Title: Sholay
Quote: Gabbar ke taap se tumhe ek hi aadmi bacha sakta hai, ek hi aadmi ... khud Gabbar
Trans: Only one man can save you from Gabbar's anger, only one man ... Gabbar himself

Title: Sholay
Quote: Basanti in kutto ke samne mat nachna
Trans: Basanti don't dance in front of these dogs

Title: Sholay
Quote: Tumhara naam kya hai Basanti?
Trans: Basanti, what is your name?

Title: Sholay
Quote: Arrey oh Sambha ... kitna inaam rakhe hai sarkar ham par?
Trans: Hey Sambha ... how much price money has the government kept on me?

Title: Don (1978)
Quote: Don ka intezaar toh gyarah mulkon ki police kar rahi hai
Trans: Police from eleven countries are also waiting for Don

Title: Don (1978)
Quote: Yeh tum janti ho ki yeh revolver khali hai ... main janta hoon ki yeh revolver khali hai ... lekin police nahin janti ki yeh revolver khali hai
Trans: You know that this revolver is empty ... I know that this revolver is empty ... but police does not know that this revolver is empty

Title: Don (1978)
Quote: Don ko pakadna mushkil hi nahin ... namumkin hai
Trans: Catching Don is not only hard ... it's impossible

Title: Don (1978)
Quote: Mujhe do tarah ki ladkiyan pasand nahi aati ... ek woh joh mere pass aane mein bahut derr lagaye ... aur ek woh joh bahut jaldi aa jaye
Trans: I don't like girls of two types ... one who takes a lot of time to come to me ... and the other who comes to me very quickly

Title: Devdas (2002)
Quote: Babuji ne kaha gaon chhod do ... sab ne kaha Paro ko chhod do ... Paro ne kaha sharab chhod do ... aaj tumne keh diya haweli chhod do ... ek din aayega jab woh kahenge, duniya hi chhod do
Trans: Dad said to leave the town ... everyone said to leave Paro ... Paro said to leave alcohol ... today you said leave the mansion ... one day will come when they will say, to leave the world itself

Title: Devdas (2002)
Quote: Kaun kambakht bardaasht karne ko peeta hai ... hum toh peete hai ki yahan par baith sake, tumhe dekh sake, tumhe bardaasht kar sake
Trans: Who the hell drinks to tolerate ... I drink so that I can sit here, so that I can see you, so that I can tolerate you

Title: Devdas (2002)
Quote: Apne hisse ki zindagi toh hum jee chuke Chunni babu, ab toh bus dhadkano ka lihaaz karte hai ... kya kahen yeh duniya waalo ko joh, aakhri saans par bhi aitraaz karte hai
Trans: Mr. Chunni I have lived my part of the life, now I am just there for the sake of my heartbeats ... what to say to these people of the world, who disagree even on my last breathe

Title: Devdas (2002)
Quote: Dil ke chaalon ko koi shayari kahe toh parwah nahi ... takleef toh tab hoti hai jab koi wah wah wah karta hai
Trans: I don't care when someone calls the heart sores as poetry ... but it bothers when they praise it

Title: Om Shanti Om
Quote: Kehte hain agar kisi cheez ko dil se chaho ... to puri kainaat usse tumse milane ki koshish mein lag jaati hai
Trans: It is saying that if you really desire something from the heart ... then the whole universe will work towards getting you that

Title: Om Shanti Om
Quote: Itni shiddat se maine tumhe paane ki koshish ki hai ... ki har zarre ne mujhe tumse milane ki saazish ki hai
Trans: I have wanted you so much, so truly ... that the entire universe has conspired for me to get you

Title: Om Shanti Om
Quote: Picture abhi baaki hai mere dost
Trans: Movie is still not over my friend

Title: Om Shanti Om
Quote: Ek chutki sindoor ki keemat tum kya jaano Ramesh babu ... ishwar ka aashirwad hota hai ek chutki sindoor ... suhagan ke sarr ka taj hota hai ek chutki sindoor ... har aurat ka khwab hota hai ek chutki sindoor
Trans: Mr. Ramesh, you don't know the value of one pinch of vermilion ...  one pinch of vermilion is the blessing of God ... one pinch of vermilion is the crown of a married woman ... one pinch of vermilion is the dream of every woman

Title: Chak De India
Quote: Peeche se nahi mardo ki tarah aage se ladoo ... woh kya hai, hamari hockey mein chakke nahi hote
Trans: Not from the back, fight like a man from the front ... it's because our hockey cannot have eunuch

Title: Chak De India
Quote: Mujhe states ke naam na sunai dete hai na dikhai dete hai ... sirf ek mulk ka naam sunai deta hai I-N-D-I-A
Trans: I can't hear nor see name of the states ... I can only hear one country name I-N-D-I-A

Title: Chak De India
Quote: Vaar karna hai toh samne waale ke goal par nahi ... samnewaale ke dimag par karo ... goal khud-ba-khud ho jayega
Trans: If you want to attack, don't attack the opponents goal ... attack the opponents mind ... the goal will come by itself

Title: Chak De India
Quote: Sattar minute, sattar minute hai tumhare paas ... shayad tumhari zindagi ke sabse khaas sattar minute ... aaj tum achcha khelo ya bura, yeh sattar minute tumhe zindagi bhar yaad rahenge ... toh kaise khelna hai aaj main tumhe nahi bataonga ... bas itna kahoonga ke jao aur yeh sattar minute jee bharkar khel lo ... kyun ki iske baad aane waali zindagi mein, chahe kuch sahi ho ya na ho, chahe kuch rahe ya na rahe, tum haaro ya jeeto ... lekin yeh sattar minute tumse koi nahi cheen sakta, koi nahi ... toh maine socha ki is match mein kaise khelna hai aaj main tumhe nahi bataonga, balki tum mujhe bataoge khel kar ... kyun ki main jaanta hoon ki agar yeh sattar minute is team ka har player apni zindagi ki sabse badiya hockey khel gaya ... toh yeh sattar minute khuda bhi tumse vapas nahi maang sakta ... toh jao, jao aur apne aap se, is zindagi se, apne khuda se aur har us insaan se jisne tumhe tum par bharosa nahi kiya apne sattar minute cheen lo
Trans: Seventy minutes, seventy minutes is what you have ... may be the most important seventy minutes of your life ... whether you play good or bad today, you'll remember these seventy minutes for your entire life ... so I won't tell you today how to play ... but I'll only say that go and play these seventy minutes with your full heart ... because in life after this, whether anything is right or wrong, whether anything remains or not, whether you win or lose ... no one will be able to snatch these seventy minutes from you, no one ... so I thought that in this match today I won't tell you how to play, instead you'll show me that by playing ... because I know that if every player of this team plays the best hockey of their life in these seventy minutes ... then even god can't ask for these seventy minutes back from you ... so go and snatch these seventy minutes from yourself, from your life, from your god and from every person who didn't believe in you

Title: Shahenshah
Quote: Mujhe malum hota aaisa kalank mere ghar mein pehda hone waala hai ... toh main apne nakhoono se apni kok phad dalti
Trans: If I knew that such a disgrace is going to be born in my house ... then I would have torn apart my womb with my nails

Title: Shahenshah
Quote: Chaand ko apni chaandni sabit karne ke liye ... chiragon ki shahadat ki zaroorat nahi padhti
Trans: To prove its moonlight the moon does not need ... the testimony of light

Title: Shahenshah
Quote: Rishtey mein to hum tumhare baap hote hai ... naam hai Shahenshah
Trans: In relation I am your father ... my name is Shahenshah

Title: Shahenshah
Quote: Main kanoon ka baazu nahi khud kanoon banonga ... aur aaisa kanoon joh khud mujrimo ko pakdega, khud mukadma sunega ... aur unka faisla bhi khud karega
Trans: I am not the arm of the law, I am myself the law ... such a law which itself catches the criminals, itself listens to the case ... and itself will decide on it

Title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
Quote: Pyar dosti hai ... agar woh meri sab se achchi dost nahin ban sakti, to main usse kabhi pyar kar hi nahi sakta ... kyun ki dosti bina toh pyar hota hi nahin ... simple, pyar dosti hai
Trans: Love is friendship ... if she can't be my best friend, then I cannot fall in love with her ... because love cannot happen without friendship ... simple, love is friendship

Title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
Quote: Hum ek baar jeete hai, ek baar marte hai, shaadi bhi ek baar hoti hai ... aur pyar ek baar hi hota hai
Trans: We live once, we die once, we get married once ... and love also happens only once

Title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
Quote: Jabse tumne pyar ko samjha hai, pyar ko jana hai ... sirf us hi se pyar kiya hai
Trans: Ever since you have understood love, known love ... you've only loved him

Title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
Quote: Kuch kuch hota hai Rahul, tum nahi samjhoge
Trans: Something something happens Rahul, you won't understand

Title: Jab We Met
Quote: Main apni favorite hoon
Trans: I am my own favorite

Title: Jab We Met
Quote: Jab koi pyar mein hota hai ... toh koi sahi galat nahin hota
Trans: When someone is in love ... then there is no right wrong

Title: Jab We Met
Quote: Ab toh mera haath chhod do ... itni bhi sundar nahin hoon main
Trans: Atleast leave my hand now ... I am not that beautiful

Title: Jab We Met
Quote: Tu original piece hai
Trans: You are an original piece

Title: Anand
Quote: Babumushoi, zindagi badi honi chahiye ... lambi nahin
Trans: My friend, life should be big ... not long

Title: Anand
Quote: Babumushoi, zindagi aur maut upar waale ke haath hai ... usse na toh aap badal sakte hai na main ... hum sab to rangmanch ki kathputliyan hai jinki dor upar waale ki ungliyon mein bandhi hai
Trans: My friend, life and death is in the hands of God ... you can't change it and neither can I ... we all are puppets of the theater whose string is tied in the fingers of God

Title: Anand
Quote: Jab tak zinda hoon tab tak mara nahi ... jab mar gaya sala main hi nahi
Trans: Until I am alive I am not dead ... when I die bloody I won't be there

Title: Anand
Quote: Hum aane waale gham ko kheench taan kar aaj ki khushi pe le aate hai ... aur us khushi mein zehar ghol dete hai
Trans: We stretch and pull the sadness of the future and bring it onto today's happiness ... and we mix poison in that happiness

Title: Baazigar
Quote: Kabhi kabhi jeetne ke liye kuch haarna bhi padta hai ... aur haar kar jeetne waale ko baazigar kehte hai
Trans: Sometimes to win you must lose something ... and one who wins from a losing position is called a gambler

Title: Baazigar
Quote: Udne ki baat parinde karte hai ... tutte huye par nahi
Trans: Birds talking about flying ... not broken wings

Title: Baazigar
Quote: Ab sailaab aayega Madan Chopra ... sailaab aayega
Trans: Now flood will come Madan Chopra ... flood will come

Title: Baazigar
Quote: Burai milne mein nahi hai ... burai chup chupkar milne mein hai
Trans: It is not bad to meet ... it is bad to meet in hiding

Title: Chalte Chalte (2003)
Quote: Yaad rakhna ki duniya ke kisi kone mein ek aadmi hai joh bahut khush hai ... kyun ki tum khush ho
Trans: Remember in some corner of the world there is a person who is very happy ... because you are happy

Title: Chalte Chalte (2003)
Quote: Agar main uthata toh tum jaag jaati ... agar tum jaag jaati toh chali jaati ... aur agar chali jaati toh main itna kareeb se tumhe kab dekhta
Trans: If I'd woke you up then you would have awakened ... if you would have awakened then you would have left ... and if you would have left then I wouldn't have been able to see you from so close

Title: Chalte Chalte (2003)
Quote: Mujhe andhar aane ke liye mat kehna ... tumhe na nahi keh paonga ... andhar bhi nahi aa paonga
Trans: Don't ask me to come inside ... I won't be able to say no to you ... neither would be able to come inside

Title: Chalte Chalte (2003)
Quote: Mujhe nahi malum business kaise hota hai ... magar pyar toh aaise hi hota hai
Trans: I don't know how business is done ... but love is done this way only

Title: Damini
Quote: Tarikh par tarikh, tarikh par tarikh, tarikh par tarikh, tarikh par tarikh milti rahi hai ... lekin insaaf nahi mila my lord, insaaf nahi mila ... mili hai toh sirf yeh tarikh
Trans: Date on date, date on date, date on date, we have got date on date ... but we haven't received justice my lord, no justice ... all we have got is this date

Title: Damini
Quote: Jab yeh dhai kilo ka haath kisi pe padta hai na ... toh aadmi uthta nahi ... utth jata hai
Trans: When this two and half kg hand will fall on someone ... then he won't get up ... he will go straight up

Title: Damini
Quote: Waqt pe shaadi na karo ... toh aadmi bahek hi jaata hai
Trans: If you don't get married in time ... then a man gets wandered

Title: Damini
Quote: Aaise khilone bazaar mein bahut bikte hai ... magar isse khelne ke liye joh jigar chahiye na ... woh duniya ke kisi bazaar mein nahi bikta ... mard usse lekar pehda hota hai
Trans: Toys like this sell a lot in the market ... but the courage that you need to play with them ... is not sold in any market of this world ... a man is born with that

Title: Darr
Quote: I love you KKKKK ... Kiran
Trans: I love you KKKKK ... Kiran

Title: Darr
Quote: Sachchi mohabbat ko pechaanne ke liye aankhon ki nahi ... dil ki zaroorat hoti hai
Trans: To recognize true love you don't need eyes ... you need a heart

Title: Darr
Quote: Naam loonga toh woh badnaam ho jayegi
Trans: If I take her name she will get disgraced

Title: Darr
Quote: Joh taar se nikli hai, woh dhun sabne suni hai ... joh saans pe ghuzri hai, woh kis dil ko pata hai
Trans: The one that comes out of a string, everyone has heard that music ... the thing that my breathe has gone through, no ones heart knows about that

Title: Deewaar (1975)
Quote: Main aaj bhi phenke hue paise nahin uthata
Trans: Even today I don't collect money that is thrown

Title: Deewaar (1975)
Quote: Mere paas maa hai
Trans: I have mom

Title: Deewaar (1975)
Quote: Aaj khush to bahut hoge tum?
Trans: Today you will be very happy right?

Title: Deewaar (1975)
Quote: Koi is liye pee raha hai ki din bhar kaam kiya, thak gaye ... koi is liye pee raha hai ki aaj din bhar kuch nahi kiya, bore ho gaye ... koi is liye pee raha hai ki aaj doston ke saath hai ... aur koi is liye pee raha hai ki aaj dost saath nahi
Trans: Someone is drinking because they've worked for the entire day and are tired ... someone is drinking because they didn't do anything today and are bored ... someone is drinking because they are with friends today ... and someone is drinking because today their friends are not with them

Title: Dhadkan
Quote: Main tumhe bhool jaon yeh ho nahi sakta ... aur tum mujhe bhool jao yeh main hone nahi doonga
Trans: Me forgetting you is never going to happen ... and you forgetting me I won't let that happen

Title: Dhadkan
Quote: Joh izzat, shradha, pyar ek beti de sakti hai ... woh ek beta kabhi nahi de sakta ... lekin main yeh bhool gaya tha ... joh sharmindgi, joh zalalat ek beti de sakti hai ... woh bhi ek beta kabhi nahi deta
Trans: The respect, faith, love a daughter can give ... a son can never give that ... but I had forgotton that ... the shame, the disgrace a daughter can give ... even that a son can never give

Title: Dhadkan
Quote: Kyun main jeet ke bhi haar gaya ... aur woh haar kar bhi jeet gaya?
Trans: Why did I lose even after winning ... and why did he win even after losing?

Title: Dhadkan
Quote: Meri kismat mujhpe kya rohegi ... tumhari mohabbat joh mere saath hai
Trans: My destiny can't cry on me ... your love is there with me

Title: Fanaa
Quote: Humse door jaoge kaise, dil se hum mein bhulaoge kaise ... hum woh khushboo hai joh saason mein bastein hai, khud ki saason ko rok paoge kaise
Trans: How can you stay away from me and go, how can your heart forget me ... I am that fragrance which lives in the breath, how will you stop your breath

Title: Fanaa
Quote: Kehte hai pyar mein neend udh jaati hai ... koi humse bhi mohabbat kare ... kambhakt neend bahut aati hai
Trans: They say one can't sleep in love ... I wish someone loved me to ... bloody I am very sleepy

Title: Fanaa
Quote: Tere dil mein meri saanson ko panaah mil jaye ... tere ishq mein meri jaan fanaa ho jaye
Trans: If my breath found a place in your heart ... I can get destroyed in your love

Title: Fanaa
Quote: Phool hoon gulaab ka chameli ka mat samajhna ... aashiq hoon aapka apni saheli ka mat samajhna
Trans: Don't judge me as jasmine I am a rose flower ... don't judge me as your friends lover I am yours

Title: Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam
Quote: Agar tum mujhe yun hi dekhti rahi ... toh tumhe mujhse pyar ho jayega
Trans: If you keep looking at me like this only ... then you will fall in love with me

Title: Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam
Quote: Sameer hawa ka jhoka
Trans: Sameer a gust of air

Title: Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam
Quote: Kabhi kabhi insaan kuch nahi kehkar bhi ... sab kuch keh deta hai
Trans: Sometimes a person without saying anything ... says everything

Title: Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam
Quote: Chahane aur haasil karne mein bahut phark hai ... pyar sirf haasil karna nahi ... pyar dene ka naam hai
Trans: There is big difference between wanting and getting something ... love is not only about getting ... love is also about giving

Title: Kalicharan
Quote: Aaj ke zamaane mein toh baimaani hi ek aaisa dhanda reh gaya hai ... joh poori imaandari ke saath kiya jaata hai
Trans: In today's world cheating is the only one business that is left ... which is done with full honesty

Title: Kalicharan
Quote: Sara shehar mujhe lion ke naam se jaanta hai
Trans: The whole city knows me by the name of lion

Title: Kalicharan
Quote: Jhoot aksar bahut aasani se gaale se neeche utar jaata hai ... sach ko nighalna bahut kathin hai
Trans: A lie can be swallowed pretty easily ... but it is very hard to swallow the truth

Title: Kalicharan
Quote: Aashirwad toh bade aadmi dete hai ... hum toh sirf rai de sakte hai
Trans: Big people give blessings ... I can only give an opinion

Title: Maine Pyar Kiya
Quote: Udaas hona, yun akele mein rona ... is injurious to health, sehat ke liye hanikarak hota hai
Trans: To be sad and crying in alone ... is injurious to health

Title: Maine Pyar Kiya
Quote: Dosti ka ek oosul hai madam ... no sorry, no thank you
Trans: Friendship has one rule madam ... no sorry, no thank you

Title: Maine Pyar Kiya
Quote: Dosti ki hai nibhani toh padegi hi
Trans: If friendship is there then one must fulfil it

Title: Maine Pyar Kiya
Quote: Abhi mood nahin hai
Trans: I am not in the mood

Title: Mr. India
Quote: Mogambo khush hua
Trans: Mogambo is happy

Title: Mr. India
Quote: Indian God marta hai ... aur hasta bhi hai
Trans: Indian God hits ... and laughs also

Title: Mr. India
Quote: Gayi bhains pani mein
Trans: The buffalo went in the water

Title: Mr. India
Quote: Aaj tak tum log baimaani aur zulm ka bazaar garam karte rahe ... magar ab tumhare zulm aur paap ke pyale chalak uthe hai ... ab tumhare ek ek jurm ka hisaab liya jayega
Trans: Till today you guys have been heating up the market of dishonesty and injustice ... but now your bowls of injustice and sin are full ... and now every single crime of yours will be accounted for

Title: No Entry
Quote: Kutta jab gaadi ke peeche bhaagta hai toh ... usko gaadi khareedni hai yah chalani hoti hai?
Trans: When a dog runs behind a car then ... does he want to buy the car or drive it?

Title: No Entry
Quote: Meri toh har raat suhaag raat hoti hai
Trans: Every night of mine is a nuptial night

Title: No Entry
Quote: Jab ek aurat se itna dukh utha liya ... toh doosri aurat se thoda sa sukh uthana yaar
Trans: Since you've taken so much grief from one woman ... hence take a little bit of enjoyment from another woman

Title: No Entry
Quote: Aapka dimaag cassette ki tarah dono taraf chalta hai ... A side bhi, B side bhi
Trans: Your mind works from both sides like a cassette ... from A side, and from B side

Title: Pardes
Quote: Nadi, nadi nahin jismein pani na ho ... hawa, hawa nahi jismein ravani na ho ... woh shaadi, shaadi nahi jismein prem kahani na ho
Trans: A river is not a river without water in it ... the wind is not the wind without the flow in it ... a marriage is not a marriage without a love story in it

Title: Pardes
Quote: Jab aadmi daulat aur taqat ki wajah se jitna bada hota jaata hai ... utna hi sach aur asliyat se door hota jaata hai
Trans: The bigger a man gets by money and power ... the farther he gets from truth and reality

Title: Pardes
Quote: Joh sach sunna chahte hai ... woh apni jeb mein pistol aur dil mein nafrat lekar nahi aate
Trans: Those who want to listen to the truth ... they don't come with a gun in their pocket and hatred in their heart

Title: Pardes
Quote: Agar Ganga ki hifazat karna pyar hai ... toh hai, pyar hai aur hamesha rahega
Trans: If protecting Ganga is love ... then yes, I love her and will always love her

Title: Raja Babu
Quote: Main hoon Nandu sabka bandhu
Trans: I am Nandu and everyone's friend

Title: Raja Babu
Quote: Samajhta nahi hai yaar
Trans: Why don't you understand my friend

Title: Raja Babu
Quote: Kar bhala toh ho bhala
Trans: If you do good then good things will happen to you

Title: Raja Babu
Quote: Jis saanp ko main sari zindagi apna khoon pilata raha ... us saanp ne aaj mujhko dassa hai
Trans: The snake that I fed my blood lifelong ... today that snake has bit me

Title: Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein
Quote: Ek ladki dekhi bilkul bijli ki tarah ... one flash ... ek chamak aur main apna dil kho behta ... mujhe lagta hai mujhe us ladki se behad pyar ho gaya hai ... bas ab ek hi tamanna hai ... rehna hai uske dil mein
Trans: I saw a girl just like lightning ... one flash ... one shine and I lost my heart ... I think I am completely in love with that girl ... now there is only one wish ... that I want to stay in her heart

Title: Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein
Quote: Kuch mulaqatein yaadein chhod jaati hai ... aur kuch vaade ... aur kuch aaisi bhi hoti hai, jinke hone se ek nahi shuruvat ka ehsaas hota hai
Trans: Some meetings leave behind memories ... and some promises ... and some are also like, their presence gives a feeling of a new beginning

Title: Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein
Quote: Sachcha pyar kabhi khali haath wapas nahi aata hai
Trans: True love never comes back empty handed

Title: Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein
Quote: Jis din insaan duniya ki kisi bhi ladki ko samajh gaya na ... us din duniya swarg ban jayegi
Trans: The day a man understands any girl in this world ... that day this world will become heaven

Title: Sarkar
Quote: Mujhe joh sahi lagta hai main karta hoon ... woh chahe bhagwan ke khilaaf ho, samaaj ke khilaaf ho, police, kanoon ... yah phir poore system ke khilaaf kyun na ho
Trans: I do what I feel is right ... whether it is against God, against the society, police, law ... or it may be against the whole system

Title: Sarkar
Quote: Nazdiki fayda dekhne se pehle ... door ka nuksaan sochna chahiye
Trans: Before you claim the shorterm profit ... you should think about the longterm loss

Title: Sarkar
Quote: Jiske paas power hai ... uska wrong bhi right ho jaata hai
Trans: The one who has the power ... even his wrong becomes the right

Title: Sarkar
Quote: Main kisiko soochne se nahi ... karne se rokta hoon
Trans: I don't stop anyone from thinking ... I stop them from doing

Title: Sharaabi
Quote: Yeh insaan nahi hai ... yeh toh machine hai ... aaisi machine joh sirf note chaapti hai aur note khaati hai
Trans: He is not a human ... he is a machine ... a machine that prints money and that eats money

Title: Sharaabi
Quote: Sharaab ki botal pe agar main label ki tarah chipak gaya hoon ... toh is label ko chipkane waale aap hai
Trans: If I am stuck as a label on an alcohol bottle ... then you are the person who stuck this label

Title: Sharaabi
Quote: Aaj itni bhi maisir nahi maikhane mein ... jitni hum chhod diya karte the paimane mein
Trans: Today there is not even that much alcohol in the bar ... how much I used to leave over in a glass

Title: Sharaabi
Quote: Kalakar sirf taarif ka bhooka hota hai ... paise ka nahi
Trans: A performer is only hungry of appreciation ... not of money

Title: Silsila
Quote: Main aur meri tanhayi, aksar yeh baatein karte hai ... tum hoti toh kaisa hota ... tum yeh kehti, tum woh kehti, tum is baat pe hairaan hoti, tum us baat pe kitni hasti ... tum hoti toh aaisa hota, tum hoti toh waisa hota ... main aur meri tanhayi, aksar yeh baatein karte hai
Trans: Me and my loneliness, often we talk ... if you were here then how would it have been ... you would have said this and said that, you would have been surprised at this, how much would you have laughed on this ... if you were here then this would have happened and that would have happened ... me and my loneliness, often we talk

Title: Silsila
Quote: Phool khamosh rehkar bhi apne rang aur khusboo se bahut kuch keh jaate hai
Trans: A flower stays quiet but it still says a lot with its colour and fragrance

Title: Silsila
Quote: Woh baat joh lafzo mein ada ho jaye ... woh baat hi kya hui
Trans: The thing that can be said with words ... is not a thing at all

Title: Silsila

Trans: So what if a dream turns into an incident and scatters ... time cannot change the emotions ... the feeling doesn't die when one becomes distant ... this love is a relationship of hearts ... a relationship which cannot be distributed like land on the borders ... you may be the beautiful moon of someone else's nights ... but you are present in every colour of my world ... my dreams, my hopes are enlightened because of you ... whichever path I may pass through, but you are my destination

Trans: In life if you want to become something, achieve something, win something ... then always listen to your heart ... and if your heart doesn't reply to you then close your eyes and take the name of your mom and dad ... then see you will achieve everything, everything that is hard will become easy ... victory will be yours, just yours

Trans: When I close my eyes I see you ... when I open my eyes then I want to see you ... if you're not around then I feel you everywhere ... every second, every minute, all the time

Title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara

Trans: Whenever the cloud of pain loomed, whenever the shadow of sadness waved, whenever tears reached my eyelids, whenever this lonely heart was worried ... I asked, why do you cry my heart ... this is what happens in the world ... this deep silence, time has given it to everyone ... everyone has a little bit of sorrow, everyone has a little bit of sunshine ... your eyes are wet for no reason, in every moment there is a new season ... why do you lose moments like that, why do you cry my heart

Trans: If you carry eagerness in your heart then you are living, if you carry dreams in your eyes then you are living ... learn to live freely like the wind, learn to flow freely like the river ... embrace every moment with open arms, see a new horizon every moment with your eyes ... if you carry surprises in your eyes then you are living, if you carry eagerness in your heart then you are living

Trans: I have come here for you ... and you are made for me

Title: Chaalbaaz
Quote: Main madira nahi peeti ji
Trans: I don't drink alcohol

Title: Kaal
Quote: Jis raaste par sher ke panje ho ... us par koi chalne ki himmat nahi karta
Trans: The path on which there are tiger paw prints ... no one dares to walk on it

Title: Kaal
Quote: Kuch log shikaar karne aate hai ... khud shikaar ban jaate hai
Trans: Some people come to hunt ... and they themselves get hunted

Title: Kaal
Quote: Joh dikhta hai woh hota nahi ... aur joh nahi dikhta usse hum maante nahi
Trans: What you see doesn't happen ... and what you can't see, we don't believe that

Title: Kaal
Quote: Jungle mein jaanwar ka shikaar ho toh insaan ko pata bhi nahi chalta ... lekin insaan ka ho toh jaanwaro ko bhi khabar ho jaati hai
Trans: In the jungle when an animal gets hunted then humans don't even come to know ... but when a human gets hunted then even the animals come to know

Title: Border
Quote: Zindagi ka doosra naam problem hai
Trans: Life's second name is problem

Title: Border
Quote: Hum hi hum hai toh kya hum hai ... tum hi tum ho toh kya tum ho
Trans: If it's only me, then what am I ... if it's only you, then what are you

Title: Border
Quote: Isse pehle ki main tujhe gaddar karaar dekar goli maar doon ... bhag ja yahan se
Trans: Before I pronounce you a traitor and shoot you ... run away from here

Title: Border
Quote: Hum toh kisi doosre ki dharti par nazar bhi nahi dalte ... lekin itne nalayak bachche bhi nahi hai ... ki koi hamari dharti maa par nazar daale aur hum chup chap dekhte rahe
Trans: We don't even eye on someone elses land ... but we are not so unworthy kids ... that we will sit quiet if someone eyes on our land

Title: Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap
Quote: Main maroonga to bullet se hi maroonga ... BP ya sugar se nahi
Trans: If I die, I'll die only from a bullet ... not from blood pressure or diabetes

Title: Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap
Quote: Is duniya mein do type ke log hote hai ... ek woh joh khud batate hai ki woh kaun hai ... doosre woh jinke baare mein duniya batati hai ki woh kaun hai
Trans: There are two kinds of people in this world ... one who themselves say who they are ... and others are, about whom the world says who they are

Title: Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap
Quote: Heart attack se mard marte hai ... kyun ki hamare pass dil hota hai
Trans: Men die of a heart attack ... because they have a heart

Title: Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap
Quote: Kahani ke andhar ki kahani abhi baki hai mere dost
Trans: The story inside the story is not yet over my friend

Title: Zor
Quote: Masle hal hote hai pyar se, vishvas se, aman se
Trans: Problems are solved with love, with trust, with peace

Title: Zor
Quote: Reaction zyada, action zero
Trans: There is more reaction and zero action

Title: Zor
Quote: Is desh mein insaaf kachhue ki chaal chalta hai
Trans: In this country justice moves at the pace of a tortoise

Title: Zor
Quote: Neta, sadhu, mafia ... gum ki tarah chipke hue hai hamare desh ke shareer se
Trans: Politicians, saints, mafia ... are stuck to the body of our country like glue

Title: Dharmatma
Quote: Zindagi mein sirf khushiya baanti jaati hai ... gham ka bhoj har insaan ko akele hi dhona padta hai
Trans: In life you can only distribute happiness ... every person has to carry the weight of sorrow by themselves

Title: Dharmatma
Quote: Joh log talwar ke zor par zinda rehte hai ... ek din unki gardan uss hi talwar se katti hai
Trans: People who live on the strength of the sword ... one day the same sword will cut their neck

Title: Dharmatma
Quote: Chori chahe ek paise ki ho yah lakh rupaiye ki ... chori, chori hai
Trans: It does not matter if the robbery is for a paisa or lakh rupees ... a robbery, is a robbery

Title: Dharmatma
Quote: Main roz kanoon banata hoon aur roz todhta hoon
Trans: I make the law everyday and break it everyday

Title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama
Quote: Kutton ka koi Sunday nahi hota ... kutte saaton din kutte hi hote hai
Trans: Dogs don't have a Sunday ... dogs are dogs for all 7 days

Title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama
Quote: In ladkiyon ko na koi khush nahi rakh sakta ... a happy woman is a myth!
Trans: No one can keep a girl happy ... a happy woman is a myth!

Title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama
Quote: Any discussion with a woman is an argument!
Trans: Any discussion with a woman is an argument!

Title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama
Quote: Shaadi ke pehle woh nagin been kyun bajhta hai ... kyun ki na band waala bhi tumhe chetavani de raha hota hai kaun aa raha hai tumhari zindagi mein ... inka signature tune hai woh
Trans: Why do they play the snake's tune before you get married ... because even the person playing the band is warning you, as to who is coming in your life ... it's their signature tune

Title: Trishul
Quote: Main paanch lakh ka sauda karne aaya hoon ... aur meri jeb mein paanch phooti kaudiyaan bhi nahin hai
Trans: I have come to make a deal of 5 lakhs ... and I don't even have 5 pennies in my pocket

Title: Trishul
Quote: Mujhse paanch minute na milkar ... aapne apna paanch lakh ka nuksaan kiya hai
Trans: By not meeting with me for 5 minutes ... you have incurred a loss of 5 lakhs

Title: Trishul
Quote: Mere zakhm jaldi nahin bharte
Trans: My wounds don't heal fast

Title: Trishul
Quote: Jisne pachees baras apni maa ko har roz thoda thoda marte dekha ho ... usse maut se kya darr lagega
Trans: One who has seen his mother die little little everyday for 25 years ... what will death scare him

Title: Soldier
Quote: Tum logon ko na chitta ki aag milegi ... na dharti maa ki godh
Trans: You guys will not get the fire for your pyre ... and neither the lap of the motherland

Title: Soldier
Quote: Tumhare seene mein joh dil hai woh Hindustani hai ... aur Hindustani dil awaara nahi hota ... yeh chahta toh sari duniya ko hai, lekin mitta kisi Hindustani par hai
Trans: The heart that you have within you is of an Indian ... and an Indian heart is not a tramp ... it loves the entire world, but it dies only for an Indian

Title: Soldier
Quote: Main contract lete waqt paisa dekhta hoon ... paise dene waale ko nahin
Trans: When I take a contract I look at the money ... and not at the person who pays

Title: Soldier
Quote: Aaj ke zamaane mein sher sirf do hi jagah hifazat se reh sakte hai ... ek circus mein aur doosra chidiya ghar mein
Trans: In today's age a tiger can live safely only in two places ... one in a circus and other in a zoo

Title: Ishq
Quote: Agar tum mein mazaak sehne ki himmat nahi hai ... toh mazaak kiya bhi mat karo
Trans: If you don't have the courage to stand a joke ... then don't be jovial yourself

Title: Ishq
Quote: Aap hai gul-e-gulzar, mausam-e-bahar ... chehre par hai gussa, dil mein hai pyar ... aa gale lag ja mere yaar
Trans: You are a beautiful flower of the spring ... you have anger on your face and love in your heart ... come give me a hug my friend

Title: Ishq
Quote: Life mein teen cheezon ke peeche khabi nahi bhagna chahiye ... bus, train aur chokri ... ek gayi doosri aati hai
Trans: In life you should never run behind 3 things ... bus, train and girl ... one goes another one comes

Title: Ishq
Quote: Abhe oh ujhdi hui riyasat ke lutte huye sultan
Trans: Hey you broken ruler of a ruined kingdom

Title: Salaam-E-Ishq
Quote: Mere kuch sapne the, apne sapne the ... par tumse milne ke baad ... tumhare khwab mere khwab ban gaye ... tumhari zindagi meri zindagi ban gayi
Trans: I had some dreams, my own dreams ... but after meeting you ... your dreams became my dreams ... your life became my life

Title: Salaam-E-Ishq
Quote: Har cheez karo limit ke andar ... lekin pyar limit ke bahut baahar
Trans: Do everything within the limit ... but love totally out of limit

Title: Salaam-E-Ishq
Quote: Hamara kal jaisa bhi ho, hum saath milkar usse khoobsurat banayenge ... lekin agar tum saath na aayi ... toh na aaj hai na aane waala kal
Trans: However our tomorrow may be, together we'll make it beautiful ... but if you're not there ... then there is no today and neither there is tomorrow

Title: Salaam-E-Ishq
Quote: Pyar har waqt saath rehta hai ... kyun ki pyar waqt se nahin, usse kiya jaata hai jiske saath waqt guzaarte hain
Trans: Love is with you every time ... because you don't love time, you love the person with whom you spend the time

Title: Naseeb (1997)
Quote: Pyar hum dono ne kiya ... magar tadapna sirf mere naseeb mein aaya
Trans: We both fell in love ... but the suffering only came in my destiny

Title: Naseeb (1997)
Quote: Mohabaat ka dard bada jaan leva hota hai
Trans: The pain of love can take one's life

Title: Naseeb (1997)
Quote: Paal le koi rog nadan zindagi ke vaaste ... sirf sehat ke sahare zindagi katti nahi
Trans: Build some bad habits for this silly life ... life cannot be completed only with good health

Title: Naseeb (1997)
Quote: Mujh jaise dost baat maar sakte hai ... magar kabhi laat nahi maar sakte
Trans: Friends like me can hit you with the words ... but not with the leg

Title: Kaminey
Quote: Paisa kamane ke do raaste hai ... ek shortcut aur doosra chota shortcut
Trans: There are two ways to make money ... shortcut and small shortcut

Title: Kaminey
Quote: Life badi kutti cheez hai ... aur is duniya mein kutton ka bas ek hi jawaab hai
Trans: Life is a dog ... and in this world dogs only have one answer

Title: Kaminey
Quote: Zindagi mein hamari vaat isse nahi lagti ki hum kaunsa raasta chunte hai ... vaat lagti hai isse ki hum kaunsa raasta chhodte hai
Trans: In life we don't get screwed for the path we take ... we get screwed for the path that we leave

Title: Kaminey
Quote: Mere har jhoot ki niyat sachi hai
Trans: Every lie of mine had an honest intention

Title: Coolie
Quote: Tere haath mein maut ka samaan hai toh ... mere seene pe khuda ka naam hai
Trans: If you have an item of death in your hands ... then I have Gods name on my chest

Title: Coolie
Quote: Mazdoor ka paseena sookhne se pehle, uski mazdoori mil jani chahiye janaab
Trans: Sir, the laborer must be paid before his sweat dries out

Title: Coolie
Quote: Koi mai ka laal kisi ko do waqt ki roti nahi dila sakta ... kyun ki roti dilane waala woh malik hai ... jisne har insaan ko do haath diye hai aur kaha hai ki ... cheer de zameen ka seena aur nikaal le apne hisse ki roti
Trans: No one person can provide two meals a day to another person ... because food is provided by God ... who has given everyone two hands and said that ... tear apart the body of the earth and remove the food of your share

Title: Coolie
Quote: Jiske seene mein dil nahi usse dil ki bemaari kaise ho sakti hai?
Trans: One who doesn't have a heart, how can he get a heart attack?

Title: Dil Chahta Hai
Quote: Mujhe yakeen hai ki main sirf is liye janma hoon ... ki tumse pyar kar sakun ... tum sirf is liye, ki ek din meri ban jao
Trans: I am certain that I am only born so that ... I can love you ... and you so that, one day you can become mine

Title: Dil Chahta Hai
Quote: Pyar sooch samajh kar nahin kiya jaata ... bas ho jaata hai
Trans: Love is not done with thought and understanding ... it just happens

Title: Dil Chahta Hai
Quote: Ya toh dosti gehri hai ... ya yeh photo 3D hai
Trans: Either this friendship is strong ... or this photo is 3D

Title: Dil Chahta Hai
Quote: Perfection ko improve karna mushkil hota hai
Trans: It is hard to improve on perfection

Title: Khuda Gawah
Quote: Itna mat sooch ... sooch gehri ho jaaye ... toh faisle kamzor ho jaate hai
Trans: Don't think so much ... if the thoughts become deep ... then the decisions become weak

Title: Khuda Gawah
Quote: Faanoos banke jiski hifaazat hawa kare ... woh shama kya bhuje jise roshan khuda kare
Trans: When a lamp gets protection from the wind ... then no one can blow the candle that is lit by God

Title: Khuda Gawah
Quote: Jahil ki baaton ka jawaab ... khamoshi hota hai
Trans: The reply to an uneducated persons question ... is silence

Title: Khuda Gawah
Quote: Chaudwee ka chaand ho ya aaftab ho ... joh bhi ho tum khuda ki kasam lajawab ho
Trans: Are you the full moon or the sun ... whatever you are, I swear to God, you are stupendous

Title: Mann
Quote: Saanson ke bina shayad kuch pal main jee sakta hoon ... lekin tumhare bina nahin
Trans: May be I can live a few moments without breathing ... but not without you

Title: Mann
Quote: Husn ko chaand, jawani ko kamal kehte hai ... dekh kar hum tujhe ek shouk ghazal kehte hai ... uff yeh sang-e-marmar sa tarasha hua shafaf badan ... dekhne wale tujhe Taj Mahal kehte hai
Trans: Beauty is called as the moon, youth is called as a flower ... after seeing you I'd like to say a poem ... oh this pure chiseled body made from marble ... people who see you call you the Taj Mahal

Title: Mann
Quote: Vishvas jeetna aasaan hai, usse todna usse bhi aasaan hai ... magar mushkil hai us vishvas ko nibhana
Trans: To win faith is easy, and it is even easier to break that faith ... but it is difficult to fulfill that faith

Title: Mann
Quote: Tujhko dekhenge sitare toh ziya mangenge, aur pyase teri zulfon se ghata mangenge ... apne kaandhe se dupatta na sarakne dena, varna budhe bhi jawani ki dua mangenge
Trans: If the stars see you then they will ask for light, and the thirsty will ask for clouds from your hair ... don't let the scarf slide from your shoulders, otherwise even the old will pray and ask for youth

Title: Hum Tum
Quote: Sachcha pyar kabhi adhoora nahi rehta ... ek na ek din toh woh poora hoga hi ... kyun ki yeh zindagi bahut lambi hai
Trans: True love never remains incomplete ... one day or the other it will get complete ... because life is very long

Title: Hum Tum
Quote: Kabhi toh pehli mulaqat hi kaafi hoti hai ... aur kabhi bahut si mulaqatein lag jaati hai
Trans: Sometimes the first meeting is enough ... and sometimes it takes a lot of meetings

Title: Hum Tum
Quote: Yeh zindagi bahut lambi hai ... aur hamare pass waqt bahut kam hai
Trans: This life is very long ... and we have very little time

Title: Hum Tum
Quote: Log burre thodi na hote hai ... achche logon par bas burra waqt aa jaata hai
Trans: People are not bad ... it's just that good people also have bad times

Title: Pukar (2000)
Quote: Hamara har jawaan ek nuclear bomb hai
Trans: Our every soldier is a nuclear bomb

Title: Pukar (2000)
Quote: Mere desh ke liye mera jazba, meri vardi mein nahi ... meri ragon mein daud raha hai
Trans: My passion for my country, is not in my uniform ... it is running in my veins

Title: Pukar (2000)
Quote: Itni laashen bicha doonga ... ki log Jallianwala Bagh ko bhool jayenge
Trans: I will spread so many dead bodies ... that people will forget Jallianwala Bagh

Title: Vaastav
Quote: Mumbai pe raj karta hoon ... raj
Trans: I rule over Mumbai ... rule

Title: Vaastav
Quote: Asli hai asli ... pachaas tola, pachaas tola ... kitna, pachaas tola
Trans: It is real ... 50 tolas, 50 tolas ... how much, 50 tolas

Title: Vaastav
Quote: Tere karm hi nahi re ... teri saali poori atma sadeli hai sadeli
Trans: Not only your deeds ... your whole bloody soul has gone bad

Title: Vaastav
Quote: Aye Baba ... pachaas idea hai dimaag mein
Trans: Oh dad ... I have fifty ideas in my mind

Title: The Legend Of Bhagat Singh
Quote: Leave my land or get thrown out
Trans: Leave my land or get thrown out

Title: The Legend Of Bhagat Singh
Quote: Aap namak ka haq ada karo ... main mitti ka haq ada karta hoon
Trans: You fulfill the duties of your job ... I'll fulfill the duties of my land

Title: The Legend Of Bhagat Singh
Quote: Khoon bahana koi badi baat nahi hai ... chahe woh apna ho yah samne waale ka ... badi baat toh yeh hai ki jism se tapka hua ek boond khoon, aane waali nasal ke saare ke saare khoon mein ubaala la sakta hai yah nahi
Trans: Shedding blood is not a big thing ... be it our own or someone else's ... the big thing is that whether a single drop of blood from the body, can boil the entire blood of the coming generation or not

Title: The Legend Of Bhagat Singh
Quote: Nah toh mujhe maut ka khauf hai ... aur nah hi rab ka yakeen
Trans: I am not scared of death ... and neither do I believe in God

Title: Delhi Belly
Quote: Joh chuaka udhte hue jaaye ... usse chakka kehte hai
Trans: The boundary that flies ... is called a sixer

Title: Delhi Belly
Quote: Sir loondry
Trans: Sir laundry

Title: Delhi Belly
Quote: Sexy hona full time kaam hai
Trans: Being sexy is a full time job

Title: Dil Se
Quote: Sabse zyada pasand mujhe yeh doori hai ... kyun ki agar ye doori na ho ... toh tumhare kareeb aane ka bahana na mile
Trans: I love this distance the most ... because if this distance isn't there ... then I won't have a reason to come near you

Title: Dil Se
Quote: Kuch log ret par likhe naamo ki tarah hote hai ... hawa ka ek hi jhoka jinhe udha deta hai
Trans: Some people are like names written on the sand ... with one gust of wind they blow away

Title: Dil Se
Quote: Yeh zaroori nahi ki tum ek behtar samaaj mein pehda ho ... zaroori yeh hai ki doosro ko tum ek behtar samaaj dekar vida lo
Trans: It is not necessary that you must be born in a good society ... but it is necessary that you give others a better society

Title: Dil Se
Quote: Joh ajnabi desh mein soo gaya ... uska sab kuch kho gaya
Trans: One who sleeps in a foreign country ... loses everything

Title: Rocket Singh: Salesman Of The Year
Quote: Business number nahi, business log hai ... sirf log
Trans: Business is not a number, business is people ... only people

Title: Rocket Singh: Salesman Of The Year
Quote: Risk toh Spiderman ko bhi lena padta hai ... main toh phir bhi salesman hoon
Trans: Even Spiderman has to take risk ... I am only a salesman

Title: Rocket Singh: Salesman Of The Year
Quote: Boss number kam hai ... dimag nahin
Trans: Boss my grades are low ... not my mind

Title: Rocket Singh: Salesman Of The Year
Quote: Jab khoon pasina ek saath kagaz par chapta hai na ... table bed ban jaati hai aur office ghar ... bhook pyas bhool jaati hai ... baal bachche rul jaate hai ... tab jaake saali company banti hai
Trans: When blood and sweat are printed together on a paper ... when the table becomes the bed and the office becomes the home ... when hunger forgets the thirst ... then a company is made

Title: Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro
Quote: Draupadi teri akele ki nahi hai ... hum sab shareholder hai
Trans: Draupadi is just not yours ... we are all shareholders

Title: Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro
Quote: Nalayak, adharmi, durachari, mamachari, bhrashtachari, bol sorry!
Trans: Useless, unholy, amoral, waste, corrupt, say sorry!

Title: Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro
Quote: Desh ki unnati ki pehchaan, agar kisi cheez se hoti hai ... toh woh hai gutter
Trans: If growth of a country can be identified ... it can be done by its gutters

Title: Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro
Quote: Maine cheer haran ka idea drop kar diya hai
Trans: I have dropped the idea of denuding

Title: Gadar: Ek Prem Katha
Quote: Hamara Hindustan zindabad tha, zindabad hai, aur zindabad rahega!
Trans: Our Hindustan has lived long, is living long, and will live long!

Title: Gadar: Ek Prem Katha
Quote: Agar main apne biwi bachchon ke liye sar jhuka sakta hoon ... toh main sabke sar kaat bhi sakta hoon
Trans: If I can bow down my head for my wife and son ... then I can also cut everyone's head

Title: Gadar: Ek Prem Katha
Quote: Ek kagaz par mohor nahi lagegi ... toh kya Tara Pakistan nahi jayega?
Trans: If one paper doesn't get stamped ... then Tara won't go to Pakistan?

Title: Gadar: Ek Prem Katha
Quote: Barsaat se bachne ki haisiyat nahin ... aur goli baari ki baat kar rahe hai aap log
Trans: You don't have the capacity to save yourself from the rain ... and you're talking about firing bullets

Title: Billoo Baadshah
Quote: Yeh baatein bekaar ki nahin ... intezaar ki hain, ikraar ki hain, methe methe pyar ki hain
Trans: These talks are not a waste ... they are of waiting, they are of acceptance, they are of sweet sweet love

Title: Billoo Baadshah
Quote: Bhagwan ne aapko daulat toh zaroorat se zyada di hai ... magar dil dene mein thodi si kanjhoosi kar gaya
Trans: God gave you wealth more than what you need ... but when it came to the heart he was a little stingy

Title: Billoo Baadshah
Quote: Tumhe insaanon se nahin ... paison se pyar hai
Trans: You don't love humans ... you love money

Title: Billoo Baadshah
Quote: Sone chandi ke bartano mein khana khane waala amir nahi hota hai ... aircondition caron mein ghoomne waala amir nahi hota hai ... aaise sangemarmar ke bunglay mein rehne waala amir nahi hota hai ... besaharon ko sahara dena waala amir hota hai ... rote hue ko hasane waala amir hota hai ... marne waala nahin, bachane waala amir hota hai
Trans: The one who eats food in golden and silver plates is not a rich person ... the one who roams around in aircondition cars is not a rich person ... the one who lives in a bungalow made from marble is not a rich person ... one who helps the needful is a rich person ... one who makes a crying person laugh is a rich person ... the one who kills is not, the one who saves is a rich person

Title: Qahar
Quote: Shehar ka sabse bada gunda ... doosre gunday ko zamanat par le jaane aaya hai
Trans: The biggest goon of the city ... has come to bail the other goon

Title: Qahar
Quote: Gunday aur gundagardi yahi se janam lete hai ... jisse aap police station kehte hai
Trans: Goons and rowdyism are born right here ... what you call as police station

Title: Qahar
Quote: Jurm ko mitane ke liye ... mitna bhi padta hai
Trans: To eradicate crime ... sometimes you have to die

Title: Qahar
Quote: Samundar mein mutthi bhar shakkar dalne se ... uska namak kam nahin ho jaata
Trans: If you throw a handful of sugar in the ocean ... that doesn't reduce its salt

Title: Gunda
Quote: Itihaas badalne waale ka naam, kabhi itihaas mein nahin hota hai
Trans: One who changes history, you won't find their name in history

Title: Gunda
Quote: Kasam khakar aagaya hai inteqam ka yeh angaraa ... bajaonga aaj teri maut ka nakaraa
Trans: The fire of revenge has taken a vow ... to play the drums of your death today

Title: Gunda
Quote: Main gareebo ke liye hero hoon ... aur tum jaise logon ke liye villain ... naam hai mera Shankar, hoon main Gunda No.1
Trans: I am a hero for the poor ... and a villain for people like you ... my name is Shankar and I am Goon No.1

Title: Gunda
Quote: Mera naam hai Chutiya ... aachoon aachoon ki khadi karta hoon main khatiya
Trans: My name is Chutiya ... I straighten the cot of very smart people

Title: Bewafaa
Quote: Ek biwi bewafaa ho sakti hai ... ek ladki, ek premika bewafaa ho sakti hai ... par ek maa bewafaa nahi ho sakti
Trans: A wife can be unfaithful ... a beloved girl can be unfaithful ... but a mother cannot be unfaithful

Title: Bewafaa
Quote: Life mein sahi waqt pe baat karna bahut zaroori hai ... varna baat bighad sakti hai
Trans: In life, it is very important to talk at the right time ... or else things can go bad

Title: Bewafaa
Quote: Chupe chupe se sarkar nazar aate hai ... dil ki barbaadi ke aasaar nazar aate hai
Trans: I see that my friend is hiding ... and it seems like my heart is going to be destroyed

Title: Bewafaa
Quote: Aap jaisa dost agar sabhi ko mil jaaye ... toh phir taqdeer kabhi bewafaa na ho
Trans: If everyone has a friend like you ... then destiny will never be unfaithful

Title: Always Kabhi Kabhi
Quote: Life koi keyboard ka shortcut nahi hai ... isse Google nahi ... experience kiya jaata hai
Trans: Life is not a keyboard shortcut ... don't Google it ... experience it

Title: Always Kabhi Kabhi
Quote: Chanda ho ya Paro ... har ladki pe chance maro
Trans: Be it Chanda or Paro ... hit on every girl

Title: Always Kabhi Kabhi
Quote: Hamari life bas yahi banke reh gayi hai ... ek SMS joke ya phir ek status update
Trans: Our life has just become ... a SMS joke or a status update

Title: Always Kabhi Kabhi
Quote: Agar hum kabhi kabhi apne dil ki baat nahi kahenge ... toh we will always regret it
Trans: If sometimes we don't say what is in our heart ... then we will always regret it

Title: Kabhi Kabhie
Quote: Kabhi raste mein mil jao toh katrakar guzar jana ... hum mein is tarah takna jaise pechana nahi tumne ... hamara zikr jab aaye toh yun anjaan ban jana ... ki jaise naam sunkar bhi hum mein jana nahi tumne
Trans: If you ever see me on the road then cut through and pass by ... look at me as if you don't know me ... and if ever my name comes up then act unknowningly ... that you don't know me even after hearing my name

Title: Kabhi Kabhie
Quote: Mere dil ka woh hissa ... kambakht mera kab tha
Trans: That part of my heart ... hell was never mine

Title: Kabhi Kabhie
Quote: Tera haath, haath mein ho agar ... toh safar hi asle-hayaat hai ... mere har kadam pe hai manzilein ... tera pyar gar mere saath hai
Trans: If your hand is my hand ... then the journey itself is life ... and there is a destination on every step of mine ... if your love is with me

Title: Kabhi Kabhie
