Trans: It is bad to do a sin ... but worse than that is to do a sin and run

Title: Heera
Quote: Yeh tumhari zindagi ka sabse aakhri dastagaz hoga ... iske baad zindagi mein tumhe kabhi bhi dastagaz karne ki zaroorat nahin padegi
Trans: This will be your last signature in life ... after this in life you will not have any need to do a signature

Title: Tezaab
Quote: Pyar toh rahega ... uske dil mein nafrat ki tarah aur mere dil mein nasoor ki tarah
Trans: There will be love ... as hatred in her heart and as a wound in my heart

Title: Tezaab
Quote: Nasik ho yah Bambai ... ladkiyan ladkiyan hoti hai, patane ka tarika aana chahiye ... pyar kiya nahin jaata, karvaya jaata hai
Trans: Be it is Nasik or Mumbai ... girls are girls, one should know how to impress them ... love doesn't happen, it is made to happen

Title: Tezaab
Quote: Tujh jaise desh drohiyon ko kanoon ke pairon par jhukane ke liye ... na vardi ki zaroorat hai aur na hi is pistol ki ... mere desh ke naujawanon ke sirf do haath hi kaafi hai
Trans: To bend a traitor like you in front of the law ... one doesn't need an uniform and neither this pistol ... only two young hands of my country are enough for that

Title: Tezaab
Quote: Aadmi ko sirf rishtey rokte hain ... aur mera koi rishta nahin
Trans: Only relations stop a man ... and I don't have any relation

Title: Jaal
Quote: Jiski zaroorat ussoolon se badi hoti hai ... woh na nahin bol sakta
Trans: One whose needs are bigger than his rules ... he can't say no

Title: Jaal
Quote: Pyar mein mohabbat mein dil joh toot jaate hain ... log aisi halat mein tere paas aate hain
Trans: The hearts that break in love ... people come to you in that state

Title: Jaal
Quote: Kabhi kabhi sainkro saal ek pal ke aage haar jaate hain
Trans: Sometimes many many years lose in front of one moment

Title: Jaal
Quote: Jab aulaad dushman ban jaye ... toh maa baap ko atmahatya kar leni chahiye
Trans: When a child becomes the enemy ... then the parents must commit suicide

Title: Yes Boss
Quote: Aadmi achcha hoon, iraada nek hai aur mausam first class hai ... chale?
Trans: I am a good man, intention is good and the weather is great ... can we go?

Title: Yes Boss
Quote: Zindagi ki har baat sirf sach yah jhoot nahin hoti
Trans: Everything in life is not only either true or false

Title: Yes Boss
Quote: Achche logon ke saath hamesha achcha hota hai
Trans: Good things always happen with good people

Title: Yes Boss
Quote: Meri shaadi mere sapne se ho chuki hai
Trans: I am married to my dream

Title: Jab Tak Hai Jaan
Quote: Main har din maut ko gale lagaonga
Trans: I will hug death everyday

Title: Jab Tak Hai Jaan
Quote: Hamari line mein kismat sirf ek baar dokha deti hai
Trans: In our line destiny can only betray once

Title: Jab Tak Hai Jaan
Quote: Done done London karo ji
Trans: Let us say yes in London style

Title: Jab Tak Hai Jaan
Quote: Yadhaash bhi kitni ajeeb cheez hoti hai ... kis cheez ko poori zindagi bhoolne ki koshish karo, woh bhoolti nahi ... kabhi ek choti si cheez yaad karne ki koshish karo, toh yaad nahi aati
Trans: Memory is such a strange thing ... when you try to forget a thing your whole life, you can't forget it ... and when you try to remember a small thing, you can't remember that

Title: Awara Paagal Deewana
Quote: Chalo chalo chalo, jaldi se crore ko pati se alag kardo
Trans: Go go go, lets quickly separate the money from the husband

Title: Awara Paagal Deewana
Quote: Baahar aag hai aur andar jwalamukhi hai ... jaaye toh kidhar jaaye?
Trans: Outside there is a fire and inside there is a volcano ... where should we go?

Title: Awara Paagal Deewana
Quote: Anna tum logo ko ganne ki tarah chil chil ke chota kar daalega ... samjha na?
Trans: Anna will peel you like a sugarcane and will make you small ... got it?

Title: Awara Paagal Deewana
Quote: Morning morning mein gents ka paise mangna ... ladies ke liye bahot bura bad luck honda hai
Trans: Gents asking for money early in the morning ... is a big bad luck for ladies

Title: Table No. 21
Quote: Kehte hai shaadi mein agar pyar banaye rakhna hai toh do cheezein bahut zaroori hoti hai ... pati ki haar aur heeron ka haar
Trans: It is said that if you want to maintain the love in a marriage then two things are very important ... a husbands defeat and a necklace of diamonds

Title: Table No. 21
Quote: Khushiyan kisi ki mohtaj nahin hoti, dosti yunhi ittefaq se nahin hoti ... kuch toh maine honge is pal ke, warna yunhi aapse mulaqat nahin hoti
Trans: Happiness does not depend on anything, friendship does not happen by chance ... there might some reasons to this moment, otherwise we wouldn't have met just like that

Title: Table No. 21
Quote: Maut se zyada khoobsurat entertainment koi nahin
Trans: There is no other entertainment more beautiful than death

Title: Table No. 21
Quote: Usse door se hi taakta raha ... bas yunhi waqt kaatta raha ... na jaane kyun nigahen thami rahi ... bas uske chehre par hi jami rahi ... kabhi chand samajhkar kabhi chandni ... hum usse dekhte rahe tehzeeb se ... par kabhi socha na tha unka deedar hoga inte kareeb se
Trans: I kept staring at her from a distance ... I was spending my time just like that ... I don't know why my eyes got stuck ... but they were focused on just her face ... sometimes like the moon and sometimes like the moonlight ... I kept looking at her in a good manner ... but I had never thought that I will see her this closely

Title: Mohra
Quote: Dobara agar koi chaal chalne ki koshish ki toh main nahi bolunga ... meri AK47 bolegi
Trans: If you try to play another ploy then I won't speak ... my AK47 (gun) will speak

Title: Mohra
Quote: Barood ke dher par beth kar aag ka khel nahi khelte
Trans: One should not play the game of fire when sitting on a pile of gunpowder

Title: Mohra
Quote: Aankhen andar ka haal bata deti hai ... sirf padne wali nazar honi chahiye
Trans: Eyes tell you the condition within ... one only needs a vision to read it

Title: Mohra
Quote: Mujrim maa ke pet se janam nahin leta ... usse janam deta hai tumhara kanoon, tumhari police
Trans: A criminal is not born from a mothers womb ... your law, your police gives birth to him

Title: Himmatwala (1983)
Quote: Tumhari yeh baat sunkar mera dil Hyderabad ki tarah aabad ho gaya
Trans: Listening to this point of yours my heart has become happy like Hyderabad

Title: Himmatwala (1983)
Quote: Ladki toh pehda hi hoti hai zulm sehne ke liye
Trans: A girl is born to endure injustice

Title: Himmatwala (1983)
Quote: Hum unlogo mein se nahin hai, joh saanp ka sar kuchalkar usse maar dalte hai ... hum unlogo mein se hai, joh saanp ka sar pakad lete hai aur uske baad uske zehrile daanton ko nikaalkar ... usse nachate hai aur paisa kamate hai
Trans: I am not someone who crushes a snakes head and kills it ... I am someone who catches the snakes head and removes the poisonous teeth ... and then I'll make it dance and make money

Title: Himmatwala (1983)
Quote: Aaj jahan fan latak raha hai ... kal wahan meri laash latak rahi hogi
Trans: Today where the fan is hanging ... tomorrow my dead body will be hanging there

Title: Tridev
Quote: Paap se dharti phati, adharm se aasmaan, atyachaar se kaanpi insaaniyat, raj kar rahe haivaan ... jinki hogi taqat apoorv, jinka hoga nishana abhed, joh karenge inka sarvanaash ... woh kehlayenge Tridev!
Trans: The earth is torn by sin, the heavens are cleaved by wrong, atrocities leave humanity trembling, the satans are ruling ... those who will have infinite strength, those who will target the evil unflinchingly, those who will destroy the wrong-doers ... they will be called trinity

Title: Tridev
Quote: Police ka kaam hai kauwon ki tarah choch marna ... aur hamara kaam hai unhe bajra dalkar gumrah karna
Trans: The work of police is to peck like a crow ... and our work is to feed them pearl millet and misdirect them

Title: Tridev
Quote: Joh insaan jurm ke khilaaf awaaz uthata hai ... usko duniya baaghi hi kehti hai
Trans: A human who raises his voice against crime ... is called a rebel by the world

Title: Tridev
Quote: Kam kapde pehenna tujhe pasand hai ... aur teri is ada pe marna hum mein pasand hai
Trans: You like wearing less clothes .... and I love this style of yours

Title: Humko Deewana Kar Gaye
Quote: Hum dono bachpan ke woh langotiye dost nahi hai ... hum toh tab ke dost hai jab hum langoti bhi nahi pehente the
Trans: We are not childhood friends ... we are friends from the days when we never even wore a nappy

Title: Humko Deewana Kar Gaye
Quote: Sapne aur haqeeqat mein sirf palak khulne aur band hone ka farak hota hai ... palak band toh sapna, khuli toh haqeeqat
Trans: Between dream and reality the only difference is of open and close eyelids ... when eyelids are closed it is a dream, when they open it is reality

Title: Humko Deewana Kar Gaye
Quote: Pyar mein shak ki koi jagah nahi hoti hai ... jahan pyar hota hai, wahan sirf pyar hota hai ... sirf pyar
Trans: In love there is no room for suspicion ... where there is love, there is only love ... only love

Title: Humko Deewana Kar Gaye
Quote: Super fast ladki ho ya super fast gaadi ... tumhe dekh ke top gear mein aa jati hai
Trans: Be it a super fast girl or a super fast car ... seeing you they get into the top gear

Title: Vivah
Quote: Jis din saare beton ke baap aap jaise ho jayenge ... us din betiyan kisi baap ke liye bojh nahi kehlayengi
Trans: The day when all fathers of sons become like you ... that day daughters will not be called a burden for any father

Title: Vivah
Quote: Yeh joh sagai aur shaadi ke beech ka waqt hota hai na ... bahut adhbut hota hai
Trans: The time between engagement and wedding ... is very surreal

Title: Dilwale (1994)
Quote: Hum mein toh apno ne loota, gairon mein kahan dum tha ... meri kishti thi doobi wahan, jahan pani kam tha
Trans: My own people robbed me, others did not have the courage ... my boat drowned in a place, where the water was less

Title: Dilwale (1994)
Quote: Yeh desh sirf do hi logon pe hasta hai ... hijhron par aur hum policewaalon par ... kyun ki nah hi woh kuch kar sakte hai, aur nah hi hum kuch kar sakte hai
Trans: This country only laughs on two people ... on eunuchs and on policemen like us ... because neither they can do anything, and neither can we do anything

Title: Dilwale (1994)
Quote: Dilwale toh bahut dekhe, lekin pyar mein joh pagal ho jaye ... aise dilwale ko aaj pehli baar dekha
Trans: I have seen many hearty people, but someone who will go mad in love ... that hearty person I am seeing for the first time

Title: Dilwale (1994)
Quote: Yeh aankhen, yeh chehra, yeh noor ... insaan ho ya pari ho tum
Trans: These eyes, this face, this beauty ... are you a human or a fairy

Title: Purab Aur Pachhim
Quote: Apne yahan ki mitti ki khushboo hai na ... woh toh ajnabi logo ki saanson mein bhi sanskar bhar deti hai
Trans: Even the smell of soil from our place ... fills culture in the breath of strange people

Title: Purab Aur Pachhim
Quote: Agar tumhare maathey ki bindiya aur maang ka sindoor, suhaag ki nishani nahi kalank hai ... toh mitta do isse
Trans: If the bindi on your forehead and the vermilion in the (hair) parting, is a sign of disgrace and not your husband ... then erase it

Title: Purab Aur Pachhim
Quote: Yahan maa baap ke liye aulad sab kuch hai ... aur aulad ke liye maa baap?
Trans: Here for the parents the offspring is everything ... and for the offspring the parents?

Title: Purab Aur Pachhim
Quote: Tum usse apna samajhte ho, joh madad leta hai ... main usse apna kehta hoon, joh madad deta hai
Trans: One who takes help, you call him a friend ... one who gives help, I call him a friend

Title: Vishwatma
Quote: Tumhare aur maut ke beech ... meri pistol se nikli sirf ek goli ka faasla reh gaya hai
Trans: The distance between you and death ... is only that of a bullet fired from my pistol

Title: Vishwatma
Quote: Ajgar kisse, kab aur kahan nighal jaata hai ... yeh toh marne waale ko bhi pata nahin chalta
Trans: Who, when and where does a python swallow ... that not even the person dying knows

Title: Vishwatma
Quote: Meri shaadi ho chuki hai, magar maut se
Trans: I am married, but with death

Title: Vishwatma
Quote: Jab bhi hum koi khel khelte hai ... toh saare mohron ko apni ungliyon par nachate hai
Trans: Whenver I play any game ... I make all the pawns dance on my fingers

Title: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
Quote: Badtameez, chaddar ki kameez, lohe ka pajama, bandar tera mama, arre billi teri mausi, kutta tera yaar, aam ka achaar ... aaja mere yaar!
Trans: Mannerless, shirt from bedsheet, iron pajama, monkey is your uncle, oh cat is your aunt, dog is your friend, mango pickle ... come my friend!

Title: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
Quote: Agar tum meri zindagi mein nahi hoti, toh main kya hota? ... bina jeb ki pant hota, bina sole ka juta hota, bina dil ke shareer hota
Trans: If you were not in my life, then what would I have been? ... a pant without a pocket, a shoe without a sole, a body without a heart

Title: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
Quote: Hum bhi woh hai ... joh door se boo ko soong lete hai
Trans: Even I am a person ... who can smell things from a distance

Title: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
Quote: Everything is fair and love is war
Trans: Everything is fair and love is war

Title: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon
Quote: Kasam ki kasam hai kasam se, humko pyar hai sirf tumse ... ab yeh pyar na hoga phir humse, kasam ki kasam hai kasam se
Trans: I swear in the name of swearing itself, that I love only you ... now I can't fall in love again, I swear in the name of swearing itself

Title: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon
Quote: A son is a son till he gets himself a wife ... but a daughter is a daughter all her life
Trans: A son is a son till he gets himself a wife ... but a daughter is a daughter all her life

Title: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon
Quote: Daulat, izzat, shohrat ke samne hum aadmi bhale hi jhuk jaye ... par kehte hai ek aurat ka dil kabhi nahi jhukta
Trans: We men bow down in front of money, respect, wealth ... but it is said that a woman's heart never bows down

Title: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon
Quote: Aaj kuch isharon mein keh dena ... samajh jaonga
Trans: Today say something in gestures ... I will understand

Title: Daag: The Fire
Quote: Jis din tu isse zindagi dega ... main isse maut doonga, maut, sirf maut!
Trans: The day you give him life ... I will give him death, death, only death!

Title: Daag: The Fire
Quote: Tum saans leti ho, toh mera dil dhadakta hai
Trans: When you breath, then my heart beats

Title: Daag: The Fire
Quote: Agar main marr gaya toh tu jee gaya ... agar main jee gaya toh tu marr gaya
Trans: If I die then you'll live ... if I live then you'll die

Title: Daag: The Fire
Quote: Bahadur toh sab hote hai ... main zara sa lucky hoon
Trans: Everyone is courageous ... I am a little lucky

Title: Ghulam-E-Musthafa
Quote: Jaan mat maangna ... iski bazaar mein koi keemat nahi hai
Trans: Don't ask for my life ... it has no value in the market

Title: Ghulam-E-Musthafa
Quote: Usne rulaya hai ... wohi hasayega
Trans: God made me cry ... God will make me smile

Title: Ghulam-E-Musthafa
Quote: Behetar hai tu apna iraada badal de ... nahin toh main tera naksha badal doonga
Trans: It's better if you change your opinion ... or else I will change your figure

Title: Ghulam-E-Musthafa
Quote: Maut se badkar koi dost nahi hai ... hamesha mere saath chalti hai
Trans: There is none better friend than death ... it always walks with me

Title: Gupt
Quote: Waada karo ki aaj raat tum mere khwaabon mein zaroor aaoge
Trans: Promise me tonight you will come in my dreams

Title: Gupt
Quote: Woh aaye ward mein hamare Sahil ki harkat hai ... kabhi hum unke plaster ko, kabhi apni pattiyon ko dekhte hain
Trans: He came to the ward because of Sahil ... sometimes I see his plaster, sometimes I see my bandages

Title: Gupt
Quote: Ek waqt par main sirf ek hi kaam karta hoon ... jab peeta hoon toh khoob peeta hoon ... aur jab duty karta hoon toh sirf duty karta hoon
Trans: At one time I only do one work ... when I drink then I drink a lot ... and when I am on duty then I only do duty

Title: Gupt
Quote: Faanoos banke jiski hifaazat sarkar kare ... woh mantri kyun mare, jiska ilaaj poora aspataal kare
Trans: One who gets protection like a lamp from the government ... why will that minister die, who gets care from the whole hospital

Title: Mother India
Quote: Main beta de sakti hoon, laaj nahi de sakti
Trans: I can give my son, but not my honor

Title: Mother India
Quote: Tumhari chhaya mein main kadi se kadi dhoop sehan kar loongi
Trans: In your shadow I will bear the most severe sunrays

Title: Mother India
Quote: Raasta dikhana sehel hai, par raaste par chalna bahut kathin
Trans: Showing the path is easy, but walking on the path is very hard

Title: Mother India
Quote: Bina murga bane vidhya nahi aati
Trans: Knowledge does not come without becoming a chicken

Title: Dil
Quote: Woh aake gire hum pe bijli ke khambe ki tarah ... khuda ki kasam current kha ke mazaa aa gaya
Trans: She feel on me like a light pole ... I swear on God I enjoyed it like a current

Title: Dil
Quote: Agar tumhare ishq ko koi laal jhanda dikhayega ... yakeen karo yeh ghalib unko dhanda dikhayega
Trans: If anyone shows a red flag to your love ... believe me this conqueror will show them a stick

Title: Dil
Quote: Jise main jigar ka tukda samjhta tha, usne mere jigar ke tukde tukde kar diye ... jise main aankh ka tara samajhta tha, usne badnaami ka kajal banke mera mooh kala kar diya
Trans: Whom I thought was extremely dear to me, she broke my heart into pieces ... whom I thought was a star for my eyes, she made my face black by becoming the eyeliner of disgrace

Title: Dil
Quote: Hum saath jee nahi sake toh kya hua ... saath mar to sakte hai
Trans: So what we could't live together ... we can die together

Title: Ram Jaane
Quote: Oonchi building mein rehne waala footpath pe chalne waala ka khoon choosta hai
Trans: People who live in big buildings suck the blood of people who walk on the footpath

Title: Ram Jaane
Quote: Humse aankhen milane wala ... bahut jaldi aankhen bandh kar deta hai
Trans: One who looks to me in the eyes ... closes his eyes very shortly

Title: Ram Jaane
Quote: Yeh apun ka style hai kya ... jiyo toh seena taan ke jiyo ... maro toh seena taan ke maro
Trans: This is my style you understand ... when you live life, live boldly ... when you die, die boldly

Title: Ram Jaane
Quote: Joh maidan mein ghutne tek de woh dosti karne ke kabil nahi re
Trans: One who gives up on the ground is not worth being a friend

Title: Inquilaab
Quote: Pehle main tumhare pyar mein deewani thi ... aaj main tumhare izzat ki deewani ho gayi
Trans: First I was crazy in your love ... today I have become crazy of your honor

Title: Inquilaab
Quote: Mujhe bhi giraftaar kar lo na ... pyar ki hathkadi lagakar dil ke lock up mein qaid kar lo na
Trans: Arrest me also ... put the handcuff of love on me and imprison me in the lock up of the heart

Title: Inquilaab
Quote: Mere haath kanoon se zyada lambe hai ... jahan mera haath ja sakta hai, wahan kanoon ka haath nahi ja sakta
Trans: My hands are longer than the hands of the law ... where my hands can reach, the hands of the law can't reach

Title: Inquilaab
Quote: Siyasat ki duniya mein maa, baap, bhai, behen, beti, damad koi kuch nahi hota ... kyun ki aadmi jab upar uthna chahta hai, tab yeh sab rishtey aur jazbaat bojh bankar usse neeche ghaseet lete hai
Trans: In the world of politics there is no mother, father, brother, sister, daughter, son-in-law ... because when a man wants to rise, then all these relations and emotions burden him and pull him down

Title: Hero (1983)
Quote: Nazuk ladkiyan dadagiri karte huye achchi nahi lagti
Trans: Delicate girls don't look good when bossing

Title: Hero (1983)
Quote: Pyar ek imtihaan hai ... aur nateeje se darne waalo ka pyar jhoota hota hai
Trans: Love is a test ... and those who fear it's results, their love is a lie

Title: Hero (1983)
Quote: Patthar ki duniya, patthar ke dil, patthar ki Heer ... tu jaisi bhi hai manzoor hai
Trans: The world is made of stones, and stone hearten people, the stone statue of Heer ... however you are, I accept you

Title: Hero (1983)
Quote: Aap ki kameez ka size bahut chota hai, Sir ... kyun ki mera seena aap se bahut bada hai
Trans: Sir, the size of your shirt is very small ... because my chest is much bigger than yours

Title: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
Quote: Jab main tumse pehli baar mili thi, main nahi jaanti thi ki tum kaun ho ... lekin jab tumhe dekha toh aise laga jaise ... tumhara hi intezaar tha
Trans: When I met you for the first time, I didn't know who you were ... but when I saw you I felt as if ... I was waiting for you

Title: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
Quote: Aakhri chand second hi toh haar aur jeet ka faisla karte hai
Trans: The last few seconds make the decision between winning and losing

Title: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
Quote: Ek ek kona toh sabke paas hai ... magar ladki kisi ko bhi nahi milti
Trans: Everyone has one corner ... but no one has a girl

Title: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
Quote: Jis insaan ne pehli baat jhoot se shuru ki ho ... usse kisi aur ko jhoota kehne ka koi haq nahi hai
Trans: The person who started the first conversation with a lie ... he has no right to call someone else a liar

Title: Thakshak
Quote: Ek anbani si muskaan ke peeche dard ki karaah sunai de toh bhi ... yeh sunheri tanhayi jazbaaton se takraake bikhar jaaye toh bhi ... hum kuch nahi bolenge, kuch nahi bolenge, kuch nahi bolenge
Trans: Even if I hear the moan of pain behind a half hearten smile ... even if this golden loneliness straggles after hitting with emotions ... I won't say anything, won't say anything, won't say anything

Title: Thakshak
Quote: Agar waqt ke saath nahi chalenge to raund diye jayenge
Trans: You will be crushed if you don't walk with time

Title: Thakshak
Quote: Sach ke liye har keemat chuka sakne ki himmat mujhe tumse mili hai ... tumhe kho sakne ki himmat bhi mujhe tumse mili hai
Trans: I have got the courage from you to pay any price for truth ... I have also got the courage from you to lose you

Title: Thakshak
Quote: Darro mat ... main Mahatma Gandhi nahi hoon
Trans: Don't be scared ... I am not Mahatma Gandhi

Title: Zakhm
Quote: Meri pehchaan tum dono ki zindagi mein ek zakhm hai
Trans: My identity is a wound in both of your lifes

Title: Zakhm
Quote: Aandhi jab chalti hai na ... toh haath chhodne ka nahi, haath thaamne ka waqt hota hai
Trans: When there is a storm blowing ... then it's the time to hold a hand, not to leave it

Title: Zakhm
Quote: Maa aur mulk badle nahi jate
Trans: One does not change their mother and country

Title: Zakhm
Quote: Hamari zindagi hamari hote huye bhi hamesha hamari nahi hoti hai ... hum mein woh zindagi bhi jeeni padti hai jise jeene ki log humse umeed karte hai
Trans: Our life being ours is still not always ours ... we also have to live the life what others expect us to live

Title: Qayamat Se Qayamat Tak
Quote: Doobte huye suraj ki kiranon mein ... har khoobsurat cheez aur bhi khoobsurat lagne lagti hai
Trans: In the rays of the setting sun ... every beautiful thing looks more beautiful

Title: Qayamat Se Qayamat Tak
Quote: Agar hum kisi ke liye deewane ho gaye ... toh yeh koi zaroori toh nahi ... ke woh bhi humare liye deewana ho jaye
Trans: If I go crazy for someone ... then it is not necessary that ... that person should also go crazy for me

Title: Qayamat Se Qayamat Tak
Quote: Is hi doobte hue suraj ne hum mein pehli baar milaya tha ... dekh lena, yahi doobta hua suraj hum mein ek din hamesha ke liye mila dega
Trans: This setting sun made us meet for the first time ... you'll see, the same setting sun one day will make us meet forever

Title: Qayamat Se Qayamat Tak
Quote: Main duniya ki har musibat ka saamna karne ke liye tayaar hoon ... bas ek tumhara saath chahiye
Trans: I am ready to face every problem of this world ... I only need your support

Title: Arjun Pandit
Quote: Chehre par bholapan hai aur aankhon mein pagalpan ... aise log bahut khatarnak hote hain ... bahut khatarnak
Trans: People who have simplicity on their face and madness in their eyes ... are very dangerous ... very dangerous

Title: Arjun Pandit
Quote: Jaise purana cricketer commentator banta hai na ... waise purani gadi museum mein jati hai
Trans: Just like an old cricketer becomes a commentator ... just like that an old car goes in the museum

Title: Arjun Pandit
Quote: Aise kaam ke liye himmat ki zaroorat nahi hoti ... sirf iraada hona chahiye
Trans: For this work you don't need courage ... you only need an intention

Title: Arjun Pandit
Quote: Hathyar becha jata hai ... koi apni taqat nahi bechta
Trans: One sells a weapon ... no one sells his strength

Title: Zamane Se Kya Darna
Quote: Roohein toh kamzarf aur buzdil insaanon ki kaapti hai
Trans: Only the souls of ungenerous and the cowards shiver

Title: Zamane Se Kya Darna
Quote: Train mein safar kiya, plane mein safar kiya, caron mein safar kiya ... magar kisi bhi safar ka itna mazaa nahi aaya jitna in baahon ke safar mein aa raha hai
Trans: Traveled in a train, traveled in a plane, traveled in cars ... but no journey was as much fun as this journey in your arms is

Title: Zamane Se Kya Darna
Quote: Pyar ka badla pyar aur dosti ka badla dosti ... yeh mera usool hai
Trans: Revenge of love is love and revenge of friendship is friendship ... this is my rule

Title: Zamane Se Kya Darna
Quote: Main kaam ko puja maanta hoon ... aur kaam karne wali jagah ko swarg
Trans: I believe that work is worship ... and the workplace is heaven

Title: Dulhe Raja
Quote: Meri maa ne kaha tha ... ki jab bhi koi buzurg tum par haath uthaye, toh uska jawab muskurakar dena
Trans: My mom had said ... whenever an older person raises their hand on you, then reply to that with a smile

Title: Dulhe Raja
Quote: Daulat ka kya hai, woh toh aati jati rehti hai ... magar beti toh ghar ki izzat hai ... aur izzat ek baar chali jaye toh woh laut kar vapis nahi aaya karti
Trans: Who cares for wealth, it comes and goes ... but daughter is the honor of the house ... and once honor goes away then it never comes back

Title: Dulhe Raja
Quote: Aaj tak mujhe tum jaisi koi ladki dikhi hi nahi ... dikhi hai toh mili hi nahi ... mili nahi toh baat bani hi nahi ... baat bani nahi toh baat aage badhi hi nahi ... isliye main zindagi mein peeche reh gaya
Trans: Till today I have not seen a girl like you ... if seen then I've never met ... if I've never met then the point is never made ... if the point is never made then the point has never moved ahead ... that's why I was left behind in life

Title: Dulhe Raja
Quote: Yeh andhere mein hazaar volt ke jhatke kyun de rahi ho? ... mere dil mein na jaane kaise kaise bulb jal uthe
Trans: Why are you giving thousand volt shocks in the dark? ... I'm not sure what different kinds of bulbs are lighting up in my heart

Title: Maidan-E-Jung
Quote: Iske tukde tukde karke poore gaon mein prasad ki tarah baant do
Trans: Cut him into pieces and distribute them into the whole village

Title: Maidan-E-Jung
Quote: Aaj ke is kalyug mein ... tumhara bhagwan bhi is shaitan se darta hai
Trans: In this modern era ... even your God is scared of this satan

Title: Maidan-E-Jung
Quote: Zindagi ek paheli hai ... kabhi dushman, kabhi saheli hai
Trans: Life is a riddle ... sometimes it is an enemy, sometimes it is a girlfriend

Title: Maidan-E-Jung
Quote: Darye us bhagwan se ... sabse badi goli hoti hai uske paas joh bewaqt chalti hai
Trans: Be scared of God ... he has the biggest bullet which gets fired anytime

Title: Imtihaan
Quote: Meri mohabbat ek chutki bhar sindoor ki mohtaj nahi
Trans: My love is not dependent on one pinch of vermilion

Title: Imtihaan
Quote: Suraj ki pehli kiran aapke bunglay aur mere ghar pe barabar ki roshni dalti hai
Trans: The Sun shines it first rays equally on your bungalow and my house

Title: Imtihaan
Quote: Atma toh pehle hi kisi aur ki ho gayi hai ... reh gaya yeh shareer, isse bhagwan ko arpan kar dete hai
Trans: My soul is already someone else's ... whats left is this body, lets offer that to God

Title: Imtihaan
Quote: Tumhare shareer ke pedh par ... jawani ka naya phool khil gaya
Trans: On the tree of your body ... a new flower of youth has blossomed

Title: Himmatwala (2013)
Quote: Yeh haath hai ki hathoda ... keedon ki basti mein kaunsa aa gaya makauda
Trans: This is a hand or a hammer ... who is this spider in the colony of bugs

Title: Himmatwala (2013)
Quote: Duniya waalo mujhe na dikhao aaina ... nahi toh main bolonga "Made In China"
Trans: People of this world don't show me a mirror ... or else I will say "Made In China"

Title: Himmatwala (2013)
Quote: Purane khandar ki giri hui deewar pe tangi hui badsurat tasveer ke peeche chupi hui gadni chipkali ki phad-phadati pooch pe lehrati hui cheenti
Trans: You are an ant roaming on the trembling tail of a dirty lizard who is hiding behind an ugly picture hanging on a broken wall of an old ruin

Title: Himmatwala (2013)
Quote: Kerala ke karele se Bareilly ki barfi banta ja raha hai tu
Trans: You are turning from a bitter gourd from Kerala into a dessert from Bareilly

Title: Zila Ghaziabad
Quote: Pichwade mein itni goli maroonga ... ki uske bachche pittal ke paida honge
Trans: I will shoot so many bullets in his ass ... that his kids will be born of brass

Title: Zila Ghaziabad
Quote: Aaj agar maut khud mere aur uske beech khadi ho jaaye na ... toh main maut ko bhi maar doonga
Trans: Today even if death stands between me and him ... then I will kill death also

Title: Zila Ghaziabad
Quote: Na courat, na kacheri, na appeal, na date ... direct sazaa
Trans: No court, no judiciary, no appeal, no date ... direct punishment

Title: Zila Ghaziabad
Quote: Kutta kitna bhi khatarnak ho jaaye ... sher ki nahi le paata
Trans: No matter how dangerous a dog gets ... he cannot take on a tiger

Title: David
Quote: Is duniya mein na, pyar naam ka ek hi emotion hai ... baki sab lose motion hai
Trans: In this world, love is the only emotion ... everything else is lose motion

Title: David
Quote: Kabhi kabhi kuch galat hi sahi hota hai
Trans: Sometimes something wrong is the right

Title: David
Quote: Rajneeti mein dushman ko ya toh doshi banao ... ya toh misaal
Trans: In politics you make your enemy guilty ... or an example

Title: David
Quote: Mind jab bhi bolta hai galat hi bolta hai ... lekin heart kabhi galat nahi bolta ... bas heart ko sunne waala ek mind hona chahiye
Trans: Whenever the mind says it says wrong things ... but the heart never says wrong things ... it's just that you need a mind that listens to the heart

Title: Desh Premee
Quote: Taqdeer kabhi kabhi insaan ko apne hi desh mein pardesi bana deti hai
Trans: Destiny sometimes makes one a foreigner in their own country

Title: Desh Premee
Quote: Firangi sarkar ke pass koi aisi goli nahin joh ek desh premee ke seene ko paar kar sake
Trans: The foreign government does not have a bullet than can pierce through the chest of a patriot

Title: Desh Premee
Quote: Tumhare raj mein toh zulm ke khilaaf awaaz uthana bhi jurm hai
Trans: In your rule to raise the voice against injustice is also a crime

Title: Desh Premee
Quote: Joh log paisa kamakar apna imaan gavah dete hai ... woh daulat hote hue bhi fakiron se battar hai
Trans: People who lose their honesty when they make money ... they are worse than the poor even with the money

Title: Arjun
Quote: Main zindagi se nahi ... apne aap se naraaz hoon
Trans: Not with life ... I am displeased with myself

Title: Arjun
Quote: Main tumhare accountant ka beta hoon ... aur yeh pitai tumhare account mein bahut dino se likhi thi
Trans: I am a son of your accountant ... and this beating was written in your account since days

Title: Arjun
Quote: Chalo utho ... abhi tumhe bahut pitna hai
Trans: Come on get up ... you still have to be thrashed a lot

Title: Arjun
Quote: Main us Mahabharat ka Arjun hoon ... jis Mahabharat ke Duryodhan aap hai
Trans: I am the Arjun of that Mahabharat ... in which you are the Duryodhan

Title: Parinda
Quote: Yeh dukh naam ki bimari ka ilaaj kisi doctor ke paas bhi nahi ... iska ilaaj khud dhoondna padta hai ... dukh ko bhoolna parta hai
Trans: No doctor has the cure for the disease of grief ... one has to find the cure for it themselves ... one has to forget grief

Title: Parinda
Quote: Dhande mein koi kisika bhai nahi, koi kisika beta nahi
Trans: In business no one is a brother, no one is a son

Title: Parinda
Quote: Apne saath kaam karna hai toh usse imtihaan mein toh bethna hi padega
Trans: If he wants to work with us then he must sit for the exam

Title: Parinda
Quote: Joh aadmi ek lakh rupaiy mein tujhe yeh khabar de sakta hai ... woh aadmi paanch lakh rupaiy mein tujhe yahan laakar bech bhi sakta hai
Trans: The man who can sell you this news for one lakh Rupees ... that man can also get you here and sell you for five lakh Rupees

Title: Yaarana (1981)
Quote: Mister ka murder ho gaya, murder ka mister ho gaya ... dono milake murder mystery ho gaya
Trans: The mister was murdered, the murder became mister ... together it became murder mystery

Title: Yaarana (1981)
Quote: Dosti joh hai na, bahut pavitra hai ... isko dosti hi rehne de ... iske upar pet, paisa, roti iski parchai na padne de
Trans: Friendship is very holy ... let it be friendship only ... don't allow the shadow of stomach, money, food to fall on it

Title: Yaarana (1981)
Quote: Main tera dost hoon, tu haddi main gosht hoon ... tera mera saath hai, maut ki baat hai, dushman ki gardan mere haath hai ... yeh uski khopdi, yeh meri laat hai
Trans: I am your friend, you are the bone I am the meat ... you and me are together, the topic is death, the enemies neck is in my hand ... this is his skull, this is my kick

Title: Yaarana (1981)
Quote: Tere liye toh maine nark ke darwaze bhi bandh kar diye kamine
Trans: Bloody, for you I have even closed the doors of hell

Title: Luv Shuv Tey Chicken Khurana
Quote: Apneya de samne gas chodke pyar badta hai
Trans: Love increases when you fart in front of your own people

Title: Luv Shuv Tey Chicken Khurana
Quote: Tu akela harami pehda nahin hua
Trans: You aren't the only scoundrel born

Title: Akele Hum Akele Tum
Quote: Main yeh nahi janta ki yeh kahan likha hai ... ki ek aurat mard se zyada pyar de sakti hai
Trans: I don't know where is it written ... that a woman can give more love than a man

Title: Beta
Quote: Hum us desh ke waasi hai jis desh mein Ganga behti hai ... aur jis desh mein bahu apne saas sasur ke samne sar par pallu daal ke rehti hai
Trans: I am from the country where the Ganga (river) flows ... and from the country where a daughter-in-law wheres a veil on her head in front of her mother-in-law and father-in-law

Title: Beta
Quote: Wah, kya saas ho tum ... abhi tak bahu ke haath ki mehandi nahi chhooti ... aur tumne apna rang dikhana shuru kar diya
Trans: Wow, what a mother-in-law you are ... the henna on your daughter-in-laws hand has not yet gone ... and you have started to show your colors

Title: Beta
Quote: Aye buddhe ... pet mein aant nahi hai, mooh mein daant nahi hai ... chumma lega?
Trans: You old man ... you don't have tripes in your stomach, you don't have teeth in your mouth ... and you want a kiss?

Title: Beta
Quote: Tu mera dulha toh kya ... kisi ka dalaal banne ke layak bhi nahi hai
Trans: Forget being my bridegroom ... you are not even worth becoming a broker for anyone

Title: Qayamat
Quote: Na Hinduo se hai, na Musalmano se hai ... is mulk mein taqleef baimaano se hai
Trans: Not Hindus, not Muslims ... this country has a problem with traitors

Title: Qayamat
Quote: Kabhi mujhko hasaye, kabhi mujhko rulaye ... mujhe kitna sataati hai ... woh ladki bahut yaad aati hai
Trans: Sometime she make me smile, sometimes she makes me cry ... how much she troubles me ... I remember that girl a lot

Title: Qayamat
Quote: Mere jaane ke baad log mujhe zyada yaad karte hai
Trans: People remember me more after I leave

Title: Qayamat
Quote: Jab baat Hindustan Pakistan ki ho rahi ho ... toh har Hindustani ek hi taraf hota hai
Trans: When the question is about India and Pakistan ... then every Indian is on one side

Title: Thanedaar
Quote: Aainda khayal rakhna ki josh mein zabaan na ladkhadaye ... warna apne hosh kho baithoge
Trans: From now on ensure that your tongue does not slip when in high spirit ... or else you will lose your conscious

Title: Thanedaar
Quote: Jurm ki duniya ke chote bhai ... hum kanoon ki duniya ke bade bhai hain
Trans: You are the younger brother of the world of crime ... and I am the elder brother of the world of law

Title: Thanedaar
Quote: Tujhse ghayal hone mein toh bahut mazaa aayega
Trans: It will be great fun to get wounded by you

Title: Thanedaar
Quote: Agar Lawrence aur Peter ko gussa aa gaya ... toh tumhara zindagi maut se baatein karne lagega
Trans: If Lawrence and Peter get angry ... then your life will start talking to death

Title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
Quote: Idhar ja rahe ho yah udhar ja rahe ho ... kidhar bhi ja rahe ho ... sab raasta God ke paas jata hai
Trans: Whether you are going here or whether you are going there ... wherever you are going ... all roads lead to God

Title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
Quote: Arrey tu sad hota hai na ... main double sad hota hai re
Trans: When you are sad ... I am double sad

Title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
Quote: Yahin kahin aas paas koi saala bahut sad hai re ... very sad, very sad
Trans: Somewhere close by, bloody someone is very sad ... very sad, very sad

Title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
Quote: Humko maloom hai heaven bahut beautiful jagah hai ... par wahan jaane ka humko itna jaldi nahi hai
Trans: I know heaven is a very beautiful place ... but I am in no rush to get there

Title: Sherdil
Quote: Yeh maa ki gaud nahin hai ... maut ki gaud hai
Trans: This is not the lap of a mother ... it is the lap of death

Title: Sherdil
Quote: Mere chehre pe kutte ki naak lagi hui hai ... main apne karazdaar ko soongh ke pakad leta hoon
Trans: I have a dogs nose on my face ... I can smell my debtor and catch him

Title: Sherdil
Quote: Shobhraj joh karta hai woh kehta nahi ... pehle karta hai phir kehta hai
Trans: Shobhraj doesn't say first whatever he does ... he does it first and then says it

Title: Hum Saath Saath Hain
Quote: Hum chahe bandhan mein bandhe na bandhe ... jazbaat ka rishta toh dil se hai
Trans: Whether we're tied in a bond or not ... the relationship of emotions is with the heart

Title: Hum Saath Saath Hain
Quote: Bachpan ki mohabbat ko dil se na juda karna ... jab yaad meri aaye milne ki dua karna
Trans: Don't separate the love of childhood from your heart ... whenever you remember me, pray that we meet soon

Title: Hum Saath Saath Hain
Quote: Ladki apne dil ki baat aankhon se keh deti hai
Trans: A girl says whatever is in heart through her eyes

Title: Hum Saath Saath Hain
Quote: Agar kisika dukh baatna hi chahte ho ... toh kaam kuch aisa karo ... ke doosro ki zindagi mein khushi aaye
Trans: If you want to share someones sorrow ... then do such a work ... which brings happiness in others life

Title: Swarg
Quote: Duniya mein gareeb pehda hona koi jurm nahi, koi paap nahi ... magar gareeb marna sabse bada jurm hai, sabse bada paap hai
Trans: Being born poor in this world is not a crime, not a sin ... but to die poor is the biggest crime, the biggest sin

Title: Swarg
Quote: Bhagwan toh hamesha bhagwan hi rehta hai ... uski har haal mein puja ki jati hai ... chahe woh apne bhakt ko sukh de yah dukh
Trans: God always remains God ... he is worshiped no matter what ... whether he gives his devotee happiness or sadness

Title: Swarg
Quote: Jab tak swarg mein devta nahi hota ... swarg, swarg nahi hota hai
Trans: Until there is no God in heaven ... heaven, it not heaven

Title: Swarg
Quote: Duniya ka koi insaan bura aadmi nahi hota ... koi aadmi apni maa ke pet se bura pehda nahi hota ... koi chor apni khushi se chori nahi karta ... koi daaku apni khushi se daaka nahi dalta ... koi tawaif apni khushi se apna jism nahi bechti ... waqt aur halaat insaan ko bura banne pe majboor kar dete hai
Trans: No person in this world is an evil person ... no one is born evil from their mother's womb ... no thief steals with his own happiness ... no dacait robs with his own happiness ... no prostitute sells her body with her own happiness ... time and situation compel a person to become evil

Title: Rock On
Quote: Kabhi kabhi aisa lagta hai jaise yeh sab pichle janam mein hua ho ... aur kabhi jaise kal hi
Trans: Sometimes it feels as if it all happened in another lifetime ... and sometimes as if just yesterday

Title: Rock On
Quote: Hum honge, lights hogi, ek huge audience hogi ... aur hogi music jiske har beat mein, har note mein zindagi hogi ... zindagi
Trans: We'll be there, there'll be lights, there'll be a huge audience ... and there'll be music in which every beat, every note there'll be life ... life

Title: Rock On
Quote: Main marne se pehle ek raat poori tarah jeena chahta hoon
Trans: Before dying I want to live one night to the fullest

Title: Rock On
Quote: Baat toh tumhe bhi saaf nazar aani chahiye ... lekin uske liye tumhe apne yeh rockstar shades utaarne padenge
Trans: You will also see what the matter is ... but for that you will have to remove your rockstar shades

Title: Aashiqui
Quote: Ab mujhe tumhe pyar karne se koi nahi rok sakta ... tum bhi nahi
Trans: Now no one can stop me from loving you ... not even you

Title: Aashiqui
Quote: Tumhara naam maine sirf apne jism par hi nahi ... apne dil, apne dimag aur apni aatma par bhi gaad diya hai
Trans: Not only have I buried your name on my body ... but also in my heart, in my mind and in my soul

Title: Aashiqui
Quote: Koi bhi rishta kitna bhi mahaan, kitna bhi bada kyun na ho ... uske khatam ho jane se zindagi khatam nahi hoti
Trans: No matter how great and how big a relation is ... life does not end when that relation ends

Title: Aashiqui
Quote: Sansar mein agar koi cheez logon ko zinda rakhti hai na ... toh woh pyar hai, pyar
Trans: If there is something that keeps people alive in the universe ... then that is love, love

Title: Special 26
Quote: Asli power dil mein hoti hai!
Trans: The real power lies within the heart!

Title: Special 26
Quote: Logon ke pairon mein chakkar hota hai ... mere dimaag mein hai
Trans: People have a swirl in their legs ... I have it in my mind

Title: Kati Patang
Quote: Na koi tarang hai, na koi umang hai ... meri zindagi bhi kya ek kati patang hai
Trans: Neither do I have any thrill, neither do I have any ambition ... my life is like a lose kite

Title: Kati Patang
Quote: Apnepan ke liye kisiko apna banana zaroori nahi ... jisse bhi apnapan mil jaye wohi apna hai
Trans: For oneness, one does not need to make someone ours ... from whoever you get oneness, they are ours

Title: Kati Patang
Quote: Kavita se mann ko behlaya ja sakta hai ... samjhaya nahi ja sakta
Trans: With a poem you can make a heart happy ... but you can't make it understand

Title: Kati Patang
Quote: Pyar apni jagah hai, daulat apni jagah hai ... zindagi ke liye dono zaroori hai
Trans: Love is in its own place, money is in its own place ... for life both are important

Title: Run
Quote: Bada kamzor leg piece hai ... is murghi ko polio ho gaya tha kya?
Trans: It is a very thin leg piece ... did this chicken have polio?

Title: Run
Quote: Mujhe tumhari ungli nahi ... poora haath thaamna hai zindagi bhar ke liye
Trans: I don't want your finger ... I want to hold your complete hand for my entire life

Title: Run
Quote: Thoda sa hamari taraf se bhi ro dena
Trans: Please cry a little on my behalf also

Title: Run
Quote: Graduate samajh ke humko line maar rahi hai kya?
Trans: Are you hitting on me thinking I am a graduate?

Title: Karz
Quote: Pyar mein toh budha bhi jawaan lagta hai ... ladki Shirin aur ladka Farhad lagta hai
Trans: In love even an old man looks young ... girl looks like Shirin and boy looks like Farhad

Title: Karz
Quote: Karz chukane wale ki yaadash aksar kamzoor ho jati hai
Trans: Usually people with debt lose their memory

Title: Karz
Quote: Musalman ke yahan parvarish, Hinduon se dosti aur angrezon ke shaunk rahe hai mere
Trans: I have been raised in a Muslim family, I have Hindu friends and I have hobbies of the Englishmen

Title: Karz
Quote: Pyar mohabbat mein toh hum tan mann jaan lutaya ... dhokha de dai dost ko ab dekh Kabira aaya
Trans: I've lost my body, heart and life in love and friendship ... now that you have betrayed a friend, watch out here comes Kabira

Title: Khiladi
Quote: Rajneeti ki bhains ke liye daulat ki lathi ki zaroorat hoti hai
Trans: For the buffalo of politics you need a nightstick of money

Title: Khiladi
Quote: Zindagi ke kisi bhi modh par, kisi bhi halaat mein ... tum mera saath nibhaogi
Trans: On any turn in life, in any situation of life ... you will be with me

Title: Khiladi
Quote: Pyar ki shuruvat hi gaaliyon se hoti hai
Trans: Love starts with abuses

Title: Khiladi
Quote: Agar tumne chalaki karne ki koshish ki, yah police ko khabar ki ... toh main tumhari beti ke chhote chhote tukde karke ... tumhe chey mahine tak installment ki soorat mein bhejta rahoonga
Trans: If you try to act smart, or if you inform the police ... then I'll make small small pieces of your daughter ... and I'll send them to you as installments for six months

Title: Taal
Quote: Ishwar dil mein ho toh sachai mazboot rehti hai
Trans: If God is in your heart, the truth is resolute

Title: Taal
Quote: Kuch log pyar karke shaadi karte hai ... aur kuch log shaadi karke pyar karte hai
Trans: Some people fall in love and get married ... and some people get married and fall in love

Title: Taal
Quote: Shaadi na hi ek contract hai, na hi koi utsav hai ... agar utsav hai toh logon ke liye hai ... shaadi do aatmaon do dilon ka mel hai ... jisme do jan bharpoor zindagi saath saath jeete hai aur saath saath marte hai
Trans: Marriage is not a contract, neither a festival ... if it's a festival then it's for others ... marriage is a union of two souls two hearts ... in which two people live life together to the fullest and die together

Title: Taal
Quote: Aap itne khoobsurat log hai ki aapki tasveer seedhe dil mein chapti hai
Trans: You are such beautiful people that your picture prints directly in my heart

Title: Deewana
Quote: Duniya ki nazar mein mare hue log kabhi zinda nahi hote ... varna zindagi khud pareshaan ho jaati hai
Trans: In the eyes of the world the dead people don't come back ... otherwise life itself gets distressed

Title: Deewana
Quote: Rasam nibhane ke liye havan mein ghee dalna hi padta hai ... lekin phir ussi aag se ghar bhi jalaya ja sakta hai
Trans: To follow the procedure one has to add clarified butter to the homa (ritual) ... but with that same fire one can burn the house down also

Title: Deewana
Quote: Mohabbat reet rivaaz nahi maanti ... aur na hi woh lafzo ki mohtaj hai
Trans: Love does not believe in customs and traditions ... and neither is it dependent on words

Title: Deewana
Quote: Yeh daulat bhi kya cheez hai ... jiske pass jitni bhi aati hai ... kam hi lagti hai
Trans: Money is so strange ... no matter how much one gets ... it just doesn't seem enough

Title: Dil To Pagal Hai
Quote: Main usse bahut pyar karti hoon ... ek din ke liye nahi ... ek pal ke liye nahi ... zindagi bhar ke liye
Trans: I love him very much ... not for a day ... not for a moment ... but for the entire life

Title: Dil To Pagal Hai
Quote: Kahin na kahin, koi na koi mere liye banaya gaya hai ... aur kabhi na kabhi main usse zaroor milongi
Trans: Somewhere, someone has been made for me ... and someday I will definitely meet him

Title: Dil To Pagal Hai
Quote: Kehdo ki tumhe nahi lagta ki hum dono ek doosre ke liye bane hai ... kehdo ki jab main tumse door jata hoon, tum mujhe palat kar nahi dekhti ... kehdo ki jab main tumhe choota hoon, tumhe kuch nahi hota ... kehdo ki is waqt tum meri baahon mein nahi aana chahti ... ek baar meri aankhon mein dekho aur aakhri baar kehdo ki tum mujhse pyar nahi karti
Trans: Say that you don't feel we are made for each other ... say that when I go far from you, you don't turn around and see me ... say that when I touch you, you don't feel anything ... say that you don't want to come in my arms right now ... look into my eyes and say for the last time that you don't love me

Title: Dil To Pagal Hai
Quote: Woh hai sabse bura ... woh hum insaano ke saath ajeeb tarah ke khel khelta hai ... woh ek ko doosre se pyar karwata hai, toh doosre ko teesre se, aur teesre ko kisi aur se
Trans: God is very mean ... he plays a very strange game with us humans ... he makes one person love a second person, he makes the second person love a third person, and he makes the third person love someone else

Title: International Khiladi
Quote: Tees din hai tumhare paas ... ek-a-tees ve din mein agar tum is shehar ki hadh mein bhi nazar aaye ... toh duniya ki hadh se bahar nikaal kar phenk doonga
Trans: You have 30 days ... if on the 31st day you are seen within the city limits ... then I will throw you out from the limits of the world

Title: International Khiladi
Quote: Yeh kaun hai yaar ... chalu episode mein commercial break ki tarah beech mein aa jata hai
Trans: Who is this person? ... he is coming in between like a commercial break in a running episode

Title: International Khiladi
Quote: By God, dil garden garden ho gaya!
Trans: By God, I'm exhilarated!

Title: International Khiladi
Quote: Main bure kaam zaroor karta hoon ... lekin waise nahin ki insaaniyat ko mujhpe sharm aa jaye
Trans: I definitely do bad things ... but not those that make humanity feel ashamed of me

Title: Chashme Baddoor (2013)

Title: Raja Hindustani

Trans: When I stepped into your life then I closed all roads, all doors of returning ... now I don't have any other choice besides you or death

Title: Raja Hindustani
Quote: Aap ki aankhen meri taxi ki headlight ki tarah hai memsaab
Trans: Madam, your eyes are like the headlights of my taxi

Title: Raja Hindustani
Quote: Jab do barabar ke log ek doosre ko kuch dete hai toh woh tofha kehlata hai ... lekin jab koi rayees kisi gareeb ko kuch deta hai toh wahi cheez bheek kehlati hai, madad kehlati hai
Trans: When two equal people give each other something then it is called a gift ... but when a rich man gives something to a poor man then the same thing is called begging and help

Title: Raja Hindustani
Quote: Kehdo uss bade baap ki beti se ke uske samaaj mein shaadi byah ek khel hoga, joh kagaz pe kiye hue dastakhat se bhi toda ja sakta hai ... lekin hamare samaaj mein hum usse puja mante hai ... agni ke saath pheron ke baad yeh bandhan atoot ho jata hai
Trans: Go tell that rich mans daughter that in her society marriage is a game, which can be broken with a signature on paper ... but in our society we worship it ... and after the seven rounds around the fire this relationship becomes unbreakable

Title: Jolly LLB
Quote: Meerut ka hoon ... apni aukaat pe aa gaya na, toh gand ka Gurgaon bana doonga
Trans: I am from Meerut ... if I come to my skin, the I will make your ass into Gurgaon

Title: Jolly LLB
Quote: Kanoon andha hota hai ... judge nahi
Trans: The law is blind ... but not the judge

Title: Jolly LLB
Quote: Madam yeh Meerut hai ... yahan ke laundon ko na ek hi tarah ki boyfriendi aati hai ... thoko, peeto aur khisko
Trans: Madam this is Meerut ... the guys out here only know being a boyfriend of one type ... bang, hit and run

Title: Jolly LLB
Quote: Kaan ke neeche kheench ke doonga na ... agli saath pushtein teri saali behri pehda hongi
Trans: If I give you one tight slap under your ears ... then bloody your next seven generations will be born deaf

Title: Sadak
Quote: Main wapas zaroor aaonga ... aur uss din aakhri baar teri photo chapegi ... zinda nahi murda
Trans: I will definitely comeback ... and that day your picture will be published for the last time ... not as living, but dead

Title: Sadak
Quote: Apan jab se pehda hua hai ... tab se yeh sadak hi apna ghar hai aur yeh footpath hi apna bistar
Trans: Since I was born ... this road has been my house and this footpath has been my bed

Title: Don (2006)
Quote: Bahar tumhari aunty bahut saare uncles ko lekar aayi hai
Trans: Your aunt has bought a lot of uncles outside

Title: Don (2006)
Quote: Kuch kaam aaise hote hai jin mein fayda yah nuksaan nahi dekha jaata ... bus unhe karna zaroori hota hai
Trans: There are a few things in which you don't look for profit or loss ... it is simply necessary to do them

Title: Don (2006)
Quote: Mera intezaar toh gyarah mulkon ki police kar rahi hai lekin ... Don ko pakadna mushkil hi nahin ... namumkin hai
Trans: Police from eleven countries are waiting for me but ... catching Don is not only hard ... it's impossible

Title: Don (2006)
Quote: Don ke dushman ki sabse badi galati yeh hai ... ki woh Don ka dushman hai
Trans: The biggest mistake of Don's enemy is that ... he is Don's enemy

Title: Jodi No. 1
Quote: Upar se hum hain saath saath ... aur andhar se hum aapke hai kaun
Trans: From the top they are like we are together ... and from inside they are like who are you

Title: Jodi No. 1
Quote: Oh paaji tussi kamaal ho, tussi great ho ... oh tussi toop ho toop, tussi zindagi di hope ho hope
Trans: Oh brother you are wonderful, you are great ... you are a tank, you are the hope of life

Title: Jodi No. 1
Quote: Bypass mein kabhi kabhi aadmi pass bhi ho jata hai
Trans: In a bypass (operation) sometimes a person passes away

Title: Waris
Quote: Yeh aap log taaliyan baja rahe hai ... yah rummy ke patte baant rahe hai
Trans: Are you guys clapping ... or distributing the cards for rummy

Title: Waris
Quote: Saanp ko fann uthane se pehle kuchalna, main achchi tarah janta hoon
Trans: I know very well, how to kill a snake before it comes into an attacking position

Title: Waris
Quote: Anyay ki kaali raat khatam ho rahi hai ... aur nyay ka suraj nikalne waala hai
Trans: The black night of injustice is getting over ... and the sun of justice is about to rise

Title: Major Saab
Quote: Joh jung aadmi teer aur talwar se nahi jeet pata ... aurat us jung ko apne aasoonyon se jeet leti hai
Trans: The war that a man cannot win with arrows and swords ... a woman can win that war with her tears

Title: Major Saab
Quote: Main ek zeharelay saanp par bharosa kar sakta hoon ... tum par nahi
Trans: I can trust a poisonous snake ... but not you

Title: Major Saab
Quote: Yeh ghulami ka patta gale se nikaal kar phek do ...  aur Hindustan ke badshahat ka taj peheno
Trans: Take out this belt of slavery from the neck and throw it away ... and wear the crown of the king of India

Title: Major Saab
Quote: Woh aaye hamare ghar mein, khuda ki kudrat hai ... kabhi hum unko, kabhi apne ghar ko dekhte hai
Trans: She came to my house, it is God's nature ... sometimes I see her and sometimes I see my house

Title: Sangam
Quote: Dukh tumne mujhe nahi diya hai ... maine apne aap ko dukh diya hai
Trans: You haven't given me any sorrow ... I have given myself sorrow

Title: Sangam
Quote: Aaj itni derr ho gayi ... kabhi darwaze ko dekhte the kabhi waqt ko ... na tum aate the na waqt jata tha
Trans: Today you are so late ... sometimes I looked at the door and sometimes I looked at the time ... neither would you come and neither would the time pass

Title: Sangam
Quote: Sab kuch khuda se mang liya tujhko mangkar ... uthte nahi hai haath mere is dua ke baad
Trans: By asking for you, I've asked everything from God ... now my hands don't rise after that prayer of mine

Title: Sangam
Quote: Sangam toh woh hai jahan dil, dil se milta hai ... atma, atma se milke paramatma ho jati hai
Trans: A confluence is where a heart meets a heart ... a soul meets a soul and becomes a supreme soul

Title: Taxi No. 9211
Quote: Tu apne crore pe, main apne road pe ... maaze karenge
Trans: You be with your money, I'll be with my road ... we'll have fun

Title: Taxi No. 9211
Quote: Shivaji ke paas ek horse ka power tha, aur unka ghoda hawa ke saath baat karta tha ... tere paas athrah horse ka power hai, gear mein dhal aur bol ... Jai Maharashtra!
Trans: Shivaji had the power of one horse and his horse would talk with the air ... you have 18 horsepowers, put the car in the gear and say ... Jai Maharashtra!

Title: Taxi No. 9211
Quote: Saala khud marna hai toh marr na ... doosre ki kaiko vaat lagata hai
Trans: Bloody if you want to die, then die ... why are you screwing others

Title: Taxi No. 9211
Quote: Har koi subah nikalta hai soochke ki aaj kuch achcha hoga ... raat tak bas booch achcha beheta hai
Trans: Everyone leaves in the morning thinking something good will happen today ... but till the night they only get screwed in a good way

Title: Maa Tujhhe Salaam
Quote: Tum doodh mangoge hum kheer denge ... tum Kashmir mangoge hum cheer denge
Trans: If you ask for milk, we'll give you pudding ... if you ask for Kashmir, we'll tear you apart

Title: Maa Tujhhe Salaam
Quote: Sir, aap apni formalities poori kijiye ... main apni duty poori karta hoon
Trans: Sir, you fulfill your formalities ... I will fulfill my duty

Title: Maa Tujhhe Salaam
Quote: Hindustan se gaddari karne waalon ka raasta ... seedhe kabristan jaata hai
Trans: The path for people who are unfaithful to India ... goes straight to the graveyard

Title: Maa Tujhhe Salaam
Quote: Hum kanoon ke saath khelte hai ... kanoon ko haath mein nahi lete
Trans: We play with the law ... we don't take the law in our hands

Title: Dil Hai Ke Manta Nahin
Quote: In buson ka yahi chakkar hai ... time par aati hai, time par jaati hai
Trans: These buses have the same issue ... they come on time and they leave on time

Title: Dil Hai Ke Manta Nahin
Quote: For your naughtiness ... I will eat a papad and you will get a jhapad
Trans: For your naughtiness ... I will eat a papadum and you will get a slap

Title: Dil Hai Ke Manta Nahin
Quote: Tum aaise ulloo ke patthe ke saath kaise shaadi kar sakti ho?
Trans: How can you marry such a fool?

Title: Murder 2
Quote: Bhagwan ke pehle ya baad agar koi cheez hai ... toh woh hai dhan, daulat, rokda ... imaandari ka certificate nahi
Trans: If there is anything before or after God ... then it is prosperity, wealth, cash ... it is not the certificate of honesty

Title: Murder 2
Quote: Main ayyashi bhi na ... muft ki nahi karta hoon
Trans: Even when it comes to debauchery ... I don't look to do it for free

Title: Murder 2
Quote: Main charge bahut karta hoon ... mujhe afford karna aasaan nahi hai
Trans: I charge a lot ... it is not easy to afford me

Title: Murder 2
Quote: Tera dimaag tedha hai, lekin achcha sochta hai
Trans: Your mind is weird, but you think well

Title: Raaz: The Mystery Continues
Quote: Bhagwan ko milne ke liye log mandiron mein jaate hai, apne bag mein uski tasveer rakhte hai, gadi mein photo tangte hai ... lekin apne dil mein usko koi nahi rakhta hai
Trans: To meet God people go to the temple, they keep his picture in their bag, they hang his picture in the car ... but nobody keeps him in the heart

Title: Raaz: The Mystery Continues
Quote: Himmat marne ke liye nahi, jeene ke liye chahiye
Trans: One does not need courage to die, one needs it for living

Title: Raaz: The Mystery Continues
Quote: Duniya pehle se hi ek masterpiece hai ... uske baare mein paitings banane se achcha hai ... uski hifazat karo, usse pyar karo
Trans: The world already is a masterpiece ... rather than making paintings of it ... its better if we protect it, love it

Title: Raaz: The Mystery Continues
Quote: Bura joh dekhan main chala, bura na milya koye ... joh mann khoja apna, toh mujhse bura na koye
Trans: When I searched for the bad, I didn't find any ... and when I searched in my heart, I found no one worse than me

Title: Jaanam Samjha Karo
Quote: Agar aashiq ko dhoondna ho toh ... mashooq ki gali mein dhoondo
Trans: If you want to find a lover ... then look for him in the street of his love

Title: Jaanam Samjha Karo
Quote: Bagair maang mein sindoor aur yeh gale mein mangalsutra ... ek suhaagan adhoori hoti hai ... adhoori
Trans: Without the vermilion of the hair parting and the wedding necklace ... a married woman looks incomplete ... incomplete

Title: Jaanam Samjha Karo
Quote: Apna desh phir bhi apna desh hota hai ... aur apna khana, apna khana hota hai
Trans: Our country is still our country ... and our food, is our food

Title: Jaanam Samjha Karo
Quote: Aapke daddu dhamki nahi dete ... faisle sunate hai
Trans: Your grandfather doesn't give warnings ... he directly gives the judgement

Title: Raaz
Quote: Garmi-e-hasratein nakaam se jal jaate hai ... hum chiragon ki tarah shaam se jal jaate hai ... shama jis aag mein jalti hai numaish ke liye ... hum ussi aag mein gumnaam se jal jaate hai ... jab bhi aata hai tera naam mere naam ke saath ... jaane kyun log mere naam se jal jaate hai
Trans: I burn in the warmth of your unrequited love ... I'm burning since the evening like the lamps ... the fire in which the candle burns for display ... I'm buring in the same fire unnoticed ... whenever your name comes with my name ... not sure why people get jealous of my name

Title: Raaz
Quote: Saare jahan ka dard sametkar, jab kudrat se kuch na ban saka ... toh usne tumhari yeh do aankhen bana di
Trans: After accumulating all the pain of the world, when God couldn't make anything ... he then made these two eyes of yours

Title: Raaz
Quote: Kabse is pyasi zameen pe barish ki ek boond tak nahi giri ... par aaj yahan toofan aayega
Trans: It's been a while since a single drop of rainfall has fallen on this thirsty land ... but today a storm will come here

Title: Raaz
Quote: Shaam hai, baarish hai, pyar ka mausam hai ... sun lene de hawa mein faile hue sangeet ko ... aag hai, tadap hai, bebasi ka aalam hai ... keh lene de aaj kuch bichre hue meet ko
Trans: It is an evening, it is raining, it is the weather of love ... let me listen to the music that is spread in the air ... there is fire, there is suffering, there is a state of helplessness ... let the separated companions say something today

Title: Gunaah
Quote: Joh jisse pyar karta hai ... agar uske dil mein zara si bhi jagah pa le ... toh marke bhi nahi marta
Trans: When you love someone ... and if you find even a small place in their heart ... then you won't die even after dying

Title: Gunaah
Quote: Himmat bandook uthake trigger dabane ke liye nahi ... himmat bandook phekne ke liye chahiye
Trans: Courage is not needed to lift the gun and press the trigger ... courage is needed to throw away the gun

Title: Gunaah
Quote: Log ikke se jeette hai ... hum tujhe rani se jeetke dikhayenge
Trans: People win with an ace ... I'll show you how I win with a queen

Title: Gunaah
Quote: Kaam khatam hone ke pehle jashn nahi manate ... nazar lag jati hai
Trans: One must not celebrate before the work is complete ... it spells bad luck

Title: Karan Arjun
Quote: Zindagi mein joh hota hai woh socha nahi hota ... aur joh socha jata hai woh kabhi hota nahi ... aur joh kabhi nahi hota, woh kabhi kabhi ho jata hai
Trans: In life whatever happens it is never thought of ... and whatever is thought of it never happens ... and whatever never happens, sometimes it does happen

Title: Karan Arjun
Quote: Mere bete aayenge, mere Karan Arjun aayenge ... zameen ki chaati phad ke aayenge, aasman ka seena cheer ke aayenge
Trans: My sons will come, my Karan Arjun will come ... they will tear the chest of the ground and come, they will rip apart the chest of the sky and come

Title: Karan Arjun
Quote: Mere dushmano ko sar chupane ke liye jagah dene waalon ... main tumhari chittaon ko jalne ke liye jagah nahi doonga
Trans: You guys who are giving a space to live to my enemies ... I will not give any space for your pyres to burn

Title: Karan Arjun
Quote: Daulat se insaan keemti bistar khareed sakta hai, magar neend nahi khareed sakta ... daulat se insaan roti khareed sakta hai, magar bhook nahi ... daulat se insaan jism khareed sakta hai, magar sacha pyar nahi khareed sakta
Trans: With money a person can buy an expensive bed, but he can't buy sleep ... with money a person can buy bread, but he can't buy hunger ... with money a person can buy a body, but he can't buy true love

Title: Aashiqui 2
Quote: Dil ko zubaan, aankhon ko sapne mil gaye ... aashiqui mein, zindagi ko mainne mil gaye
Trans: The heart got a language, the eyes got dreams ... in love, life got its meaning

Title: Aashiqui 2
Quote: Yeh zindagi chal toh rahi thi ... par tere aane se maine jeena shuru kiya
Trans: This life was going on ... but I started living since you came

Title: Aashiqui 2
Quote: Main marne ke liye nahi peeta ... peene ke liye marta hoon
Trans: I don't drink to die ... I die to drink

Title: Aashiqui 2
Quote: Tumhare ishq se bani hoon main ... pehle zinda thi ... ab jee rahi hoon main
Trans: I am made from your love ... first I was alive ... now I am living

Title: Virrudh
Quote: Koi insaan mahan nahi hota ... mahan hoti hai chunautiyan ... jab ek aam insaan unhe sweekar kare ... tab woh bada kehlata hai
Trans: No one person is great ... challenges are great ... and when a normal person accepts these challenges ... then he is called someone big

Title: Virrudh
Quote: Shraddha ka toh supermarket hai hamara desh ... jiska basement andh-shraddha ke parking se full hai
Trans: Our country is a supermarket of faith ... whose basement parking is full of faithlessness

Title: Virrudh
Quote: Shopping karne gaye the yah shoplifting?
Trans: Did you guys go for shopping or shoplifting?

Title: Qaidi
Quote: Maine uske shaq ko shamshaan mein badal diya ... kyun ki Kaali ki adalat mein shaq ki daleel nahi ... maut ki sazaa sunai jaati hai
Trans: I changed her suspicion into a mortuary ... because in Kaali's court there is no case of suspicion ... only the punishment of death is announced

Title: Qaidi
Quote: Main suraj ko bhi raat ko nikalne par majboor kar doonga
Trans: I will even compel the sun to come out in the night

Title: Qaidi
Quote: Jaldi ka kaam shaitan ka hota hai
Trans: Quick work is the work of devil

Title: Qaidi
Quote: Yaad rakh, tere paas hamare khilaf proof hai ... magar tera ghar bulletproof nahi hai
Trans: Remember, you have proof against us ... but your house is not bulletproof

Title: Mard
Quote: Meri zindagi aur maut par toh hukumat kar sakte hai aap ... lekin mere dil par nahi
Trans: You can rule over my life and death ... but not over my heart

Title: Mard
Quote: Upar waala bhookha jagata zaroor hai ... lekin bhookha sulata nahi
Trans: God wakes us up hungry ... but he doesn't make us sleep hungry

Title: Mard
Quote: Mard ko dard nahi hota
Trans: Real man doesn't feel any pain

Title: Mard
Quote: Peeth par maara hai ... ab seene par khaoge
Trans: You've hit me on the back ... now you will face it on the chest

Title: Chal Mere Bhai
Quote: Neeli chatri waale, agar tu hai toh meri fariyad sun ... is duniya mein kahi ladkiyan hai ... ek toh, arre ek toh mere liye chun
Trans: Hey you (God) with the blue umbrella, if you are there then listen to my complaint ... in this world there are so many girls ... atleast select one for me, atleast one

Title: Chal Mere Bhai
Quote: Yeh aasoon joh hai na, beh jaye toh pani hai ... andhar reh jaye toh zehar hai
Trans: These tears, if they flow away then they are like water ... but if they stay inside then they are like poison

Title: Ab Tak Chhappan
Quote: Hum sab system ka hissa hai ... system decide karta hai, apun follow karta hai
Trans: We are all part of the system ... the system decides, and we follow it

Title: Ab Tak Chhappan
Quote: Tum log society ka kachra hai ... main society ka jamadar
Trans: You people are the trash of the society ... and I am the cleaner of the society

Title: Ab Tak Chhappan
Quote: Senior officers hai na mausam ki tarah hote hain ... badalte rehte hai
Trans: Senior officers are like the weather ... they keep changing

Title: Lakeer
Quote: Kapde badalne se insaan badal nahi jata
Trans: A human does not change by merely changing clothes

Title: Lakeer
Quote: Zameen aur aasman ek nahi ho sakte ... us hi tarah kasoorwar aur bekasoor bhi ek nahi ho sakte
Trans: The ground and the sky can't be one ... just like that the guilty and the innocent also can't be one

Title: Lakeer
Quote: Aapke ek shaunk ki keemat ... hamari kahi chhaton ki keemat hai
Trans: The price of your one hobby ... is the price for many of our roofs

Title: Lakeer
Quote: Waqt halaat badalte hai ... aur halaat insaan
Trans: Time changes situations ... and situations change humans

Title: Phir Hera Pheri
Quote: Arre baba wrong number hai toh uthati kaiko hai re?
Trans: If its a wrong number then why do you pick it up?

Title: Phir Hera Pheri
Quote: Amir aadmi pandhra minute mein apne kapde badalta hai, aadhe ghante mein apna ghar badalta hai, ek ghante mein apna dhanda badalta hai ... aur do ghante mein apni biwi badalta hai
Trans: A rich man changes his clothes in 15 minutes, changes his house in half an hour, changes his business in an hour ... and in a couple of hours changes his wife

Title: Phir Hera Pheri
Quote: Iske mooh mein pehdaishi supari hai ... yeh totla hai
Trans: He has a nut in his mouth since birth ... he stammers

Title: Phir Hera Pheri
Quote: Har dhoti pehenne waala Gandhi nahi hota
Trans: Everyone who wears a loincloth is not Gandhi

Title: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
Quote: Jis aadmi ka dil achcha na ho ... uspar kuch achcha nahi lagta
Trans: One who does not have a clean heart ... nothing looks good on him

Title: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
Quote: Bhaisaab dete hai gali pe gali ... lagta hai jana padega mujhe Kullu Manali
Trans: Brother is cursing a lot ... looks like I'll have to go to Kullu Manali

Title: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
Quote: Kardo aaisi ghatna ... woh seedhe pahunche Patna
Trans: Do some eventful ... so that he reaches straight to Patna

Title: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
Quote: Khana khane ke liye pati ka nahi ... bhook lagne ka intezaar karna chahiye
Trans: To eat food one should not wait for the husband ... one should wait for hunger

Title: Rakshak
Quote: Paison mein bahut garmi hoti hai ... usse bardaasht karna seekho ... varna jal jaoge
Trans: Money has a lot of heat ... learn to tolerate it ... otherwise you will burn

Title: Rakshak
Quote: Sirf daulat kamane se kuch nahi hota hai ... aadmi kamana bhi zaroori hota hai
Trans: Nothing happens by only earing money ... it is important to earn people also

Title: Rakshak
Quote: Main toh aaj tak samajhta tha ki daulat insaan ko sirf pagal banati hai ... par main dekh raha hoon ... daulat insaan ko soovar bhi bana deti hai
Trans: I use to think that money only made a human go mad ... but I am seeing that ... money also turns a human into a pig

Title: Rakshak
Quote: Joh bikta nahi ... woh mere samne tikta nahi
Trans: The one who cannot be bought ... he doesn't stand a chance in front of me

Title: Jeet
Quote: Aaj joh khoon apne khoon ke liye pani ho sakta hai ... kal hum sabke liye zehar bhi ban sakta hai
Trans: Today the blood that can become water for its own blood ... tomorrow it can also become poison for all of us

Title: Jeet
Quote: Agar mujhe malum hota ki mujhe dekhkar tumhare chehre pe hazaar watt ki muskaan phail jati ... toh main kab ka aa chuka hota
Trans: If I knew that there will be a 1000 watts smile on your face after seeing me ... then I would have come much earlier

Title: Jeet
Quote: In haathon ne sirf hathyaar chhode hai ... chalana nahi bhoole
Trans: These hands have only left the weapons ... they have not forgotton using them

Title: Jeet
Quote: Aaj ke baad teri har saans ke peeche main maut bankar khada hoon
Trans: From today onwards I will be standing like death behind every breathe of yours

Title: Agneepath (2012)
Quote: Yere yere pausa, tula deto paisa ... paisa saala khota, paus aala motha
Trans: Oh rain do come, I'll give you money ... the money was bloody fake, and the rain came fast

Title: Agneepath (2012)
Quote: Tum kya leke aaye the ... aur kya leke jaoge
Trans: What did you bring ... and what will you take and go

Title: Agneepath (2012)
Quote: Lambe khel mein chote mohron ki zaroorat nahi hoti
Trans: In a long game small pawns are not needed

Title: Agneepath (2012)
Quote: Daru peena buri baat hai ... peeke bottal ko mauke padh chhod dena ... aur buri baat hai
Trans: Drinking alcohol is bad ... but leaving the bottle on the spot after drinking ... is even worse

Title: Parineeta
Quote: Aapki har baat paison se shuru hoti hai ... aur paison par khatam hoti hai
Trans: Every point of yours starts with money ... and ends with money

Title: Parineeta
Quote: Jahan munafa na ho ... wahan bilkul waqt barbad nahi karna chahiye
Trans: Where there is no profit ... we must not waste any time over there

Title: Phir Teri Kahani Yaad Aayee
Quote: Pyar ke khatir usko bhi chhodna padta hai ... jiske bina jee nahi sakte
Trans: For love one has to also leave the person ... without whom we cannot live

Title: Phir Teri Kahani Yaad Aayee
Quote: Shuruvat mein hi anth chupa hota hai
Trans: The end is hidden in the start itself

Title: Ajnabee
Quote: Everything is planned!
Trans: Everything is planned!

Title: Ajnabee
Quote: Main ittefaq se koi kaam nahi karta
Trans: I don't do any work by coincidence

Title: Ajnabee
Quote: Akalmand aadmi mein ek bahut badi bewakoofi hoti hai ... woh apne sivah sari duniya ko bewakoof samajhta hai
Trans: A wise man has one big foolishness in him ... he thinks that the whole world is foolish except him

Title: Ajnabee
Quote: Daal mein thoda sa pani dalo, phir usse garam karo ... phir thoda sa apni khoobsurati ka namak, apni shararat ki mirchi aur apne masoomiyat ki malai dal do ... aur mohabbat ke makhan ka tadka laga do ... aisi daal banegi ki daal toh daal, saath mein main tumhe bhi kha jaaonga
Trans: Put a little water in the pulses, then heat it up ... then put a little salt of your beauty, spice of your mischief and cream of your innocence ... then garnish it with the butter of your love ... with that such great pulses will be ready, that I will eat you along with the pulses

Title: Ek Duuje Ke Liye
Quote: Prem ki raah hoti hi hai aaisi ... raasta jitna lamba hota hai ... rahi utne nasdeek ho jaate hai
Trans: The path of love is such that ... the longer the road is ... the closer the travelers get

Title: Ek Duuje Ke Liye
Quote: Yeh dard nahi zehar hai ... jise main na andhar pee sakta hoon ... na bahar ugal sakta hoon
Trans: This is poison and not pain ... which I can't gulp inside ... and neither can I spit it outside

Title: Ek Duuje Ke Liye
Quote: Hum tum dono jab mil jayenge ... ek naya itihaas banayenge ... aur agar hum na mil paye toh ... toh bhi ek naya itihaas banayenge
Trans: When we two meet together ... we will make a new history ... and if we are not able to meet ... then to we will make a new history
