Title: Salaam Namaste
Quote: Main perfect nahi hoon, tum perfect nahi ho aur zindagi kabhi perfect nahi hogi ... par tum mere liye hamesha perfect hogi
Trans: I am not perfect, you are not perfect and life will never be perfect ... but you will always be perfect for me

Title: Salaam Namaste
Quote: Rehna hai raho, jaana hai jao ... I don't give a crocodile's ass
Trans: Stay or leave, it's your wish ... I don't give a crocodile's ass

Title: Salaam Namaste
Quote: Maan na maan ... no mehmaan
Trans: Whether you accept it or not ... I want no guests

Title: Salaam Namaste
Quote: Yeh koi Hindustani sulabh shauchalay nahi ... jahan bandh hone waali cheez khulti nahi aur khulne waali cheez bandh nahi hoti
Trans: This is not an Indian toliet ... where the thing that is supposed to close does not open and the thing that is supposed to open does not close

Title: Naseeb (1981)
Quote: Jiske sar pe tujh jaise dost ki dosti ka saaya ho ... uske liye bankar aayi maut, uske dushmano ki maut ban jaati hai
Trans: Whoever has the shadow of friendship on their head from a friend like you ... for him even the death that comes, becomes the death of his enemies

Title: Naseeb (1981)
Quote: Zindagi insaan ko laati hai, maut le jaati hai ... yeh sharaab beech mein kahan aati hai
Trans: Life brings a human, death takes him away ... where does this alcohol come in between

Title: Naseeb (1981)
Quote: Kapde badalne se aadmi ki asliyat nahi badal jaati
Trans: The reality of a man does not change by changing clothes

Title: Naseeb (1981)
Quote: Aap ek achche aadmi hai ... aur ek achche aadmi ke haath mein sharaab ki bottal achchi nahi lagti
Trans: You are a good man ... and an alcohol bottle does not look good in the hands of a good man

Title: Sooryavansham
Quote: Sooryavansh ek aag hai ... ismein doston ke liye jitni jyoti hai ... dushmano ke liye utni hi jwala
Trans: The Sun dynasty is a fire ... the amount of light it has for friends ... that many flames it has for the enemies

Title: Sooryavansham
Quote: Bachpan se dukhon ka itna bhoj uthaya hai ... ki ab aur bhoj uthane ki himmat nahi rahi
Trans: Since childhood I have lifted so much weight of sorrow ... that now I don't have the courage to lift any weight

Title: Sooryavansham
Quote: Kisi insaan ka gussa uski umar se bada nahi hota
Trans: The anger of any person is not bigger than their age

Title: Sooryavansham
Quote: Ek baar insaan pehda ho jaaye, uski umar sirf ghatti hai ... badhti nahi
Trans: Once a human is born then their life only decreases ... it doesn't increase

Title: Prem Rog
Quote: Sabhi insaan ek jaise hi toh hote hai ... wahi do haath, do paun, aankhen, kaan, chehra ... sabke ek jaise hi toh hote hai ... phir kyun koi ek, sirf ek aaisa hota hai ... joh itna pyara lagne lagta hai ... ke agar uski liye jaan bhi deni padhe ... toh haste haste di ja sakti hai
Trans: Every person is the same ... two hands, two legs, eyes, ears, face ... everyone has the same ... then why is it that there is someone, only one ... whom we adore so much ... and for whom if we have to give our life ... then we can do that laughingly

Title: Prem Rog
Quote: Humne saanp ko doodh pilaya ... par hum doodh pila sakte hai, toh uska sar bhi kuchal sakte hai
Trans: I have fed milk to a snake ... but if I can feed milk then I can also crush its head

Title: Prem Rog
Quote: Prem toh woh rog hai joh aasani se lagta nahi ... aur jab lag jaata hai na ... phir kabhi mitta nahi
Trans: Love is a disease that doesn't come easily ... and when it comes ... then it never goes away

Title: Prem Rog
Quote: Reet rivaaz insaan ki sahuliyat ke liye banaye jaate hai ... insaan reet rivaazo ke liye nahi
Trans: Customs and rituals are made for the ease of humans ... humans are not made for customs and rituals

Title: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
Quote: Gusse se dekh rahi ho yah shakal hi aaisi hai
Trans: Are you staring with anger or is your face like this only

Title: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
Quote: Challis saal ki shaadi shuda zindagi ke baad bhaagwaan ...  pati patni ko sirf goli maar sakta hai ... seetti nahi
Trans: Oh my beloved wife, after 40 years of married life ... a husband can only fire a bullet at his wife ... he can't whistle at her

Title: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
Quote: Soone ke liye chaddar ki nahi ... neend ki zaroorat hai
Trans: To sleep one doesn't need a blanket ... one needs sleep

Title: Yeh Raaste Hain Pyaar Ke
Quote: Sacha dost toh woh hota hai ... joh dost ki galati ko apni galati samajhkar maaf karde
Trans: A true friend is one ... who considers a friends mistake as his mistake and forgives him

Title: Yeh Raaste Hain Pyaar Ke
Quote: Achcha dost khushiyan deta hai ... cheenta nahi
Trans: A good friend gives happiness ... he doesn't snatch it

Title: Yeh Raaste Hain Pyaar Ke
Quote: Ajab hai yeh taqdeer ka lekha ... maa aaisi hoti hai ... aaj pehli baar hai dekha
Trans: Destiny is so strange ... a mother is something like this ... today I saw for the first time

Title: Yeh Raaste Hain Pyaar Ke
Quote: Yaar hoon, humdardo ka saaya hoon ... aaj yeh mat kehna, ke bewaqt aaya hoon
Trans: I am a friend, I am a shadow of a caring person ... today don't say that, I have come at the wrong time

Title: Takkar
Quote: Udaasi ka sirf ek sur hota hai, jisse pakadkar main jeeti rahi hoon ... aur gusse ka bhi ek hi sur hota hai, jisse pakadkar tum jee rahe ho ... magar zindagi mein saat sur hote hai ... kya hum in saaton suron ko pakadkar nahi chal sakte
Trans: Sadness has only one tune, on which I am living ... and anger also has only one tune, on which you are living ...  but life has seven tunes ... why can't we catch these seven tunes and walk together

Title: Takkar
Quote: Tum agar saath ho toh kisi cheez se darr nahi lagta ... darrta hoon toh sirf tumhe khone se
Trans: If you are with me then I am not scared of anything ... I am only scared of losing you

Title: Takkar
Quote: Nafrat ki is duniya mein mohabbat shayad sabse bada jurm hai
Trans: Love is the biggest crime in this world of hate

Title: Takkar
Quote: Bahut auratein dekhi jinke liye jaan di jaa sakti hai ... pehli baar ek aaisi ladki dekhi jiske liye jaan li jaa sakti hai
Trans: I have seen many women for whom one can give their life ... but for the first time I am seeing a woman for whom a life can be taken

Title: D-Day
Quote: Sirf insaan galat nahi hote ... waqt bhi galat ho sakta hai
Trans: Not only can humans be wrong ... even the time can be wrong

Title: D-Day
Quote: Zinda laane ki zaroorat nahi ... murde bhi chalenge
Trans: No need to get them alive ... dead is also fine

Title: D-Day
Quote: Galatiya bhi rishto ki tarah hoti hai ... karni nahi padti ... ho jaati hai
Trans: Mistakes are like relations ... you don't have to do them ... they just happen

Title: D-Day
Quote: Trigger kheench ... mamla mat kheench ... khinch gaya na toh bahut takleef doonga
Trans: Pull the trigger ... don't pull the matter ... if it gets pulled then I will give you a lot of suffering

Title: Khudgarz
Quote: Aaj hum iska boti ka tukda tukda karke ... iska khoon ka ek ek boond choos loonga
Trans: Today I will chop his body into pieces ... and I will suck every drop of his blood

Title: Khudgarz
Quote: Aaj humne tarakki ka pehla seedhi par kadam rakh liya hoon ... aur bahut jaldi itna oonchai pe pahunch jaonga ... ke humko dekhne ke liye tumko aakash ka baadal hatana padega
Trans: Today I have stepped on the first step of advancement ... and very soon I will reach such great heights ... that to see me you will have to move the clouds in the sky

Title: Khudgarz
Quote: Is zameen se kabhi nafrat mat karna ... kyun ki aadmi jab oonchai se ludakta hai ... toh usse neeche is hi zameen par aana padta hai
Trans: Never hate the ground ... because when a man falls from the top ... then he has to come down on this ground itself

Title: Khudgarz
Quote: Imaandari se chori karne mein ... chori pakdi nahi jaati
Trans: When you steal with honesty ... then you don't get caught

Title: Baap Numbri Beta Dus Numbri
Quote: Dukh jab hamari kahani sunta hai toh khud dukh ko dukh hota hai
Trans: When sadness listens to our story then even sadness himself feels sad

Title: Baap Numbri Beta Dus Numbri
Quote: Na pet mein dana hai ... na lote mein pani hai ... na bundle mein beedi hai ... na maachis mein teeli hai
Trans: There is no food in the stomach ... no water in the mug ... no beedi in the packet ... and no matchstick in the matchbox

Title: Baap Numbri Beta Dus Numbri
Quote: Hum mein toh lagta hai bhagwan ne khali pehda kar diya hai ... taqdeer likhna hi bhool gaya hai
Trans: I think that God has only given birth to us ... he has forgotten to write our destiny

Title: Baap Numbri Beta Dus Numbri
Quote: Itna kamzor ho gaya hoon ki meri parchai ko bhi chakkar aa rahi hai
Trans: I have become so weak that even my shadow is feeling dizzy

Title: Yaadein
Quote: Pehle din inkaar kiya ... duje din iqraar ki ... teeje din pyar kiya
Trans: First day she denied ... second day she agreed ... third day she fell in love

Title: Yaadein
Quote: Jab pyar karne waale apne jazbaato ko dabakar ... rishto ko koi doosra naam dete hai ... toh kabhi na kabhi, kahin na kahin jazbaat phoot phootke rone lagte hai
Trans: When people in love suppress their emotions ... and give an alternate name to their relations ... then at some point and at some place those emotions cry a lot

Title: Yaadein
Quote: Is duniya mein aaisa koi nahi bacha jisse kabhi na kabhi, kahin na kahin, kisi na kisi se mohabbat na hui ho ... aur us mohabbat mein kuch mile toh kuch bhichad gaye ... par unki mohabbat hamesha zinda rahi hai
Trans: In this world there is no one person left who has never been in love sometime, somewhere and with someone ... and in that love sometimes they meet and sometimes they separate ... but their love always remains alive

Title: Yaadein
Quote: Tum jaisi ladkiyan jab pyar mein padti hai na ... toh great love stories banti hai
Trans: When girls like you fall in love ... then great love stories are made

Title: Jaisi Karni Waisi Bharni
Quote: Haraam ki daulat insaan ko shuru shuru mein sukh zaroor dilati hai ... magar baad mein le jaakar ek aaise dukh ke sagar mein dhakel deti hai ... jahan marte dum tak sukh ka kinara kabhi nazar nahi aata hai
Trans: Unlawful wealth surely gives happiness to one in the start ... but later on it takes you and throws you into the sea of sadness ... where you will never ever see the shores of happiness

Title: Jaisi Karni Waisi Bharni
Quote: Agar insaan dukh se dosti karle ... toh phir zindagi mein kabhi usko sukh ki tamanna hi nahi rahegi
Trans: If a man befriends sorrow ... then in life he will never have the wish for happiness

Title: Jaisi Karni Waisi Bharni
Quote: Insaan ki zindagi ek aaine ki tarah hoti hai ... farak itna hai ki aam aaine mein hum joh harkat karte hai uski tasveer us hi waqt nazar aa jaati hai ... magar zindagi woh aaina hai ki aaj kiya hue harkat ki tasveer barso baad nazar aati hai
Trans: The life of a human is like a mirror ... the only difference is that whatever we do in front of a regular mirror we can see the picture of that right away ... but life is that mirror which shows the picture of whatever we do today, after a long time

Title: Jaisi Karni Waisi Bharni
Quote: Sukh toh bewafaa tawaif ki tarah hai ... joh aaj iske pass, kal uske pass
Trans: Happiness is like the unfaithful prostitute ... who is with one today and with another tomorrow

Title: Ram Lakhan
Quote: Yeh nyay nahi ... anyay hai!
Trans: This is not justice ... it is injustice!

Title: Ram Lakhan
Quote: Aurat ka sangharsh uske aasuon se nahi ... uske nischay se hota hai
Trans: The battle of a woman is not with her tears ... it is with her decisions

Title: Ram Lakhan
Quote: Dhande aur career ke bare mein bhai, bhai se jal sakta hai
Trans: When it comes to business and career, a brother can be jealous of another brother

Title: Ram Lakhan
Quote: Ho jaye tayaar, jaana hai bahaar, waqt hai kam, manzil hai door ... lekin jaana hai zaroor
Trans: Get ready, we have to go out, the time is less, the destination is far ... but we have to go

Title: Zanjeer (2013)
Quote: Sher Khan baimaani ka dhanda bhi imaandari se karta hai
Trans: Sher Khan does even the business of dishonesty with honesty

Title: Zanjeer (2013)
Quote: Hamare haathon arrest hone waale ... bail nahi maangte
Trans: Those who get arrested by me ... don't ask for bail

Title: Zanjeer (2013)
Quote: Jab tak baithne ke liye na kaha jaaye sharafat se khade raho ... yeh police station hai tumhare baap ka ghar nahi
Trans: Stand straight until you are asked to sit ... this is a police station, not your father's house

Title: Zanjeer (2013)
Quote: Mumbai mein insaan ki keemat uski supari se hoti hai
Trans: The value of a person in Mumbai is determined by the amount of money that is paid to kill him

Title: Chennai Express
Quote: Don't underestimate the power of a common man
Trans: Don't underestimate the power of a common man

Title: Chennai Express
Quote: (Meri dictionary mein impossible ka shabd hi nahi hai) ... Acha ... kahan se khareedi aaisi bakwaas dictionary?
Trans: (My dictionary doesn't have the word impossible in it) ... Alright ... from where did you buy such an useless dictionary?

Title: Chennai Express
Quote: Tu don ki nahi ... donkey ki ladki hai
Trans: You are not a daughter of a don ... you are a daughter of a donkey

Title: Chennai Express
Quote: Chutti manane nikla tha ... tumne meri chutti kar di
Trans: I had left for a vacation ... and you made me go crazy

Title: Mickey Virus
Quote: Tujhe dekhke na ... mere dimaag ka parental control hi switch off ho jaata hai
Trans: When I see you ... the parental control switch in my mind turns off

Title: Mickey Virus
Quote: Malviya Nagar ke James Bond ... tum kya body language padte ho?
Trans: Hey you James Bond of Malviya Nagar ... do you read body language?

Title: Mickey Virus
Quote: Ek aalsi aadmi ko jab koi mushkil kaam do na ... toh koi na koi aasaan tarika dhoond hi leta hai karne ka
Trans: When you give a difficult task to a lazy person ... then somehow or the other he will find an easy way to do it

Title: Mickey Virus
Quote: Saala badsurato ko hamesha achcha maal mil jaata hai
Trans: Bloody the ugly people always get the good stuff

Title: Refugee
Quote: Shaadi ke bagair mohabbat gunaah hai
Trans: Love without marriage is a crime

Title: Refugee
Quote: Janwaro pe bharosa kiya ja sakta hai ... insaano par nahi
Trans: You can trust animals ... not humans

Title: Refugee
Quote: Mohabbat karne waale ... kabhi mohabbat ke dushman nahi hote
Trans: Those in love ... can never be the enemy of love

Title: Refugee
Quote: Tumne mujhe zindagi ke woh haseen khwab kyun dikhaye ... jiske tootne par mere andhar ka insaan hi toot gaya
Trans: Why did you show me those beautiful dreams of life ... which on breaking, have broken the person inside me

Title: Yamla Pagla Deewana 2
Quote: Kitni baar kaha hai ... aaish kar, ishq mat kar
Trans: How many times have I told you ... have fun, don't fall in love

Title: Yamla Pagla Deewana 2
Quote: Humne itne paap kiye hai na ... ki agar Ganga mein dupki laga di ... toh Ganga maiya kisi aur ke paap nahi doh payegi
Trans: We have committed so many sins ... that if we take a dip in the river Ganges ... then the river Ganges will not be able to rinse anyone elses sins

Title: Yamla Pagla Deewana 2
Quote: When jatt full tight ... is full right
Trans: When a Sikh is drunk ... then he is completely right

Title: Yamla Pagla Deewana 2
Quote: Main tujhko dekhte hi samajh gaya si ... tere andhar genius ke bacteria maujood hai
Trans: The moment I saw you I knew that ... the bacteria of a genius is inside you

Title: Mangal Pandey
Quote: Aaj tak aapne hamari wafaadari dekhi thi ... ab hamara krodh dekhiye
Trans: Till today you've seen our loyalty ... now you'll see our anger

Title: Mangal Pandey
Quote: Yeh azaadi ki ladai hai ... ghuzre hue kal se azaadi ... aane waale kal ke liye
Trans: This is the fight for freedom ... the freedom from yesterday ... for tomorrow

Title: Mangal Pandey
Quote: Bandook badi bewafaa mashuka hoti hai ... kab kidhar mooh modh le ... koi bharosa nahi
Trans: The gun is a very unfaithful lover ... anytime it can change its direction ... there is no trust

Title: Praan Jaye Par Shaan Na Jaye
Quote: Tereko aaisi maut maroonga ... ki tere marne ke baad tera janaza uthane waale khauf se kaanp jayenge
Trans: I will kill you in such a way that ... after you die the people who lift your funeral will tremble with fear

Title: Praan Jaye Par Shaan Na Jaye
Quote: Apni jaan ki salamati chahta hai toh bhaag nikal yahan se ... varna tere tukde tukde karke cheel kauwon ko khila doonga
Trans: If you care for your life then run away from here ... otherwise I will cut you into pieces and feed them to eagles and crows

Title: Praan Jaye Par Shaan Na Jaye
Quote: Gareebo ke paas waise bhi gawane ke liye kuch rehta toh nahi ... magar koi uski izzat yah maryada ko lalkare ... toh woh khoon ki aakhri boond tak ladega
Trans: The poor as it is don't have anything to lose ... but if anyone dares their respect or limits ... then they will fight till the last drop of their blood

Title: Praan Jaye Par Shaan Na Jaye
Quote: Aasaan kishton par paise dene waale log ... kal maut bhi aasaan kishton par denge
Trans: People who lend money payable on easy installments ... tomorrow will even offer death on easy installments

Title: Main Hoon Na
Quote: Aapko dekhte hi ... main jal bin machali, nritya bin bijli ban jata hoon
Trans: When I see you ... I become a fish without water and lightening without dance

Title: Main Hoon Na
Quote: Zindagi nikalti jaati hai aur hum sab pyar ke bina jeena seekh lete hai ... kyun pyar ko mauka nahi dete, kyun apno par vishvas nahi karte
Trans: Life keeps going on and we all learn to live without love ... why don't we give love a chance, why don't we trust our own people

Title: Main Hoon Na
Quote: Itni choti hokar teacher ... amazing
Trans: A teacher at this small age ... amazing

Title: Main Hoon Na
Quote: Nafrat bahut soch samajhkar karni chahiye ... kyun ki ek din hum bhi wahi ban jaate hai, jise hum nafrat karte hai
Trans: You should hate someone only after careful thinking ... because one day even we become the person, whom we have the hatred for

Title: Shola Aur Shabnam
Quote: Hum jurm ki duniya ka colonel hoon
Trans: I am colonel of the world of crime

Title: Shola Aur Shabnam
Quote: Bazaar mein behti tawaif aur aapke kanoon ke rakhwaalon mein koi fark nahi hai ... fark hai toh sirf itna, ki woh apna jism bechti hai aur yeh apna imaan
Trans: There is no difference between a prostitute sitting in the market and your people who protect the law ... and if there is a difference then it is only that, she sells her body and they sell their dignity

Title: Shola Aur Shabnam
Quote: Aadmi naujawan ho yah meri tarah tajurbekar ... raat ko aurat se jhagde mein kabhi nahi jeet sakta
Trans: Whether a man is young or experienced like me ... at night he cannot win against a woman in a fight

Title: Shola Aur Shabnam
Quote: Bura joh kaam karta hai woh manzil se bhatakta hai ... kamina lakh baande boriyan, magar ek din atakta hai
Trans: One who does bad things wanders away from the destination ... and no matter how many bags a scoundrel packs, but one day he gets stuck

Title: Khoon Bhari Maang
Quote: Tune Maryam ka daaman aur Sita ki gaud dekhi hai ... Durga aur Kali roop nahi dekha
Trans: You have seen Maryam's hem and Sita's lap ... you have not seen the guise of Durga and Kali

Title: Khoon Bhari Maang
Quote: Whiskey mein soda ya pani milane se uska taste kharab ho jaata hai ... whiskey mein whiskey milake peena chahiye
Trans: If you add soda or water to whiskey then it spoils the taste ... you should add whiskey to whiskey and drink

Title: Khoon Bhari Maang
Quote: Teri kismat mein toh ab sirf maut ki baahein likhi hai
Trans: Only the arms of death are now written in your destiny

Title: Khoon Bhari Maang
Quote: Ladki ka model ho ya gadi ka ... waqt ke saath saath dono purani ho jaati hai
Trans: Whether it is a model of a girl or a car ... with time both get old

Title: LOC Kargil
Quote: Dost mar sakta hai ... lekin dosti nahi
Trans: A friend can die ... but friendship cannot

Title: LOC Kargil
Quote: Woh kehte hain ki humse, ki tum mujhe yaad nahi karte ... main kehta hoon ki tu jaye toh teri yaad aaye ... tu saali yahan se jati hi nahi hai ... toh yaad kahan se aayegi
Trans: She says to me that I don't remember her ... I say that only if you go, can I remember you ... you don't go from here ... then how can I remember you

Title: LOC Kargil
Quote: Jab dil, dil se baat karta hai ... toh hoton ko chup rehna chahiye
Trans: When a heart is talking to a heart ... then the lips must remain quiet

Title: LOC Kargil
Quote: Some goals are so worthy ... it's glorious even to fail
Trans: Some goals are so worthy ... it's glorious even to fail

Title: Saajan
Quote: Badi muddat se mere dil mein ek tasveer behti hai ... teri zulfon ke chao mein meri taqdeer behti hai
Trans: After a long time a picture is sitting in my heart ... and my destiny is sitting in the shade of your hair

Title: Saajan
Quote: Kabhi kabhi dil ke paimane mein khushi itni badh jati hai ... ki khud ba khud aasoon ke cheetay bankar jhalak jati hai
Trans: Sometimes happiness increases so much in the heart ... that it starts to fall by itself in the form of tear drops

Title: Saajan
Quote: Falak ke teer ka kya dekh nishana tha, udhar thi bijli idhar mera aashiana tha ... pahunch rahi thi kinare pe kashti-e-umeed, us hi waqt is toofan ko bhi aana tha
Trans: What an aim it was of the arrow from the sky, there it was the lightning and here it was my home ... my boat of hope was reaching the shore, and at that time only the storm had to come

Title: Saajan
Quote: Taqdeer banane waale tune kami na ki ... ab kisko kya mila yeh muqaddar ki baat hai
Trans: The creater of destiny has not given anyone less ... now who gets what depends on your fate

Title: Zindagi 50 50
Quote: Aaisi jagah laat marenge na ... ki poori zindagi apni aurat ke paas jaane se gabrayega
Trans: I will kick you in such a place that ... for the entire life you will be scared of going to your wife

Title: Zindagi 50 50
Quote: Zindagi 50 50 hoti hai ... kabhi haar toh kabhi jeet hoti hai
Trans: Life is half and half ... sometimes you lose and sometimes you win

Title: Zindagi 50 50
Quote: Duniya mein joh dhanda ganda hota hai na ... woh kabhi manda nahi hota hai
Trans: In this world the business that is evil ... that business can never be slow

Title: Zindagi 50 50
Quote: Zindagi zaroorto ke hisaab se guzaarni chahiye ... na ki khwaisho ke hisaab se ... kyun ki zaroortein saala fakir ki bhi poori ho jaati ... magar khwaishein badshaho ki bhi adhoori reh jaati hai
Trans: Life should be lived based on needs ... not based on wants ... because even the needs of a beggar get fulfilled ... and even the wants of a king are left unfulfilled

Title: Shuddh Desi Romance
Quote: Insaan ko jab pyar hota hai ... woh ek pal sahi sahi yaad karna mushkil ho jaata hai ... lekin woh pal jab pyar dil se udh jaata hai ... hamesha yaad rehta hai
Trans: When a person falls in love ... it becomes hard to remember that one moment ... but the moment when loves flies away from the heart ... you always remember that

Title: Shuddh Desi Romance
Quote: Tum pehda hi chalu huye the ... yah bade hoke koi infection lagi thi
Trans: Were you born this smart ... or did you get an infection when you grew up

Title: Shuddh Desi Romance
Quote: Love vagehra ka khayali pulav maine taste karke pakakar chod diya hai
Trans: I have cooked, tasted and left alone the imaginary rice of love etc.

Title: Shuddh Desi Romance
Quote: Burger mein tikki rakhne se woh hamburger nahi ban jaata ... tikki burger hi rehta hai
Trans: By keeping a vegetable patty in a burger is doesn't become a hamburger ... it remains as a vegetable burger

Title: Rangeela
Quote: Arre yeh theater hai ki koyle ki bhatti ... aye fan chalu kar reh
Trans: Is this a theater or a coal furnace ... hey you start the fan

Title: Rangeela
Quote: Kuch log purani baatein bhulane ke liye peete hai ... toh kuch log purani yaadein taaza karne ke liye
Trans: Some people drink to forget old things ... and some people drink to freshen old memories

Title: Rangeela
Quote: Tu jaanta nahi hai apun ko ... yeh area mein apun world famous hai ... world famous
Trans: You don't know me ... I am world famous in this area ... world famous

Title: Fashion
Quote: Sapne jab tootte hai ... unki goonj ka asar bahut gehra hota hai
Trans: When dreams break ... the effect of its resonance is very deep

Title: Fashion
Quote: Log puri tarah se tab akele ho jaate hai ... jab apna hi saath choot jaata hai
Trans: People become totally alone when ... their self support leaves them

Title: Fashion
Quote: Success ki seedi chadte huye jin logo se mulaqat hoti hai ... wohi log phir se seedi utarte huye bhi milte hai
Trans: The people you meet when climbing up the steps of success ... are the same you meet when climbing down

Title: Fashion
Quote: Success ke bare mein wahi log lecture kyun dete hai ... jinhone success kabhi dekhi nahi ho
Trans: Why do those people give a lecture on success ... who have never seen success

Title: Deewana Mastana

Trans: I am God's man, who could dare to defy me ... the Sun of hopes, is out in all directions ... my intentions are solid, and there is courage in every step ... I have set forth today, to write my own destiny

Trans: If you are happy, it's because you want to be happy ... and if you are sad, it's because you want to be sad

Title: Fatso
Quote: All men are dogs ... but some of us are well trained dogs
Trans: All men are dogs ... but some of us are well trained dogs

Title: Fatso

Title: Satya 2

Trans: Don't try to understand the meaning of a poem ... try to understand its feelings

Trans: The real power of strength ... is in hiding it

Title: Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-Leela

Trans: Shameless and mannerless people are selfish ... but love happens just like that

Title: R Rajkumar

Title: Eklavya: The Royal Guard

Trans: Religion is what is born out of your thought ... religion is what is born out of your mind ... religion is what your heart and mind believes is true ... religion is what your soul believes is true

Title: Eklavya: The Royal Guard

Trans: I am taking every single breathe carefully ... so that I am not of breathe when you come

Title: Boom

Trans: In India there is no value of an artist ... and outside India, there is no value of an Indian artist

Title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke

Trans: No one stands up for anyone ... everyone changes ... everyone goes away

Trans: It is the magic of your love ... that makes my heart uncontrollable

Title: Dasvidaniya

Trans: Before life eats you ... you should drink life

Quote: Life mein biwi badal, ghar badal, gaadi badal ... lekin apna brand kabhi mat badalna
Trans: In life change your wife, change your house, change your car ... but never change your brand

Trans: When revenge becomes the purpose of living ... then after taking the revenge the purpose of living also ends

Trans: Bananas and tragedies never come in singles

Trans: To reach your destination and to achieve your goals ... sometimes you have to wait for years

Title: Loot

Title: Life Mein Kabhie Kabhiee

Trans: Happiness is not in getting something ... happiness is in the journey to get to it

Trans: People without whom we can't live ... only they get snatched away from us

Trans: Growth in business is achieved by completing commitments ... not by being sneaky

Trans: Don't connect your life with the person whom you love ... connect your life with the person who loves you

Title: Khel

Title: Lucky: No Time for Love

Trans: A famous person has said ... "It is not easy to separate, hence don't say goodbye ... I still have to go away from you, but I will stay in your heart"

Title: Lucky: No Time for Love

Trans: Every wife fakes crying when she gets married ... and then for the entire life she makes her husband cry

Trans: A common man is a sleeping lion ... don't disturb him ... because if he wakes up then he will destroy everything

Trans: It is very important to take care ... it has the power of curing within it ... and it's a medicine which eliminates pain

Trans: Every child has their own speciality, their own potential, their own likings

Title: Taare Zameen Par

Trans: Whatever we see, we believe it's there ... and whatever we don't see, we believe it's not there ... but sometimes whatever we see, it's not there ... and whatever we can't see, it's there

Title: Aap Mujhe Achche Lagne Lage

Trans: I will never leave your hand .. not today, not now, and never

Trans: In our business we keep more news about our enemies than that of our friends

Title: Aap Mujhe Achche Lagne Lage

Trans: It is said that when a child's obstinance is not fulfilled by his father ... he then goes to his mother

Trans: In India until you have money in your pocket ... people ask how are you?

Trans: A moustache is the pride of a man ... a man who doesn't have a moustache on his face, is not a man

Title: Chor Machaaye Shor

Trans: Only people who have a moustache, wear a shroud on their head

Trans: You lose respect when you keep going to someones house

Title: Armaan

Trans: There should be entertainment on a birthday

Trans: If you stay happy on your birthday ... then you will stay happy for the entire year

Trans: A doctor fights with illness ... illness is his enemy

Trans: A human always lives two life's ... one when he learns to live his life ... and second when he lives his learnt life

Title: Victory

Trans: One stone turned into pieces when it was hit ... and one stone turned into God when it was carved

Title: Victory

Trans: Form is temporary, but class is permanent

Title: Victory

Trans: There is a voice of God in the voice of the people

Title: Gori Tere Pyaar Mein
Quote: Kisi aur se pyar karne se pehle, khud se pyar karna seekho ... long term mein yahi kaam aayega
Trans: Learn to love yourself, before you love anyone else ... it will be useful in the long term

Trans: Your daughter is a living machine of tension

Trans: I have seen before people going blind and crazy in love ... but I am seeing a dumbass for the first time

Title: Dedh Ishqiya
Quote: Wahi taj hai, wahi takht hai, wahi zehar hai, wahi jaam hai ... yeh wahi khuda ki zameen hai, yeh wahi bhuton ka nizam hai ... bade shauk se mera ghar jalaa, koi aanch tujhpar na aayegi ... yeh zabaan kisi ne khareed li, yeh kalam kisi ka ghulam hai
Trans: That is the crown, that is the throne, that is poison, that is a drink ... this is the land of god, this is the ruler of statues ... my house burnt with ease, but you'll have no problems ... somebody has paid me to be quiet, and this pen is a slave of someone

Title: Dedh Ishqiya
Quote: Hamari is duniya mein zindagi thami si rehti hai ... kabhi aaiyega bhut banke baithenge
Trans: In our world life is stationary ... do come sometime, we will sit like statues

Title: Gunday
Quote: Agar jigar ki jagah jigar hai aur jigar mein dum hai ... toh rok le aake
Trans: If you have courage in the right place and if you have the guts in your courage ... then try to stop me

Title: Gunday
Quote: Hum gunday hai ... na aaj tak kisi ke haath aaye hai ... aur na aayenge
Trans: We are goons ... no has been able to catch us to date ... and neither will anyone be able to

Title: Gunday
Quote: Hum toh falak ke taare the ... zameen pe aaye toh pehchaan payi, mazhab paya, rang paya, zubaan payi ... hum nikle the jannat dhoondne ... par har modh pe, har makaam pe, nafrat jung aur sarhad payi ... par apne tevar ka sikka ek din chalega zaroor ... khoon ubaal marega zamana badlega zaroor ... khud ko buland karenge ... rab ke bandhe hai hum ... gunday the, gunday hai, gunday rahenge hum
Trans: We were the stars from the sky ... when we came to the earth we got an identity, religion, colour, language ... we had left to find the heaven ... but on every turn, on every destination, we found hatred war and borders ... but the coin of our attitude will work one day ... the blood will boil and the world will change ... we will make ourselves strong ... we are the messengers of God ... we were goons, we are goons and we will remain goons

Title: Gunday
Quote: Sabse bada kalakar toh woh hai ... usne itni badi duniya banai ... phir is duniya mein hazaron log banaye, hazaron logon ke haathon mein karodon lakeerein kheench di ... sukh ki, dukh ki, izzat ki, pyar ki, sab likh daala saala ... lekin woh mujhse itna pyar karta hai ki usne mere haath mein sirf ek lakeer kheenchi, sirf ek ... kaali kismat ki kaali lakeer
Trans: He (god) is the biggest artist ... he made such a big world ... then he made thousands of people in this world, he drew millions of lines on the hands of thousands of people ... of happiness, of sadness, of respect, of love, he wrote everything ... but he loves me so much that he drew only one line on my hand, only one ... which is the black line of bad luck

Title: Teri Meri Kahaani

Title: Teri Meri Kahaani

Trans: When God must have created you, a passion must have come in his heart ... he must have thought what could he give you as a gift, and then he must have created me

Title: Teri Meri Kahaani

Trans: I'm mad about you and I don't deny that, how can I say that I don't love you ... there is some fault of your style too, since I am not the only culprit

Title: Teri Meri Kahaani
