Trans: It is very easy to write books for kids ... but it is very hard to sing lullabies for them

Title: Dishkiyaoon
Quote: Marte hue ko kabhi rokne ka nahi ... dushman galati kare toh tokne ka nahi ... aur yaar ki item ko kabhi chune ka nahi
Trans: You should never stop a person who is dying ... don't kill when an enemy commits a mistake ... and never touch a friend's girlfriend

Title: Dishkiyaoon
Quote: Baimaani pe promotion aur imaandari pe suspension?
Trans: Promotion on cheating and suspension on honesty?

Title: Dishkiyaoon
Quote: Mereko Yash Chopra waala pyar karna hai ... Prem Chopra waala nahi
Trans: I want to love like Yash Chopra ... not like Prem Chopra

Title: Dishkiyaoon
Quote: Aadmi bada ho ya chota, koi farak nahi padta ... bas uski kahani badi honi chahiye
Trans: It doesn't matter if a person is big or small ... it's just that his story must be big

Title: Mere Brother Ki Dulhan
Quote: Ladke pappu hote hai ... pappu ko lollipop dikhao, apne aap control mein aa jayega
Trans: Boys are like kids ... show them a lollipop, and they will themselves come under control

Title: Mere Brother Ki Dulhan
Quote: I will miss you ... a lot se bhi zyada
Trans: I will miss you ... more than a lot

Title: Mere Brother Ki Dulhan
Quote: Aisa thappad padega na ... toh yeh sari filminess nikal jayegi
Trans: I will slap you ... and all this style of yours will come out

Title: Mere Brother Ki Dulhan
Quote: Yeh hoti hai asli ladki ... chutki mein Bipasha, chutki mein Madhubala
Trans: This is a real girl ... she is Bipasha in a flash, and she is Madhubala in a flash

Title: Main Azaad Hoon
Quote: Jism ki maut insaan ki maut nahi hoti
Trans: The death of a body is not the death of a person

Title: Main Azaad Hoon
Quote: Election mein gareebo se vaade aur ameero se saude kiye jaate hai
Trans: During elections you make promises to the poor and deals with the rich

Title: Main Azaad Hoon
Quote: Aadha sach jhoot se bhi zyada khatarnak hota hai
Trans: Half truth is more dangerous than lies

Title: Main Azaad Hoon
Quote: Itne baazu itne sar, ginle dushman dhyan se ... harega woh har baazi, jab khelein hum jee jaan se
Trans: So many hands and so many heads, let the enemy count them properly ... he will lose every battle, when we play with our heart

Title: Main Tera Hero
Quote: Main dikhta hoon sweet, innocent, swami type ka na ... lekin actually hoon bahut bade harami type ka
Trans: Don't I look someone who is of the type of a sweet, innocent saint ... but I'm actually someone who is of the type of a big rascal

Title: Main Tera Hero
Quote: Jaise ladoo mein hota hai meva ... jaise dance mein hai Prabhu Deva ... vaise main karoonga Bali bhaiya ki seva
Trans: Just like there is thickened milk in sweets ... just like there is Prabhu Deva in dance ... just like that I will serve brother Bali

Title: Main Tera Hero
Quote: Acha khasa Ranbir Kapoor mil raha tha ... lekin inki kismat mein toh Shakti Kapoor hi likha tha
Trans: They were easily getting Ranbir Kapoor ... but Shakti Kapoor was written in their destiny

Title: Main Tera Hero
Quote: Life mein main sirf teen cheezon ka fan hoon ... TV pe Amitji ka crorepati, tennis mein Mahesh Bhupati aur bhagwanon mein mere pyare Ganpati
Trans: In life I am only a fan of 3 things ... Amitabh on TV for the serial crorepati, Mahesh Bhupati in tennis and in gods my favourite Ganesha

Title: Gang of Ghosts
Quote: Kapdon se tramp lagta hoon ... lekin tramp ko hi triumph milti hai
Trans: I look like a tramp from my clothes ... but only trampy people find triumph

Title: Gang of Ghosts
Quote: Mumbai mein khaya, Mumbai mein piya, Mumbai mein jaga, Mumbai mein soya ... aur Vada Pav ki burai karke tera dil ek pal bhi na roya
Trans: You ate in Mumbai, you drank in Mumbai, you woke up in Mumbai, you slept in Mumbai ... and your heart was not sad for once, when you were complaining about Vada Pav

Title: Gang of Ghosts
Quote: Joh log burre time mein Vada Pav khate hai ... woh achche time mein bada bhav khate hai
Trans: Those who eat Vada Pav in their hard times ... have a lot of attitude in their good times

Title: Gang of Ghosts
Quote: Don't have dirty picture in your mind please
Trans: Don't have dirty picture in your mind please

Title: Pyaar Ke Side Effects
Quote: Ek ladki ka diya hua dard ... doosri ladki hi mitta sakti hai
Trans: The pain given by a girl ... can only be treated by another girl

Title: Pyaar Ke Side Effects
Quote: Delhi ki ladkiyan aaisi dress karti hai ... jaise har roz Diwali ho
Trans: Girls from Delhi dress up as if ... it is Diwali everyday

Title: Pyaar Ke Side Effects
Quote: Dude, you're a man ... tujhe hamesha coffee peene ke mood mein hona chahiye ... it's what we do, it's our tradition, it's what men do
Trans: Dude, you're a man ... you should always be in the mood to have coffee ... it's what we do, it's our tradition, it's what men do

Title: Pyaar Ke Side Effects
Quote: Pyar ka sabse bada side effect ... shaadi
Trans: The biggest side effect of love is ... marriage

Title: Chandni
Quote: Dard ki dawa na ho ... toh dard ko hi dawa samajh lena chahiye
Trans: If there is no medicine for pain ... then you should consider pain as the medicine itself

Title: Chandni
Quote: Jab tum mujhe apna kehte ho ... apne pe guroor aa jaata hai
Trans: When you call me your own ... I feel proud of myself

Title: Chandni
Quote: Raaton ko jaagna meri kismat ban chuki hai
Trans: It has become my fate to stay awake at night

Title: Chandni
Quote: Pyar hawa ka ek jhonka hai ... joh sab udakar le jaata hai
Trans: Love is a gust of wind ... which blows away everything

Title: Shree 420
Quote: Mera joota hai Japani, yeh patloon Englishtani, sar pe laal topi Russi ... phir bhi dil hai Hindustani
Trans: My shoes are Japanese, these pants are British, I have a Russian red hat on my head ... but still my heart is Indian

Title: Shree 420
Quote: Dil ka dard aur aankhon ke aasun chupane ke liye ... yeh bewakoof maskare ka bhes bade kaam ki cheez hai
Trans: To hide the pain of the heart and the tears of the eyes ... a disguise of a smiling face is very useful

Title: Shree 420
Quote: Aaj gareeb bhi gareeb ko nahi pehchanta
Trans: Today one poor person doesn't know another poor person

Title: Shree 420
Quote: Yeh Bambai hai mere bhai Bambai ... yahan doosro ko girta dekhkar sab haste hai ... magar jab khud girte hai toh hasna bhool jaate hai
Trans: This is Mumbai my friend ... here everyone laughs when someone falls ... but when they themselves fall, they forget to laugh

Title: Desi Boyz
Quote: Tendulkar bina India adhoora, Jai ko Veeru karta hai poora ... Rocko bulaye aur Hunter na aaye, aaise dialogue pe Rajinikanth bhi taali bajaye
Trans: India is incomplete without Tendulkar, Veeru completes Jai ... Rocko calls and Hunter has to come, on this dialogue even Rajinikanth claps

Title: Desi Boyz
Quote: Galati ko sudhaarne ka ek bhi mauka na dena ... usse bhi bada gunaah hai
Trans: Not giving a single chance to correct a mistake ... is a bigger crime

Title: Desi Boyz
Quote: Maafi se pyar badhta hai
Trans: Love grows with an apology

Title: Desi Boyz
Quote: Ek ulte haath ki padegi na ... tere plastic surgeon ko bhi surgery ki zaroorat padegi
Trans: I will give you one tight slap ... and even your plastic surgeon will need surgery

Title: Kismat Konnection
Quote: Ek hi waqt har insaan ke liye alag hota hai ... kisi ke liye achcha hota hai, toh kisi ke liye burra hota hai
Trans: A moment in time is different for everyone ... it is good for someone, and it is bad for someone

Title: Kismat Konnection
Quote: Taash ke patton ki tarah hai zindagi ... jahan khel shuru hone se pehle, khiladiyon ke aane se bhi pehle ... kaun jeetega, kaun haarega ... iska faisla ho chuka hota hai
Trans: Life is like a pack of cards ... where before you start the game and even before the players come ... who will win and who will lose ... is already decided

Title: Kismat Konnection
Quote: Tumhe apne bharose pe bhi bharosa nahi tha
Trans: You yourself didn't have confidence in what you believe

Title: Kismat Konnection
Quote: Woh shaadi karke chali jayegi ... saath mein tumhari kismat bhi dhal jayegi
Trans: She will get married and leave ... and with that your fate will also set

Title: Murder 3
Quote: Ek nayi shuruvat ke liye ... joh hai uska khatam hona zaroori hai
Trans: For a new start ... it is necessary to end what is going on

Title: Murder 3
Quote: Waqt ka problem yahi hai ki woh har waqt badalta rehta hai
Trans: The problem of time is that it changes every moment

Title: Murder 3
Quote: Kuch chehre aaise hote hai ... joh pehli mulaqat se yaad ho jaate hai
Trans: There are some faces ... which you remember after you meet them once

Title: Murder 3
Quote: Insaan jis jagah jaane se darta hai ... jawaab wahin se milta hai
Trans: A person gets a reply from ... the place where he is scared to go

Title: Love
Quote: Prem sachchai hai ... is sachchai ko aaj tak na koi maar saka hai aur na koi maar sakega
Trans: Love is the truth ... no one till date has been able to kill this truth and no one will ever be able to

Title: Love
Quote: Har majboor aurat meri maa lagti hai
Trans: Every helpless women is my mother

Title: Love
Quote: Aurat ko aur saari ko sambhalna bahut mushkil kaam hai
Trans: It is a very difficult task to handle women and a saari

Title: Yaadon Ki Baaraat
Quote: Shakaal jab baazi khelta hai ... toh jitne patte uske haath mein hote hai ... utne hi uski aasteen mein
Trans: When Shakaal plays a bet ... then the number of cards he has in his hands ... the same number of cards he has in his sleeve

Title: Yaadon Ki Baaraat
Quote: Jab dil bahut kuch kehne ko chahe aur zubaan saath na de ... toh yeh mohabbat ki pehli seedi hoti hai
Trans: When the heart wants to say a lot and the words don't give support ... then that is the first step to love

Title: Yaadon Ki Baaraat
Quote: Pilana bhi farz tha toh kuch bhi pila diya hota ... sharaab kam thi toh pani mila diya hota
Trans: If it was your duty to make me drink, then you could have given me anything ... if the alcohol was less, then you could have added some water

Title: Yaadon Ki Baaraat
Quote: Main apne plan khud banata hoon
Trans: I make my own plans

Title: Indian
Quote: Chahe hum mein ek waqt ki roti na mile, badan pe kapde na ho, sarr pe chatt na ho ... lekin jab desh ki aan ki baat aati hai ... tab hum jaan ki baazi laga dete hai
Trans: Even if we don't get a one time meal, even if we don't have clothes on our body, even if we don't have a roof on our head ... but when it comes to the pride of our country ... then we put our lives forward for it

Title: Indian
Quote: Hum haath milana bhi jaante hai, haath ukhaadna bhi ... hum Gandhiji ko bhi poojte hai, Chandra Shekar Azad ko bhi ... main bhi pehle pyar se samjhata hoon, phir hathyar se
Trans: We know how to shake hands and also to break them ... we worship Gandhi and also Chandra Shekar Azad ... and I also try to explain with peace first and then with a weapon

Title: Indian
Quote: Shikaari apne shikaar ke saath dosti nahi karta
Trans: A hunter doesn't befriend his prey

Title: Indian
Quote: Mere liye maa aur mulk ek hai
Trans: Mother and country are the same for me

Title: Gambler
Quote: Jua khelna hi ek pagalpan hai ... aur asli jua khelne waala khiladi hota hai
Trans: Gambling is a crazy thing ... and the person who plays the real gamble is a player

Title: Gambler
Quote: Jab aurat ka dil tootta hai, toh woh apni sari zindagi un tukdon ko baantene mein kharch kar deti hai ... aur jab mard ka dil tootta hai, toh woh apni sari zindagi un tukdon ko sametne mein
Trans: When the heart of a woman breaks, then she spends her entire life distributing those broken pieces ... and when the heart of a man breaks, then he spends his entire life collecting those broken pieces

Title: Gambler
Quote: Lucky in gambling and unlucky in love
Trans: Lucky in gambling and unlucky in love

Title: Gambler
Quote: Zindagi mein kuch ehsaan aise bhi hote hai ... jinki keemat asal se zyada sood mein chukana padti hai
Trans: Some favors in life are such that ... for which you have to pay more in interest than the principal itself

Title: China Gate
Quote: Mere mann ko bhaya ... main kutta kaat ke khaya
Trans: My heart liked it ... and so I cut the dog and ate it

Title: China Gate
Quote: Humse ladne ki himmat toh jutta loge ... par kaminapan kahan se laoge?
Trans: You will accumulate the courage to fight against me ... but from where will you get the sneakiness?

Title: China Gate
Quote: Haath mein bandook lekar apne aap ko bahadur samajhna utna hi aasaan hai ... jitna kisi nihatte ko buzdil samajhna
Trans: It is easy to consider a weaponless person as a coward ... as easy as it is to consider yourself a brave person by simply holding a gun in your hand

Title: China Gate
Quote: Jung koi bhi ho, nateeja kuch bhi ho ... ek sipahi apna kuch na kuch kho hi deta hai
Trans: Be it any war, be it any outcome ... a soldier loses something or the other

Title: Bhoothnath Returns
Quote: Election circus ki tarah hota hai ... jahan pe joker sirf time pass ke liye hota hai ... ticketein khareedi jaati hai sher ko dekhne ke liye
Trans: Election is just like the circus ... where the joker is there just for time pass ... tickets are bought to see the tiger

Title: Bhoothnath Returns
Quote: Trailer hit toh picture hit ... aur gaana hit toh picture super hit
Trans: If the trailer is a hit then the movie is a hit ... and if the song is a hit then the movie is a super hit

Title: Bhoothnath Returns
Quote: Is desh ki population ke mann ke andar sirf frustration hai ... system ki is constipation se bahar yeh situation hai ki har jagah saturation hai ... public yeh jaanna chahti hai ki is intoxication ka justification kya hai ... right to information hai lekin us par objection hai ... police ke power hai lekin uska limitation hai ... jiske paas designation hai uske paas intention nahi aur jiske paas suggestion hai uske paas position nahi ... aaise mein janta kya kare yeh mera question hai
Trans: There is only frustration in the hearts of the population of this country ... the situation outside the constipation of the system is that, there is saturation everywhere ... the public wants to know what is the justification for this intoxication ... there is right to information but there is an objection on that ... the police has power but it also has limitations ... the one who has the designation doesn't have the intention and the one who has the suggestion doesn't have the position ... so in this case what should the people do, is my question

Title: Bhoothnath Returns
Quote: Vote dena usko chahiye joh sabse zyada pasand ho ... par dena padta hai usse joh sabse kam napasand ho
Trans: We need to vote for someone whom we like the most ... but unfortunately we have to vote for someone whom we dislike the least

Title: Holiday
Quote: Tum log parivaar ke saath yahan chain se jeeo ... is liye hum log roz border par marte hai
Trans: So that you people can live here peacefully with your family ... people like us die every day at the border

Title: Holiday
Quote: Yeh aadha pagal, tum aadhi pagal ... bachche poore pagal
Trans: He is half crazy, you are half crazy ... your kids will be completely crazy

Title: Holiday
Quote: Mujhe smart logon se sakht nafrat hai
Trans: I really hate smart people

Title: Holiday
Quote: Main aa raha hoon tere paas ... jahan mila, khatam kar doonga
Trans: I am coming to you ... wherever I find you, I will finish you

Title: Sanam Bewafa
Quote: Anjaam unka wahi hoga joh tu chahta hai ... lekin hoga vaise jaise hum chahte hai
Trans: Their end will be as you want ... but it will happen as I want

Title: Sanam Bewafa
Quote: Awaaz toh teri ek din main neechi karoonga ... sher ki tarah garajne waala ... billi ki zabaan bolega
Trans: One day I will lower your voice ... someone who roars like a tiger ... will talk like a cat

Title: Sanam Bewafa
Quote: Ek baar aasman se giri hui bijliyan vapas laut sakti hai ... toofan apna rukh badal sakta hai ... lekin is Sher Khan ka faisla kabhi nahi badal sakta
Trans: For once the lightning that falls from the sky can go back ... a storm can change its path ... but the decision made by Sher Khan will never change

Title: Sanam Bewafa
Quote: Ek pahaad ka naam hai Sher Khan ... aur pahaad na kisi ke samne chalkar jaate hai ... na kisi ke samne jhukte hai
Trans: Sher Khan is the name of a mountain ... and a mountain doesn't go to anyone ... and neither does it bow down in front of anyone

Title: Kohram
Quote: Joh markar zinda hote hai ... unki zindagi haramzadi ho jaati hai ... joh na aasani se marti hai aur na hi kisiko aasan maut maarti hai
Trans: People who live after being dead ... their life becomes that of a bastard ... which doesn't die easily and neither does it kill anyone with ease

Title: Kohram
Quote: Is desh ke gaddaron ko anjaam tak pahunchana ... yahi meri zindagi ka maqsad hai
Trans: To bring the traitors of this country to their end ... is the purpose of my life

Title: Kohram
Quote: Tum jaise gaddaron ka anth ek alag andaz se hoga
Trans: The end of traitors like you will be very different

Title: Kohram
Quote: Jab ek fauji ki khopdi garam ho jaati hai toh woh apni hadh hi kya ... dushman ki sarhad bhi paar kar jaata hai
Trans: When the mind of a soldier goes crazy then forget his limits ... he even crosses the border of his enemy

Title: Amar Akbar Anthony
Quote: Aaisa toh aadmi life mein do-heech time bhaagta hai ... Olympic ka race ho yah police ka case ho ... tum kahe mein bhaagta hai bhai?
Trans: A man runs like this only for two reasons in his life ... either in a race in Olympics or if it is a police case ... what are you running for brother?

Title: Amar Akbar Anthony
Quote: Hindu Muslim Sikh Isai ... sabhi toh hai bhai bhai
Trans: Hindu Muslim Sikh Christian ... all are brothers

Title: Amar Akbar Anthony
Quote: Apun bahut famous aadmi ... bada bada paper mein apun ka chota chota photo chapta hai
Trans: I am a very famous person ... big newspapers do publish a small picture of mine

Title: Bichhoo
Quote: Tere liye yeh kehna bahut mushkil hai ... ki tu zyada gira hua baap hai ... ya zyada gira hua insaan
Trans: When it comes to you, it is very hard to say ... whether you are a more bad father ... or a more bad person

Title: Bichhoo
Quote: Khula paisa aur khuli aurat samne ho ... toh aadmi ka dimaag kaam karna bandh kar deta hai
Trans: When when you have open money and an open woman in front of you ... then the mind of a person stops working

Title: Bichhoo
Quote: Gun haath mein lene ke baad ... dil aur dimaag poori tarah se shikaar pe hona chahiye
Trans: Once you take the gun in your hand ... your heart and mind should be completely on the prey

Title: Bichhoo
Quote: Aadmi ko maarne ke liye ek hi goli kaafi hoti hai ... agar woh goli sahi jagah pe lage
Trans: To kill a person you only need one bullet ... if that bullet hits the right spot

Title: Asli Naqli (1986)
Quote: Aaj kal joh jitni zyada namak khata hai ... utni hi zyada namak haraami karta hai
Trans: Nowadays the more honest a person is ... that much more deceiving he is

Title: Asli Naqli (1986)
Quote: Pehli galati maaf kar deta hoon ... doosri bardaash nahi karta
Trans: I forgive the first mistake ... and I don't tolerate the second one

Title: Asli Naqli (1986)
Quote: Sharifon ko lootna baimaani hoti hai ... aur baimaanon ko lootna chalaaki
Trans: It is evil to steal from honest people ... and it is smartness to steal from evil people

Title: Saathiya
Quote: Tum dua karo apne liye ... agar usse kuch bhi hua na toh main tumhe nahi chhodunga
Trans: You pray for yourself ... because if anything happens to her then I won't leave you

Title: Saathiya
Quote: Ladki ko bhagake laane mein ek bahut bada faida hai ... ladki baar baar maa baap ke paas jaane ki dhamki toh nahi degi
Trans: There is one big advantage in running with the girl in hiding ... she won't threaten you every time about going back to her parents house

Title: Saathiya
Quote: In do minute ke liye toh main do janamon tak bhi intezaar kar sakta hoon
Trans: For these two minutes I can even wait for two lives

Title: Saathiya
Quote: Mardon ka asli rang shaadi ke baad pata chalta hai ... shaadi se pehle train ho, bus ho, bheedh ho har jagah gale padh jaate hai ... aur shaadi ke baad gale lagate hue bhi sharm aati hai
Trans: The true color of men is known after marriage ... before marriage they are everywhere in the train, bus, crowd ... and after marriage they feel shy even to hug you

Title: Itihaas
Quote: Jiske paas mohabbat hai ... usse na jaan ka darr hai, na jahaan ka
Trans: Those who have love ... are not scared of life, or the world

Title: Itihaas
Quote: Shor lehron ki aadat hoti hai aur khamoshi chattanon ki taqat ... lehren awaaz toh bahut karti hai ... magar chattanon se takrakar toot jaati hai
Trans: Sound is a habit of the waves and silence is the strength of mountains ... waves do make a lot of sound ... but they break apart when they collide with the mountains

Title: Itihaas
Quote: Jism ki numaish paschim ki ada hai ... sharm Hindustan ka gehna
Trans: To reveal the body is the style of the west ... shyness is the jewel of India

Title: Itihaas
Quote: Zameen ussi ki hoti hai jinke hal chalte hai ... unki nahi joh unpar hal chalate hai
Trans: The land belongs to the person who owns the plow ... not the person who plows the field

Title: Qila
Quote: Maa apni kokh se bachche janam toh de sakti hai ... lekin usse apna naam nahi de sakti ... baap ke naam ki mohar chahiye hoti hai usse zindagi ki har kadam pe
Trans: A mother can give birth to a child from her womb ... but she cannot give him her name ... a father's name stamp is needed by him on every step of life

Title: Qila
Quote: Najayaz hote hai woh log ... joh najayaz kaam karte hai, najayaz baat karte hai, aur tumhari tarah najayaz sochte hai
Trans: Illegitimate are those people ... who do illegitimate things, who talk illegitimately, and think illegitimately like you

Title: Qila
Quote: Paida hue bachche par najayaz jayaz ki chaap nahi hoti ... aulad sirf aulad hoti hai
Trans: A child that is born doesn't have the mark of illegitimate or legitimate ... a child is simply a child

Title: Qila
Quote: Yeh khoon ke rishtey hai ... insaan na inhe banata hai, na hi todh sakta hai
Trans: These are blood relations ... a person neither makes them, nor can he break them

Title: Mast
Quote: Kisi bhi cheez mein itni sachchai nahi ho sakti ... jitni tumse milne ki meri khwaish mein hai
Trans: No one thing can have so much truth ... that my wish has to meet you

Title: Mast
Quote: Zindagi U-turn hai ... pata nahi kab kiski zindagi kaunsa turn maar deve
Trans: Life is a U-turn ... who knows whose life will turn where

Title: Mast
Quote: Mazaak ko chewing gum ke maafik kheechne ka nahi
Trans: Don't stretch humour like a chewing gum

Title: Mast
Quote: Agar koi sachche dil se kuch chahe ... toh namumkin bhi mumkin ho jaata hai
Trans: If someone wants something with a true heart ... then the impossible also becomes possible

Title: Earth
Quote: Raat ke waqat pedh paudon ko haath nahi lagate ... paap lagta hai
Trans: You should not touch plants and trees at the night ... it brings a curse

Title: Earth
Quote: Kuch baatein aaisi hoti hain jinhe dekh ke insaan pagal ho jaata hai
Trans: Seeing certain things makes a person go mad

Title: Earth
Quote: Darr logon ko pagla deta hai
Trans: Fear makes people go crazy

Title: Lahoo Ke Do Rang
Quote: Maine itne aasoon dekhe hai ... ke unhe jama karta toh ek samundar ban jaata
Trans: I have seen so many tears ... that had I collected them it would have made an ocean

Title: Lahoo Ke Do Rang
Quote: Aadmi issi mitti se banta hai, issi par jeeta hai, issi ke liye ladta hai aur aakhir mein ... issi mitti mein mil jaata hai
Trans: A human is made from this land, he lives on this land, he fights for this land and in the end ... he mixes with this land

Title: Lahoo Ke Do Rang
Quote: Dosti ya dushmani, jab tak jam ke na ho ... mazaa nahi aata
Trans: Be it friendship or enmity, unless it is strong ... there is no fun

Title: Lahoo Ke Do Rang
Quote: Kabhi kabhi aankhon dekhi aur kaano suni baat bhi jhoot ho sakti hai
Trans: Sometimes what you see and hear can also be a lie

Title: Kala Bazaar
Quote: Meri pahunch Delhi se lekar shamshan ghat tak hai ... awaaz Delhi tak jaati hai aur dushman shamshan tak chala jaata hai
Trans: I have connections all the way from Delhi to the graveyard ... my voice goes till Delhi and my enemy goes to the graveyard

Title: Kala Bazaar
Quote: Is rishwat ke samaaj mein agar izzat ki zindagi guzarni hai ... toh apna seena cheerkar, apne zameer ka katal karke, apni rooh ko maarke ... uski laash ko rishwat ke kadmo mein dalna padta hai ... tab jaakar insaan yeh zindagi guzaar sakta hai
Trans: If you want to live a life of respect in this society of bribery ... then you have to tear apart your heart, murder your conscience, kill your soul ... and put all of that in the feet of bribery ... and only then can a person live his life

Title: Kala Bazaar
Quote: Ya rab kahin se ishq ka bazaar bhej de ... dil bechta hoon, koi khareedar bhej de
Trans: I wish from somewhere God sends the market of love ... I am selling my heart, and I hope some buyer comes along

Title: Kala Bazaar
Quote: Tadbeer ki syahi se insaan apni taqdeer ki likhai ko badal sakta hai
Trans: A man can change the words of his destiny with the ink of planning

Title: Surakshaa
Quote: Main jab bhi koi khel khelta hoon ... hamesha uska ek patta bahar chhodkar aata hoon
Trans: Whenever I play any game ... I always leave one card of that outside

Title: Surakshaa
Quote: Jin logon ki zindagi ka koi maqsad hota hai ... unhe aurat ki duniya se door rehna chahiye
Trans: People who have a goal in life ... they must stay away from the women's world

Title: Surakshaa
Quote: Yeh crorepati hai, yeh arabpati hai ... magar aaise rehte hai jaise chai ki patti hai
Trans: He is rich, he is super rich ... but he lives as if he is tea powder

Title: Surakshaa
Quote: Hamare is kaale dhande mein zindagi aur maut ka khel toh chalta hi rehta hai
Trans: The game of life and death keeps going on in our illegal business

Title: Trimurti
Quote: Aadmi zabaan se kuch kehta hai ... dimaag se kuch aur sochta hai ... aur dil kuch aur hi chahta hai
Trans: A person says something from his mouth ... thinks something else from his mind ... and his heart wants something else altogether

Title: Trimurti
Quote: Agar halaat ke ghulam banoge na, toh duniya tumhe kutta samajhkar laat maregi ... lekin agar halaat ko apna ghulam banaoge na, toh duniya tumhe sher samajhkar salaam karegi
Trans: If you become a slave to the conditions, then the world will kick you like a dog ... but if you make the conditions as your slave, then the world will salute you like a tiger

Title: Trimurti
Quote: Kal shyam aur thi, aaj shyam aur hai ... kal thikaane aur the, aaj manzil aur hai
Trans: Yesterday evening was different, today evening is different ... yesterday the location was different, today the destination is different

Title: Trimurti
Quote: Woh tujhe mil jayegi ... tere dil ki kali khil jayegi
Trans: You will get her ... and the flower in your heart will blossom

Title: Revolver Rani
Quote: I love phasion, phun aur gun
Trans: I love fashion, fun and gun

Title: Revolver Rani
Quote: Kadaknath khaya karo ... sab kuch kadak rahega
Trans: Eat hard things ... everything will stay hard

Title: Revolver Rani
Quote: Waqt aane de bata denge tujhe aye jahaan ... hum abhi se kya bataein, kya hamare dil mein hai
Trans: Let the time come, I'll tell to the world ... why should I say from now itself, what is in my heart

Title: Revolver Rani
Quote: Ram Ram saban ne Ram Ram ... subah ki Ram Ram nagad ... sandhya ki Ram Ram advance
Trans: I am wishing everyone ... the wishes for the morning are right now ... and the wishes for the evening are in advance

Title: Ragini MMS 2
Quote: Horror film ka asli mazaa toh raat ko akele mein hi aata hai
Trans: The real fun of a horror film comes when you watch it alone at night

Title: Ragini MMS 2
Quote: Normal logon ke saath raha karo ... paranormal logon ke saath nahi
Trans: Stay with normal people ... not with paranormal people

Title: Ragini MMS 2
Quote: Get ready to die!
Trans: Get ready to die!

Title: Ragini MMS 2
Quote: Na koi kaam karti hai ... na kisi aur kaam aati hai
Trans: Neither does she do any work ... nor is she useful for any other work

Title: Queen
Quote: Indians sab cheez mein best hai ... kissing mein bhi Indians hi best hai ... kabhi Emraan Hashmi ka naam nahi suna?
Trans: Indians are the best in everything ... even in kissing Indians are the best ... haven't you heard about Emraan Hashmi?

Title: Queen
Quote: Why fart and waste it ... when you can burp and taste it
Trans: Why fart and waste it ... when you can burp and taste it

Title: Naya Daur (1957)
Quote: Jab pet ki roti aur jeb ka paisa chin jaata hai na ... toh koi samajh wamajh nahi reh jaati hai aadmi ke paas
Trans: When food for the stomach and money for the pocket is taken away ... then a man can't think properly

Title: Naya Daur (1957)
Quote: Jiske dil mein daga aa jaati hai na ... uski aankhon mein daya kabhi nahi aati
Trans: A person whose heart is deceitful ... can never have mercy in his eyes

Title: Naya Daur (1957)
Quote: Aaj ki duniya mein machine ne tarakki nahi ki hai, aadmi ne tarakki ki hai ... aaj tak aadmi machine banate aaye hai ... machine ne kabhi kisi aadmi ko nahi banaya hai
Trans: In today's age machines have not advanced,  humans have advanced ... till today humans have made machines ... a machine has never made a human

Title: Naya Daur (1957)
Quote: Jab amir ka dil kharab hota hai na ... toh gareeb ka dimaag kharab hota hai
Trans: When the heart of a rich person goes evil ... then the mind of a poor person goes crazy

Title: Betaab
Quote: Agar amiri insaan ko wahi bana deti hai joh aap ban gaye hai ... toh bhagwan ka shukar hai ki hum amir nahi rahe
Trans: If riches makes a person what you have become ... then thank god I am not rich

Title: Betaab
Quote: Kuch baatein kehne aur sunne mein utni achchi nahi lagti ... lekin phir bhi woh sach hoti hai
Trans: Some things don't sound good when you say and hear them ... but still they are true

Title: Betaab
Quote: Aadmi ko khwab dekhne chahiye apni aukaad aur haisiyat ke hisaab se
Trans: A man should see dreams based on his position and status

Title: Prince
Quote: Khel chahe koi bhi ho ... jeetna aana chahiye
Trans: No matter what the game is ... you should know how to win

Title: Prince
Quote: Khel wahi khelna chahiye ... jis mein jeet pakki ho
Trans: You should only play the game ... in which you are sure to win

Title: Prince
Quote: Agar subah tak unka pata nahi lagaya ... toh tum lapata ho jaoge
Trans: If you don't find them until morning ... then you will get lost

Title: Ghar Ho To Aisa
Quote: Cancer ka ilaaj hai iss duniya mein ... lalach ka nahi hai
Trans: In this world cancer can be treated ... but not greed

Title: Ghar Ho To Aisa
Quote: Zindagi mein kabhi izzat mat khona
Trans: Never lose respect in life

Title: Ghar Ho To Aisa
Quote: Kulhaari ko pair pe maaro, ya pair ko kulhaari pe maaro ... har halat mein pair hi katne waala hai
Trans: Whether you hit the axe on the leg, or hit the leg on the axe ... in any case the leg is going to get cut

Title: Ghar Ho To Aisa
Quote: Bade ghar ka damaad banna, jaise topi ko sar se utaar ke pairo mein pehenna
Trans: Becoming a son-in-law of a rich family, is like removing the hat from the head and wearing it on the legs

Title: Muqaddar Ka Badshaah
Quote: Jab aulad ki zindagi ka sawaal ho ... toh maa din aur raat nahi dekhti
Trans: When it comes to the life of a child ... then a mother doesn't see if it's day or night

Title: Muqaddar Ka Badshaah
Quote: Ek patni apni pati ke liye apne armaano ka khoon toh kar sakti hai ... lekin ek maa apni aulad ki khushi ke liye sari duniya se takra sakti hai
Trans: A wife can kill her wishes for the sake of her husband ... but a mother can fight with the entire world for the sake of happiness of her child

Title: Muqaddar Ka Badshaah
Quote: Upar waale ne yeh dil patthar ka banaya hai ... isse shock toh lag sakta hai, lekin kabhi stop nahi ho sakta
Trans: God has made my heart of stone ... it can take a shock, but it can never stop

Title: Muqaddar Ka Badshaah
Quote: Joh rishta swarth ke dhaago se bandha ho ... uske toot jaane mein koi harj nahi
Trans: A relationship that is tied together with a thin thread ... should have no issues when it breaks

Title: Pyaar Mein Kabhi Kabhi
Quote: Taali do haath se bajti hai ... ek haath se sirf tamacha padta hai
Trans: With two hands you can clap ... but with one hand you can only slap

Title: Pyaar Mein Kabhi Kabhi
Quote: Hum sab kisi na kisi ko chahte hai ... aur is chahat mein hum yeh bhool jaate hai ki shayad hum mein bhi koi chahta hai
Trans: We all love someone or the other ... and in that love we forget that may be someone loves us also

Title: Pyaar Mein Kabhi Kabhi
Quote: Zindagi mein khushi paane ke liye pyar ka hona zaroori hai
Trans: In life to achieve happiness it is very important to have love

Title: Pyaar Mein Kabhi Kabhi
Quote: Agar dil se hasna chahte ho ... toh sankoch ki har seemao ko todh do
Trans: If you want to laugh from your heart ... then break all the barriers of hesitation

Title: Silsila Hai Pyar Ka
Quote: Sachche dil se aur khuli aankhon se dekhe sapne ... hamesha sach hote hai
Trans: Dreams that are seen with a true heart and open eyes ... always come true

Title: Silsila Hai Pyar Ka
Quote: Apni galati maan kar insaan bada banta hai ... apni nazron mein bhi, aur doosron ki bhi
Trans: A man becomes big when he accepts his mistake ... in his own eyes, and in others also

Title: Silsila Hai Pyar Ka
Quote: Prem ka matlab samarpan hota hai ... issi liye main aaj, issi waqt apne aap ko tumpar samarpit karta hoon
Trans: Love means to surrender ... and that's why today, at this very moment, I am surrendering myself to you

Title: Silsila Hai Pyar Ka
Quote: Pyar ko chupana bhi toh pyar hota hai
Trans: To hide love is also love

Title: Sheshnaag
Quote: Maut aur badnaseebi do hi aisi cheezein hai ... joh bagair khabar kiye aate hai
Trans: Death and bad luck are two such things ... which come without any notice

Title: Sheshnaag
Quote: Joh pehli saans lene ki choot deta hai ... wohi aakhri saans par rok laga sakta hai
Trans: One who gives the permission to take the first breath ... only he can put the stop on the last breath

Title: Sheshnaag
Quote: Maut sabse halki sazaa hoti hai
Trans: Death is the easiest punishment

Title: Sheshnaag
Quote: Insaano mein kuch log zehreelay saanpo se bhi zyada khatarnak hote hai ... aur kuch log devtaon se bhi zyada mann ke sachche aur achche
Trans: Within humans some people more dangerous than a poisonous snake ... and some people are much better and truthful than God

Title: Sohni Mahiwal
Quote: Ishq ki kismat ka faisla khud ishq hi karta hai ... koi doosra nahi
Trans: The decision on the destiny of love is done by love itself ... not by anyone else

Title: Sohni Mahiwal
Quote: Taqdeer ke likhe ko aankhon ka pani nahi dho sakta
Trans: Water from the eyes can't wash what's written in the destiny

Title: Sohni Mahiwal
Quote: Mohabbat kabhi nahi marti ... mohabbat ko koi nahi maar sakta ... mohabbat ke phool hamesha khile rahenge
Trans: Love never dies ... no one can kill love ... the flowers of love will always stay blossomed

Title: Sohni Mahiwal
Quote: Dil koi bartan nahi hai ... jisse apni marzi se banaya aur toda ja sake
Trans: The heart is not a vessel ... which you make and break at your own wish

Title: Angoor
Quote: Sone ka bhav bhi biwiyon ke mijaaz ki tarah chadta jaa raha hai
Trans: The price of gold is rising like the temper of wives

Title: Angoor
Quote: Joh kabhi nahi daantte ... woh bahut sakht daantte hai
Trans: Those who never scold ... they scold very badly

Title: Zakhmi Aurat
Quote: Main tum logon ko aisi sazaa doongi ... ki tum log maut ke liye tarsoge ... aur maut tum tak nahi aayegi
Trans: I will punish you guys in such a way ... that you people will long for death ... and death will not come to you

Title: Zakhmi Aurat
Quote: Paap ke khilaaf na ladna ... sabse bada paap hota hai
Trans: To not fight against the evil ... is the most evil thing

Title: Zakhmi Aurat
Quote: Suraj ki kiran gandagi par padhti hai toh ... kiran mayli nahi hoti
Trans: When the rays of the Sun fall on dirt ... then the rays don't get dirty

Title: Zakhmi Aurat
Quote: Ek karsi Gangajal mein agar ek boond sharaab mila di jaye ... toh saara Gangajal apavitra ho jaata hai
Trans: If you mix a drop of alcohol in the water from river Ganga ... then the whole water becomes unholy

Title: Laila Majnu (1979)
Quote: Nawazish, karm, shukriya, meherbani ... mujhe baksh diya aapne zindagani
Trans: Kindness, deeds, thanks, courtesy ... you have blessed me with a life

Title: Laila Majnu (1979)
Quote: Duniya ke sitam yaad, na apni hi wafaa yaad ... ab kuch bhi nahi mujhko mohabbat ke sivah yaad
Trans: I don't remember the torture of the world, and neither do I remember my faithfulness ... now I remember nothing other than love

Title: Laila Majnu (1979)
Quote: Bekhabar soye hai woh loot ke woh neendein meri, jazba-e-dil pe taras khane ko jee chahta hai ... kabse khamosh hue ho jaane jahan kuch bolo ... kya abhi aur sitam dhane ko jee chahta hai
Trans: She has stolen my sleep and she is sleeping calmly, I wish to pity on my heart ... oh my love say something, you've been quiet for a long time ... do you still wish to trouble me more

Title: Laila Majnu (1979)
Quote: Sangemarmar se tarasha hua ye shaukh badan, itna dilkash hai ki apnane ko jee chahta hai ... surkh hooton mein terakhti hai woh rangeen sharaab, jisko pee peekay bahak jaane ko jee chahta hai ... naram seene mein dhadakte hai woh nazuk toofan, jinki leharon mein utar jaane ko jee chahta hai ... tum se kya rishta hai kab se hai yeh maloom nahi, lekin is husn pe mar jaane ko jee chahta hai ... humse behtar hai yeh pazeb joh is paon mein hai, issi pazeb mein dhal jaane ko jee chahta hai ... rakhle kal ke liye yeh doosri pazeb-e-dil, kal issi baz mein phir aane ko jee chahta hai
Trans: This beautiful body chiseled with marble, is so captivating that I wish I could make it mine ... the colorful alcohol that is flowing through your ruby lips, I wish I could drink that and wander ... the delicate storms that are beating in your soft heart, I wish I could get down in those waves ... I don't know what relation I have with you and since when, but I wish I could die for your body ... the anklet that is your leg is better than me, I wish I could settle in that anklet ... oh my heart keep the other anklet for tomorrow, I wish to come tomorrow for the same reason

Title: Judwaa
Quote: India mein time se aane waale ki koi value nahi hoti ... der se aane waale ko star samjha jaata hai
Trans: In India there is no value for people who come on time ... and people who come late are considered a star

Title: Judwaa
Quote: Hindustan ki pavitra dharti par pehda hokar ... gadhe ki tarah mehnat karke, kutte ki tarah jeena chhodkar ... chori chakari kar raha hai?
Trans: Being born on the holy land of India ... after working hard like a donkey, and leaving the life of a dog ... instead you are stealing?

Title: Judwaa
Quote: Sar se paon tak khud ko dhak liya hai ... meri Roopa ka roop toh kahin se nazar hi nahi aata ni
Trans: You have covered yourself from head to toe ... so we can't see the beauty of my Roopa

Title: Judwaa
Quote: Tera mooh baatein karta hue achcha nahi lagta hai ... Fevicol dhal uske andhar
Trans: Your mouth doesn't look talking ... put glue in it

Title: Heer Raanjha
Quote: Basakar dilon ko mittati hai duniya ... hasakar hamesha rulati hai duniya
Trans: The world settles the hearts and then erases them ... the world always makes you laugh and then cry

Title: Heer Raanjha
Quote: Tune sab paaya hai, aashiq ki nazar paayi nahi ... jabse dekha tujhko duniya ki taraf dekha nahi ... jabse chaha tujhko apni yaad bhi aayi nahi ... tukhjo paana zindagi hai, tujhko khona maut hai ... aur kuch iske sivah mere fasaane mein nahi ... maang loonga mein khuda se yah chura loonga tujhe ... tujhsa moti doosra uske khazane mein nahi
Trans: You have everything, but not the eyes of a lover ... since I have seen you, I haven't looked at the world ... since I have loved you, I haven't thought about myself ... achieving you is life, and losing you is death ... and there is nothing to my story other than this ... I will ask you from God or else I will steal you ... and God doesn't have a pearl other than you in his treasure

Title: Heer Raanjha
Quote: Laila ke aangan mein joh bhangra ho gaya ... Majnu naacha aur yoon naacha ke langda ho gaya
Trans: When people were dancing in Laila's courtyard ... Majnu danced like crazy and he became lame

Title: Heer Raanjha
Quote: Kya milega bhala rulaake mujhe ... paoge kya jala jalake mujhe
Trans: What will you get from making me cry ... what will you achieve from burning me

Title: Koyelaanchal
Quote: Mere dushman ne yeh socha hi nahi tha shayad ... yeh diya baad-e-fanaa se bhi bhadak sakta hai ... usko quwwat pe takabbur hai mujh ko yakeen ... dast-e-haq baazu-e-qatil ko jhatak sakta hai ... mere jallad ko yeh maloom hi nahi hai shayad ... yeh dil dast-e-ajal mein bhi dhadak sakta hai
Trans: My enemy probably didn't even think that ... this lamp can also ignite in the storm of death ... he believes in the power of pride and I believe that ... the hand of the truth can break the arm of a killer ... my executioner probably didn't know that ... this heart can also beat with the hand of death on him

Title: Koyelaanchal
Quote: Zindagi mein nayi umeed chahiye ... toh takleef toh uthani hi padti hai
Trans: If you want new hopes in life ... then you have to go through the troubles

Title: Koyelaanchal
Quote: Is desh ma ek hi mafia hai ... woh hai sarkar
Trans: There is only one mafia in this country ... and that is the government

Title: Koyelaanchal
Quote: Shramiko ki awaaz dabayi ja sakti hai ... maari nahi
Trans: The voice of labour workers can be suppressed ... but it can't be killed

Title: The Xpose
Quote: Na dance, na expression, na pose ... sirf expose
Trans: No dance, no expression, no pose ... only expose

Title: The Xpose
Quote: Raja ka beta bhale hi nanga pehda ho ... magar hota woh rajkumar hi hai
Trans: So what if the son of a king is born naked ... he still is a prince

Title: The Xpose
Quote: Tere shareer mein itna khoon nahi hoga ... jitna Ravi Kumar ek baar mein moot deta hai
Trans: The amount of blood in your body is less than ... what Ravi Kumar pees at one time

Title: The Xpose
Quote: Hum toh dariya hai, hum mein apna hunar malum hai ... jis taraf bhi chal padenge, rasta ho jayega
Trans: I am the sea, and I know my talent ... whichever way I start going, the path will be made by itself

Title: Purani Jeans
Quote: Zindagi mein dost toh kahi aate hai ... lekin purane dost us jeans ki tarah hote hai, jisse pehente hi you become free ... free to be yourself
Trans: In life we get a lot of friends ... but old friends are like that pair of jeans, which on wearing you become free ... free to be yourself

Title: Purani Jeans
Quote: Alpha, beta, gamma, theta ... joh hai sexy woh hai jeeta
Trans: Alpha, beta, gamma, theta ... the one who is sexy will win

Title: Purani Jeans
Quote: Dosti na guitar ke strings ki tarah hoti hai ... ek baar tuning theek beth jaaye na ... har ek taar important hota hai
Trans: Friendship is like the strings of a guitar ... once it is tuned well ... then every string becomes important

Title: Purani Jeans
Quote: Jinko zindagi mein pyar karte hai na ... woh hum mein hamesha nahi milte
Trans: People whom we love in life ... we don't get them always

Title: Samrat & Co.
Quote: Smart criminal woh nahi joh saboot na chhode ... balki woh hai joh saboot toh chhode ... par gumrah karne ke liye
Trans: A smart criminal is not the one who doesn't leave the evidence ... instead it is the one who leaves the evidence ... but to misguide

Title: Samrat & Co.
Quote: Aadmi woh nahi hota hai joh woh dikhata hai ... aadmi woh hota hai joh woh chupata hai
Trans: A person is not what he shows ... a person is what he hides

Title: Samrat & Co.
Quote: Kuch sawaalon ke jawab kudh sawaal hote hai
Trans: The answers to some questions are questions themselves

Title: Samrat & Co.
Quote: Jispar sabse zyada shak ho ... uspar sabse zyada yakeen karna chahiye
Trans: The one whom you suspect the most ... you should believe in them the most

Title: Khamoshi: The Musical
Quote: Woh zindagi hi kya jis mein koi namumkin sapna na ho
Trans: What good is a life in which you don't have an impossible dream

Title: Khamoshi: The Musical
Quote: Jab tum hasti ho tum bahut khoobsurat lagti ho ... you look very ugly
Trans: You look very beautiful when you laugh ... you look very ugly

Title: Khamoshi: The Musical
Quote: Jab tak dil dhadakta hai ... sangeet zinda rehta hai
Trans: The music lives ... until the heart beats

Title: Halla Bol
Quote: Apne badan pe chot lage toh saala janwar bhi rota hai ... insaan woh hai joh doosre ki chot ko mehsoos kar sake
Trans: Even an animal cries when he has a wound on his body ... but a human is someone who can feel the wound of someone else

Title: Halla Bol
Quote: Commission mein kam se kam 100 crore kamayenge ... aur netagiri ki parampara nibhayenge
Trans: We will earn at least 100 crores in commission ... and we will fulfill the tradition of politics

Title: Halla Bol
Quote: Hansi mazak mein jhoot bolna aur baat hai ... lekin main zindagi mein jhoot bolkar kuch bhi haasil nahi karna chahta
Trans: To lie in fun is one thing ... but I don't want to achieve anything by lying in life

Title: Halla Bol
Quote: Ab Rasul aayenge duniya mein na Ram aayenge ... sirf insaan hi insaan ke kaam aayenge
Trans: Now neither Rasul nor Ram will come in this world ... only a person can be of help to another person

Title: Lajja
Quote: Har aurat hamaar maiyya hai aur hum maiyya ka sauda nahi karat
Trans: Every women is my mother and I don't trade my mother

Title: Lajja
Quote: Roti kamane ke liye aurat ghar se nikli nahi ... ki tankha dene waala har aadmi usse apne baap ka maal samajhta hai
Trans: A woman barely steps out from her house to earn a living ... and every man who pays her the salary considers her to be his father's property

Title: Lajja
Quote: Joh koi zulm ke khilaaf awaaz uthawat hai ... wohi insaan hai, wohi zinda hai
Trans: The one who raises their voice against injustice ... is a human, and is alive

Title: Lajja
Quote: Jab chahe chuna lagaye ragad ke khaye ... ab khud pe baat aayi toh kare hai hai ... arre bhoya pedh babool ka toh aam kahan se khaye
Trans: Whenever you wanted you duped and ate ... and you are crying now that it has come on you ... if you have sowed the seeds of an acacia tree then how can you get mangoes

Title: I Hate Luv Storys
Quote: Ladkiyan buses ki tarah hoti hai, ek jaati hai toh doosri aati hai ... lekin in saare buses mein sirf ek aaisi bus hoti hai joh tumhe apne ghar pahunchati hai ... aur woh bus miss nahi karna chahiye
Trans: Girls are like buses, one goes and another one comes along ... but amongst all the buses there is only one bus that takes you home ... and you should not miss that bus

Title: I Hate Luv Storys
Quote: Kal tak toh sab theek tha, yeh pyar kaise ho gaya ... kabhi soocha na tha ki aaise hoga, yeh kaise ho gaya
Trans: Until yesterday everything was alright, how did this love happen ... I never thought that it would happen this way, how did this happen

Title: Uttar Dakshin
Quote: Jua mein juari haarta hai ... patta nahi
Trans: In gambling a gambler loses ... not the card

Title: Uttar Dakshin
Quote: Sabse gehra zakhm wohi log de sakte hai ... joh khud gehri chot khaye huye hai
Trans: Only those people can give deep wounds ... who themselves have deep wounds

Title: Uttar Dakshin
Quote: Taash ki gaddi bhale hi bees rupaye ki ho ... lekin uspar jua karodon ka kehla jaata hai
Trans: So what if the pack of cards is for Rs.20 ... the bet played on it is for millions

Title: Uttar Dakshin
Quote: Aap aur hum uttar aur dakshin ki tarah do dishayen hai ... joh kabhi nahi mil sakti
Trans: You and I are like the two ways of north and south ... which can never meet

Title: Mirch Masala
Quote: Sankat ke samay toh savdhani hi sabse bada dharm hai
Trans: Precaution is the biggest religion during the times of difficulty

Title: Mirch Masala
Quote: Baat agar hadd se badh jaaye ... toh batangar bann jaati hai
Trans: If the news rises above its limits ... then it becomes a nuisance

Title: Mirch Masala
Quote: Sher jab ek baar khoon chak leta hai ... toh adamkhor ho jaata hai
Trans: Once a tiger has tasted blood ... then he becomes a maneater

Title: Mirch Masala
Quote: Nazar par bhi nazar rakhni padti hai
Trans: You have to keep an eye on the eye

Title: Khubsoorat
Quote: Jab miya bibi raazi, toh kya karengi maaji?
Trans: When the husband and wife are agreeing, then what will the mother-in-law do?

Title: Khubsoorat
Quote: Haath ki rekhayein kabhi jhoot nahi bolti
Trans: The lines on the palm never lie

Title: Khubsoorat
Quote: Appointments can wait but death will not
Trans: Appointments can wait but death will not

Title: Khubsoorat
Quote: Koi bhi azaadi bina apne niyamon ke poori nahin hoti ... aur issi ko discipline kehte hai
Trans: No independence is complete without its rules ... and this is called as discipline

Title: Do Aur Do Paanch
Quote: Bachche bado ko bhool jaaye par bade bachchon ko nahi bhoolte
Trans: Kids can forget the elders but the elders never forget the kids

Title: Do Aur Do Paanch
Quote: Paise mein badi taqat hoti hai ... jinke paas paisa nahi hai na, unse toh unke apne bhi nazar pher lete hai ... aur jinke paas paisa hai, unke gair tak apne ho jaate hai
Trans: Money has a lot of power ... those who don't have money, they lose their near and dear ones ... and those who have money, even strangers become their near and dear ones

Title: Do Aur Do Paanch
Quote: Iss duniya ki gaadi baimaani aur rishwat ke paiyon par chal rahi hai
Trans: The car of this world is running on the wheels of dishonesty and bribe

Title: Do Aur Do Paanch
Quote: Sangeet woh daulat hai jisse duniya ka koi chor chura nahi sakta, koi daaku loot nahi sakta ... sangeet woh jadoo hai jiske samne duniya ka har jadoo beqaboo ho jaata hai
Trans: Music is that wealth which cannot be stolen by any thief of this world, cannot be looted by any dacoit ... music is that magic in front of which every magic of the world becomes uncontrollable

Title: Fiza
Quote: Jin gharon par Allah meherbaan hota hai ... wahan betiyan paida hoti hai
Trans: Girls are born in those houses ... where God has his blessings

Title: Fiza
Quote: Jeena koi majboori nahi, ek maqsad hai
Trans: To live is not an obligation, it is a purpose

Title: Fiza
Quote: Harra rang aur bhagwa rang, green and saffron ... Hindustan ke jhande ka ek hi hissa hai ... usse ek hissa hi rehna chahiye ... poora jhanda banne ki koshish nahi karni chahiye
Trans: The colours green and saffron ... are a part of the Indian flag ... they should remain as a part only ... they should not try to become the complete flag

Title: Fiza
Quote: Asli imaan sirf mohabbat hai
Trans: Only love is a true religion

Title: Ek Main Aur Ekk Tu
Quote: Main dost se pyar kiya aur tumne pyar se dosti ki
Trans: I loved a friend and you did friendship with your love

Title: Ek Main Aur Ekk Tu
Quote: Kabhi kabhi life mein aaisa lagta hai ki hum sach-much udh sakte hai ... aaisa lagta hai ki yeh ek mauka sirf hamare liye banaya gaya hai
Trans: Sometimes in life you feel as if you can really fly ... it feels as if this one opportunity is only made for us

Title: Umar 55 Ki Dil Bachpan Ka
Quote: Kaante sirf zakhm de sakte hai ... khushboo nahi de sakte
Trans: Thorns can only give wounds ... not fragrance

Title: Umar 55 Ki Dil Bachpan Ka
Quote: Abhi aaye, abhi behte, abhi daaman sambhala hai ... tumhari aulad bhi kya yaad karegi, ki chacha ne kya dum nikala hai
Trans: You just came, you just sat, you barely settled down ... but your child will remember, what great uncle do they have

Title: Umar 55 Ki Dil Bachpan Ka
Quote: Ladkon se agar ladna hai toh ladakpan mein aana hi padega ... pachpan se nikalkar bachpan mein aana hi padega
Trans: If you want to fight with the boys then you will have to come in your boyhood ... from the age of 55 you will have to come in your childhood

Title: Good Boy Bad Boy
Quote: Zindagi ek bhel puri ki tarah hai ... jis mein kuch meethi cheezein hoti hai, meri tarah ... aur kuch teekhi cheezein hoti hai, tumhari tarah
Trans: Life is like a savoury snack ... in which there are some sweet things, like me ... and some spicy things, like you

Title: Good Boy Bad Boy
Quote: Agar hamari kismat mein jeetna likha hoga toh hum jeetenge ... lekin hum haarne tak haar nahi manenge
Trans: If we are destined to win then we will win ... but we won't accept defeat until we lose

Title: Good Boy Bad Boy
Quote: Mere marks 90% na ho ... lekin maine joh kuch bhi kiya hai sirf isliye kiya hai ... kyun ki tumse pyar maine hamesha 100% hi kiya hai
Trans: My marks may not be 90% ... but whatever I have done, I have done only because ... I have always loved you 100%

Title: Good Boy Bad Boy
Quote: Kisi bhi badi uljhan se nikalne ka sach hi raasta hota hai
Trans: Only truth is the way out from any big problem

Title: Bees Saal Baad
Quote: Pita ka hukum manna beti ka farz hai ... lekin patni ko pati se alag rehne ka hukum agar bhagwan bhi de ... toh usse bhi thukra dena patni ka dharam hai
Trans: It is the duty of a daughter to obey her father's order ... but even if God gives an order to a wife to stay away from her husband ... then it is the religion of the wife to reject that order

Title: Bees Saal Baad
Quote: Pyar karne waale jismon ke milan par nahi ... aatmaon ke milan par bharosa karte hai
Trans: People in love don't believe in the union of the bodies ... they believe in the union of the souls

Title: Bees Saal Baad
Quote: Badal ki taqdeer mein toh sirf garajna aur aasoon bahana likha hota hai
Trans: Only thunder and tears are written in the destiny of clouds

Title: Bees Saal Baad
Quote: Jis pyar mein tyaag ho, woh tyaag mahaan hota hai ... aur usse bhi mahaan hota hai, tyaag karne waala
Trans: The love that has sacrifice in it, that sacrifice is great ... and much greater than that, is the one who gives the sacrifice

Title: Hero No. 1
Quote: Aurat ek khoobsurat phool ki tarah hoti hai ... jiski khushboo ko sirf mehsoos kiya ja sakta hai ... magar usse kuchla ya masla nahi ja sakta
Trans: A woman is like a beautiful flower ... whose fragrance can only be felt ... but it can't be destroyed or smashed

Title: Hero No. 1
Quote: Main tere pyar mein kya kya na bana Meena ... kabhi bana kutta, kabhi kamina
Trans: Meena, what not did I become in your love ... sometimes a dog, sometimes a scoundrel

Title: Hero No. 1
Quote: Duniya mein aadmi ki nahi ... uske kapdon ki, uske dhan ki kadar hoti hai
Trans: In this world a person's clothes and his money has value ... he himself has no value

Title: Hero No. 1
Quote: Duniya banane waale kya tere mann mein samayi ... kahe ko ghadi banayi
Trans: Hey God what was in your heart ... why did you make the clock

Title: U Me Aur Hum
Quote: Dono gham se guzrein ya guzrein khushi se ... jahan se bhi guzrein, guzrein apni khushi se
Trans: We both will go through sorrow or happiness ... but from wherever we go, we will go at our own will

Title: U Me Aur Hum
Quote: Problem kabhi insaan se bada nahi hota ... insaan hi usse bada banata hai
Trans: A problem is never bigger than a person ... the person makes it bigger

Title: U Me Aur Hum
Quote: Tumse milne ke baad maine bhi ek sapna dekha tha ... tumhare har sapne ko sach karne ka sapna
Trans: Even I saw a dream after meeting you ... the dream to make every dream of yours a reality

Title: U Me Aur Hum
Quote: Jab ladka aande zyada khane lage ... toh iska matlab usse us murgi se pyar ho gaya hai, joh aande deti hai ... ya us ladki se joh aande leti hai
Trans: When a guy eats a lot of eggs ... then it means that he is love with the chicken that gives the eggs ... or with the girl who buys the eggs

Title: Xcuse Me
Quote: Kamine ka bhai kutta kamina hota hai
Trans: The brother of a scoundrel is called a bloody scoundrel

Title: Xcuse Me
Quote: Mujhe tum logon ko chance deke ... chance nahi lena hai
Trans: I don't want to take a chance ... by giving you guys a chance

Title: Xcuse Me
Quote: Ek doonga rakhke mooh pe ... soo jayega Juhu pe
Trans: I will give you one tight slap on your face ... that you'll go and sleep in Juhu

Title: 2 States
Quote: Agar suddenly ek saath sab kuch theek ho jaaye ... toh life bahut boring ho jaati hai
Trans: If suddenly everything becomes alright ... then life becomes boring

Title: 2 States
Quote: Punjabi mother-in-law se khatarnak kuch bhi nahi hota hai is duniya mein
Trans: There is nothing more dangerous in this world than a Punjabi mother-in-law

Title: 2 States
Quote: Story mein hero ho ya na ho ... story hero honi chahiye
Trans: The story may have a hero or not ... the story itself must be a hero

Title: 2 States
Quote: Budhi ho ya jawaan ... melodrama is duniya ki sari auraton ke khoon mein hota hai
Trans: Be it old or young ... all the women of this world have melodrama in their blood

Title: Dus
Quote: Jee nahi saki ... par jaan de sakti hoon tumhare saath
Trans: I wasn't able to live ... but I can die with you

Title: Dus
Quote: Ek bhi goli chali ... toh jaan kisi ki bhi jaye ... maare tum log jaoge
Trans: Even if a single bullet is fired ... then no matter who gets killed ... you guys will die

Title: Dus
Quote: Hum jis mission par hai ... us mein goliyon ka hisaab nahi diya jaata
Trans: The mission that we are on ... we don't have to give an account for the bullets

Title: Ek Ajnabee
Quote: Jeetne waale woh cheez karte hai ... joh haarne waale nahi karte
Trans: Winners do things ... that losers don't do

Title: Ek Ajnabee
Quote: Burre insaan ko sazaa dena uparwaale ka kaam hai lekin ... uparwaale se mulaqat karana mera kaam hai
Trans: It is the duty of God to punish bad guys ... but it is my duty to send them to God

Title: Ek Ajnabee
Quote: Har insaan ki taqdeer ek jaisi nahi hoti
Trans: Everyone doesn't have the same destiny

Title: Ek Ajnabee
Quote: Har goli ki bhi ek taqdeer, ek kismat hoti hai ... jab usse uski manzil mil jaye ... khud ba khud chal jayegi
Trans: Even every bullet has its own fate, its own destiny ... and when it finds its target ... then it fires by itself

Title: Koi Mil Gaya
Quote: Computer ne insaan ko nahi banaya hai ... insaan ne computer ko banaya hai ... is liye joh dimaag kar sakta hai, woh aapka computer nahi kar sakta hai
Trans: The computer did not make humans ... the humans made the computer ... that's why what a mind can do, a computer can't

Title: Koi Mil Gaya
Quote: Duniya mein kisi aadmi ko chota mat samajhiye ... kyun ki har chota, kabhi na kabhi badha zaroor ho jaata hai
Trans: Don't consider anyone in this world as a small person ... because every small person, someday definitely becomes big

Title: Koi Mil Gaya
Quote: Duniya har nayi baat ko pehle thukrati hai ... baad mein maan leti hai
Trans: In the beginning the world ignores every new thing ... and then later it agrees to it

Title: Koi Mil Gaya
Quote: Om is a Hindu religious word ... which has all the vibrations of the universe
Trans: Om is a Hindu religious word ... which has all the vibrations of the universe

Title: Do Dooni Chaar
Quote: Khali fees bharne se papa hone ki duty poori nahi hoti ... papa ki duty hoti hai bachchon ki khushiyan
Trans: Just by paying the fees a father's duty is not fulfilled ... a father's duty is the happiness of his children

Title: Do Dooni Chaar
Quote: Jab tak ki ghar ki murgi ko koi bahar waala murgi na bole ... tab tak murgi daal hi lagti hai
Trans: Until someone from outside calls the chicken of the house as a chicken ... until then the chicken feels like lentil

Title: Rajjo
Quote: Ras nikaalta hoon jaaneman nichodkar ganna ... tera deedar ho khidki se bas yahi hai tamanna
Trans: I remove the juice by squeezing sugarcane ... my only wish is that I get a glimpse of you from the window

Title: Rajjo
Quote: Lady agar pasand aa jaaye toh pehle chaati pe lagao, mann behlao ... jee bhar jaaye toh uske pairon mein ghunghroo bandvao aur paise kamao
Trans: If you like a lady then first hug her and have fun ... and when you are done with her then tie an anklet on her and earn money

Title: Rajjo
Quote: Joh adab mein aaye toh lehar hai ... joh ho meharbaan toh woh pyar hai
Trans: If it comes in a gesture then it's a wave ... if it's amicable then it's love

Title: Rajjo
Quote: Ishq aur mushq chupaye chupta nahi ... baar baar dekhi adayein Rajjo ki, dil bharta nahi
Trans: Love and fragrance cannot be hidden ... my heart wants to see more and more gracefulness of Rajjo

Title: War Chhod Na Yaar
Quote: Sirf do hi tareeke hai ... pehla pyar ka doosra talwar ka ... bas fark itna hai ki talwar ek ko do karti hai ... par pyar do ko ek karta hai
Trans: There are only two ways ... first of love and second of sword ... the only difference is that a sword cuts one into two ... and love connects two into one

Title: War Chhod Na Yaar
Quote: Jaise surya ko koi mitta nahi sakta ... ussi tarah se Hindustan ko koi hara nahi sakta
Trans: Just like no one can eliminate the Sun ... just like that no one can defeat India

Title: War Chhod Na Yaar
Quote: Tairna hai toh samundar mein tairo, talaabo mein kya rakha hai ... aur joh ishq karna hai toh mujhse karo, janaaniyo mein kya rakha hai
Trans: If you want to swim then swim in the ocean, what's there in the lake ... and if you want to love then love me, what's there in the girls

Title: Maqbool
Quote: Gilauri khaya karo ... zabaan kabu mein rehti hai
Trans: You should eat betel leaf ... the tongue stays in control

Title: Maqbool
Quote: Shakti ka santulan bahut zaroori hai sansar mein
Trans: It is very important to have the balance of power in the world

Title: Maqbool
Quote: Jis insaan ka maqsad sirf nuksaan ho ... usse kisi ka fayda nahi ho sakta
Trans: A person whose intention is only to decimate ... no one can benefit from him

Title: Maqbool
Quote: Aag ke liye paani ka dar bane rehna chahiye
Trans: The fear of water must always be there for the fire

Title: Jaani Dushman
Quote: Tumhare mooh se jitne jhoot niklenge ... main utni goliyan tumhare seene mein daal doonga
Trans: The number of lies that come out from your mouth ... I will fire that many bullets in your body

Title: Jaani Dushman
Quote: Joh mard hote hai woh apni chaati pe vaar toh seh sakte hai ... lekin doosron ki peeth par chupke vaar nahi kar sakte hai
Trans: Men can withstand an attack on their chest ... but they will not hide and attack on a persons back

Title: Jaani Dushman
Quote: Jaani dushman samajh loon aaisi nahi hai tu ... magar joh maine samjha tha waise bhi nahi hai tu
Trans: You are not such that I should consider you as my biggest enemy ... but what I had thought, you aren't that either

Title: Jaani Dushman
Quote: Mard tayaari nahi karte ... hamesha tayaar rehte hai
Trans: Men don't do preparations ... they are always ready

Title: John Day
Quote: Dard hum mein nahi ... hum dard ko chunte hai
Trans: The pain doesn't select us ... we select the pain

Title: John Day

Trans: The most dangerous animal in the world is a human

Title: John Day
Quote: Kutta, kutta hi rehta hai chahe kitna hi wafaadar ho jaaye ... malik nahi banta
Trans: A dog remains a dog no matter how faithful he becomes ... he doesn't turn into a master

Title: John Day

Trans: If you want to increase the burden in someone's life ... then put all your trust on their shoulders

Title: Teesri Manzil
