Trans: Amalgamation has three storeys ... first storey of hatred and fight ... second storey of friendship and purification ... and third storey of love and engagement

Title: Teesri Manzil
Quote: Duniya mein bahut si aaisi baatein hoti hai joh namumkin nazar aati hai ... lekin agar insaan himaat se kaam kare aur woh sachcha hai ... toh jeet ussi ki hoti hai
Trans: There are so many things in the world that appear impossible ... but if a person acts with courage and if he is truthful ... then he will win

Title: Teesri Manzil
Quote: Jab koi nadaan ladki pyar ki manzilon se guzar jaati hai ... apni izzat aur abroo kho beheti hai ... toh anjaam zindagi nahi, maut hota hai
Trans: When an innocent girl travels across the destinations of love ... she loses her respect and honour ... and then the outcome is death, not life

Title: D: Underworld Badhshah
Quote: Dhande mein dost dushman hota hai
Trans: In business a friend is an enemy

Title: D: Underworld Badhshah
Quote: Agar mere upar ek bhi goli chali ... toh teri khopdi mein itni goliyan hongi ... ki bheje ke liye jagah nahi bachegi
Trans: If even a single bullet is fired on me ... then there will be so many bullets in your head ... that there will be no space for the brain

Title: D: Underworld Badhshah
Quote: Har cheez ka first time hota hai
Trans: Everything has a first time

Title: D: Underworld Badhshah
Quote: Is line mein experience nahi ... daring ka zaroorat hai
Trans: In this line you don't need experience ... you need daring

Title: Kranti (1981)
Quote: Apni laashon se hum tarikh ko aabad rakhe ... woh ladai ho ki angrez jisse yaad rakhe
Trans: We will make the date eternal with our dead bodies ... but it should be a fight that the Englishmen should remember

Title: Kranti (1981)
Quote: Kulhadi mein lakdi ka dasta na hota ... toh lakdi ke katne ka rasta na hota
Trans: If the axe didn't have the handle of wood ... then there would have been no way to cut the wood

Title: Kranti (1981)
Quote: Zulm aur jhoot ki dhaali par ek baar phal lagta hai ... dobara nahi
Trans: Fruits can grow only once on the branches of injustice and lies ... not again

Title: Kranti (1981)
Quote: Jab zindagi daudti hai ... toh ragon mein behta hua khoon bhi daudta hai
Trans: When life runs ... then the blood flowing in the veins also runs

Title: Teen Patti
Quote: Jeevan ko janne ke liye ... usse pehle jeena hoga
Trans: To understand life ... you first have to live it

Title: Teen Patti
Quote: Jeetne ke liye haarna bahut zaroori hai
Trans: To win, it is very important to lose

Title: Teen Patti
Quote: Woh luck hi kya ... joh agli baar ka intezaar kare
Trans: What good is the luck ... that has to wait for the next time

Title: Teen Patti
Quote: I want to be defined by who I am ... not by what I own
Trans: I want to be defined by who I am ... not by what I own

Title: Ishkq in Paris
Quote: Jab dil kisi ke liye rota hai na ... toh pyar ka pata khud-ba-khud chal hi jaata hai
Trans: When the heart cries for someone ... then you come to know about love automatically

Title: Ishkq in Paris
Quote: Paris mein pyar karna aasaan hai ... par pyar paana bahut mushkil
Trans: It is easy to love in Paris ... but it is very hard to get love

Title: Ishkq in Paris
Quote: Kabhi kabhi na kehte huye, na jaante huye ... ek rishta sa judh jaata hai
Trans: Sometimes without saying, without knowing ... a relationship gets established

Title: Ishkq in Paris
Quote: France ka fashion aur ladki ka selection ... dono mushkil mein daal deta hai
Trans: The fashion of France and the selection of a girl ... both things put you in a difficult situation

Title: Laawaris (1981)
Quote: Aulad na ho dukh hota hai ... aulad ho aur marr jaye bahut dukh hota hai ... lekin aulad ho aur nalayak, toh bardaash nahi hota
Trans: You feel sad if you don't have a child ... and you feel very sad when your child dies ... but if you have a child who is useless, then you can't tolerate that

Title: Laawaris (1981)
Quote: Apun kutte ki woh dum hai joh barah baras nalli mein daalke rakho ... nalli tedhi ho jayegi ... apun seedha nahi hoga
Trans: I am a dog's tail which even if you keep in a tube for 12 years ... the tube will get curled ... but I won't become straight

Title: Laawaris (1981)
Quote: Apne kiye ki sazaa toh har insaan ko bhugatni padti hai ... lekin apna jurm kubool karne se, uski sazaa jhelna aasaan ho jaati hai
Trans: Every person has to go through the punishment for their deeds ... but by accepting your mistake, it becomes easier to tolerate that punishment

Title: Laawaris (1981)
Quote: Aaj ya toh insaaf hoga ... ya mamla saaf hoga
Trans: Today either there will be justice ... or the case will be cleared

Title: Kudrat (1998)
Quote: Aurat ko hathyar banakar jung ladne waala mard ... mard nahi hota
Trans: A man who uses a woman as a weapon in war ... is not a man

Title: Kudrat (1998)
Quote: Jis uljhan aur pareshani par insaan ka zor na chalta ho ... usko kudrat ke hawaale kar dena chahiye
Trans: The complications and the problems on which a person has no control ... one should leave them in the hands of god

Title: Kudrat (1998)
Quote: Woh aur zakhm hote hai jinhe waqt ka marham bhar diya karta hai ... magar pehle pyar ka zakhm duniya ka koi marham bhar nahi sakta hai
Trans: Wounds that can be filled with the medicine of time are something else ... but no medicine of this world can fill the wound of first love

Title: Kudrat (1998)
Quote: Jab jeb mein daulat badh jaati hai na ... toh zabaan kaboo se nikal jaati hai
Trans: When you have more money in the pocket ... then the words go out of control

Title: Rafoo Chakkar
Quote: Maut ko ek baar dhokha dene se ... zindagi lambi nahi ho jaati
Trans: By deceiving death once ... life doesn't become longer

Title: Rafoo Chakkar
Quote: Joh main hoon woh main nahi hoon ... joh main nahi hoon woh main bilkul nahi hoon ... joh main bilkul nahi hoon woh main hoon
Trans: I am not what I am ... I am certainly not what I am not ... and I am what I am certainly not

Title: Rafoo Chakkar
Quote: Ajeeb nyay hai bhagwan ka bhi ... jinko bhook deta hai unko khane ko nahi deta ... aur jinko khane ko deta hai unko bhook nahi deta
Trans: God's justice is strange ... those who are hungry don't have anything to eat ... and those who are not hungry have everything to eat

Title: Rafoo Chakkar
Quote: Pet anaaj se nahi bharta ... pyar se bharta hai
Trans: Food doesn't fill the stomach ... love does

Title: Bombay Talkies
Quote: Follow your heart for there is magic in your dreams ... if you believe them they will come true
Trans: Follow your heart for there is magic in your dreams ... if you believe them they will come true

Title: Bombay Talkies
Quote: Agar tum mein will hai ... toh tum wahi karoge joh tumhara dil chahta hai
Trans: If you have the will in you ... then you will do only what your heart wants

Title: Bombay Talkies
Quote: Zaroori nahi hai ki har baat har waqt doosron ko batayi jaye ... har baat batane ka ek sahi waqt hota hai
Trans: It is not necessary to tell everything, everytime to others ... there is a right time to tell everything

Title: Bombay Talkies
Quote: Gale mein mangalsutra aankhon mein kamasutra
Trans: She has a wedding necklace on her neck and kamasutra in her eyes

Title: Ek Villain
Quote: Jab tak hum kisi ke humdard nahi bante ... tab tak hum dard se aur dard humse juda nahi hota
Trans: Until someone sympathizes with us ... till then we don't leave pain and neither does pain leave us

Title: Ek Villain
Quote: Nafrat ko nafrat nahi, sirf pyar mitta sakta hai ... bas zaroorat hai kisi ke haath ki ... joh kheench kar usse andheron mein se ujalon mein la sake
Trans: Hatred cannot erase hatred, only love can ... you just need a hand ... that can pull you from darkness into light

Title: Ek Villain
Quote: Zindagi ko aaisi party ki tarah jeena chahti hoon ki maut jab aaye na ... toh saath behetkar do drink maarkar, jaan lekar chali jaye
Trans: I want to live life like a party so that when death comes ... it has a couple of drinks with me and then takes my life away

Title: Ek Villain
Quote: Zindagi mein ek hassi woh hoti hai joh insaan apne gham ko chupane ke liye khud seekhta hai ... aur ek hassi woh hoti hai joh insaan ke saare gham bhula deti hai
Trans: In life there is one smile which a person learns himself to hide his sorrow ... and there is one smile that makes a person forget all his sorrow

Title: Heropanti
Quote: Joh dost kamine nahi hote ... woh kamine dost nahi hote
Trans: Friends that are not scoundrels ... those scoundrels are not friends

Title: Heropanti
Quote: (Heropanti karega?) - Kya karun yaar sabko aati nahi ... meri jaati nahi
Trans: (You want to be a hero?) - What to do everyone doesn't know how to become one ... and I can't lose it

Title: Heropanti
Quote: Cheenti chadi pahad pe daane ke vaaste ... aur kuwaaron ki manzil mohabbat ke raaste
Trans: The ant climbed on a mountain for food ... and the destination of bachelors goes through the roads of love

Title: Just Married
Quote: Joh nazar aata hai ... woh hamesha sach nahi hota
Trans: What you see ... is not always the truth

Title: Just Married
Quote: Rishton ke phoolon ko baandne se hi guldasta banta hai
Trans: A bouquet is formed by tying the flowers of relationships

Title: Just Married
Quote: Kuch rishte apni marzi se bante hai, kuch ban jaate hai ... lekin unka khayal hum mein hi rakhna padta hai ... unhe paalna padta hai ... so that they can grow
Trans: We make some relations and some get made by themselves ... but we have to take care of them ... we have to nurture them ... so that they can grow

Title: Just Married
Quote: Kabhi kabhi do kahaniyan judh jaati hai aur ek nayi kahani banti hai ... aur kabhi ek hi kahani mein kahi choti choti kahaniyan chupi hoti hai ... lekin badi ho ya choti ... har kahani mein kahi chote chote modh, pal aur maiyne hote hai ... aur inhi se har kahani judhti hai, mudti hai, banti hai aur badti hai
Trans: Sometimes two stories get combined and become a new story ... and sometimes in one story itself there are many small stories hidden ... but be it big or small ... every story has many small turns, moments and meanings ... and with these things a story comes together, turns and moves ahead

Title: Toofan
Quote: Achcha ladka dhoondne se nahi ... kismat se milta hai
Trans: You don't find a good boy by looking for him ... you get him with destiny

Title: Toofan
Quote: Jab jab zulm ki aandhi badti hai ... usse rokne ke liye ek toofan aata hai
Trans: Whenever the wind of injustice grows ... there comes a storm to stop it

Title: Toofan
Quote: Mohabbat ki maar ka bada meetha meetha dard hota hai
Trans: The pain from the wound of love is very sweet

Title: Toofan
Quote: Tujhe Pavan-putra ka vardaan hai ... unka diya hua dhanush baan hai ... teri raksha ke liye toofan hai
Trans: You have the blessings of Lord Hanuman ... you have his bow and arrow ... and the storm is there for your protection

Title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
Quote: Hamara income high ho na ho ... outcome toh hamara bhi world class hai
Trans: No matter if our income is high or not ... our outcome is world class

Title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
Quote: My daddy cry if I fail ... then I hit you and go to jail ... but don't worry I get easy bail ... then I again hit you, again jail, again bail ... then jail bail, jail bail, jail bail ... and one day your heart fail
Trans: My daddy will cry if i fail ... then I'll hit you and go to jail ... but don't worry I'll get easy bail ... and then I'll hit you again, then again jail, then again bail ... then jail bail, jail bail, jail bail ... and one day your heart will fail

Title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
Quote: Sirf dimaag bada hai tera, dil itna sa ... aur woh toh usse bhi chota hai
Trans: Only your brain is big, your heart is small ... and that thing is even smaller than that

Title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
Quote: Main pehda hi hot hui thi!
Trans: I was born hot!

Title: Break Ke Baad
Quote: Log tumhe is liye pyar nahi karte hai kyun ki tum special ho ... balki tum special ho kyun ki duniya mein kuch log tumse beintehaa pyar karte hai ... sometimes despite the way you are
Trans: People don't love you because you are special ... instead you are special because there are some people in the world who love you a lot ... sometimes despite the way you are

Title: Break Ke Baad
Quote: Rishta space se nahi ... saath rehkar banta hai
Trans: Relationships are made by staying together ... not by giving space

Title: Break Ke Baad
Quote: Khushi, khushi tab hoti hai ... jab woh baanti jaaye
Trans: Happiness only becomes happiness ... when it is shared

Title: Awara
Quote: Bas yahi toh hamare naye samaaj ka kamaal hai ... joh chor ho, doosron ke jeb kaatte hai, public ki aankhon mein dhool daalte hai, mere jaisa patla suit pant pehente hai ... unhe hum sharif samajhte hai ... aur joh imandaari se, mehnat mazdoori karke pet paalte hai, phate purane kapde pehente hai ... unhe chor daaku awaara samajhkar dhar liya jaata hai
Trans: This is the greatness of our new society ... one who is a thief, who pick pockets, who cheats other people, wears a suit and pant like me ... we consider them honest people ... and those who work hard and with honestly, wear ripped old clothes ... we catch them considering them as thieves and dacoits

Title: Awara
Quote: Insaaf karte waqt har doosre rishtey ko bhool jaana padta hai
Trans: While doing justice you should forget every other relationship

Title: Awara
Quote: Import export ka matlab hai idhar ka maal udhar aur udhar ka maal idhar
Trans: Import export means moving the goods from here to there and from there to here

Title: Awara
Quote: Sharifon ki aulad hamesha sharif hoti hai ... aur chor daaku ki aulad hamesha chor daaku hoti hai
Trans: The children of honest people are always honest ... and the children of thieves and dacoits are always thieves and dacoits

Title: Joru Ka Ghulam
Quote: Saaya andhere mein saath chhod deta hai ... aur naseeb bure dino mein saath chhod deta hai
Trans: A shadow leaves us during darkness ... and destiny leaves us during bad days

Title: Joru Ka Ghulam
Quote: Ladkiyon ka asli ghar unka mayka nahi ... unka sasural hota hai
Trans: The real home of women is their husbands house ... not their parents house

Title: Joru Ka Ghulam
Quote: Insaan is duniya mein insaan bankar rahe ... yahi uske liye kaafi hai
Trans: It is more than enough ... if a human lives as a human in this world

Title: Joru Ka Ghulam
Quote: Jis baap ki char jawan betiyan bin biyahi ghar mein baithi rahe ... us baap ki misaal us laash ki tarah hoti hai ... jisko na jalaya ja sakta hai, na dafnaya ja sakta hai
Trans: A father who has four young unmarried daughters sitting in the house ... the example of that father is like that of a dead body ... which can't be cremated, and neither can it be buried

Title: Junglee
Quote: Jab pyar kisise hota hai toh dil ki uljhane aur bhi badh jaati hai
Trans: When you fall in love with someone then the problems of the heart get bigger

Title: Junglee
Quote: Mohabbat mein kabhi aisi bhi halat paayi jaati hai ... tabiyat aur ghabrati hai jab behlayi jaati hai
Trans: Sometimes in love there comes a condition where ... the health gets more worse when it is pacified

Title: Junglee
Quote: Is duniya mein na koi pooch ke aaya hai ... aur na koi pooch ke jayega
Trans: No one has come in this world by asking ... and neither will anyone ask and go

Title: Junglee
Quote: Insaan gir sakta hai, usool jhuk sakta hai, aur khandan tabah ho sakte hai ... lekin mohabbat karne waale dil na jhuke hai ... aur na kabhi jhuk sakte hai
Trans: A person can fall, protocols can bow down, and families can get destroyed ... but the hearts that are in love have never bowed down ... and will never bow down

Title: Roti Kapada Aur Makaan
Quote: Pyar ki kahani ek aisa pinjra hai jis mein mann ka panchi pharphara toh sakta hai ... magar nikal nahi sakta
Trans: The story of love is such a cage in which the bird of heart can tremble in it ... but it can't come out

Title: Roti Kapada Aur Makaan
Quote: Yeh mat socho ke desh tumhe kya deta hai ... socho yeh ke tum desh ko kya de sakte ho
Trans: Don't think what the country is offering you ... think what you can offer to the country

Title: Roti Kapada Aur Makaan
Quote: Joh aadmi chori karke bhaagte huye pakda jaaye ... woh zindagi bhar bhaagta rehta hai
Trans: A person who is caught running after stealing ... that person keeps running for his entire life

Title: Roti Kapada Aur Makaan
Quote: Khushi ke mauke par dard bhara geet chedna ... badi manhoos si baat hoti hai
Trans: To sing a sad song on a happy event ... is very inauspicious

Title: Kick
Quote: Mere bare mein itna mat sochna ... dil mein aata hoon ... samajh mein nahi
Trans: Don't think a lot about me ... I am in the heart ... but hard to understand

Title: Kick
Quote: Koi umeed bar nahi aati, koi soorat nazar nahi aati ... maut toh ek din moiyan hai, neend raat bhar kyun nahi aati ... pehle aati thi haal-e-dil pe hassi, ab kisi baat pe nahi aati
Trans: There is no hope to be found, there is no resolution to be sought ... death is destined to come one day, but why can't I sleep all night ... earlier I was able to laugh at the predicament of my heart, but now I am unable to laugh at anything

Title: Kick
Quote: Chehre par gussa, mann mein gaali ... goli bhi chalali ... phir bhi dono haath khali
Trans: There is anger on your face, cursing going on in your heart ... you even shot a bullet ... but still both your hands are empty

Title: Kick
Quote: Woh jeena bhi koi jeena hai jis mein kick na ho
Trans: A life that doesn't have a kick is not a life

Title: Hulchul (2004)
Quote: Vaar woh hai jis mein awaaz na ho
Trans: A true attack is the one that is silent

Title: Hulchul (2004)
Quote: Maut, mausam, machchar aur mantri ka kya bharosa
Trans: Death, weather, mosquito and politician cannot be trusted

Title: Hulchul (2004)
Quote: Agar andar ka dard bol sakta ... toh angara ka har zakhm ek kitaab hota
Trans: If the pain from inside could talk ... then every wound of the ember would have been a book

Title: Hulchul (2004)
Quote: Tootti churiyon ka dard sirf bewa ki kalai hi janti hai
Trans: Only the wrist of a widow knows the pain of broken bangles

Title: Janbaaz
Quote: Ek goli daali aur paanch ghar khali ... yun lagali aur goli chalali ... joh jeeta woh zinda, joh haara woh murda
Trans: Put one bullet and leave five slots empty ... take an aim and fire ... the one who wins lives, and the one who loses dies

Title: Janbaaz
Quote: Mohabbat mein pehle dil haara jaata hai ... wohi mohabbat ki jeet hai
Trans: In love you first lose your heart ... and that is the victory in love

Title: Janbaaz
Quote: Jaan ki baazi lagane waala hota hai janbaaz ... jeene ka hai marne ka hai, apna hi andaz
Trans: Those who gamble with their life are adventurous ... and they have their own style of living and dying

Title: Janbaaz
Quote: Rishtey hone se nahi ... maanne aur nibhane se bante hai
Trans: Relationships are made by believing in them and fulfilling them ... not by their existence

Title: Aag Ka Gola
Quote: Imaandari ka toofan baad par aayi nadi ke paani ki tarah phail jaata hai ... aur baimaani ki fasal ka naam aur nishaan mitta deta hai
Trans: The storm of honesty spreads like the flood water from the river ... and it erases the existence of the crops of dishonesty

Title: Aag Ka Gola
Quote: Mohabbat karne waala door ho jaye ... toh nafrat se hi mohabbat karni padti hai
Trans: When the person you love becomes distant ... then you have to love hatred itself

Title: Aag Ka Gola
Quote: Sharafat aur imaandari ka certificate yeh duniya sirf unhe deti hai ... jinke paas daulat hoti hai
Trans: The world gives the certificate of truth and honesty only to those people ... who have money

Title: Aag Ka Gola
Quote: Taqdeer jiska mazaak banade ... uska sabhi mazaak udhate hai
Trans: A person who is fooled by destiny ... everyone makes a fool out of him

Title: Humshakals
Quote: Don't fear come near ... put my jawani ka scooter in third gear
Trans: Don't fear come near ... put the scooter of my youth in third gear

Title: Humshakals
Quote: Aap jaisa koi meri zindagi mein aaye ... toh mere bachche ka baap ban jaye
Trans: If someone like you comes in my life ... then he will become the father of my child

Title: Humshakals
Quote: Hum pagal nahi hai ... hamara dimaag kharab hai
Trans: We are not mad ... it's just that our mind is crazy

Title: Humshakals
Quote: Tumhare vital stats kya hai?
Trans: What are your vital statistics?

Title: Risk
Quote: Time ka na bada game hai ... iske saath kabhi nahi khelneka
Trans: Time is a big game player ... you should never play with it

Title: Risk
Quote: Yeh Mumbai hai ... idhar raat ko alti ka palti aur palti ka alti ho sakta hai
Trans: This is Mumbai ... here in the night things can go from here to there and from there to here

Title: Risk
Quote: Sooch hamesha zinda rehti hai
Trans: A thought always remains alive

Title: Zalzala
Quote: Tum mujhe giraftar toh kar sakte ho magar sazaa nahi de sakte ... jis din maine tujhe giraftar kar liya na ... us din kanoon bhi mera hoga aur sazaa bhi meri
Trans: You can arrest me but you can't punish me ... but the day I arrest you ... that day the law will be mine and even the punishment will be mine

Title: Zalzala
Quote: Aaise tadpa tadpakar maroonga ... ki maut bhi teri laash ko dekhkar kaanp uthegi
Trans: I will torture and kill you such that ... even death will get scared looking at your dead body

Title: Zalzala
Quote: Main tumhare jism ke har ang ko apni mohabbat ke sone se sajja doonga
Trans: I will decorate every part of your body with the gold of my love

Title: Zalzala
Quote: Mohabbat ke liye mahalon ki nahi ... dilon ki zaroorat hoti hai
Trans: You don't need mansions for love ... you need hearts

Title: Yateem
Quote: Ghar na toh char deewaron ka naam hai aur na un char deewaron ke andhar rehne waalon ka ... ghar toh us pyar ka naam hai joh hawaon mein ghula hua hai
Trans: The four walls are not called a house and neither are the people living in those four walls ... a house is the name of the love that is mixed in the air

Title: Yateem
Quote: Hatyare se bada paapi woh hai ... joh kisi masoom ko hatyara banata hai
Trans: A person who makes an innocent person a killer ... is more sinful than the killer himself

Title: Yateem
Quote: Tere paap toh itne ghinone hai ... ki daya ka sagar bhagwan bhi tujhe maaf karne se pehle do baar sochega
Trans: Your sins are so dirty ... that even God, the sea of forgiveness will think twice before forgiving you

Title: Yateem
Quote: Farishtay ke ghar mein shaitaan pehda hota hai ... aur shaitaan ke ghar mein farishta
Trans: A devil is born in an angels house ... and an angel is born in a devils house

Title: Jeevan Daata
Quote: Hamari duniya mein pehla mauka hi aakhri mauka hota hai ... chahe jeene ka ho, chahe marne ka
Trans: In our world the first chance is the last chance ... be it of living or dying

Title: Jeevan Daata
Quote: Dukh ek aaisi cheez hai ... usse jitna mehsoos karoge, woh utna hi badega
Trans: Sorrow is one such thing ... the more you feel it, the more it grows

Title: Jeevan Daata
Quote: Us kamine ko main dhoondkar aaisi sazaa doonga ... ki us sazaa ke naam se maut tak kaanp uthegi
Trans: I will find and punish that scoundrel in such a way that ... even death will tremble with the name of that punishment

Title: Jeevan Daata
Quote: Paap aur jurm ... na toh dharam maaf karta hai, na samaaj aur na hi kanoon
Trans: Sins and crimes ... are not forgiven by religion, by society and neither by the law

Title: Youngistaan
Quote: Jis sayant nazar jaye, mera Hind nazar aaye ... ujaale hi ujaale ho, mera Hind jidhar jaye
Trans: Wherever I can see, I see my India ... there will be brightness, wherever my India goes

Title: Youngistaan
Quote: Agar apne rooth jaye ... toh unhe bina bataye gale laga lena chahiye ... kyun ki is duniya mein roothne waale bahut aur manaane waale kum hai
Trans: If your loved ones are upset ... then you should simply hug them without saying anything ... because in this world there are many people who get upset and few who conciliate

Title: Youngistaan
Quote: Rajneeti mein aapka charitra hi aapki pehchaan hai
Trans: In politics your character is your identity

Title: Youngistaan
Quote: Kahan ki eenth, kahan ka roda ... kahan pe jaake mattha phoda
Trans: Everything has become useless ... and where have I hit my head against

Title: Hate Story 2
Quote: Qaidi ki aazadi ki aarzoo aur raand ki shaadi ki aarzoo ... kabhi na kabhi sar uthayegi hi
Trans: A prisoner's desire to be free and a prostitute's desire to get married ... will definitely surface at sometime or the other

Title: Hate Story 2
Quote: Tumhara chehra dekhte huye marna manzoor hai ... tumhare bagair jeena nahi
Trans: I am willing to die looking at your face ... but I am not willing to live without you

Title: Hate Story 2
Quote: Biwi ki aankhon mein pyar aur mashooka ke haathon mein hathyar ... sirf dikhave ke liye hota hai
Trans: Love in the eyes of a wife and a weapon in the hands of a girlfriend ... are both only for the purpose of showing

Title: Hate Story 2
Quote: Aurat ko uski jaat aur dushman ko uski aukaad ... jitna jaldi ho sake bata deni chahiye
Trans: A woman's class and the enemy's status ... should be shown to them as soon as possible

Title: Lal Baadshah
Quote: Joh khave maari dal, badal jave uki chaal ... main aaisi banao kadhi, haath mein lag jaye hathkadi ... joh khave maari roti, dhatke khele goti
Trans: One who drinks my lentil soup, changes his style ... I make such good kadhi, that there will be handcuffs in your hand ... one who eats my bread, plays marbles well

Title: Lal Baadshah
Quote: Hamare ek ishare par hawa bhi rukh badalti hai ... mere tinke bhikere joh, jahan mein kiski hasti hai
Trans: Even the wind changes its direction with one indication of mine ... there is no one in this world who can break me into pieces

Title: Lal Baadshah
Quote: Ram se bacha na Ravan, Krishna se bacha na Kans ... mujhse kya bachega Thakur, tu aur tera vansh
Trans: Ravan was not able to escape from Ram, Kans was not able to escape from Krishna ... Thakur you and your generation will not be able to escape from me

Title: Lal Baadshah
Quote: Is baar maine tumhare khilaaf itne gawah ikhatte kar liye hai ... ki agar yamdoot bhi chahe toh bhi tumhara arrest warrant cancel nahi karva sakta
Trans: This time I have accumulated so many witnesses against you ... that even the god of death will not be able to cancel your arrest warrant

Title: Singham Returns
Quote: Kis kaam ki hai yeh vardi ... joh ek police waale ko mazboot nahi, majboor banati hai
Trans: What is the use of this uniform ... that makes a police officer helpless, and not strong

Title: Singham Returns
Quote: Sabki ulti ginti chalu!
Trans: Start counting your days backwards!

Title: Singham Returns
Quote: Aali re aali ... aata tumchi baari aali!
Trans: It's here it's here ... now your turns are here!

Title: Singham Returns
Quote: Main yahan investigation karne aaya hoon ... do kaudi ka pravachan sunne nahi
Trans: I have come here to do the investigation ... not to hear some cheap discourse

Title: Yeh Dillagi
Quote: Dukh chupane ke kamaal ko hassi kehte hai
Trans: A magical way of hiding sorrow is called laughter

Title: Yeh Dillagi
Quote: Zakhm bhar bhi jaye ... magar nishaan baki reh jaate hai
Trans: Even if the wounds fill up ... the marks stay over

Title: Yeh Dillagi
Quote: Pyar karna koi kamaal nahi hai ... kamaal toh yeh hai ki doosre tumse pyar karne par majboor ho jaye
Trans: To love is not a big thing ... the big thing is when others are compelled to love you

Title: Yeh Dillagi
Quote: Sharaab ek aaisi cheez hai ... joh ameeron ka shaunk aur gareebon ki zaroorat hai
Trans: Alcohol is one such thing ... that is a hobby of the rich and necessity of the poor

Title: Dosti: Friends Forever
Quote: Mujhe dard se takleef nahi hoti ... par purani yaadon se bahut takleef hoti hai
Trans: I am not affected by pain ... but I am affected by old memories

Title: Dosti: Friends Forever
Quote: Jab sahi ladki mil jaye na ... toh na pyar mein deri karni chahiye aur na shaadi mein
Trans: When you find the right girl ... then you should not wait to love her and neither to marry her

Title: Dosti: Friends Forever
Quote: Bhagwan ne har khushnaseeb ke liye ek aaisa insaan banaya hai ... jiska haath thaamke zindagi ko sahi disha milti hai
Trans: For every lucky person god has made someone ... whose hand when you hold, it gives your life the right direction

Title: Dosti: Friends Forever
Quote: Ghis jaonga, pitt jaonga ... ek baar haan kehdo, tumhare pyar mein mitt jaonga
Trans: I am ready to bear the pain ... just say yes once, I am ready to die in your love

Title: Judaai
Quote: Sari duniya ke bache jab pehda hote hai toh maa maa karke rohte hai ... yeh gadha cinema cinema karke roh raha tha
Trans: All the kids of the world cry mom mom when they are born ... this donkey was crying cinema cinema

Title: Judaai
Quote: Lalach bahut badi kamzori hai insaan ki
Trans: Greed is a very big weakness of humans

Title: God and Gun
Quote: Humne dekhe hai bahut dushmani karne waale ... waqt ki har saans se darne waale ... jiska haami hai khuda, kaun usse maar sake ... hum nahi bomb aur barood se marne waale
Trans: I have seen many people who are enemies ... people who are scared with every breathe of time ... one who has the support of god, who can kill him ... I am not someone who will die with bombs and gunpowder

Title: God and Gun
Quote: Koi kabil ho toh hum shaan-e-watan dete hai ... dhoondne waalon ko duniya bhi nayi dete hai
Trans: If someone is deserving then I will give my great country to him ... and if you look properly then I will also give you a new world

Title: God and Gun
Quote: Jab vichar ka deep bhuj jaata hai ... toh aachar andha ho jaata hai
Trans: When the candle of thinking blows off ... then mannerism becomes blind

Title: God and Gun
Quote: Rajneeti mein goonge aur behre bankar raho ... toh raj karoge
Trans: In politics if you stay dumb and deaf ... then you will rule

Title: Haseena Maan Jaayegi
Quote: Yeh duniya gham toh deti hai, lekin sharikh-e-gham nahi hoti ... aur is duniya mein kisi ke door jaane se na, mohabbat kam nahi hoti
Trans: This world gives you sorrow, but it doesn't participate in that sorrow ... and in this world just by someone going far away, the love doesn't decrease

Title: Haseena Maan Jaayegi
Quote: Tareef toh us khuda ki hai jisne yeh jahan banaya ... jisne aapko ladki waala aur hum mein ladke waala banaya
Trans: Let's praise the lord who has created this world ... and who has made you on the brides side and us on the grooms side

Title: Haseena Maan Jaayegi
Quote: Thoda roothegi, thoda cheekhegi, thoda chilayegi ... dil kehta hai ek din haseena maan jayegi
Trans: She will sulk a little, scream a little, shout a little ... but the heart says that one day she will agree

Title: Haseena Maan Jaayegi
Quote: Joh kaam maine itni umar mein nahi kiya ... tune itni si umar mein kar liya?
Trans: The work that I haven't done in so many years ... you have done that in such a small age?

Title: Gundaraj
Quote: De shiva var mohe, shubh karman se kabhoo na hatton ... na daroon bairi sauh jab chahe ladoon, nishchay kar apni jeet karoon
Trans: Oh power of god give me this boon, that I may never shirk from doing good deeds ... that I shall not fear when I go into combat, and be victorious with determination

Title: Gundaraj
Quote: Apna vasiyat nama banakar rakho ... kyun ki maut kisi bhi waqt tumhare ghar ka darwaza khatkhata sakti hai
Trans: Prepare and keep your will ready ... because death can knock on the door of your house anytime

Title: Gundaraj
Quote: Insaan ka itna sach bolna bhi acha nahi ... ki uski zubaan ko rokne ke liye uski saanson ko bandh karna pade
Trans: A person saying the truth always is also not good ... because it may become necessary to end his breathe in order to stop his words

Title: Kasam Paida Karne Wale Ki
Quote: Logon ko apni cheezein cheenne dega ... toh log tumhari zindagi tak cheen lenge
Trans: If you let people steal your things ... then people will steal your life also

Title: Kasam Paida Karne Wale Ki
Quote: Fiza bhi kuch nashe mein hai ... shabaab hai, sharaab hai ... joh yeh nahi toh zindagi azaab hi azaab hai
Trans: The breeze is intoxicated ... there is youth, there is alcohol ... and if these things are not there, then life is a punishment

Title: Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega
Quote: Ek umar si jee rahi ho, magar adhoori ... agar woh mil jaye, toh zindagi ho jaye poori
Trans: I am living since long, but incomplete ... if I get him, then my life will be complete

Title: Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega
Quote: Kal tak joh ajnabi tha, dil aaj ussi ko chahta hai ... zindagi dene waale tujhpe, mar jaane ko jee chahta hai
Trans: The one who was a stranger until yesterday, today the heart loves him ... oh god I wish to give my life for you

Title: Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega
Quote: Kyun mere pyar ka tum imtehaan lete ho ... tum meri jaan ho, kyun meri jaan lete ho
Trans: Why are you taking an exam of my love ... you are my love, why are you taking my life

Title: Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega
Quote: Insaan ka is duniya mein aana is baat ka signal hai ... ke koi hai joh sirf uski khatir is duniya mein aaya hai
Trans: The existence of a human in this world is a signal that ... there is someone who has come in this world just for them

Title: Hamara Dil Aapke Paas Hai
Quote: Khushkismati sirf ek baar darwaza khatkhatati hai ... lekin badkismati tab tak darwaza khatkhatati hai jab tak darwaza khul na jaye
Trans: Good luck only knocks on the door once ... but bad luck keeps knocking on the door until that door opens

Title: Hamara Dil Aapke Paas Hai
Quote: Izzat koi patni ko diya hua koi necklace nahi hai, college mein diya hua koi certificate nahi hai, locker mein chupakar rakhi koi jewellery nahi hai ... joh gava dene se chali jaati hai
Trans: Respect is not a necklace that you give to a wife, its not a certificate that you give in college, its not a jewellery that you hide in the locker ... which you lose it when it goes away

Title: Hamara Dil Aapke Paas Hai
Quote: Sukh aur dukh wohi samajh sakta hai jispar beetti hai
Trans: Happiness and sadness can only be understood by the one who goes through it

Title: Hamara Dil Aapke Paas Hai
Quote: Joh log khudse nahi darte ... yeh samaaj ussi se darta hai
Trans: People who are not scared of themselves ... this society is scared of them

Title: Mere Jeevan Saathi (2006)
Quote: Pyar toot jaye toh sirf dukh hota hai ... par vishvas toot jaye toh sab kuch khatam ho jata hai
Trans: When love breaks we only feel sad ... but when the trust breaks then everything ends

Title: Mere Jeevan Saathi (2006)
Quote: Main tumhe bhool jaon, yeh mumkin nahi ... aur tum mujhe bhool jao, yeh main kabhi hone nahi doongi
Trans: It is not possible that I'll forget you ... and I'll never let you forget me

Title: Mere Jeevan Saathi (2006)
Quote: Tumhare intezaar mein aasoon bhi sookh gaye ... joh sapne sanjoye, sare toot gaye
Trans: Even the tears have dried up in waiting for you ... and the dreams that I saw are all broken

Title: Mere Jeevan Saathi (2006)
Quote: Hum dono ek doosre se kabhi door nahi reh sakte ... kyun ki hum ek doosre ke dil mein rehte hai, ek doosre ki dhadkan mein baste hai, yaadon mein jeete hai
Trans: We both can never stay away from each other ... because we stay in each others heart, settle in each others heartbeat and live in each others memories

Title: Jalwa
Quote: Hafta lete lete police waalon ki ungliyan itni ghis gayi hai ... ki unmein na hathkadi lagane ki taqat hai aur na trigger dabane ki
Trans: By taking bribes the fingers of police have worn out so much that ... they don't have the strength to tie handcuffs and neither to press the trigger

Title: Jalwa
Quote: Jis din mujhe thoos saboot mil gaya ... tumhari zindagi ka aakhri panna main likhonga
Trans: The day I get sound evidence ... I will write the last page of your life

Title: Shikhar
Quote: Fayde ke liye ki gayi dosti ... sirf ghaata deti hai
Trans: Friendship that is done for profit ... can only give a loss

Title: Shikhar
Quote: Haath mein hai heeron ka haar ... aur hum dhoond rahe hai Zaveri Bazaar
Trans: We have a diamond necklace in the hand ... and we are looking for Zaveri Bazaar (jewellery market)

Title: Shikhar
Quote: Har kisi ka ek sapna hota hai ... par joh apne sapne doosro ke aasoonyo se poore karte hai ... unke sapne bhi aasoon ban jaate hai
Trans: Everyone has a dream ... but the people who fulfill their dreams with the tears of others ... even their dreams turn into tears

Title: Shikhar
Quote: Jaise hawa aur roshni ke aava gaman ke liye ghar mein khidki hoti hai ... ussi prakaar shareer mein hawa aur pani ke aava gaman ke liye dhoti hoti hai
Trans: Just like there is a window in the house so that wind and light can come and go ... just like that for the coming and going of wind and water in a body, we have loincloth

Title: Baaz: A Bird in Danger
Quote: Khaas samay par khaas kaam ke liye khaas insaan ko dhoond lena meri khaasiyat hai
Trans: It is my speciality to find the right person for the right job at the right time

Title: Baaz: A Bird in Danger
Quote: Aankhen joh dekhti hai ... woh hamesha sach nahi hota
Trans: Whatever the eyes see ... is not always the truth

Title: Baaz: A Bird in Danger
Quote: Yeh ahtiyad zaroori nahi sabhi ke liye ... ghadi ghadi ki khabar rakhna, do ghadi ke liye
Trans: It is not necessary for everyone ... to keep the track of time just for a couple of moments

Title: Baaz: A Bird in Danger
Quote: Jab mazaa lena ho toh main logon ko bulata hoon ... jab khabar leni ho toh main logon tak jaata hoon
Trans: When I want to have fun then I call people ... and when I want to meet them then I go to them

Title: Annarth
Quote: Bewajah log kahan marte hai ... yaar hi bewafai karte hai
Trans: People don't die without a reason ... it is friends who are unfaithful

Title: Annarth
Quote: Yeh dhanda hai na bewafaa aurat ki tarah hai ... bewafai par utar aaye toh kangaal kar deta hai ... aur wafaadari par utar aaye toh malamaal
Trans: This business is like an unfaithful woman ... if it comes to unfaithfulness then it will make you broke ... and if it comes to faithfulness then it will make you rich

Title: Annarth
Quote: Aadmi agar thode time ke liye pareshaan hai na ... toh matlab time kharab hai ... aur aadmi agar hamesha pareshaan hai na ... toh samajh lena ki aadmi kharaab hai
Trans: If a man is worried for sometime ... then it means his time is bad ... and if a man is worried always ... then understand that the man himself is bad

Title: Annarth
Quote: Is jahaan mein aaye ho toh kuch aaisa karo kadardaan ... ke jis gali se guzro toh awaaz aaye, abbajaan abbajaan
Trans: Since you have come in this world then do something that ...  sounds calling you Dad come from whichever street you pass through

Title: Apna Sapna Money Money
Quote: Jahan sach na chale wahan jhoot sahi ... aur jahan haq na mile wahan loot sahi
Trans: Say the lie where truth is not accepted ... and steal where you don't get your right

Title: Apna Sapna Money Money
Quote: Tu apne dimaag ko akal ka search warrant de ... aur agar phir bhi na maane toh gobar gas ka current de
Trans: Give your head the search warrant for a brain ... and if it still doesn't agree then give it a current of methane gas

Title: Apna Sapna Money Money
Quote: Casino mein haseeno ke saath hum sabke paseeno ka paisa udake bhaag gaya
Trans: He has blown away all our hard earned money with beautiful girls in the casino

Title: Apna Sapna Money Money
Quote: I love you ... do you love me? ... haan bolti toh you ... varna bahut hai in the queue
Trans: I love you ... do you love me? ... are you saying yes ... or else there are many others in the queue

Title: F.A.L.T.U
Quote: Life se badi school koi nahi hai ... aur is school mein har subject available hai
Trans: There is no bigger school than life ... and in this school every subject is available

Title: F.A.L.T.U
Quote: Darr insaan ke liye bahut zaroori hai ... woh tumhe hadh mein rakhta hai
Trans: Fear is very important for a person ... it keeps you within limits

Title: F.A.L.T.U
Quote: Children are never useless ... it's just that they are used less
Trans: Children are never useless ... it's just that they are used less

Title: Wake Up Sid
Quote: (Tum karte kya ho vaise?) - Main apne dad ke paise kharch karta hoon
Trans: (By the way what do you do?) - I spend my dad's money

Title: Wake Up Sid
Quote: Goals paane ki khushi tabhi mehsoos hoti hai ... jab usse kisi ke saath share kar sako
Trans: You feel the happiness of achieving goals ... when you can share that with someone

Title: Virasat
Quote: Thakur waqt ke hisaab se nahi chalte ... waqt Thakur ke hisaab se chalta hai
Trans: The lord doesn't move according to time ... time moves according to the lord

Title: Virasat
Quote: Khoon ek baar karo ya sau baar ... phansi sirf ek baar hoti hai
Trans: No matter if you kill once or a hundred times ... you are hanged to death only once

Title: The Train (2007)
Quote: Kuch zakhm aaise hote hai joh bhar toh jaate hai ... lekin zindagi bhar ek nishaan banke reh jaate hai
Trans: Some wounds are such that they do heal ... but they remain as a mark for life

Title: The Train (2007)
Quote: Chance diya nahi jaata ... chance liya jaata hai
Trans: You don't give a chance ... you take a chance

Title: The Train (2007)
Quote: Shaadi ke baad toh ajnabi apne ban jaate hai ... aur apne ajnabi
Trans: After marriage strangers become our dear ones ... and our dear ones become strangers

Title: The Train (2007)
Quote: Yahan pe baat boli se nahi ... goli se chalti hai re
Trans: Here you don't say things with your mouth ... you say them with a bullet

Title: Style
Quote: Hum hum hai ... baki sab pani kam hai
Trans: I am great ... and everyone else is nothing

Title: Style
Quote: Behen ke ghar bhai kutta ... aur sasur ke ghar jamai kutta
Trans: A brother is a dog in his sister's house ... and a son-in-law is a dog in his father-in-laws house

Title: Agent Vinod
Quote: Jhoot main bol nahi sakta ... aur sach tum pakad logi
Trans: I can't say the lie ... and you'll catch the truth

Title: Agent Vinod
Quote: Sharaabi hai, laundibaaz hai ... ek gandi aadat aur hai ... imaandar hai
Trans: He is an alcoholic, he runs behind girls ... he has one more bad habit ... he is honest

Title: Khatta Meetha
Quote: Aadmi ki shakal achchi na ho na ... toh bhagwan kehta hai baatein achchi karni chahiye
Trans: When a person doesn't have a good face ... then god says that he should talk good things

Title: Khatta Meetha
Quote: America mein jao toh American milenge, Germany mein jao toh German milenge, France mein jao toh aapko Frenchmen milenge, England mein jao toh Englishmen milenge ... aur India mein jao toh aapko milenge Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Malayali, Bengali ... Indian kahan hai?
Trans: If you go to America you'll get Americans, if you go to Germany you'll get Germans, if you go to France you'll get Frenchmen, if you go to England you'll get Englishmen ... and if you go to India then you'll get Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Malayali, Bengali ... where are the Indians?

Title: Khatta Meetha
Quote: Is desh ka sabse bada shraap hai bureaucracy
Trans: Bureaucracy is the biggest curse of this country

Title: Sivaji: The Boss
Quote: Jhund mein toh soovar aate hai ... sher akela hi aata hai
Trans: Pigs come in a group ... a tiger comes alone

Title: Sivaji: The Boss
Quote: Udh udh ke maarne mein main Superman hoon ... latak latak ke maarne mein main Spiderman hoon ... dhoond dhoond ke maarne mein main Batman hoon ... aur main tumhari haddi pasli choor choor karne waala doberman hoon
Trans: I am Superman when it comes to flying and hitting ... I am Spiderman when it comes to hanging and hitting ... I am Batman when it comes to finding and hitting ... and I am the doberman who will smash your bones

Title: Sivaji: The Boss
Quote: Patri par chalti hai rail gaadi, Sivaji ko chuha toh ho jayegi dead body ... chote bache dekhte hai PoGo, Sivaji ko mat chedo gogo ... che ke baad aata hai saat, Sivaji dega sabko maat
Trans: A train runs on tracks, if you touch Sivaji then you will be a dead body ... small children watch PoGo (channel), don't tease Sivaji go from here ... after six comes seven, Sivaji will defeat you all

Title: Mausam (2011)
Quote: Is zameen aur is aasman se pare ... jahan na waqt ho na tumhare mere sivah koi aur ... sirf ek feeling ho, ek jazba ho ... ki tum mujh mein ho aur main tum mein
Trans: Far from this earth and sky ... where there is no time and no one else other than you and me ... there is just one feeling, one passion ... that you are within me and I am within you

Title: Mausam (2011)
Quote: Aapka koi apna chala jaye ... toh zindagi badi choti lagne lagti hai
Trans: When we lose a dear one ... then life starts to look very small

Title: Mausam (2011)
Quote: Tujhpe ladki marne ke bajai ... tujhe dekh ke mar jayegi
Trans: Instead of girls dying for you ... girls will die looking at you

Title: Mausam (2011)
Quote: The Sun just sets if at all ... never dies
Trans: The Sun just sets if at all ... never dies

Title: Baarish
Quote: Aurat zindagi mein ek hi baar, ek hi mard ko apna kehti hai
Trans: Only once in life a woman calls a man as her own

Title: Baarish
Quote: Ghar ki shobha toh ghar mein rehne waalon se hoti hai
Trans: The grace of a house comes from the people living in it

Title: Baarish
Quote: Bhagwan ne tumhe overtime karke banaya hai
Trans: God has created you by doing overtime

Title: Udaan
Quote: Joh lehron se aage nazar dekh paati, toh tum jaan lete main kya sochta hoon ... woh awaaz tumko bhi joh bhed jaati, toh tum jaan lete main kya sochta hoon ... zid ka tumhare joh parda sarakta, khidkiyon se aage bhi tum dekh paate ... aankhon se aadaton ki joh palke hatate, toh tum jaan lete main kya sochta hoon
Trans: If you could see beyond the waves, then you would have known what I think ... if you would have heard that voice, then you would have known what I think ... if the curtain of your stubbornness moves, then you would have seen beyond the window ... if you would have moved the eyelids of your habits from your eyes, then you would have known what I think

Title: Udaan
Quote: Meri tarah hota agar khud par zara bharosa, toh kuch door tum bhi saath saath aate ... rang meri aankhon ka baantte zara sa, toh kuch door tum bhi saath saath aate ... nasha aasman ka joh choomta tumhe, hasratein tumhari naya janam paati ... khud doosre janam mein meri udaan chhoone, kuch door tum bhi saath saath aate
Trans: If only you trusted yourself a little bit like me, then you would have come some distance with me ... if only you would have shared the color of my eyes, then you would have come some distance with me ... if only the allure of the sky kissed you, your hope would have found a new life ... and to touch my flight in the next life, you would have come some distance with me

Title: Udaan
Quote: Choti choti chitrayi yaadein, bichhi hui hai lamho ki lawn pe ... nange pair unpar chalte chalte itni door aa gaye hai ... ki ab bhool gaye hai joote kahaan utare the ... edi komal thi jab aaye the, thodi si nazuk hai abhi bhi aur nazuk hi rahegi ... in khatti meethi yaadon ki shararat jab tak inhe gudgudati rahe ... sach bhool gaye hai joote kahan utaare the ... par lagta hai ki ab unki zaroorat nahi
Trans: All the little shreds of memories are scattered on the lawn of stolen moments ... I've come so far walking on them bare feet ... that now I've forgotten where I left my shoes ... my soles were soft when I came, and they are still weak and they will remain weak ... for as long as the pranks of these bittersweet memories go on tickling them ... truly I've forgotten where I left my shoes ... but now I think I won't need them

Title: Udaan
Quote: Har baal ki khaal ki yeh chaal bhi kha jaaye ... iske haath padh jaaye toh mahiney saal bhi kha jaaye ... kisi behal ka bacha haal joh haal kha jaaye ... bemaut marte mann ka yeh malaal kha jaaye ... Lalu ka laal kha jaaye, naxal baari ki naal kha jaaye, bachpan ka dhamaal kha jaaye, budhape ki shawl kha jaaye ... haya toh chhodo behaya ki chaal bhi kha jaaye ... aur agar parosa ja sake toh khayal bhi kha jaaye
Trans: He can even eat the covering of the hair's skin ... if he can get it then he will even eat months and years ... he can even eat the remaining well-being of someone unwell ... he can even eat the sadness of an untimely dying heart ... he can eat the son of Lalu, he can eat the guns of naxalites, he can eat the fun of childhood, he can eat the shawl of old age ... leave aside shyness, he can even eat the style of a shameless ... and if it's possible to put it on a plate, he'll even eat a thought

Title: Mela
Quote: Uske gaal, uske baal arre kya kamaal ... aur uski chaal karde halaal ... uski kalai hai ram duhai, pure malai ... aur uska badan phoolon ka chaman ... aur uski aankhen sone ke button
Trans: Her cheeks, her hair are wonderful ... and her walking style kills ... her wrist is soft, just like pure sweet ... and her body is a garden of flowers ... and her eyes are golden buttons

Title: Mela
Quote: Dost dost na raha, pyar pyar na raha ... daru ke sivah zindagi mein koi karobar na raha
Trans: A friend is no longer a friend, love is no longer love ... now there is no business in life other than drinking alcohol

Title: Mela
Quote: Joh aurat ki hifazat karta hai woh sirf pati ya aashiq nahi hota ... mard ka ek aur roop bhi hota hai ... jisse bhai kehte hai
Trans: The one who protects a woman is not only a husband or a lover ... a man has one more guise ... which we call as a brother

Title: Mela
Quote: Bade beabroo hoke unke kooche se hum nikle ... humne toh ki wafaa pe wafaa pe wafaa non-stop ... phir bhi woh bewafaa nikle
Trans: I left with a lot of humiliation from her street ... I had been faithful non-stop ... but still she turned out to be unfaithful

Title: Naya Andaz
Quote: Duniya ki har jagah mohabbat ki nigahon mein pyari hoti hai
Trans: Every place of the world is beautiful in the sight of love

Title: Naya Andaz
Quote: Bekaar aadmi phatte huye tube ki tarah hota hai ... lekin mushkil toh yeh hai ki tube ka puncture phir bhi judh sakta hai ... lekin bekaari ka puncture nahi judhta
Trans: A jobless man is like tube with a hole ... but the problem is that puncture of a tube can be fixed ... but the puncture of joblessness cannot be fixed

Title: Naya Andaz
Quote: Zindagi ki raahon mein thokarein wohi khate hai ... joh oonche hokar chalte hai
Trans: Only those people stumble on the paths of life ... who walk with a tall posture

Title: Naya Andaz
Quote: Kismat aadmi ko dokha de sakti hai ... lekin bhagwan aadmi ko dokha nahi deta
Trans: Destiny can betray a man ... but god doesn't betray a man

Title: Rudraksh
Quote: Kabhi kabhi jannat aur duniya ke beech ka fasla ... sirf ek kadam hota hai
Trans: Sometimes the distance between heaven and the world ... is just one step

Title: Rudraksh
Quote: Main is duniya ka bhut aur bhavishya hoon
Trans: I am the past and the future of this world

Title: Entertainment
Quote: Jahan kabootar ka naam Masakali ho sakta hai ... zameen pe rehkar ghode ka naam Badal ho sakta hai ... aadmi ka naam Mahela Jayawardene ho sakta hai ... toh inka naam Entertainment kyun nahi ho sakta hai
Trans: When a pigeon's name can be Masakali ... staying on the ground a horse's name can be Badal (cloud) ... a man's name can be Mahela Jayawardene ... then why can't his name be Entertainment

Title: Entertainment
Quote: Waqt ka pata nahi chalta hai apno ke saath ... lekin apno ka pata chal jaata hai waqt ke saath
Trans: We don't come to know about time when we are with our dear ones ... but we come to know about our dear ones with time

Title: Entertainment
Quote: Abhe mobile tower bulaya tha ... yeh sim card kahan se aa gaya
Trans: I had called for a mobile tower ... where did this sim card come from

Title: Entertainment
Quote: Ab yeh slumdog ... millionaire ban gaya!
Trans: Now this slumdog ... has become a millionaire!

Title: Shor
Quote: Jeevan ka matlab toh aana aur jaana hai
Trans: The meaning of life is to come and go

Title: Shor
Quote: Tum gham-e-beti mein dubli na hui ... main bekaari mein mota ho gaya ... tum balti se ho gayi drum ... main glass se lota ho gaya
Trans: You didn't become slim in the memory of your daughter ... and I became fat in joblessness ... you turned from a bucket into a drum ... and I turned from a glass into a tumbler

Title: Akaash Vani
Quote: Humne joh ki thi mohabbat aaj bhi hai ... teri zulfon ke saaye ki chahat aaj bhi hai ... raat katti hai aaj bhi khayalon mein tere ... deewanon si woh meri haalat aaj bhi hai ... kisi aur ke tasavvur ko uthti nahi, baimaan aankhon mein thodi si sharafat aaj bhi hai ... chaha ki ek baar chahe phir chhod dena tu ... dil todh tujhe jaane ki izaazat aaj bhi hai
Trans: The love that I had still exists today ... the passion for the shade from your hair still exists today ... even today the night passes by with your thoughts ... and my condition is like crazy even today ... I cannot imagine anyone else, because there is a little bit of honesty left in those eyes even today ... I wished that you loved me for once and then leave ... since the permission for you to break my heart and go still exists today

Title: Akaash Vani
Quote: Koi galati itni badi nahi hoti ... jisse zinda rakhne ke liye zindagi ka gala ghoont diya jaye
Trans: No mistake is so big that ... to keep it alive we need to squeeze the throat of life

Title: Akaash Vani
Quote: Woh aaj humse mile anjaano ki tarah ... hum yunhi raah take baithe the deewanon ki tarah ... har nigaah mein aur door chale jaate hai ... humse nazar churate hai baimaanon ki tarah ... hum yunhi raah take baithe the deewanon ki tarah
Trans: She met me today like a stranger ... I was waiting for her like crazy ... in every sight she kept going farther away ... she was avoiding me with dishonesty ... I was waiting for her like crazy

Title: Akaash Vani
Quote: Woh kehte hain kabhi aur, kabhi aur hota nahi ... dil bhi toh nadan unke sivah kahin aur khota nahi ... hum mangte hai ek saans, ek dhadkan, ek nigaah ... woh kabhi aur de jaate hai ... par yeh kambakht kabhi aur, kabhi aur hota nahi
Trans: She says sometime else, but that sometime never comes ... even my silly heart doesn't go anywhere else other than her ... I ask for one breathe, one heartbeat, one sight ... but this crazy sometime else never comes

Title: Bombay To Goa
Quote: Rang aur roop toh bhagwan deta hai ... lekin uski hifazat karna apne haat mein hai
Trans: God gives us colour and looks ... but it is in our hands to protect that

Title: Bombay To Goa
Quote: Khili thi chaandni, charon taraf pani barasta tha ... main jab pehda hua, toh meri maa roti thi aur baap hasta tha
Trans: There was moonlight and water was pouring from everywhere ... when I was born, my mom was crying and my dad was laughing

Title: Iqbal
Quote: Dimaag aur dil jab ek saath kaam karte hai na ... toh farak nahi padta hai ki dimaag kaunsa hai aur dil kaunsa hai
Trans: When the mind and the heart work together ... then it doesn't matter which is the mind and which is the heart

Title: Iqbal
Quote: Yeh dimaag ka khel hai joh dil se khela jaata hai
Trans: This is a game of the mind that is played from the heart

Title: Iqbal
Quote: Hum sab is duniya mein koi ek khaas kaam karne ke liye bheje gaye hai
Trans: Each one of us has been sent in this world to do one special thing

Title: Mr. Natwarlal
Quote: Is mein sirf itni zindagi baki chhodna ... ki yeh apni maut apni aankhon se dekh sake
Trans: Only leave that much life in him ... so that he can see his own death with his own eyes

Title: Mr. Natwarlal
Quote: Har chor apni maut marta nahi ... maara jaata hai
Trans: Every thief doesn't die his own death ... he gets killed

Title: Mr. Natwarlal
Quote: Tu toh apne saathiyon ko bhi dokha de sakta hai ... lekin main apne dushman se kiye huye vaade ko bhi poora karta hoon
Trans: You can even cheat your friends ... but I fulfill the promises that I have made even to my enemies

Title: Dhan Dhana Dhan Goal
Quote: Jeetna bhi ek aadat hoti hai ... joh dheere dheere aati hai
Trans: Winning is also a habit ... that comes slowly

Title: Dhan Dhana Dhan Goal
Quote: Zindagi mein insaan ko sirf do ya char aaise mauke milte hai ... joh woh keh sakta hai ki humne zindagi mein kuch kiya hai
Trans: In life a person gets two or four such opportunities ... where he can say that I have done something in life

Title: Dhan Dhana Dhan Goal
Quote: Sirf Hindustan chhoda hai ... Hindustaniyat nahi
Trans: I have only left India ... not being an Indian

Title: Pyaar To Hona Hi Tha
Quote: Woh log bahut badnaseeb hote hai jinhe pyar nahi milta ... lekin unse bhi zyada badnaseeb woh log hote hai jinhe pyar milta toh hai ... magar woh log usse pehchaan nahi paate aur usse kho dete hai
Trans: People who don't get love are very unfortunate ... but more unfortunate than those are the people who get love ... but they don't recognize it and lose it

Title: Pyaar To Hona Hi Tha
Quote: Insaan ko apne kal mein nahi ... aaj mein jeena chahiye
Trans: A person should live in his present ... not his past

Title: Pyaar To Hona Hi Tha
Quote: Kanoon ka dost mera dost ... kanoon ka dushman mera dushman
Trans: A friend of the law is my friend ... and an enemy of the law is my enemy

Title: Pyaar To Hona Hi Tha
Quote: Har insaan ko zindagi mein ek baar pyar zaroor karna chahiye ... pyar insaan ko bahut achcha bana deta hai
Trans: Every person should fall in love at least once in life ... because love makes a person very good

Title: Jallaad
Quote: Shehar jalta hai toh jalne do, yeh aag humne hi lagai hai ... log marte hai toh marne do, yeh apni khudai hai
Trans: If the city is burning then let it burn, since I have started the fire ... if the people are dying then let them die, because this is my virtue

Title: Jallaad
Quote: Sachi baat kehne ke liye himmat ki zaroorat nahi ... himmat ki zaroorat hai sachi baat sunne ke liye
Trans: To say the truth you don't need courage ... you need courage to listen to the truth

Title: Jallaad
Quote: Tujhe maaf karne waale ko toh bhagwan bhi maaf nahi karega
Trans: Even god will not forgive the person who forgives you

Title: Jallaad
Quote: Mera jaam rahe meri shaam rahe ... mere pehlu mein meri jaan rahe
Trans: Let there be an evening with drinks ... and let there be my life on my side

Title: Lamhe
Quote: Sabhi badhe hote hai ... magar koi apne badhon se bada nahi hota
Trans: Everyone grows up ... but no one can become bigger than their elders

Title: Lamhe
Quote: Sawaal ke jawaab mein sawaal nahi kiya jaata
Trans: You shouldn't ask question when answering a question

Title: Lamhe
Quote: Khane ka shaunk aapko bhi hai, khane ka shaunk mujhe bhi hai ... ghumne ka shaunk aapko bhi hai, ghumne ka shaunk mujhe bhi hai ... gappe ladane ka shaunk aapko bhi hai, gappe ladane ka shaunk mujhe bhi hai ... aur sabse zyada important baat yeh hai ... ki hasne ka shaunk aapko bhi hai aur hasne ka shaunk mujhe bhi hai
Trans: You love to eat and I love to eat also ... you love to go around and I love to go around also ... you love to talk and I love to talk also ... and the most important thing is that ... you love to laugh and I love to laugh also

Title: Lamhe
Quote: Jinhe ulfat ki khushiyan mil sake woh shaunk se lele ... hum mein chhodo hum toh apni kismat aazma behte
Trans: Those who can get the happiness of love, get it ... but leave me alone since I have tried my luck

Title: Doodh Ka Karz
Quote: Mujrim kitni bhi hoshyari kare ... saboot ko zameen ki kok mein dafan kyun na karde ... lekin ek na ek din uska gunaah uske samne aaine ki tarah khada ho jaata hai
Trans: No matter how smart a criminal is ... and even if buries the evidence in the ground ... but one day his crimes will come and stand in front of him like a mirror

Title: Doodh Ka Karz
Quote: Jab baat apni maut ki aati hai na ... toh aadmi ke dimaag ki sari khidkiyan khul jaati hai
Trans: When it comes to your own death ... then all the windows of a persons mind open up

Title: Doodh Ka Karz
Quote: Bahut khush hona bhi achchi baat nahi hai ... aasoon nikal aate hai
Trans: It's not good to be very happy ... because tears come out

Title: Doodh Ka Karz
Quote: Sharifon ki izzat paison se zyada keemti hoti hai
Trans: Respect for honest people is more expensive than money

Title: Andaaz
Quote: Yeh meri himmat kahan ki main aapse shikva karoon ... aap hona chahte hai bewafaa, ho jahiye ... aapke kadamon par laakar rakh di hai dil aur jaan ... meri mohabbat ki duniya ke khuda ho jahiye
Trans: I don't have the courage to complain against you ... if you want to become unfaithful, then so be it ... I have kept my heart and life in your feet ... please become the god of my love life

Title: Andaaz
Quote: Us intezaar se kya gila joh tere deedar pe khatam ho
Trans: I have no complaints against the wait that ends with your sight

Title: Andaaz
Quote: Isse mujhpar vishvas tha ... aur mujhe iske vishvas pe vishvas tha
Trans: She believed in me ... and I believed in her belief

Title: Andaaz
Quote: Yaadon par pehre nahi bichai ja sakte
Trans: You cannot put guard against memories

Title: Raja Natwarlal
Quote: Confidence khel mein jaan zaroor dalta hai ... lekin overconfidence jaan le leta hai
Trans: Confidence definitely puts life into a game ... but overconfidence kills

Title: Raja Natwarlal
Quote: Risk aur opportunity ke beech mein hi toh chance milta hai ... aur joh us chance ke saath romance karta hai ... wohi asli raja kehlata hai
Trans: You get a chance between risk and opportunity ... and the one who does romance with that chance ... is called a true king

Title: Raja Natwarlal
Quote: Life is paise ki tarah hai ... bas ek baar kharch kar paoge
Trans: Life is like money ... you can only spend it once

Title: Raja Natwarlal
Quote: Main paidahishi 420 hoon, jamoora nahi ... kartab dikhake haath nahi failata ... jaal failata hoon aur phir us jaal pe maal
Trans: I am a born cheater, not a sidekick ... I don't spread my hands after a show ... I spread a trap and then I collect money in that trap

Title: Do Aankhen Barah Hath
Quote: Naag bola main bada main bada ... Shiv Shankar ke gale mein pada ... bakht bola tu kaise bada ... tere phan pe toh Kanhaiya khada
Trans: The snake said I'm big ... while he was on the neck of Lord Shiva ... the devotee asked how are you big ... because Lord Krishna is standing on your head

Title: Do Aankhen Barah Hath
Quote: Ravan bola main bada main bada main bada ... Navagraha mere singhasan ke neeche pada ... bakht bola tu kaika bada ... tu toh che mahina Bali ki kankh mein pada
Trans: Ravan said I'm big ... the nine planets are below my throne ... the devotee asked how are you big ... you were lying for six months in the armpit of (king) Bali

Title: Do Aankhen Barah Hath
Quote: Pedh chahe babool ka ho ya chandan ka ... kulhadi sabko kaatti hai
Trans: Whether the tree is Acacia or Sandalwood ... the axe cuts all

Title: Do Aankhen Barah Hath
Quote: Main har daur mein har nasal ke kaatil dekhe ... main mohabbat hoon meri umar badi hai yaaron
Trans: I have seen all types of killers in every era ... but friends I am love and I have a long life

Title: Kyaa Super Kool Hain Hum
Quote: Apna impression macho-de!
Trans: Give your impression as a macho!

Title: Kyaa Super Kool Hain Hum
Quote: (Tum ladki mein sabse pehle kya dekhte ho) - Woh toh depend karta hai na, ki ladki aa rahi hai ... ki jaa rahi hai
Trans: (What do you look in a girl first) - That depends if the girl is coming ... or going

Title: Kyaa Super Kool Hain Hum
Quote: Kahin two-some aur kahin three-some ... aur ab tak main hand-some
Trans: Somewhere there is two-some and somewhere there is three-some ... and I am still with hand-some

Title: Kyaa Super Kool Hain Hum
Quote: Lagta hai meri destiny mein wedding ring nahi ... sirf suffering hai
Trans: Looks like there is no wedding ring in my destiny ... just suffering

Title: Jaane Tu Ya Jaane Na
Quote: Ek arse ke baad jab log milte hai toh ... har mulaqat mein ek choti si kahani hoti hai
Trans: When people meet after a long time ... then every meeting has one small story in it

Title: Jaane Tu Ya Jaane Na
Quote: Mujhe ladna nahi tha ... par tune koi choice nahi chhoda
Trans: I didn't want to fight ... but you left me with no other choice

Title: Jaane Tu Ya Jaane Na
Quote: Agar 'L' word kahoonga na ... toh 'GPL' khaoonga
Trans: If I say the love word ... then she will kick my ass

Title: Jaane Tu Ya Jaane Na
Quote: Teri mom ne kabhi sabun se tera mooh nahi dhoya kya? ... kitni gaaliyan deti hai
Trans: Didn't your mom ever wash your face with soap? ... how much you curse

Title: Badal
Quote: Jab tak meri saansein chalengi ... mera inteqam zinda rahega
Trans: Until I breathe ... my revenge will stay alive

Title: Badal
Quote: Mere bayaan ka ek ek lafz ... Gita aur Ramayan ki tarah pavitra aur sach hai ... aur sach ke sivah kuch nahi hai
Trans: Every word of my statement ... is pure and true like the Bhagavad Gita and the Ramayana ... and nothing but the truth

Title: Badal
Quote: Maut se kiski rishteydari hai ... aaj meri toh kal teri baari hai
Trans: Death is not related to anyone ... today it is my turn and tomorrow it will be yours

Title: Badal
Quote: Gaadi mein aur biwi mein kya farak hai yaar ... chalte chalte gaadi bighad jaati hai, behte behte biwi bighad jaati hai
Trans: My friend there is no difference between a car and a wife ... a car goes bad as you drive it and a wife goes bad just like that

Title: Na Tum Jaano Na Hum
Quote: Mera ek vishvas hai ... mujhe lagta hai ki bhagwan ne hum sabke liye kuch na kuch tay kar rakha hai ... wohi jaanta hai aur wohi faisla karta hai ki hum kab, kahan, kisse aur kaise milenge
Trans: I believe in one thing ... that god has decided something or the other for each one of us ... and that he knows and he decides when, where, with whom and how will we meet

Title: Na Tum Jaano Na Hum
Quote: Woh wahi hai joh kabhi kabhi mere khayalon mein aata hai ... jise soochkar hi muskurane ka mann karta hai ... jiski awaaz meri har saans pehchaanti hai ... dil ko ussi ka intezaar hai ... jise meri tarah pyar se pyar hai
Trans: He is one who sometimes comes in my dreams ... thinking about whom I feel like smiling ... whose voice is recognized by every breathe of mine ...  my heart is waiting for him ... and just like me he loves to love

Title: Na Tum Jaano Na Hum
Quote: Kabhi kabhi koi dhun sunne ke liye kisi saaz ki zaroorat nahi hoti ... phoolon ke khilne ke liye baarish ki zaroorat nahi hoti ... dil ki awaaz sunne ke liye lafzon ki zaroorat nahi hoti
Trans: Sometimes to listen to a tune you don't need an instrument ... for flowers to blossom you don't need the rains ... and to hear the voice of the heart you don't need words

Title: Na Tum Jaano Na Hum
Quote: Pyar toh bas ho jaata hai, kaise? ... na tum jaano na hum
Trans: How does love just happens by itself? ... neither do you know and neither do I

Title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
Quote: Itna susu laate kahan se ho tum?
Trans: Where do you get so much urine from?

Title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa

Trans: The smell of Asafetida and the desire in love ... cannot be hidden

Title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa

Trans: You consider your belief as the truth ... and I only believe in the truth

Title: Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai
Quote: Jab mujhe pyar se pyar tha, tab tum bahut pasand thi ... ab jab mujhe pyar hi pasand nahi, toh tum kaise pasand aaogi?
Trans: When I was in love with love, then I liked you a lot ... and now that I don't like love itself, then how can I like you?

Title: Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai
Quote: Pyar amrit hota hai agar safal hua toh ... nahi toh wohi pyar zehar ban jaata hai
Trans: Love is immortal if it's successful ... or else that same love turns into poison

Title: Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai
Quote: Pyar aadmi ko pagal bana deta hai, deewana bana deta hai, khooni bana deta hai ... magar issi pyar ne mujh jaise pagal ko ek insaan bana diya
Trans: Love makes a person go mad, makes him go crazy, makes him a killer ... but this love has made a mad person like me into a human

Title: Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai
Quote: Love is not heart of life ... it is only part of life
Trans: Love is not heart of life ... it is only part of life

Title: Dushman

Trans: May god punish the people who made the motor vehicle ... it is said truly that people who drive a motor vehicle have become homeless

Title: Dushman

Trans: When you feel remorseful from the heart then all sins are wiped clean

Title: Cash

Trans: Sometimes the fun in winning is not that great ... as the fun that you get in letting others win

Title: Cash
Quote: Ya rab na woh samjhe na samajhenge meri baat ... de aur na dil unko, toh de mujhko zabaan
Trans: Oh god she hasn't and she will not understand my point ... don't give her any more heart, instead give me the words to explain

Title: Lekar Hum Deewana Dil
Quote: Hero gaana gaake khush rehta hai ... lekin villain ko wohi chahiye hota hai joh mujhe chahiye
Trans: A hero is happy by singing a song ... but a villain needs what I need

Title: Lekar Hum Deewana Dil

Trans: Do roses pour from your potty?

Title: Jayantabhai Ki Luv Story

Trans: If someone fails in Mumbai ... then the problem is not in Mumbai ... it's in them

Trans: When everything settles down for the hero ... bloody only then does the villain make his entry

Title: Jayantabhai Ki Luv Story
Quote: Badhe sheharon mein logon ke ghar hi nahi ... dil bhi bahut chote hote hai
Trans: In big cities not only people have small homes ... but they also have small hearts

Title: Jayantabhai Ki Luv Story

Trans: Bloody bench breaker!

Title: Avtaar

Trans: With money you can buy every passion, every moment of life

Title: Avtaar
Quote: Kya husn ne samjha hai, kya ishq ne jaana hai ... hum khaak nasheeno ki thokar mein zamana hai
Trans: What has beauty understood, what does love know ... the world is a captive of people like us

Title: Avtaar
Quote: Bada aadmi toh woh hota hai joh doosron ko chota nahi samajhta
Trans: A person is considered big when he doesn't consider others to be small

Quote: Retire toh aadmi ko us din hona chahiye ... jab upar waale ka bulava aa jaye

Trans: Only those people have the right to throw stones on the people who have committed sins ... who have not committed sins themselves

Trans: This coal mine is a python ... which swallows countless workers everyday and chews them, crushes them, smashes them ... it sucks every drop of life from their body ... and then spits them out in the form of a dead body

Trans: There are some birds who are locked in the cage of situation, but they are not helpless ... they have so much strength in their wings that they fly away with the cage itself

Trans: When 10 assholes die then one dog is born ... when 100 dogs die then one pig is born ... when 1000 pigs die then one pimp is born ... and when 100,000 pimps die then one dirty politician like you is born

Trans: Instead of this uniform I'll put the attire of wounds on your body ... and then you'll flutter so much with pain that after that even if you taste death, then you'll say ... it wasn't fun

Quote: Joh shaksh mujhse khud itna pyar karte huye bhi ... sirf meri khushi ke liye apne pyar ko kurbaan kar sakta hai ... mere dil pe haq sirf ussi ka hai
Trans: A person who loves me so much ... and who can sacrifice his love just for my happiness ... only he has the right on my heart

Quote: Pata nahi duniya ke kis kone se aayi thi ... aur meri duniya ban gayi thi
Trans: I don't know from which corner of the world she came from ... and she became my world

Trans: There is only one proof of god's love and faith in this world ... which grows in the heart of a mother as motherly love

Title: Sone Pe Suhaaga

Trans: People who speak less, usually are dangerous ... that's why a smart person should always be careful of a silent enemy

Trans: The strength in the arms is god's gift

Trans: Money is necessary in life ... just as much as love is necessary in life

Trans: A person should not have the happiness to achieve something and neither the sorrow to lose something

Quote: Is duniya mein koi kisi ka dost nahi hai ... sab paison ke dost hai
Trans: In this world no one is a friend of anyone ... everyone is a friend of money

Trans: If you don't tease a beautiful girl ... then that also is disrespectful to her

Trans: A wrong thing can never have a right reason

Trans: Everything that you can see is not always the truth

Title: Samay: When Time Strikes

Trans: A persons biggest win is hidden within his loss

Title: Samay: When Time Strikes

Trans: What is right or wrong in this world ... only that person can decide who has the courage, the self confidence, the conviction to take that decision

Title: Zameen
Quote: Bheek mein mile desh aur daan mein mile hathyaron ke dum par itna bhaunkna theek nahi
Trans: It is not good to bark a lot on the basis of a country that you got by begging and weapons that you got by charity

Title: Zameen
Quote: Agar ek maut se nau jaane bachti hai, toh bachani chahiye ... yahi army ka asool hai
Trans: If you can save 9 lives with one death, then you should have saved them ... this is the rule of the army

Title: Zameen
Quote: Ateet hamare bas mein nahi hota hai ... na hi bhavishya hamare kabze mein hota hai ... toh uske baare mein soch ke kya fayda? ... sirf ek cheez par hamara control hota hai ... woh hai aaj, yeh pal joh hamara hai
Trans: The past is not within our control ... and neither do we have any control of the future ... then what is the use to think about it? ... there is only thing that we have control on ... and that is the present, this moment which is ours

Title: Ek Thi Daayan
Quote: Daayan raat ki rani hoti hai
Trans: A witch is the queen of the night

Title: Ek Thi Daayan
Quote: Ek daayan ki saari shakti uski chhoti mein bandh hoti hai ... aur ek pechaaz ki saari shakti uski gardan mein bandh hoti hai
Trans: A witch has all her powers tied up in her hair ... and a demon has all his powers tied up inside his neck

Title: Ek Thi Daayan
Quote: Ek baar kisi daayan ke saath so lo ... toh phir kisi aur ke saath neend hi nahi aati
Trans: Once you sleep with a witch ... then you'll not be able to sleep with anyone else

Title: Ek Thi Daayan
Quote: Dono hamare andar hai ... achcha bhi aur bura bhi ... yeh hamare upar hai, hum kisko chune aur kiska saath de
Trans: Both things are within us ... the good and the bad ... it's up to us, what we select and what we stay on the side with

Title: Heartless
Quote: Mere marne ke baad mera dil nikaal lena ... hai kisi aur ki amanat ... kahin saath jal na jaye
Trans: Take my heart out after I die ... it is someone else's deposit ... so that it doesn't burn with me

Title: Heartless
Quote: Har insaan ka apna safar hota hai ... thodi der ke liye kisi aur ke saath judh jaane se ... uska safar apna nahi ho jaata hai
Trans: Every person has his own journey ... if we spend some time with someone else ... then their journey doesn't become ours

Title: Heartless
Quote: Yeh kaisi khwahish, yeh kaisa ehsaas hai ... joh waakif na tha kal tak woh har lamha ab mere pass hai ... yeh kaunsa rang hai, yeh kiska sang hai, yeh kaisa saaz hai, yeh kiski awaaz hai ... kyun neend ab pareshan si aati hai ... kyun har saans mein uski khushboo utar jaati hai ... tahruff toh abhi nahi hai usse phir har waqt kyun woh aas pass hai ... yeh kaisi khwahish, yeh kaisa ehsaas hai
Trans: What wish is this, what a feeling is this ... today I have every moment that I wasn't aware of until yesterday ... which colour is this, whose company is this, which instrument is this, whose voice is this ... why is it that I am unable to sleep ... why is that I smell her fragrance in every breathe of mine ... why is it that she is near me everytime when I don't even know her ... what wish is this, what a feeling is this

Title: Heartless

Trans: There is no tomorrow in your life and there is one in my life ... because you count life in years and I count it in moments

Title: Happy New Year

Trans: A person can live for 4 weeks without food, 4 days without water and may be 4 minutes without air ... but a person can't even live for 4 seconds without hope

Trans: In this world there are two types of people ... winners and losers ... but life definitely gives every loser that one chance ... in which he can become a winner

Title: Happy New Year

Trans: The value of a poor man's life ... is the same as the value of a rich man's life

Trans: Perfect mischief ... no loss, no issues

Title: Fugly
Quote: Dilli ki ladki hoon ... dhakke aur ragad ke beech ka farak jaanti hoon
Trans: I am a girl from Delhi ... I know the difference between a push and rubbing

Title: Fugly
Quote: Zinda aadmi ki baat pe koi vishvas nahi karta ... magar marte huye aadmi ki baat sab sunte hai
Trans: No one believes in what a living person says ... but everyone listens to a person who is dying

Title: Fugly
Quote: Tum yahan mujhe support karne aayi ho ... ki visphoot karne aayi ho
Trans: Have you come here to support me ... or to disrupt me

Title: Fugly
Quote: I'm a chooza ... pure chooza!
Trans: I'm a chicken ... pure chicken!

Title: Mission Kashmir
Quote: Yeh sach hai ki maine tumse jhoot kaha ... par yeh bhi sach hai ki maine tumse mohabbat ki hai
Trans: It's true that I lied to you ... but it's also true that I've loved you

Title: Mission Kashmir
Quote: Waqt, jihad aur maut ... kisi ka intezar nahi karta
Trans: Time, holy war and death ... don't wait for anyone

Title: Mission Kashmir
Quote: Neki aur badi mein, haiwaniyat aur insaaniyat mein, kehar aur Kashmir mein kya zinda rahe ... yeh tumhe tay karna hai ... sirf tumhe
Trans: Between kindness and selfishness, between inhumanity and humanity, between fear and Kashmir what will stay alive ... you have to decide ... only you

Title: Mission Kashmir
Quote: Pathan ko toh sirf do hi baatein aati hai ... hadh se zyada pyar aur behadh nafrat
Trans: A Pathan knows only two things ... love beyond limits and hatred beyond limits

Title: Tango Charlie
Quote: Main toh sirf ek sipahi hoon jisne maut ko itne kareeb se dekha hai ki ... zindagi ke har pal ki keemat jaan gaya hoon
Trans: I am just a soldier who has seen death from so close ... that I now know the value of every moment in life

Title: Tango Charlie
Quote: Jung marke nahi, maarke jeeti jaati hai
Trans: A war is won by killing, not by dying

Title: Tango Charlie
Quote: Kabhi kabhi kayar ki shakal ... bahadur ki akal se zyada sahi hoti hai
Trans: Sometimes the face of a coward person ... is better than the mind of a brave person

Title: Tango Charlie
Quote: Har sipahi ki zindagi mein aaisa waqt zaroor aata hai ... jab usse apni duty se zyada apni aatma ki awaaz sunni padti hai
Trans: In the life of every soldier there comes definitely a moment ... when he has to listen more to the voice of his soul rather than his duty

Title: Elaan
Quote: Achcha bhi laga aur bura bhi ... achcha laga teri himmat dekh kar ... aur bura laga tera anjaam sooch kar
Trans: I felt good and bad ... good looking at your courage ... and bad thinking about your consequence

Title: Elaan
Quote: Jab tak insaan ke mann mein hamara darr hai ... tab tak hum usse ungliyon pe nacha sakte hai ... darr khatam toh hum khatam
Trans: Till the time our fear exists in the heart of the people ... until then we can make them dance on our fingers ... if the fear ends then that's our end

Title: Elaan
Quote: Mujhe ladne waale nahi ... jeetne waale log chahiye
Trans: I don't want people who fight ... I want people who win

Title: Elaan
Quote: Do gaz zameen toh mili, mitti naseeb na hui ... zalim zamane ne hamari kabar baraf mein bana di
Trans: I got two yards of land, but I didn't get the soil ... this cruel world made my grave in the ice
