Title: Ek Khiladi Ek Haseena
Quote: Bura waqt aur purane paap ... insaan ko hamesha dhoond hi lete hai
Trans: Bad times and old sins ... always find a person back

Title: Ek Khiladi Ek Haseena
Quote: Har insaan achcha hota hai ... waqt usse bura banata hai
Trans: Every person is good ... time is what makes him bad

Title: Ek Khiladi Ek Haseena
Quote: Imaan ki bhi keemat hoti hai ... sirf maut rishwat nahi leti ... is liye ke kafan mein jeb nahi hote hai
Trans: Even honesty has a price ... only death doesn't take bribe ... because there are no pockets in a shroud

Title: Ek Khiladi Ek Haseena
Quote: Zinda dilon ki hai yahan zindagi ... murda dil khaak jiya karte hai
Trans: Life is meant to be for the brave ones ... since passionlessness hardly enjoy life

Title: Dil Maange More
Quote: Sara chali gaye jaane de ... tujhe pyar chahiye kahin aur se aane de
Trans: If Sara left, let her go ... you want love, let it come from somewhere else

Title: Dil Maange More
Quote: Kitna bhi bhaag lo ... gham, yaadein aur karza peecha nahi chhodte
Trans: No matter how much you run ... sadness, memories and loans don't leave you

Title: Dil Maange More
Quote: Dil koi kiraye ka ghar nahi hota ... ki ek jaye, doosra aaye
Trans: The heart is not a rental house ... where after one goes, another one comes along

Title: Dil Maange More
Quote: Jaane jahan tujhe kya kahoon ... mere khawabon mein, meri baaton mein, meri neendon mein, meri raaton mein bas tu hi tu ... jaaneman meri zindagi hai tu
Trans: My love what should I tell you ... it is just you in my dreams, in my words, in my sleep, in my nights ... my love you are my life

Title: Kalyug
Quote: Kayde mein rahoge toh fayde mein rahoge
Trans: If you stay within the rules then you'll be in profit

Title: Kalyug
Quote: Andhere ko door karne ke liye ... us mein diya khud hi jalana padta hai
Trans: To eliminate the darkness ... you yourself have to burn the candle in it

Title: Kalyug
Quote: Paisa ek aaisa marham hai ... joh har zakhm ko bhar deta hai
Trans: Money is one such medicine ... that fills up every wound

Title: Kalyug
Quote: Yeh kalyug hai kalyug ... yahan ek ki takleef doosre ka tamasha hai
Trans: This is the age of vice ... here one's problem is entertainment for the other

Title: Saawariya
Quote: Mil jaye tumhe tumhari mohabbat, toh maan lo khuda tumpar meherban ho gaya ... aur agar na mile, toh jaan lo ke khuda tumse ek jaan ho gaya
Trans: If you get your love, then understand that god is kind with you ... and if you don't get it, then understand that god is within you

Title: Saawariya
Quote: Yeh kambhakt mohabbat cheez hai hi aaisi ... joh kabhi patthar ko bhagwan ... toh kabhi farishtey jaise insaan ko patthar bana deti hai
Trans: This cruel love is one such thing ... that sometimes turns a stone into god ... and sometimes it turns an angel like person into a stone

Title: Saawariya
Quote: Kisi se itni bhi mohabbat na karna ... ki ek din khud se nafrat ho jaye
Trans: Don't love someone so much that ... one day you'll hate yourself

Title: Saawariya
Quote: Bina khaddon ke raste nahi hote ... aur bina dukh ke zindagi
Trans: There are no roads without potholes ... and there is no life with sorrow

Title: Desi Kattey
Quote: Hum inaam mein saansein dete hai ... toh sazaa mein saansein cheen lete hai
Trans: I give life as a gift ... hence I take life as a punishment

Title: Desi Kattey
Quote: Galiyan goliyon waali, dosti sadiyon waali ... the shaakon ke kadak patte, jinhe kehte the desi kattey
Trans: The streets were full of bullets, the friendship was from ages ... they were fresh leaves from the branches, whom we called as the local gangsters

Title: Desi Kattey
Quote: Yeh jail ki salakhein hum mein qaid kar sakti hai ... hamari badshahat ko nahi
Trans: The bars of the jail can lock me up ... but not my rulership

Title: Desi Kattey
Quote: Jab tak seh sakte the seh liye ... jab bardasht nahi hua toh thok diya
Trans: I beared until I could ... and I shot once I couldn't bear it anymore

Title: Teri Meherbaniyan
Quote: Mil-julkar sharaab peene se dosti aur zyada badti hai
Trans: Friendship grows by drinking alcohol together

Title: Teri Meherbaniyan
Quote: Pistol toh haath mein bachche bhi pakad sakte hai ... magar usse chalana bachchon ka kaam nahi
Trans: Even kids can hold a pistol in their hand ... but it is not child's play to fire it

Title: Teri Meherbaniyan
Quote: Maut ko daakhil hone ke liye kisi ki ijaazat ki zaroorat nahi padti hai
Trans: Death doesn't need the permission of anyone to enter

Title: Teri Meherbaniyan
Quote: Jab suraj sar par hota hai ... toh parchayi bhi saath hoti hai
Trans: When the Sun is on top of your head ... then a shadow is also with you

Title: Ulta Seedha
Quote: Jeevan mein teen cheezon se hamesha parez rakhiye ... shakkar, namak aur neta
Trans: In life always stay away from 3 things ... sugar, salt and politician

Title: Ulta Seedha
Quote: Zukham kamzor aadmi ko hota hai
Trans: Only the weak people catch cold

Title: Ulta Seedha
Quote: Beva ki aankh mein khwab toh hote nahi ... bas aasoon hote hai
Trans: A widow doesn't have dreams in her eyes ... she only has tears

Title: Ulta Seedha
Quote: Jiske dil mein pyar ka chand utra ho ... woh bahut khush kismat hai
Trans: The one who has the moon of love in their heart ... is very lucky

Title: Ilzaam
Quote: Sagai ke din ladka na aaye toh ek baap ke dil par kya guzarti hai ... yeh sirf ek ladki ka baap hi janta hai
Trans: What a dad goes through, when on the day of engagement the bridegroom doesn't come ... that only a bride's father knows

Title: Ilzaam
Quote: Ladki kitni bhi modern ho ... saree pehne toh sharma hi jaati hai
Trans: No matter how modern a girl is ... she feels shy when she wears a saree

Title: Ilzaam
Quote: Kamal keechad mein rehta hai ... lekin chadaya bhagwan ke charano mein hi jaata hai
Trans: A lotus flower lives in the mud ... but it's still presented at the feet of god

Title: Ilzaam
Quote: Kamal ka ghar keechad mein hota hai ... lekin keechad mein ghar banana kamal ki khwahish nahi ... majboori hai
Trans: The house of a lotus flower is in the mud ... but it's not the wish of the lotus flower to make it's house in the mud ... it's their compulsion

Title: Geraftaar
Quote: Har paida hone waale ko marte waqt kafan pehenna padta hai ... vaise hi har kaale dhande karne waale ko hathkadi pehenni padti hai
Trans: Everyone who is born has to wear a shroud when you die ... just like that everyone who does unofficial business has to wear handcuffs

Title: Geraftaar
Quote: Kanoon banane se pehle kanoon todne waale paida ho gaye the
Trans: People who break the law were born before the law itself was made

Title: Geraftaar
Quote: Socho kuch, bolo kuch, dekho kuch, dikhao kuch, karo kuch ... ho jaye kuch ... samajh mein aaya kuch?
Trans: Think something, say something, see something, show something, do something ... and something else happens ... did you understand anything?

Title: Geraftaar
Quote: Jab pyar ki aag ek baar jalti hai ... toh woh kabhi nahi bujhti
Trans: Once the fire of love ignites ... then it doesn't go off

Title: Hawaa Hawaai
Quote: Chhoti chhoti jal ki boondein sagar ko bhar deti hai ... balu ki rach nanhi nanhi sukar bhoomi rach deti hai ... kshan kshan kaal ikkattha hokar lamba yug ban jaata hai ... kshan ko shuksma na samjho bhai ... yeh jag ka nirmata hai
Trans: Little drops of water make the mighty ocean ... little grains of sand make the beautiful land ... little moments get together and make the mighty ages of eternity ... don't consider these little moments useless my brother ... they are the creators of the earth

Title: Hawaa Hawaai
Quote: Chule ke angare jaise pehle tadpate haathon ko tab naseeb roti hoti hai ... jeevan saar yehi hai manwa tu kar, mat darr ... angaaron pe chalna hai sahi, yehi jeevan jyoti hai
Trans: When the embers of the stove first agonize the hands, then only one gets to eat bread ... the gist of life in my heart is to do, and not be afraid ... since walking on fire is the flame of life

Title: Hawaa Hawaai
Quote: Aaj kal insaanon mein heroes bahut mushkil se milte hai
Trans: Nowadays it's very hard to find heroes in humans

Title: Rangrezz
Quote: Dosti ek aaisa rishta hai joh insaan khud banata hai ... baki sab rishtey toh apne aap hi ban jaate hai
Trans: Friendship is a relation that a person makes himself ... all other relations are made by themselves

Title: Rangrezz
Quote: Baap baap hota hai ... maa maa hoti hai ... lekin zaroorat padne par dost maa, baap, bhai, behen, sab kuch ban sakta hai
Trans: A father is a father ... a mother is a mother ... but if needed then a friend can become a mother, father, brother, sister, everything

Title: Rangrezz
Quote: Agar thaan lenge na ... toh phad denge!
Trans: If we decide that we have to do it ... then we will kill it!

Title: Love 86
Quote: Mohabbat karne waalon ka dukh sirf mohabbat karne waale hi samajh sakte hai
Trans: Only people in love can understand the sorrow of people in love

Title: Love 86
Quote: Agar bhagwan bhi insaan se uski zindagi maange, toh insaan kabhi nahi dega ... is liye bhagwan bhi cheen kar hi leta hai
Trans: Even if god asks man for his life, then man won't give ... that's why god also snatches that away from him

Title: Love 86
Quote: Bachche jab chote hote hai, toh unse pyar kiya jaata hai ... jab woh bade ho jaate hai, toh unhe samjha jaata ha
Trans: When children are small, then you should love them ... and when they grow big, then you should understand them

Title: Love 86
Quote: Mohabbat aur chahat heere aur sone ki mohtaj nahi hote ... do dilon ka milan hi sabse badi daulat hoti hai
Trans: Love and romance don't rely on diamonds and gold ... the union of two hearts is the biggest wealth

Title: Baabul
Quote: Dil ki aawaz kaano se nahi dil se suni jaati hai
Trans: The voice of the heart is heard from the heart, and not from the ears

Title: Baabul
Quote: Dost nahi badalte ... waqt badal jaata hai
Trans: Friends don't change ... time changes

Title: Baabul
Quote: Haan main cheating karta tha, par sirf khel mein ... tune toh zindagi ko khel samajh ke mujhe cheat kar diya
Trans: Yes I used to cheat, but only in a game ... but you've cheated me by considering life as a game

Title: Baabul
Quote: Matlab nikal gaya toh pehchante hi nahi ... ladki kya mili hum mein jaante hi nahi
Trans: Now that your work is done you don't even recognize me ... you've got the girl, so you don't even know me

Title: Tere Naal Love Ho Gaya
Quote: Ladne ke liye dolon ki nahi ... jigar ki zaroorat hoti hai
Trans: To fight you don't need muscles ... you need courage

Title: Tere Naal Love Ho Gaya
Quote: Soote hue ko jagana toh aasaan hai ... lekin jaagte hue ko jagana toh namumkin hai
Trans: It is easy to wake up a person who is sleeping ... but it is impossible to wake up a person who is awake

Title: Tere Naal Love Ho Gaya
Quote: Chori joh hai na woh peeche se ki jaave hai ... aur haath ki safai joh hai woh samne se
Trans: Theft is done from the back ... and the trick of the hand is done from the front

Title: Tere Naal Love Ho Gaya
Quote: Jaise apna Bathinda, waise apna Canada
Trans: Just like we have Bathinda, exactly like that we have Canada

Title: Jaagruti
Quote: Deewane aashiq zindagi ka saath chhodte hai ... lekin haath nahi chhodte
Trans: Lovers can leave the company of life ... but they don't leave the hand (of their lover)

Title: Jaagruti
Quote: Jab jab dharti par paap badha ... tab tab uska vinaash karne ke liye swayam Krishna ne janam liya
Trans: Whenever the sins have grown on earth ... then Lord Krishna by himself has taken birth to destroy them

Title: Humjoli
Quote: Khat ka mazmoon bhap lete hai lifafa dekh kar ... naam ko bhi jaan lete hai qayafa dekh kar
Trans: I can assess the content of a letter by merely looking at the envelope ... and I can know the name just by looking at the person

Title: Humjoli
Quote: Mere paas car hai lekin main phir bhi bekaar hoon
Trans: I have a car but still I'm jobless

Title: Humjoli
Quote: Duniya mein har insaan ko do cheez ki bhook hoti hai ... ek daulat ki aur doosri mohabbat ki
Trans: In the world every person is hungry for two things ... one money and second love

Title: Humjoli
Quote: Aapke chehre par aaya hua gussa, jaise chand pe chahe huye chote se badal ki tarah ... aapka mann jal ki tarah nirmal ... aapka dil phool ki tarah komal ... aur aapka swabhav "aaahhhh"
Trans: The anger on your face is like the small cloud covering the moon ... your heart is pure like water ... your heart is soft like a flower ... and your nature is beyond words

Title: Jigar
Quote: Joh toofan mein palta hai ... wohi duniya badalta hai
Trans: The one who grows in a storm ... changes the world

Title: Jigar
Quote: Tum shayad mere bagair reh sakte ho ... magar main tumhare bagair na reh sakti hoon, na jee sakti hoon ... haan mar sakti hoon
Trans: May be you can stay without me ... but I can't stay without you, and neither can I live without you ... but yes I can die

Title: Jigar
Quote: Aashirwad toh main usse aaisa doonga ... ki mera aashirwad uske liye hi nahi ... balki uske khandan ke liye abhishap banke reh jayega
Trans: I will give him such a blessing ... that my blessing will not only become a curse for him ... but also for his entire family

Title: Jigar
Quote: Keechad aadmi par girre yah aadmi keechad par ... dono suraton mein daag toh aadmi par hi lagta hai
Trans: Whether the mud falls on a person or a person falls in the mud ... in both cases the person is one who gets dirty

Title: Khoon Pasina
Quote: Jis din gareeb baghavat par utarta hai ... toh dhanwan toh kya usse bhagwan bhi nahi rok sakta
Trans: The day when a poor person starts to rebel ... then forget a rich person, even god won't be able to stop him

Title: Khoon Pasina
Quote: Gundon ka mazhab gundagardi hota hai
Trans: The religion of goons is rowdyism

Title: Khoon Pasina
Quote: Sache insaan ko aag jala nahi sakti ... talwar kaat nahi sakti ... aur sache insaan ko zindagi ki takleefein rula nahi sakti
Trans: Fire can't burn a honest person ... neither can a sword cut him ... and the problems of life can't make a honest person cry

Title: Khoon Pasina
Quote: Agar kisi ki beti ki izzat ek baar lut jaye ... toh duniya ki sari daulat usse vapas nahi la sakti
Trans: Once someone's daughter loses their honour ... then all the money in the world can't bring it back

Title: 36 China Town
Quote: Ramchandra keh gaye Natwar se aaisa kalyug aayega ... dance bar mein raas rachega, casino mein lut jayega
Trans: Lord Ram said to Natwar that such an age of vice will come ... where you'll dance in the dance bar, and you'll lose in the casino

Title: 36 China Town
Quote: Jua mein jeetne ka koi formula nahi hota ... haan nahi harne ka ek formula hai ... (kya) ... jua mat khelo
Trans: There is no formula to win in gambling ... but yes there is a formula for not losing ... (what) ... don't gamble

Title: 36 China Town
Quote: Partnership sirf profit mein hi nahi ... loss mein bhi hoti hai
Trans: A partnership happens not only in profit ... but in loss also

Title: 36 China Town
Quote: Tumhare daddy drug dealer hai na? ... varna aaisi nasheeli cheez aur kaun bana sakta hai ... tumhe dekhte hi nasha chad gaya
Trans: Your dad is a drug dealer right? ... or else who can produce such a highly intoxicating thing ... I am intoxicated by looking at you

Title: Benaam Badsha
Quote: Jinke paas zabaan nahi hoti ... woh aksar aasoonyon se baatein karne lagte hai
Trans: Those who can't speak ... they often talk with their tears

Title: Benaam Badsha
Quote: Kehte hai patni ke liye pati parmeshwar hote hai ... mere liye toh lagta hai parmeshwar hi pati banne aa gaye
Trans: It is said that the husband is a god for the wife ... but for me it seems likes god himself has arrived to become my husband

Title: Benaam Badsha
Quote: Phir kabhi tune mere ghar ke andhar jhanke ki koshish ki ... toh main apne darwaze par limbu mirchi ki jagah ... teri mundi kaatkar latka doonga
Trans: If you ever try to peep inside my house ... then instead of tying a lemon and chilli ... I'll cut your head and hang it on my door

Title: Benaam Badsha
Quote: Aurat ki izzat par agar ek baar daag lag jaye ... toh woh kabhi nahi dhul sakta hai
Trans: Once the honour of a woman is marked with a spot ... then that can never be erased

Title: Jung Baaz
Quote: Hum mein oonchi awaaz sunna bhi pasand nahi ... hamare samne joh oonchi awaaz mein bolta hai ... uski awaaz hamesha hamesha ke liye band kar di jaati hai
Trans: I don't like to hear loud voices ... the person who speaks loudly in front of me ... I shut their voice forever

Title: Jung Baaz
Quote: Chipkali ke bachche kabhi magarmach nahi ban sakte ... woh deewar par rhengte rhengte hi mar jaate hai
Trans: The children of a lizard can never become crocodiles ... they will simply die crawling on the walls

Title: Jung Baaz
Quote: Mera naam hai Mahakaal ... Kali ka pujari hoon main ... libaz bhi kaala, dhanda bhi kaala aur dushmanon ko joh kafan pehnata hoon uska rang bhi kaala
Trans: My name is Mahakaal ... and I worship (the goddess) Kali ... my dress is black, my business is black and the shroud that I put on my enemies is also black

Title: Jung Baaz
Quote: Hum toh woh bhanwar hai jis mein samundar ke samundar doob jaate hai
Trans: I am that vortex in which the ocean of the oceans drowns

Title: Hindustan Ki Kasam (1999)
Quote: Roshanara beti hai ek Musalman ki ... jisse pehchaan hai apne imaan ki ... pyar toh kya jaan tak loota doongi ... mujhe kasam hai apne Hindustan ki
Trans: Roshanara is a daughter of a Muslim ... who knows her faith ... forget love, I'll even give my life ... I swear on my India

Title: Hindustan Ki Kasam (1999)
Quote: Woh toh meri saanson mein hai, meri dhadkanon mein hai, meri aankhon mein hai, mere khwabon mein hai ... sach toh yeh hai ke mera dil unke paas hai aur unka dil mere paas
Trans: He is in my breathe, in my hearbeats, in my eyes, in my dreams ... the truth is that he has my heart and I have his heart

Title: Hindustan Ki Kasam (1999)
Quote: Woh khudgarz joh jung chahte hai unka kuch nahi jaata ... tabah toh woh log hote hai ... jinki subah roti ki talash mein shuru hoti hai aur raat thakaan ke bistar par
Trans: The selfish people who want a war don't lose anything ... but the people who start their day in search of food and their night on the bed of tiredness ... are the ones who get destroyed

Title: Hindustan Ki Kasam (1999)
Quote: Maut ka sadma toh insaan bardasht kar leta hai ... lekin jab koi apna kho jaata hai toh usse paane ki tadap ko bardasht nahi kar paata
Trans: A person can bear the trauma of death ... but he cannot bear the tormenting that he goes through in finding a loved one who is lost

Title: Vijaypath
Quote: Jab main tujhe maaronga ... toh teri awaaz ki goonj sare shehar ko sunai degi
Trans: When I kill you ... then the sound of your voice will be heard by the entire city

Title: Vijaypath
Quote: Joh ghar se kafan baandkar nikalte hai ... woh apna nahi dushman ka naam yaad rakhte hai
Trans: Those who leave the house wearing a shroud ... they remember their enemies name and not theirs

Title: Vijaypath
Quote: Joh shikaar khud chalkar sher ki gaar mein aata hai ... woh achchi tarah janta hai ki sher ke daant kaise todhe jaate hai
Trans: A prey that himself walks into the region of the tiger ... knows exactly how to break the teeth of the tiger

Title: Vijaypath
Quote: Jinki aankhon mein manzilon ke khwab hote hai ... woh shikast aur haar ki baatein nahi kiya karte
Trans: Those who have the dreams of destinations in their eyes ... they don't talk about defeat and losing

Title: Khauff
Quote: Haath mein pistol lekar joh jeete hai ... unka anth pistol hi likhti hai
Trans: Those who live with a pistol in their hand ... their end is written by the pistol itself

Title: Khauff
Quote: Jahan paisa hota hai wahan jurm hai ... jahan jurm hota hai wahan khauff ... aur jahan khauff hota hai wahan mere jaisa mujrim
Trans: Where there is money there is crime ... where there is crime there is fear ... and where there is fear there are criminals like me

Title: Khauff
Quote: Aaj tumhe maut sirf dekhni hi nahi ... mehsoos bhi karni padegi
Trans: Today you'll have to not only see a death ... but also feel it

Title: Khauff
Quote: Shuruvat unhone ki thi ... anjaam main doongi
Trans: They started it ... but I'll give it the end

Title: Mary Kom
Quote: Kabhi kisi ko itna bhi mat darrao ki darr hi khatam ho jaye
Trans: Don't scare someone so much that they are not scared anymore

Title: Mary Kom
Quote: Fighter kabhi haar nahi manta
Trans: A fighter never accepts defeat

Title: Mary Kom
Quote: Nail polish kisi bhi time lagana ... har ladki ka birthright hota hai
Trans: Applying nail polish at any time ... is the birthright of every girl

Title: Mary Kom
Quote: Hamesha full focus ... dhayan gaya toh naak gaya
Trans: Always have full focus ... if you lose your focus then you'll lose your nose

Title: Jhoom Barabar Jhoom
Quote: Saj gaye hum lute hue sajinda jaise behte hai ... aur yaar gaye magar hum besharam zinda jaise behte hai
Trans: I am sitting all dressed up like an instrumentalist ... and my friend is in trouble and I am sitting here like a shameless person

Title: Jhoom Barabar Jhoom
Quote: Jab do pyar karne waale marte hai ... toh do pyar karne waale pehda ho jaate hai
Trans: When two lovers die ... then two lovers are born

Title: An Evening In Paris
Quote: Mashooq mere saath hai, boat mere haath hai ... dil mein armaan hai, jigar mein toofan hai
Trans: My love is with me, the boat is in my hands ... I have desires and a storm in my heart

Title: An Evening In Paris
Quote: Andhera wohi hota hai ... jahan roshni dikhane waala koi nahi hota
Trans: Darkness is a place ... where there is no one to show light

Title: An Evening In Paris
Quote: Duniya mein do cheezein aaisi hai jinhe koi bhi nahi chupa sakta ... ek husn aur doosri daulat
Trans: There are two things in the world that no one can hide ... first a beautiful body and second money

Title: An Evening In Paris
Quote: Jisne Paris mein mohabbat nahi ki ... woh duniya mein kahin nahi kar sakta
Trans: The one who hasn't fallen in love in Paris ... he can't fall in love anywhere else in the world

Title: Yugpurush
Quote: Yahan koi kisi se pyar nahi karta ... sab zaroorat ke rishtey hai ... rishton ki zaroorat kisi ko nahi
Trans: Here no one loves anyone ... all relationships are there just for the sake of being there ... no one has the need for a relationship

Title: Yugpurush
Quote: Is bazaar mein log bikte hai, zameer bikta hai ... shareer toh shareer, yahan atmaon ke bhi saude hote hai
Trans: In this market people are sold, the conscience is sold ... forget the body, even the deals of the soul are done here

Title: Kisna
Quote: Khokar bhi aakhri saana tak ussi pyar mein rehna ... sabse bada pyar hai ... sacha pyar hai
Trans: To stay with the love that is lost, until your last breathe ... is the biggest love ... and true love

Title: Kisna
Quote: Har dharam ka ek hi matlab hota hai ... prem aur shanti ke raaste par chalna
Trans: Every religion has only one meaning ... to walk on the path of love and peace

Title: Kisna
Quote: Log badle, desh badle, tareekh badli ... nahi badli toh ek insaan ki sachi mohabbat
Trans: People changed, countries changed, dates changed ... the only thing that didn't change is the true love of humans

Title: Kisna
Quote: Sacha pyar hamesha vishvas, sabra aur tyag se hi panapta hai
Trans: True love always grows with trust, patience and sacrifice

Title: Kasoor
Quote: Aadmi jitna bada hota hai ... uske chupne ki jagahein utni hi kam hoti hai
Trans: The bigger the person is ... the less places he has for hiding

Title: Kasoor
Quote: Daulat ka nasha kisi drug se bhi zyada khatarnak nasha hota hai
Trans: The intoxication of money is more dangerous than the intoxication of drugs

Title: Kasoor
Quote: Khilte hue phoolon ko dekh ke ... insaan khud poori tarah khil jaata hai
Trans: Seeing flowers that blossom ... a person himself blossoms completely

Title: Kasoor
Quote: Asli khel wahi hai jis mein aakhir tak pata na chale ... ki jeet kiski hogi
Trans: A real game is the one in which until the end you don't know ... that who is going to win

Title: Daawat-e-Ishq
Quote: Mujhe tumse tumhari cash value ke liye nahi tumhari apni value ke liye shaadi karni hai ... tumhari friendship ki value, tumhari beauty ki value, tumhari hassi ki value
Trans: I want to marry you not for your cash value, but for your own value ... for the value of your friendship, for the value of your beauty, for the value of your laughter

Title: Daawat-e-Ishq
Quote: Maine kausa expect-hich kiya ke mujh jaise pede ko tum jaisi rasmalai milegi
Trans: When did I expect that a sugar ball like me will get a dessert like you

Title: Daawat-e-Ishq
Quote: Chaand chahoon na chakora, na falak ka tukda ... noor chahoon na main hoori, na pari sa mukhda
Trans: I don't want the moon or the birds, and neither do I want a piece of the sky ... I don't want the divine light or the beauty from paradise, and neither do I want a face like fairy

Title: Daawat-e-Ishq
Quote: Body ka kya hai ... aaj dubli kal moti ... thinking mein-hich honi chahiye na beauty
Trans: What is it about the body ... today it's slim tomorrow it'll be fat ... but there should be beauty in the thought itself

Title: Ghulam Begam Badshah
Quote: Kunwari ladki ek patang ki tarah hoti hai ... joh shaadi se pehle apni marzi se khuli hawa mein idhar udhar udhti phirti hai ... lekin phir kismat ki patang se pech ladta hai ... aur woh katkar apne pati ki aangan mein aa girti hai
Trans: An unmarried girl is like a kite ... who before marriage flies here and there as she wishes in the open air ... but then she battles with the kite of destiny ... and then she gets cut off and falls into the courtyard of her husband

Title: Ghulam Begam Badshah
Quote: Chaand suraj apni jagah se hat sakte hai ... lekin Thakur apne vaade se nahi palat sakta
Trans: The moon and the sun can move from their place ... but a Thakur can never change from his promise

Title: Ghulam Begam Badshah
Quote: Ladki ki maang tab khoobsurat hoti hai ... jab uska pati us mein sindoor bhar deta hai
Trans: The hair parting of a girl looks good ... when her husband fills vermilion in it

Title: Ghulam Begam Badshah
Quote: Pyar ek aaisi khushboo hai joh chupaye nahi chupti
Trans: Love is a fragrance that cannot be hidden even if you want to

Title: Pardesi Babu
Quote: Oh tu rail gaddi vich paida hui thi? ... jab dekho Rajdhani Express ki tarah bhaagti hui nazar aati hai
Trans: Were you born in a train? ... since you are always seen running around like the Rajdhani Express

Title: Pardesi Babu
Quote: Maine kisi devta ko nahi dekha ... par tumhe dekh ke aaisa lagta hai ki woh tumse alag nahi hoga
Trans: I have never seen any god ... but after seeing you, I feel that he is not going to be much different than you

Title: Pardesi Babu
Quote: Woh is duniya se alag toh nahi ... lekin unka pyar is duniya se alag hai
Trans: He is not different than anyone in this world ... but his love is different than anyone in this world

Title: Pardesi Babu
Quote: Aapki nazaron mein paisa pyar aur bhagwan dono se bada hai ... aap samajhte hai joh madhurta paison mein hai woh Sharda ke sitar mein, Vishnu ke shank mein nahi ... aap samajhte hai joh sundarta paison mein hai woh Rati ki surat mein nahi, swarg ki jhanki mein nahi ... paise mein joh pavitatra hai woh Ganga ke pani mein nahi, Savitri ke daman mein nahi ... paise mein joh taqat hai woh maa ke aashirwad mein nahi, devtaon ke zubaan mein nahi ... satya, shiv, sundar sab paisa hai ... jiske paas paisa hai woh raja aur jiske paas paisa nahi woh Raju?
Trans: In your eyes money is bigger than love and god ... you think that the sweetness that exists in money, doesn't exists in the sitar of Sharda and the shell of Vishnu ... you think that the beauty that exists in money, doesn't exists in the face of Rati and in the glimpse of heaven ... the purity that exists in money, doesn't exists in the water of Ganges (river) and in the lap of Savitri ... the power that exists in money, doesn't exists in the blessing of a mother and in the words of gods ... and that money is truth, god and everything ... the one who has money is a king and the one who doesn't have money is Raju?

Title: Wajood
Quote: Kaise bataon main tumhe mere liye tum kaun ho ... kaise bataon main tumhe tum dhadkanon ka geet ho, jeevan ka tum sangeet ho, tum zindagi, tum bandagi, tum roshni, tum taazgi, tum har khushi, tum pyar ho, tum preet ho, manmeet ho ... aankhon mein tum, yaadon mein tum, saanson mein tum, aahon mein tum, neendon mein tum, khwaabon mein tum ... tum ho meri har baat mein, tum ho mere din raat mein, tum subaah mein, tum shyaam mein, tum soch mein, tum kaam mein ... mere liye paana bhi tum, mere liye khona bhi tum, mere liye hasna bhi tum, mere liye rona bhi tum aur jaagna sona bhi tum ... jaaon kahin, dekhon kahin, tum ho wahan, tum ho wahin ... kaise bataon main tumhe tum bin toh main kuch bhi nahi ... kaise bataon main tumhe mere liye tum kaun ho
Trans: How can I tell you who you are to me ... how can I tell you that you are the song of my heartbeats, you are the music of my life, you are my life, you are my devotion, you are my light, you are my freshness, you are my every happiness, you are my love, you are my affection, you are my soulmate ... you are in my eyes, you are in my memories, you are in my breath, you are in my sighs, you are in my sleep, you are in my dreams ... you are in every word of mine, you are in my days and nights, you are in my morning, you are in my evening, you are in my thoughts, you are in my work ... for me gaining is also you, for me losing is also you, for me laughing is also you, for me crying is also you and waking up and sleeping are also you ... wherever I go, wherever I look, you are there, you are right there ... how can I tell you that I am nothing without you ... how can I tell you who you are to me

Title: Wajood
Quote: Destiny bahut beraham hoti hai ... yeh apne doston se mooh pherne par aur dushmanon se baat karne par majboor kar deti hai
Trans: Destiny is very cruel ... it compels us to turn our backs on our friends and talk to our enemies

Title: Wajood
Quote: Kaise bataon main tumhe mere liye tum kaun ho ... yeh joh tumhara roop hai, yeh zindagi ki dhoop hai ... chandan se tarsha hai badan, behti hai jis mein ek agan ... yeh shokhiyan, yeh mastiyan, tumko hawaon se mili, zulfein ghataon se mili ... hooton mein kaliyan khil gayi, aankhon ko jheele mil gayi ... chehre mein simti chandni, awaaz mein hai ragini ... sheeshe ke jaisa ang hai, phoolon ke jaisa rang hai, nadiyon ke jaisi chaal hai, kya husn hai, kya haal hai ... yeh jism ki rangeeniyan, jaise hazaaron titliyan, baahon ki yeh golaiyan, aanchal mein yeh parchaiyan ... yeh nagriyan hai khwaab ki, kaise bataon main tumhe haalat dil-e-betaab ki ... kaise bataon main tumhe mere liye tum kaun ho
Trans: How can I tell you who you are to me ... this beauty of yours, is life's sunshine ... your body is chisled from sandalwood, in which a flame is wavering ... this brilliance, this naughtiness, you've gotten from the winds, you've got your hair from the clouds ... on your lips the buds have blossomed, your eyes have found the lakes ... your face has the shining moonlight, your voice has the melody ... your body is like glass, your colour is like flowers, your walk is like a river, what a beauty, what a condition ... the colorfulness of your body, is like thousands of butterflies, the roundness of your arms, is the shadow from your scarf ... these are the cities of dreams, how can I tell you the condition of my anxious heart ... how can I tell you who you are to me

Title: Wajood
Quote: Chal lekar apni naav chale, chandan chandani ke gaon chale ... indradhanush ki behti dhara, uske paar teesra kinara ... is safar mein aur koi nahi, yeh safar hai bas mera tumhara ... ab kis dastak ka hai intezar, jab tumhe pukarta ho pyar aur samne ho sapnon ka sansar ... chal lekar sapnon ki naav chale, chandan chandani ke gaon chale
Trans: Let's take our boat and go to the village of sandalwood and moonlight ... the flowing stream of the rainbow and the third shore behind it ... this journey is just ours and no one else ... now you are waiting for what, when love is calling you and the world of dreams is in front of you ... let's take our boat and go to the village of sandalwood and moonlight

Title: God Tussi Great Ho
Quote: Burre waqt ki ek baat achchi hoti hai ... ki woh bhi guzar jaata hai
Trans: Bad times have one great thing ... that they also pass away

Title: God Tussi Great Ho
Quote: Taqdeer kharab ho toh oonth par baithe baune aadmi ke pair mein bhi kutta kaat le
Trans: If the luck is bad then a dog will bite the leg of a midget even if he is sitting on a camel

Title: God Tussi Great Ho
Quote: Filmy gaane gayega toh paise kamayega ... varna upar waale ke naam par bhookha marr jayega
Trans: If you sing songs from the movies then you'll make money ... or else you will die hungry in the name of god

Title: God Tussi Great Ho
Quote: God great nahi hai ... woh great hai apne manne waalon se, apne chahne waalon se
Trans: God is not great ... he becomes great by the people who believe in him, by the people who love him

Title: Aa Gale Lag Jaa
Quote: Phatte hue kapde toh sille jaate hai ... lekin gayi hui izzat vapas nahi aati hai
Trans: Torn clothes can be stitched ... but lost respect never comes back

Title: Aa Gale Lag Jaa
Quote: Baat jab sadak tak pahunch jaati hai ... toh ghar ke andhar jhankne ki zaroorat nahi padti
Trans: When the issue comes on the road ... then there is no need to peek inside the house

Title: Aa Gale Lag Jaa
Quote: Saale tune bhi dushmani ki laash par khoob dosti ka kafan pehnaya hai
Trans: Bloody you've well applied the shroud of friendship on the dead body of enmity

Title: Aa Gale Lag Jaa
Quote: Lagata hai tumhari aankhon mein soovar ka baal hai
Trans: It seems like there is a hair of a pig in your eyes

Title: Hadh Kar Di Aapne
Quote: Bahut soch samajh kar samajh samajh kar samajhdari ke saath hum dono milke duniya ko kuch aaisa samjhayenge ... ke soch samajh kar samajh samajh kar samajhdari ke saath duniya bhi yeh samajh jayegi ... ke soch samajh kar samajh samajh kar samajhdari ke saath hum dono ki samajhdari saath saath chal rahi hai ... aur soch samajh kar samajh samajh kar samajhdari ke saath hum dono ko joh bahut pehle kar dena chahiye tha ... woh soch samajh kar samajh samajh kar samajhdari ke saath hum dono ne baad mein kiya ... magar kiya zaroor ... samajh rahi hai na main kya samjhana chah raha hoon?
Trans: After thinking a lot, understanding and with wisdom we two will make the world understand ... that after thinking, understanding and with wisdom this world will also understand ... that after thinking, understanding and with wisdom our mutual understanding is walking together ... and that after thinking, understanding and with wisdom what we two should have done long time back ... that after thinking, understanding and with wisdom was done by us later ... but it was done ... you are understanding right what I am trying to say?

Title: Hadh Kar Di Aapne
Quote: Joh karte hai woh bolte nahi ... joh bolte woh karte nahi ... joh garajte hai woh baraste nahi ... joh baraste hai woh garajte nahi ... lekin main karoonga bhi, bolunga bhi, garjunga bhi, barsunga bhi
Trans: The people who do, don't talk ... the people who talk, don't do ... the people who shout, don't act ... the people who act, don't shout ... but I'll do, I'll talk, I'll shout, I'll act

Title: Hadh Kar Di Aapne
Quote: Aap log isse poochiye, iske dhadakte dil se poochiye ... zameen se poocho, aasman se poocho, hawaon se poocho, fizaon se poocho, andheron se poocho, ujalon se poocho, chaand se poocho, sitaron se poocho, aandhi se poocho, toofan se poocho ... mujhe se poocho, mere baap se poocho, isse poocho, iske baap se poocho, mere ghar ke char char cartoon se poocho ... arre main kehta hoon aur toh aur in pattiyon se poocho, in pattiyon ke peeche jalti hui battiyon se poocho, is bikhare hue kaleen se poocho, girre hue tambu se toote hue bamboo se poocho ... poocho us zarre zarre tinke tinke se kitna pyar kiya hai main ne isse?
Trans: You people should ask her, ask her beating heart ... ask the ground, ask the sky, ask the wind, ask the atmosphere, ask the darkness, ask the brightness, ask the moon, ask the stars, ask the squall, ask the storm ... ask me, ask my father, ask her, ask her father, ask the four cartoons in my house ... infact I am saying that you should ask these leaves, ask the lights that are behind these leaves, ask this strewn carpet, ask this fallen shelter and broken bamboo ... ask every little thing and every drop how much have I loved her?

Title: Hadh Kar Di Aapne
Quote: Maine tujhe dhoonda yahan vahan sara jahan kahan kahan kahan ... tu mujhe mili yahan yahan yahan?
Trans: I looked for you here, there, everywhere ... and I found you here, here, here?

Title: Kachche Dhaage
Quote: Yahan main hi vaakil hoon, main hi judge hoon aur main hi jallad
Trans: Here I am the lawyer, I am the judge and I am the executioner

Title: Kachche Dhaage
Quote: Logon ne rab ko rab kaha hai ... lekin maine apne yaar ko rab kaha hai
Trans: People have called god as god ... but I have called my friend as my god

Title: Kachche Dhaage
Quote: Joh aadmi hamara kaam nahi kar sakta ... us aadmi ko hum kisi kaam ke layak nahi chhodte
Trans: A person who can't do my work ... I leave that person incapable of doing any other work

Title: Banarasi Babu
Quote: Hamari ragon mein hamari maa ka doodh aur shudh Gangajal beh raha hai
Trans: My mom's milk and the pure water from the river Ganga is flowing in my veins

Title: Banarasi Babu
Quote: Maine iske saath saat phere liye the ... magar yeh saat kadam bhi hamare saath nahi chal payi
Trans: I have taken 7 seven roads around the marriage homa (fire ritual) with her ... but she could not walk 7 steps with me

Title: Banarasi Babu
Quote: If you take bath in ghar ka bathroom ... ghar ki izzat ghar ke andhar ... if you take bath in nadi khulam-khula ... ghar ki izzat on road
Trans: If you take a bath in the bathroom of the house ... then the honour of the house stays within the house ... but if you take a bath in the river openly ... then the honour of the house comes on the road

Title: Shaukeen
Quote: Dil tha tumhari yaad mein tapish-e-gham se bekarar ... aankhen tumhari shakal ko dhoond rahi thi baar baar
Trans: My heart was restless from the heat of sadness in your memory ... and my eyes were looking for you again and again

Title: Shaukeen
Quote: Zindagi bhi kitni dilchasp hai ... woh har naye anubhav ke saath thokar lagati hai ... ek naye sabak ke liye
Trans: Life is so interesting ... it trips us with every new experience ... for a new lesson

Title: Shaukeen
Quote: Jin jin cheezon se zindagi, zindagi lagti hai ... kambhakt doctor unhi ko cheen lete hai
Trans: The things that make life, feel as life ... the bloody doctor takes them away

Title: Shaukeen
Quote: Jawaani unhi ke liye hai joh jawaan hai
Trans: Youthfulness is only for those who are young

Title: Dil Ka Kya Kasoor
Quote: Jab kisi saaz ka dil tootta hai ... toh dard ki teez bahut der tak uthti hai
Trans: When the heart of music breaks ... then the pain is felt for a long time

Title: Dil Ka Kya Kasoor
Quote: Bazaar ke chaurahe par bikne waali koi ashleel kitaab nahi hai hum ... jiske panne har koi palatta rahe aur hamare mooh par thookta rahe
Trans: I am not a dirty book that sells on the crossroads of a market ... that everyone flips my pages and spits on my face

Title: Dil Ka Kya Kasoor
Quote: Kaunsa kasoor hai mera ... jiski sazaa tu usse de raha hai aur hisaab meri kitaab mein likha ja raha hai
Trans: What is my fault ... for which you are punishing her and writing it in the books of my account

Title: Dil Ka Kya Kasoor
Quote: Main apne khoon ke har ek katre ko jalakar uske raste ke diye jalaongi
Trans: I will burn every drop of my blood to light the candles on his path

Title: Milenge Milenge
Quote: Do log tabhi milte hai jab destiny unko milvana chahti hai
Trans: Two people only meet when destiny wants them to meet

Title: Milenge Milenge
Quote: Agar tum destiny ko maanti ho toh yeh ittefaq ho nahi sakta ... aur agar yeh ittefaq hai toh main yeh chahunga ke aaisa khubsoorat ittefaq mere saath roz ho
Trans: If you believe in destiny then this can't be a coincidence ... and if this is a coincidence then I would want that such a coincidence should happen with me everyday

Title: Milenge Milenge
Quote: Ek baap ki zindagi mein khushiyon ka mauka sirf do baar aata hai ... pehli baar toh tab jab uska beta zindagi ke farsh par pehli bar bina kisi sahare ke kadam rakhta hai ... aur doosra tab jab wahi beta bada hokar apni shaadi shudha zindagi mein apna pehla kadam rakhta hai
Trans: In a father's life this moment of happiness comes only twice ... first when his son walks on the floor of life for the first time without any support ... and second when the same son grows up and takes his first step into his married life

Title: Milenge Milenge
Quote: Agar sunne waala achcha ho ... toh mooh se achchi baatein apne aap nikalti hai
Trans: If the person listening is good ... then good words come out from the mouth by itself

Title: Zameer
Quote: Har sapna toh sach nahi hota hai na ... kuch sapne aankh khulte hi hamesha ke liye toot jaate hai
Trans: Every dream doesn't come true ... some dreams break forever when your eyes open

Title: Zameer
Quote: Koi bhi ladki apna pehla pyar kabhi nahi bhool sakti
Trans: No girl can forget her first love

Title: Zameer
Quote: Hasna hasana agar apni limit cross kar de ... toh sari zindagi ek mazaak ban jaati hai
Trans: If jokes cross their limits ... then the whole life becomes a joke

Title: Chandni Chowk to China
Quote: Mujhe un dus hazar move se khatra nahi hai, joh tumne ek baar practice kiya hai ... mujhe us ek move se khatra hai, joh tumne dus hazar baar practice kiya hai
Trans: I'm not in danger from the 10,000 moves that you have practiced once ... I'm in danger from that one move that you have practiced 10,000 times

Title: Chandni Chowk to China
Quote: Mehnat se sirf pasina nikalta hai ... paisa nahi
Trans: With hard work only sweat comes out ... not money

Title: Chandni Chowk to China
Quote: Tinka bhi ussi doobne waale ko sahara deta hai ... joh us tak pahunchne ka sahas rakhta hai
Trans: Even a small hope helps only that drowning person ... who has the courage to reach it

Title: Zulm Ki Hukumat
Quote: Hamara yeh pesha shatranj ki bisat se kam nahi ... chote se chote mohre ko maarne ke liye hum mein dekhna padta hai ... ki uska vazir kaun hai, badshah kaun hai
Trans: Our business is nothing less than a chessboard ... where even to kill a small pawn we have to see ... who is his minister and who is his king

Title: Zulm Ki Hukumat
Quote: Kabhi kabhi kahin ruk jana hi achcha hota hai ... varna manzil peeche reh jaati hai aur insaan aage nikal jaata hai
Trans: Sometimes it is good to stop somewhere ... or else the person moves ahead and the destination stays behind

Title: Zulm Ki Hukumat
Quote: Gussa insaan ka sabse bada dushman hai ... jisse gusse par kabu nahi, woh kisi cheez par kabu nahi rakh sakta ... gussa insaan ki akal ko kha jaata hai
Trans: Anger is the biggest enemy of a person ... the one who can't control his anger, he won't be able to control anything else ... anger eats the brain of a person

Title: Zulm Ki Hukumat
Quote: Aaj main apni hukumat ki adaalat ka gawah bankar, vakil bankar, judge bankar ... tum jaise khoon ka sauda karne waale saudagar ko sazaa deta hoon ... sazaaye maut
Trans: Today I'll become the witness, the attorney, the judge of my rule ... and I'll give the punishment of death for people like you who do the business of blood ... the punishment of death

Title: Jwalamukhi
Quote: Vardi ko khel aur kanoon ko rakhail samajhne waalon ko ... Jwala maarta nahi, maar deta hai
Trans: The people who think the uniform is a game and the law is their mistress ... Jwala doesn't hit them, he kills them

Title: Jwalamukhi
Quote: Dukh ke baad sukh hi aata hai aur raat ke baad savera
Trans: After sadness comes happiness and after night comes morning

Title: Jwalamukhi
Quote: Nabhe crore Hindustan ki janta ko tabah karne waalon ko tabah karne ke liye ... sirf ek Hindustani kafi hai
Trans: To destroy the people who want to destroy 90 crore Indians ... we only need one Indian

Title: Jwalamukhi
Quote: Aye main Shankar dada ... baat karne nahi ka zyada ... poora ka poora aadmi ka kar doonga aadha
Trans: I'm Shankar the boss ... don't talk to much ... or else I'll make a full person into half

Title: Dangerous Ishhq
Quote: Kahi janam lag jaate hai sachcha pyar paane mein ... ek pal lagta hai usse kho dene mein
Trans: It takes a lot of ages to get true love ... but it only takes a moment to lose it

Title: Dangerous Ishhq
Quote: Preet aur prem ka sambandh atma se hove hai ... shareer se nahi
Trans: Affection and love are related to the soul ... not the body

Title: Dangerous Ishhq
Quote: Hamara dimaag sirf is janam ki baaton ko yaad rakhta hai ... jab ki hamari atma hamare har janam ki har baat ko yaad rakhti hai
Trans: Our brain only remembers the things of this life ... where as our soul remembers everything from every life of ours

Title: Dangerous Ishhq
Quote: Is janam mein agar tumhe chahne waale tumhare saath hai ... toh tumse nafrat karne waale bhi tumhare saath hi honge
Trans: If in this life the people who love you are with you ... then the people who hate you are also going to be with you

Title: Parwana
Quote: Janam dene waali sirf maa hi nahi ... mitti bhi hoti hai
Trans: The one who gives birth is not the only mother ... the land is also our mother

Title: Parwana
Quote: Ek nayi ada aaj dekhega zamana ... khud shama ko lene aaya hai parwana
Trans: The world will see a new style today ... a true lover has come himself to get his love

Title: Parwana
Quote: Mere junoon ki misaal deta hai zamana ... kyun ki maut se darta nahi Parwana
Trans: The world gives an example of my passion ... because Parwana (this lover) is not scared of death

Title: Parwana
Quote: Aag mein kood padhun ... iraadon mein asar rakhta hoon ... naam hai Parwana ... hateli pe jigar rakhta hoon
Trans: I can jump in the fire ... my intentions are strong ... my name is Parwana ... and I keep my courage on my hand

Title: Gangaa Jamunaa Saraswati
Quote: Agar tujh jaise bhai aur pehda ho jaye ... toh is duniya se Rakhi ka tyohar mitt jayega
Trans: If more brothers like you are born ... then the festival of Rakhi will get erased from this world

Title: Gangaa Jamunaa Saraswati
Quote: Insaan ka jab waqt pura ho jaye ... toh kadam khud ba khud wahan pahuncha dete hai ... jahan maut bahen phalye uska intezar kar rahi ho
Trans: When the time of a person ends ... then his feet automatically get him to the place ... where death is waiting for him with open arms

Title: Gangaa Jamunaa Saraswati
Quote: Jab jab is dharti par Kans ne janam liya hai ... uska sar kuchalne ke liye Krishna bhi pehda hota raha hai
Trans: Whenever Kans has been born on this earth ... Lord Krishna has also been born to crush his head

Title: Gangaa Jamunaa Saraswati
Quote: Shankar jab gale se gaa sakta hai ... kahin khopdi ghumi na ... toh dushmanon ko jalakar khaak bhi kar sakta hai
Trans: When Shankar can sing from this throat ... then he can also burn his enemies to dust ... if his mind goes crazy

Title: Deedar
Quote: Har kamyab insaan ke dushman zyada aur dost kam hote hai
Trans: Every successful person has more enemies and few friends

Title: Deedar
Quote: Rupaiyon mein woh taqat hai ... ki imaandar se imaandar insaan ki bhi neeyat bighadte derr nahi lagti
Trans: The money has that power in it ... that it doesn't take time even for the most honest person to change their intention

Title: Deedar
Quote: Jumma aaye, jumma jaye ... lekin is chumme ki nishani kabhi na mitne paye
Trans: Let Friday come, let Friday go ... but the mark of this kiss should never get erased

Title: Deedar
Quote: Jab jab dharm ki haani aur adharm ki vriddhi hoti hai ... tab tab swayam Sri Krishna ji kisi bhi roop mein aakar ... dushton ka naash aur sajjanon ki rashka karte hai
Trans: Whenever virtue declines and evilness rises ... then Lord Krishna has come in some form or the other ... to destroy the demons and to protect the good people

Title: Hello Brother
Quote: Maine tumhe samjha tha badam, nikle moongphali ... ab bol Jai Bajrang Bali aur todh us tapori ki nali
Trans: I thought you were an almond, but you turned out to be peanut ... now say Jai Bajrang Bali (pray to god) and break that rowdy persons head

Title: Hello Brother
Quote: Main tumhari pungi bajaonga!
Trans: I will destroy you!

Title: Hello Brother
Quote: Aap achche achchon ko hila daalte hai ... naak ke baal jala daalte hai
Trans: You shake even the best of the people ... and burn the hair in their nose

Title: Kasme Vaade
Quote: Badle ki is bhavna ko mann se nikaal do ... yeh woh khel hai joh shuru ho jaye toh khelne waale khatam ho jaate hai ... par khel khatam nahi hota
Trans: Remove the feelings of revenge from your heart ... it is that game which once it starts, then the players will end ... but the game will not end

Title: Kasme Vaade
Quote: Naale ka ganda pani kabhi Gangajal nahi ban sakta
Trans: The dirty water from the gutter can never become the holy water from the river Ganges

Title: Kasme Vaade
Quote: Kabhi kabhi dushman ki zindagi ... uski maut se zyada faydemand hoti hai
Trans: Sometimes the life of an enemy ... is more beneficial than his death

Title: Kasme Vaade
Quote: Phir kabhi udhar nazar aaya ... toh kisi ko nazar nahi aayega
Trans: If I ever see you there ... then you won't be seen to anyone

Title: Kill Dil
Quote: Tabse gun chala raha hoon ... jabse tu apne maa ke andhar nahi, apne baap ke andhar tha
Trans: I am firing a gun ... not since you were inside your mother, but since you were inside your father

Title: Kill Dil
Quote: Laundiya ko ghumana ho, jeb mein haath daalo note nikal aata hai ... laundiya ko gol-gappa khilana ho, jeb mein haath daalo note nikal aayega ... laundiya ko cinema dikhana ho, jeb mein haath daalo ... kya nikal aata hai? ... (note) ... lekin jab jeb phatti hogi, us mein haath daloge toh kya nikaloge ... ghanta!
Trans: When you want to go out with a girl, just put your hand in the pocket and money comes out ... if you want to treat a girl with a snack, just put your hand in the pocket and money comes out ... if you want to watch a movie with a girl, just put your hand in the pocket ... and what comes out? ... (money) ... but if your pocket is torn, what will you remove using your hand ... nothing!

Title: Kill Dil
Quote: Bacha paida kahin bhi ho ... banta waisa hi hai jahan bada hota hai
Trans: It doesn't matter where a child is born ... he becomes just like the place where he grows up

Title: Kill Dil
Quote: Moongphali mein chilke aur laundiya mein nakhre na hote ... toh zindagi kitni aasaan hoti
Trans: If groundnuts didn't have the skin and if women didn't have tantrums ... then how easy life would have been

Title: EMI: Liya Hai To Chukana Padega
Quote: Loan aur shaadi ek jaise hai ... loan liya toh chukao, shaadi kiya toh nibhao
Trans: A loan and marriage are similar ... if you take a loan then pay for it, and if you got married then fulfill it

Title: EMI: Liya Hai To Chukana Padega
Quote: Duniya mein har cheez badalti hai ... mausam, rishtey, naseeb
Trans: Everything in this world changes ... weather, relations, destiny

Title: EMI: Liya Hai To Chukana Padega
Quote: Jitna talk time hai utna bol
Trans: Only talk for whatever talk time is left

Title: EMI: Liya Hai To Chukana Padega
Quote: Joh ladki dil mein ho, woh jab samne aa jaati hai ... toh pyar ki baatein apne aap hone lagti hai
Trans: When the girl that is our heart comes in front of us ... then the words of love automatically come out

Title: Aamdani Atthani Kharcha Rupaiyaa
Quote: Jaise ek ghar mein do kitchen nahi hote hai na ... vaise ek ghar mein do brain nahi hone chahiye
Trans: Just like in one house you don't have two kitchens ... just like that in one house you shouldn't have two brains

Title: Aamdani Atthani Kharcha Rupaiyaa
Quote: Keep it up ... nahi toh ek ghup, seedha up
Trans: Keep it up ... or else I'll give you one shot and you'll go straight up

Title: Aamdani Atthani Kharcha Rupaiyaa
Quote: Abhe oye sadhe huye tamatar ki phu-phundi waali chutney ... baasi kadhi ke baas marte huye besan ... zamane ke bighade huye fashion ... jaale huye aloo ki kaalak, keedhe pade huye paalak ... phitkari ki phitkar, auraton ki dhutkar ... dekh kaise khadi karta hoon main teri khaat aur kaise lagata hoon main teri vaat
Trans: Hey you chutney made from rotten tomato ... stinking gram flour from a stinky curry ... disturbed fashion of the era ... blackness of a burnt potato, spinach with germs in it ... potassium in alum, cursed by women ... look what I do to you and how I screw you

Title: Aamdani Atthani Kharcha Rupaiyaa
Quote: Abhe oye sadhe huye unde ke double half-fry ... gumnaam shehar ke jhulte minar ... geele papad ki paidavar ... takle ki taal, kharbhuje ki khaal, bin batti ki dhaal ... maroonga ek kaan ke neeche, awaaz aayegi tere naak ke neeche ... badbudar chailay, phatte huye thayle, mailay guzelay ... teri yeh majhaal ki tu apun ke saath khele
Trans: Hey you double half-fry of a stinking egg ... tower of an anonymous city ... product of a wet papadum ... head of a bald person, skin of a muskmelon, shield without a light ... I'll hit you one below your ear and the noise will come from below your nose ... you smelly thing, you torn bag, you dirty thing ... how dare you play with me

Title: Baiju Bawra
Quote: Tumhare bagair meri sargam adhoori hai, mere geet adhoore hai ... tum hi mera sangeet ho
Trans: Without you my musical notes are incomplete, my songs are incomplete ... you are my music

Title: Baiju Bawra
Quote: Sangeet seekhne ke liye hridhay mein prem paida kar ... doosron ka dil dukhane ke badle, apne dil mein dard pehda kar
Trans: To learn music you need to grow love in your heart ... instead of making others sad, grow pain in your heart

Title: Baiju Bawra
Quote: Sangeet hridhay se hridhay ka sambandhit hota hai ... atma ko ooncha uthata hai ... bhair ko prem mein badal deta hai
Trans: Music is related from a heart to a heart ... it raises the soul ... and converts hatred into love

Title: Baiju Bawra
Quote: Tansen ki shikast mein sangeet ki jeet chupi hui hai
Trans: The victory of music is hidden in the loss of Tansen

Title: Bewakoofiyaan
Quote: Jeb mein paise ho na ho ... log coffee peena kabhi nahi chhodenge
Trans: Whether people have money in their pocket or not ... they will never leave drinking coffee

Title: Bewakoofiyaan
Quote: Paise ho na ho ... pyar apna jugaad nikaal hi leta hai
Trans: Whether money is there or not ... love will find it way

Title: Bewakoofiyaan
Quote: Pyar kha lenge, pyar pehen lenge ... pyar petrol tank mein bhar kar gaadi chala lenge
Trans: We will eat love, we will wear love ... we will fill love in the petrol tank and drive the car

Title: Bewakoofiyaan
Quote: Agar aaj jeete na toh hamesha ke liye haar jaoge
Trans: If you win today then you'll lose forever

Title: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
Quote: Suna hai pyar mein ghantiyan bajhti hai, shehnaiyan bajhti hai, dhol nagaade bajhte hai ... par mera toh band bajh gaya
Trans: I've heard that in love bells ring, flutes play, drums play ... but I got screwed

Title: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
Quote: Pyar toh mujhe aasani se ho gaya ... lekin usse sabit karne ke liye main kadi mehnat karoonga
Trans: I fell in love quiet easily ... but I'll work hard to prove it

Title: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
Quote: Joh opposite hota hai ladkiyan hamesha wahi kehti hai
Trans: Girls always say the opposite

Title: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
Quote: Bhagwan ne insaan ki umar ki lakeer ke saath ... uski naseeb ki lakeer bhi banayi hai
Trans: Along with the lines of the age of a person ... god has also created the lines of his destiny

Title: Bhoot Bungla
Quote: Aap log kaun hai, kyun hai, kahan se aaye hai, kyun aaye hai, kisse milna hai, kyun milna hai ... agar is waqt nahi aate toh kya bighad jaata?
Trans: Who are you guys, why are you, where have you come from, why have you come here, whom do you want to meet, why do you want to meet ... what would have happened if you didn't come at this time?

Title: Bhoot Bungla
Quote: Daulat jahan nehmat hai ... wahan ek bahut badi laanat bhi hai
Trans: Money is a blessing ... but it is also one big curse

Title: Baaghi
Quote: Agar pyar karna bagawat hai, kisi ko sahara dena bagawat hai ... toh main aapke khilaf, aapke kanoon ke khilaf, aapke samaaj ke khilaf bagawat karta hoon ... main bhaagi hoon ... haan main bhaagi hoon
Trans: If loving is to revolt, if helping someone is to revolt ... then I am revolting against you, against your law, against your society ... I'm a rebel ... yes I'm a rebel

Title: Baaghi
Quote: Agar yeh hi hai aapki duniya toh nahi chahiye mujhe aapki duniya ... nahi chahiye mujhe woh duniya jis mein ek ladki ke saare haq cheene jaye ... beti hone ka, behen hone ka, biwi hone ka ... ek zinda insaan ko ek bejaan cheez ki tarah bazar mein rakha jaye ... uska mol lagaya jaye, usse khareeda jaye, usse becha jaye ... aur phir kaha jaye ki yahi duniya ka dastoor hai ... nahi chahiye mujhe aapki duniya
Trans: If this is your world then I don't want your world ... I don't want the world in which all the rights are taken away from a girl ... to be a daughter, to be a sister, to be a wife ... where she is kept as a non-living thing in the market ... she is priced, she is bought, she is sold ... and then it is said that it's the custom of the world ... I don't want your world

Title: Baaghi
Quote: Apun ke dhande ke andhar rishta nahi ... fayda soocha jaata hai
Trans: In our business we don't think relations ... we think profit

Title: Baaghi
Quote: Yeh duniya bahut badi aur lambi hai ... magar Dhanraj ke haath usse kahin zyada bade aur lambe hai
Trans: This world is very big and long ... but the hands of Dhanraj are much bigger and longer than that

Title: Reshma and Shera
Quote: Jiski maut jis ghadi likhi hoti hai ... ussi ghadi aati hai
Trans: When the time of death is defined ... then death comes at that time itself

Title: Reshma and Shera
Quote: Joh veer Rajput apna sar jhukakar dushman ka dil jeet le ... woh sar uthakar jag jeetega
Trans: A brave warrior that can win the heart of an enemy by bowing down his head ... he can win the universe with his head held high

Title: Reshma and Shera
Quote: Virodh se kabhi virodh nahi mitt sakta ... apnepan ke khrod, apne ahankar ko maarkar, apne pyar se hi jag ka virodh mitta sakte hai
Trans: You cannot erase revolt with a revolt ... you can erase the revolt of the universe by killing your anger, killing your ego and with your love

Title: Reshma and Shera
Quote: Joh kabhi nahi hota ... wohi ek din zaroor hota hai
Trans: The thing that never happens ... it definitely happens one day

Title: Do Badan
Quote: Kahin sher aur nagma bankar, kahin aasoonyon mein dhalkar ... woh mile mujhe toh e-dil, kahin sooratein badalkar
Trans: Sometimes as a poem and a song, sometimes within my tears ... she met my heart with many different faces

Title: Do Badan
Quote: Dil ke paas rehne waala jab door chala jaata hai ... tabhi pata chalta hai hum usse kitna pyar karte hai
Trans: When the one that is close to our heart goes far away ... then only we come to know how much we love them

Title: Do Badan
Quote: Pyar ki seema sirf issi duniya tak nahi ... pyar toh bhavnaon ka ek aaisa phool hai ... joh ek janam se doosre janam aur phir janam janam tak mahekta rehta hai
Trans: Love is not just limited to this world ... love is a flower of emotions ... which provides it's fragrance from one life to another and then for eternity

Title: Do Badan
Quote: Humko toh gardish-e-haalat pe rona aaya ... rone waale tujhe kis baat pe rona aaya?
Trans: I was crying looking at my situation ... what are you crying for?

Title: Bas Itna Sa Khwaab Hai
Quote: Mauka jitna chota shabd hai na ... utni hi derr ke liye aata hai
Trans: Chance is a small word ... and it stays for the same amount of time

Title: Bas Itna Sa Khwaab Hai
Quote: Aadmi khane se gareeb hota hai, kapdon se gareeb hota hai ... lekin agar vicharon se gareeb ho na ... toh woh uski apni galati hoti hai
Trans: A man can be poor by what he eats, what he wears ... but if he is poor by his thoughts ... then that is his own mistake

Title: Bas Itna Sa Khwaab Hai
Quote: Saintalis ke pehle angrez jaan le rahe the ... saintalis ke baad angrezi jaan le rahi hai
Trans: Before 1947 the Englishmen were killing us ... and after 1947 English is killing us

Title: Bas Itna Sa Khwaab Hai
Quote: Sanskaron ka baandh bahut mazboot hota hai ... yeh milta hai pyar se, pariwar se aur desh se
Trans: The bonds of rituals are very strong ... you get them from love, from family and from the country

Title: Aaj Ka Arjun
Quote: Jiske sar par kafan banda ho ... uske sar par sehra nahi bandh sakta
Trans: The one who wears a shroud on his head ... he can't wear a turban on his head

Title: Aaj Ka Arjun
Quote: Jab zulm sehne waala apna sar jhuka leta hai ... toh zulm karne waale ki taqat badh jaati hai
Trans: When the person bearing the injustice bows his head down ... then the strength of the person doing the injustice grows

Title: Aaj Ka Arjun
Quote: Tumhare jaise gunahgaron ke khilaf mere jaise officer ... file nahi banate ... faisla kar dete hai
Trans: Against criminals like you, officers like me ... don't make a file ... they decide the verdict

Title: Aaj Ka Arjun
Quote: Talwar kitni bhi tezz ho ... lekin apne mayaan ko kabhi nahi kaatti
Trans: No matter how sharp a sword is ... it never cuts it's own scabbard

Title: Charas
Quote: Joh aurat kisi ke pyar ki kasam kha chuki ho ... woh paraye mard ke haath lagne se hi mar jaati hai
Trans: A woman who has sworn upon her love ... will die even if a strange man touches her

Title: Charas
Quote: Khushi toh naam hai tumse nazar milane ka ... nazar milana ek bahana hai dil lagane ka
Trans: Happiness is the name of looking into your eyes ... and to look into your eyes is just one reason to love you

Title: Charas
Quote: Lalach insaan ko ek pagal kutta bana deti hai ... joh apne malik ko bhi kaat leta hai
Trans: Greed turns a person into a mad dog ... the one who even bites his master

Title: Charas
Quote: Mere dil mein toh ek jwalamukhi hai jiske dhadakte sholon mein ... in logon ko zinda jala dene ko jee chahta hai
Trans: I wish to burn these people alive ... in the lava of the volcano that is in my heart

Title: Auzaar
Quote: Jab do dost dushman bante hai ... toh aur bhi zyada khatarnak hote hai ... kyun ki woh ek doosre ki kamzori jante hai
Trans: When two friends become enemies ... then they become more dangerous ... because they know about each others weaknesses

Title: Auzaar
Quote: Yeh illaka tera ho, tere baap ka ho, ya tere baap ke baap ka ho ... yeh desh hamara hai
Trans: Whether this area is yours, your fathers, or your grandfathers ... this country is mine

Title: Auzaar
Quote: Aadmi ko hamesha ladna chahiye ... lekin jiska time achcha ho usse ladna nahi chahiye
Trans: A man should always fight ... but not with a person who has a good time going on

Title: Auzaar
Quote: Aaj shyam ka suraj doobne se pehle agar mujhe paise nahi mile ... toh duniya ki bheed mein kal tum bhi kisi ko nahi miloge
Trans: If I don't get the money before today's sunset ... then tomorrow you will not be found in the crowd of this world

Title: Baazi
Quote: Agar shatranj ki baazi jeetni ho ... toh usse dus dimaag se nahi, ek dimaag se khelna chahiye
Trans: If you want to win the game of chess ... then play it with one brain, and with not 10 brains

Title: Baazi
Quote: Dole dole mera bhi dil dole ... isse pehle ki meri joote bole ... tu patli gali hole
Trans: My hearts is singing ... but before my shoes talk ... you get out from here

Title: Baazi
Quote: Tumhare jism mein main itne chhed kar doonga ... ki marne ke baad bhi saale basuri ki tarah bajhte rahoge
Trans: I will make so many holes in your body ... that bloody even after dying you will play like a flute

Title: Baazi
Quote: Joh doosro ko tapkane ki himmat rakhte hai ... un mein khud bhi tapakne ka kaleja rehta hai
Trans: Those who have the courage to kill others ... they also have the courage to die

Title: Aaja Nachle
Quote: Kaam samajh kar karogi toh mushkil hai ... pyar samajh kar karogi toh kuch bhi nahi
Trans: It will be hard if you do it thinking it as work ... but if you do it as love then it is nothing

Title: Aaja Nachle
Quote: Kalakar banne ki chah ko bahar agar hai lana ... toh sheeshey ko thodi takleef dijiye aur dil ko ek bahana
Trans: If you want to bring out your interest of becoming an actor ... then give the mirror some difficulties and your heart a reason

Title: Aaja Nachle
Quote: Joh ek baar bhaagte hai ... woh hamesha bhaagte rehte hai
Trans: Those who run once ... they keep running forever

Title: Aaja Nachle
Quote: Style bhi toh koi cheez hoti hai
Trans: Style is also something

Title: Aisha
Quote: Pyar koi toofan nahi hai joh aaye aur duniya badal de ... woh toh zindagi ke chote chote lamhon mein hota hai
Trans: Love is not a storm that will change the world ... it is within the small small moments of life

Title: Aisha
Quote: Tum ne mujhe zindagi ka sahi rasta dikhaya hai ... galat aur sahi mein fark dikhaya hai ... sehna sikhaya hai, samajhna sikhaya hai, dosti nibhana sikhaya hai ... aur chahna bhi
Trans: You've shown me the right path of life ... you've shown me the difference between right and wrong ... you've taught me to bear, to understand, to fulfill friendship ... and to love as well

Title: Aisha
Quote: Main duniya ki sabse sundar ladki toh nahi hoon, sabse smart bhi nahi hoon ... par uski nazar mein main hoon
Trans: I am not the most beautiful girl in the world, neither the smartest ... but I am in his view

Title: Aisha
Quote: Agar main tumhe kho doongi na ... toh main khud ko kho doongi
Trans: If I lose you ... then I will lose myself

Title: Bang Bang
Quote: Woh yeh soochte hai ki tum kuch jaanti ho ... par woh yeh nahi jaante ki tum kuch nahi jaanti
Trans: They think that you know something ... but they don't know that you don't know anything

Title: Bang Bang
Quote: Main toh roz yeh maankar nikalta hoon ki ... yeh mera aakhri din hai
Trans: I leave everyday thinking that ... this is my last day

Title: Bang Bang
Quote: Joh desh ke liye ladte hai ... unki maut ka countdown unki pehli saans ke saath shuru ho jaata hai
Trans: Those who fight for their country ... the countdown of their death starts with their first breath

Title: Bang Bang
Quote: In aankhon mein gaur se dekh ... na toh in mein marne gham hai, na maut ka khauff ... sirf garv hai
Trans: Look properly in these eyes ... neither there is the sorrow of dying, nor there is the fear of death ... there is only pride in it

Title: Mili
Quote: Dosti achchi ya buri nahi hoti ... dost achche ya bure hote hai
Trans: Friendship is not either good or bad ... friends are either good or bad

Title: Mili
Quote: Waqt ke saath saath aadmi thoda bahut zaroor badalna chahiye ... varna waqt burra maan jaata hai
Trans: With time a person should change at least just a little bit ... or else time feels bad

Title: Mili
Quote: Aaj kal achche chawal ki tarah ... achche ladke bhi black mein milte hai
Trans: Just like good rice today ... you get good guys in the black market as well

Title: Agni Varsha
Quote: Jungle mein jeevan narak hota hai
Trans: Life is a hell in the jungle

Title: Agni Varsha
Quote: Boond boond se sagar banta hai ... aur kiran kiran se suraj
Trans: Drops make the ocean ... and sunrays make the sun

Title: Agni Varsha
Quote: Badi shaktiyon ka prayog har din ki mushkilon ko suljhane ke liye nahi karna chahiye ... woh toh antargyan dene ke liye hoti hai
Trans: You shouldn't use the big powers to solve everyday problems ... they are there to give us self realisation

Title: Adalat
Quote: Bhagwan jab dukh dard devat hai ... toh saath saath sehan shakti bhi devat hai
Trans: When god gives sadness and pain ... then along with that he also gives the power to bear that

Title: Adalat
Quote: Ladki zindagi mein sirf do baar ghar chhodkar jaati hai ... ek baar jab apne maa baap ke ghar se uski doli jaati hai ... doosri baar apne pati ke ghar uski arthi uthti hai
Trans: A girl leaves her house only twice in her life ... first when her palanquin leaves from her parents house ... and second when her funeral leaves from her husbands house

Title: Adalat
Quote: Khamosh rehna aur chup-chap sab kuch sehne ka naam hi aurat hai
Trans: To stay quiet and to bear everything silently is what we call as a woman

Title: Adalat
Quote: Hamare kaam mein joh aadmi hoshiyar nahi rehta ... woh kisi waqt bhi phas sakta hai
Trans: In our work the one who is not alert ... he can get caught anytime

Title: Bheja Fry
Quote: Chinta chitta ke samaan hoti hai
Trans: Worry is just like a funeral pyre

Title: Bheja Fry
Quote: Purush ka asli sammaan uske ekagrah mein hai ... uske power of control mein hai
Trans: The real honour of a man lies in his focus ... in his power of control

Title: Bheja Fry
Quote: Tera gaana sunke toh behra bhi tujhe apne ghar se nikaal dega
Trans: Even a deaf person will throw you out of his house after listening to your song

Title: Bheja Fry
Quote: Door jana hi hai toh paap se door jao ... paapi se door kyun jaate ho
Trans: If you want to go far then go far from the sin ... why are you going far from the sinner

Title: Maine Dil Tujhko Diya
Quote: Meri duniya mein mere paas khone ke liye kuch nahi hai ... lekin tumhari duniya mein tumhare paas khone ke liye bahut kuch hai
Trans: In my world I have nothing to lose ... but in your world you have a lot to lose

Title: Maine Dil Tujhko Diya
Quote: Pyar karna, izhaar karna bahut hi aasaan hai ... lekin usko nibhana bahut mushkil
Trans: It's very easy to love and to disclose your love ... but it's very hard to fulfill it

Title: Maine Dil Tujhko Diya
Quote: Baahon mein Tina, kamar mein Meena, kandhon mein Leena aur sar par Henna ... yaar tune toh apne pyar ka ek Jumbo circus banakar rakha hai
Trans: You have Tina in your arms, Meena around your waist, Leena on your shoulders and Henna on your head ... my friend you have made a Jumbo circus of your love

Title: Maine Dil Tujhko Diya
Quote: Jiske paas ho pyar ki amanat ... ab Allah karega uski hifazat
Trans: The one who has the trust in love ... now God will protect him

Title: Aakhree Raasta
Quote: Sacha bahadur wohi hota hai joh toofani samundar ke beech mein ja karke machli pakadne ka jaal phekta hai ... kinare behetkar pani mein kaanta daale machli ke phasne ka intezar karne waale ko bahadur nahi kehte
Trans: A true courageous person is someone who throws a net to catch the fish in the middle of a storm in an ocean ... because someone who sits on the shore, throws a net and waits for the fish to get caught in, is not called a courageous person

Title: Aakhree Raasta
Quote: Bahar khade rehkar tamasha dekhne waala sirf vedant jhaad sakta hai ... kisi ke andhar ki peedha nahi samajh sakta
Trans: The one who stands outside and watches the entertainment can only talk about philosophy ... they can't understand the problem within someone

Title: Aakhree Raasta
Quote: Dushmano ko maaf karna insaaniyat hai ... lekin makkaron ko maaf karna bewakoofi hai
Trans: It is humanity to forgive enemies ... but it is foolishness to forgive sly people

Title: Aakhree Raasta
Quote: Tum kya samajhti ho Krishna bhagwan tumhe bachane aayenge ... woh Mahabharat mein aaye the ... is Bharat mein nahi aayenge
Trans: What do you think that Lord Krishna will come to save you ... he had come in the Mahabharata ... he won't come in this India

Title: Keemat
Quote: Humne koi dharam khata nahi khol rakha hai ... hum jab kuch deta hai toh uske badle mein kuch leta bhi hai
Trans: I haven't opened an free account in the name of religion ... when I give something then I take something in exchange for that

Title: Keemat
Quote: Tum aur tumhare dost is waqt meri hukumat mein ho ... aur yahan par meri ijazat ke baigar ek patta bhi nahi hil sakta
Trans: Right now you and your friends are under my rule ... and here without my permission not even a leaf can move

Title: Keemat
Quote: Tumhari building ko police ne charon taraf se gher rakha hai ... aur agar main do minute ke andar andar yahan se bahar nahi gaya ... toh tumhari aur is building ki dhajjiyan udaa di jayengi
Trans: The police has surrounded your building from all four sides ... and if I don't go out in the next two minutes from here ... then you and your building will be blown into pieces

Title: Chachi 420
Quote: Tum ek bahut badi daayan ho joh apne aap ko Draupadi se kam nahi samajhti hai
Trans: You are a big witch who thinks she is not any less than Draupadi

Title: Chachi 420
Quote: Kanoon shaadi ko todh sakta hai ... pyar ko nahi
Trans: The law can break a marriage ... but not love

Title: Chachi 420
Quote: Zindagi sirf pyar par nahi palti ... zindagi chalane ke liye paisa chahiye, aaram chahiye, rutba chahiye
Trans: Life doesn't live only on love ... for life to move you need money, relaxation, status

Title: Chachi 420
Quote: Chandni Chowk mein chandni raat mein chachi ne chacha ko chandi ke chamach se chutney chatayi
Trans: Aunty fed uncle chutney in a silver spoon in Chandni Chowk on a night with the moon

Title: Batwara
Quote: Joh sar par kafan bandkar nikalte hai ... woh anjaam nahi sochte
Trans: Those who leave wearing a shroud on their head ... they don't think about the consequence

Title: Batwara
Quote: Pyar aur dushmani mein ek hi kadam ka faasla hove hai
Trans: There is only a difference of one step between love and enmity

Title: Batwara
Quote: Goli ka jawab goli se denge aur loot ka jawab loot se
Trans: In reply we will give a bullet for a bullet and theft for a theft

Title: Batwara
Quote: Dost marte hai, dosti nahi marti
Trans: Friends die, but friendship doesn't die

Title: Cheeni Kum
Quote: Dil mein joh hai woh bol dena chahiye ... aaise dabake nahi rakhna chahiye ... acidity ho jaati hai
Trans: You must say whatever is in your heart ... you shouldn't hide it ... because it causes acidity

Title: Cheeni Kum
Quote: Tu sad-sad kyun hai, happy-sad kyun nahi ... hum sad kyun hote hai ... kyun ki mann bhaari hai, heavy heavy ... mann kab heavy heavy hota hai ... jab mann ko koi hurt karta hai ... mann ko kaun itna hurt kar sakta hai ... joh mann ke very very close hota hai ... mann ke very very close kaun hota hai ... jiske saath mann very very happy feel karta hai ... happy tha, is liye sad hai na ... so be happy-sad, not sad-sad
Trans: Why are you sad-sad, and why not happy-sad ... why do we feel sad ... because our heart feels heavy ... when does the heart feel heavy ... when someone hurts our heart ... who can hurt our heart so much ... the one who is close to our heart ... who is close to our heart ... the one with whom our heart feels happy ... so you were happy, that's why you are sad ... so be happy-sad, not sad-sad

Title: Cheeni Kum
Quote: Khana banana duniya ki sabse badi kala hai
Trans: Cooking food is the biggest talent in the world

Title: Cheeni Kum
Quote: Aadmi budha tab hota hai ... jab uske andhar jeene ki ichcha khatam ho jaati hai
Trans: A person becomes old ... when the desire to live within him ends

Title: Dev
Quote: Muddha yeh nahi hai ki main jeeton ya haaron ... muddha yeh bhi nahi hai ki main jeeyon ya maar diya jaon ... muddha yeh hai ki ek police officer hone ke naathe mera joh farz hai ... usse mein imaandari se nibha raha hoon ya nahi ... ek insaan hone ne naathe satya ke liye, satya ki vijay ke liye main ladh raha hoon ya nahi
Trans: The issue is not whether I win or lose ... the issue is not also whether I live or get killed ...  the issue is that being a police officer what my duties are ... whether I am fulfilling them with honesty or not ... being a person whether I am fighting or not for the truth and the victory of truth

Title: Dev
Quote: Shakti joh hai woh police, fauj, hathyaron mein nahi hoti ... desh ki shakti uske rajnaitik dhanche mein hoti hai, uski economy mein hoti hai, uski nyay pranali mein hoti hai ... samaaji barabari aur mazhabi bhai-chare mein hoti hai ... aur yeh sab kuch hum mein hamara samvidhaan hum mein deta hai
Trans: Power doesn't lie in the police, the military, the weapons ... the power of a country lies within its political nature, within its economy, within its law and order ... within its equality in society and brotherhood amongst its religions ... and we get all this from our constitution

Title: Dev
Quote: Is desh mein politics hi sabse bada hathyara hai
Trans: In this country politics is the biggest killer

Title: Dev
Quote: Yeh desh hai toh samvidhaan hai ... desh nahi toh uske samvidhaan, uske kanoon ka koi wajood nahi
Trans: The constitution exists because this country exists ... if the country didn't exist then its constitution, its law has no existence

Title: Khelein Hum Jee Jaan Sey
Quote: Agar apni azaadi ke liye ladna apradh hai ... toh haan maine apradh kiya hai
Trans: If fighting for our independence is a crime ... then yes I have committed a crime

Title: Khelein Hum Jee Jaan Sey
Quote: Kranti ka rasta aaisi paristitiyon se guzarta hai ... joh striyon ke liye surakshit nahi hai
Trans: The path of revolution passes through circumstances ... that are not safe for women

Title: Khelein Hum Jee Jaan Sey
Quote: Aapka shasan jise apradh kehta hai ... hamari bhasha mein usse kranti kehte hai
Trans: What your reign calls a crime ... in our language we call it revolution

Title: Khelein Hum Jee Jaan Sey
Quote: Sahi tarika apnaoge toh badi se badi kathenayi hal ho sakti hai
Trans: If you take the right approach then even the biggest problem can be solved

Title: Suhaag
Quote: Kisi bhi achchi cheez ko mashoor hone mein waqt lagta hai
Trans: Any good thing takes time to become famous

Title: Suhaag
Quote: Aap hi jaise logon ki buzdili ki kok se nikli hui najayaz aulaaden hai yeh
Trans: These guys are illegitimate children who are born from the womb of cowards like you

Title: Suhaag
Quote: Jitna khoon mere haath se baha hai ... utna toh tune maa ka doodh bhi nahi piya hoga
Trans: The amount of blood that has flown from my hand ... you haven't even drunk that much milk from your mother

Title: Suhaag
Quote: Har aurat ko bhabi aur har ladki ko behen kahunga ... sivah tumhare
Trans: I will treat every woman as my sister-in-law and every girl as my sister ... except you

Title: Dhartiputra
Quote: Duniya mein sab kuch mil jaye, sab kuch ... lekin maa nahi mili, toh samjho kuch nahi mila
Trans: Even if you get everything in this world ... but if you don't have a mother, then you don't have anything

Title: Dhartiputra
Quote: Ghar ka doodh chahe jitna shudh ho ... baazar ki chai peene ka kuch mazaa hi aur hota hai
Trans: No matter how pure the milk in the house is ... the fun of drinking tea from outside is something else

Title: Dhartiputra
Quote: Oonchai par rehne waale ko har waqt sar jhukakar baat karni padti hai ... aur neeche waale hamesha sar uthakar baat karte hai
Trans: People on the top always have to talk keeping their head down ... and the people at the bottom always talk with their head held high

Title: Dhartiputra
Quote: Agar tum mere aur meri duty ke beech aaye ... toh main tumhare aur tumhari saanson ke beech aa jaonga
Trans: If you come in between me and my duty ... then I will come in between you and your breathes

Title: Ungli
Quote: Jitna dum aapke ek haath mein nahi hai ... utna dum hamari ek ungli mein hai
