Trans: The amount of power that you don't have in one hand of yours ... we have that much power in one finger of ours

Title: Ungli
Quote: Jab ghee seedhi aur tedhi dono ungliyon se na nikle ... toh beech ka rasta apnana padta hai
Trans: When you can't remove clarified butter using both a straight and a crooked finger ... then you should adopt the middle solution

Title: Ungli
Quote: Jab main phodna shuru karoonga na ... toh iski koi guarantee nahi hai ki kya kya phutega
Trans: When I start breaking things ... then there is no guarantee what all will break

Title: Ungli
Quote: Mujhe sudhaarte sudhaarte ... sudhaarne waale bighad gaye
Trans: In trying to improve me ... the people who were trying to improve me became bad

Title: Dil Hai Tumhara
Quote: Pyar paana sabki kismat mein nahi hota
Trans: Not everyone is destined to achieve love

Title: Dil Hai Tumhara
Quote: Tum meri zindagi mein ajnabee banke aaye the ... lekin ab tum iske maalik ho
Trans: You came into my life as a stranger ... but now you have become the owner of it

Title: Dil Hai Tumhara
Quote: Zindagi mein hamesha apna faida nahi dekhna chahiye ... kabhi kabhi kuch kaam doosron ki bhalai ke liye bhi karne chahiye
Trans: In life you shouldn't always think about your profit ... sometimes you should do some work that benefits others also

Title: Dil Hai Tumhara
Quote: Yeh woh lamhe hai jin mein maine tumhari saanson ko chua hai ... jin mein maine ek bahut haseen sa khwaab dekha hai ... yeh lamhe kabhi guzar nahi sakte
Trans: These are the moments in which I have touched your breathe ... in which I have seen a very beautiful dream ... these moments can never pass away

Title: Haider
Quote: Jab tak hum apne inteqam se azaad nahi ho jaate ... tab tak koi azaadi hum mein azaad nahi kar sakti
Trans: Until we free ourselves from our revenge ... till then no freedom can make us free

Title: Haider
Quote: Kiska jhoot, jhoot hai ... kiske sach mein sach nahi ... hai ki hai nahi, bas yahi sawaal hai ... aur sawaal ka jawaab bhi sawaal hai
Trans: Whose lie is a lie ... whose truth is not the truth ... whether it's there or not, just that's the question ... and the answer of the question is also a question

Title: Haider
Quote: Darya bhi main, darakht bhi main ... Jhelum bhi main, chinar bhi main ... dair bhi hoon, haram bhi hoon ... Shai bhi hoon, Sunni bhi hoon, main hoon pandit ... main tha, main hoon aur main hi rahoonga
Trans: I'm the sea, I'm the tree ... I'm the river Jhelum, I'm the aspen tree ... I'm the temple, I'm the sin ... I'm Shai, I'm Sunni, I'm a pandit ... I was there, I am here and I will be there

Title: Haider
Quote: Dil ki agar sunu toh hai, dimag ki toh hai nahi ... jaan loon ki jaan doon, main rahoon ki main nahi
Trans: If I listen to my heart then you are there, if I listen to my mind then not ... should I take a life or give my life, should I live or not

Title: Dhoop Chhaon
Quote: Jin rahon mein tum mere saath nahi chalogi ... vishvas karo un rahon mein bhatak-bhatakar main apni jaan de doonga
Trans: The paths on which you will not walk with me ... trust me I'll go around those paths and give up my life

Title: Dhoop Chhaon
Quote: Madira ki dukaan mein gangajal ko bhi log sharab hi samajh lete hai
Trans: In an alcohol shop people think even the holy water is alcohol

Title: Dhoop Chhaon
Quote: Nazuk rishtey tootne ke baad ... kabhi nahi judhte
Trans: Once weak relationships break ... then they can't be fixed

Title: Dhoop Chhaon
Quote: Joh doosron ki duniya andheri karte hai ... unki apni duniya mein bhi kabhi roshni nahi aati
Trans: Those who make the world of others dark ... light never comes in their own world

Title: Yeh Hai Jalwa
Quote: Apni kalayi mein achchi ghadi bandhane ka yeh matlab nahi hota ki tumhara achcha waqt aa gaya hai
Trans: Just by wearing a nice watch on your wrist doesn't mean that your good time has come along

Title: Yeh Hai Jalwa
Quote: Hamare Hindustani culture mein ek aur baat kehte hai ... ki pehle pyar se samajhao, phir sharafat se samajhao, phir baat se samajhao ... aur jab samajh mein nahi aaya na toh thapad se aur phir laat se
Trans: In our Indian culture we say one thing that ... first make them understand with love, then make them understand politely, then make them understand with words ... and if they still don't understand then use slaps and kicks

Title: Yeh Hai Jalwa
Quote: Jab kuch bhi nahi tha, toh sab kuch tha kyun ki tu thi ... aaj sab kuch hai, toh kuch bhi nahi kyun ki tu chali gayi
Trans: When we had nothing, we still had everything because you were there ... today we have everything, but still we have nothing because you left

Title: Road
Quote: Police waale jahan se sochna band kar dete hai ... Babu wahan se sochna shuru karta hai
Trans: From where the policemen stop thinking ... Babu starts to think from there

Title: Road
Quote: Zindagi bhi ek ajeeb road ki tarah hai ... pata nahi kab kisse takkar ho jaye
Trans: Life is like a strange road ... you never know when and with whom will you come across

Title: Road
Quote: Pyar jaate jaate jaata hai
Trans: Love goes away very slowly

Title: Road
Quote: Main jab sochta hoon toh doosron ko takleef deta hoon
Trans: When I think, then I give trouble to others

Title: Aradhana
Quote: Apne bachchon ke khatir kabhi na kabhi har maa ko rona padta hai ... koi aasoon bahakar roti hai aur koi aasoon peekar
Trans: Every mother has to cry for her children at some point or the other ... some cry by shedding tears and some by drinking the tears

Title: Aradhana
Quote: Mann ko jalane se dukh door nahi hota hai ... dukh ko toh koshish karke bhulana padta hai
Trans: Sadness doesn't go away by burning the heart ... you have to try to forget sadness

Title: Aradhana
Quote: Prem mein mazaa hi tab aata hai jab ladki gusse waali ho
Trans: The fun in love comes only when the girl is short tempered

Title: Aradhana
Quote: Ek chota sa zakhm bahut gehra daag ban sakta hai ... aur ek choti si mulaqat jeevan bhar ka saath ban sakti hai
Trans: One small wound can turn into a very deep mark ... and one small meeting can turn into a company for lifetime

Title: Jurm (2005)
Quote: Socha na tha mohabbat ka yeh bhi anjaam aayega ... royegi tu aur dil ko mere qaraar aayega
Trans: I had not thought that even this consequence will come in love ... that you will cry and my heart will feel satisfied

Title: Jurm (2005)
Quote: Bewakoof dost se samajhdar dushman zyada achcha hota hai
Trans: A smart enemy is better than a foolish friend

Title: Jurm (2005)
Quote: Jab pyar se bharosa hat jaye ... toh wohi pyar kitni jaldi nafrat mein badal jaata hai
Trans: When you don't believe in your love ... then that love quickly changes into hatred

Title: Jurm (2005)
Quote: Ab tak joh kuch unhone mere saath kiya maine socha nahi tha ... aur ab joh main unke saath karoonga woh unhone nahi socha hoga
Trans: Until now what they have done to me, I had not thought of that ... and now what I am going to do with them, that they would have not thought of

Title: Mafia
Quote: Jeena agar joh chaho, toh door humse rehna ... tum maum se bane ho, hum aag se bane hai
Trans: If you want to live, then stay away from me ...you are made from wax, and I'm made from fire

Title: Mafia
Quote: Hum mafia is pani ki tarah hai ... dosti ki mithaas mila de, amrit ban jayega ... dushmani ka zehar gholega, jaan lelega
Trans: We mafia are like water ... if you mix the sweetness of friendship, then we'll become the holy water ... and if you mix the poison of enmity, then it will kill you

Title: Mafia
Quote: Kis kis ko yaad ki jiye, kis kis ko royiye ... aaram badi cheez hai, mooh dhakke soyiye
Trans: Who all to remember, who all to cry for ... resting is a big thing, cover your face and sleep

Title: Mafia
Quote: Yeh waqt mera hai ... aur aaj hukumat bhi meri hai
Trans: This time is my mine ... and today the rule is also mine

Title: Aan Milo Sajna
Quote: Jiyo toh sabke liye ... maro toh sabke liye
Trans: If you live then live for everyone ... if you die then die for everyone

Title: Aan Milo Sajna
Quote: Zameen toh kisi ke baap ki nahi hai ... zameen toh bhagwan ki hai, mehnat kisaan ki aur anaaj saare desh ka hai
Trans: The land doesn't belong to anyones father ... the land belongs to god, the farmers work hard on it and the crops are of the entire country

Title: Aan Milo Sajna
Quote: Jise dost ka haath thaam le aur maa ka aashirwad mil jaye ... woh zindagi ki har manzil tay kar sakta hai
Trans: The one who has the support of a friend and blessings from a mother ... he can achieve every goal in life

Title: Aan Milo Sajna
Quote: Agar duniya mein maut se badi sachai koi nahi ... toh sach maniye aapko dhoka dekar meri zindagi bhi maut se kam nahi
Trans: If there isn't anything more true than death in this world ... then believe me by deceiving you, my life is nothing less than death

Title: Ajooba
Quote: Main fauladi shaitan ki madad se sultan toh kya ... sari duniya par fateh hasil kar sakta hoon ... shaitan zindabad, shaitan zindabad
Trans: With the help of the strong devil ... I am going to win over the entire world and not just the emperor ... long live the devil, long live the devil

Title: Ajooba
Quote: Sukh aur dukh dono uparwaale ki den hai ... is liye sukh ki tarah dukh ko bhi apnana seekho
Trans: Happiness and sadness are both gods gift ... that's why just like happiness learn to adopt sadness also

Title: Ajooba
Quote: Jako rakhe saiyan, maar sake na koi ... baal na baka kar sake, joh jag bairi hoye
Trans: If God is protecting you, then there is no one that can harm you ... no one can even touch your hair, even if the whole world is against you

Title: Ajooba
Quote: Husn ka deewana hoon ... kabhi bhawara, kabhi bulbul, kabhi parwana hoon
Trans: I am crazy for a beautiful body ... sometimes I am a bee, sometimes I am a bird, sometimes I am a lover

Title: Jeene Nahi Doonga
Quote: Main teri itni botiyan karoonga ... ki aaj gaon ka koi bhi kutta bhookha nahi soyega
Trans: I'll cut you into so many pieces ... that today no dog of the village will sleep hungry

Title: Jeene Nahi Doonga
Quote: Barood tumhare andhar bhi bhara hai ... bomb mere seene mein bhi sulag rahe hai ... dhamaka jab hoga bade zor ka hoga
Trans: The gunpowder is filled within you ... the bombs are also igniting in my body ... whenever the blast happens, it will be very loud

Title: Jeene Nahi Doonga
Quote: Isaaniyat ka dhood pilane se saanpon ka zehar aur badhta hai
Trans: Snakes become more poisonous when they are fed the milk of humanity

Title: Jeene Nahi Doonga
Quote: Insaaniyat inteqam nahi ... insaaf chahti hai, aman chahti hai
Trans: Humanity doesn't want revenge ... it wants justice, it wants peace

Title: Mere Yaar Ki Shaadi Hai
Quote: Hai aaj mere yaar ki shaadi magar main khush nahi hoon ... hai kisi ke pyar ki shaadi magar main khush nahi hoon ... maine roka usse, toka usse samjhaya bhi ... deke vaasta apni yaari ka manaya bhi ... uski rah ka patthar bana aur kaanta bhi ... phool banke uske samne murjhaya bhi ... le karke chal diya hai woh baharen dahej mein ... hai gul-e-gulzar ki shaadi magar main khush nahi hoon ... hai aaj mere yaar ki shaadi magar main khush nahi hoon ... hai kisi ke pyar ki shaadi magar main khush nahi hoon
Trans: Today is my friends wedding but I'm not happy ... today is someone's love's wedding but I'm not happy ... I tried to stop him, question him and make him understand ... I even tried to persuade using the concern of our friendship ... I even became the stone and the thorn of his path ... I even withered as a flower in front of him ... but he walked taking the blossom of spring as dowry ... it's my best friends wedding but I'm not happy ... today is my friends wedding but I'm not happy ... today is someone's love's wedding but I'm not happy

Title: Mere Yaar Ki Shaadi Hai
Quote: Kabhi nahi socha tumne ki saari umar jhule par tumhara haath thaame joh ladki baithi hai ... uska is poore jahan mein le deke bas ek dost hi kyun hai ... kabhi nahi socha ki jis ladki ne ek ladke ke saath bachpan se jawani tak ka safar tay kiya ... usse apni baki zindagi ke liye kisi aur ki zaroorat kyun hoti ... kabhi nahi socha ki us pagli ke liye uska woh ek hi dost kaafi tha ... woh ek hi ladka ... tum
Trans: You never thought that the girl who is sitting holding your hand on the swing ... give or take, why does she have only one friend ... you never thought that the girl who has travelled the journey from childhood to youth along with one guy ... why would she need someone else for the rest of her life ... you never thought for that crazy girl, her one friend was more than enough ... that one guy ... you

Title: Mere Yaar Ki Shaadi Hai
Quote: Zindagi ke bade bade faisle in choti choti baaton se nahi liye jaate
Trans: The big decisions of life should never be taken with these small things

Title: Mere Yaar Ki Shaadi Hai
Quote: Purani cheezein kabhi dhokha nahi deti
Trans: Old things never cheat

Title: Aunty No. 1
Quote: Vaise toh main ek frustated aadmi hoon ... meri story ka pata nahi hai ... finance ka thikana nahi hai ... hero date nahi de raha hai ... heroine keh rahi hai ki main poore kapde pehnungi
Trans: I'm a frustrated person ... I don't know where my story is ... I don't know about my finances ... the hero is not giving any date ... the heroine is saying she will wear full clothes

Title: Aunty No. 1
Quote: Yeh duniya jhoot ke paiyon par chalne waali woh gaadi hai ... jis mein petrol ki jagah gareebon ke armaan jalte hai
Trans: This world is a car that runs on the wheels of lies ... which burns the hopes of the poor people rather than petrol

Title: Aunty No. 1
Quote: Vishvas vaade ke daldal ki zameen par khadi dhue ki woh deewar hai ... jispe na toh koi insaan reh sakta hai aur naa hi koi sachai ki keel thok sakta hai
Trans: Trust is a wall of smoke that is standing on the ground of a bog of promise ... on which no person can stand and neither can anyone put a nail of truth on it

Title: Aunty No. 1
Quote: Bheek maange se aadmi zaleel aur zaar hota hai ... aur nikal jaye jis phool se khushbo, woh phool bekaar hota hai
Trans: By begging a person becomes humiliated and shameful ... and the flower which has lost its fragrance, that flower is useless

Title: Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega
Quote: Kutta chahe bunglay mein rahe yah gali mein, doodh piye ya naale ka pani ... uski dum seedhi nahi hoti ... kyun ki basically woh kutta hai
Trans: Whether a dog lives in a bungalow or in the streets, whether he drinks milk or the gutter water ... his tail doesn't become straight ... because basically he is a dog

Title: Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega
Quote: Aslam bhai ko joh raag patti deta hai na ... usko Aslam bhai malam patti deta hai
Trans: The one who acts smart with rowdy Aslam ... rowdy Aslam smashes him up

Title: Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega
Quote: Chande mein aur dhande mein Aslam bhai ke liye sab dharam samaan hai
Trans: For rowdy Aslam, donation and business are both like his religion

Title: Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega
Quote: Aadmi purani cheezon se ughta jaata hai ... aur nayi cheezon se uthta jaata hai
Trans: People get bored of old things ... and they get excited with new things

Title: Dushman Duniya Ka
Quote: Jab insaan nasha karko haivaan ban jaata ... toh haivaan nasha karko shaitaan hi banega na
Trans: When a human gets intoxicated he becomes a monster ... hence when a monster gets intoxicated he will obviously become a devil

Title: Dushman Duniya Ka
Quote: Horror shows, horror novels kabhi mat padna ... dimaag ke khaate mein haddiyon ka dhancha nazar aata hai
Trans: Don't watch horror shows and read horror novels ... because your brain then looks like a frame of bones

Title: Dushman Duniya Ka
Quote: Koyle ko kitna bhi sabun lagao ... woh kaala ka kaala hi rahega
Trans: No matter how much soap you apply to charcoal ... it remains black

Title: De Taali
Quote: Krishna kare toh raas leela ... hum kare toh character dheela
Trans: If Lord Krishna does it then it's dance and play ... but if I do it then my character is loose

Title: De Taali
Quote: Shola ya shabnam, naa toh hai hi ... koshish karke dekh le ... shayad haan ho jaye
Trans: Whether you get the girl or fire, you already have a no ... but give it shot ... may be it will turn into a yes

Title: De Taali
Quote: Life hum mein itna sab kuch deti hai ... aur hum itne se ke liye aankh band karke behte rehte hai
Trans: Life gives us so much ... but we still sit keeping our eyes closed for smaller things

Title: Aankhen (1993)
Quote: Imaandari kitni bhi bewakoof ho ... aakhir ek din uski tarakki zaroor hoti hai ... aur baimaani kitni bhi chalaak ho ... ek din usse jail mein zaroor jana padta hai
Trans: No matter how foolish honesty is ... one day it definitely advances ... and no matter how smart dishonesty is ... one day it definitely has to go to the jail

Title: Aankhen (1993)
Quote: (Woh qurbani dega kaun?) - Dega kaun, dega kaun, dega kaun kya ... kamine tu dega qurbani!
Trans: (Who will give the sacrifice?) - Who will give, who will give, what who will give ... bloody you will give the sacrifice!

Title: Aankhen (1993)
Quote: Jab aurat lachaar ho jaati hai toh pesha karne lagti hai ... aur jab mard kamzor ban jaata hai toh tum jaisa mujrim aur baimaan ho jaata hai
Trans: When a woman becomes helpless then she sells herself ... and when a man becomes weak then he becomes a criminal and cheat like you

Title: Aankhen (1993)
Quote: Bata de haramzade ... nahi toh tadap tadapkar aur sisak sisakar marega tu
Trans: Tell me you bastard ... or else you'll wriggle and moan and then die

Title: Darna Zaroori Hai
Quote: Zindagi ka koi bharosa nahi hai ... lekin ek baat ka bharosa hai ... life insurance ka
Trans: Life can't be trusted ... but there is one thing that can be trusted ... that is life insurance

Title: Darna Zaroori Hai
Quote: Haadse batakar nahi hote
Trans: Tragedies don't inform and come

Title: Darna Zaroori Hai
Quote: Jis tarah Musalman ko pyari hai jumme ki namaz ... ussi tarah mujhe pyara hai jumme ko theater Delnaaz
Trans: Just like the Friday prayer is important for a Muslim ... just like that I love theater Delnaaz on a Friday

Title: Barsaat
Quote: Pyar jab bagawat par utar aata hai ... toh koi taqat usse nahi rok sakti ... na insaan ki, na kudrat ki
Trans: When love comes down to revolution ... then no power can stop it ... not of a human, and neither that of god

Title: Barsaat
Quote: Hum tumhe aaisi maut denge ... ki log kutte ko bhulakar tumhari maut ki misaal diya karenge
Trans: I will give you such a death ... that people will forget the dog and they will give examples of your death

Title: Barsaat
Quote: Kuch dard aaise bhi hai jinse tum waqif nahi ... aaise dard jisse Tina ki toh kya ... insaan ko khud apni pehchan tak bhula dete hai
Trans: There are some pains that you are not aware of ... the pains from which forget Tina ... any person will forget his own identity

Title: Barsaat
Quote: Main yahan dosti karne aaya hoon ... ghulami karne nahi
Trans: I have come here to make friends ... not to be a slave

Title: Chillar Party
Quote: Bole toh Bapu India ka woh bhai tha jisne angrezon ki vaat laga di thi ... aur India se tadipaar kar diya tha
Trans: Gandhi was that person who put the Englishmen in trouble ... and he kicked them out of India

Title: Chillar Party
Quote: Bole toh ... khaneka, khujhaneka, batti bhujhaneka, soo janeka ... kya!
Trans: It means that ... you should eat, you should scratch, close the light, and sleep ... you understand that!

Title: Chillar Party
Quote: Jack and Jill gaye sumdi mein hill, laane ko pail of water ... Jack tapakgela, Jill atakgeli, life mein locha thereafter
Trans: Jack and Jill went hidingly to the hill, to get a pail of water ... Jack fell down, Jill got stuck, and their life was a problem thereafter

Title: Chillar Party
Quote: Laat kha, lafaa kha, daant kha, joh khana hai kha ... par signature la
Trans: Be kicked, be slapped, be scolded, whatever it may be ... but get the signature

Title: Blackmail
Quote: Jee toh janwar bhi lete hai ... lekin insaan ussi ko kehte hai joh samajhdari se jee sake
Trans: Even an animal lives on ... but the one who lives sensibly is called a human

Title: Blackmail
Quote: Chahe mujhe zindagi bhar tumhe talaash karna padhe ... main tumhe dhoondunga zaroor ... aur phir joh tumhara haal karoonga ... usse dekhkar tumhare farishtey bhi kaanp uthenge
Trans: Even if I have to search for you throughout my life ... I'll definitely find you ... and then the condition that I'll do of yours ... seeing that even your angels will get scared

Title: Blackmail
Quote: Khoj ek nasha hai, ek ishq hai ... jis mein khoj karne waala khoya rehta hai
Trans: Discovery is an intoxication, it is love ... in which the person doing the discovery is lost

Title: Blackmail
Quote: Taqatwar se taqatwar insaan bhi kuch ghadiyon mein kamzor se kamzor ho jaata hai
Trans: In some moments of time even the strongest of the person can become the weakest of all

Title: Kidnap
Quote: Agar kisi ko meri kamyabi se jalan hoti hai, toh achcha hai ... agar koi mujhse nafrat karta hai, toh aur bhi achcha hai
Trans: If someone is jealous of my success, then it's good ... if someone hates me, then it's even better

Title: Kidnap
Quote: Kuch baatein bina kahe samajhi jaati hai ... aur kuch kehni zaroori hoti hai
Trans: Some things are understood without being said ... and some things are important to be said

Title: Kidnap
Quote: Yahan har koi saans toh le raha hai ... magar zindagi se bahut door
Trans: Here everyone is breathing ... but far away from life

Title: Kidnap
Quote: I don't know woh kaun hai aur yeh sab kyun kar raha hai ... lekin ek baar uska pata chal jaye toh usse nafrat karne ki sahi wajah de doonga
Trans: I don't know who he is and why is he doing all this ... but once I know about him then I'll give him the right reason to hate me

Title: I, Me aur Main
Quote: Yeh love bhi kya cheez hai ... ek doosre se ek shabd bhi na kehna aur tab bhi ek doosre ke itne kareeb hona ... us khamoshi ka kuch aur hi mazaa hai
Trans: Love is such a strange thing ... where without saying even a word people are close to each other ... that silence has it's own fun

Title: I, Me aur Main
Quote: Beauty ko samajhne ke liye usse dekhna padta hai
Trans: To understand beauty you first have to look at it

Title: Dhoop
Quote: Apni biwi ko hamesha is dokhe mein rakho ki har baar wohi jeetti hai ... sukhi rahoge
Trans: Keep your wife under the false impression that she wins every time ... you'll stay happy

Title: Dhoop
Quote: Yaadein dil mein rehti hai ... deewaron mein nahi
Trans: Memories stay in the heart ... not on the walls

Title: Dhoop
Quote: Time badal gaya hai ... time ke saath cheezon ki definition bhi ... aaj joh paisa leke kaam kare woh imaandar hai ... joh paise leke kaam na kare woh corrupt hai
Trans: Time has changed ... and with time the definition of things have also changed ... today the one who takes bribe and does the work is honest ... and the one who takes bribe and doesn't do the work is corrupt

Title: Rajaji
Quote: Beti pati ke pallu se pallu bandhkar agni ke jitne phere leti hai ... baap ka haq utna hi gunah kam ho jaata hai ... aur pati ka haq utne hi gunah zyada
Trans: The number of rounds around the fire a daughter takes with her husband tying their scarfs together ... that much right of the father decreases ... and that much right of the husband increases

Title: Rajaji
Quote: Abhe aye dhakan ... yeh phone ke andhar hi mooh daalke tereko aaisi gaali doonga na ... ki aakhe telephone exchange mein angaar lag jayegi
Trans: Hey you crazy ... I will put my face in the phone and curse you so badly ... that the entire telephone exchange will be on fire

Title: Rajaji
Quote: Jhoot ki umar bahut kam hoti hai ... jhoot jiye char din aur sach jiye hazaar din
Trans: The life of lies is very less ... lies will live for 4 days and truth will live for 1000 days

Title: Rajaji
Quote: Yeh joh paisa hota hai na, iske paon nahi hote hai ... lekin paon waale se sau gunah zyada tezz bhaagta hai
Trans: Money has no legs ... but it runs 100 times faster than the people with legs

Title: Aaina
Quote: Khoobsurati woh nahi hoti joh aaine mein dikhai de ... khoobsurati woh hoti hai joh aaine mein nazar na aaye
Trans: Beauty is not what you see in the mirror ... beauty is what you can't see in the mirror

Title: Aaina
Quote: Tum mujhe apne ghar se nikaal sakte ho, apne dil se nikaal sakte ho ... lekin apne zameer se tum yeh baat kaise nikaaloge ... ki tum dono mere gunehgaar ho
Trans: You can remove me from your house, from your heart ... but how will you remove the fact from your conscience ... that you both are my culprits

Title: Aaina
Quote: Cheez hamesha apni pasand ki leni chahiye ... doosro ki pasand ki nahi
Trans: You should always buy things of your choice ... and not of others

Title: Aaina
Quote: Tum duniya ki pehli aaisi khoobsurat aurat hogi ... joh apne aapko itna badsurat sabit karne pe tuli hui hai
Trans: You are probably the first beautiful woman of this world ... who is trying to prove herself ugly

Title: Hum Hain Kamaal Ke
Quote: Agar upar waale ne maut likhi hai toh zindagi kuch nahi kar sakti ... aur agar zindagi likhi hai toh maut kuch nahi kar sakti
Trans: If god has written death then life can't do anything ... and if he has written life then death can't do anything

Title: Hum Hain Kamaal Ke
Quote: Nishana meri pistol ka hi nahi ... meri dimaag ki soch ka bhi bahut pakka hai
Trans: Not only the aim of my pistol is accurate ... but also the aim of the thoughts of my mind is accurate

Title: Hum Hain Kamaal Ke
Quote: Is umar mein aaisa hi hota hai ... dil atak jaata hai, mamla khatak jaata hai aur neeyat phisal jaata hai
Trans: Things like this happen at this age ... the heart gets stuck, the situation tumbles and the intention goes bad

Title: Hum Hain Kamaal Ke
Quote: Musibaton ka saamna himmat se karna chahiye ... aasunyon se nahi
Trans: You should face problems with courage ... not with tears

Title: Madhoshi
Quote: Meri zindagi mein koi aur aa gaya hai ... ek sailaab, ek toofan ki tarah aur baha le gaya mujhe
Trans: Someone else has come in my life ... like a flood, like a storm and he has taken me away

Title: Madhoshi
Quote: Us waqt par joh maine sahi samjha maine kiya ... lekin aaj joh hone ja raha hai woh bilkul galat hai
Trans: I did what I thought was right at that time ... but what is going to happen today is very wrong

Title: Madhoshi
Quote: Kiya hai ishq toh har imtihaan se guzrenge ... tumhare vaaste har intehaan se guzrenge
Trans: Since I'm in love I'll go through every test ... and for you I'll go through every limit

Title: Madhoshi
Quote: Tumhe koi chahe yeh toh bahut hi mamuli si baat hai ... magar tum kisi ko is tarah tootkar chaho bahut badi baat hai
Trans: If someone loves you it is a very small thing ... but it is a very big thing if you love someone to this extent

Title: Apaharan
Quote: Chillao mat ... agar humri awaaz oonchi hui toh sabka phat jayega yahan
Trans: Don't shout ... if I raise my voice then everyone will be scared

Title: Apaharan
Quote: Arre kaan mein gobar pack kar liye ho ka? ... saala teesra time ring kar rahe hai
Trans: Have you packed cow dung in your ears or what? ... bloody I'm calling you for the third time

Title: Aetbaar
Quote: Pyar sirf ek baar kiya ja sakta hai ... aur uske liye har kisi ko aazmane ki koi zaroorat nahi hoti ... sirf dil ki awaaz sunni hoti hai
Trans: You can only fall in love once ... and for that you don't need to try everyone ... you just have to listen to the voice of your heart

Title: Aetbaar
Quote: Bahut jala hoon main is akelepan ki aag mein ... aur tumhare liye main sari duniya ko jala sakta hoon
Trans: I have burnt a lot in the fire of loneliness ... and for you I can burn the entire world

Title: Aetbaar
Quote: There is nothing better than you ... and for you I want nothing to be better than me
Trans: There is nothing better than you ... and for you I want nothing to be better than me

Title: Aetbaar
Quote: Plan yeh hai ki koi plan nahi hai
Trans: The plan is that there is no plan

Title: Ayee Milan Ki Bela
Quote: Daulat gareebi ki taraf dosti ka haath toh bada sakti hai ... magar usse gale lagate hue hich-kichati hai
Trans: Money can brings it's hand forward towards poverty for friendship ... but it hesitates to give it a hug

Title: Ayee Milan Ki Bela
Quote: Mohabbat jisse ek baar gale lagale ... usse juda karte hue maut ke haath bhi kaanp jaate hai
Trans: Once love hugs someone ... then even the hands of death shiver to separate them

Title: Ayee Milan Ki Bela
Quote: Husn ki shaan mein ho jaye na kuch gustakhi ... tum chale jao, tumhe dekh ke pyar aata hai
Trans: So that I don't become insolent in praising your body ... you should leave, since I feel in love when I see you

Title: Ayee Milan Ki Bela
Quote: Dhobi ki dhulai, darzi ki silai, Roopraja ki padai, us par itni mehangai ... aur sirf do sau ki kamai ... duhai hai duhai
Trans: The washing of the washerman, the stichting of the tailor, the studies of Roopraja, on top of that these expenses ... and earnings of just Rs.200 ... it is injustice

Title: Mrityudand
Quote: Aap humre pati hai ... parmeshwar banne ka bhool mat ki jiye
Trans: You are my husband ... don't make the mistake of being my god

Title: Mrityudand
Quote: Anyay kabhi karna mat ... aur uske samne jhukna bhi mat
Trans: Don't ever do injustice ... and never bow down in front of it either

Title: Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi
Quote: Har saas yeh bhool jaati hai ki woh bhi kabhi bahu thi ... aur har bahu yeh bhool jaati hai ki usse bhi ek din kisi ki saas banna hai
Trans: Every mother-in-law forgets that even she was a daughter-in-law at some time ... and every daughter-in-law forgets that one day even she has to become a mother-in-law of someone

Title: Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi
Quote: Meri zabaan se ughla hua zehar bhi amrut ban jaata hai
Trans: Even the poison that comes out from my mouth becomes the holy water

Title: Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi
Quote: Maya Devi toh meri bachpan ki saheli hai ... hum ek doosre ke naakhun tak pehchante hai
Trans: Maya Devi and I are childhood friends ... we even recognize each others nails

Title: Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi
Quote: Hai Ram kya waqt aa gaya hai ... maa ki shiksha ka amrut bhi beti ko zehar lag raha hai
Trans: Oh my god, what time has come ... even the holy water of teachings by the mom, feels like poison to the daughter

Title: Krazzy 4
Quote: Signal todne pe fine toh lagta hai ... kisi ka dil todne pe fine nahi lagta ... kisi ka sar tod do toh sazaa hoti hai ... kisi ka bharosa tod do uski koi sazaa nahi hai
Trans: You are fined when you break the signal ... but you are not fined when you break someones heart ... you are punished when you break someones head ... but you are not punished when you break someones trust

Title: Krazzy 4
Quote: Saaf sutre kapde, saaf sutre dimaag ki nishaani hai ... aur saaf sutra dimaag, saaf sutra samaaj ki nishaani hai
Trans: Clean clothes are the signs of a clean mind ... and a clean mind is the sign of a clean society

Title: Krazzy 4
Quote: Intezar bhi kitni ajeeb cheez hai na ... karo toh bura lagta hai ... aur jab koi aur karta hai toh maza aata hai
Trans: Waiting is such a strange thing ... you feel bad when you do it ... and you enjoy it when someone else does it

Title: Jurm (1990)
Quote: Yeh ajeeb rishtey hai ... in mein log alag toh ho sakte hai ... par juda nahi ho sakte
Trans: These relationships are strange ... in these people can separate ... but they cannot stay away

Title: Jurm (1990)
Quote: Jin logon ko qaid mein rehne ki aadat ho jaati hai ... unhe khushi qaid mein hi milti hai
Trans: The people who are used to staying in captivity ... they are happy in captivity only

Title: Dil Ka Rishta
Quote: Rishtey bante hai ... khatam nahi hote
Trans: Relationships are made ... they don't end

Title: Dil Ka Rishta
Quote: Pehle tum door thi aur main pass aana chahta tha ... ab tum pass ho par door jana meri majboori hai
Trans: First you were far away and I wanted to come near ... now you are near and I'm compelled to go far away

Title: Dil Ka Rishta
Quote: Guzre hue pal laut kar nahi aate ... bas yaadein chhod jaate hai
Trans: Time never comes back ... it just leaves behind memories

Title: Dil Ka Rishta
Quote: Jab dil se dil ki raah milti hai ... toh ek doosre ki pasand napasand sab pata chalta hai
Trans: When the path of the hearts connect ... then you come to know about each others likes and dislikes

Title: Ram Aur Shyam
Quote: Inki sundarta ki tareef karna toh chand ko aaina dikhana hai
Trans: Praising her beauty is like showing the mirror to the moon

Title: Ram Aur Shyam
Quote: Poochte raho aur jagaye rakho mujhe din raat ... hazar saal tak main bookha pyasa rahoonga ... aur phir bhi main yahi kahoonga ki main begunah hoon
Trans: Keep asking me and keep me awake day and night ... I'll stay hungry and thirsty for a 1000 years ... and still I'll keep saying that I'm innocent

Title: Ram Aur Shyam
Quote: Is sansar mein joh dikhta hai, woh nahi hai ... aur joh nahi dikhta hai, samajho avasha hai
Trans: What you see in this world, that doesn't exists ... and what you can't see, understand that it definitely exists

Title: Agni Sakshi
Quote: Tumhare liye toh main ek sundar shareer se zyada kuch thi hi nahi ... aur ab bhi tumhe mere shareer ke alava kuch aur nahi milega
Trans: I was nothing other than a beautiful body for you ... and now also you won't get anything else other than my body

Title: Agni Sakshi
Quote: Duniya bahut choti hai ... yahan koi aaisi jagah nahi, jahan tum mujhse chup sako
Trans: The world is very small ... there is no place here, where you can hide from me

Title: Agni Sakshi
Quote: Kitna bada dil hai unka ... us dil mein sabke liye kitna pyar hai ... aur mere liye us pyar ki gehrai ka andaza, main bhi nahi laga sakti
Trans: He has such a big heart ... there is so much love for everyone in it ... and how deep is the love for me in it, that even I can't estimate

Title: Agni Sakshi
Quote: Zakhm maine diye hai marham bhi main hi lagaunga
Trans: I will apply the ointment since I have given the wounds

Title: Maan Gaye Mughall-e-Azam
Quote: Sitaron se aage jahan aur bhi hai ... aasman se aage aasman aur bhi hai
Trans: There is a world beyond the stars ... and there is more sky beyond the sky

Title: Maan Gaye Mughall-e-Azam
Quote: Desh mein azaadi hai, par choron ne pehni khaadi hai ... jago India jago!
Trans: There is independence in the country, but the robbers are wearing hand-woven clothes ... wake-up India wake-up!

Title: Maan Gaye Mughall-e-Azam
Quote: Zahid sharab peene de masjid mein baithkar ... ya phir woh jagah dikha de jahan khuda na ho
Trans: Let me sit inside the mosque and drink alcohol ... or else show me the place where there is no god

Title: Maan Gaye Mughall-e-Azam
Quote: Taqdeerein badal jaati hai, zamana badal jaata hai, mulkon ki tareekh badal jaati hai ... aur main samajhta hoon life partner bhi badle ja sakte hai
Trans: Destinies change, the world changes, the dates of countries change ... and I understand that even life partners can be changed

Title: Desh Drohi
Quote: Aulad pehda hote hi mar jaye toh ek dukh ... jawan hoke mare toh dugna dukh ... aur agar aulad tere jaisi nalayak pehda ho jaye ... toh zindagi bhar ka dukh
Trans: If a child dies when they are born then you feel sad ... if they die when they are young then you feel double sad ... but if the child born is useless like you ... then the sadness is their for life

Title: Desh Drohi
Quote: Yeh na hota toh koi doosra gham hona tha ... main toh woh hoon jise har haal mein bas rona tha
Trans: Had this not been there, then there would have been some other sorrow ... I am that person who had to cry no matter what

Title: Desh Drohi
Quote: Hindustan mein ek-atees rajya hai, solah-sau-athara bhasha, che-hazar-char-sau jaatiyan aur che dharm hone ke bawajood ... Hindustan ek hai
Trans: In India, inspite of there being 31 states, 1618 rationalized mother tongues, 6400 castes and 6 religions ... India is united

Title: Desh Drohi
Quote: Zindagi kabhi kabhi aaise modh par aa jaati hai ... jahan se koi U-turn nahi hota
Trans: Sometimes life comes at such a point ... from where there is no U-turn

Title: Azaad
Quote: Zindagi sirf do paon se bhaagti hai ... aur maut hazaaron haathon se uska rasta rokti hai
Trans: Life runs only on two legs ... and death blocks its way with a 1000 hands

Title: Azaad
Quote: Gareebon ke haath ki bani hui cheez ameeron ko achchi nahi lagti
Trans: Rich people don't like the things that are made by the hands of poor people

Title: Azaad
Quote: Jisne tumhari maang ka sindoor mittaya hai ... tumhari kasam main usse is duniya se mitta doonga
Trans: The one who has erased the vermilion from your hair partition ... I swear on you that I will erase him from this world

Title: Azaad
Quote: Aurat ke haath mein churi aur bandook bilkul achchi nahi lagti
Trans: A knife and a gun don't look good at all in a woman's hand

Title: Black & White
Quote: Apni nazar ussi raste pe honi chahiye ... joh aapko aapki manzil pe le jaye
Trans: You should keep your eyes on that path ... which takes you to your destination

Title: Black & White
Quote: Tofhe rishton ko mazboot karne ke liye diye jaate hai
Trans: Gifts are given to strengthen relationships

Title: Black & White
Quote: Is duniya mein sabse bada aadmi wahi hai jisna naam hai grahak ... aur us grahak ka na koi naam poochta hai, na imaan ... woh grahak na Hindu hai, na Musalman ... woh hai sirf har dhande ka Allah aur bhagwan
Trans: The biggest person in this world is called a customer ... and no one will ask a customer for his name, or his religion ... a customer is neither Hindu, nor a Muslim ... he is only the God of every business

Title: Black & White
Quote: Joh log khud par yakeen nahi karte ... woh kabhi jeet nahi sakte
Trans: Those who don't believe in themselves ... they can never win

Title: Daava
Quote: Jab jab dega Ravanraj adharm aur anyay ko bagaava ... tab tab aayenge adharm vinashi, yeh hai daava
Trans: Whenever the rule of Ravana will uprise for immorality and injustice ... then the destroyers of immorality will come, this is our challenge

Title: Daava
Quote: Kanoon saboot ka mohtaj hai ... lekin jis din mere haath saboot laga ... tum logon ko pagal kutton ki tarah ghaseeta hua le jaonga
Trans: The law is dependent on the proof ... but the day I get the proof ... I'll drag you guys like mad dogs

Title: Daava
Quote: Is zameen par itihaas hamesha apne aapko daurahta hai
Trans: On this land history always repeats itself

Title: Daava
Quote: Insaan ko agar lalach ki pyaas lag jaye ... toh woh kitne hi rishton ka khoon kar sakta hai
Trans: Once a person becomes thirsty for greed ... then he can murder many relations

Title: Benaam
Quote: Agar tumne hamara kaam nahi kiya ... toh hum tumhari beti ki zindagi bounce check ki tarah phaadkar ... tudke tudke kar denge
Trans: If you don't do our work ... then we will tear apart your daughter's life like a bounce check ... into small small pieces

Title: Benaam
Quote: Bhai logon ka nikal jaata hai oil ... police ki bandh ho jaati hai file ... naam hai Munna mobile
Trans: The rowdy people are scared ... the file of the police gets closed ... my name is Munna mobile

Title: Benaam
Quote: Police ki maar aur talwar ki dhaar se aaj tak koi nahi bacha
Trans: Till date no one has ever escaped from the beating of the police and the blade of a sword

Title: Benaam
Quote: Chokri samajh ke chhod raha hoon ... doobara nazar aayi na toh Sridevi ka poster bana ke deewar pe chipka doonga
Trans: I am leaving you since you are a girl ... but if I ever see you again then I'll make you into a poster of Sridevi and stick you on the wall

Title: Chhote Sarkar
Quote: Har modh pe mile jaate hai humdard hazaron ... shayad meri basti mein adakaar bahut hai
Trans: At every turn I found thousands of people who share my pain ... may there are a lot of actors in my colony

Title: Chhote Sarkar
Quote: Raaz chahe pati ka ho ya patni ka ... agar usse dono ke beech khol diya jaye toh badapan hota hai ... aur chupaya jaye toh dokha hota hai
Trans: Whether the secret is about the husband or the wife ... it is greatness if it opens up between them ... and it is betrayal if it is hidden

Title: Chhote Sarkar
Quote: No underwear in this world can live without nada and no nada in this world can live without underwear ... because they are inseparable, they love each other, they are incomplete without each other ... that's why they have to live together ... ek saath Dhobi Ghat par dhulne ke liye jaate hai, ek saath sookhte hai aur doobara maile hokar Dhobi Ghat par chale jaate hai ... underwear aur nada se duniya ko ekta ka sabak lena chahiye
Trans: No underwear in this world can live without string and no string in this world can live without underwear ... because they are inseparable, they love each other, they are incomplete without each other ... that's why they have to live together ... they go together to Dhobi Ghat to get washed, they dry together and they get dirty again and go to Dhobi Ghat ... the world should learn the lesson of unity from the underwear and the string

Title: Chhote Sarkar
Quote: Shikaar usne kiya, dil ko taar-taar kiya ... bura kiya joh kisi ladki se pyar kiya
Trans: She hunted me, she broke my heart into pieces ... I did a mistake by falling in love with a girl

Title: Action Jackson
Quote: Pasand aaya toh dil mein ... nahi toh dimaag mein bhi nahi
Trans: If I like it then it's in my heart ... or else it's not even in my mind

Title: Action Jackson
Quote: Na commitment, na appointment ... only punishment!
Trans: No commitment, no appointment ... only punishment!

Title: Action Jackson
Quote: Main ek hi baar bolta hoon ... kyun ki doosri baar sunne ke liye tu nahi hoga
Trans: I only say it once ... because you won't be there to hear it for the second time

Title: Action Jackson
Quote: It's my way ya skyway
Trans: It's my way or the skyway

Title: Balika Badhu
Quote: Teri aankhon mein doobun, ya teri palkon se khel karun ... ya kho jaun teri zulfon ke jungle mein, ya apna dil rakh doon tere komal pairon ke neeche ... ab shuru kahan se ho jaun, yeh nahi samjh mein aata hai ... is beautiful manzar ke aage kiska bas chal pata hai
Trans: Should I drown in your eyes, or should I play with your eyelids ... or should I get lost in the jungle of your hair, or should I keep my heart under your soft feet ... now from where should I start, I don't understand that ... no one has control in front of this scene

Title: Balika Badhu
Quote: Tere nainon ki khidki se yeh mujhko kaun bulata hai ... chandni ishara karti hai aur chand sitaar bajata hai ... pagalpan mein kuch kar baithun toh doshi mujhko mat kehna ... is beautiful manzar ke aage kiska bas chal pata hai
Trans: Who is calling me from the window of your eyes ... the moonlight is giving gestures and the moon is playing the sitaar ... if I do something crazy in this madness then don't blame me ... no one has control in front of this scene

Title: Balika Badhu
Quote: Bhagwan bahut acha hai tu, naari kya cheez banayi hai ... isko koi samajh na paya hai, sab duniya chakkar khayi hai ... arre yeh chakkar hi toh sab kuch hai, baki toh aata jaata hai ... woh yowan chullu mein layi, yeh ullu sher sunata hai ... is beautiful manzar ke aage kiska bas chal pata hai
Trans: God you are very good, you've made a wonderful thing called woman ... the whole world is swirling since no one has understood her ... and this swirling is everything, rest all comes and goes ... she brought her youth in her hollowed palm, and this fool was singing a poem ... no one has control in front of this scene

Title: Balika Badhu
Quote: Pyar ki shuruvat hai rota hai kya ... aage aage dekhiye hota hai kya
Trans: Why are you crying, this is just the start of love ... you'll see what's going to happen ahead

Title: Shaadi Se Pehle
Quote: Life mein kisi ka pyar kam nahi hota hai ... sirf hamari umeedein zyada hoti hai
Trans: In life no one loves less ... it's just that our hopes keep increasing

Title: Shaadi Se Pehle

Trans: The land is crying, the sky is crying ... this is nonsense, what's going on?

Title: Shaadi Se Pehle
Quote: When I'm good, I'm good ... when I'm bad, I'm better
Trans: When I'm good, I'm good ... when I'm bad, I'm better

Title: Shaadi Se Pehle
Quote: Ab ishq waalon ki duniya hogi tehas-nehas ... jab ghar ghar pahunchega yeh MMS
Trans: Now the world of lovers will get destroyed ... when this MMS (video message) will reach every house

Title: Noorie

Trans: I'll love you so much that life will be in your feet ... and death will have no meaning for you

Title: Noorie
Quote: Tumhari mehfil se agar jaan bach bhi gayi, toh hum kisi doosri bazm mein shikaar honge ... is liye humne tay kiya hai, ki hum tumhari hi khatir jaan denge
Trans: If I save my life from your gathering, then I'll get caught by some other gathering ... that's why I've decided that, I'll give my life for you

Title: Noorie
Quote: Achcha yaar pehle mar jaye ... toh phir hisse mein sivah aasunyon ke aur kuch chhodkar nahi jaata
Trans: If a good friend dies first ... then he doesn't leave anything else but tears in your share

Title: Shalimar
Quote: Zindagi ka har woh zakhm jiska koi ilaaj na ho ... uspe daulat hi marham ka kaam kar sakti hai
Trans: Every wound of life that has no cure ... only money can work as an ointment on that

Title: Shalimar

Trans: In our business we don't identify a person by their work ... instead we identify them by the style of their work

Title: Shalimar
Quote: Aadmi khatron pe fateh pa sakta hai ... lekin maut ko nahi jeet sakta
Trans: A person achieve victory over dangers ... but he can't win over death

Title: Do Numbri

Trans: I say it once ... but you need understand that 100 times

Trans: Parents wish to see the shining moon on the forehead of their children ... and children apply the mark of disgrace on the forehead of their parents

Title: Do Numbri
Quote: Aapko malum hai aurat ki izzat kya hoti hai? ... ek sheeshay ki tarah, toot jaye toh judta nahi ... ek phool ki tarah, todh diya toh murjha jaata hai
Trans: Do you know what is the honour of a woman? ... it's like a mirror, which cannot be fixed once it breaks ... it's like a flower, it wilts if you break it

Title: Do Numbri

Trans: My name is Hatela Hitler ... and in front of cunningness even Hitler becomes a butler

Title: Big Brother
Quote: Kaam, naam aur anjaam ... sab tay hai
Trans: Work, name and outcome ... are all decided

Title: Big Brother
Quote: Insaan joh karam karta hai ... unhi karamon ki karmi milti hai usse
Trans: The deeds that a person does ... he goes through the consequences of the same deeds

Title: Big Brother

Trans: Even if you try to look towards my life ... then I'll write such scenes in your life ... which you would have never seen before and neither heard of

Title: Ankush
Quote: Aaj kal toh do hi logon ko kaam milta hai ... joh bahut neeche hai, mazdoori karte hai ... ya toh bahut oonche hai ... is jaise beech waale logon ka haal toh beech waalon jaisa ho gaya hai ... taali bajao aur paisa maango
Trans: Nowadays only two types of people get work ... those who are at the bottom, who do the labour work ... or those who are at the top ... the condition of people like him in the middle has become that of eunuchs ... clap your hands and ask for money

Title: Ankush
Quote: Asli sazaa toh woh hoti hai ... joh gunahgar zindagi bhar bhugatta rahe
Trans: A real punishment is one that ... the culprit bears it for his entire life

Title: Ankush
Quote: Woh nahi koi aur sahi ... koi aur nahi koi aur sahi
Trans: If it's not her then it will be someone else ... and if it's not someone else then it will be someone else

Title: Ankush
Quote: Shraddha sirf bhagwan par rakhi ja sakti hai, yeh tumse kisne kaha bete? ... woh toh apne mann ki bhavna hai ... shraddha toh apni maa, baap, desh, apne log, apna kaam, kisi par bhi rakhi ja sakti hai ... yeh wohi shraddha hai joh har insaan ko burre kaam karne se rokti hai ... achche kaam karvane par majboor karti hai ... jis din yeh shraddha nasht hui mann se ... hum janwaron se zyada kuch nahi rahenge
Trans: My son who told you that faith can only kept in god? ... it is the emotion of our heart ... faith can be kept in our mother, father, country, our people, our work, anything ... it is faith that stops a man from doing wrong things ... and compels him to do good things ... the day this faith gets destroyed from our heart ... we will be nothing but animals

Title: Anari No. 1

Trans: A mother is one such wealth of this world ... which a person gets only once in his destiny

Trans: If you go to the police and try to act smart ... then I'll put a gun below your ears

Trans: I won't let you die this easily ... with every drop of your blood ... I'll take the revenge from you, of every cruel act that the police did on me

Title: China Town

Trans: Love, romance, cough and happiness ... can't be hidden even if you try to

Title: Justice Chowdhary

Trans: It will rain and we all will shower in that ... and we shall dance and sing in the joy of promotion

Trans: When sadness becomes the part of your life ... then you should hug it laughingly

Trans: Life is not just memories of the past ... life is here, life is now ... learn to live it, learn to respect it

Title: Main Tulsi Tere Aangan Ki

Trans: The sweetness in love is always perfect ... not less, not more

Trans: Love is like a cloud that comes suddenly, pours suddenly ... and it brings out the moon

Title: Main Tulsi Tere Aangan Ki

Trans: I couldn't get married to the girl that I love ... and I don't love the girl that I am married to

Title: ABCD: Any Body Can Dance

Trans: Dance by itself is intoxication ... and when this intoxication is there then you can't have any other intoxication

Title: ABCD: Any Body Can Dance

Title: ABCD: Any Body Can Dance

Trans: Friendship is something that teaches you how to live ... and not how to die

Title: ABCD: Any Body Can Dance
Quote: Tum sab wohi dance karoge joh pura India karta hai ... woh dance joh sab ko baanta nahi, kareeb lata hai ... woh dance jisse dekh ke chup chap baith nahi sakte, joh sabko nachane par majboor kar deta hai ... wohi dance joh saalon se karte aaye ho, hamesha karte ho, shaadion mein karte ho, India jab cricket match jeetta hai tab karte ho, Ganpati visarjan mein karte ho ... wohi ek dance discipline se nahi hota ... hota hai sirf dil se ... "ABCD" - Any Body Can Dance!
Trans: You all will do the dance that the entire India does ... the dance that doesn't divide you, but brings you closer ... the dance after watching which you can't sit quiet, and it compels everyone to dance ... the dance that you have been doing since years, the one that you always do, the one that you do in weddings, the one that you do when India wins a cricket match, the one that you do at Lord Ganesh immersion ... that one dance doesn't have any discipline ... it comes from the heart ... "ABCD" - Any Body Can Dance!

Title: Aksar

Trans: I'm not saying that spend your entire life with me ... who wants life long commitment? ... we'll live one day at a time ... we won't think about the future, nor will we remember the past ... we'll just take care of the present and who knows may be just like that we'll spend the entire life

Trans: Love only looks good in movies ... they edit the extra stuff

Trans: If a boy and a girl run and hug each other, then let them do it ... let there be slow motion, let there be a sunset, if songs are playing then let them play ... infact I'm saying if they are kissing then let them do it

Trans: When a rich person dies he leaves behind happiness and peace ... but when a poor person dies he leaves behind sadness and pain

Title: Bemisal

Trans: With money you can buy a Mercedes, you can buy a house, you can buy a nursing home ... you can buy every luxury of life ... but you can't buy a heart

Title: Taj Mahal: An Eternal Love Story

Title: Taj Mahal: An Eternal Love Story

Title: Taj Mahal: An Eternal Love Story

Title: Saathi
Quote: Insaan yaadon ke sahare nahi, umeedon ke sahare jeeta hai ... log mitt jaate hai, zindagi nahi mitati ... woh hamesha aage badti rehti hai, kisi naye sahare ke umeed mein
Trans: A human doesn't live on the support of memories, he lives on the support of hopes ... people die, but life doesn't die ... it always keeps moving ahead, in hope of some new support

Trans: The season of youth doesn't stay for the entire life ... but let's celebrate until it's there

Title: Roop Tera Mastana
Quote: Mere jaal mein aayi hui chidiya udh nahi sakti ... kyun ki main uske par katar deta hoon
Trans: A bird that comes in my cage can't fly ... because I cut their wings off

Title: Roop Tera Mastana
Quote: Yeh Hindustani ladkiyon ka khaas andaz hota hai ... yeh haan bhi na ki tarah karti hai ... aur na haan ki tarah
Trans: Indian girls have this unique style ... they say yes as if it's no ... and they say no as if it's yes

Title: Dil Jo Bhi Kahey
Quote: Zindagi ke joh chaurahe hote hai na woh rukne ke liye hote hai, sochne samajhne ke liye hote hai ... lekin yeh dil joh hai na yeh sochta nahi hai, yeh sirf dhadakta hai ... it's the head that thinks
Trans: The crossroads of life are there to stop, are there to think and understand ... but the heart doesn't think, it only beats ... it's the head that thinks

Title: Dil Jo Bhi Kahey
Quote: I can understand it's not easy ... change never is ... but then that's the only thing that is permanent
Trans: I can understand it's not easy ... change never is ... but then that's the only thing that is permanent

Title: Straight
Quote: Mazak jitna bhi badhda ho ... log uspe utna hi zyada haste hai
Trans: The more awful a joke is ... that much more people laugh on it

Title: Straight
Quote: Nobody forgets how to love ... even if love forgets them
Trans: Nobody forgets how to love ... even if love forgets them

Title: Straight
Quote: Pyar pyar hota hai ... and we should all refuse to live without love
Trans: Love is love ... and we should all refuse to live without love

Title: Hazaaron Khwaishein Aisi
Quote: To pee under the open sky ... if there is bliss, it is this ... none but this
Trans: To pee under the open sky ... if there is bliss, it is this ... none but this

Title: Hazaaron Khwaishein Aisi
Quote: Rahiman dhaga prem ka mat todo chhatkai ... aaisi sharan chhodkar pagle tu kahan jaye
Trans: Don't break the thread of love by snapping ... you fool, where will you go leaving this shelter

Title: Mahabharat
Quote: Shareer nashvar hai ... aatma amar hai
Trans: The body is mortal ... and the soul is immortal

Title: Mahabharat
Quote: Jiski mrityu ka samay nahi aata ... usse koi nahi maar sakta
Trans: Until the time of death comes ... no one can kill that person

Title: Mahabharat
Quote: Nyay aur dharam ke liye yudh karna hinsa nahi ... veerta hai
Trans: To battle for justice and your duty is not violence ... it is courageous

Title: Dangerous Khiladi
Quote: Exam ke sawaal ka jawab toh har koi deta hai ... lekin asli hero woh hai joh zindagi ke jawab de
Trans: Anyone can give the answer to a question of the exam ... but the real hero is one who has the answers to life

Title: Dangerous Khiladi
Quote: Karun toh kya karun ... software mein salary soft hai ... hardware bahut hard hai ... real estate mein real gunde bhare hai ... construction mein salary kam hai ... faltu naukri karoonga toh ghar waale shaadi karayenge
Trans: What should I do ... the salary in software is soft ... hardware is very hard ... there are real goons in real estate ... the salary is less in construction ... and if I do a useless job then my family will get me married

Title: Dangerous Khiladi
Quote: Mujhe darr se darr nahi lagta
Trans: I am not fearful of fear

Title: Dangerous Khiladi
Quote: Generally hamari generation ke log plan karke kaam karte hai ... lekin mere jaise smart log kaam karte karte plan kar lete hai
Trans: Generally people of my generation plan and then do the work ... but smart people like me plan as we do the work

Title: Yakeen
Quote: Tumne apne ateeth mein kuch achche pal bitaye honge aur kuch bure ... par dost wohi hote hai joh sirf achche palon ki yaad dilaye
Trans: In your past you must have spent some good moments and some bad ... but a friend is someone who only reminds you of the good moments

Title: Yakeen
Quote: Jab dimaag koi faisla karne se inkaar karde ... toh apne dil ki baat suno ... mushkilen aasaan ho jayegi
Trans: When your mind refuses to make any decision ... then listen to your heart ... your problems will get easier

Title: Yakeen
Quote: Koi bhi rishta pati patni ke yakeen se badkar nahi hota hai
Trans: No relationship is bigger than the trust between a husband and a wife

Title: Yakeen
Quote: Zindagi chubne lagi kaanton ki tarah yaar mujhe ... har pal tere intezaar ka sadiyon ki tarah guzra
Trans: My friend, life started to hurt me like thorns ... every moment that I waited for you felt like years

Title: Suryavanshi
Quote: Mangalsutra zaroor gale mein pehna jaata hai ... magar iska rishta saanson se juda hota hai
Trans: You do wear the wedding necklace on the neck ... but it's connection is with the heartbeats

Title: Suryavanshi
Quote: Agar tere paas nafrat ki taqat hai ... toh mere paas ab mohabbat ki shakti hai
Trans: If you have the strength of hatred ... then now I have the power of love

Title: Suryavanshi
Quote: Dhere dhere, chaba chabake, thanda karke khana chahiye ... yahi buzurgon ka kehna hai, isko na thukrana chahiye
Trans: You should eat your food slowly, chew it and after it is warm ... elders have said that and we should not ignore that

Title: Nehlle Pe Dehlla
Quote: Kayde mein rahega toh fayde mein rahega
Trans: If you follow the rules then you'll be in profit

Title: Nehlle Pe Dehlla
Quote: Agar aap miss world mein khadi ho gayi na ... toh 1st, 2nd, 3rd ka title aap hi ko milega
Trans: If you participate in the miss world (contest) ... then you'll only win the 1st, 2nd and 3rd place title

Title: Nehlle Pe Dehlla
Quote: Chor chori se jaye lekin hera pheri se na jaye
Trans: A thief can give up everything but not stealing

Title: Platform
Quote: Maut se woh log darte hai jinka zindagi se koi rishta ho ... mera toh sirf ek hi rishta hai ... jis se mujhe maut hi mila sakti hai
Trans: The people who have a relationship with life are scared of death ... I have only one relationship ... and only death can make me meet with that

Title: Platform
Quote: Yahan koi kisi ke liye kuch nahi chhodta ... sab kisi na kisi ko chhodkar aage badh jaate hai
Trans: Here no one leaves anything behind for someone ... everyone moves ahead leaving behind someone or the other

Title: Platform
Quote: Len-den mein pehle baad mein nahi hota ... is haath le, us haath de
Trans: There is no before and after in an exchange ... take from one hand and give from the other hand

Title: Naqaab
Quote: Jhoot bolna ho toh aankhen band kar liya karo ... kyun ki woh sach bolti hai
Trans: If you want to lie then close your eyes ... because they speak the truth

Title: Naqaab
Quote: Poori game pehli chaal pe depend karti hai
Trans: The whole game depends on the first move

Title: Naqaab
Quote: Kehte hai pyar mein sachchai ho ... toh kiss karte waqt aankhen band ho jaati hai
Trans: It is said that if there is honesty in love ... then the eyes get closed while kissing

Title: Paap
Quote: Dukh is baat ka nahi ki har cheez mitt jaati hai, hum mitt jaate hai ... dukh is baat ka hai ki hum jeete ji pyar karna chhod dete hai
Trans: I am not sad that everything gets erased, we get erased ... I am sad that we forget to love while we are living

Title: Paap
Quote: Kholo kholo apni aankhen aur gaur se suno ... dene ko toh bahut kuch hai, par apna sa kuch dena chahti hoon ... ek boond suraj ki, ek qatra aasman ka, koyal ki aadhi kook aur kuch jagmagate sapne ... achcha lage toh aur maango ... dene ko toh bahut kuch hai, par apna sa kuch dena chahti hoon ... aasman sa aaina, ek dibbi titliyon ki, ek chamach nadi ki dhar aur ek mutthi zindagi ... achcha lage toh aur maango ... dene ko toh bahut kuch hai, par apna sa kuch dena chahti hoon
Trans: Open your eyes and listen carefully ... I have so many things to give, but I want to give something personal ... one drop of the sun, a fragment of the sky, half song of the cuckoo bird and some glittering dreams ... if you like it then ask for more ... I have so many things to give, but I want to give something personal ... the sky like a mirror, a box of butterflies, a spoon of the river and one handful of life ... if you like it then ask for more ... I have so many things to give, but I want to give something personal

Title: Paap
Quote: Agar koi masla hal kiya ja sakta hai toh fikar karne ki zaroorat nahi ... agar hal nahi kiya ja sakta toh fikar karne se kya hoga
Trans: If you can solve a problem then there is no need to worry ... and if you can't solve the problem then what will you get by worrying about it

Title: Paap
Quote: Apno se chahe jitna bhi pyar karo ... unhe taqleef ke ek pal se bhi bacha nahi sakte
Trans: No matter how much we love our dear ones ... we can't save them even from a single moment of pain

Title: Plan
Quote: Achcha hua sanam hum bewafaa nikle ... wafaadar toh kutte hote hai
Trans: It's good that I turned out to be unfaithful ... since dogs are the ones that are faithful

Title: Plan
Quote: Apne dhande mein rishtey paalna achcha nahi hota ... zindagi ki kishtein kam ho jaati hai
Trans: Having relations is not good in our business ... the installments of life get reduced

Title: Plan
Quote: Dhoondi sari duniya, dhoonde sare khopche ... kahan chupa hai re tu Mussa, Sultan se bachke
Trans: I searched the entire world, I searched all the corners ... Mussa where are you hiding, escaping from Sultan

Title: Plan
Quote: Mumbai ... ek aaisa station jahan koi bhi musafir kabhi akele nahi utarta ... uske saath koi na koi sapna zaroor utarta hai
Trans: Mumbai ... is a station where no traveller gets down alone ... some dream or other gets down along with him

Title: Seeta Aur Geeta
Quote: Dum par kabhi zor se jhatka diya hota ... toh dum toh kya kuttiya bhi seedhi ho jaati hai
Trans: Had you ever pressed firmly on the tail ... then forget the tail, even the dog would have become straight

Title: Seeta Aur Geeta
Quote: Bhagwan jab apni mutthi mein chand ko chupata hai ... toh suraj nikalta hai
Trans: When god hides the moon in his fist ... then the sun comes out

Title: Seeta Aur Geeta
Quote: Har insaan joh paap se, zulm se ladta hai ... woh bhagwan ka hi toh roop hota hai
Trans: Every person that fights with sin and injustice ... is a disguise of god

Title: Seeta Aur Geeta
Quote: Agar kisi nek kaam ke liye jhoot bolna padhe ... toh woh jhoot sau sach ke barabar hai
Trans: If you have to lie for a good cause ... then that lie is equivalent of 100 truths

Title: Divya Shakti
Quote: Yeh ek aam aadmi ka khoon hai ... yeh jab behta hai, toh achche achchon ki kundli palat deta hai
Trans: This is the blood of a common man ... and when it sheds, then it flips the horoscope of the best of the best people

Title: Divya Shakti
Quote: Agar yeh haath gunahon ke khaatme ke liye uthe ... toh inki pakad mein sabse pehli gardan teri hogi
Trans: If these hands rise to end crimes ... then the first neck in its grip will be yours

Title: Divya Shakti
Quote: Jab hum kisi ko retire karte hai toh woh seedha upar chala jaata hai
Trans: When I retire someone then they go straight up (to god)

Title: Divya Shakti
Quote: Main itni oonchai par khada hoon ... ki mujhe dekhne ke liye gardan itni oonchi uthani padti hai ... ki reed ki haddi toot jaati hai
Trans: I am standing at such great heights ... that you will have to lift your neck up so high to see me ... that your backbone will break

Title: C.I.D. (1990)
Quote: Aurat aur sharab ka mila-jula nasha aaisa nasha hai ki ... bade bade sultan barbad ho gaye
Trans: The combined intoxication of women and alcohol is such that ... even the best of the best rulers have got ruined

Title: C.I.D. (1990)
Quote: Yeh chor aur police ki joh dosti hoti hai na badi mushkil se hoti hai ... aur jab hoti hai toh atoot hoti hai
Trans: The friendship between thieves and police is very hard to happen ... but when it happens then it is unbreakable

Title: C.I.D. (1990)
Quote: Tumhe kho diya hai paane ke baad ... teri yaad aayi tere jaane ke baad
Trans: I lost you after achieving you ... and I remembered you after you left

Title: C.I.D. (1990)
Quote: Aurat, aag aur sharab mard ke bas mein hi ho toh achcha hota hai ... mard inke bas mein ho, inka ghulam ban jaye ... toh yeh usse jala dalti hai
Trans: It's good if a man has control over women, fire and alcohol ... but if a man is under their control and he becomes their slave ... then they burn him

Title: Aap Ki Khatir
Quote: Pyar hai toh jhagda hai, jhagda hai toh pyar hai ... aur jhagda hi pyar ko aur tagda karta hai
Trans: If there is love then there will be fights, if there are fights then there will be love ... and it is the fights that make the love much stronger

Title: Aap Ki Khatir
Quote: Zindagi mein agar koi bhi galati karni ho ... toh confidence se karni chahiye
Trans: In life if you want to make a mistake ... then do it with confidence

Title: Aap Ki Khatir
Quote: Dava, daru yah insaan ... kam waqt mein zyada asar karne waali koi bhi cheez ... thik nahi hoti
Trans: Medicine, alcohol or a person ... anything that affects a lot in a short time ... is not a good thing

Title: Aap Ki Khatir
Quote: Kuch dard apne dil mein chupake rakhne chahiye ... varna apno ko taqleef hoti hai
Trans: You should keep some pains hidden in your heart ... or else our dears ones feel the pinch

Title: Balwaan
Quote: Aag, pani aur Bhaiji ke saath nahi khelna ... aag jalata hai, pani doobata hai aur Bhaiji tadpata hai
Trans: Never play with fire, water and Bhaiji ... the fire will burn you, the water will drown you and Bhaiji will agonize you

Title: Balwaan
Quote: Kutte kabhi sher ka shikaar nahi karte ... sher jab dahadta hai toh kutte bhaukana bhool jaate hai
Trans: Dogs never hunt a tiger ... and when a tiger roars then dogs forget about barking

Title: Balwaan
Quote: Joh Bhaiji ka parda phaash karta hai ... Bhaiji uske pet ka parda phaad dalta hai
Trans: The one who exposes Bhaiji ... Bhaiji tears apart the curtain of his stomach

Title: Balwaan
Quote: Tujhe aaisi maut doonga ... ki teri kriya-karam ke liye tujhe kisi cheez ki zaroorat na padhe
Trans: I will give you such a death ... that you won't need anything for your cremation

Title: Aks
Quote: Na koi marta hai, na koi maarta hai ... yeh main nahi kehta, Gita mein likha hai
Trans: No one dies, no one kills ... I don't say this, it is written in the Bhagavad Gita

Title: Aks
Quote: Sawaal yeh nahi hai ki tum ughloge ya nahi ... sawaal yeh hai ki hum ughalwana jaante hai
Trans: The question is not that you will talk or not ... the question is that do we know how to make you talk

Title: Aks
Quote: Zindagi ek taraf se khali kar deti hai ... toh doosri taraf se bhar bhi toh deti hai
Trans: Life makes us empty from one side ... but then it also fills us up from the other side

Title: Roop Ki Rani Choron Ka Raja
Quote: Maut ka intezaar maut se kahin zyada bhayanak hota hai
Trans: Waiting for death is much more scary than death itself

Title: Roop Ki Rani Choron Ka Raja
Quote: Mehnat, lagan aur akalmandi ke saath joh baimaani ki jaye ... us baimaani ka duniya ke tamaam imaandar milkar bhi kuch nahi bighad sakte
Trans: The dishonesty that is done with hard work, dedication and smartness ... that dishonesty cannot be disrupted even by all the honest people of world together

Title: Woh 7 Din
Quote: Tere bina main nahi, mere bina tu nahi ... hamare bina prem nahi, prem bina hum nahi
Trans: I'm not there without you, you're not there without me ... love is not there without us, we're not there without love

Title: Woh 7 Din
Quote: Bin byahi ladki ka dil toh hota hi hai aaine ki tarah hai ... joh bhi samne padh jaata hai, ussi ki parchai us mein dikhne lagti hai ... lekin shaadi ke baad woh parchai tasveer mein badal jaati hai ... pati ki tasveer
Trans: The heart of an unmarried woman is like a mirror ... the one who falls in front of her, their shadow is seen in her ... but after marriage that shadow turns into a photo ... the photo of her husband

Title: Woh 7 Din
Quote: Duniya mein jitne type ka bhook hota hai na ... utne hich type ka bhook maarne ka tarkeeb bhi hota hai
Trans: The number of types of hunger that exists in the world ... there are that many types of ways to kill hunger

Title: Woh 7 Din
Quote: Meri premika kisi ki patni bhale hi ban jaye ... kisi ki patni meri premika kabhi nahi ban sakti
Trans: Even if my girlfriend becomes someone's wife ... someone's wife can never become my girlfriend

Title: Anthony Kaun Hai?
Quote: Insaaf ki laathi mein awaaz ho ya na ho ... timing badi zalim hoti hai
Trans: Whether there is sound or not in the stick of justice ... it's timing is very cruel

Title: Anthony Kaun Hai?
Quote: Sharaab bhi ajeeb cheez hai na ... dimaag band kar deti hai ... dil bolne lagta hai
Trans: Alcohol is a very strange thing ... it closes the mind ... and the heart starts to talk

Title: Jaadugar
Quote: Leader ke jazbaat ka, Bambai ki barsaat ka aur producer ki baat ka ... kabhi bharosa karna nahi chahiye
Trans: You should never trust ... the emotions of a leader, the rain of Mumbai and the words of a producer

Title: Jaadugar
Quote: Ek andha bhi mann ki aankhon se bahut kuch dekh leta hai ... lekin andhvishvasi toh tann aur mann dono ki aankhen kho behetta hai
Trans: Even a blind person can see a lot from the eyes of his heart ... but a superstitious person loses both, the eyes of his body and that of his heart

Title: Jaadugar
Quote: Hum toh yeh samajhkar aapke paas aaye the, ki hum apni samajh ko aapki samajh ke charano mein rakh denge ... aur aap is nasamajh ki bina samajhayi hui samajh ko, apni samajhdari se samajhake sabko yeh samajha denge ki hum samajh gaye ... lekin aap samajhenge nahi ... samajh gaye na?
Trans: I came to you thinking that, I'll keep my thinking under the feet of your thinking ... and that with your sensible thinking you'll make everyone understand that, the foolish thinking of this silly person now understands ... but you won't understand that ... do you understand?

Title: Jaadugar
Quote: Bhagwan ka ansh har insaan ke andar hota hai
Trans: A portion of god is within every person

Title: Dulhan Hum Le Jayenge
Quote: Shakahari bhojan khane se dil, dimaag aur aatma teeno shaant rehte hai
Trans: By eating vegetarian food your heart, mind and soul all three remain at peace

Title: Dulhan Hum Le Jayenge
Quote: Duniya badi baawari, patthar pujan jaye ... ghar ki chakki koi na puje, jaako piso khaye
Trans: The world is crazy, it worships stones ... but no one worships the grinding stone of the house, which grinds and gives us bread

Title: Dulhan Hum Le Jayenge
Quote: Pothi padh padhkar jag mua, pandit bhaya na koi ... dhai aakhar prem ka, padhe so pandit hoye
Trans: Reading the scriptures doesn't make you wise ... but the one who reads the two and a half letters of love, becomes wise

Title: Angrakshak
Quote: Abhi mera haath tere sar pe hai ... agar yeh haath utarkar gardan pe aa gaya na, toh tera maut ban jayega ... agar yeh haath gardan se aur neeche aa gaya na, toh na zindagi rahegi na maut
Trans: My hand is now on your head ... if this hand comes down on your neck, then it will become your death ... and if this hand comes down more from the neck, then you'll neither live nor die

Title: Angrakshak
Quote: Aaj tune is dua dene waale dil ki bhi bad-dua le li ... aur ab tujhe koi nahi maaf karega
Trans: Today you have taken a curse even from a heart that wishes good things ... and now no one will forgive you

Title: Angrakshak
Quote: Isse pehle ke kuch netaon ne toh sirf yeh desh becha hoga ... magar yeh woh hai joh is desh ka balatkar kar dega
Trans: Some politicians before him have only sold this country ... but he is someone who will rape this country

Title: Hukumat
Quote: Josh mein koi burai nahi lekin usse hosh ke dariye mein hona chahiye
Trans: There is nothing bad with passion but it must stay within the limits of awareness

Title: Hukumat
Quote: Kanoon ka sipahi, kanoon ki raksha ke liye jab kanoon ke dariye se bahar nikalta hai ... toh woh sar pe kafan bandkar nikalta hai
Trans: When a soldier of the law, steps out of the limits of the law to protect the law ...  then he leaves with a shroud tied on his head

Title: Hukumat
Quote: Ab na woh zalim rahenge na zulm rahega ... na kanoon se khilwar karne waale woh gaddar rahenge ... ab sirf kanoon rahega
Trans: Now neither will those cruel people remain nor will their cruelty ... neither will the traitors remain who play with the law ... now only the law will remain

Title: Hukumat
Quote: Khuda toh sabko bacha sakta hai ... lekin jiska khuda na ho, usse koi nahi bacha sakta
Trans: God can save everyone ... but the one who doesn't believe in god, no one can save him

Title: Bandhan
Quote: Khaki vardi jiska saath, power uska saath
Trans: The one who has the police uniform, has the power

Title: Bandhan
Quote: Beti ke apne ghar se doli nikalti hai aur pati ke ghar se arthi ... itna hi safar hota hai aurat ke jeevan ka
Trans: A daughter leaves her house in a palanquin and leaves her husbands house on a bier ... that is the journey of life of a woman

Title: Dil-E-Nadaan
Quote: Dard toh tab hota hai jab koi zakhm ke baare mein yaad kare ... bhool jao toh dard ka ehsaas bhi nahi hota
Trans: You feel the pain when you remember about the wound ... if you forget it then you don't even feel the pain

Title: Dil-E-Nadaan
Quote: Zameen aur asmaan ki mulaqat ko log nazar ka dokha kehte hai
Trans: People call the meeting of the ground and the sky as deception of the eye

Title: Dil-E-Nadaan
Quote: Kabhi kabhi sambhalkar chalne mein bhi thokar lag hi jaati hai
Trans: Sometimes you stumble also when you are walking with caution

Title: Bhagam Bhag
Quote: Tum ladkiyan bhi na badi chalaak hoti ho ... jaanti sab ho lekin humse sunna chahti ho
Trans: You girls are very smart ... you know everything but you want to listen from us

Title: Bhagam Bhag
Quote: London ka mausam aur London ki ladkiyan inka koi bharosa nahi hai ... yeh kabhi bhi rang badalte rehte hai
Trans: The weather of London and the girls of London cannot be trusted ... they change their colours anytime

Title: Bhagam Bhag
Quote: Pyar mein sab kuch aasaan hota hai
Trans: Everything is easy in love

Title: Kya Kehna
Quote: Maa banna duniya ka sabse bada saubhagya hai ... ishwar ka sabse bada vardaan
Trans: To become a mother is the biggest privilege of this world ... the biggest blessing of god

Title: Kya Kehna
Quote: Sachche aasunyon mein bahut taqat hoti hai
Trans: Real tears have a lot of strength in them

Title: Kya Kehna
Quote: Jab bhi koi samaaj ke niyam todta hai ... maryada ki rekha ka ulanghan karta hai ... toh sach much uske paas ek hi rasta bachta hai ... prayashchit
Trans: Whenever someone breaks the law of the society ... violates the boundaries of limits ... then really they have only one path left ... atonement

Title: Malaamal Weekly
Quote: Zyada chapad-chapad kiye toh mooh mein chaata ghusedh doonga aur kholonga bhi
Trans: If you talk too much then I'll stuff an umbrella in your mouth and I'll open it also

Title: Malaamal Weekly
Quote: Haathi chale bazar ... kutte bhaunke hazar
Trans: When an elephant goes to the market ... a thousand dogs are bark

Title: Malaamal Weekly
Quote: Arre tu aadmi hai ki patang ... jab dekho hawa mein udhkar aata hai
Trans: Are you a human or a kite ... you always fly in the air and come

Title: Malaamal Weekly
Quote: Agar tu mere samne aaya na ... toh gobar mein jhadu dubo dubokar peeton tujhe
Trans: If you come in front in me ... then I'll dip the broom in cow dung and beat you with it

Title: Jaal: The Trap
Quote: Hamare saath zindagi ka ek din jeena ... hazaaron saalon ki taqleefon ke barabar hota hai
Trans: Living one day of your life with me ... is equal to a 1000 years of suffering

Title: Jaal: The Trap
Quote: Tum logon se baat-cheet karne ke liye hum mein lafzon ki nahi ... goliyon ki zubaan sikhayi jaati hai
Trans: To talk with you people we are not taught the language of words ... we are taught the language of bullets

Title: Jeevan Ki Shatranj
Quote: Jis tarah bina sone ke zevar nahi ban sakta ... us hi tarah bina pitte koi aashiq nahi ban sakta
Trans: Just like you can't make an ornament without gold ... just like that you can't become a lover without being beaten up

Title: Jeevan Ki Shatranj
Quote: CID waale shaq ke dhaagon se hi yakeen ka ghar banate hai ... joh baad mein mujrim ke liye qaid khana ban jaata hai
Trans: The people of CID (Crime Investigation Department) make their house of trust with the threads of suspicion ... which later becomes a jail for the criminal

Title: Jeevan Ki Shatranj
Quote: Manju ... mere khawabon ki rani, mere pyar ki nishani, meri mohabbat ki biryani
Trans: Manju ... you are the queen of my dreams, the memento of my love, the biryani of my romance

Title: Gharwali Baharwali
Quote: Guzarta hua waqt bade se bade masle ko suljha deta hai
Trans: Passing time solves even the biggest of the problems

Title: Gharwali Baharwali
Quote: Aurat zindagi mein sab kuch baant sakti hai ... apna mangalsutra nahi
Trans: A woman can share everything in life ... but not her wedding necklace

Title: Tarazu
Quote: Buraiyon se ladte ladte joh log mar jaate hai ... unki maut ko maut nahi ... shahadat kaha jaata hai
Trans: People who die fighting against the evil ... their death is not called death ... it's called martyrdom

Title: Tarazu
Quote: Yeh adalat hai na, yeh rishton aur jazbaton se nahi chalti ... adalat chalti hai sabooton se, adalat chalti hai gawahon se
Trans: The court doesn't run on relations and emotions ... the court runs on proofs, the court runs on witnesses

Title: Tarazu
Quote: Ek ladka, ek ladki, chota sa ghar pyara pyara ... yahi sandesh de raha hai desh hamara
Trans: One boy, one girl, and small lovable house ... our country is giving this message

Title: Tarazu
Quote: Tu kanoon ko khareed sakta hai, adalaton ko khareed sakta hai ... lekin bhagwan ke us insaaf ko nahi khareed sakta
Trans: You can buy the law, you can buy the court ... but you can't buy the justice of god

Title: Fox
Quote: Darr wahan hota hai jahan shaq hota hai
Trans: There is fear where you have a doubt

Title: Fox
Quote: Bhaagne ki koshish mat karna ... main bhagode criminals ko goli maar deta hoon
Trans: Don't try to run ... I shoot criminals who are on the run

Title: Hawalaat
Quote: Mangal ke samne joh zabaan chalata hai ... Mangal uski taqdeer ki linen mitta deta hai
Trans: The one who talks in front of Mangal ... Mangal erases the lines of their destiny

Title: Hawalaat
Quote: Aurat ke daman par agar ek baar daag lag jaata hai ... toh Ganga ka pavitra jal bhi usse nahi dho sakta
Trans: Once there is a mark on a woman's reputation ... then even the pure water from Ganges river can't clean it off

Title: Hawalaat
Quote: Mangal ka rasta joh rokta hai ... Mangal uske liye maut ka darwaza khol deta hai
Trans: The one who blocks Mangal's path ... Mangal then opens the door of death for him

Title: Hawalaat
Quote: Chalo dhabe mein sab kuch milega ... mutton kadi, alu badi, maa ki daal raita naal, fry machhi bachut achchi, shami kabab lajawab, paneer palak ... chalo balak
Trans: Let's go to the roadside restaurant, you'll get everything ... mutton curry, potato vegetable, mother's lentil soup with yogurt, very good fried fish, great shami kabab, cottage cheese in spinach ... let's go my son

Title: Chhailla Babu
Quote: Is duniya mein apne zakhm dikhane nahi chahiye ... varna yeh log marham ki jagah usse namak se bhar dete hai
