Trans: You should not show your wounds in this world ... or else people will fill it with salt instead of ointment

Title: Chhailla Babu
Quote: Goli ke bagair pistol bekaar hai ... aur akal ke bagair dono bekaar hai
Trans: A pistol is useless without a bullet ... and both of them are useless without a brain

Title: Chhailla Babu
Quote: Yeh haath bada ziddi hai ... gardan pakad le toh dum nikaal ke chhodta hai ... aur haath pakad le toh apna ke chhodta
Trans: This hand is very stubborn ... if it catches a neck then it leaves only after squeezing it ... and if it catches a hand then it leaves only after owning it

Title: Chhailla Babu
Quote: Malik ne hamari mitti kuch special kisam ki banai hai ... ki jis saanche mein dalo wohi roop dharan kar leta hai ... agar tange mein behta do toh tangewaala ban jata hoon, agar hawaijahaz mein behta do toh pilot ban jata hoon ... masjid mein mulla, mandir mein pandit ... aur agar dil mein behta do toh dilwaala
Trans: God has made my properties of a special kind ... in whichever shape you put me I adopt that shape ... if you make me sit in a horse cart then I become a horse cart driver, if you make me sit in an aeroplane then I become a pilot ... religious leader in a mosque, saint in a temple ... and if you put me in a heart then I become a lover

Title: Ilaaka
Quote: Galati ek baar hoti hai, do baar hoti hai ... lekin teesri baar iraada hota hai
Trans: Mistake can happen once, can happen twice ... but the third time it's the intention

Title: Ilaaka
Quote: Kal hum Holi khelenge ... lekin is Holi mein gulaal ki bajai dhuna udhega ... pichkariyon mein se rang nahi, bandookon mein se goliyan niklengi ... geeton ki jagah cheekein ... aur laaj ki jagah laashein tadapengi
Trans: Tomorrow I'll play Holi ... but in this Holi instead of colour powder, smoke will fly ... bullets will come out from guns instead of colour from water toys ... screams instead of songs ... and bodies will drop instead of modesty

Title: Ilaaka
Quote: Dushman ko dushmani se hi nahi ... dosti se bhi maara ja sakta hai
Trans: You can not only kill an enemy with enmity ... but also with friendship

Title: Ilaaka
Quote: Hamara rasta kaatne waali koi bhi billi ... zinda nahi rehti
Trans: Any cat that cuts my path ... doesn't stay alive

Title: Hum Tum Shabana
Quote: Uske Ramayan shuru hone ke pehle uska Mahabharat kar denge
Trans: Before his Ramayana starts we will do his Mahabharata

Title: Hum Tum Shabana
Quote: Oye mere dry fruiton, oye mere kaju, oye mere badam ... oye jhappi de de yaar, oye pappi de de yaar
Trans: Oh my dry fruit, oh my cashew, oh my almond ... give me a hug, give me a kiss

Title: Hum Tum Shabana
Quote: Mere ghar mein kaun nagina hai kaun kamina hai?
Trans: In my house who is a diamond and who is a scoundrel?

Title: Janta Hawaldar
Quote: Aaj hum joh kuch bhi hai na, yeh aap hi ke wajah se hai ... is liye jitna hum yeh charan thame rahenge na ... utna hi dharam aur badega
Trans: What I am today is all because of you ... that's why the more I hold your feet ... the more my righteousness will grow

Title: Janta Hawaldar
Quote: Hamare paas sone chandi ki daulat hai ... tumhare paas husn ki
Trans: I have the wealth of gold and silver ... and you have the wealth of beauty

Title: Darling
Quote: Yeh dimag hai na is a very fascinating thing ... yeh kab, kahan, kaise humpar chaal chale ... koi bhi nahi bol sakta
Trans: This mind is a very fascinating thing ... when, where, how it will play a trick on us ... no one can say that

Title: Darling
Quote: Che mahine ke baad sab biwiyan bhoot ban jaati hai
Trans: After 6 months all wives become ghosts

Title: Darling
Quote: Shaadi ke baad duniya ki har ladki nazar aati hai ... biwi dikhai nahi deti hai
Trans: After marriage you can see every girl of this world ... but you just can't see your wife

Title: Darling
Quote: Jo khel tumne mere saath khela ... wahi khel main tumhare saath khelungi
Trans: The game that you played with me ... that same game I'll play with you

Title: Pocket Maar
Quote: Zindagi ki har ghadi aakhri ghadi hoti hai ... aur har saans aakhri saans hota hai
Trans: Every moment of life is the last moment ... and every breath is the last breath

Title: Pocket Maar
Quote: Har khel mein ek ki jeet aur doosre ki haar hoti hai
Trans: In every game one person wins and the other person loses

Title: Pocket Maar
Quote: Ek peshawar mujrim jab yeh kehta hai ki usse sharafat ki talash hai ... toh usse badkar koi zaleel nahi hota hai
Trans: When a professional criminal says that he is looking for honesty ... then there is no one more disgraceful than him

Title: Pocket Maar
Quote: Joota khane ke baad garam chai penicillin ka kaam deti hai
Trans: After getting beaten by shoes, hot tea gives what penicillin gives

Title: Jurmana
Quote: Maine aapko devi jankar puja ... par aap devi nahi, devi ki murti nikli ... joh na kuch dekh sake, na mehsoos kar sake
Trans: I worshipped you thinking you are a goddess ... but you are not a goddess, you are a statue of a goddess ... who can't give anything, and neither can it feel anything

Title: Jurmana
Quote: Ladies ko sharaab offer karne ka tarika yeh hai ... ki hurricane aaye, toofan aaye, bhuchal aaye lekin glass se ek boond sharaab bhi na chalke ... aur chalke toh kaide se chalke
Trans: You should offer alcohol to women in such a way that ... whether a hurricane comes, whether a storm comes, whether an earthquake comes, not even one drop of alcohol should fall from the glass ... and if it falls then it should in the right manner

Title: Jurmana
Quote: Rupaiya bhes bhi badalta hai
Trans: Money does change its appearance

Title: Chaar Din Ki Chandni
Quote: Yeh ladki nahi hai ... barah bor ka kartoos hai jisne mujhe dishkiyaon kar diya hai
Trans: She is not a girl ... she is 12 mm bullet who has killed me

Title: Chaar Din Ki Chandni
Quote: Khemgadh ka cheetah hoon ... shikaar par hi jeeta hoon
Trans: I'm a cheetah from Khemgadh ... and I live off my prey

Title: Chaar Din Ki Chandni
Quote: Bachpan mein chewing gum khakar baat nahi kar pate the ... aur ab paan khakar baat nahi kar pa rahe hai
Trans: In childhood you couldn't talk properly because of the chewing gum in your mouth ... and now you can't talk properly because of the betel leaves in your mouth

Title: Aadmi Aur Insaan
Quote: Yeh mitti pyasi hai, jis din iski pyaas bhuj jayegi ... yeh mitti sona ban jayegi
Trans: This land is thirsty and the day its thirst will end ... this land will turn into gold

Title: Aadmi Aur Insaan
Quote: Sahare insaan ko kamzor bana dete hai
Trans: Support makes a person weak

Title: Aadmi Aur Insaan
Quote: Mein kal ke bare mein kabhi bhi nahi sochti ... ho rahega kuch na kuch ghabrayen kya ... zindagi sirf ek ittefaq ka naam hai
Trans: I never think about tomorrow ... something will happen, no need to worry ... life is nothing but a coincidence

Title: Aadmi Aur Insaan
Quote: Hamare haath se naseeb waale hi marte hai
Trans: Only the lucky people die from my hands

Title: Alaap
Quote: Pyar ka mazaa saath marne mein nahi ... saath jeene mein hai
Trans: The fun of love is not in dying together ... it's in living together

Title: Alaap
Quote: Zinda rehne ke liye apne sivah kisi aur ka hona bilkul zaroori nahi hai ... aadmi jinke saath jeena chahta hai woh unke bagair bhi jee sakta hai
Trans: To stay alive you don't anyone else other than you ... a person can also live without the people with whom he wants to live

Title: Alaap
Quote: Kanoon kehta hai ki karz agar purana ho jaye ... toh usse chukane ki koi zaroorat nahi
Trans: The law states that if the loan becomes old ... then there is no need to repay that

Title: Alaap
Quote: Bus mein tel jalta hai aur taange mein janavar ka khoon jalta hai
Trans: In a bus oil burns and in a horse cart the blood of the animal burns

Title: Dard-E-Dil
Quote: Bade gaur se sun raha tha zamana ... tum hi so gaye dastan kehte kehte
Trans: The world was listening very carefully ... you yourself slept while saying the story

Title: Dard-E-Dil
Quote: Woh chalti toh zameen par hai ... lekin uske kadmo ke nishaan hamare dil par padte hai
Trans: Even though she walks on the ground ... but her footprints are created in my heart

Title: Dard-E-Dil
Quote: Tum khud ek aaisi churi ho ... jiski dhaar par katne waala kat bhi jaye par uff na kare
Trans: You yourself are a knife ... on the edge of which a person being cut will get cut, but he won't say a thing

Title: Dard-E-Dil
Quote: Hum mein bhi aa padha hai doston se kaam kuch yaani ... hamare doston ke bewafaa hone ka waqt aaya
Trans: I need help from my friends ... hence the time has come for my friends to become unfaithful

Title: Pyaar Koi Khel Nahin
Quote: Pyar karne waala insaan apni zabaan se chahe dus jhoot bol le ... lekin uski aankhen kabhi jhoot nahi bolti
Trans: Even if a person in love says ten lies from his own mouth ... still his eyes can never lie

Title: Pyaar Koi Khel Nahin
Quote: Yeh kya hota hai, yeh kyun hota hai, yeh kaise ho jaata hai ... kyun apna dil achanak kisi anjaane ki pehli hi nazar mein ... apna nahi paraya ho jaata hai
Trans: What is this, why does this happen, how does this happen ... why is it that our own heart suddenly on the first sight of some stranger ... becomes someone else's instead of being our own

Title: Chand Ke Paar Chalo
Quote: Duniya ki sabse oonchi imaarat ban jaane ke baad apne naam se pehchani jaati hai ... usse banane waalon ke naam se nahi
Trans: The tallest building in the world after being built is known by its name ... and not by the people who make it

Title: Chand Ke Paar Chalo
Quote: Yeh udi udi si rangat, yeh luti luti si zulfen ... teri halat bata rahi hai teri zindagi ka fasana
Trans: Your faded complexion, your twisted hair ... your condition is describing the story of your life

Title: Chand Ke Paar Chalo
Quote: Ameeron ke joh kutte hote hai na, woh kabhi bhaukte nahi hai ... aur jab woh bhaukna shuru karde toh samjho ki unko time khatam ho gaya
Trans: The dogs of rich people never bark ... and when they start barking then you should understand that their time has ended

Title: Nagin
Quote: Maika ladki ke liye ek sarai jaisa hota hai ... jahan aadmi raat bhar aaram toh kar sakta hai ... lekin zindagi bhar ka thikana nahi kar sakta
Trans: The maternal home for a girl is like a resting place ... where she can relax for a night ... but it can't become her home for the entire life

Title: Nagin
Quote: Bhagyawan wohi hoti hai joh do kandhon pe savaar apne babul ke ghar se jaati hai ... aur char kandhon pe savaar apne dulha ke ghar se nikalti hai
Trans: A girl is lucky if she leaves her fathers house on the support of two shoulders ... and if she leaves her husbands house on the support of four shoulders

Title: Nagin
Quote: Shaadi ek yagya hota hai ... jis mein aadmi ko sukh paane ke liye apne ahankar ki aahuti deni padti hai
Trans: Marriage is a ritual ... in which a person to sacrifice their ego the achieve happiness

Title: Nagin
Quote: Dil ke kuch taar aaise hote hai jinse woh khabaren bhi mil jaati hai ... joh bheji nahi jaati
Trans: Some connections of heart are such that they give out the news ... which is not even sent out

Title: Bol Radha Bol
Quote: Insaan toh waqt ki tarah hota hai ... badalte hi rehta hai
Trans: A human is like time ... he keeps changing

Title: Bol Radha Bol
Quote: Zindagi toh dhoop chaon ki tarah hoti hai ... is mein agar bure log hai, toh achche log bhi hote hai
Trans: Life is like sunlight and shade ... if there are bad people in it, then there are good people as well

Title: Bol Radha Bol
Quote: Log pyar mein zindagi haar jaate hai, aap ek inkaar se haar gaye?
Trans: People lose their life in love, and you're losing from one rejection?

Title: Bol Radha Bol
Quote: Ek maa jise doodh pilati hai ... uske saaye tak ko pehchanti hai
Trans: A mother who feeds her child milk ... knows even the shadow of him

Title: Shirdi Ke Sai Baba
Quote: Joh Baba ki taraf ek kadam badata hai na ... Baba uski taraf dus kadam badate hai
Trans: The one who walks one step towards god ... Lord Sai Baba walks 10 steps towards him

Title: Shirdi Ke Sai Baba
Quote: Sachche dil ki awaaz jab goonjti hai ... toh dishayen dol uthti hai
Trans: When the voice of a true heart echoes ... then all the directions start dancing

Title: Shirdi Ke Sai Baba
Quote: Shirdi mera Pandharpur, Shirdi pujya staan ... yahin viraje Vithal mere, saavare Ghanshyam ... yahin bahe Ganga Jamuna, yahi tirth mahan ... pranaam mera sweekar karo Sainath bhagwan
Trans: Shirdi is my Pandharpur, Shirdi is a respectable place ... here Lord Vithoba and Ghanshyam are seated ... here the rivers of Ganga and Jamuna flow, and this is a great holy place ... oh Lord Sai Baba accept my greetings

Title: Shirdi Ke Sai Baba
Quote: Jab insaan apne paap ka prayashchit khud karle ... toh usse kisi ke reham-o-karam ka mohtaj nahi hona padta
Trans: When a person himself remorses for his sins ... then he is not dependent on someone else's compassion

Title: Kal Aaj Aur Kal
Quote: Dushmani ko khareedne kahi jana nahi padta ... aur dosti kisi bhi keemat pe nahi milti
Trans: You don't have to go anywhere to buy enmity ... and you can't buy friendship for any price

Title: Kal Aaj Aur Kal
Quote: Aadat kisi bhi kisam ki ho achchi ya buri ... uska ghulam hona buri aadat hai
Trans: Doesn't matter if the habit is good or bad ... it's bad to be a slave of that habit

Title: Kal Aaj Aur Kal
Quote: Do suiyon ke beech zindagi kya kya khel dikhaye ... naya purana natak karta waqt guzarta jaye
Trans: Life shows so many tricks between the two needles ... time passes on by doing the drama of the new and the old

Title: Kal Aaj Aur Kal
Quote: Agar hum apne buzurgon ki nakhushi ki buniyaad par apni khushiyon ki imaarat khadi karenge ... toh woh zyada din nahi tik payegi
Trans: If we build our buildings of happiness on the foundation of sadness of our elders ... then it won't stand for many days

Title: Jaan
Quote: Shukriyada karne se ehsaan khatam ho jata hai ... aur agar ehsaan khatam ho jaaye toh dosti kaise shuru hogi
Trans: By thanking the favour ends ... and if the favour ends then how will the friendship start

Title: Jaan
Quote: Maut ke saath sirf zindagi khatam hoti hai ... mohabbat nahi
Trans: Only life ends with death ... not love

Title: Jaan
Quote: Maut toh muft mein badnaam hai ...  jaan toh zindagi leti hai
Trans: Death is defamed uselessly ... life is the one that kills

Title: Jaan
Quote: Koi bhi insaan paidaishi mujrim nahi hota ... ya toh banaya jaata hai, ya phir ban jaata hai
Trans: No person is a born criminal ... he either is made into one, or he becomes one

Title: Will You Marry Me
Quote: Joh kholna hai khol dena ... dil mat kholna
Trans: Open whatever you want ... just don't open your heart

Title: Will You Marry Me
Quote: Look change karne se insaan change nahi hota
Trans: By changing the look a person doesn't change

Title: Will You Marry Me
Quote: Pati patni ka joh rishta hai woh rath ke do paiyon ki tarah hota hai ... ek bhi paiya toot gaya toh rath ka chalna mushkil ho jaata hai
Trans: The relationship between husband and wife is like the two wheels of a chariot ... even if one wheel breaks then it becomes hard for the chariot to move

Title: Will You Marry Me
Quote: Aapke pichwade pe aaisi laat maroonga na ... super duper bumper banake rakh doonga
Trans: I'll give you such a kick on your backside ... that I'll make it into a super duper bumper

Title: Rocky
Quote: Jab main tumhare saath bike pe chalti hoon ... toh phir dil aaise karta hai ki road kabhi khatam hi na ho ... bas tum aur main, main aur tum, chalte jaye chalte jaye ... aur manzil kabhi na aaye
Trans: When I go on the bike with you ... then my heart wishes that the road never ends ... just you and me, me and you, keep going ... and the destination never comes

Title: Rocky
Quote: Pehle police ka naam sunkar gunde bhaagte the ... ab police ka naam sunkar public bhaagti hai
Trans: Before goons used to run by hearing the name of police ... nowadays the public runs by hearing the name of police

Title: Rocky
Quote: Jab apun khada ... toh sarkar se bada!
Trans: When I stand ... I'm taller than the government!

Title: Rocky
Quote: Zindagi murdajali ka naam hai ... zinda dil kya khaak jeete hai
Trans: Life is the name of apathy ... the people with enthusiasm hardly live their life

Title: Tamasha (1952)
Quote: Koi haarkar jeet leta hai aur koi jeetkar haar jaata hai
Trans: Some win even after losing and some lose even after winning

Title: Tamasha (1952)
Quote: Mohabbat ussi ka naam hai joh insaan ko qurbaaniya sikhati hai
Trans: Love is the name of a thing that teaches a person how to sacrifice

Title: Tamasha (1952)
Quote: Samajhdar log kabhi dil se mohabbat nahi karte ... woh hamesha dimag se mohabbat karte hai
Trans: Smart people never love from the heart ... they always love from the mind

Title: Tamasha (1952)
Quote: Zehereli nagin sabke liye zeher rakhti hai ... magar woh bhi apne naag ke liye pyar rakhti hai
Trans: A poisonous snake lady keeps poison for everyone ... but she also keeps love for her snake

Title: Thodi Life Thoda Magic
Quote: Agar aap mujhse poochti hai ki, which is this one person joh mere liye competition hai ... toh that's me
Trans: If you ask me, which is this one person who is a competition for me ... then that's me

Title: Thodi Life Thoda Magic
Quote: Sapne kuch kuch magic jaise hote hai ... dikhta kuch hai aur hota hai kuch aur
Trans: Dreams are a little bit like magic ... you see something and something else happens

Title: Thodi Life Thoda Magic
Quote: Iraada agar pakka ho toh taqat apne aap jhut jaati hai
Trans: If the intention is strong then the courage comes by itself

Title: Uran Khatola
Quote: Nadan dost se samajhdar dushman achcha hota hai
Trans: It's better to have a sensible enemy rather than a silly friend

Title: Uran Khatola
Quote: Dil ki awaaz dil se suni jaati hai ... kaano se nahi
Trans: The voice of the heart is heard from the heart ... and not from the ears

Title: Uran Khatola
Quote: Lehron se darne waale kinare reh jaate hai ... aur sagar mein faandne waale moti le aate hai
Trans: Those who are scared of the waves remain on the shores ... and those who jump into the ocean bring the pearls

Title: Uran Khatola
Quote: Zindagi ek khoobsurat khilona hai ... isse darna nahi, khelna seekho
Trans: Life is a beautiful toy ... don't be scared of it, learn to play with it

Title: Yahudi
Quote: Tumhare hi liye paida hue duniya ke nazare ... chamakte hai tumhari roshni se chand aur taare ... tumhara gham hai gham, auron ka gham khawab-o-kahani hai ... tumhara khoon hai khoon, hamara khoon pani hai
Trans: The sights of the world are created just for you ... the moon and the stars shine because of your light ... your sorrow is sorrow, and the sorrow of others is a dream story ... your blood is blood, and my blood is water

Title: Yahudi
Quote: Tareef us khuda ki jisne jahan banaya ... unko haseen banakar mujhko jawan banaya
Trans: Praise the lord that has made this world ... he made her beautiful and he made me young

Title: Yahudi
Quote: Na ched ab mujhko, rehne de yahin tak dastan meri ... kahunga sach toh jal jayega dil tera, zabaan meri
Trans: Don't tease me now, let my story be till here only ... because if I say the truth then your heart and my mouth will burn

Title: Yahudi
Quote: Doob maro is insaaf par, aasun bahao is kanoon par ... joh kamzoron ke liye talwar ki dhaar, aur zabardast ke liye bank-e-bahar hai ... joh apne liye nagme-e-saaz, aur hamare liye maut ki awaaz hai
Trans: Drown on this justice, shed tears on this law ... which is the edge of a sword for the weak, and is the guise of spring for the strong ... which is a musical melody for you, and it's the sound of death for me

Title: Humse Hai Muqabla
Quote: Avesh ho ya dukh ho, gussa ho ya khushi ... apni bhavnaon ko paanch minute tak roke rakho ... un paanch minuton mein mann shaant ho jayega ... aur shaant mann se lena waala har ek faisla achcha hi hoga
Trans: Whether it's zeal or sadness, whether it's anger or happiness ... control your emotions for five minutes ... and in those five minutes your mind will become calm ... and every decision that you take with a calm mind will be good

Title: Humse Hai Muqabla
Quote: Pyar mein woh divya shakti hai joh patthar ko bhi maum bana de
Trans: Love has the divine power which can turn even a stone into wax

Title: Alibaba Aur 40 Chor
Quote: Badshahon ka andaza bahut kam galat hota hai ... aur jab galat hota hai toh woh badshah nahi rehte
Trans: The estimation of kings is very rarely wrong ... and when it's wrong then they don't remain as a king

Title: Alibaba Aur 40 Chor
Quote: Jhoot ke chehre par naqab nahi rukta
Trans: A mask doesn't stay on the face of a lie

Title: Alibaba Aur 40 Chor
Quote: Mere bahadur saathiyon ... nikal aao bahar aur laashon se bhar do is shehar ko ... jala do, raakh kardo, ek bhi zinda na rahe
Trans: My courageous partners ... come outside and fill this city with dead bodies ... burn them, turn them into ashes, no one should remain alive

Title: Apna Haath Jagannath
Quote: Aadmi jab tak zindagi mein kuch ho na jaye ... uske apne bhi paraye ho jaate hai
Trans: Until a person becomes something in life ... even his dear ones act as strangers

Title: Apna Haath Jagannath
Quote: Chota kaam kare toh mochi aur bada kare toh Bata ... chota kaam kare toh julaha aur bada kare toh khambata
Trans: If it's a small person doing the job then he is a cobbler and if it's a big person then he is Mr. Bata ... if it's a small person doing the job then he is from a low caste and if it's a big person then he is from a good family

Title: Apna Haath Jagannath
Quote: In haathon ki mehnat se joh pasine ki boond dharti pe girti hai ... woh moti bankar laut aati hai
Trans: The drop of sweat that falls on the ground from the hardwork of these hands ... it comes back as a pearl

Title: Apna Haath Jagannath
Quote: Peet ka bhai kaam nahi aata ... pet ka bachcha kaam nahi aata ... aakhir pallu ka paisa hi kaam aata hai
Trans: A supporting brother is of no use ... your own child from your belly is of no use ... finally only money is of use

Title: Akhiyon Se Goli Maare
Quote: Yeh kaisa locha kiya tune mere pyar ka ... maal toh bika nahi bill chad gaya udhaar ka
Trans: What problem did you bring into my love ... the merchandise didn't sell and instead I got a bill of a loan

Title: Akhiyon Se Goli Maare
Quote: Mereko damaad thoda hatke chahiye ... aaisa jisko dekh ke public sadak pe se hat jave ... police station se police hat jave ... aur mahulle mein se bade se bada gunda phut jave
Trans: I need an unique son-in-law ... as in seeing whom the public moves away from the road ... the police moves away from the police station ... and the biggest goon of the locality runs away

Title: Akhiyon Se Goli Maare
Quote: Is chor bazaar mein aake apne ho gaye vare nyare ... apun akhiyon se goli maare
Trans: By coming to this thief market I've become rich ... and I shoot bullets from my eyes

Title: Kishen Kanhaiya
Quote: Main toh film bhi dekhkar pasand karti hoon, story sunkar nahi ... ussi tarah main ladka bhi dekhkar pasand ya napasand karoongi
Trans: I select a film after seeing it, not by listening to its story ... just like that I'll select or reject a guy after seeing him

Title: Kishen Kanhaiya
Quote: Jab kaam ka bhoj badh jaata hai na ... toh dimaag ki wiring mein short circuit ho jaati hai
Trans: When the load of work increases ... then the wires of the brain get short circuited

Title: Kishen Kanhaiya
Quote: Ek ek do do peg toh do do takke ke log peete hai ... hum toh poori botal peene waalon mein se hai
Trans: Cheap people drink one or two pegs ... I'm someone who finishes the entire bottle

Title: Kishen Kanhaiya
Quote: Hum toh kalakar hai ... hamari kala ki taqdeer mein car likhi hi nahi hai ... yeh kalakar bekaar sadakon par dhukaar ki tarah ghoom raha hai, dhukaar ki tarah
Trans: I'm an actor ... and there is no car written in the destiny of my talent ... here an actor is roaming on the streets like an useless person

Title: Chalo Ishq Ladaaye
Quote: Insaan ko usse shaadi nahi karni chahiye, jisse woh pyar karta ho ... balki usse shaadi karni chahiye, joh usse pyar karta ho
Trans: A person should not marry someone whom he loves ... instead a person should marry someone who loves him

Title: Chalo Ishq Ladaaye
Quote: Abhe oh dukkar Fiat ke cancelled model
Trans: Hey you cancelled model of a piggy Fiat car

Title: Chalo Ishq Ladaaye
Quote: Clinic all clear dandruff shampoo ki tarah clear clear bata do ... varna itna maarenge ki zindagi bhar badan pe kapdon ki jagah dukh dabao lep lagakar ghoomoge
Trans: Tell me clearly like the Clinic all clear dandruff shampoo ... or else I'll beat you so much that instead of wearing clothes everywhere, you'll apply the pain killing balm for your entire life

Title: Chalo Ishq Ladaaye
Quote: Abhe pain balm ... ghamorio ke saste powder!
Trans: Hey you pain balm ... cheap powder for rashes!

Title: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose: The Forgotten Hero
Quote: Tum mujhe khoon do ... main tumhe azaadi doonga!
Trans: You give me blood ... and I'll give you independence!

Title: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose: The Forgotten Hero
Quote: Agar akele choot jao aur satya tumhare saath hai ... toh aage badne se mat darna
Trans: If you are left alone and if the truth is with you ... then don't be afraid of moving forward

Title: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose: The Forgotten Hero
Quote: Phirta raha main desh desh, mann mein usse basaye ... uske ird-gird jeevan ke lamhe mittaye, banaye
Trans: I used to roam from one country to another country keeping her in my heart ... I made and erased the moments of life near her

Title: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose: The Forgotten Hero
Quote: Waqt aane de bata denge tujhe aasmaan ... hum abhi se kya batayein kya hamare dil mein hai
Trans: Hey sky, let the time come I'll show it you ... why should I tell from now itself what is there in my heart

Title: Doli Saja Ke Rakhna
Quote: Joh hum mein sabse zyada pyar kare ... wohi hum mein thukra de ... isse bada dard aur kya ho sakta hai
Trans: Those who love us the most ... if they reject us ... then there is no pain bigger than that

Title: Doli Saja Ke Rakhna
Quote: Pyar dil se hota hai ... joh sachcha hota hai aur hamesha rehta hai
Trans: Love happens from the heart ... which is true and it stays forever

Title: Doli Saja Ke Rakhna
Quote: Itna maroonga tujhe itna maroonga ki meri behen toh kya ... tu apni hone waali biwi ko bhi behen kahega
Trans: I'll hit you so much that forget my sister ... you'll even call your fiance as your sister

Title: Doli Saja Ke Rakhna
Quote: Yeh Baba Sehgal ka zamane hai aur aap Saigal ke zamane ke lagte ho
Trans: This is the generation of Baba Sehgal and you look from the generation of Saigal

Title: Allah Rakha
Quote: Pathan ka lafz aur mayaan se nikla talwar ... kabhi vapas nahi jaati
Trans: The words of a Pathan and the sword from a scabbard ... never go back

Title: Allah Rakha
Quote: Is shareer par vaasna ke itne daag hai ... ki yeh behta khoon bhi inhe dhoh nahi sakta
Trans: There are so many marks of sexual desires on this body ... that even this flowing blood can't clean it

Title: Allah Rakha
Quote: Zeherilay saanp zyada din zinda nahi rehte ... ek na ek din kisi ki laathi uska sar kuchalkar rakh deti hai
Trans: Poisonous snakes don't live long ... one day or the other someone's stick smashes their head

Title: Allah Rakha
Quote: Zindagi mein Allah aur maa ke baad is roti ko izzat di hai ... isse main zameen par girakar beizzat nahi hone doonga
Trans: In life after god and my mother, I've respected food ... and I won't disrespect it by dropping it on the ground

Title: Koi Mere Dil Se Poochhe
Quote: Aap saas bankar hamari zindagi mein aayi ... aur itna pyar diya ki hamari maa ban gayi
Trans: You came in my life as a mother-in-law ... and you gave me so much love that you became my mother

Title: Koi Mere Dil Se Poochhe
Quote: Fashion ki shuruvat Adam aur Eve se hui thi
Trans: Adam and Even started fashion

Title: Koi Mere Dil Se Poochhe
Quote: Jiske paas maa hai uske paas sab kuch hai ... jiske paas maa nahi uske paas kuch bhi nahi
Trans: The one who has a mother has everything ... and the one who doesn't have a mother has nothing

Title: Kitne Door Kitne Paas
Quote: Zindagi ke safar mein bahut saare musafir milte hai ... lekin har ek ki manzil ek hi toh nahi hoti
Trans: In the journey of life you get a lot of companions ... but not everyone has the same destination

Title: Kitne Door Kitne Paas
Quote: Zindagi ke safar mein joh rasta manzil ki taraf jata hai ... ussi par chalna chahiye
Trans: In the journey of life the path that takes you to the destination ... you should walk only on that

Title: Kitne Door Kitne Paas
Quote: Hindustan mein jab tak aapki jeb mein paisa hai ... log poochte hai kaisa hai?
Trans: In India until you have money in your pocket ... people will ask how are you?

Title: Kitne Door Kitne Paas
Quote: Shaadi sirf char pheron ke bandhan ka naam nahi hota ... shaadi toh woh hai jahan dil se dil mile ... jab tak ek doosre ke man mandir mein ek doosre ki murat nahi bas jaati ... us shaadi ka koi matlab nahi hota
Trans: Marriage is just not the name of taking four rounds around the holy fire ... marriage is something that connects a heart to a heart ... until the idol of each other resides in each others heart ... till then that marriage has no meaning

Title: PK
Quote: Jis mehfil ne thukraya humko, kyun us mehfil ko yaad kare ... aage lamhe bula rahe hai, aao unke saath chale
Trans: The gathering that rejected us, why should we remember that gathering ... the moments ahead are calling us, come let's go with them

Title: PK
Quote: Main dikhti hoon maa jaisi sab kehte hai ... sab kehte hai, sach kehte hai ... par main hoon apne papa ki beti
Trans: Everyone says that I look like my mother ... if everyone says that, then they are telling the truth ... but I'm a daddy's girl

Title: PK
Quote: Humra gola par log jhoot nahi bolta hai
Trans: People don't lie on my planet

Title: PK
Quote: Kaun Hindu, kaun Musalman ... thappa kidhar hai dikha ... ye farak bhagwan nahi tum log banaya hai ... aur yahi is gola ka sabse danger wrong number hai
Trans: Who is Hindu, who is Muslim ... show me where is the stamp ... you guys have made this difference and not god ... and this is the most dangerous wrong number of this planet

Title: Lakeer ka Fakeer
Quote: Yahan sapne dekhne ka haq sabko hai ... par poore naseeb waalon ke hi hote hai
Trans: Here everyone has the right to see dreams ... but only the lucky ones get them fulfilled

Title: Lakeer ka Fakeer
Quote: Mar gaye toh maaf nahi toh pandra bees saaf
Trans: If I die then forgive me or else I'll kill about 15 to 20 people

Title: Lakeer ka Fakeer
Quote: Mumbai raat mein jaagti hai aur din mein bhaagti hai
Trans: Mumbai stays awake during the night and runs during the day

Title: Lakeer ka Fakeer
Quote: Yahan jiska jitna haath chalta hai ... uski utni baat chalti hai ... jiske haathon mein vazan, uske baaton mein vazan
Trans: Here the one who uses his hand ... only his words are accepted ... the one who has authority in his hands, his words have more weightage

Title: Tyaag
Quote: Aadmi har darr se bhaag sakta hai ... lekin apne aap se nahi
Trans: A person can run away from every fear ... but he can't run away from himself

Title: Tyaag
Quote: Purani zameen, purana makaan aur purana dost ... jitna zyada purana ho jaye ... utna hi zyada yaad aata hai
Trans: Old land, old house and an old friend ... the older they are ... the more you remember them

Title: Tyaag
Quote: Insaan marta aur jeeta sirf apne khayalon mein hai ... varna maut jaisi toh koi cheez hi nahi hai
Trans: A person dies and lives only in his imagination ... otherwise there is nothing called as death

Title: Tyaag
Quote: Waqt padne par aadmi jhoot bhi sach ki tarah bolta hai
Trans: When it's needed a person can tell a lie, just like it's the truth

Title: Love Breakups Zindagi
Quote: Joh baat dil mein hai usse bolne ki himmat rakh ... aur joh baat kisi aur ke dil mein hai usse samajhne ki samajh
Trans: Have the courage to say what is in your heart ... and have the understanding to understand what someone else has in their heart

Title: Love Breakups Zindagi
Quote: Relationships utne hi complicated hote hai ... jitna tum unhe banana chahte ho
Trans: Relationships are complicated only to the extent ... to which we make them

Title: Love Breakups Zindagi
Quote: Life mein aur films mein ... anth mein sab kuch theek ho jaata hai
Trans: In life and in films ... in the end everything becomes alright

Title: Love Breakups Zindagi
Quote: Zindagi bahut complicated hai doston ... isse simple rakho ... ek like minded partner dhoondo aur khush raho ... simple
Trans: Life is very complicated my friends ... keep it simple ... find a like minded partner and be happy ... simple

Title: MSG: The Messenger
Quote: Koi hum mein sant kehta hai, koi kehta hai farishta, koi kehta hai guru, toh koi kehta hai bhagwan ... lekin hum toh hai sirf ek insaan
Trans: Some call me a saint, some call me an angel, some call me a teacher, and some call me god ... but I'm just a human

Title: MSG: The Messenger
Quote: Hum aaise baap hai joh dushmanon ke liye akele hi kaafi hai
Trans: I'm such a father who is himself more than enough for the enemies

Title: MSG: The Messenger
Quote: Hum mein maarna apne aap ko maarne ke barabar hai
Trans: Killing me is the equivalent of killing yourself

Title: MSG: The Messenger
Quote: Agar desh mein srishti ke seva karna paap hai ... toh yeh paap hum aakhri saans tak karte rahenge
Trans: If it's a sin in the country to serve the universe ... then I'll commit this sin till my last breathe

Title: Khamoshiyan
Quote: Hum jism nahi, rooh ko bas mein karne ka shauk rakhte hai ... ujaalon mein nahi, andheron mein savarte hai
Trans: I like to control the soul, and not the body ... I dress up in the darkness, and not in the light

Title: Khamoshiyan
Quote: Woh baatein joh hum kisi ko bata nahi sakte ... tanha toh woh baatein hum mein banati hai
Trans: The things that we can't share with anyone ... those things make us lonely

Title: Khamoshiyan
Quote: Hum sab apne apne raaz ke shikaar hote hai
Trans: We all are preys of our own secrets

Title: Khamoshiyan
Quote: Bura waqt koi jagah nahi hoti jahan se aap bachke nikal sakte hai ... bura waqt aapke saath saath chalta hai ... aur jitna hi aap usse bhaagne ki koshish karte hai ... utna hi woh aapki taraf badhta hua nazar aata hai
Trans: Bad time is not a place from where you can run away ... bad time moves with you ... and the more you try to run away from it ... that much more it appears to come closer to you

Title: Kuch Tum Kaho Kuch Hum Kahein
Quote: Insaan chale jaate hai ... unki yaad reh jaati hai
Trans: Humans go away ... but their memories stay behind

Title: Kuch Tum Kaho Kuch Hum Kahein
Quote: Badhon ke samne jhukne se koi chota nahi hota ... kyun ki badhon ki narazgi joh hai na woh sirf satta par hoti hai ... bheetar ki gehrai mein toh bahut sara pyar hota hai
Trans: By bowing down in front of elders you don't become small ... because the elders are only angry from the outside ... but from inside they have a lot of love

Title: Kuch Tum Kaho Kuch Hum Kahein
Quote: Maa ke haath sirf aashirwad dene ke liye hote hai ... maafi mangne ke liye nahi
Trans: The hands of a mother are only there to give blessings ... and not to apologize

Title: Kuch Tum Kaho Kuch Hum Kahein
Quote: Hello Mrs. Agarkar ... we all know you love purana cricketer Gavaskar ... but we are very very sorry to tell you there is no one greater than apna Sachin Tendulkar
Trans: Hello Mrs. Agarkar ... we all know you love the old cricketer Gavaskar ... but we are very very sorry to tell you that there is no one greater than our Sachin Tendulkar

Title: Dharam Veer
Quote: Mard ka khoon aur aurat ke aasoon jab tak na bahe ... unki keemat nahi lagayi ja sakti
Trans: Until the blood of a man and the tears of a woman shed out ... you can't estimate their value

Title: Dharam Veer
Quote: Bahaduri ka naya dhang sikha gaya hai koi ... chukake khoon ki keemat chala gaya hai koi ... Dharam aur Veer ka naam reh jaye dharti par ... sabak zamane ko aaisa sikha gaya hai koi
Trans: Someone has taught us the new style of courage and left ... someone has paid the price of blood and left ... the name of Dharam and Veer will remain on this earth ... someone has taught the world a lesson and left

Title: Dharam Veer
Quote: Manushya sari duniya par vijay prapt kar sakta hai ... lekin mrityu par vijay prapt kar nahi sakta
Trans: A human can win over the entire world ... but he can't win over death

Title: Dharam Veer
Quote: Hum tumhe woh maut maarenge ki ek baar maut bhi kaanp uthegi
Trans: I'll give you such a death that for once even death will be scared

Title: Ghar Sansar
Quote: Badhon ke mooh se nikli hui gaaliyan ... choton ko dua bankar lagti hai ... joh badhon ki daant kha leta hai ... woh zindagi ki thokarein nahi khata
Trans: Curses coming out of elders mouth ... hit the younger ones as blessings ... and those who bear the scoldings of elders ... they never stumble in life

Title: Ghar Sansar
Quote: Is sansar mein bheek le lo magar udhaar kabhi mat lo ... kyun ki bheek leke aadmi ek baar zaleel hota hai ... magar udhaar maangke subah shyam zaleel hota hai
Trans: In this world you may beg but never take credit ... because a person is humiliated only once when he begs ... but with credit he is humiliated all the time

Title: Ghar Sansar
Quote: Haath woh kalam hai joh aakash ke kagaz pe likhi hui taqdeer ko badal sakta hai
Trans: The hand is that pen which can change the destiny that is written on the paper of the sky

Title: Ghar Sansar
Quote: Joh bhi kaam mile usse kar lena chahiye ... kaam koi chota nahi hota ... chota hota hai aadmi, uska dil, uski kartoot
Trans: Do whatever work you get ... no work is small ... if something is small then it's the person, his heart, his deeds

Title: Roy
Quote: Hum insaan hamesha kisi aur ki zindagi churake jeena chahte hai ... yeh fitrat hai hamari
Trans: We humans always want to steal someone else's life and live that ... that's our nature

Title: Roy
Quote: Log kehte hai ki kal main apni zindagi badal doonga, lekin kar nahi paate ... mera kal aa gaya hai, lekin hum chahe jitna badal jaye ... hum mein apne beete huye kal ki keemat deni padti hai
Trans: People say that tomorrow I'll change my life, but they are unable to do it ... my tomorrow has come, but no matter how much we change ... we have to pay the price of our past

Title: Roy
Quote: Main sochti hoon ki kya tum sach mein woh ho joh log kehte hai ... ya log joh kehte hai tum woh banne ki koshish kar rahe ho
Trans: I'm thinking whether you are indeed that person what people say you are ... or what people say, you are trying to be that

Title: Roy
Quote: Baatein jhooti ho sakti hai ... kahaniyan nahi
Trans: Conversations can be lies ... but not stories

Title: Neal 'N' Nikki
Quote: Your first time should be with someone special ... pata hai kyun? ... (kyun) ... kyun ki tum usse kabhi nahi bhula paogi ... aur agar tumhara first time kisi idiot ke saath hoga ... toh zindagi bhar us idiot yaad rakhna padega
Trans: Your first time should be with someone special ... you know why? ... (why) ... because you'll never forget him ... and if your first time is with some idiot ... then you'll have to remember that idiot for your entire life

Title: Neal 'N' Nikki
Quote: I want to be a part of every part of your life
Trans: I want to be a part of every part of your life

Title: Neal 'N' Nikki
Quote: Men ... jitna chota dil, utna chota dimaag ... utna chota sab kuch
Trans: Men ... the smaller their heart is, that much smaller their mind is ... and that much smaller is everything else

Title: Vaah Life Ho Toh Aisi
Quote: Yeh Superman, Batman aur Spiderman ka baap malum hai kaun hai? ... Hanuman
Trans: Do you know who is the father of Superman, Batman and Spiderman? ... Hanuman

Title: Vaah Life Ho Toh Aisi
Quote: Main har ghadi, har minute, har second paise kamana chahta hoon
Trans: I want to make money every moment, every minute, every second

Title: Vaah Life Ho Toh Aisi
Quote: Dhanda karneka toh ekdum hatela ... pan kya karega kismat hai na phatela
Trans: If you do any business then it must be very unique ... but what to do my luck is torn

Title: Godmother
Quote: Koi rishta pakka nahi hota ... maut aati hai toh pakke se pakka rishta bhi kachi maati ki tarah toot jaata hai
Trans: No relationship is firm ... when death comes then even the firmest relationship breaks like a fragile pot

Title: Godmother
Quote: Kom toh bas ek hai ... insaan ki
Trans: There is only one caste ... which is humanity

Title: Godmother
Quote: Tum logon ne mere pe vishvas kiya aur maine tumhare saath vishvasghat kiya ... tum logon ne meri jai-jai-kaar ki aur maine tumhari peeth mein chura bhaunka
Trans: You people trusted me and I betrayed you ... you people hailed me and I stuck a knife on your backs

Title: Mashaal
Quote: Main marke bhi maroonga nahi ... tumhare andar zinda rahoonga
Trans: I won't die even after dying ... I'll stay alive within you

Title: Mashaal
Quote: Har aadmi ka kuch na kuch daam hota hai ... daam dedo, aadmi tumhara
Trans: Every person has a price ... pay the price and the person is yours

Title: Mashaal
Quote: Halaat, kismatein, insaan, zindagi ... waqt ke saath saath sab badal jaata hai
Trans: Situation, luck, human, life ... with time everything changes

Title: Mashaal
Quote: Agar naali ke keeday ko duniya bhar ka sabun ikattha karke bhi saaf kiya jaye, usko dhoya jaye ... toh bhi woh gande ka ganda hi rahega
Trans: If you collect all the soap in the world and wash and clean a bug from the gutter ... still he will remain dirty

Title: Bardaasht
Quote: Kutton ke bhaunkane se haathi ki chaal pe koi farak nahi padta
Trans: Elephants are not bothered by barking dogs

Title: Bardaasht
Quote: Khuredne se zakhm bharte nahi hai ... hare ho jaate hai
Trans: By scratching wounds don't fill up ... they become even more worse

Title: Bardaasht
Quote: Main ab tak jee raha tha apne bhai ke liye ... aur ab jee raha hoon uski maut ka badla lene ke liye
Trans: Until now I was living for my brother ... and now I'm living to take the revenge of his death

Title: Bardaasht
Quote: Jab tak main tum logon ko adalat mein phaasi ki sazaa na dilwa doon ... maut bhi mera kuch nahi bighaad payegi
Trans: Until I get you guys the death penalty in court ... till then even death can't do anything to me

Title: Johnny Gaddaar
Quote: Shuruvat hamesha majboori se hi hoti hai ... yeh majboori ahista ahista zaroorat ... aur zaroorat aadat ban jaati hai
Trans: The start always happens with a compulsion ... and this compulsion slowly slowly turns into necessity ... and necessity turns into a habit

Title: Johnny Gaddaar
Quote: It's not the age ... it's the mileage!
Trans: It's not the age ... it's the mileage!

Title: Ram Avtar
Quote: Pyar ek jazbaat hai joh kiya nahi jaata ... yeh ittefaq se ho jaata hai
Trans: Love is a sentiment that can't be done ... it happens by coincidence

Title: Ram Avtar
Quote: Shaadi toh kabhi na tootne waala ek bandhan hai, ek haqeeqat hai ... yeh woh rishta hai joh saans tootne ke baad hi tootta hai
Trans: Marriage is a bond that can never break, it's a reality ... it's a relationship which breaks only when we stop breathing

Title: Ram Avtar
Quote: Phool pyar ki nishani hoti hai aur khushboo uska ehsaas
Trans: Flower is the sign of love and it's fragrance is the feeling of it

Title: Ram Avtar
Quote: Ehsaas sirf dil mein yaadon ke diye jalate hai ... dilon ke beech nahi aate
Trans: A feeling only ignites the lamps of memories in the heart ... it doesn't come in between the hearts

Title: Laaga Chunari Mein Daag
Quote: Yeh aaine si shafaq aankhen ... khuda inki masoomiyat mehfoos rakhe
Trans: These eyes of dawn are like a mirror ... I wish god secures their innocence

Title: Laaga Chunari Mein Daag
Quote: Koi rishta agar sach ki talwar nahi jhel sakta ... toh uska toot jana hi achcha hai
Trans: If a relationship can't handle the sword of truth ... then it's better for it to break

Title: Laaga Chunari Mein Daag
Quote: Bombay mein kisi ko bhi ek se zyada chance nahi milta hai
Trans: In Bombay no one gets more than one chance

Title: Laaga Chunari Mein Daag
Quote: Har kadam par ek kutta milega tumhe ... par tum chaho toh woh tumhara nahi, tum uska istamal kar sakti ho
Trans: On every step you'll get one dog ... but if you want then he won't be able use you, instead you'll be able to use him

Title: Shaadi Karke Phas Gaya Yaar
Quote: Shaadi is mind blowing ... sometimes blowing mind
Trans: Marriage is mind blowing ... sometimes it blows your mind

Title: Shaadi Karke Phas Gaya Yaar
Quote: Pyar aur aulad ke bina insaan kabhi khush nahi rehta
Trans: A person can never be happy without love and a child

Title: Bhindi Baazaar Inc.
Quote: Zindagi aur chess mein koi khaas farak nahi hai ... jeetne ke liye dono mein chaalein chalni padti hai
Trans: There is not much of a difference between chess and life ... you have to play your moves in both to win

Title: Bhindi Baazaar Inc.
Quote: Ladai badshah ke liye nahi hoti hai ... badshahat ke liye hoti hai
Trans: War is not done to be the king ... it is done for the reign

Title: Bhindi Baazaar Inc.
Quote: Jab ek vazir marta hai ... toh mamooli sa pyada, vazir ban jaata hai
Trans: When the minister dies ... then even an ordinary pawn can become the minister

Title: Bhindi Baazaar Inc.
Quote: Joh jitna ooncha udhta hai ... usse kaatna utna hi aasaan hota hai
Trans: The higher the one flies ... it's that much easier to cut them out

Title: Yuvvraaj
Quote: I am a bad boy ... thoda sa ziddi, thoda sa awara, thoda sa pagal, thoda sa nakara ... yani total milake I am a bad boy
Trans: I am a bad boy ... a little stubborn, a little tramp, a little crazy, a little useless ... which means that totally I am a bad boy

Title: Yuvvraaj
Quote: Main characterless zaroor hoon ... lekin itna bhi less nahi
Trans: I'm definitely characterless ... but not so much less

Title: Yuvvraaj
Quote: Maafi maangne waale do kisam ke log hote hai ... ek joh maafi maangkar galti dobara nahi repeat karte hai ... aur doosre joh ke maafi maangkar aage ki ladai ke liye tayaari karte hai
Trans: There are two types of people who apologize ... first who apologize and don't repeat the mistake ... and second who apologize and then prepare for the upcoming battle

Title: Yuvvraaj
Quote: Kagaz ke tukdon se parivar nahi khade hote hai ... dil ke rishton se hote hai
Trans: Families don't stand together with pieces of paper ... they stand together with the relations of the heart

Title: Tera Jadoo Chal Gayaa
Quote: Pasand cheez hi aaisi hai joh waqt ke saath badal jaati hai ... lekin pyar kabhi nahi badalta
Trans: Choice is a thing that changes with time ... but love never changes

Title: Tera Jadoo Chal Gayaa
Quote: Ishq agar sacha ho toh qayamat tak zinda rehta hai
Trans: If the love is true then it stays alive till end of time

Title: Tera Jadoo Chal Gayaa
Quote: Is duniya mein woh log bahut badkismat hote hai jinhe kisi ka pyar nahi milta ... lekin usse bhi zyada badkismat woh log hote hai jinhe pyar toh milta hai ... lekin uski kadar nahi karte, usse kho dete hai
Trans: People who don't get love from anyone are very unfortunate ... but more unfortunate than them are the people who do get love ... but they don't care for it and they lose it

Title: Tera Jadoo Chal Gayaa
Quote: Gaane toh ban jaate hai ... halaat se sur janam lete hai aur jazbaat se bol ban jaate hai
Trans: Songs are made with ease ... the tunes are born from the situation and the lyrics are made with the emotions

Title: Mr. Bond
Quote: Maine aasoon bechkar daulat nahi kamai ... joh aasoon dekhkar daulat luta doon
Trans: I am not going to shell my wealth looking at the tears ... since I haven't sold my tears to make my wealth

Title: Mr. Bond
Quote: Jab kuch karne aur na karne dono mein hi risk ho ... toh kuch karna hi achcha hota hai
Trans: When there is a risk in both doing and not doing something ... then it's better to do something

Title: Mr. Bond
Quote: Shyam hote hi tanhaiyan mujhe til-til maarne lagti hai ... aaise mein agar koi saathi saath na ho, toh aasoon bhi gale mil-mil behne lagte hai
Trans: When the sun sets my loneliness starts to kill me slowly slowly ... and if someone is not with me at that time, then my tears start to flow drop by drop

Title: Mr. Bond
Quote: Saanp apne dushman ki tasveer apni aankhon mein utaar leta hai ... Bond apne dushmanon ka nishaan apne baazu saja leta hai ... apna apna style hai
Trans: A snake prints the photo of his enemy in his eyes ... and Bond decorates the mark of his enemies on his hand ... everyone has their own style

Title: Victoria No. 203
Quote: Kali dekhi thi, ab gulzar hai tu ... churi dekhi thi, ab talwar hai tu
Trans: I saw you as a flower bud, but now you're a flower garden .. I saw you as a knife, but now you're a sword

Title: Victoria No. 203
Quote: Duniya bhi kitni ajeeb jagah hai ... jinhe hum chor, gunda aur badmaash kehte hai ... woh insaaniyat ke liye daulat ko thukra dete hai ... aur jinhe hum nek, shareef aur baizzat kehte hai ... woh daulat ke liye ek bachche ko apne baap se alag kar dete hai
Trans: The world is a strange place ... the people whom we call as a thief, goon and naughty ... those people leave money for humanity ... and the people whom we call as good, noble and dignified ... those people separate a child from his father for money

Title: Victoria No. 203
Quote: Kahin bhi apna thikana nahi is zamane mein ... na aashiyane ke bahar, na aashiyane mein
Trans: We don't have a residence in this world ... not outside a beautiful house, not inside a beautiful house

Title: Victoria No. 203
Quote: Woh kaali kaali botalein joh hai sharaab ki ... arre raatein hai in mein band hamare shabaab ki
Trans: Those black bottles of alcohol ... have our nights of youth enclosed in them

Title: Dulha Mil Gaya
Quote: Hamara zikr toh har pal hua fasaane mein ... toh kya hua joh todhi der hui aane mein
Trans: I was remembered at every moment in the story ... so what if I was a little late in coming

Title: Dulha Mil Gaya
Quote: Betiyan gharon mein khushiyan laati hai, pyar laati hai ... lekin apne hisse ki khushi dhoondne ke liye unhe kisi aur ke ghar jaana padta hai
Trans: Daughters bring hapiness and love in homes ... but to find their share of happiness they have to go to someone else's house

Title: Dulha Mil Gaya
Quote: Har kamyabi ke peeche koi toota hua sapna hota hai shayad ... duniya kamyabi se toh judna chahti hai ... lekin us toote huye sapne se nahi
Trans: May be behind every success there is a broken dream ... the world wants to connect with success ... but not with that broken dream

Title: Dulha Mil Gaya
Quote: Ladkiyan kisi bhi ladke ke dil ka size dekhti hai ... kisi aur cheez ka nahi
Trans: Girls look at the size of the heart of boys ... and not of anything else

Title: Champion
Quote: Tujhe chahiye desi ilaaj aur woh ilaaj karega yeh desi haath
Trans: You need a local treatment and this local hand will do that treatment

Title: Champion
Quote: Tumhare aur mere beech hamesha ek foot ka fasla reh jaata hai ... jaanta hai kyun? ... kyun ki tu hamesha ek foot neeche se sochta hai (from the heart) ... aur main ek foot upar se (from the mind)
Trans: There always remains a distance of one foot between you and me ... you know why? ... because you always think from one foot below (from the heart) ... and I think from one foot above (from the mind)

Title: Champion
Quote: Service hai, salary hai, sapna hai ... settle ho ja
Trans: You have a job, a salary, a dream ... now settle down

Title: Champion
Quote: Yeh pao kilo ka bheja bhi ajeeb cheez hai ... theek ho tab bhi takleef deta hai ... aur agar na theek ho, tab toh aur bhi takleef deta hai
Trans: This quarter kilo brain is a strange thing ... it gives us problems when it's ok ...  and if it's not ok, then it gives us much more problems

Title: Aaj Ka Goonda Raj
Quote: Main zindagi mein bahut kam faisle karta hoon ... lekin ek baar faisla kar loon toh woh pahaad se bhi zyada atal hota hai
Trans: I take very few decisions in life ... but once I take a decision then it's more firm than a moutain

Title: Aaj Ka Goonda Raj
Quote: Tum jaise logon ko ek baar maaf karna ... doosri baar galati karne ka mauka dena hai
Trans: Forgiving people like you once ... is like giving an opportunity to make another mistake

Title: Aaj Ka Goonda Raj
Quote: Hum jaise lakhon naujawanon ke bhavishya ke liye, is samaaj ki bhalai ke liye, saare desh ki ekta ke liye ... tum jaise log cancer ho ... sharafat ke libaas mein chupe hue gunde ho ... jinhone aaj ke is raaj ko bana diya hai goondaraaj
Trans: For the future of millions of young people like us, for the betterment of this society, for the unity of the entire country ... you people are like cancer ... you people are goons hiding behind the clothes of honesty ... who has made the government of today into a rowdy government

Title: Aaj Ka Goonda Raj
Quote: America ki police ko khoon hone ke do ghante ke paschat pata chalta hai ... aur Roos ki police ko sadhe-teen ke paschat ... aur Cheen ki police ko che ghante ke pashcat ... magar hamari police ko khoon hone ke chaubees ghante pehle pata hota hai ki ... kab, kahan, kis vyakti ka khoon hone waala hai ... aur kaunsa manushya is shubh kaarya ko sampan karne waala hai
Trans: The police of America comes to know about a murder after 2 hours ... the police of Russia after 3.5 hours ... and the police of China after 6 hours ... but our police knows about a murder 24 hours in advance ... as to when, where and who will be killed ... and who will be the person who will accomplish this auspicious task

Title: Aaj Ka M.L.A. Ram Avtar
Quote: Yeh joh vote hai na yeh kagaz ka tukda nahi hai ... ki dabbe mein daala aur chal diye ... yeh vote tumhare parivar, tumhare desh, uski unnati ki parchi hai ... yeh toh do dhaari talwar hai joh dono taraf se kaatti hai ... theek jagah pade toh desh khushal aur galat jagah pade toh desh ka satyanash
Trans: A vote is not a piece of paper ... that you put in a box and move on ... a vote is a paper for the betterment of your family, your country ... it's a double edged sword which cuts from both sides ... if it falls in the right place then the country is happy and if it falls in the wrong place then the country is destroyed

Title: Aaj Ka M.L.A. Ram Avtar
Quote: Agar usne apna rasta nahi badla toh majboor hokar hum mein apna rasta badalna hoga ... aur woh rasta khoon ke darya se hoke guzrega
Trans: If he does not change his path then we'll be compelled to change our path ... and that path will pass through the sea of blood

Title: Aaj Ka M.L.A. Ram Avtar
Quote: Jab raajneeti pesha ban jaati hai, vyapar ban jaati hai ... toh kursi desh se badi ho jaati hai
Trans: When politics becomes a profession, becomes a business ... then the position becomes bigger than the country

Title: Aaj Ka M.L.A. Ram Avtar
Quote: Hamare desh mein samajwad kahan hai ... hamare desh mein toh afsarwad hai, jaat-paatwad hai, kursiwad hai ... arre samajwad toh tab aayega jab aap apne vote ki taqat mehsoos karenge
Trans: Where is socialism in our country ... in our country there is officership, there is racism, there is politics ... socialism will come when we feel the power of our vote

Title: Ugly Aur Pagli
Quote: Pain aur pleasure ... dono dene mein expert thi
Trans: Pain and pleasure ... she was an expert in giving both

Title: Ugly Aur Pagli
Quote: Beer aur chana bahut hi deadly combination hota hai
Trans: Beer and chickpeas is a very deadly combination

Title: Ugly Aur Pagli
Quote: Galati insaan se ek baar hoti hai ... joh same mistake do baar kare ... woh gadha
Trans: A person does a mistake once ... the one who does the same mistake twice ... is a donkey

Title: Iski Topi Uske Sarr
Quote: Main aayi toh thi tumhe phasane, par khud hi tumhare pyar mein phas gayi ... tumhe qaid karne ke liye jaal bichaya tha maine, aur khud hi qaidi ban gayi
Trans: I had come to trick you, but I myself got tricked in your love ... I had laid a trap to catch you, but I myself got trapped in it

Title: Iski Topi Uske Sarr
Quote: Teri nigahon ka salaam kabul kare, meri nigahon mein woh nafasat nahi ... tujhse mila loon nazar toh magar, mere dil ki shayad yeh aadat nahi
Trans: To accept the welcome of your eyes, my eyes don't have that sophistication ... I'll look into your eyes but, may be my heart doesn't have that habit

Title: Iski Topi Uske Sarr
Quote: Samundar ki khamoshi apne andar bahut bade toofan ko chupaye hoti hai
Trans: The silence of the ocean hides a very big storm within it

Title: Iski Topi Uske Sarr
Quote: Ek aurat akeli hoti hai ... lekin zalim samaaj ko yeh nahi bhoolna chahiye ... ki ek talwar bhi akeli hoti hai
Trans: A woman can be alone ... but the cruel society shouldn't forget that ... even a sword is alone

Title: Ustadon Ke Ustad (1963)
Quote: Hirani jaisi chaal, khile phool jaise gaal, uspar sitam yeh ki sunhare baal ... arre phir kyun na ho bura haal ... malik vaake hi tune kiya kamaal
Trans: She has the walk of a female deer, cheeks like a blossomed flower, and on top of that her beautiful hair ... so why won't I become crazy ... oh god you've indeed done some magic

Title: Ustadon Ke Ustad (1963)
Quote: Meri zindagi ka maqsad, mera dharam, imaan sirf ek cheez hai ... rupaiya
Trans: The purpose, religion, faith of my life is just one thing ... money

Title: Ustadon Ke Ustad (1963)
Quote: Duniya mein insaan ki kadar daulat se nahi, uski khubiyon se hoti hai
Trans: In this world a person is valued by his good qualities, not by his money

Title: Jhooth Bole Kauwa Kaate
Quote: Aadmi ko apni haisiyat ke andar rehna chahiye ... doosron ki daya par jeene ko jeena nahi kehte
Trans: A person should stay within his limits ... living on someone else's sympathy is not called as living

Title: Jhooth Bole Kauwa Kaate
Quote: Hamare yahan shaadi ka bandhan sirf pati patni ke beech nahi hota ... poore parivar ke saath hota hai
Trans: In our place the bond of marriage is not only between the husband and the wife ... it's between the entire families

Title: Jhooth Bole Kauwa Kaate
Quote: Koi bhi jhoot itna mahaan nahi hota ki jiske samne sar jhukaya jaye
Trans: No lie is so big that we need to bow down our head in front of it

Title: Jhooth Bole Kauwa Kaate
Quote: Is desh mein vakil aur barrister toh sirf auraton ko hi hona chahiye
Trans: In this country only women should be lawyers and barristers

Title: Khooni Ilaaka
Quote: Burai chahe kitni bhi taqatwar kyun na ho ... uska anth ek na ek din toh nishchit hai
Trans: No matter how strong evil is ... one day it's end is inevitable

Title: Khooni Ilaaka
Quote: Agar apni maut se bachna chahte ho toh chup chap chale jao yahan se ... varna aaisi maut maroge joh tumne kabhi sochi bhi nahi hogi
Trans: If you want to escape from your death then quietly leave from here ... or else you'll die in such a way which you haven't even imagined

Title: Khooni Ilaaka
Quote: Insaan zindagi mein ek baar marta hai ... magar woh log baar baar marte hai, joh apni zindagi ka maqsad pura hone se pehle hi maut se darkar bhaag jaate hai
Trans: A person dies only once in life ... but the people who run away fearing death before their purpose is over, die many a times

Title: Shaitan
Quote: Dost do kisam ke hote hai ... ek woh jinhe raat ke do bajhe bhi phone kiya ja sakta hai ... and you know ki they will be there for you ... aur doosre woh jinhe raat ke do bajhe hi phone kiya jaata hai
Trans: There are two types of friends ... one whom we can call at 2am in the night ... and you know that they will be there for you ... and second whom we call only at 2am in the night

Title: Shaitan
Quote: Sach aur sachai mein farak hota hai ... aur sach yeh hai ki har police waale ka dharam hai ki woh niswarth bhav se desh ki seva kare ... lekin sachai yeh hai ki 8,500 ki is tankha mein desh sambhalo, ghar sambhalo, imaan sambhalo
Trans: There is difference between truth and reality ... the truth is that it's the religion of every policeman to serve his country unselfishly ... but the reality is that he has to manage his country, manage his house, manage his honesty within a salary of Rs. 8,500

Title: Shaitan
Quote: Pehle lagta tha ki zindagi ek intezar hai ... a long boring wait ... lekin ab lagta hai jaise ki zindagi ek film ki tarah hai ... boring hai toh kya hua, forward toh kar sakte hai na
Trans: First it used to feel that life is a wait ... a long boring wait ... but now it feels as if life is like a film ... so what if it's boring, you can atleast forward it

Title: Love U Mr. Kalakaar
Quote: Denhar koi aur hai, devat hai din rain ... log bharam humpe kare, aasoon neeche nain
Trans: The real giver is someone else (not me), who gives enough to be given away ... people think I'm giving, hence I'm ashamed and I keep my eyes low

Title: Love U Mr. Kalakaar
Quote: Meri pasand woh nahi hoga joh croreon kamayega ... meri pasand woh hoga joh croreon ka dil jeetega
Trans: My choice will not be someone who makes millions ... my choice will be someone who wins millions of hearts

Title: Love U Mr. Kalakaar
Quote: Anushasan sabse zaroori yahi hai ... iske baad kadi mehnat, lagan aur apne aapko sabit karne ki ichcha ... I think agar yeh chaar ghun kisi mein bhi ho toh woh zaroor safal hoga
Trans: Discipline is the most important thing ... after that hard work, dedication and the desire to prove yourself ... I think if someone has these four qualities then he will definitely be successful

Title: Love U Mr. Kalakaar
Quote: Ek achche aadmi ki pehchan hoti hai uske ghun ... hamare shaastron mein bhi paanch saat ghun maane gaye hai ... daya, dharam, prem, tyaag aur shama
Trans: A good person is known by his qualities ... even in our knowledge books there are 5 to 7 qualities adopted ... sympathy, religion, love, sacrifice and apology

Title: Jeevan Mrityu
Quote: Vidhata ne jab jeevan aur mrityu ke daurahe par doobara lakar khada kar diya hai ... toh is khel ko jeevan ki baazi lagakar hi khatam karoonga
Trans: Since god has made me stand once again on the crossroads of life and death ... then I'll end this game by putting my life on the line

Title: Jeevan Mrityu
Quote: Paisa insaan ko woh cheez nahi de sakta joh usse shiksha se milti hai ... izzat ... shiksha insaan ko izzat ke saath jeena sikhati hai
Trans: Money can't give a person the thing that he gets from knowledge ... which is respect ... knowledge teaches a person to live with respect

Title: Jeevan Mrityu
Quote: Izzat hamare jeevan ka updesh hai ... daulat toh sirf jeene ka sadhan hai
Trans: Respect is the moral of our life ... and money is just a mean for living

Title: Jeevan Mrityu
Quote: Sui ke is chote se chhed mein se oont jaisa bhari bharkam janwar guzar sakta hai ... magar ishwar ke raj mein daulat ka pujari kabhi nahi ja sakta ... kyun ki wahan daulat ka koi mol nahi
Trans: A big animal like camel can pass through the small hole of a needle ... but under the rule of god, a money worshipper won't be able to pass ... because there is no value for money there

Title: Prem Kaa Game
Quote: Khel khatam, paisa hazam ... sudar gaya khasam, khake kasam
Trans: The game is over, the money spent is worth it ... and the husband sweared and improved

Title: Prem Kaa Game
Quote: Chori ke aam ka har koi deewana ... joh pakda gaya woh chor hai aur joh bach gaya woh sayana
Trans: Everyone is a fan of stolen mangoes ... the one who gets caught is a thief and the one who escapes is a smart person

Title: Prem Kaa Game
Quote: Yeh shaadi joh hai na woh public toilet hai ... jitne log bahar khade hai na, unko andar jaane ki jaldi hai ... joh log andar hai, unko bahar aane ki jaldi hai
Trans: Marriage is a public toilet ... the people standing outside, are eager to go inside ... and those who are inside, they are eager to come outside

Title: Prem Kaa Game
Quote: Yeh joh auratein hoti hai na, yeh internet ke virus ki tarah hoti hai ... pehle to mard ki life mein enter hoti hai ... phir uske dil aur dimaag ko scan karke ... uski sari khushiyan, uski sari azaadi, uske sare bank balance apne account mein transfer kar leti hai ... aur badle mein mard ke account mein kya download karti hai ... (kya?) ... tension, tadap, ghutan, bechaini, jhik-jhik, bachche ... aur uske chehre ki smile ko delete karke usse hamesha hamesha ke liye hang karke chali jaati hai
Trans: Women are like the virus from the internet ... first they enter a man's life ... then after scanning his heart and mind ... the transfer all his happiness, all his freedom, all his bank balance into their account ... and instead of that do you know what do they download in the man's account ... (what?) ... tension, yearning, suffocation, restlessness, fussiness, kids ... and then they leave deleting the smile from his face and hanging him forever

Title: Paigham
Quote: Jis dhan ke liye aap duniya se dokha kar rahe hai, apne azeezon se, apne doston se dokha kar rahe hai, apne saathiyon se dokha kar rahe hai ... ussi dhan ke haathon aap khud bhi dokha khayenge
Trans: The money for which you are cheating the world, your dear ones, your friends, your colleagues ... you'll be cheated by the hands of that money

Title: Paigham
Quote: Agar aaj hum sab aapas mein milkar aur apne kaam ko apna dharam samajhkar kare ... toh kal hamara desh bhi duniya ke sare mulkon ke aage apna sar ooncha karke khada ho sakega
Trans: Today if we all get together and do our work thinking it's our duty ... then tomorrow even our country will stand with its head held high in front of other countries from the world

Title: Paigham
Quote: Insaan patthar ki chot seh sakta hai ... lekin yeh buri nazar ke vaar se bachna bahut mushkil hai
Trans: A person can bear the wound from a stone ... but it's very hard to escape from the attack of an evil eye

Title: Paigham
Quote: Insaan apne maa baap ke naam se nahi ... apne ghuno se achcha ya bura samjha jaata hai
Trans: A person is considered to be good or bad because of his qualities ... not because of the names of his parents

Title: Jeans
Quote: Log jeevan mein hi khush rahe woh kaafi nahi ... marte waqt bhi khushi se marna zaroori hai
Trans: It's not enough that people remain happy just in their life ... it's also important that a person is happy at the time of death

Title: Jeans
Quote: Cinema mein bhi jeevan hai, jeevan mein bhi cinema hai ... kai daffa cinema se badke jeevan mein anhoni baatein ho jaati hai
Trans: In cinema there is life, in life there is cinema ... many a times impossible things bigger than cinema happen in life

Title: Pratighaat
Quote: Jis desh ko hamare buzurgon ne apne pranon ki aahuti dekar azaad karaya ... ussi desh mein in kayaron ki fauj pal rahi hai
Trans: The country which our elders made free by sacrificing their lives ... in that country an army of these cowards is being raised

Title: Pratighaat
Quote: Manushya ke jeevan mein sangeet ka staan asadharan hai
Trans: The place of music in a person's life is something out of the normal

Title: Pratighaat
Quote: Shaadi ke mandap mein pallu se ghaant baandhane waala pati nahi hota ... balki patni ki zindagi ki guthiyan suljhane waala pati hota hai ... pavitra agni ke gird phere lene waala pati nahi hota ... balki patni ke jeevan ko har aag se bachane waala pati hota hai
Trans: A husband is not someone who ties the knot with his dress on the wedding stage ... instead a husband is someone who solves the problems of life for the wife ... a husband is not someone who walks arounds the holy fire ... instead a husband is someone who protects the wife from every fire of her life

Title: Pratighaat
Quote: Ek aurat apne pati ki gareebi mein khush reh sakti hai ... uske aeb seh sakti hai ... lekin uski kayarta nahi seh sakti
Trans: A woman can stay happy in the poverty of her husband ... she can bear his ego ... but she cannot bear his cowardness

Title: Anth
Quote: Duaon se swarg aur narak ke faisle hote hai ... kanoon ke nahi
Trans: Only the decisions of heaven and hell are made with prayers ... not the decisions of law

Title: Anth
Quote: Jurm ki chataan ko kranti ki lehren takra takrakar todh deti hai
Trans: The waves of revolution crash and break the mountain of crime

Title: Anth
Quote: Jab samne waala garam hota hai na ... toh khud ko naram rehne ka
Trans: When the person in front of you is hot ... then you should be soft

Title: Anth
Quote: Ab tak tum is vardi ki ahmiyat ko samajh nahi paye ho ... kyun ki tum ek aaise dimak ho jisne is police station ki deewaron ko itna khokla kar diya hai ... ki koi mamuli sa ladka isse todh sakta hai
Trans: Until now you have not understood the importance of this uniform ... because you are such a termite who has made the walls of this police station so hollow that ... any ordinary boy can break it

Title: Shamitabh
Quote: Yeh awaaz ek kutte ke mooh se bhi achchi lagegi
Trans: This voice will sound good even from a dog's mouth

Title: Shamitabh
Quote: Jab hum kisi cheez ko bahut, bahut, bahut, bahut, bahut chahte hai na ... toh woh mil hi jaati hai
Trans: When we love something very much ... then we do get it eventually

Title: Shamitabh
Quote: Hai koi pani joh chadti hai whiskey ke bina ... pani needs whiskey ... whiskey mein zaroorat nahi kiski
Trans: Is there any water that intoxicates without whiskey ... water needs whiskey ... whiskey doesn't need anything

Title: Shamitabh
Quote: Mere paas botal hai, glass hai, pani hai, pyas hai, chakna hai, chicken hai ... par meri daru kiske paas hai yaar?
Trans: I have a bottle, a glass, water, thirst, snacks, chicken ... but who has my alcohol?

Title: Prem Aggan
Quote: Aurat ke pyar ko kabhi seene mein itni jagah mat do ... ke dil ke liye dhadakna mushkil ho jaye
Trans: Don't give the love for a woman so much space in your heart ... that it becomes hard for the heart to breath

Title: Prem Aggan
Quote: Mujhe woh haseen dard dedo jisse aaj ke baad main kisi doosre ke saath na baant sakun ... aur mera yeh jism sirf tumhari amanat bankar reh jaye
Trans: Give me that beautiful pain which from today I won't able to share with anyone else ... and that my body remains only as your property

Title: Prem Aggan
Quote: Aurat ke inhi hoton ne lakhon ghar barbaad kiye hai ... aabad kiye hai toh sirf veerane, maikhane, qaid khane aur pagal khane
Trans: The lips of women have destroyed millions of homes ... if they have flourished anything, then that is ruins, bars, jails and mental asylums

Title: Prem Aggan
Quote: Sacha sipahi kabhi hisaab nahi lagata ki desh ne usse kya diya hai ... woh hamesha yahi sochta hai ki usne apne pyare desh ke liye kya kiya hai
Trans: A true soldier never calculates what the country has done for him ... he always thinks what has he done for his dear country

Title: Gandhi My Father
Quote: Hindustan ka dil uske gaon mein dhadakta hai
Trans: The heart of India beats in its villages

Title: Gandhi My Father
Quote: Sharaab meri dawa hai aur mera dard bhi hai
Trans: Alcohol is my medicine and also my pain

Title: Gandhi My Father
Quote: Mandir, masjid aur gurudwara ho ... yahi mazhab bane bas hum sabhi ka ek ... Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram
Trans: There should be temples, mosques and gurudwaras ... but all of us should have this one religion ... hail your motherland, hail your motherland, hail your motherland

Title: Gandhi My Father
Quote: In life, life counts!
Trans: In life, life counts!

Title: Hum Tum Pe Marte Hain
Quote: Har koi yahi toh chahta hai meri tarah ... ki uski zindagi mein koi ek aaisa aaye joh ussi ke liye soche, ussi ke sapne dekhe, ussi ke liye jeeye aur dua kare
Trans: Everyone wants this just like me ... that someone should come in their life who thinks for them, dreams about them, lives for them and prays for them

Title: Hum Tum Pe Marte Hain
Quote: Agar marne ke baad bhi zinda rehna hai ... toh doosron ko zindagi dena seekho
Trans: If you want to stay alive after dying ... then learn to give life to others

Title: Hum Tum Pe Marte Hain
Quote: Ho jaoge majboor tum bhi kuch is tarah ... Ranjhe ki mohabbat mein Laila thi jis tarah
Trans: You'll get compelled in such a way ... just like how Laila was in the love of Ranjha

Title: Hum Tum Pe Marte Hain
Quote: Kya sher farmaya hai aapne ... Majnu ki jagah Ranjhe ko chipkaya hai aapne
Trans: What a great verse you said ... but you mentioned Ranjha instead of Majnu

Title: Kroadh
Quote: Is shehar par aaisa qahar bankar gir ... ki insaan toh kya ... is shehar ka zara zara us qahar se kaanp uthte, gabrakar chilla uthte
Trans: Create such a havoc on this city ... that forget a person ... every little bit of this city should shiver from that havoc and shout with fear

Title: Kroadh
Quote: Tum log itna itna sa the talaab mein nange nahate the ... hum pakadkar bahar nikaalte the ... ab toh tum poore James Bond ho gaye ... saand ke saand ho gaye
Trans: You guys were so small and you used to bath naked in the pond ... and I used to catch you guys and take you out ... now you've become completely like James Bond ... infact you've become bulls

Title: Kroadh
Quote: Kroadh woh zehareela saanp hai joh dasta zaroor kisi doosre ko hai ... lekin zehar khud ki zindagi mein ghol deta hai
Trans: Anger is that poisonous snake which definitely will bite someone else ... but it will blend the poison in our own life

Title: Kroadh
Quote: Goonjte hai tere nagamon se ameeron ke mahal ... jhopdiyon mein bhi teri awaaz hai ... apne sangeet pe toh sabhi ko naaz hai
Trans: The mansions of the rich echo with your tunes ... your voice exists even in the huts ... and everyone is proud of their music

Title: Yamraaj
Quote: Sar jiske aage na jhuke woh darwaza kisi aur ka hoga, mera nahi ... aur joh har darwaze pe jhuk jaye woh sar kisi aur ka hoga, hamara nahi
Trans: The door in front of which your head won't bow down will be someone else's, not mine ... and the head that bows down in front of every door will be someone else's, not mine

Title: Yamraaj
Quote: Upar ke yamraj ko hukum dena padta ki woh kisi ki zindagi ko maut mein badal de ... lekin zameen ka yeh yamraj kisi ke hukum ka intezar nahi karta ... woh khud maut ka faisla karta hai
Trans: The god of death above has to order as to whose life he wants to convert into death ... but this god of death on the earth doesn't wait for anyone's order ... he himself decides on the death

Title: Yamraaj
Quote: Dil todke bhikra diye jaate hai ... joh toot nahi sakte woh thukra diye jaate hai ... jadh kitni bhi gehri ho mushkil hai khade rehna ... joh pedh nahi hai phalte woh katva diye jaate hai
Trans: The hearts are broken and thrown away ... and things that can't be broken are rejected ... it's hard to stand no matter how deep the foundation is ... and the trees that dont' grow are cut down

Title: Yamraaj
Quote: Tumne kursi ko kabhi gaur se dekha hai ... kursi ke haath hote hai, paon hote hai, peeth hoti hai, magar kursi ka dil nahi hota ... yeh kursi dilwaalon ki nahi, jigar waalon ki rakhail hai
Trans: Have you ever seen a chair carefully ... a chair has hands, it has legs, it has a back, but a chair doesn't have a heart ... hence the chair is a mistress of people who have courage and not a heart

Title: The Don
Quote: Meri pistol mein ek adalat bethti hai ... kartoos ko sirf gunahgar ke taraf jaane ki ijaazat hai
Trans: A court sits inside my pistol ... and the bullet only has the permission to go towards the guilty

Title: The Don
Quote: Mere us aakhri gunah ke baad tumhe sabooton aur gawahon ke jhamele mein nahi padna padega ... kyun ki us din gunahgar Deva khud banega aur gawah bhi Deva hi banega ... jurm bhi mera hoga aur sazaa bhi main tay karoonga ... apne gale mein sooli bhi daloonga aur jallad bhi main hi khud banooga
Trans: After that last crime of mine you won't have to run behind proofs and witnesses ... because that day Deva himself will become the guilty and also Deva will become the witness ... the crime will be mine and I'll decide the punishment ... I'll put the hangman's knot around my neck and I'll myself become the executioner

Title: The Don
Quote: Is waqt tum jis glass ke andar khade ho ... woh bulletproof zaroor hai, lekin patthar proof nahi
Trans: The glass behind which you are standing at the moment ... is definitely bulletproof, but it's not stone proof

Title: The Don
Quote: Deva ki adalat mein sazaa jitni der se milti hai ... maut utni hi dardnak hoti hai
Trans: The later the punishment you get in Deva's court ... that much more painful the death is

Title: Aaj Ka Boss
Quote: Yeh zindagi ek jung ka maidan hai ... yahan sar uthakar jeene ke liye insaan ko har kadam par ladna padta hai ... kabhi waqt ke saath, kabhi halaat ke saath aur kabhi maut ke saath
Trans: Life is a battlefield ... here you have to fight at every step to live with your head held high ... sometimes with time, sometimes with situations and sometimes with death

Title: Aaj Ka Boss
Quote: Dushman ke paas agar taqat ke saath saath dimaag bhi ho ... toh vaar uske haath pe nahi, gardan pe karna chahiye
Trans: If the enemy has a mind along with the strength ... then you should attack his neck and not his hand

Title: Aaj Ka Boss
Quote: Jurm ki duniya mein wafaadar dost ... kabhi bhi gaddari kar sakta hai
Trans: In the world of crime a honest friend ... can betray anytime

Title: Aaj Ka Boss
Quote: Yeh shehar jurm ka bhayanak jungle hai ... aur main is jungle ka sher hoon
Trans: This city is a dangerous jungle of crime ... and I'm the tiger of this jungle

Title: Border Hindustan Ka
Quote: Mainu Delhi nahi le jana ... mera chitta singhasan yahin banana ... mera mooh dushman var rakhna jab mainu aag lagana ... humne nahi seekha dushman ko peeth dikhana ... mere shastra mere saath sulana ... amrit kande taar da mere mooh vich paana ... "Bole So Nihal" da nara lagana ... main markar bhi ladunga, mera bhog na paana
Trans: Don't take me Delhi ... make the throne for my pyre right here ... keep my face pointing towards the enemy when you burn me ... I haven't learnt to show my back to the enemy ... keep my weapons next to me ... put the holy water in my mouth ... keep shouting "Bole So Nihal" (whoever utters, shall be fulfilled) ... I'll fight even after dying, don't have the death ceremony for me

Title: Border Hindustan Ka
Quote: Khwaab kabhi na poora hoga dushman ke armaan ka ... dekhen kaise paar kare woh border Hindustan ka
Trans: The dream of the enemies desire will never be fulfilled ... let' see how can they cross the border of India

Title: Border Hindustan Ka
Quote: Mazloomon ke liye dhaal hai hum, dushmanon ke liye kaal hai hum ... awaaz se duniya tharaye, woh Guru Gobind Singh ke lal hai hum
Trans: I'm armour for the victims, I'm time for the enemies ... the world shakes with my voice, I'm that son of Guru Gobind Singh

Title: Border Hindustan Ka
Quote: Kes, kach, kada, kirpan, kangha, Sikhon ka nishan ...  dhoondte reh jaoge nakshe mein Pakistan
Trans: Hair, inner shorts, iron bangle, knife and comb are the signs of Sikhs ... you guys will keep looking for Pakistan on the map

Title: Tyaagi
Quote: What Bharat thinks today ... world thinks tomorrow
Trans: What India thinks today ... the world thinks tomorrow

Title: Tyaagi
Quote: Main toh bhagwan jaisa pati pana chahti hoon ... jisko pyar kar sakoon, jiski seva kar sakoon ... jisko main insaan ke roop mein pa sakoon
Trans: I want a husband like god ... whom I can love, whom I can serve ... whom I can achieve in the form of a human

Title: Tyaagi
Quote: Sach kabhi chupta nahi ... prakat ho hi jaata hai ... sirf kabhi kabhi bahut der laga deta hai
Trans: The truth can never hide ... it eventually comes forward ... it's just that sometimes it takes a very long time

Title: Tyaagi
Quote: Anyay joh kare aur anyay joh sahe ... tumhari grihna usse ghaas ki tarah tahe
