Trans: The one who does and bears the injustice ... your disgust should cut him like grass

Title: Kyaa Dil Ne Kahaa
Quote: Tanhai, aasoon, udasi ... baat hai zara si ... aur tum itni khafa si
Trans: Loneliness, tears, sadness ... it's just a small thing ... and you are so much annoyed

Title: Kyaa Dil Ne Kahaa
Quote: Hawaon mein ab toh kiss karta hoon ... har taraf tujhko miss karta hoon
Trans: Now I kiss in the air ... and I miss you everywhere

Title: Kyaa Dil Ne Kahaa
Quote: Kishore Kumar ka gaana aur Bharat ka rashtra geet ... inhe kabhi aadhe chhodkar nahi jaate
Trans: Songs of Kishore Kumar and the national anthem of India ... you should never leave them in between

Title: Kyaa Dil Ne Kahaa
Quote: Pati patni joh saat kasme khate hai na ... ki woh ek doosre ke saath rahenge, ek doosre ko khush rakhenge, ek doosre ko cheat nahi  karenge ... un saat kasmo ko hum khud likhenge apne mann se ... chaar kasme tum likhna aur teen kasme main likhoongi
Trans: The seven vows that a husband and a wife take ... that they'll stay together, they'll keep each other happy, they won't cheat on each other ... we will write those seven vows together as per own wish ... you write four vows and I'll write three vows

Title: Lucky Kabootar
Quote: Ladki khoobsurat ho aur Scooty par ho toh pyar ho jaata hai ... aur jab ladki badsurat ho aur Mercedes mein ho toh pyar jhak marke karna hi padta hai
Trans: If the girl is beautiful and on a Scooty (moped) then you'll fall in love ... and if the girl is ugly and in a Mercedes then you'll have to fall in love

Title: Lucky Kabootar
Quote: Yeh dhai kilo haath nahi, sade-teen kilo ka haath hai ... yeh jispar padta hai na ... woh uthta nahi, uth hi jaata hai
Trans: This is not a 2.5 kg hand, it's a 3.5 kg hand ... and the person on whom this hand falls ... forget getting up, he infact dies

Title: Ram Gopal Varma Ki Aag
Quote: Diwali kab hai ... kab hai Diwali!
Trans: When is Diwali ... when is Diwali!

Title: Ram Gopal Varma Ki Aag
Quote: Kuch log mar marke jeete hai aur kuch log maarke
Trans: Some people live in fear and some people live by killing

Title: Ram Gopal Varma Ki Aag
Quote: Aaj ke baad ek saal tak roz tujhe tapli marenge ... aur tu inch-inch chota hota jayega
Trans: From today we'll hit you on your head everyday for the next one year ... and you'll become shorter inch by inch

Title: Ram Gopal Varma Ki Aag
Quote: Joh ho gaya, woh kabhi nahi hua ... joh kabhi nahi hua, woh ab hoga
Trans: Whatever happened, didn't ever happen ... and what has never happened, that will happen now

Title: Sanam Teri Kasam (1982)
Quote: Sab taqdeer ka khel hai ... yeh kabhi apno ke haathon rulati hai ... toh kabhi gairon ke haathon rulati hai
Trans: Everything is a game of destiny ... sometimes our dear ones make us cry ... and sometimes strangers make us cry

Title: Sanam Teri Kasam (1982)
Quote: Blessing in disguise ... makes man healthy, wealthy and wise
Trans: Blessing in disguise ... makes man healthy, wealthy and wise

Title: Sanam Teri Kasam (1982)
Quote: Shaadi do jismon ka mel nahi ... do aatmaon ka milan hai
Trans: Marriage is not the union of two bodies ... it's the union of two souls

Title: Kya Dilli Kya Lahore
Quote: Lakeerein hai toh rehne do, kisi ne rooth kar gusse mein shayad kheench di thi ... inhi ko ab banao paala aur aao kabaddi khelte hai ... lakeerein hai toh rehne do
Trans: Let the lines be if they are there, someone must have drawn them in anger ... now let's make that into the court line and come let's play the game of kabaddi ... let the lines be if they are there

Title: Kya Dilli Kya Lahore
Quote: Jinki neeyat kharaab ... unki zindagi tezaab
Trans: Those who have bad intentions ... their life is acid

Title: Kya Dilli Kya Lahore
Quote: Bhaag gaye bhalu, vadiya ho gaya alu ... wahan ka main paalu, aur yahan ka tu paalu
Trans: The bears ran away, the potatoes are great ... I'm a man from there, and you're a man from here

Title: Oh Darling Yeh Hai India
Quote: Sample pesh karo ... naacho, gaao, seena cheerke dil dikhao, jaan ki baazi lagao, dekha na suna aaisa sapna jagao ... hamara dil behlao
Trans: Show me the sample ... dance, sing, open and show me your heart, put your life on the line, ignite the dream which is never seen nor heard of ... entertain me

Title: Oh Darling Yeh Hai India
Quote: Pyar woh nasha hai jis mein chain kho jaata hai, hosh udh jaata hai, neend gayab ho jaati hai ... kisi ko milne ki, chune ki, kehne ki, sunne ki, kisi ko apna banane ki, kisi ka ho jaane ki khawaish hoti hai, jeene ko mann karta hai ... pyar woh andhrooni bahaar hai jis mein kalpana ke phool khilte hai, kavita ko sur milte hai, chahaton ke mele lagte hai, kisse mehakte hai, kah-kahe lagte hai, karaar milta hai ... pyar woh insaani karishma hai jis mein aane waale kal ko wajah milti hai, guzre hue kal ko wajood milta hai, anjaan logon ka dil milta hai, soone safar ko sahil milta hai
Trans: Love is that intoxication in which you lose your peace of mind, you lose your senses, your sleep disappears ... you wish to meet someone, touch someone, say to someone, listen to someone, make someone yours, to become of someone, and to live ... love is that incomplete spring season in which the flowers of imagination blossom, the poems get their tunes, the fairs of romance are set, the stories create a fragrance, laughing happens, and you get satisfaction ... love is that human magic in which the future gets a purpose, the past gets an existence, the hearts of strangers connect, and the lonely journey finds the destination

Title: Oh Darling Yeh Hai India
Quote: Bhook hai, thakaan hai, dard ki pehchaan hai ... dushman jahaan hai, mann bhi pareshaan hai
Trans: I'm hungry, I'm tired, I have the understanding of pain ... the world is my enemy, and my heart is disturbed

Title: Oh Darling Yeh Hai India
Quote: Yahan tel bhi hai, adalaton mein bail bhi hai ... Kashmir aur Taj Mahal ke saath, suna hai Tihar jail bhi hai
Trans: Here there is oil, and there is bail in the courts also ... along with Kashmir and Taj Mahal, I've heard there is also Tihar jail

Title: Hawaizaada
Quote: Jab main hawai jahaj udaonga na toh uske duk-duk-duk ki awaaz mein shor nahi ... fakht ek awaaz sunai degi ... Vande Mataram!
Trans: When I'll fly the airplane then there won't be any noise in it's sound ... instead you will only hear one sound ... Hail to the Motherland!

Title: Hawaizaada
Quote: Haathon ki lakeeron ko itni ahmiyat nahi diya karte ... naseeb toh unke bhi hote hai jinke haath nahi hote hai
Trans: You should not give so much importance to the lines in the palms ... because even people without hands have a destiny

Title: Hawaizaada
Quote: Pyar mein pada aadmi aksar apni aukaat se zyada bada kaam kar jaata hai
Trans: A person in love usually does things bigger than his capacity

Title: Hawaizaada
Quote: Us upar waale ne hamare liye sab taykar chhoda hai ... hamare hisse ke badal sirf humpar hi barsenge ... hamare hisse ka suraj sirf humpar hi chamkega ... hamare hisse ka sikka sirf hamare haq mein hi bemandi karega ... yeh sab tay hai ... par maaze ki baat toh yeh hai ki hum mein hi nahi pata hamara badal, hamara suraj, hamara sikka aakhir hai kahan ... issi liye kehta hoon ... hawa ka rukh modhte chal, mutthi mein kirane batoorte chal, sikke uchaalte chal ... bina thakke, bina rukke ... kyun ki sabki udaan tay hai
Trans: God has already decided everything for us ... the clouds in our share will only pour on us ... the sun in our share will only shine on us ... the coin in our share will only cheat in our favour ... all this is already decided ... but the fun is that we don't know where our cloud, our sun, our coin is ... that's why I say that ... change the direction of the air and move, collect sunshine in your fist and move, flip the coins and move ... without getting tired, without stopping ... since the flight of everyone is already decided

Title: Aarzoo
Quote: Dard agar insaan ke apne daire mein rahe toh saha ja sakta hai ... magar joh dard doosron ka dard ban jaye ... usse apno mein baant lena hi behtar hota hai
Trans: If the pain stays within the limits of a person then it can be beared ... but the pain that becomes pain for others ... it's better to share that with your dear ones

Title: Aarzoo
Quote: Apna toh sidhaant hai shaan se jeeyo aur shanti se ludhak jao
Trans: It's my principle to live with pride and to die quietly

Title: Aarzoo
Quote: Zindagi ki raftar jitni tezz hai ... traffic utni hi rukavatein daal deta hai ... kai baar raaste badalne padte hai ghar pahunchne ke liye
Trans: The faster the speed of life is ... the traffic puts that many blocks ... many a times you have to change my path to reach home

Title: Aarzoo
Quote: Tumhara nishana toh chook gaya aur ab humne is goli par tumhara naam likh diya hai ... aur jis din yeh goli hamari bandook se chalegi ... hamara nishana nahi chookega
Trans: You missed the target and now I've written your name on this bullet ... and the day this bullet fires from my gun ... I won't miss the target

Title: Dharam Karam
Quote: Achai ki koi seema nahi hoti ... aur burai ka koi anth nahi
Trans: Goodness has no limits ... and evil has no end

Title: Dharam Karam
Quote: Yeh aurat jaat hi aaisi hoti hai ... baat ka batangar bana deti hai, rai ka pahaad aur bedh ka sava-ser
Trans: Women are like this only ... they make an issue out of small things, a mountain out of a molehill and a tiger out of a sheep

Title: Sharafat Gayi Tel Lene
Quote: Twenty20 mein runs aur zindagi mein paisa ... aana zaroori hai ... kaise aa raha hai no one bothers
Trans: Runs in Twenty20 cricket and money in life ... it's important that they come ... no one bothers how do they come

Title: Sharafat Gayi Tel Lene
Quote: Ab sharafat gayi tel lene!
Trans: Now I don't care about honesty!

Title: Sharafat Gayi Tel Lene
Quote: Sahi kaam karna zaroori hai ... lekin yeh ensure karna zyada zaroori hai ki aapke saath koi galat kaam na kar sake
Trans: It's important to do the right thing ... but it's more important to ensure that no one else can do wrong with you

Title: Sharafat Gayi Tel Lene
Quote: Adhoora kuch nahi chhodta main ... sharaab ho ya hisaab
Trans: I don't leave anything incomplete ... be it alcohol or account

Title: Dadagiri
Quote: Apna toh aaisa-hich hai ... lade bagair apun zero aur ladke apun hero
Trans: I'm like this only ... without fighting I'm a zero and with fighting I'm a hero

Title: Dadagiri
Quote: Saanp ke bil mein ghuskar zeharilay phanon se dushmani nahi lete ... varna khoon ke saath zehar bhi dil mein ghus jayega
Trans: You don't enter a snakes hole and build enmity with the poisonous fangs ... or else along with blood even poison will enter your heart

Title: Dadagiri
Quote: Apan dada hai gareebon mein fakeeri ka ... lafdebaazon mein vasooli ka ... dada logon mein dadagiri ka
Trans: I'm the boss of poverty for the poor people ... I'm the boss of recovery for the problematic people ... I'm the boss of rowdyism for the rowdy people

Title: Dadagiri
Quote: Sau din chor ke toh ek din thanedaar ka ... sau din zalim ke toh ek din mazloom ka
Trans: After 100 days of a thief there comes a day for the cop ... after 100 days of a cruel person there comes a day for the victim

Title: Taqdeer Ka Badshah
Quote: Yeh goli teri maut bhi ho sakti thi ... lekin hum tujhe itni aasaan maut dekar apne inteqam ko halka nahi karna chahte
Trans: This bullet could have even been your death ... but I don't want to make my revenge this light by giving you such an easy death

Title: Taqdeer Ka Badshah
Quote: Maut ka ek waqt hota hai ... na woh pal bar pehle aa sakti hai, na pal bar baad
Trans: Death has one specific time ... it can't come a moment before that, and neither a moment after that

Title: Taqdeer Ka Badshah
Quote: Main ki main ko chhod de ... main na kisi ki hove ... joh marzi bhagwan ki ... woh tere sang sajoye
Trans: Quit saying me, myself ... me doesn't belong to anyone ... whatever god wants ... that will happen with you

Title: Taqdeer Ka Badshah
Quote: Shaastra sirf padhne aur sunane ke liye reh gaye hai ... amal ke liye jis dharam aur karam ki zaroorat hai ... usse insaan khud apne haathon se banata hai
Trans: The books of knowledge are only left to study and read ... and the religion and deeds that you need to comply with ... a person himself creates them with his own hands

Title: Khoobsurat
Quote: Aadmi dimaag se budha hota hai ... shareer se nahi
Trans: A person grows old from his mind ... not from his body

Title: Khoobsurat
Quote: Lagta hai iske style ki maa bahen ho chuki hai
Trans: Looks like his style has got screwed

Title: Khoobsurat
Quote: Aap ek business machine se shaadi karne ja rahi hai
Trans: You are going to get married to a business machine

Title: Khoobsurat
Quote: Main apne papa ka eklauta mistake hoon
Trans: I'm the one and only one mistake of my father

Title: Ta Ra Rum Pum
Quote: Kal kisi ne nahi dekha hai ... aur kya pata kal aaye ya nahi aaye ... aur main apna har kal aaj mein badal doonga
Trans: No one has seen tomorrow ... who knows whether tomorrow will come or not ... and that's why I'll turn my every tomorrow into today

Title: Ta Ra Rum Pum
Quote: New York mein jabhi bhi koi sapna tootta hai na ... toh ek taxi driver paida hota hai
Trans: In New York whenever a dream breaks ... then a taxi driver is born

Title: Ta Ra Rum Pum
Quote: I can talk cars, I can walk cars ... infact main khud hi ek car hoon
Trans: I can talk cars, I can walk cars ... infact I'm myself a car

Title: Ta Ra Rum Pum
Quote: East or west never rest until you find the best
Trans: East or west never rest until you find the best

Title: Zid
Quote: Agar jhooti kahaniyon ko sache mann se kaho na ... toh sachi lagti hai
Trans: If you tell the stories of lies with a true heart ... then they feel real

Title: Zid
Quote: Evidence se badkar aur ek cheez hai ... truth
Trans: There is one thing bigger than evidence ... which is truth

Title: Zid
Quote: I love you so much that I can kill both of us
Trans: I love you so much that I can kill both of us

Title: Zid
Quote: When a person is passionately in love ... uski sari takleefein door ho jaati hai
Trans: When a person is passionately in love ... then all his problems go away

Title: Dilli Ka Thug
Quote: Kab tak bolo chupi rahogi oh meri Asha ... maine padh li aaj tumhare naino ki basha
Trans: Asha tell me until when will you hide ... today I've read the language of your eyes

Title: Dilli Ka Thug
Quote: Main tum bin adhoora, jaise namak bin daal ... daal bin bhat, bhat bin Bengal
Trans: I'm incomplete without you, just like lentil soup without salt ... like rice without lentil soup and Bengal without rice

Title: Tamanchey
Quote: Ekdum zehar ho tum
Trans: You are totally poisonous

Title: Tamanchey
Quote: Jaan ke haath se jaan jaave ... toh jaan jaane ka mazaa aa jaave
Trans: When you lose your life by the hands of your love ... then it's fun to lose your life

Title: Tamanchey
Quote: Upar waale ke karname bhi kamaal hai ... kabhi ek rasta bandh kare toh ek khol deve ... kabhi daboche toh kabhi chhod deve
Trans: The plans of god are great ... sometimes when he closes one path he opens one ... sometimes he catches us and sometimes he lets us go

Title: Tamanchey
Quote: Shaadi karega? ... saala jhandu!
Trans: You want to get married? ... bloody jerk!

Title: Sainik
Quote: Sainik hona ek desh ka sipahi hona hi nahi hai ... sainik hona ek shahadat hai, ek qurbani hai, balidaan hai ... aur sainik ke ghar waale sainik se bhi badhe shaheed hote hai
Trans: Being a soldier is not just being a warrior for the country ... being a soldier is a martyrdom, a sacrifice, an immolation ... and the family members of a soldier are biggers martyrs than the soldier

Title: Sainik
Quote: Aap iske khandan ke baare mein nahi jaante ... iska par-dada 009, iska dada 008, iska baap 007  aur yeh zero zero chakka (006) hai
Trans: You don't know about his family ... his great grandfather was 009, his grandfather was 008, his father was 007 and he is 006 (eunuch)

Title: Anarkali
Quote: Main nahi gaati, meri mohabbat gaati hai ... main nahi naachti, kisi ke liye mera dil naachta hai ... aur yeh tab hota hai jab mera mehboob mere paas ho
Trans: I don't sing, my love sings ... I don't dance, my heart dances for someone ... and that happens when my lover is with me

Title: Anarkali
Quote: Mohabbat ki tasveer jab tak khoon se na rangi jaye ... lutf nahi aata
Trans: Until the picture of love is not painted with the colour of blood ... there is no enjoyment

Title: Anarkali
Quote: Mulkon ko fatah karne se pehle ... badshahon ko apne dil fatah karne padte hai
Trans: Before winning over countries ... the kings have to win over their own hearts

Title: Anarkali
Quote: Hukumaten khandano se nahi usoolon se chalti hai
Trans: Regimes are run by principles and not families

Title: Sheesh Mahal
Quote: Ameeri aur gareebi toh jeevan ki dhoop chhaon ka naam hai
Trans: Richness and poverty are the names of sunlight and shade of life

Title: Sheesh Mahal
Quote: Baazi haar dene ka naam haar nahi hota ... himmat haar behetneka naam haar hota hai
Trans: Losing is not the name of losing in a game ... losing is the name of losing courage

Title: Sheesh Mahal
Quote: Neend uski hai, dimaag uska hai, raatein uski hai ... jiske baazu par teri zulfein pareshan ho gayi ... dil dhoondta hai phir wohi fursat ke raat din ... behte rahen tasawur-e-jana liye hue
Trans: The sleep, the mind, the nights belong to him ... the one on whose hand your hair is confused ... the heart once again yearns for those leisurely days and nights ... when we would just sit back leisurely and let our imagination wander

Title: Sheesh Mahal
Quote: Judai teri kisko manzoor hai ... zameen sakht hai, aasman door hai
Trans: Who wants to accept separation from you ... the ground is hard and the sky is far

Title: Shapath
Quote: Log peete hai isse hosh ko khone ke liye ... aur hum mein hosh bhi aata hai peene ke baad
Trans: People drink this (alcohol) to lose their senses ... and I get into my senses only after drinking

Title: Shapath
Quote: Mauka deta hai parmeshwar ... maut deta hai Rajeshwar
Trans: The god gives a chance ... and Rajeshwar gives death

Title: Shapath
Quote: Langoor ki dumm par angoor ki bail ... ab main nikaalonga mujrimon ka tel
Trans: There is a grapevine on the tail of a monkey ... now I'll squeeze the oil out of criminals

Title: Shapath
Quote: Main chaal chalta nahi ... aur chalta hoon toh maat nahi khata
Trans: I don't plan ploys ... but if I plan them, then I don't lose

Title: Pehchaan
Quote: Kuch nashe aaise hote hai joh kiye nahi jaate ... ho jaate hai
Trans: There are some intoxications that don't have to be done ... they happen by themselves

Title: Pehchaan
Quote: Aadmi aur aadmi ki badnaami mein koi farak nahi hota ... aadmi pehda hota hai, badnaami janam leti hai ... aadmi bada ho jaata hai, badnaami bhi badi ho jaati hai
Trans: There is no difference between a person and a person's humiliation ... when a person is born, even humiliation is born ... when a person becomes big, his humiliation also becomes big

Title: Pehchaan
Quote: Ek dushman ko doosre dushman se lada dena chahiye ... nuksaan chahe kisi ka bhi ho ... fayda hamesha hamara hota hai
Trans: You should make one enemy fight the other enemy ... no matter who loses ... we'll always profit

Title: Pehchaan
Quote: Toote hue rishtey aur toote hue dhaage ko jaldi ma jodne ki koshish nahi karni chahiye ... gaanth padh jaye toh umar bhar chubti rehti hai
Trans: You should not try to quickly connect broken relationships and broken threads ... if a knot gets formed then it hurts for the entire life

Title: Mirza Ghalib
Quote: Ab toh ghabra ke yeh kehte hai ki mar jayenge ... marke bhi chain na paya toh kidhar jayenge ... hum nahi woh joh karen unka daava tujhse ... balki poochega khuda bhi toh mukhar jayenge
Trans: Now I'm scared and I'm saying that I will die ...  where will I go if I don't get peace even after dying ... I'm not someone who will challenge you ... infact even if god asks then I'll turn away

Title: Mirza Ghalib
Quote: Hai bas ki har ek unke ishaare mein nishaan aur ... karte hai mohabbat toh guzarta hai gumaan aur ... yaa rab na woh samjhe hai na samjhenge meri baat ... de aur dil unko joh na de mujhko zubaan aur
Trans: There are so many signals in every gesture of hers ... that when she expresses love, I suspect something else ... oh god she doesn't understand me and neither will she understand me ... give her some more heart if you don't want to give me few more words

Title: Mirza Ghalib
Quote: Nikalna khuld se aadam ka sunte aaye the lekin ... bahut beabroo hokar tere kooche se hum nikle
Trans: I had heard that how helpless the child of a human is when he comes out of the womb ... but I was even more helpless than that when I came out of your doors

Title: Mirza Ghalib
Quote: Hai aur bhi duniya mein sukhanavar bahut achche ...  kehte hai ki Ghalib ka hai andaaz-e-bayaan aur
Trans: There are many good poets in the world ... but they say that Ghalib's style (of poetry) is different

Title: Rang Rasiya
Quote: Maine unke sapnon ko dhuan hote dekha hai, waqt se pehle umar ko dhalte dekha hai, dukhte hue dard ko dekha hai ... lekin kabhi himmat haarte nahi dekha
Trans: I have seen his dreams turn into smoke, I have seen him age before time, I have seen his pain in sadness ... but I have never seen him lose his courage

Title: Rang Rasiya
Quote: Ek kalakaar kabhi bhi businessman nahi ban sakta ... aur ek businessman kabhi kalakaar nahi ban sakta
Trans: An artist can never become a businessman ... and a businessman can never become an artist

Title: Rang Rasiya
Quote: Mera maanna hai ke jeevan ka udeshya hona chahiye kala sa sundar hona ... aur agar aap kala ko bandhoge toh woh sab nasht ho jayega, joh jeevan mein sundar hai ya jiska koi arth hai ... bandh ke reh jayenge hum sab
Trans: I believe that the goal of life should be, to be beautiful like art ... and if you lock up art then, everything that is beautiful in life or that has a meaning will be destroyed ... and we all will be locked up

Title: Rang Rasiya
Quote: Yeh Kamasutra ka desh hai ... joh hum mein apne shareer ka, apni aatma ka, apni kamana ka, apni manavata ka utsav manana sikhata hai
Trans: This is the country of Kamasutra ... which teaches us to celebrate the festival of our body, our soul, our wish, our humanity

Title: Jhankaar Beats
Quote: Duniya gol hai aur har paap ka ek double role hai
Trans: The world is round and every sin has its look alike

Title: Jhankaar Beats
Quote: Zindagi mein sirf do hi cheezein hai ... ek khana aur doosra gaana
Trans: There are only two things in life ... one is food and other is music

Title: Jhankaar Beats
Quote: Marriage is a lovely institution ... it's a lovely mental institution
Trans: Marriage is a lovely institution ... it's a lovely mental institution

Title: Jhankaar Beats
Quote: Chandramukhi ho ya Paaro ... ki farak penda hai yaaron
Trans: Be it Chandramukhi or Paaro ... how does it matter my friends

Title: Heera Panna
Quote: Pyar bhagwan hai ... lekin saath yeh bhi kahoongi, ki pyar mein joh shaadi na kare ... woh shaitan hai
Trans: Love is god ... but along with that I'll say that, the one who doesn't get married in love ... is a devil

Title: Heera Panna
Quote: Bhagwan ne insaan ko banaya hi aaise hai ki jab tak woh zinda hai ... usse jhoot aur lobh aur moh se koi mukti nahi
Trans: God has made a human such that until he is alive ... he won't get freedom from lies and greed and fascination

Title: Heera Panna
Quote: Main pyar karoongi toh sirf ek hi aadmi se ... aur agar mujhe utna hi pyar vapas nahi milega toh tukde tukde ho jaongi andar hi andar
Trans: If I fall in love then I'll only love that one person ... and if I don't get the same amount of love back then I'll break into pieces from the inside

Title: Joggers Park
Quote: Izzat banane ke liye poori zindagi lag jaati hai ... lekin usse barbaad karne ke liye sirf ek bhool ki zaroorat hoti hai
Trans: It takes the entire life to earn respect ... but you only need one mistake to destroy it

Title: Joggers Park
Quote: Pyar ek chemistry hai, ek bhavna hai, ek emotion hai ... just happens when two souls meet ... is mein umar, status, religion, nationality kuch nahi hota ... bas hoti hai bhavna, ehsaas, emotion
Trans: Love is chemistry, it's a feeling, it's an emotion ... just happens when two souls meet ... in this there is no age, status, religion, nationality ... the only things that are there are feelings, sentiments, emotions

Title: Joggers Park
Quote: Pyar aur dosti ki pehchaan ek hi waqt par hoti hai
Trans: One recognizes love and friendship at the same time

Title: Joggers Park
Quote: Desires, dreams, khwaab, hasratein banayi hai bhagwan ne ... par duniya mein kaise jeena hai banaya hai samaaj ne, insaan ne
Trans: Desires and dreams are made by god ... but how to live in this world is made by society and humans

Title: Aa Ab Laut Chalen
Quote: Jiska dil gham ki tanhaiyon mein ujadh gaya ho ... woh bahar se kitna hi sehatmand lagta ho, lekin andar se toh bimaar hi rehta hai
Trans: The one whose heart is destroyed in the loneliness of sorrow ... no matter how healthy he looks from the outside, but from inside he is sick

Title: Aa Ab Laut Chalen
Quote: Joh sacha pyar karte hai woh zindagi bhar ke liye naraaz nahi hote ... kuch derr ke liye rooth jaate hai
Trans: Those who are truly in love they are not angry for the entire life ... they just get upset for some time

Title: Aa Ab Laut Chalen
Quote: Aao ab hum laut chale apne logon mein, apni basti mein ... jahan pyar hai, apnapan hai, sukoon hai
Trans: Come let's go back to our own people, in our own colony ... where there is love, there is oneness, there is peace

Title: Aa Ab Laut Chalen
Quote: Ek bachcha anath ashram mein palkar bada ho sakta hai ... baap mar jaye toh maa ke sahare jee sakta hai ... lekin ek aurat ka pati chala jaye toh woh kiske sahare aur kaise jeeti hai ... woh takleef main samajhta hoon
Trans: A child can grow living in an orphanage ... he can live with the support of his mother if his father dies ... but if the husband of a woman goes away then the support on which she lives and how she lives ... I understand that pain

Title: Mr. & Mrs. Khiladi
Quote: Paise ke pair mein paiye lage hote hai ... woh kabhi bhi khasak jaati hai
Trans: Money has wheels on its legs ... it can slide away anytime

Title: Mr. & Mrs. Khiladi
Quote: Jawan beti ka baap Taj Mahal ke chaukidaar ki tarah hota hai ... usko hamesha darr laga rehta hai ke kisi gande aadmi ke haath se Taj Mahal ganda na ho jaye
Trans: The father of a young girl is like the watchman of the Taj Mahal ... he is always scared that the Taj Mahal will get dirty by the hands of some dirty person

Title: Mr. & Mrs. Khiladi
Quote: Inspector sahab aapne ab tak jail ki zanjeeron aur salakhon ka loha dekha hai ... magar Shalu ki himmat ka faulad nahi dekha ... pehna di jiye sar se paon tak loha, kheench di jiye zameen se aasman tak lohe ki deewar ... magar Shalu har deewar ko todh degi
Trans: Mr. Inspector, till now you have only seen the iron of the jail and the shackles ... but you haven't seen the steel of Shalu's courage ... put the shackles on me from head to toe, build the wall of iron from the ground to the sky ... but Shalu will break every wall

Title: Mr. & Mrs. Khiladi
Quote: Insaan aaise gunaah zindagi mein sirf do hi baar karta hai ... ek ya toh sar pe kisi ka udhaar ho aur doosra jab dil mein kisi ka pyar ho
Trans: A person commits such a crime only in two conditions of life ... first if he is in debt to someone and second when he is in love with someone

Title: Chandni Bar
Quote: Yeh batting ka nahi, betting ka zamana hai ... aaj kal khelne ka kam, out hone ka zyada paisa milta hai
Trans: This is the era of betting, not batting ... nowadays you get less money to play and more to get out

Title: Chandni Bar
Quote: Dhamki aur gaali ... yeh dono se achche achchon ki phat jaati hai
Trans: With threat and abuse ... even the best of the best get scared

Title: Chandni Bar
Quote: Aadmi ke marne ke baad biwi bewa hoti hai ... rakhail nahi
Trans: A man's wife becomes a widow when he dies ... his mistress doesn't

Title: Sardari Begum
Quote: Tera tabassum ho gaya mere dil ke paar ... yeh zakhmi dil lekar kahan jaon main ... main chahoonga ki tum meri rafiq-e-hayat bano ... jab tak is duniya mein qaid muqarrar hai, tum mere saath raho
Trans: Your smile went across my heart ... now where should I go with this wounded heart ... I wish that you become my friend in life ... and that you stay with me until captivity is constituted in this world

Title: Sardari Begum
Quote: Mausiki ki taseer aaise dil se nikalti hai ... joh paakh saaf ho
Trans: The effect of music comes from a heart ... which is completely pure

Title: Angaaray (1998)
Quote: Stall ka pachees, balcony ka pachaas ... ek ticket bacha hai, baki sab khallas
Trans: Rs.25 for stall, Rs.50 for balcony ... only one ticket is left, everything else is sold out

Title: Angaaray (1998)
Quote: Jurm aur dharam ka dhanda darr ke bal pe hi toh chalta hai
Trans: The business of crime and religion runs on the basis of fear

Title: Dhoti Lota Aur Chowpatty
Quote: Tumhare dil ki, mere dil ki, sari duniya ke dil ki ek hi awaaz hai ... rupaiya, rupaiya, rupaiya
Trans: Your heart, my heart and the heart of the entire world is saying ... money, money, money

Title: Dhoti Lota Aur Chowpatty
Quote: Shut-up kehne waali ladkiyan toh sabse zyada pyar karti hai
Trans: The girls who say shut-up, give the most love

Title: Dhoti Lota Aur Chowpatty
Quote: Ladki hai ki whiskey ki botal ... dekhte hi nasha aa gaya
Trans: Is she a girl or a bottle of whiskey ... I'm intoxicated just by looking at her

Title: Dhoti Lota Aur Chowpatty
Quote: Abhe oh tan-tambure ... barsaati kan-khajure!
Trans: Hey you musical instrument ... centipede from the rain!

Title: Vishwasghaat
Quote: Ek baar, sirf ek baar unke chehre mere samne saaf ho jaye ... main unka woh hashar karoonga ki woh duayen maangenge zindagi ke liye nahi ... maut ke liye
Trans: Once their faces come in front of me ... then I'll do that condition of them, that they will pray not for life ... but for death

Title: Vishwasghaat
Quote: Vishwasghaat sabse bada gunaah hota hai ... ek aaisa gunaah joh maafi ke layak nahi
Trans: Betrayal is the biggest crime ... a crime that cannot be forgiven

Title: Vishwasghaat
Quote: Tu toh kanoon ka woh pilla hai joh botiyan dekh ke talve chatta hai
Trans: You are that dog of the law which licks the boots when you see bones

Title: Khote Sikkay
Quote: Aurat tawaif vichaaron se banti hai ... peshe se nahi
Trans: A woman becomes a prostitute with her thoughts ... not by her occupation

Title: Khote Sikkay
Quote: Chaku chalane ke liye kalai nahi kaleja chahiye ... joh bazaar mein nahi bikta
Trans: To use a knife you don't need a wrist, you need courage ... which doesn't sell in the market

Title: Khote Sikkay
Quote: Armaan dabaye ja sakte hai, chupaye ja sakte hai ... lekin jalaye nahi ja sakte
Trans: Desires can be suppressed, they can be hidden ... but they can't be burned

Title: Khote Sikkay
Quote: Chaku aur churi ke bal pe jeene waale log ... ek din khud chaku churi ke neeche aa jaate hai
Trans: Those who live on the support of knives and cutters ... one day they themselves come under the knives and the cutters

Title: Phool Bane Angaray
Quote: Main shaq ki buniyad par case ka panna kholta hoon ... aur usse yakeen mein badalkar kitaab bandh kar deta hoon
Trans: I open a page of the case on the basis of suspicion ... and I convert that into certainty and then I close the book

Title: Phool Bane Angaray
Quote: Aaj ke baad kisi imaandar officer ko baimaan banane ki koshish mat karna ... varna kisi din kisi imaandar officer ki khopdi ghum gayi ... toh woh sari ki sari goliyan teri khopdi ke aar-paar kar dega
Trans: From today don't try to make any honest officer into a dishonest one ... or else if someday the head of a honest officer spins ... then he will shoot all his bullets through your head

Title: Phool Bane Angaray
Quote: Understand ... you better understand!
Trans: Understand ... you better understand!

Title: Phool Bane Angaray
Quote: Zindagi mein agar jeena zaroori hai ... toh peena bahut zaroori hai
Trans: If living is important in life ... then drinking is very important

Title: Maharaja
Quote: Maharaja woh nahi hota jiske sar par taj aur pairon ke neeche makhmal ho ... maharaja woh hota hai jiske dil mein apno ke liye pyar aur baazuon mein unki raksha karne ki taqat ho
Trans: A king is not someone who has a crown on his head and velvet under his feet ... a king is someone who has the love in his heart for his dear ones and the strength in his hands to protect them

Title: Maharaja
Quote: Jaan chahe janwar ki ho ya insaan ki ... jaan, jaan hoti hai ... khoon chahe janwar ka gire ya aadmi ka ... dard dono ko ek sa hota hai
Trans: Whether it is the life of an animal or a human ... a life is a life ... whether the blood shed is of an animal or a human ... both go through the same kind of pain

Title: Maharaja
Quote: Rehne ke liye duniya ki sabse sundar jagah insaan ka dil hota hai ... tum hamare dil mein reh lena, hum tumhare dil mein reh lenge aur hamare bachche hum dono ke dil mein
Trans: The most beautiful place to live in this world is the heart of a person ... you live in my heart, I'll live in your heart and our children will live in both our hearts

Title: Maharaja
Quote: Hindustani ladki kitni hi aaj ke zamane ki kyun na ho ... woh apne pyar ka iqraar apne zabaan se kabhi nahi karegi ... ladke ko uska jawaab khud uske aankhon mein aankhen dalke jaan lena chahiye
Trans: No matter how modern an Indian girl is ... she won't confess her love from her own mouth ... the guy has to look into her eyes and get the answer

Title: Parampara
Quote: Parampara ko na koi talwar kaat sakti hai, na koi aag jala sakti aur na waqt badal sakta hai
Trans: Tradition can't be cut by any sword, it can't be burned by any fire and neither can time change it

Title: Parampara
Quote: Band karo yeh yudh ... is yudh ki jeet mein bhi haar hai aur haar mein bhi haar hai
Trans: Stop this battle ... there is a loss in winning this battle and there is loss in losing as well

Title: Parampara
Quote: Jab main aankhen bandh karti hoon aapki tasveer mere samne aati hai ... jab main saans leti hoon aapki khushboo aati hai ... jab main soo jaati hoon aap mere sapno mein aa jaate hai
Trans: When I close my eyes then your picture comes in front of me ... when I breath then your fragrance comes ... when I sleep then you come in my dreams

Title: Parampara
Quote: Dosti do tareekon se hoti hai ... ya toh bachpan mein saath khelen ho ... ya sirf pehli mulaqat mein
Trans: Friendship can happen in two ways ... either if you have played together in childhood ... or else in the first meeting

Title: Deshwasi
Quote: Jeete aur marte toh janwar bhi hai ... magar insaan woh jiski zindagi ka koi maqsad ho ... aur marna woh joh kisi ke kaam aaye
Trans: Even animals live and die ... but a human is someone whose life has a meaning ... and death should be something that can be of use to someone else

Title: Deshwasi
Quote: Rajneeti aur dharam yeh do aaise shastra hai ... jisse koi bhi bandhan kaate ja sakte hai, todhe ja sakte hai
Trans: Politics and religion are two such weapons ... with which you can cut and break any relationship

Title: Deshwasi
Quote: Deshwasi ke seene se goli paar nahi hoti ... vapas jaati hai
Trans: A bullet cannot pass through the chest of a patriot ... it returns back

Title: Deshwasi
Quote: Dharam afeem ki woh goli hai ... jisse sari janta ko mast rakha ja sakta hai
Trans: Religion is that pill of opium ... with which you can keep all the people happy

Title: Afsana Pyar Ka
Quote: Judai ka gham jitna hoga ... milan ka mazaa utna hi zyada hoga
Trans: The more the pain of separation is ... there will be that much more fun in the union

Title: Afsana Pyar Ka
Quote: Daulat mein hi woh taqat hai joh har sapna, har umeed, har umang ko haqeeqat mein dhaal sake
Trans: Money has the power that can turn every dream, every hope, every aspiration into reality

Title: Afsana Pyar Ka
Quote: Khoobsurati ki tareef toh dekhte hi ki jani chahiye ... chahe woh koi ladki ho ya koi haseen phool
Trans: You should praise beauty the moment you see it ... whether it is a girl or a beautiful flower

Title: Afsana Pyar Ka
Quote: Mauke diye nahi, liye jaate hai ... jahan bhi mil jaye
Trans: Opportunities are not given, they are taken ... wherever you get them

Title: Pyaar Impossible
Quote: I'm just a girl ... but with you I feel like a princess
Trans: I'm just a girl ... but with you I feel like a princess

Title: Pyaar Impossible
Quote: Pyar kare toh mujhse kare ... is liye nahi kyun ki main usse pyar karta hoon
Trans: She should love me for me ... not because I love her

Title: Pyaar Impossible
Quote: Zindagi mein jeet sirf ussi ki nahi hoti hai joh strong hota hai, tezz hota hai, chalaak hota hai ... anth mein jeet uski hoti hai joh apne upar vishvas kar sakta hai
Trans: The ones who win in life aren't always the stronger, faster, clever ones ... in the end the one who wins is the one who believes in himself

Title: Pyaar Impossible
Quote: Is duniya mein do kisam ke log hote hai ... ek tumhare jaise joh cheezein banate hai aur ek mere jaise joh unhe bechte hai ... aur aaj ki duniya mein mere jaise log ke bina, tum jaise log kahin ke nahi hote
Trans: In this world there are two types of people ... people like you who make things and people like me who sell those things ... and in today's world without people like me, people like you would be nowhere

Title: Isi Ka Naam Zindagi
Quote: Haai is ada pe kaun na mar jaye khuda ... ke ladte hai aur haath mein talwar bhi nahi
Trans: Oh god who will not die on this style ... she fights and she doesn't even have a sword in her hand

Title: Isi Ka Naam Zindagi
Quote: Sharaab peena bahut zaroori hai ... varna zindagi adhoori hai
Trans: Drinking alcohol is very important ... or else life is incomplete

Title: Dil Apna Aur Preet Parai
Quote: Hawa hi aaisi chali hai ki jee bahal nahi ... varna hum toh bahut kam udaas rehte hai
Trans: The wind is blowing such that my heart doesn't want to reinstate ... or else I hardly am sad

Title: Dil Apna Aur Preet Parai
Quote: Hai dekhkar aaina hairat ho gayi ... meri soorat unki soorat ho gayi
Trans: She was astonished looking at the mirror ... her face looked like my face

Title: Dil Apna Aur Preet Parai
Quote: Jisse marna nahi aaya ... usse jeena nahi aaya
Trans: The one who doesn't know how to die ... doesn't know how to live

Title: Lok Parlok
Quote: Swatantra Bharat ka nagrik hoon, krantiveer hoon, tanashahi ke liye talwar hoon, yam lok mazdooron ka sardar hoon
Trans: I'm a citizen of independent India, I'm a brave revolutionary, I'm a sword for dictatorship, I'm the leader of the labourers of hell

Title: Lok Parlok
Quote: Mere liye tum aaise badal ho ... main ek din pyar se mar jaongi, lekin tum mere pyar ke aangan mein kabhi nahi barsoge
Trans: For me you are such a cloud ... that one day I'll die from love, but still you won't pour the rain in the backyard of my love

Title: Lok Parlok
Quote: Main tumhe zinda nahi chhodunga ... joh aag tumne mere seene mein lagayi hai ... woh tumhare khoon se bujhegi
Trans: I won't leave you alive ... the fire that you have started in my heart ... will erase only with your blood

Title: Lok Parlok
Quote: Dharam rakshak hoon, narak lok shashak hoon, yamraj hoon!
Trans: I'm the protector of religion, I'm from hell, I'm the god of death!

Title: Muskaan
Quote: Pyar aatma se hota hai, rooh ki gehrai se hota hai ... aatma aur rooh shakal ko nahi jaanti
Trans: Love happens from the soul, it happens from the depth of the spirit ... and the soul and the spirit don't know the face

Title: Muskaan
Quote: Mere liye woh joh bhi hoga, jaisa bhi hoga ... duniya ka sabse khoobsurat insaan hoga
Trans: For me whosoever that person will be, however he may be ... he will be the most beautiful person of the world

Title: Muskaan
Quote: Jurm karne waale saanp mujhe nevala kehte hai ... aur saanp ki khushboo mujhe bahut door se aa jaati hai
Trans: The snakes who commit crimes call me a mongoose ... and I can smell snakes from very far away

Title: Socha Na Tha
Quote: Samaaj, mazhab, sab apni jagah hai ... lekin pyar sabse upar hai
Trans: Society, religion, everything is in it's place ... but above all of this is love

Title: Socha Na Tha
Quote: Main seedhe sadhe dhang se kehta hoon apni baat ... ek ghar basana chahta hoon main tumhare saath ... kya dogi mere haathon mein bolo tum apna haath
Trans: I'll say my point in a straight manner ... I want to settle down in a home with you ... tell me if you'll give your hand in my hand

Title: Socha Na Tha
Quote: Yeh meri zindagi hai ... mera faisla hai!
Trans: It's my life ... it's my decision!

Title: Socha Na Tha
Quote: Yeh duniya bati hui hai dharam ke naam par, desh ke naam par, rang ke naam par, jaat ke naam par ... par yeh woh sarhaden hai jise insaan ne kheenchi hui hai ... lekin in sabse upar hai woh jise insaan ne nahi uparwaale ne banaya hai ... pyar
Trans: This world is distributed in the name of religion, in the name of country, in the name of colour, in the name of caste ... and these are those boundaries that humans have made ... but bigger than all of this is what god has made and not humans ... that is love

Title: Baby
Quote: Har jung border par nahi hoti
Trans: Not every war happens on the border

Title: Baby
Quote: Mil jaate hai kuch officers hum mein todhe pagal, todhe adhiyal ... jinke dimaag mein sirf desh aur desh bhakti ghumti rehti hai ... yeh desh ke liye marna nahi chahte, balki jeena chahte hai ... taki aakhri saans tak desh ki rakhsha kar sake
Trans: We do get some officers who are a little mad, a little stubborn ... in whose mind only country and patriotism keeps moving ... these people don't want to die for their country, instead they want to live ... so that they can protect their country till their last breath

Title: Baby
Quote: Main kuch bhi kar sakta hoon!
Trans: I can do anything!

Title: Out of Control
Quote: Aye toh ho late ... lekin ho aap great
Trans: You may have come late ... but you're great

Title: Out of Control
Quote: It won't be easy to let you go ... but it'll be a lot harder to hold on
Trans: It won't be easy to let you go ... but it'll be a lot harder to hold on

Title: Himalay Ki God Mein
Quote: Ek achche hospital ke liye sirf pakki imaarat aur chamakte hue furniture ki zaroorat nahi ... zaroorat hai to kaam karne waale haathon ki aur mehsoos karne waale dil ki
Trans: For a good hospital you just don't need a strong building and shining furniture ... what you need are hands that work and hearts that can feel

Title: Himalay Ki God Mein
Quote: Raat mein soote hue joh sapne aate hai, woh sache nahi hote ... lekin din mein jaagte hue joh sapne dekhe jaate hai, woh hamesha sache hote hai ... kyun ki unka doosra naam hai irrada
Trans: The dreams that come in the night while sleeping are not true ... but the dreams that you see being awake during the day are always true ... because their second name is intention

Title: Himalay Ki God Mein
Quote: Duniya abhi tak woh bandook nahi bana saki joh sachai ka khoon kar sake, nekki ko khatam kar sake
Trans: The world has not yet been able to make that gun which can kill truth, which can end good deeds

Title: Himalay Ki God Mein
Quote: Doosre ke ghar ka cheena hua diya ... apne ghar mein kab tak ujala de sakta hai
Trans: The lamp stolen from someone else's house ... how long can it give light in our house

Title: Miss 420
Quote: Hindustani namak ki taqat hi kuch aur hai ... rupayon ki laalach aur maut ka darr bhi Hindustaniyon ko gaddari karne pe majboor nahi karta
Trans: The power in the Indian salt is something else ... even the greed for money and the fear of death can't compel Indians to cheat

Title: Miss 420
Quote: Kadi se kadi milti hai toh ek zanjeer banti hai ... aaiye hum sab milkar ek zanjeer banaye ... tadbeer se in badnaseebon ki taqdeer banaye
Trans: When a link connects with a link a chain is made ... come let's all connect and make a chain ... let's make the destiny of these unfortunate people with some planning

Title: Miss 420
Quote: Goli chalate waqt na tum mujhse kahoge ki mujhe maaf kardo ... aur na main tumse kahoongi ki mujhe maaf kardo
Trans: When I fire the bullet you don't ask me for forgiveness ... and neither will I ask you for forgiveness

Title: Miss 420
Quote: Ek nadaan dost se achcha hai ek chalaak dushman
Trans: A smart enemy is better than a naive friend

Title: Ponga Pandit
Quote: Janam se Haridwar ka panda aur mooh mein murgi ka anda
Trans: By birth you're a pandit from Haridwar and you have an egg of a chicken in your mouth

Title: Ponga Pandit
Quote: Saanp ka kaata kam se kam mar toh jaata hai ... lekin aurat ka sataya na mar sakta hai, na jee sakta hai
Trans: A person bit from a snake atleast dies ... but a person troubled by a woman can neither die, nor live

Title: Ponga Pandit
Quote: Jisne sachche dil se Ramayan aur Gita ka paath kiya ho ... uske shabdon ki laaj bhagwan ko bhi rakhni padti hai
Trans: The one who has studied the Ramayana and the Bhagavad Gita with a true heart ... even god has to keep the honour of his words

Title: Ponga Pandit
Quote: Aaj raat ke baad jab subah ka suraj niklega ... toh hamare bistar ki shikan ko dekhkar badalon mein mooh chupa lega
Trans: After tonight when the morning sun rises ... then looking at the wrinkles on our bed it will hide it's face in the clouds

Title: Ittefaq (2001)
Quote: Main usko pencil ki tarah cheel daloonga ... uske tukde tukde kar daloonga ... uske tukde kutton ko khilaonga aur kutte billiyon ko khila daloonga
Trans: I'll strip him like a pencil ... I'll cut him into pieces ... I'll feed his pieces to the dogs and I'll feed the dogs to the cats

Title: Ittefaq (2001)
Quote: Abhe Chambal ghaati se bagaye hue C-grade ke daku!
Trans: Hey you C-grade dacoit on the run from the mountains of Chambal!

Title: Thodisi Bewafaii
Quote: Agar bhoolne se rishtey naate toot sakte hai ... toh is duniya mein na pyar hota, na nafrat hoti aur na dard hota
Trans: If relationships broke simply on forgetting ... then there wouldn't have been any love in this world, nor hatred and neither pain

Title: Thodisi Bewafaii
Quote: Patni ka ghamand hota hai uska pati ... aur tum us ghamand ko kayam rakhane ke liye pati ki khushi mein apni khushi talash karna ... issi mein ek sukhi pariwar ki zamanat chupi hui hai
Trans: The pride of a wife is her husband ... and to maintain that pride you try to find your happiness in your husband's happiness ... within this is hidden the guarantee of a happy family

Title: Thodisi Bewafaii
Quote: Woh pyar hi kya joh faulaadi dil mein band ghut-ghutkar mar jaye ... pyar ko izhaar chahiye
Trans: What good is that love which dies out of suffocation in the heart of steel ... love needs to be expressed

Title: Thodisi Bewafaii
Quote: Pati ke ghar ka dukh bhi maikay ke sukh se meetha hota hai
Trans: Even the sadness in the husband's house is much sweeter than the happiness in the parents house

Title: Ye Gulistan Hamara
Quote: Rajneeti ke vachan samay ki zaroorat dekhkar diye jaate hai ... aur ussi tarah samay ki zaroorat dekhkar todh diye jaate hai
Trans: The promises in politics are given according to the needs of time ... and just like that they are broken according to the needs of time

Title: Ye Gulistan Hamara
Quote: Yeh azaadi ki ladai mere mar jaane se khatam nahi hogi ... yeh ladai toh mere mar jaane ke baad shuru hogi ... aur us waqt tak ladi jaati rahegi jab tak yeh Bharat maa ke bichade hue bachche maa ki ghod mein vapas nahi chale jaate
Trans: This battle of independence won't end after I die ... this battle will start after I die ... and it will go on until these separated children of India don't return into the lap of their mother

Title: Ye Gulistan Hamara
Quote: Pyar jab nafrat mein badal jaata hai ... toh khatarnak ho jaata hai
Trans: When love changes into hatred ... then it becomes dangerous

Title: Ye Gulistan Hamara
Quote: Jail ki deewar ko todkar bhaag jaana aasaan hai ... lekin prem aur dosti ki deewar ko phandna namumkin hai
Trans: It's easy to break the walls of jail and run away ... but it's impossible to jump across the walls of love and friendship

Title: Commando (1988)
Quote: Duniya alag alag ho jayegi lekin hamare desh ke Hindu Musalman ... kabhi alag nahi honge
Trans: The world will get separated but the Hindus and the Muslims in our country ... will never get separated

Title: Commando (1988)
Quote: Bhagwan ka shukar ki jiye ki usne hum mein koi behen nahi di ... varna saala kehne par cheerkar phek deta
Trans: Thank god he hasn't given me a sister ... or else on calling me your brother-in-law, I would have torn you apart and thrown you away

Title: Sailaab
Quote: Doosron ki seva karna hi bhagwan ki puja karna hai
Trans: Serving others itself is worshipping god

Title: Sailaab
Quote: Toofan kabhi kabhi apne saath sailaab lata hai ... aur sailaab se uthe hue bhanwar bahut khatarnak ho sakte hai
Trans: Sometimes a storm brings flooding with itself ... and the gyration that rises from the flood can be very dangerous

Title: Sailaab
Quote: Joh meri asliyat pehchaane ki koshish karega ... main uski asliyat puri bighaad doonga
Trans: The one who tries to know my reality ... I'll completely destroy their reality

Title: Faraar
Quote: Beheto toh mehbooba ki sar aankhon par beheto ... leto toh mehbooba ki aagosh mein leto ... varna kuch nahi, khade raho
Trans: If you sit then you should sit in the eyes of your lover ... if you lay down then you should lay down in the arms of your lover ... or else if nothing, then keep standing

Title: Faraar
Quote: Miya biwi ke romance ko censor board bhi nahi kaat sakta
Trans: Even the censor board cannot cut the romance between a husband and a wife

Title: Faraar
Quote: Jhoot ki zubaan lambi hoti hai ... umar nahi
Trans: The words of lies are long ... but not its age

Title: Faraar
Quote: Mirchi mooh na lage toh bhali ... jitna kaatenge utna si-si karenge ... mirchi uff nahi karegi
Trans: If the chilli doesn't touch the mouth then it's good ... because the more you eat it the more you'll feel spicy ... but the chilli won't even say a thing

Title: Dev D
Quote: Kai cheezein itni achchi lagne lagti hai ... ki baki sab buri lagne lagti hai
Trans: When you like certain things a lot ... then everything else looks bad

Title: Dev D
Quote: Delhi mein billi maarlo, khalo ... paalo nahi ... bahut mehenga padta hai
Trans: In Delhi you may kill a cat, eat a cat ... but don't nurture it ... it will be very costly

Title: Raat Gayi Baat Gayi?
Quote: Happiness is good health and a bad memory
Trans: Happiness is good health and a bad memory

Title: Raat Gayi Baat Gayi?
Quote: Shaadi ke do golden rules yaad rakho ... rule no. 1 aaisa kuch mat karo jisse tumhare partner ko dukh ho ... rule no. 2 agar karo bhi toh kisi ko pata mat lagne do
Trans: Remember the two golden rules of marriage ... rule no.1 don't do anything that will make your partner sad ... rule no. 2 even if you do something then don't let anyone come to know about it

Title: Raat Gayi Baat Gayi?
Quote: Well behaved women, rarely make history
Trans: Well behaved women, rarely make history

Title: What's Your Raashee?
Quote: Baimaani hi tikau shaadi shuda jeevan ki chaabi hai
Trans: Lying is the key to a stable married life

Title: What's Your Raashee?
Quote: Kamyab insaan wahi hota hai joh zindagi ke ahem faisle dil se nahi ... dimaag se leta hai
Trans: A successful person is one who takes the important decisions of life from the mind ... and not from the heart

Title: What's Your Raashee?
Quote: I go out on all dates ... Sundates, Mondates all dates up till Saturdates
Trans: I go out on all days ... Sunday, Monday all days up till Saturday

Title: What's Your Raashee?
Quote: Passion toh woh hai joh har pal tumhari life ko meaning deta hai
Trans: Passion is something which gives the meaning to every moment of your life

Title: Deewaanapan
Quote: Kiran meri prarthana hai, meri ibaadat hai, mera pyar hai, mera deewanapan hai
Trans: Kiran is my prayer, my worship, my love, my obsession

Title: Deewaanapan
Quote: Jis insaan mein mohabbat ka aaisa jazba ho ... woh lagatar kisi se nafrat nahi kar sakta
Trans: A person who has such passion for love ... that person can never hate someone continuously

Title: Deewaanapan
Quote: Ajeeb hai yeh pyar ... jitna tumse milti hoon, utna hi apne aapko tumse door mehsoos karti hoon
Trans: Love is strange ... the more I meet you, that much more I feel far away from you

Title: Deewaanapan
Quote: Dil par pyar ka raj hota hai ... taqat aur haisiyat ka nahi
Trans: Love rules the heart ... not power and status

Title: Dil Deke Dekho
Quote: Achcha dost aur achcha pati ... kismat waalon ko hi milta hai
Trans: A good friend and a good husband ... only lucky people get them

Title: Dil Deke Dekho
Quote: Marzi ho toh sooli par chadana ya rab ... sau baar jahannam mein jalana ya rab ... lekin mashooq kahen aap hamare hai buzurg ... na cheez ko yeh din na dikhana ya rab
Trans: Oh god if you wish then hang me ... oh god burn me 100 times in hell ... but my lover calling me her elder ... oh god don't make me see that day

Title: Dil Deke Dekho
Quote: Jis insaan ko maa ki mamta naseeb nahi hui ... us jaisa koi badnaseeb nahi
Trans: A person who doesn't get the motherly love ... there is no one as unfortunate as him

Title: Dil Deke Dekho
Quote: Tum aa rahi ho zamane ki aankh se bachkar ... nazar jhukaye hue aur badan churaye hue ... khud apne kadamon ki aahat se jhebti, darti ... khud apne saaye ki jumbish se khauf khaye hue
Trans: You are coming hiding from the eyes of the world ... with your eyes staring down and stealing your body ... scared from the noise of your own footsteps ... and in fear from the shaking of your own shadow

Title: Hunterrr
Quote: Love aur sex ke beech mein na confuse nahi karna chahiye ... it's a physical need
Trans: You should not get confused between love and sex ... it's a physical need

Title: Hunterrr
Quote: Second best pe line maaro yaar ... patne ke chances zyada hote hai
Trans: Try to hit on the 2nd best (girl) ... there are better chances of her falling for you

Title: Hunterrr
Quote: Chota Chetan dekhne aaya tha ya Chota Chetan bada karne aaya tha
Trans: Did you come to watch Chote Chetan (movie) or to get horny

Title: Hunterrr
Quote: Yeh ajeeb sa khela hai ... haan aur na ka mela hai ... shakkar ka daana kabhi karela hai ... kabhi Savita, kabhi Sunita, kabhi Bela hai
Trans: This is a strange game ... it's an exhibition of yes and no ... sometimes a granule of sugar is like bitter gourd ... sometimes there is Savita, sometimes there is Sunita, sometimes there is Bela

Title: Badlapur
Quote: Log kehte hai apne dushman ko maaf kar dena chahiye ... main bhi yahi maanta hoon ... lekin unhe tadpa tadpake maarne ke baad
Trans: People say that you should forgive your enemy ... I also agree with that ... but after killing them with pain and agony

Title: Ek Paheli Leela
Quote: Glamour industry mein success ka short cut ... short skirt
Trans: The short cut for success in the glamour industry is ... the short skirt

Title: Ek Paheli Leela
Quote: Jab uparwaala aapse kuch cheez vapas leta hai toh aapke dono haath khali kar deta hai ... taki aapko kuch behtar de sake
Trans: When god takes something back from you then he leaves both your hands empty ... so that he can give you something better

Title: Ek Paheli Leela
Quote: Agar tu is ilaake mein nazar aaya ... toh teri talaash teri laash pe khatam hogi
Trans: If you are seen again in this neighbourhood ... then your search will end with your dead body

Title: Ek Paheli Leela
Quote: Badan aur baahen gori ho ya na ho ... lekin dil gora hona chahiye
Trans: Whether you have a fair skinned body and arms or not ... but the heart must be fair

Title: Tum Mile
Quote: Aam aadmi ki rai kabhi aam nahi hoti
Trans: The opinion of a common man can never be common

Title: Tum Mile
Quote: Shahenshahon ke taqt aam aadmi ke kandhon pe hi khade hote hai
Trans: The thrones of kings stand on the shoulders of the common man

Title: Tum Mile
Quote: Kuch baatein reh jaati hai ankahi ... joh na kahun karo us par yakeen
Trans: Some conversations get left behind unsaid ... so believe in what I don't say

Title: Kurukshetra
Quote: Jahan satya hai wahan vijay hai
Trans: Where there is truth, there is victory

Title: Kurukshetra
Quote: Dhanda shuru karne se pehle teri jahan jahan bhi pahunch hai na, un sabse meri report manga lena ... agar kisi ek ne bhi mere area mein dhanda shuru karne ki salah di na tujhe ... toh vardi ki kasam tere dhande ka ribbon kaatne main khud aaonga
Trans: Before starting your business, collect my report from everyone whom you can reach ... and even if one person gives you the advice of opening your business in my area ... then I swear on my uniform that I'll myself come to cut the ribbon of your business

Title: Kurukshetra
Quote: Zindagi mein sirf ek hi aadmi se daro ... jise maut ka darr nahi
Trans: In life fear only one person ... the one who has no fear of death

Title: Kurukshetra
Quote: Jis din police aur fauj tum logon ki rakhail ban jayegi na ... us din yeh saara mulk ek randikhana ban jayega ... aur jaise chakle chalte hai na ... ussi tarah tum is desh ko bech daloge
Trans: The day the police and the military will become a mistress of people like you ... that day this entire country will turn into a brothel ... and just like pimps move around ... just like that you guys will sell this country

Title: Raavan
Quote: Akal shakal ke chakkar mein, jurm na ho sangeen ... hum toh mast vanar hai, kabhi na ho gangeen
Trans: I hope no serious crime is committed in running behind the mind and the face ... I'm a happy monkey who will never be sad

Title: Raavan
Quote: Aankhen hai toh dekh le, nahi khulega gate ... aur bahut bookha pyasa hai, toh kahin aur jaake kha chocolate
Trans: If you have eyes then see that this gate won't open ... and if you are hungry and thirsty a lot, then go somewhere else and eat a chocolate

Title: Raavan
Quote: Madamji ko jeetne chale hai Dev Pratap ... saath hai Sanjeevani, khatam karenge paap
Trans: Dev Pratap has left to win madam ... Sanjeevani is with him, and they'll finish the evil

Title: Red Alert: The War Within
Quote: Terrorism aur revolution mein bahut farak hai ... woh log desh ke khilaf hai, hum log system ke
Trans: There is a lot of difference between terrorism and revolution ... those people are against the country, and we are against the system

Title: Red Alert: The War Within
Quote: Sarkar ke paas bahut paisa hai, hathyar hai, logan hai ... hamare paas sirf junoon hai
Trans: The government has a lot of money, weapons, people ... but we only have passion

Title: Main Aurr Mrs Khanna
Quote: Jab bhi main tumhe taqleef mein paonga ... sabse pehle main apna haath badaonga
Trans: Whenever I find you in a problem ... I'll be the first one to give you a hand

Title: Main Aurr Mrs Khanna
Quote: Achche waqt ki ek kharabi hai ... achcha waqt khatam ho jaata hai ... lekin bure waqt ki ek achchai hai ... ke woh bhi khatam ho jaata hai
Trans: Good time has one bad thing ... that good time comes to an end ... but bad time has one good thing ... that even that comes to an end

Title: Main Aurr Mrs Khanna
Quote: Kehte hai kehne waale ishq karna aasaan nahi ... koi humse bhi toh pooch kar dekhe-e-zaalim ... aage chalna aur peeche mudhkar na dekhna bhi aasaan nahi
Trans: People who say, say that loving is not easy ... oh please but someone ask me too ... even walking ahead and not looking behind is not easy either

Title: Main Aurr Mrs Khanna
Quote: Achche waqt mein koi bhi khush reh sakta hai ... aadmi woh hai joh bure waqt mein khush rahe na rahe ... lekin doosron ko khush rakhe
Trans: Anyone can stay happy in good times ... but a person is someone who may be happy or not in bad times ... but he keeps others happy

Title: Kuchh Meetha Ho Jaye
Quote: Hum tanhaiyon se nahi, mehfilon se darte hai ... hum zamane se nahi, apne aap se darte hai ... yun toh bahut kuch khoya hai humne, na jaane kyun aapko khone se darte hai
Trans: I'm scared of parties and not loneliness ... I'm scared of myself and not the world ... I may have lost a lot, but I'm not sure why I'm scared of losing you

Title: Kuchh Meetha Ho Jaye
Quote: Pitaji ka naam, mataji ki shaan ... aur dono ke ishq mein phas gaya yeh gareeb insaan
Trans: My father's name and my mother's pride ... and in between the love of these two, this poor person was born

Title: Kuchh Meetha Ho Jaye
Quote: Zindagi mein pyar khone se aur pyar paane se badkar hai ... pyar karna
Trans: In life, bigger than losing love and getting love ... is falling in love

Title: Kuchh Meetha Ho Jaye
Quote: Na umeed hai, na sharaab hai ... soorat-e-haal kaafi kharab hai
Trans: Neither there is hope, nor there is alcohol ... and the condition of the face is very bad

Title: Ab Tak Chhappan 2
Quote: Upar waale ne insaan ke shareer mein nau chhed kiye hai ... do kaan ke, do naak ke, do aankh ke, ek mooh ka ... baki ke do tu jaanta hai ... sapne mein bhi galat socha na, dusva chhed kar doonga
Trans: God has made 9 holes in a human body ... two for the ear, two for the nose, two for the eyes, one for the mouth ... and you know the remaining two ... now even if you think wrong in your dream, then I'll make the 10th hole

Title: Ab Tak Chhappan 2
Quote: Ghar mein hai bas chhe hi log ... chaar deewarein, chatt aur main ... raat sahuli ek saheli, gora chitta din hai dost ... ghar mein hai bas chhe hi log ... tehelne nikle tanha parchai, main bhi uske peeche chaloon ... neele ambar ke kagaz par panchi hokar chitra banoon ... indradhanush ki tirchi daali par chipki geeli geeli aus ... ghar mein hai bas chhe hi log ... chaar deewarein, chatt aur main
Trans: There are only six people in the house ... four walls, the roof and me ... the night is my girlfriend, and the fair day is my buddy ... there are only six people in the house ... the saddened shadow is going for a walk, and I'm going behind it ... may I become like a bird in a picture on the canvas of the blue sky ... and like a moist dew drop on a branch under the rainbow ... there are only six people in the house ... four walls, the roof and me

Title: Ab Tak Chhappan 2
Quote: Force kisi ke baap ki jagir nahi hai ... force ki apni ek dignity hai ... us dignity ko barkarar rakhna hamari zimmedari hai
Trans: The force is not a property of someone's father ... the force has it's own dignity ... and to maintain that dignity is our responsibility

Title: Ab Tak Chhappan 2
Quote: Gandhiki jab tak deewar par the humne haar pehnaye ... note par aa gaye, humne jeb mein daal liye
Trans: Until Mahatma Gandhi was on the wall we used to put a garland around him ... now he's come on money, and we have put him in our pockets

Title: Hum To Mohabbat Karega
Quote: Ek mujrim kanoon se bhaag sakta hai ... lekin doosre mujrim se nahi
Trans: A criminal can run from the law ... but not from an other criminal

Title: Hum To Mohabbat Karega
Quote: Aaj apna pehla mulaqat, khane ke liye daal bhat ... khana khale aaj mere saath, khana khale bill ka kya baat
Trans: Today is our first meeting, we have lentil rice to eat ... eat with me today and don't worry about the bill

Title: Hum To Mohabbat Karega
Quote: Tum toh un jaali noton se bhi zyada jaali nikle ... joh bazaar mein chalte hai
Trans: You turned out to be more counterfeit than counterfeit money ... which runs in the market

Title: Naajayaz
Quote: Maa ka dil sab kuch jaanta hai ... bete ka sukh, bete ka dukh ... sab kuch usse pehle se hi maloom hota hai
Trans: The heart of a mother knows everything ... happiness of her son, sadness of her son ... it knows everything before hand

Title: Naajayaz
Quote: Main tum jaise logon ke saath sauda nahi karta ... sirf faisla karta hoon
Trans: I don't make a deal with people like you ... I only take decisions

Title: Naajayaz
Quote: Main kudrat ki jayaz aulad hoon jisne mujhe sab kuch diya hai ... yeh dhoop, yeh chaun, yeh zameen, yeh aasmaan sab kuch ... bas nahi mila toh sirf ek municipality ka birth certificate nahi mila
Trans: I'm a legal child of nature who has given me everything ... this sunshine, this shade, this ground, this sky, everything ... if I haven't got one thing, then that is a birth certificate from the municipality

Title: Naajayaz
Quote: Insaani rishton ko kayam rakhne ke liye kabhi kabhi jhoot bolna bahut zaroori hai
Trans: To maintain human relationships sometimes it becomes very important to lie

Title: Watan Ke Rakhwale
Quote: Kutte kamine tu mujhse bachkar nahi ja sakta ... main tujhe dhoond nikaloonga, main tujhe pataal se bhi dhoond nikaloonga ... aur main tujhe dhoondkar tera kaleja cheer doonga, main tera pet phaad daloonga ... haramzade tu mujhse bachkar nahi ja sakta
Trans: You can't escape from me you bloody dog ... I'll find you, I'll even find you from the world below the earth ... and after I find you I'll tear apart your throat and rip your stomach ... you can't escape from me you bastard

Title: Watan Ke Rakhwale
Quote: Jaldi se chalte bano varna aaisi laat maaroonga ki football ki tarah goalpost se latakkar ... baar baar goal hote rahoge
Trans: Get out from here quickly or else I'll give you such a kick that you'll hang from the goalpost like a football ... and you'll be goaled again and again

Title: Watan Ke Rakhwale
Quote: Khatron se khelna hamara business hai, hamara karobar hai ... hamare paas maut ki factory hai ... hum maut banate jaate hai aur society mein bechte jaate hai
Trans: Playing with danger is our business, it's our trade ... we have a factory of death ... we keep making death and we keep selling it in the society

Title: Watan Ke Rakhwale
Quote: Agar doobara tumne hum dono ki zindagi mein phir se koi gadbad karne ki koshish ki ... toh maar maarkar tumhari shakal aaisi bighad doonga ... ki museum waale bhi apne showcase mein nahi rakhenge
Trans: If you even try to create a problem in both our lives again ... then I'll beat you up and damage your face such that ... even the people of the museum won't keep it in their showcase

Title: Paap Ko Jalaa Kar Raakh Kar Doonga
Quote: Tune apni zindagi mein bade bade shaitan dekhe honge ... lekin aaj teri mulaqat shaitanon ke shahenshah Shaadilal se ho rahi hai ... jiske paas insaan toh kya, khud shaitan panah maangne aate hai
Trans: You might have seen big devils in your life ... but today you're meeting with the king of devils called Shaadilal ... and forget humans, even devils themselves come to him asking for shelter

Title: Paap Ko Jalaa Kar Raakh Kar Doonga
Quote: Jinke paas sirf pahunch hoti hai, unke paas kabiliyat nahi hoti ... meri pahunch meri wafaadari tak hai, meri imaandari tak hai, meri pahunch meri mehnat tak hai ... aur iske badaulat main apne mukaam par zaroor pahunch jaonga
Trans: Those who only have influence, they don't have potential ... my influence is till my faithfulness, till my honesty, my hard work ... and with that I'll definitely reach my goal

Title: Paap Ko Jalaa Kar Raakh Kar Doonga
Quote: Sachche pyar mein koi paap punya, achcha bura kuch nahi hota ... pyar bas pyar hota hai
Trans: In true love there is no sin or virtue, there is no good or bad ... love is just love

Title: Paap Ko Jalaa Kar Raakh Kar Doonga
Quote: Meri kamyaabi ke peeche ... tadbeer meri hai aur taqdeer meri maa ki hai
Trans: Behind my success ... is my planning and my mother's luck

Title: Tum Mere Ho
Quote: Jab bete ki ghar mein shikayatein aane lage aur gaon mein charcha hone lage ... toh samjho beta jawan ho gaya
Trans: When the complaints for a son start coming into the house and people start talking about it in the village ... then understand that he has become young

Title: Tum Mere Ho
Quote: Meri nazar padne se pehle isse itni door le jana ... ki hawa bhi iska pata mujh tak na pahuncha sake
Trans: Before I see him again, take him so far away ... that even the wind won't be able to give his address to me

Title: Superstar
Quote: Apni poori zindagi hi filmy hai
Trans: My whole life is cinematic

Title: Superstar
Quote: Aapki pehchaan woh nahi hoti joh koi aur aapko de ... aapki pehchaan woh hoti hai joh koi aapse le na sake
Trans: You identity is not something that someone else gives you ... your identity is something that no one else can take it from you

Title: Superstar
Quote: Star banne ki recipe bahut hi simple hai ... ek cup Amitabh ka talent li jiye, usse barson dheemi aanch par rakhiye ... uske baad us mein aada cup Shahrukh ka charm mila di jiye ... usse ubaaliye ... uske baad us mein do chamach Aamir ki intensity, ek chamach Hrithik ka dance ... is sabko achchi tarah mix kar di jiye ... uske baad us mein Salman ke looks ka takda laga di jiye ... bas aapka superstar tayaar hai
Trans: The recipe to become a star is very simple ... take one cup of Amitabh's talent, and cook it on slow gas for years ... after that add half a cup of Shahrukh's charm to it ... and boil it ... after that add two spoons of Aamir's intensity, one spoon of Hrithik's dance ...  and mix well all of that together ... after that temper it with the spicy looks of Salman ... and then your superstar is ready

Title: Superstar
Quote: Is shehar mein jab roshni ki aadat padh jaye na ... toh andheron se darr lagne lagta hai
Trans: In this city when you get used to the light ... then you start fearing darkness

Title: Boy Friend
Quote: Zindagi hazaron karvatein badalti hai ... aur ek din aapki zindagi ek aaisi karvat badlegi ... jiski lapet mein aakar aap apna tamaam business bhool jayenge
Trans: Life takes thousands of turns ... and one day your life will take such a turn ... in which you'll get caught and you'll forget your entire business

Title: Boy Friend
Quote: Daulat ka nasha bhang se zyada tezz hota hai
Trans: The intoxication from money is much more than the beverage made from cannabis leaves and flowers

Title: Basant
Quote: Bholi bhali shakal waale hote hai jallad se ... bewafaaon se pyar kaun kare, husn ka aitbaar kaun kare
Trans: Those who have innocent faces are like executioners ... no one wants to love the dishonest people, no one wants to trust a beautiful body

Title: Basant

Trans: Where is that girl in whose scarf a person can hide his face and forget the entire world ... where is that girl seeing whom the heart says, that there is sweetness and you on this side, but who knows what will be there on the other side ... where is that girl seeing whom I feel that, the one who I was searching for since ages is here ... where is that girl for whom Rabindranath Tagore had said that, your blue eyes are like a deep lake, and I wish to drown in that ... where is that girl who will jump with me in crazy waves of the sea, where is that girl who will come with me

Title: Basant
Quote: Deewana banana hai toh deewana bana de ... varna kahin taqdeer tamasha na bana de

Title: Money Hai Toh Honey Hai

Title: Money Hai Toh Honey Hai

Title: Rules: Pyaar Ka Superhit Formula

Trans: For a woman there is no difference between loving and expressing love ... but for a man loving is very easy, but expressing love is very hard

Title: Rules: Pyaar Ka Superhit Formula

Trans: When we grow old our eyes become weak ... but our heart is able to see much more clearer than before

Title: Rules: Pyaar Ka Superhit Formula

Trans: Running behind a man is like making him run away from you ... let him run behind you

Trans: In life love is that only one thing for which no matter what price you have to pay ... it's less

Title: Waah! Tera Kya Kehna

Trans: What are you staring at me with these big big eyes for ... I'll cut your neck like a chicken, and I'll put it in chicken biryani

Title: Waah! Tera Kya Kehna

Trans: I'm a Hyderabadi girl ... I'll remove your eyes and play marbles with it

Title: Waah! Tera Kya Kehna
Quote: Teri kahani se mujhko ek sabak mila hai ... ke waqt se pehle aur taqdeer se zyada kisko mila hai ... uska insaaf dekh ke yeh lazmi hai yeh kehna ... waah tera kya kehna, waah tera kya kehna
Trans: Your story has taught me a lesson ... that no one has got anything before time and more than destiny ... looking at his (god's) justice it's essential to say ... wow you're great, wow you're great

Title: Waah! Tera Kya Kehna
Quote: Sabak wafaa ka sikhaya bhi ja nahi sakta ... joh seekh lo toh bhulaya bhi ja nahi sakta .. yeh haseen dard dil mein chupaya bhi ja nahi sakta ... aur koi pooche toh bataya bhi ja nahi sakta
Trans: The lesson of loyalty cannot be taught ... if you learn it then you can't forget it ... this beautiful pain can't be hidden in the heart ... and if anyone asks then it can't be told either

Trans: Only what she says gets done and with style ... because when she walks then people say ... how gracefully is she walking

Title: Chala Mussaddi Office Office

Trans: Even if the sun becomes cold ... even if the chicken becomes the egg ... even if a government officer takes bribe and opens his mouth ... even if god himself comes to this office and says ... we won't consider Mussaddilal alive

Trans: In the cricket of life there is no draw ... you either win or you lose ... and the one who is on the top wins ... and the one who is not down is on the top

Title: Chhoti Si Baat

Trans: No way is illegitimate to achieve love

Title: Karam

Title: Karam

Trans: He went away and left his memories behind ... some incomplete dreams, some incomplete promises

Title: Ajab Gazabb Love

Trans: If you are making a product which has demand today ... then you're late ... a product should be something which will be in demand tomorrow

Title: Ajab Gazabb Love
Quote: Baap toh aaise hi hote hai ... khushiyon ka har tukda baant dete hai bachchon mein ... lekin gham ka ek katra bhi nahi choone dete
Trans: Fathers are like this only ... they distribute every bit of happiness with their children ... but they don't let even a drop of sadness touch them

Title: Ajab Gazabb Love

Trans: The one who does not have a dream in his eyes is the most poorest person

Trans: When we hard working people will ask for our share from this world ... not a park, not a field, but we'll ask for the entire world

Title: Dulaara

Trans: I shed my blood where you were sweating ... I considered you even bigger than a big brother ... but bloody you turned out to be a big rascal

Trans: What good is a book which doesn't have a cover ... and what good is a girl who doesn't have a lover

Trans: He looked at you from different different angles ... and you hate him with different different sandals

Trans: A lie is like a prostitute ... no matter how much you keep it behind the curtain, you cannot hide it's reality

Title: Haunted

Trans: If there is evil then there is god ... and it's not possible to fight evil without the help of god

Trans: I don't know what love is ... but I know that when a stranger feels more dearer to you than yourself ... then that is called love

Trans: I had come here to save a deal ... but now to free Meera from her captivity ... I can even put my life on the line

Trans: Very soon the biggest bungalow on this street will be Raj Malhotra's ... the building in which your office is there, the biggest office that will be there on its top floor will be Raj Malhotra's ... the biggest car that will stop on the signal will be Raj Malhotra's ... and you know it very well that I'm Raj Malhotra

Title: Kyo Kii Main Jhuth Nahin Bolta

Trans: If I'm life then Sona is breaths ... if I'm the heart then Sona is heartbeat ... if I'm thirst then Sona is water ... if I'm a flower then Sona is fragrance ... if I'm the pain then Sona is the cry

Trans: Few wives are like the TV sitting in the drawing room ... whenever you turn them on they are playing some old program ... but you're the internet ... whenever I turn you on, I see a new site

Trans: The one who loses in the game of gambling ... only he wins in the game of love

Title: Dil Vil Pyar Vyar

Trans: The distance between putting a value and paying it's price ... is only that of closing the deal

Trans: A person can pay back a loan ... but not a favour

Trans: If even a drop of mother's milk would have gone in your body ... then you would have never said such a dirty thing about a woman, about a mother

Trans: When a person becomes nude because of truth and honesty ... then people don't look at his body ... they look at his soul

Trans: In a married life if the lentil of love becomes cold ... then you should make it fresh by adding the tempering of romance in it

Trans: This marriage is not a marriage, instead it's a government formed by a union which cannot last long ... it's a boring Hindi movie which is going on and on and on since 3 hours, without ending ... it's a cricket match in which it's raining after every over ... it's a broken car whose brakes have failed, but it's going here and there in the market and crashing into people

Title: Maine Pyaar Kyun Kiya

Trans: Love has crippled Mr. Thappa ... or else even he would have done disco and bhangra

Trans: If you think that I believe in your promise, then it's a lie ... if I had faith in you, I would died with happiness

Trans: There is only one way to move forward in this world ... don't consider anyone bigger than you ... and then this world will be yours

Trans: Even science says that a heart is independent ... it doesn't need a body nor a mind to beat

Title: Traffic Signal

Trans: Be it a girl or a cigarette ... you have been habituated to take both for free

Title: Traffic Signal

Trans: All these cars that stop at our signal ... keep their model and price on one side ... and stand shoulder to shoulder in a way that ... it looks as if they are paying respect to our signal

Title: Traffic Signal
Quote: Signal pe rukne waale har ek aadmi ke bheje mein ek-hich tension rehta hai ... ki kab yeh signal apna rang badle aur kab woh idhar se nikal jaye ... idhar bitayele dus se pandra second bhi, saale ko ghante ke maafit lagte hai
Trans: Every person that stops on a signal has only one tension in his mind ... that when will this signal change its colour so that he can move ahead ... even the 10 to 15 seconds that he spends here, feels like an hour to him

Title: Traffic Signal

Trans: After this if you guys call me for a loan ... then you guys will have to take a loan from your bank itself to free yourself from here

Title: Ekkees Toppon Ki Salaami

Trans: If wings were used to fly then a peacock would have flown the highest ... flight happens with ambitions

Title: Ekkees Toppon Ki Salaami

Trans: Honesty is not bought in the market and neither it's a few words written on a paper that you remember ... honesty is a sacrament

Trans: A soldier receives honour as long as he lives ... but even after becoming a martyr he gets a salute of 21 guns

Title: Thoda Pyaar Thoda Magic

Trans: We all have a little bit of tears written in our life ... and to erase them we need a little bit of help, a little bit of love, a little bit of magic

Title: Thoda Pyaar Thoda Magic
Quote: Koi aur jeete, uske liye aaise dil se taali bajao jaise tum apne liye sunna chahti ho ... toh is tarah kabhi koi haarta nahi hai ... hum sub kisi na kisi tarah jeet ke hissedaar hote hai
Trans: When someone else wins, clap for them from your heart just the way you wanted to hear the claps for youself ... that way no one loses ... we all become a part of the victory in some way or the other

Title: Thoda Pyaar Thoda Magic

Trans: The best but difficult thing to do ... is to forgive someone

Trans: Relations are not built just by birth ... they are also built with love

Title: Tera Mera Saath Rahen

Trans: Old age is a very bad thing ... and even worse than that is loneliness in the old age
