Trans: I used to live in an one bedroom house ... and today I don't know how many bedrooms are there in my house

Title: Uuf Kya Jaadoo Mohabbat Hai

Trans: When the relationships are clean ... then there is no need for an explanation

Trans: When someone wears with love, something that has been given to them with love ... then they look more beautiful

Title: Ek Mahal Ho Sapno Ka

Trans: Ask me what's the reality ... the person whom you'll give your love, has no need for money

Title: Ek Mahal Ho Sapno Ka

Trans: There is no difference between a woman and alcohol ... both of them do the job of starting a fire

Title: Ek Mahal Ho Sapno Ka

Trans: The one who decorates the balcony of my dreams ... do you mention me somewhere in your dream

Title: Ek Mahal Ho Sapno Ka
Quote: Uljhe dhaagon ka sera toh mil jaata hai ... lekin uljhi zindagi ka sera badi mushkil se milta hai
Trans: You can straighten up tangled thread ... but it's very hard to straighten up tangled life

Title: Sunday
Quote: Bas yahi apradh main har baar karta hoon ... aadmi hoon aadmi se pyar karta hoon
Trans: I commit only this crime every time ... I'm a man and I love a man

Title: Sunday
Quote: Meri zindagi sasti ho gayi hai ... aur mera jeena mehenga ho gaya hai
Trans: My life has become cheap ... and my living has become expensive

Title: Sunday
Quote: Aaj kal ke Hindustani Coke peete hai, Pepsi peete hai, bhool gaye nimbu pani ... phir bhi dil hai Hindustani ... FTV, MTV, Channel V, bhool gaye Akashvani ... phir bhi dil hai Hindustani ... Reserve Bank khali, Swiss Bank mein saara maal pani ... phir bhi dil hai Hindustani?
Trans: The Indians of today drink Coke, drink Pepsi, and they have forgotten lemon juice ... but still they are Indian at heart ... FTV, MTV, Channel V, and they have forgotten Akashvani (Indian radio channel) ... but still they are Indian at heart ... the Reserve Bank in empty, and all the money is in the Swiss Bank ... but still they are Indian at heart?

Title: Sunday
Quote: Minister ki nishani aur kaam gairkanooni ... phir bhi dil hai Hindustani?
Trans: He has the signs of a Minister and does illegal work ... but still he is Indian at heart?

Title: Haqeeqat
Quote: Jis darakht ki jadh mein saanp ka bil ho ... parinde uski shaakon par ghosla nahi banate
Trans: The root of a tree that has a snake hole ... birds don't make a nest on its branches

Title: Haqeeqat
Quote: Paap ki umar bahut lambi hoti hai ... lekin paapi ki umar bahut choti
Trans: The life of a sin is very long ... but the life of a sinful person is very short

Title: Haqeeqat
Quote: Aap itne mohtaj nahi ki aaisi roti na kama sako ... joh imaandari ke aate se bani ho aur sachchai ki aanch par pakki ho
Trans: You're not that dependent that you can't earn a bread ... which is made from the dough of honesty and baked on the flame of truth

Title: Haqeeqat
Quote: Apni hi karni ka phal hai naiki aur ruswaiyan ... aap hi ke sang chalengi aap ki parchaiyan
Trans: Virtue and stigma are the results of our own deeds ... your shadows will walk only with you

Title: Madam X
Quote: Galatfahmi mein jeene waale ... asliyat mein mar jaate hai
Trans: Those who live in misapprehension ... die in reality

Title: Madam X
Quote: Vasuli mein hum rupaye nahi ... samne waale ke maathe par pasine ki boondein ginte hai
Trans: I don't count money when it comes to recovery ... I count the number of drops of sweat on the person in front of me

Title: Madam X
Quote: Hum hai maut ki woh express ... duniya jise kehti hai Madam X
Trans: I'm that express of death ... which the world calls as Madam X

Title: Madam X
Quote: Main uske jism par itne zakhm kar doonga ... ki sirf zakhm hi zakhm nazar aayenge ... jism nahi
Trans: I'll make so many wounds on her body ... that only wounds will be seen ... and not her body

Title: Dus Kahaniyaan
Quote: Shareer ke rishton se bhi alag kuch rishtey hote hai ... zindagi aur maut ke rishtey ... insaaniyat ke rishtey
Trans: There are some relationships other than the relationship of body ... the relationships of life and death ... the relationships of humanity

Title: Dus Kahaniyaan
Quote: Coffee bhi baimaan cheez hai ... woh dekhti hai usse peene waala kaun hai ... us hisaab se banti hai
Trans: Coffee is not a trustworthy thing ... it looks at the person who is going to drink it ... and based on that it prepares itself

Title: Dus Kahaniyaan
Quote: Kuch kahaniyan sunane ke liye nahi ... sirf yaad rakhne ke liye hoti hai
Trans: Some stories are not meant to be told ... they are there only to be remembered

Title: Dus Kahaniyaan
Quote: All good things have to come to an end ... for better things
Trans: All good things have to come to an end ... for better things

Title: Tere Mere Phere
Quote: Aadmi ki sabse badi tradegy kya hai pata hai? ... log lust ko pyar samajhne lagte hai
Trans: Do you know what's the biggest tradegy of a person ... people think lust is love

Title: Tere Mere Phere
Quote: Umar ke saath saath na parents bachche ban jaate hai aur bachche parents
Trans: With age parents become children and children become parents

Title: Tere Mere Phere
Quote: Zyada chalaaki karne ki koshish ki na ... toh aaisa gayab kar doonga pahadon mein ki cheelon ko bhi khabar nahi hogi
Trans: Don't try to act smart ... or else I'll make you disappear in the mountains in a way that even the vultures won't be able to find you

Title: Tere Mere Phere
Quote: Tum itna ooncha kyun bolti ho ... kauve khaye the kya bachpan mein?
Trans: Why do you speak so loudly ... did you eat crows in your childhood?

Title: Anamika (2008)
Quote: Zindagi itni lambi nahi hoti ki invitation ka intezar kiya jaaye
Trans: Life is not so long that we should wait for an invitation

Title: Anamika (2008)
Quote: Aap beshaq unse pyar thoda kam, lekin wafaa zyada kare
Trans: You may love him a little less, but be more loyal to him

Title: Sarhad Paar
Quote: Jiska dushman zinda hai, uski maut zinda hai ... jisne apne dushman ko maar diya, usne apni maut ko maar diya
Trans: The one whose enemy is alive, his death is alive ... the one who has killed his enemy, that person has killed his death

Title: Sarhad Paar
Quote: Hum kisi sarhad ko nahi mante ... hum kisi mulk ko bhi nahi mante ... hum sirf yeh jante hai ki uparwaale ne sirf ek hi zameen banayi hai ... aur us pe sarhaden insaan ne banayi hai
Trans: We don't believe in any border ... we also don't believe in any country ... we only know that god has made only one earth ... and humans have made boundaries on it

Title: Jab Jab Phool Khile
Quote: Ameer se uski daulat aur gareeb se uski izzat cheen lo ... toh hamesha hamesha ke liye mar jayega
Trans: If you snatch the wealth from the rich and diginity from the poor ... then they will die forever

Title: Jab Jab Phool Khile
Quote: Libaas badal dene se aatma nahi badal jaati
Trans: By changing clothes the soul doesn't change

Title: Gaja Gamini
Quote: Woh mere paas hota hai goya ... jab koi doosra nahi hota
Trans: He is around me much the same as ... when no one else is around me

Title: Gaja Gamini
Quote: Yeh kyun, kya, kahan ke uljhan mein kyun pade ... bas yeh kya kam hai ki hum sab hai aur saath hai
Trans: Why should we worry about why, what, where ... isn't it enough that we are all there and together

Title: Gaja Gamini
Quote: Soz jab dil mein utar aata hai ... nagma aankhon se nazar aata hai
Trans: When passion comes into the heart ... then you can see music through the eyes

Title: Chingaari
Quote: Jab tak rona dhona, sukh dukh hai tab tak maano zinda hai ... nahi toh saans toh chalegi lekin ehsaas mar jayega
Trans: Until there is crying and sadness, till then understand that you're living ... without that you may be breathing but the feelings will die

Title: Chingaari
Quote: Jis maathe par ek baar kalank lag jaata hai ... wahan maang ka teeka shobha nahi deta
Trans: A forehead that is marked with disgrace ... can't be adorned with a bindi (dot)

Title: Chingaari
Quote: Jahan satya hai wahan dharm hai ... aur jahan dharm hai wahan dhan hai
Trans: Where there is truth there is religion ... and where there is religion there is money

Title: Chingaari
Quote: Mere liye Allah ka vardaan aur maata ka farmaan ... sab ek samaan hai
Trans: For me the blessing of Allah and the order of goddess ... are all the same

Title: Hogi Pyaar Ki Jeet
Quote: Meri zindagi maut ke naam ho sakti hai ... lekin mere purkhon ki zameen tumhare naam nahi ho sakti
Trans: My life can be named for death ... but the land of my ancestors will never have your name on it

Title: Hogi Pyaar Ki Jeet
Quote: Aurat apne pati mein ek achcha insaan dhoondti hai ... joh usse pyar de sake, usse samajh sake, marte dum tak uska saath nibha sake
Trans: A woman searches for a good man within her husband ... the one who loves her, understands her, and stays with her until she lives

Title: Hogi Pyaar Ki Jeet
Quote: Ek din aayega main tere ghamand ke tukde tukde kar doonga ... aur teri zid ke bhi tukde tukde ho jayenge
Trans: One day will come when I'll break your pride into pieces ... and then even your stubbornness will break into pieces

Title: Hogi Pyaar Ki Jeet
Quote: Main usko aaisa dasna chahti hoon ki woh pal pal marne ke liye tadapta rahe ... aur tadap tadapkar jeeta rahe
Trans: I want to bite him in such a way that he should wriggle every moment to die ... and he should flounder and live

Title: Tum Haseen Main Jawan
Quote: Bhagwan ki bhi kya leela hai ... kisse kiska saath kahan chhuda deta hai aur kahan mila deta hai
Trans: God's play is very strange ... he separates people in one place and unites them in some other place

Title: Tum Haseen Main Jawan
Quote: Tumhe dekhte hi mere dil ka diwala aaisa nikal gaya hai jaise kisi satodiya ka nikal jaata hai ... aur mere jeevan ka karobar poora beh gaya hai ... yeh tabhi chalega jab tum apne prem ka finance mujhe dogi
Trans: The moment I saw you my heart became bankrupt just like a gambler becomes one ... and the business of my life has been washed away ... now it will only work when you'll give me the finance of your love

Title: Tum Haseen Main Jawan
Quote: Tumhe dekhne ke pehle mera dil is aaine ki tarah bilkul kora tha ... jabse tumko dekh liya tumhari tasveer is dil ne kheench li
Trans: Before seeing you my heart was completely empty like this mirror ... but since I've seen you my heart has taken a picture of yours

Title: Tum Haseen Main Jawan
Quote: Yeh badi badi aankhen, yeh rasile honth, yeh gora gora rang ... jism hai ki samundar ki leheren ... yahan uthti hui, yahan girti hui, yahan uthti hui, yahan girti hui ... jee chahta hai bas dekhta hi rahoon
Trans: These big eyes, these juicy lips, this white colour ... is it a body or the waves of the ocean ... they go up here, they go down here, they go up here, they go down here ... I wish to only keep staring at it

Title: Swami
Quote: Cheezein tab chutti hai jab dil se chhodi jaati hai
Trans: Things get left behind only when you leave them from your heart

Title: Swami
Quote: Zindagi mein koi na koi cheez toh honi chahiye joh jeene ka bahana bani rahe
Trans: In life there must be something or the other which should be the reason to stay alive

Title: Swami
Quote: South Indian se south Indian mile, kar kar lambe haath ... mera band baja diya, patang de di kisi aur ke haath
Trans: When a south Indian met another south Indian with open arms ... then I went crazy, since they gave the kite in someone else's hand

Title: Nishana
Quote: Insaan agar kisi baat ki umeed na rakhe toh na dil tootne ka afsoos hota hai ... na baad mein behosh hota hai
Trans: If a person doesn't keep a hope for anything then you don't feel sad when your heart breaks ... and neither does he faint later on

Title: Nishana
Quote: Waqt aane par na dushman ko chhodna chahiye ... na saanp ko dekhkar laathi ko todna chahiye
Trans: When the time comes you should neither leave the enemy ... nor should you break the stick on seeing a snake

Title: Nishana
Quote: Kismat hamare saath hai, uske haathon mein apna haath hai, chand chakori ki mulaqat hai, premi ko mili daulat ki saugat hai, lekin is baat mein bhi ek baat hai, shaadi ke baad main aapse poochunga daddy ... aapki kya aukaat hai?
Trans: Luck is with us, my hand is in her hand, the bird and the moon are meeting, the lover has got a gift of money, but in this thing there is also a thing, and after marriage I'll ask you daddy ... what is your status?

Title: Nishana
Quote: Ab toh baat hi baat hai, har taraf chandni raat hai, khushiyon ki barsaat hai, tera aur Kavita ka zindagi bhar ka saath hai, teri aane waali baraat hai, sari jaidaad apne haath hai ... aye kabootar rone ki kya baat hai?
Trans: Now the time is good, everywhere there is moonlit night, it's raining happiness, you and Kavita will stay together for life, your wedding procession is going to come, the whole wealth is in our hands ... so why are you crying you pigeon?

Title: Humko Tumse Pyaar Hai
Quote: Hasne waalon ke saath toh duniya hasti hai ... lekin rone waala akele hi rota hai
Trans: The world laughs with those who laugh ... but the one who cries, cries alone

Title: Humko Tumse Pyaar Hai
Quote: Sapno aur sachai mein bahut farak hota hai ... sapne toh ghar ke andar hote hai aur sachai toh darwaze pe dastak deti hai
Trans: There is a lot of difference between dreams and reality ... dreams stay inside the house and reality knocks on the door

Title: Humko Tumse Pyaar Hai
Quote: Jab badle ki baat aati hai ... toh Dubai return Rana jail se bhi return aa sakta hai
Trans: When it comes to revenge ... then Dubai return Rana can even return from jail

Title: Jwar Bhata
Quote: Uparwaala bada dayalu hai ... jahan ek darwaza band karta hai, wahan sau darwaze khol deta hai
Trans: God is very generous ... where he closes one door, over there he opens a 100 doors

Title: Jwar Bhata
Quote: Yeh duniya bhagwan ka bank hai ... joh dharti pe jama karwayega ... woh swarg mein cash karwayega
Trans: This world is a bank of god ... the one who deposits on earth ... he will cash out in heaven

Title: Jwar Bhata
Quote: Mirch ke bagair khana aaise hota hai jaise chand ke bagair puranmashi ki raat, koyle ke bagair engine aur pani ke bagair kuaan
Trans: Without spice food is like a full moon night without the moon, engine without coal and a well without water

Title: Jwar Bhata
Quote: Baatein karodo ki aur dakshina kaudiyo ki
Trans: You talk about crores and you remunerate hardly anything

Title: Fruit & Nut
Quote: Omar sharifon ki tarah behave karo
Trans: Omar behave like good people

Title: Fruit & Nut
Quote: Mera dil bada hai ... I have expanded my heart
Trans: I have a big heart ... I have expanded my heart

Title: Fruit & Nut
Quote: Kyun taqleef utha rahe hai ... why are you lifting trouble?
Trans: Why are you taking the trouble ... of lifting trouble?

Title: Fruit & Nut
Quote: Aap kis zamane ki baat kar rahe hai, I don't understand ... aap toh VT station se bhi purane hai
Trans: What era are you talking about, I don't understand ... you are older than the VT (Victoria Terminus) station

Title: Hey Ram
Quote: Gandhi is the only sanity in this country
Trans: Gandhi is the only sanity in this country

Title: Hey Ram
Quote: Dharm aur raajneeti ka combination bahut khatarnak hai ... ekdum jaise ki sex aur violence ka
Trans: The combination of religion and politics is very dangerous ... just like sex and violence

Title: Bachke Rehna Re Baba
Quote: Hamare naseeb mein champagne nahi ... sirf pain hai
Trans: We don't have champagne in our destiny ... we only have pain

Title: Bachke Rehna Re Baba
Quote: Ek achchi life jeene ke liye rules nahi hone chahiye
Trans: To live a good life there should be no rules

Title: Bachke Rehna Re Baba
Quote: Main tujhse pyar da petrol maanga tha ... tune toh petrol chidakkar meri pyar di gaadi hi jala di
Trans: I had asked you for the petrol of love ... but you sprayed petrol over and burned the car of my love

Title: Well Done Abba
Quote: Yeh fareban baaton ki machine gun ghumakar ... mere dil, dimaag aur gurde ka chindiyan bana diya
Trans: These cheaters spun the machine gun of talks ... and made pieces of my heart, brain and kidney

Title: Well Done Abba
Quote: Badi achchi baat hai ... din mein bhi raat hai ... chalo Allah hamare saath hai
Trans: It's alright ... there is night even during the day ... and Allah is with us

Title: Well Done Abba
Quote: Bekaar mein nakko seena taan ... bolo mohabbat ki zubaan
Trans: Don't widen your chest for no use ... just speak the language of love

Title: Well Done Abba
Quote: Makkaron se kabhi mat daro ... daro toh apne aap se ... aur daro toh dar darke zinda rehne se
Trans: Never fear cunning people ... if you want to fear then fear yourself ... and if you want to fear then fear from living in fear

Title: Military Raaj
Quote: Ghar aaye mehmaan ko salute dekar uski izzat karna hamare desh ki parampara hai ... aur dushman ke ghar mein ghuskar usse phoond dena hamari army ki shaan hai
Trans: It's the tradition of our country to salute the guest that comes homes and give them respect ... and it's the pride of our army to enter the enemies house and kill them

Title: Military Raaj
Quote: Kuch nasoor itne ghinaune hote hai ki aadmi unka dard toh seh sakta hai ... magar unhe kisi ko dikha nahi sakta
Trans: Some ulcers are so bad that a person can bear it's pain ... but he can't show them to anyone

Title: Military Raaj
Quote: Zamane bhar ki logon ki auladen pehda hokar paalne mein palti hai ... lekin hamari auladen seedhi kursi par behetti hai
Trans: The children of the world after being born are nurtured in a swing ... but my children sit directly on the chair (position)

Title: Military Raaj
Quote: Jab raajneeti ho dagabaaz ... toh janta maange military raaj
Trans: When politics is unfaithful ... then people ask for the military rule

Title: One 2 Ka 4
Quote: Khichdi ke hai dost char ... dahi, papad, mirchi, aachar
Trans: Porridge has four friends ... curd, papadum, pepper, pickle

Title: One 2 Ka 4
Quote: Jahan chanda hoga wahan chakori hogi ... jahan thali hogi wahan katori hogi ... aur jahan tu hoga wahan main hongi
Trans: Where there is moon there will be a bird ... where there is a plate there will be a bowl ... and where you're there, I'll be there

Title: Kunwara Baap
Quote: Petrol ka bhav badh gaya ... tarkaari ka bhav badh gaya ... tera bhav bhi badh gaya kya?
Trans: The price of petrol has gone up ... the price of vegetables has gone up ... has your price also gone up or what?

Title: Kunwara Baap
Quote: Inhe aaisa kadva aadmi hai ki agar ganderi khake thukenga ... toh uspe makkhi bhi nahi behethengi
Trans: He is such a bitter person that if he eats sugarcane and spits ... then even a mosquito won't sit on that

Title: Sharmilee
Quote: Hawa badal gayi hai aaisi kuch zamaane ki ... duayen maangta hoon hosh mein aane ki
Trans: The winds of the world have changed such that ... I keep praying so that I can come back to my senses

Title: Sharmilee
Quote: Gulshan parast hoon mujhe gul hi nahi aziz ... kaanto se bhi nibah kiye ja raha hoon main
Trans: I worship the garden and I not only like the flowers ... but I'm even carrying on with the thorns

Title: Sharmilee
Quote: Haya se sar jhuka lena, ada se muskura dena ... haseeno ko bhi kitna sehal hai, bijli gira dena
Trans: Bowing down your head in shyness, smiling with style ... it's so easy for beauties, to shock someone

Title: Sharmilee
Quote: Chaman mein ikhtalat-e-rangboo se baat banti hai ... hum hi hum hai toh kya hum hai ... tum hi tum ho toh kya tum ho
Trans: A garden looks good with colour and fragrance both ... what am I if I am all by myself ... what are you if you are all by yourself

Title: Zulmi
Quote: Dushman chatt ke neeche aa jaye ... toh mehmaan ban jaata hai
Trans: When an enemy comes under your roof ... then he becomes a guest

Title: Zulmi
Quote: Dushman ke ghar mein daakhil hone ke liye ... tameez ki nahi taqat ki zaroorat hoti hai
Trans: To enter the enemies house ... you need courage and not manners

Title: Zulmi
Quote: Jis tarah chalaang lagane ke liye khiladi ko peeche aana padta hai ... ussi tarah dushman ko jadh se ukhaadne ke liye kabhi jhukna bhi padta hai
Trans: Just like a player has to take a step back to jump forward ... just like that sometimes to uproot your enemy you have to bow down also

Title: Zulmi
Quote: Jab dimaag mein gussa ho aur aankhon mein nafrat ... toh nishana theek nahi lagta hai
Trans: When there is anger in the mind and hatred in the eyes ... then you can't aim properly

Title: Khwahish
Quote: Zindagi mein kuch khwahishen poori ho jaati hai aur kuch dil hi mein reh jaati hai ... yahi zindagi hai, yahi zindagi hai
Trans: Some desires in life get fulfilled and some just remain in the heart ... this is life, this is life

Title: Khwahish
Quote: Shaadi duniya ko dikhane ke liye nahi ... duniya mein rehne ke liye ki jaati hai
Trans: A marriage is not done to show to the world ... it's done to stay in the world

Title: Parvarish
Quote: Logon ko intezaar karvane ke baad mehfil mein jao toh taaliyon se swagat hota hai ... waqt se pehle pahunch jao toh khud taali baja bajakar aane waale ka swagat karna padta hai
Trans: If you make people wait and then enter the party then you are welcomed with an applause ... and if you reach before time then you have to applaud and welcome the people coming

Title: Parvarish
Quote: Kanoon ke raaste mein agar koi aaye toh kanoon nahi tootna chahiye ... chahe rishtey toot jaye
Trans: If someone comes in between the law then the law should not break ... even if the relationships break

Title: Parvarish
Quote: Chashm-e-baddoor gar khush qadoqamat hogi ... aaj fitna hai chand roz mein qayamat hogi
Trans: Far be the evil eye if the stature is happy ... today the problem is that the end will come in a few days

Title: Parvarish
Quote: Record mein agar daag laga toh mitt bhi sakta hai ... lekin ek baar zindagi mein daag lag gaya toh kabhi nahi mitt sakta
Trans: If a mark gets applied on a record then it can be erased ... but if a mark gets applied on life then it can never be erased

Title: Mumbai Can Dance Saalaa
Quote: Haram ka paisa jab aata hai na ... toh insaan harami ban jata hai
Trans: When illegal money comes along ... then a person becomes a bastard

Title: Mumbai Can Dance Saalaa
Quote: Jaise bajhti hai ghanti ... vaise hai meri pyari pyari aunty
Trans: The way a bell rings ... just like that my aunt is sweet

Title: Jawani Zindabad
Quote: Bhagwan se toh kayi baar aapko maang liya hai ... bas ab aapse aapko maangna baaki hai
Trans: I have asked god many a times for you ... but now what's remaining is to ask you for you

Title: Jawani Zindabad
Quote: Agar kabhi phir se shaadi karoonga toh aaisi khubsoorat ladki se ... joh hotel mein entry kare toh lage Sridevi, drawing room mein behti ho toh Madhuri Dixit, aur andar ke room mein ho toh Kimi Khaatpar ... matlab Katkar
Trans: If I ever get married again then I'll marry such a beautiful girl ... who looks like Sridevi when she enters a hotel, Madhuri Dixit when she is sitting in the drawing room, and Kimi Khaatpar when she is in the room inside ... I mean Katkar

Title: Jawani Zindabad
Quote: Apni zindagi toh aaise chal rahi hai jaise ee desh ko tohri sarkar ... bina engine ke handle, upar se scandal pe scandal
Trans: My life is going on just like your government for this country ... it's a handle without an engine, and on top of that there are many scandals

Title: Jawani Zindabad
Quote: Pair choone se bade chote nahi ho jaate hai ... magar chote joh hai woh khote zaroor ho jaate hai
Trans: By touching the feet a big person doesn't become small ... but a small person definitely becomes insincere

Title: Bombay To Bangkok
Quote: Chahe juda ho dono ke jahan, phir bhi judi hai dekho taqdeerein ... pyar ki koi sarhad na zubaan, pyar na maane koi zanjeerein
Trans: Even if both our worlds are separate, still our destinies are connected ... love has no boundaries nor language, love doesn't believe in any shackles

Title: Bombay To Bangkok
Quote: Sacha pyar life mein ek baar aata hai ... aur jab aata hai toh achanak koi aaise roop mein jiska hum andaza nahi kar sakte
Trans: True love comes only once in life ... and when it comes, then it suddenly comes in such a disguise which we can't even think of

Title: Bombay To Bangkok
Quote: When you have eliminated the impossible ... whatever remains, however improbable ... must be the truth
Trans: When you have eliminated the impossible ... whatever remains, however improbable ... must be the truth

Title: Bombay To Bangkok
Quote: Jaldi mein woh chala kaha na goodbye ... ticket lekin gira gaya, ja raha hai Dubai
Trans: He left in a hurry without saying goodbye ... but he dropped the ticket, and he is going to Dubai

Title: Maa
Quote: Ek aurat jab tak maa nahi banti ... woh adhoori rehti hai
Trans: Until a woman becomes a mother ... she remains incomplete

Title: Maa
Quote: Tawaif aur titli mein koi farak nahi hota ... titli bhi ek phool par nahi tikti aur tawaif ek mard par
Trans: There is no difference between a prostitute and a butterfly ... a butterfly doesn't stick to one flower and a prostitute doesn't stick to one man

Title: Maa
Quote: Pyar ke mamle mein aur khane ke mamle mein ... doosre ki marzi mein apni marzi ki taang nahi adana chahiye
Trans: When it comes to love and food ... you should not force your wishes upon the wishes of others

Title: Maa
Quote: Haai gul-e-gulzar, jaan-e-bahar ... vaise kaafi ho vazandar
Trans: You are the flower of my garden, spring of my life ... but you're quite heavy

Title: Ek Se Badhkar Ek
Quote: Jahan the wahin hai, na koi izafa hai ... halaat yeh hai ki, na mazmoon hai na lifafa hai
Trans: We are where we were, there is no increment ... the condition is such that, there is no paper and neither an envelope

Title: Ek Se Badhkar Ek
Quote: Apne paap maqsad se is kadar hath gaye ... phadna tha dushman ko, khud hi phat gaye
Trans: Because of our sin we got so disturbed ... that we had to tear apart the enemy, but we ourselves got torn

Title: Ek Se Badhkar Ek
Quote: Bewakoof kahin ke yahi toh maar khate hai ... karne se pehle hi sab kuch bol dete hai ... aur hum kar dete hai ... pata bhi nahi chalta
Trans: Fools lose just because of this ... they say everything before doing it ... and we do it ... and no one even comes to know

Title: Kya Love Story Hai
Quote: Agar tumhe kuch chahiye toh usse haasil karne ke liye tumhe ladna padta hai ... chahe woh kamyaabi ho ya pyar
Trans: If you want something then you have to fight to get it ... whether it's success or love

Title: Kya Love Story Hai
Quote: Joh kuch nahi karta ... uska kuch nahi hota
Trans: The one who doesn't do anything ... nothing will happen for him

Title: Kya Love Story Hai
Quote: Jisse jitni door jaana hota hai ... safar utni hi jaldi shuru karna padta hai
Trans: The farther one wants to go ... the earlier he has to start his journey

Title: Kya Love Story Hai
Quote: Rishtey waqt se nahi, jazbaaton se mazboot hote hai ... kabhi koi ek saal tak janane ke baad bhi apne dil ki baat nahi samajh paata ... toh kabhi koi kisi ko ek pal mein apna jeevan saathi maan leta hai
Trans: Relationships become strong by emotions and not by time ... sometimes even after knowing someone for a year we still don't know what our heart wants ... and sometimes in one moment we consider someone to be our life partner

Title: Hum Hain Bemisaal
Quote: Hamare dhande mein dushman khatam nahi hote ... mehmaano ki tarah ek jaata hai toh doosra chala aata hai
Trans: Enemies never end in our business ... like guests one goes and another one comes along

Title: Hum Hain Bemisaal
Quote: Jitni himmat mujh mein goli chalane ki hai ... usse kahi zyada himmat goli khane ki hai
Trans: The amount of courage that I have to fire a bullet ... much more than that I have the courage to take a bullet

Title: Hum Hain Bemisaal
Quote: Tutisha ka record hai ... uske tamachon ke nishaan gaal par se mitt jaate hai ... lekin dimaag par se nahi mittate
Trans: It's a record of Tutisha ... that the marks from his slaps may get erased from the cheeks ... but they can't be erased from the mind

Title: Hum Hain Bemisaal
Quote: Sher jab ghayal ho jaata hai ... toh shikari ke liye maut ban jaata hai
Trans: When a tiger gets wounded ... he then becomes death for the hunter

Title: Fun2shh: Dudes in the 10th Century
Quote: Yeh kaisi hai majboori ... hoon bin tumhare adhoori ... yeh sadiyon ki doori ... kya hogi ichcha poori ... jab pyar kiya toh darna kya ... hum mein hoga karna kya ... bhaag chalogi mere saath ... jab tum kaho din ho ya raat ... duniya se darr nahi jaogi ... bin tumhare mar nahi jaongi
Trans: What is this compulsion ... I'm incomplete without you ... this separation is from generations ... will our wish be fulfilled ... why fear if we are in love ... what will we have to do ... will you run away with me ... whenever you say be it day or night ... won't you be scared of the world ... I'll die without you

Title: Fun2shh: Dudes in the 10th Century
Quote: Tum ek number ke chor, luchche, lafangey, bhagode ho ... desh ke jawano ke naam pe kalank ho ... zeherilay saanp ka dank ho
Trans: You're a thief, scoundrel, rascal, fugitive of top quality ... you're a disgrace in the name of youth of this country ... you're a bite of a poisonous snake

Title: Fun2shh: Dudes in the 10th Century
Quote: Joh dikhta hai woh hota nahi ... aur joh hota hai woh dikhta nahi
Trans: What can be seen doesn't exists ... and what exists can't be seen

Title: Fun2shh: Dudes in the 10th Century
Quote: Aaj jurm ko nahi roka gaya toh kal bilkul nahi rukne payega ... agar abhi nahi pakde toh phir pakadna mushkil ho jayega
Trans: If we don't stop crime today then we won't be able to stop it at all ... if we don't catch them now then it'll be difficult to catch them

Title: Main Meri Patni Aur Woh
Quote: India mein koi cheez ho na ho ... shaadi badi aasani se ho jaati hai
Trans: Whether anything happens or not in India ... but you can get married easily

Title: Main Meri Patni Aur Woh
Quote: Aapke mann mein joh bhi hai woh bata dena chahiye ... isse khud ka hi nahi aapke aas paas rehne waalon ka mann bhi halka ho jaata hai
Trans: You should say whatever is there in your heart ... with that not only yours but the people around you also feel light hearted

Title: Main Meri Patni Aur Woh
Quote: Ek pal mein poori zindagi badalne ki taqat hoti hai
Trans: One moment has the power to change the entire life

Title: Main Meri Patni Aur Woh
Quote: Khane ke baad aaram karna bhi utna hi zaroori hai ... jitna khujli hone par khujlana
Trans: To relax after eating is as important as ... it is to itch when you feel itchy

Title: Saugandh
Quote: Sarang ka sar sulhi par chad sakta hai, barood ki tarah phat sakta hai, kat sakta hai ... magar jhuk nahi sakta
Trans: Sarang's head can be hanged, it can blast like gunpowder, it can be slit ... but it won't bow down

Title: Saugandh
Quote: Joh ladki raat ke andhere mein ghar se bhaag jaati hai ... usse din ke ujale mein log taane maar maarkar marne par majboor kar dete hai
Trans: A girl who runs away from her house in the darkness of night ... people keep taunting her in broad daylight and compel her to die

Title: Saugandh
Quote: Mard ki taqat uski aankhon mein hoti hai ... lekin aurat ki taqat uski zubaan hoti hai
Trans: The strength of a man lies in his eyes ... but the strength of a woman are her words

Title: Saugandh
Quote: Agar ghar ka mard bighad jaye toh sirf ek nasal barbaad hoti hai ... lekin agar ek aurat bighad jaye toh us ghar ki saat nasalen tabah ho jaati hai
Trans: If the man of the house goes rogue then only one generation is destroyed ... but if a woman goes rogue then seven generations of that house are destroyed

Title: Julie
Quote: Shaadi mein sirf do jism nazdeek nahi aate ... unki aatmaon ka bhi milan hota hai
Trans: In a marriage not only two bodies come near ... but their souls also unite

Title: Julie
Quote: Tera mera sheeshay ka ghar ... phir kyun dono ke haath mein patthar ... main bhi soochon, tu bhi sooch ... kya tujhe maloom na tha leheren aati hai, jaati hai ... phir bhi kyun likha naam ret par ... tu bhi sooch, main bhi soochon ... kyun teri behen beti ghar mein aur kisi ki bazaar mein ... tu bhi sooch, main bhi soochon
Trans: Our houses are made with glass ... they why do we both have stones in our hands ... I'll think and you think as well ... didn't you know that waves come and go ... then why did you write our names in the sand ... you think and I'll think as well ... why is it that your sister and daughter are in the house and someone else's are in the market ... you think and I'll think as well

Title: Julie
Quote: Tum ek aaise insaan ho joh puja ke phool arthi par aur arthi ke phool kisi ke birthday par present kar sakte ho
Trans: You are such a person who can present the flowers of a prayer on a bier and the flowers of a bier on a birthday

Title: Julie
Quote: Duniya ka sabse bada violence, terrorism ... kisi ladki ko vaishya banana hai ... usse vaishya banke jeene par, vaishya banke marne par majboor karna hai
Trans: The biggest violence, terrorism in the world is ... to make a girl into a prostitute ... to compel her to live as a prostitute and to die as a prostitute

Title: Shaadi No. 1
Quote: Time time ki baat hai, kabhi din hai kabhi raat hai ... khatam ho jaye joh coffee ke bina, woh mulaqat koi mulaqat hai
Trans: Things change from time to time, it's day at times and it's night at times ... a meeting that ends without coffee, is not a meeting at all

Title: Shaadi No. 1
Quote: Shaadi ke pehle pyar bahut zaroori hai ... kyun ki shaadi ek gaadi ki tarah hai ... jitna zyada chalao utna better andaza hota hai ki kab dhakka dekar start karna hai
Trans: Love before marriage is very important ... because marriage is like a car ... the more you drive it, the more better you understand as to when you have to push it to start it

Title: Shaadi No. 1
Quote: Plane time par hai, economy ki seat hai ... badlo bhes aur chalo pardes
Trans: The plane is on time, the seat is economy ... change your appearance and let's go to a foreign country

Title: Shaadi No. 1
Quote: Maane ki kasai se dosti karne se murgi nahi bachti ... par kasai apna dost ho toh kam se kam pyar se murgi toh katti hai
Trans: I agree that a chicken cannot be saved by befriending a butcher ... but if the butcher is our friend then atleast the chicken is slaughtered with ease

Title: Khosla Ka Ghosla
Quote: Jab badi machli ko phaasna hai toh pehle choti machli ko phaanso ... badi machli khud-ba-khud chali aayegi
Trans: When you want to catch a big fish then first catch a small fish ... the big fish will come by itself

Title: Khosla Ka Ghosla
Quote: Yeh cricketeron waale naam safe nahi hote ji ... kal ko woh run banane band karega ... log jootiyan isko marenge
Trans: These names of cricketers are not safe ... tomorrow if they stop scoring runs ... then people will hit him with shoes

Title: Pehla Nasha
Quote: Koi nahi hoga beghar jab talak zinda hai Amar ... maut jise dhoondti hai dar-badar, log usse kehte hai baazigar
Trans: No one will be homeless until Amar is alive ... the person whom death is searching for door to door, people call him a gambler

Title: Pehla Nasha
Quote: Bhagwan rehta hai mandir mein, woh uska ghar hai ... panchi rehte hai amber mein, kyun ki woh unka ghar hai ... amir aadmi rehta hai mehalon mein, kyun ki woh uska ghar hai ... toh phir itni badi duniya mein ek gareeb aadmi kahan rahega?
Trans: God lives in the temple, because that's his house ... birds live in the sky, because that's their house ... a rich person lives mansions, because that's his house ... so where will a poor person live in this big world?

Title: Dirty Politics
Quote: Rajneeti note chaapne ki machine hai
Trans: Politics is a machine to print money

Title: Dirty Politics
Quote: Pahad ki choti se girke bach sakte hai aap ... lekin ghagre ki chapet mein aake bachna mushkil hai
Trans: You can be saved after falling from the top of a mountain ... but it's hard to be saved after coming into the grip of a skirt

Title: Dirty Politics
Quote: Jin logon ko sar uthakar jeene ki aadat hoti hai ... unhe kabhi kabhi bhagwan ke darbar mein sar jhuka lena chahiye
Trans: Those who have the habit of living with their head held high ... they should sometimes bow their head down in god's court

Title: Dirty Politics
Quote: Aasunyon se keh do ab aankhon se behna chhod de ... in labon se keh do ab khamosh rehna chhod de ... apni chingari ki loh ko jalao doston ... dil mein joh barood hai usse jalao doston
Trans: Tell the tears to stop flowing from the eyes ... tell the lips to stop being quiet ... ignite the spark in you my friends ... burn the gunpowder that is there in your heart my friends

Title: Saraswatichandra
Quote: Aatma aur parmatma, tapasya aur vardaan, dharm aur satya ke beech bahut kam antar hai ... phir bhi usse paar karne ka maarg bahut lamba hai
Trans: The difference between a soul and the supreme soul, meditation and blessing, religion and truth is very less ... but still the path to cross that is very long

Title: Saraswatichandra
Quote: Raakh ko koi kitna bhi dehkai ... woh aag nahi ban sakti
Trans: No matter how much one blows the ash ... it can't turn into fire

Title: Saraswatichandra
Quote: Apne mann mein base hue purush ko nikalkar ... bhagya se paye hue pati ko devta maan lena nari hi kar sakti hai ... issi liye Bharat ki nari ko devi kaha jaata hai
Trans: Only a woman can forget the man who is in her heart ... and adopt the husband found through destiny as god ... that's why an Indian woman is called a goddess

Title: Saraswatichandra
Quote: Is duniya mein jiske haath mein talwar hai ... wohi jee sakta hai
Trans: In this world the one who has a sword in his hand ... only he'll be able to live

Title: Purani Haveli
Quote: Is haveli mein rehne waala har insaan marega ... yeh haveli nahi maut ka ghar hai
Trans: Every person living in this mansion will die ... this mansion is a house of death

Title: Purani Haveli
Quote: Main kabar khodta nahi hoon ... main kabar banata hoon ... aur ab ek ek karke tum sabki kabaren yahan ban jayengi
Trans: I don't dig graves ... I make graves ... and now one by one all your graves will be made here

Title: Kaala Samrajya
Quote: Zindagi mein kuch gham aaise bhi hote hai ... jinse insaan ka rishta zindagi bhar ka hota hai
Trans: In life there are some sorrows ... with which a person has a relationship for the entire life

Title: Kaala Samrajya
Quote: Pati woh hota hai jise patni parmeshwar samajhkar poojti hai ... ek kamzor aur besahara aurat par zulm karne waala pati nahi ... rakshas kehlata hai
Trans: A husband is someone whom a wife worships as god ... and a person who does injustice on a weak and helpless woman is not called a husband ... but he is called a devil

Title: Kaala Samrajya
Quote: Aurat ka dil atyachar se nahi ... pyar se jeeta jaata hai
Trans: A woman's heart is won with love ... and not with oppression

Title: Kaala Samrajya
Quote: Aurat jis aadmi ka daaman chhodkar bhaagna chahe ... woh mard nahi namard hota hai
Trans: When a woman wants to leave and run away from the company of a man ... then that man is not a man

Title: Tejasvini
Quote: Main khata hoon vegetarian aur kaam karta hoon non-vegetarian
Trans: I eat vegetarian but I do non-vegetarian work

Title: Tejasvini
Quote: Gundon ko police officer bante mat dekhna ... sharif aadmiyon ko jail mein sadte huye mat dekhan ... desh ke tukde hote huye mat dekhna ... magar cricket zaroor dekhna
Trans: Don't watch the goons becoming police officers ... don't watch the honest people burning in the jail ... don't watch your country being broken into pieces ... but definitely watch cricket

Title: Tejasvini
Quote: Chote mote gunaah karoge toh aaise hi kanoon se darte rahoge ... bade gunaah karoge toh bade bade logon ke saath naam judh jayega, TV par interview honge aur badi badi magazino ke cover page par aaoge ... press tumhe hero bana degi
Trans: If you commit small crimes then you'll always fear the law ... but if you commit big crimes then your name will connect with big people, your interview will come on the TV and you'll be on the cover page of big magazines ... the press will make you a hero

Title: Tejasvini
Quote: Sipahi shaheed ki maut marta hai aur gunda kutte ki maut
Trans: A soldier dies the death of a martyr and a goon dies the death of a dog

Title: Alone
Quote: Dil mein joh jagah hoti hai woh sirf kisi ek ko di jaati hai ... usse aur koi nahi le sakta ... na saath jeeke, na saat phere leke, na saath rehke
Trans: The place that is there in the heart is only given to one person ... no one else can take that ... not by living together, not by getting married, not by staying together

Title: Alone
Quote: Jab khone ki naubat aati hai ... tabhi paane ki keemat samajh aati hai
Trans: When it comes to losing something ... only then you understand the value of achieving it

Title: Alone
Quote: Meri tarah tumhe koi pyar nahi kar sakta ... aur yeh baat main jitni baar bhi kahoon kam hai
Trans: No one can love you like me ... and no matter how many times I say that, it's less

Title: Alone
Quote: Yeh sab ek sapna hai jis mein tum ho, main hoon aur koi nahi ... yeh woh waqt hai jispe sirf tumhara haq hai, mera bhi nahi
Trans: All this is a dream in which you're there, I'm there and no one else ... this is the time on which only you have the right, not even me

Title: Sherni
Quote: Maine tumhari tarah dikhave ke liye sharafat ka chola nahi audh rakha hai ... balki farz ki vardi pehani hui hai aur is vardi ka daaman saaf rakhne ke liye main apna khoon tak baha sakta hoon
Trans: Like you I don't wear a coat of honesty only to show ... instead I have worn the uniform of my duty and I can even shed my blood to keep this uniform clean

Title: Sherni
Quote: Hamari kitaab mein galati ka lafz hi nahi hai ... hum galat kare toh sahi kehlata hai aur zulm kare toh insaaf kehlata hai
Trans: I don't have the word wrong in my book ... when I do wrong then it's called as right and when I do injustice then it's called as justice

Title: Sherni
Quote: Jis tarah ghoda dabakar bandook se goli bahar nikaal dete hai ... ussi tarah galati manane waale ke sar par haath pherkar hum purani baaton ko dil se nikaal dete hai
Trans: Just like I press the trigger and fire the bullet out of the gun ... just like that I roll my hands on the head of the person accepting his mistake and remove the old things from my heart

Title: Sherni
Quote: Ek se bhale do, do se bhale chaar ... manzil apni door hai, aur rasta karna hai paar
Trans: Two are better than one, four are better than two ... our destination is far, and we have to travel the road

Title: Mahaan
Quote: Manushya ko makhan mein baal ki tarah, samudra mein jaal ki tarah aur yudh mein dhaal ki tarah rehna chahiye
Trans: A human should stay like a hair in butter, like a net in the sea and like an armour in battle

Title: Mahaan
Quote: Khat kabutar kis tarah le jaye bam-e-yaar par ... par kattarne ke liye hai kaichiyan deewar par ... jawab hai ki khat kabutar is tarah le jaye bam-e-yaar par ... khat ka mazmoon ho paron par, par katte deewar par
Trans: How does the pigeon take a letter to the terrace ... when there are scissors on the wall to cut his wings ... the answer is that the pigeon takes the letter to the terrace in such a way that ... the envelope of the letter is on his wings, and his wings are cut down on the wall

Title: Mahaan
Quote: Hum do hamare do, teesra kabhi na ho ... patni se bhaiya door raho, kitni bhi adhchan ho
Trans: We two and our two, there should never be a third ... stay away from the wife, no matter how big the problem is

Title: Mahaan
Quote: Samajh samajhke samajh ko samajho toh samajhna bhi ek samajh hai ... samajh gaye?
Trans: If you understand the understanding then to understand is also an understanding ... did you understand?

Title: Saare Jahaan Se Mehnga
Quote: Pehle joh hai pyaz kaante mein aasoon aate the ... ab pyaz khareedne mein
Trans: First tears used to come when we used to cut onions ... and now when we buy onions

Title: Saare Jahaan Se Mehnga
Quote: Mehengi sirf cheezein hi nahi hoti balki uske saath sab kuch mehenga ho jaata hai ... rishta bhi, naata bhi, pyar bhi, hasi bhi
Trans: Only things don't get expensive but along with that everything gets expensive ... even relationships, even bonds, even love, even a smile

Title: Saare Jahaan Se Mehnga
Quote: Jab tak rum mein nahi hoga dum ... kaise mitega gham
Trans: Until the rum is strong ... our sadness won't go away

Title: Saare Jahaan Se Mehnga
Quote: Chori toh bahut hoti hai ... lekin joh pakda jaata hai na chor wohi hota hai
Trans: A lot of robberies happen ... but a thief is someone only who gets caught

Title: Badmashiyaan
Quote: Aapki aankhon mein dekha toh irradon mein badmashiyan aa gayi
Trans: My intentions became naughty when I looked in your eyes

Title: Badmashiyaan
Quote: Maari kahani mein baatein kam ... action zyada hove hai
Trans: In my story there is less talking ... and more action

Title: Badmashiyaan
Quote: Is duniya mein sirf do hi kisam ke log hote hai ... ek jeevit aur doosre vivahit
Trans: There are only two kinds of people who exists in this world ... one who are living and second who are married

Title: Badmashiyaan
Quote: Choriyon ko jahan bhi proposal ka andesha ho ... unhe do hi jagah nazar aati hai ... courtroom aur washroom ... courtroom se shaadi ho jaati hai aur washroom se azaadi
Trans: Wherever girls sense the intention of a proposal ... they only look for two places ... courtroom and washroom ... in the courtroom they can get married and from the washroom they can run away

Title: Barkhaa
Quote: Aurat pyar ke liye mard ke saath sooti hai aur mard soone ke liye pyar karta hai
Trans: A woman sleeps with a man for love and a man loves a woman to sleep with her

Title: Barkhaa
Quote: Taqdeer guzre hue kal aur aane waale kal ke beech ka hi doosra naam hai ... kismat in do palon ki beech mein hi apna faisla sunati hai
Trans: Destiny is the other name for the time between the past and the future ... and luck declares its decision between these two moments

Title: Barkhaa
Quote: Kabhi kabhi sach ko bhi apna wajood sabit karne ke liye khud se hi ladai ladni padti hai
Trans: Sometimes even truth has to fight with itself to prove it's existence

Title: Barkhaa
Quote: Main toh woh lailaaj bimari hoon ... joh tumhari jaan jaane se hi chutegi
Trans: I'm that untreatable disease ... which will leave only after you die

Title: Uvaa
Quote: Insaaf hum mein tabhi milega ... jab hum na tootenge aur na bikenge
Trans: We will only get justice ... if we don't break and neither do we get sold

Title: Uvaa
Quote: Jab jab auraton ki aankhon se aasoon bahe hai ... mardon ka khoon khaula hai
Trans: Whenever the eyes of women have shed tears ... then the blood of men has boiled

Title: Uvaa
Quote: Dena hai poora do sammaan ... mat do adhoora gyaan
Trans: If you want to give, then give full respect ... but don't give incomplete knowledge

Title: Uvaa
Quote: Satya pareshan hota hai ... lekin parajit nahi
Trans: Truth can be troublesome ... but it can't be defeated

Title: Bombay Velvet
Quote: Main joh bhi karta hoon ... khud ke liye karta hoon
Trans: Whatever I do ... I do it for myself

Title: Bombay Velvet
Quote: Abhi toh apan small se large hua hai ... abhi patiala hona baki hai
Trans: I have just turned from small into large ... I still have to become extra large

Title: Bombay Velvet
Quote: Picture jab housefull hota hai na ... toh ticket us-hich ko milta hai jiski manager tak pehchan ho
Trans: When a movie becomes housefull ... then only the one who knows the manager gets a ticket

Title: Bombay Velvet
Quote: Footpath pe sangemarmar chadhane se woh Taj Mahal nahi ho jaata ... footpath hi rehta hai
Trans: If you put marble on a footpath then it doesn't become into a Taj Mahal ... it still remains as a footpath

Title: Vansh
Quote: Banaya hai jisne tumko dekho usse kaise hum banate hai ... maa banane se pehle bhabhi usse hum banate hai
Trans: See how I fool the person who has made a fool of you ... I'll make her my sister-in-law before she becomes a mother

Title: Vansh
Quote: Dhuan, dhuan aur dhuan ... chala hai dil, chala hai jahaan ... is jalti duniya ko chhodkar jaon kahan
Trans: Smoke, smoke and smoke ... the heart is moving, the world is moving ... where should I go leaving this burning world

Title: Vansh
Quote: Rakhail aurat ki koi jaat nahi hoti ... aur na hi koi aurat kisi jayaz ya najayaz aulad ki maa kehlati hai ... woh toh sirf maa hoti hai
Trans: A prostitute is not a caste of women ... and neither is any woman called a mother of a legal or illegal child ... she is just a mother

Title: Badhaai Ho Badhaai
Quote: Dharam ka asli matlab prem ke alava kuch aur ho hi nahi sakta
Trans: The real meaning of religion can't be anything but love

Title: Badhaai Ho Badhaai
Quote: Doosron ki madad karne mein joh fayda hai ... woh apni madad karne mein ho hi nahi sakta
Trans: The benefit that lies in helping others ... that benefit doesn't lie in helping ourselves

Title: Badhaai Ho Badhaai
Quote: Ek ladki Miss Universe ka taj apne sar par pehan sakti hai ... gold medal apne gale mein latka sakti hai ... lekin ek mangalsutra bina mantra ke kabhi nahi pehan sakti
Trans: A girl can wear the tiara of Miss Universe on her head ... she can hang a gold medal in her neck ... but she can never wear a wedding necklace without taking the vows

Title: Chamatkar
Quote: Prem ki koi seema nahi hoti aur naa hi uska koi wazan hota hai ... prem ka koi hisaab kitaab nahi hota ... is liye toh kehte hai ki prem hi ishwar hai aur ishwar hi prem
Trans: Love doesn't have any boundaries and neither can you weigh it ... also love doesn't have any accounts ... that's why it's said that love is god and god is love

Title: Chamatkar
Quote: Mujhpe aaisa aarop ... ab dekh mera prakop
Trans: Such an allegation is put on me ... now see my fury

Title: Chamatkar
Quote: Tum kya samajhte ho kanoon koi khilona hai, mujrimon ke samne bauna hai? ... arre ab toh wohi hoga joh hona hai
Trans: Do you think the law is a toy, a dwarf in front of criminals? ... now only that will happen what is suppose to happen

Title: Chamatkar
Quote: Atyachari, durachari ... tu jaanta hai main hoon bal-brahmachari
Trans: You oppressive, vicious person ... you know that I'm a celibate

Title: Shaadi Ka Laddoo
Quote: Agar koi mard kisi doosri aurat ko nahi dekhta hai toh phir woh dikhava kar raha hai ... ya phir uski biwi usse yeh dikhava karne par majboor kar rahi hai
Trans: If a man doesn't look at another woman then he is pretending ... or else his wife is compelling him to pretend that way

Title: Shaadi Ka Laddoo
Quote: Happily married? ... aadmi ya toh sirf happy ho sakta hai ya married ... dono cheezein ekhatti nahi ho sakti ... impossible
Trans: Happily married? ... either a man can be happy or married ... both things can't happen together ... impossible

Title: Shaadi Ka Laddoo
Quote: Zindagi mein kabhi kabhi dil se soochna chahiye ... lekin zindagi ke mathematics mein hamesha dimaag se soochna chahiye
Trans: In life sometimes you should think from the heart ... but in the mathematics of life you should always think from the mind

Title: Shaadi Ka Laddoo
Quote: Waqt nahi beetta ... insaan beetta hai
Trans: Time doesn't move on ... a person moves on

Title: Hum Dono
Quote: Kambakht yeh neend ki goli sula toh deti hai ... lekin lori nahi sunati
Trans: The sleep pill will put you to sleep ... but it won't sing a lullaby

Title: Hum Dono
Quote: Aaj tak main soochti rahi ki aap mujhe bahut pyar karte hai ... meri khushi ke liye aap apni khushiyo ka gala ghoont sakte hai ... lekin aaj mujhe pata chala ki aap apni khushi ke liye mera bhi gala ghoont sakte hai
Trans: Until today I thought that you love me a lot ... and that you could sacrifice your happiness for my happiness ... but today I came to know that you can even squeeze my neck for your own happiness

Title: Kartoos
Quote: Mera junoon hai sirf mera mulk ... mera Hindustan!
Trans: My passion is only my country ... my India!

Title: Kartoos
Quote: Jab upar waala kisi ke sar ke upar apna haath rakhna chahta hai ... toh aap badhon ke haath ko apna zariya banata hai
Trans: Whenever god wants to bless someone with his hands ... then he uses the hands of elders like you as his medium

Title: Dillagi
Quote: Galati sab karte hai ... lekin galati sudhaarne ka mauka sabko nahi milta
Trans: Everyone makes a mistake ... but not everyone gets a chance to correct that mistake

Title: Dillagi
Quote: Pyar doosro ki jaan lena nahi hota ... pyar doosro ko jeene dena hota hai ... zindagi hota hai pyar, doosro ko khushi dena hota hai pyar
Trans: Love is not taking the life of others ... love is to let others live ... life is love, giving happiness to others is love

Title: Dillagi
Quote: Jab sapne aur haqeeqat takrate hai ... toh sapne toot jaate hai
Trans: When dreams and reality clash ... then dreams break

Title: Dillagi
Quote: Main tumhe bahut pyar karta hoon ... itna jitna suraj karta hai apni kiranon se, chand karta hai apni chandni se, phool karte hai apni khushboo se
Trans: I love you a lot ... as much as the sun loves its sunrays, as much as the moon loves its moonlight, as much as the flowers love their fragrance

Title: Dacait
Quote: Insaan hi insaan ka sabse bada dushman hai ... insaan hi insaan pe zulm karta hai, usse lootta hai, uska ghar ujhaad deta hai
Trans: A human is the biggest enemy of a human ... a human is the one who does injustice on humans, steals him, destroys his home

Title: Dacait
Quote: Gareeb ka jab bheja phirta hai na ... toh usse andook bandook kuch nahi dikhai deti ... chalao goli!
Trans: When the mind of a poor person goes crazy ... then he can't see any guns ... come on shoot me!

Title: Shaapit
Quote: Insaan ke marne ke liye jail se buri jagah aur aatma ke janam ke liye jail se achchi jagah duniya mein nahi hai
Trans: In this world the jail is the worst place for a human to die and the best place for a spirit to be born

Title: Shaapit
Quote: Jab hum kisi zinda aadmi ke bare mein janane ki koshish karte hai toh uske janam se shuru karte hai ... aur jab kisi rooh ki bare mein janane ki koshish karte hai toh uske shareer ki mrityu se shuru karte hai
Trans: When we try to find out about a living person then we start from their birth ... and when we try to find out about a spirit then we start from the death of their body

Title: Shaapit
Quote: Joh sapne dikhata hai woh sapno ko sach karne ki taqat bhi deta hai ... joh pyar karna sikhata hai woh pyar ko zinda rakhne ki himmat bhi deta hai
Trans: The one who shows us the dreams also gives us the strength to make them true ... the one who teaches us how to love also gives us the courage to keep that love alive

Title: Shaapit
Quote: Subah hone se pehle andhera sabse ghana hota hai ... par woh andhera bhi subah ko rok nahi paata
Trans: The darkness just before morning is the most dense ... but even that darkness can't stop the morning

Title: Aashik Aawara
Quote: Tum hamari sari daulat lootkar le jaate toh hum mein koi gham nahi hota ... tumne hamare pariwar ka pyar aur vishvas loota hai ... khoon kiya hai tumne hamari bhavnao ka
Trans: Had you stolen all my money and left then I wouldn't have been sad ... but you have stolen the love and trust of our family ... you have murdered our emotions

Title: Aashik Aawara
Quote: Hilna nahi ... hilega toh dobara life mein hilne ka chance nahi milega
Trans: Don't move ... if you move then you won't get a chance in life to move again

Title: Aashik Aawara
Quote: Hilna nahi ... nahi toh goli maar maarke bina plastic surgery ke tumhara face bighad dega
Trans: Don't move ... or else I'll shoot bullets and destroy your face without plastic surgery

Title: Aashik Aawara
Quote: Dame ki bimari kuch aaisi hai jaise ghar aaya hua mehmaan ... aaj hai, kal nahi
Trans: Asthma is like a guest in the house ... it's there today, but gone tomorrow

Title: Mitti Aur Sona
Quote: Main tumhari yaadon ki mitti se tumhari murti banakar ... zindagi bhar uski puja karta rahoonga
Trans: I'll make a statue from the soil of your memories ... and I'll worship that for my entire life

Title: Mitti Aur Sona
Quote: Zindagi subah ki dhoop ki tarah phailti hai ... joh kal andhere mein tha woh tumhe aaj dikhai dene laga ... joh aaj ka andhera hai woh kal ki roshni ke saath door ho jayega
Trans: Life spreads like the sunlight of morning ... today you're able to see the thing that was in darkness yesterday ... and the darkness of today will go away with the sunlight of tomorrow

Title: Mitti Aur Sona
Quote: Aapke haathon bikke hum, uski kudrat dekhiye ... baat ki sholon ki, aur khud pani pani ho gaye
Trans: I was bought by you, look at gods play ... you talked about embers, and you yourself got scared

Title: Mitti Aur Sona
Quote: Jab sar ke upar se chatt aur pair ke neeche se naram carpet hat jayega ... tab pata chalega isse ki bahar ki duniya baap ka ghar nahi hai
Trans: When the roof above his head and the soft carpet under his feet will go away ... then he'll come to know that the world outside is not his father's house

Title: Joshilaay
Quote: Samjhao isse pyar koi paap nahi hai ... jallad hai kambhakt, yeh mera baap nahi hai
Trans: Make him understand that love is not a sin ... he is an executioner, and not my father

Title: Joshilaay
Quote: Main jaanta tha tumhari aankhon mein mera intezar hai, tumhare dil mein mera pyar hai ... magar yeh zalim zamana hum dono ke beech deewar hai
Trans: I knew that your eyes were waiting for me, my love is there in your heart ... but this cruel world is a wall between the two of us

Title: Joshilaay
Quote: Aadmi ko khel wahi khelna chahiye ... joh achchi tarah khelna aata ho
Trans: A person should only play that game ... which he knows to play well

Title: Joshilaay
Quote: Agar tumne ek kadam bhi aur badaya ... toh aaj ke baad tum apne pairon se nahi chal sakoge
Trans: If you take even one step forward ... then from today you won't be able to walk on your legs

Title: Leader
Quote: Meri haseen mehfil mein, ishq patthar hai aur kuch bhi nahi ... apne nagamo se zindagi de isse, ya mitta apni zindagi bhi yaheen
Trans: In my beautiful party, love is nothing but a stone ... give him life with your tunes, or else erase your life also here

Title: Leader
Quote: Aye haseen aasman ki malika, mera dildar mujhko lauta de ... tujhko apni nazakaton ki kasam, tu mera pyar mujhko lauta de
Trans: Hey you queen of the beautiful sky, give my lover back to me ... you have the swear of your delicacy, give my love back to me

Title: Leader
Quote: Zindagi ka kya bharosa hai ... kaun jaanta hai kab maut kis darwaze se dhakil hoti hai ... kab in chalti hui saanson ka silsila toot jaata hai
Trans: Life can't be trusted ... who knows when will death enter and from which door ... and when will the series of these breathes break

Title: Leader
Quote: Charon taraf dekhte hai toh har baat mein khot aur milavat ... nal ka pani pejiye toh us mein dawai ki milavat hai, saans lijiye toh hawa mein millon ke dhuan ki milavat hai, agar khana khaiye toh roti ke aate mein mitti ki milavat hai ... charon taraf har baat mein jhoot hai ... dua mein, salaam mein, pyar mein, nafrat mein, gusse mein ... sab mein jhoot hai
Trans: When you look everywhere then there is cheating and adulteration ... if you drink tap water then it's adulterated with medicine, if you breath then it's adulterated with the smoke from the factories, if you eat food then the flour of the bread is adulterated with mud ... there is lies everywhere and in everything ... in a prayer, in a salute, in love, in hatred, in anger ... there is lies in everything

Title: Teri Payal Mere Geet
Quote: Aaina todh diya khud bhi nazara na kiya ... unke jaisa ho koi yeh bhi gawara na kiya
Trans: I broke the mirror and didn't see myself ... since I don't accept that there is someone else like him

Title: Teri Payal Mere Geet
Quote: Jis aurat ka pesha hi kahi mardon ka dil lubhana hai ... woh zindagi mein jitna chahe dhan kama le ... izzat kabhi nahi kama sakti
Trans: A woman whose occupation is to entertain many men ... in life no matter how much money she earns ... she'll never be able to earn respect

Title: Teri Payal Mere Geet
Quote: Humne kya kya usse mehfil mein ishara na kiya ... dekhna bhi hum mein zalim ne gawara na kiya
Trans: What all signals didn't I give him in the party ... but he was cruel and didn't even look at me

Title: Teri Payal Mere Geet
Quote: Kothe ki santan sirf ek raat ke liye dulhan banti hai ... umar bhar ke liye nahi ... woh daulat ke tarazu mein tulkar apni nath utarwaati hai ... byah karke suhagraat nahi manati
Trans: A child of a brothel can only become a bride for one night ... not for the entire life ... she gives up her virginity after being weighed on the scale of money ... and she doesn't get married and celebrates her wedding night

Title: Life Ki Toh Lag Gayi
Quote: Maut kisi ko dokha nahi deti
Trans: Death never cheats anyone

Title: Life Ki Toh Lag Gayi
Quote: Is underworld mein log ghuste toh pant kameez pehankar hai ... lekin rawangi kafan mein hoti hai
Trans: In underworld people enter wearing a pant and shirt ... but they leave in a shroud

Title: Life Ki Toh Lag Gayi
Quote: Yeh na thi hamari kismat ki visaal-e-yaar hota ... aur jeete rehte bas yahi intezaar hota
Trans: It was not in my destiny to meet my beloved ... and had I lived more then there would have been the same waiting

Title: Life Ki Toh Lag Gayi
Quote: Dhanda badalne se dushman nahi badalte
Trans: Enemies don't change by changing the business

Title: Hariyali Aur Rasta
Quote: Mohabbat ki raah par chalne waalo ki taqdeer mein pyar ki hariyali nahi ... kaanto bhara raasta hota hai
Trans: Those who walk on the path of love don't get the greenery of love in their destiny ... they get a path full of thorns

Title: Hariyali Aur Rasta
Quote: Joh marr jaate hai woh sitare ban jaate hai ... taaki unke bachche unko roz dekh sake
Trans: Those who die they turn into stars ... so that their kids can see them everyday

Title: Hariyali Aur Rasta
Quote: Mazhab aur karobar do alag alag cheezein hai ... inko mix karne waala hamesha bhookha marta hai
Trans: Religion and business are two different things ... the one who mixes them always dies hungry

Title: Hariyali Aur Rasta
Quote: Lipat jaate hai woh bijli ki darr se ... ilahi yeh ghata do din toh barse
Trans: She hugs me fearing the lightning ... oh god let this rain fall for a couple of days

Title: Lal Dupatta Malmal Ka
Quote: Yeh shareer toh mitti ka bana hai ... agar is mein aatma na hoti toh kitna khokla hota
Trans: This body is made of soil ... had there been no soul in it then it would have been so empty

Title: Lal Dupatta Malmal Ka
Quote: Mard ki nazron mein aurat ka waqt tab tak hi hota hai ... jab tak uska usse dil laga rahe
Trans: A woman's time only lasts in the eyes of a man until ... he feels her entertaining

Title: Lal Dupatta Malmal Ka
Quote: Mard ka dil aur uski aankhon ki sachchai ... us hi mein basti hai aur us hi mein barbaad ho jaati hai
Trans: The heart of a man and the truth in his eyes ... (a woman) resides in that and also gets destroyed in that

Title: Rabba Main Kya Karoon
Quote: Shaadi saath janamon ka bandhan hota hai ... maine toh apni galatiyon ka quota aadhe janam mein hi poora kar diya ... bas ab baki ke sade-che janam sirf tumhe pyar dena chahta hoon
Trans: Marriage is a bond of 7 rebirths ... I've finished the quota of my mistakes in half a life itself ... now I only want to give you love for the remaining 6.5 rebirths

Title: Rabba Main Kya Karoon
Quote: Mard hai na ek aurat ke saath bore ho jaata hai ... aurat bore nahi hoti ... aur jab mard bore ho jaata hai toh uske joh hormones hai na usko attack karne lagte hai
Trans: A man gets bored with one woman ... but a woman doesn't get bored ... and when a man gets bored then his hormones start to attack him

Title: Rabba Main Kya Karoon
Quote: Hormones ko koi farak nahi padta aadmi hai ya aurat hai ... discrimination na tum jaise log karte ho society mein
Trans: Hormones don't care if it's a man or a woman ... it's people like you who discriminate in the society

Title: Ek Nari Ek Brahmachari
Quote: Aurat agar apne aapko mitakar purush ke charano ki dhool ban sakti hai ... toh sataaye jaane par shool bankar uska jeena bhi haram kar sakti hai
Trans: If a woman can erase herself and become the dust of a man's feet ... then on being troubled she can also turn into a thorn and make his life difficult

Title: Ek Nari Ek Brahmachari
Quote: Nari gyan maha gyan hai ... iske bina sare gyan adhoore reh jaate hai ... is liye har mard ko chahiye ki is gyan ka poora poora adhyaan kare
Trans: A woman is knowledge, major knowledge ... without her all other knowledges remain incomplete ... that's why every man should study about this knowledge completely

Title: Ek Nari Ek Brahmachari
Quote: Pehla bacha abhi nahi ... do ke baad kabhi nahi
Trans: Not now for the first child ... and after two nothing

Title: Ek Nari Ek Brahmachari
Quote: Pati ka mann jeetne ke liye stri ka jhukna hi stri ki jeet hai
Trans: A woman bowing down to win her husband's heart is victory for the woman

Title: Jangal Mein Mangal
Quote: Insaan bhale hi nafrat zahir kare ... lekin uske dil mein pyar chupa hota hai
Trans: Even if a person expresses hatred ... but still love is hidden in his heart

Title: Jangal Mein Mangal
Quote: Jis tarah soot aur kapas alag nahi ho sakte, tann aur mann alag nahi ho sakte, baal aur khaal alag nahi ho sakte ... issi tarah male aur female bhi alag nahi ho sakte ... in dono ka milap hi prem aur shanti ki manzil hai
Trans: Just like thread and cotton cannot be separated, body and heart cannot be separated, hair and skin cannot be separated ... just like that male and female also cannot be separated ... their union is the destination of love and peace

Title: Hu Tu Tu
Quote: Politics naukri nahi hai ... business hai, bahut bada business
Trans: Politics is not a job ... it's a business, a very big business

Title: Hu Tu Tu
Quote: Pichle pachaas saalo mein hamare desh ne sirf mantri aur minister paida kiye hai ... ek neta paida nahi kiya
Trans: For the last 50 years our nation has only produced politicians and ministers ... it has not even produced a single leader

Title: Hu Tu Tu
Quote: Is generation ke paas sawal bahut hai ... jawab koi nahi
Trans: This generation has a lot of questions ... but no answers

Title: Aatank Hi Aatank
Quote: Revolver se zyada khatarnak cheez agar koi hai ... toh woh hai tumhari aankhen
Trans: If there is anything more dangerous than a revolver ... then it's your eyes

Title: Aatank Hi Aatank
Quote: Samundar ke kinare rehne waala nadiyon se nahi darte ... aur na keechad mein palne waala khoon ke cheeton se bhaagte hai
Trans: Those who stay near the ocean shore are not scared of rivers ... and neither do the people who grow in mud run away from the marks of blood

Title: Aatank Hi Aatank
Quote: Gore rang pe agar kaala til padh bhi jaye toh usse khurajkar nahi mitaya jaata ... balki log uska aur ehsaan mante hai ... is liye ki woh buri nazar se bachata bhi hai
Trans: If you have a black mole on a white body then you don't scratch that to erase it ... instead people thank for it ... because it saves us from the evil eyes

Title: Aatank Hi Aatank
Quote: Doodh agar sookh bhi jaye toh koi marta hai kya ... lekin bade bhai ke khoon ke baad agar chote bhai ka khoon sookh jaye ... toh yeh maut se bhi bhattar hai
Trans: No one dies if the milk dries up ... but if the blood of the younger brother dries up after the murder of the elder brother ... then it's even worse than death

Title: Geet Gaaya Pattharon Ne
Quote: Humne gareebi mein sapne dekhe hai ... yeh sapno mein bhi gareebi nahi dekh sakegi
Trans: We have seen dreams in poverty ... and she won't even be able to see poverty in dreams

Title: Geet Gaaya Pattharon Ne
Quote: Yeh mere do haath jab bhi uthenge pattharon ko tarashne ... yeh goonj har baar milan ka geet bankar sunai degi ... tumhe vishvas dilane ki tum mere paas ho, mere dil mein
Trans: Whenever my two hands will rise to carve stones ... this echo will be heard like a song of union ... to make you believe that you're near me, and in my heart

Title: Geet Gaaya Pattharon Ne
Quote: Do akele mil gaye toh ek sansar ban jayega
Trans: When two lonely people meet then a universe is formed

Title: Humse Badhkar Kaun
Quote: Jab rishta zindagi mein aata hai ... toh saath aankhon mein aasoon aur dil mein dard lekar aata hai
Trans: When a relationship comes in life ... then it brings tears in the eyes and pain in the heart with itself

Title: Humse Badhkar Kaun
Quote: Agar ek kadam bhi badaya ... toh doosra kadam zameen pe rakhne se pehle hi hawa mein kaat di jayega
Trans: If you move even one step ... then your leg will be cut in the air before you put your second step on the ground

Title: Humse Badhkar Kaun
Quote: Ek foot ki lohe ki nalli aur dedh inch ki barood ki goli ... oont ke mooh mein jeera lagta hai
Trans: A foot of an iron barrel and a 1.5 inch bullet of gunpowder ... looks like a cumin seed in a camel's mouth

Title: Aloo Chaat
Quote: Insaan ki parak Hindu Musalman se nahi ... insaaniyat se hoti hai ... aur wohi sabse bada mazhab hai
Trans: A human is not identified as a Hindu or a Muslim ... but he is by humanity ... and that is the biggest religion

Title: Aloo Chaat
Quote: Kundli ladka ladki ki nahi ... saas aur ladki ki milani chahiye
Trans: You should not match the horoscope of a girl and a boy ... instead you should match for the mother-in-law and the girl

Title: Aloo Chaat
Quote: India woh emotion hai joh hamare dil mein basta hai ... jahan badhon ke liye izzat aur choton ke liye pyar hota hai
Trans: India is that emotion that lives in our hearts ... where there is respect for the elders and love for the small

Title: Tu Chor Main Sipahi
Quote: Tumhare dil ke jail mein umar bhar ke liye qaid ho gaya hoon ... chahkar bhi yahan se riha hone ka koi chance nahi ... aur tumhari zulfon ki zanjeeron mein is tarah jakad gaya hoon ... ki agar chahon bhi toh usse todh nahi sakta
Trans: I've been imprisoned for life in the jail of your heart ... even if I want there is no chance of me being released from here ... and I'm tied up in the shackles of your hair in a way that ... even if I want I won't be able to break that

Title: Tu Chor Main Sipahi
Quote: Azaadi ka nasha sabse bada nasha hota hai ... usse bada koi nasha nahi
Trans: The intoxication of independence is the biggest intoxication ... there is no other intoxication bigger than that

Title: Tu Chor Main Sipahi
Quote: Ek din woh aaisa hungama karega aur unka blood pressure itna bad jayega ... ki sirf pressure hoga, blood nahi hoga
Trans: One day he'll do such a commotion and his blood pressure will increase so much that ... only pressure will be there and no blood

Title: Tu Chor Main Sipahi
Quote: Insaan apni umar se, apne aaude se chota bada ho sakta hai ... lekin haqeeqat mein insaan apni bahaduri se, apne kaam se chota bada hota hai
Trans: A person can be small or big by his age and by his position ... but in reality a person is small or big by his courage and by his work

Title: Tarkieb
Quote: Pyar ki aahuti hi pyar ko amar bana deti hai
Trans: The sacrifice of love makes love immortal

Title: Tarkieb
Quote: Bahut khoobsurat hai aankhen tumhari ... bana dijiye inko kismat hamari ... usse aur kya chahiye zindagi mein ... jisse mil gayi hai mohabbat tumhari
Trans: Your eyes are very beautiful ... turn them into my destiny ... what else does he need in life ... the one who has got your love

Title: Tarkieb
Quote: Hamere baad mehfil mein afsane bayan honge ...  baharen humko dhoondengi, na jaane hum kahan honge
Trans: Stories will be told in the party after I'm gone ... the spring season will be looking for me, and I don't know where I'll be

Title: Tarkieb
Quote: Meri nigaah ne yeh kaisa khawab dekha hai ... zameen pe chalta hua mehtab dekha hai
Trans: What dreams have my eyes seen ... I've seen a moon walking on the ground

Title: Kuch Khatti Kuch Meethi
Quote: Jua mein hamesha jeetkar hi nahi ... kabhi kabhi haarkar bhi zyada paisa kamaya ja sakta hai
Trans: In gambling you not only make money by winning ... sometimes you can make more money by losing

Title: Kuch Khatti Kuch Meethi
Quote: Kisi aur ko badalne ke liye ... khud ko badalna zaroori hota hai
Trans: To change someone ... it's important that we ourselves change

Title: Kuch Khatti Kuch Meethi
Quote: Pyar karne waale kabhi naraz nahi hote ... sirf rooth jaate hai aur roothon ko manana padta hai
Trans: People in love can never be angry ... they simply get upset and you have to pacify those who are upset

Title: Dharam Adhikari
Quote: Jaise hi fasal pak jaye toh rakhwaale ki zaroorat hoti hai ... vaise hi ladki jawan ho jaye toh gharwaale ki zaroorat hoti hai
Trans: Just like the crops need a protector once they ripen ... just like that a girl she needs a husband when she becomes young

Title: Dharam Adhikari
Quote: Gyan aur agyan mein antar hi kya hai ... kewal ek akshar ka ... lekin arth mein satyug aur kalyug ka sa bedh hai
Trans: What is difference between educated and uneducated ... only of one syllable ... but there is a difference of the golden age and the iron age in the meaning of it

Title: Dharam Adhikari
Quote: Jab koi apradh vichar kiye bina kiya jaata hai ... usse bhool kehte hai ... lekin vichar ke saath kiya hua apradh ... nishchit apradh hi kehlata hai
Trans: When a crime is committed without being thought ... then it's called a mistake ... but a crime that is committed after being thought ... is definitely called a crime

Title: Dharam Adhikari
Quote: Is sansar mein koi manav poorna buddhiman nahi hota ... Brahma srishti rachate hai, Vishnu uski raksha karte hai aur Shiv usko nasht karte hai
Trans: In this universe no human is completely wise ... Lord Brahma creates the world, Lord Vishnu protects it and Lord Shiva destroys it

Title: Gabbar Is Back
Quote: Na yeh sarkari hai, na gair kanooni ... na yeh neta hai, na koi terrorist ... kaam se hero, naam se villain ... yeh hai Gabbar
Trans: Neither he is official, nor is he illegal ... neither he is a politician, nor is he a terrorist ... he is a hero by his work and a villain by his name ... he is Gabbar

Title: Gabbar Is Back
Quote: Haddiyan todne mein woh mazaa nahi ... joh teri akad todne mein hai
Trans: The fun in breaking your bones ... is nothing in front of the fun in breaking your stubbornness

Title: Gabbar Is Back
Quote: Pachas pachas kos door jab koi rishvat leta hai toh sab kehte hai mat le varna ... Gabbar aa jayega
Trans: Even fifty kilometers from here when someone takes a bribe then everyone says don't take it ... or else Gabbar will come

Title: Gabbar Is Back
Quote: Mujhe pasand hai woh log joh mujhe pasand nahi karte ... himmat rakhte hai aaise log
Trans: I like those who don't like me ... those kind of people have courage

Title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
Quote: Apna toh ek hi usool hai ... jeeyo toh apne liye, socho toh doosron ke liye
Trans: I have only one protocol ... if you live then live for yourself, and if you think then think for others

Title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
Quote: Ek doosre ka jootha peene ka matlab? ... ek doosre ka wafaadar rehna ... dost ka sar jhukne se pehle apna sar kata dena
Trans: What is the meaning of drinking from the same glass? ... it means to stay loyal to each other ... and to slit your head before the head of your friend bows down

Title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
Quote: Jab dil par bhoj ho aur dimag mein pareshani ... toh nishana kabhi fit nahi behatta
Trans: When your heart is heavy and your mind is troubled ... then your aim never fits well

Title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
Quote: Hum ek aur ek gyarah hai ... aur us saale ko nau-do-gyarah karna hai
Trans: We are 1 and 1 equaling 11 ... and we have to make him run away from here

Title: Tumsa Nahin Dekha
Quote: Taqleef is baat ki nahi ki log mar jaate hai ... taqleef is baat ki hai ki log zinda rehkar bhi nahi jeete
Trans: I'm not troubled by the fact that people die ... I'm troubled by the fact that people don't live when they are alive

Title: Tumsa Nahin Dekha
Quote: Hamari zindagi hamari hokar bhi hamari nahi hoti ... woh marte dum tak kisi doosre ki marzi ke mutabik chalti hai
Trans: Our life being ours is still not ours ... it moves as per the decisions of others until you die

Title: Tumsa Nahin Dekha
Quote: Zindagi us bewafaa aurat ki tarah hai ... joh bure waqt mein apne pati ka saath chhod deti hai
Trans: Life is like that dishonest woman ... who leaves her husband's in bad times

Title: Raghu Romeo
Quote: Is duniya mein pyar karne waale log bahut kam hai ... lekin joh nafrat nahi karte na woh sirf ek ... aap
Trans: There are very few people in this world who love ... but there is only one person who doesn't hate ... and that's you

Title: Raghu Romeo
Quote: Zindagi bahut hi khoobsurat hai ... yahan par dhoop bhi hai aur chaon bhi, yahan asha bhi hai aur nirasha bhi, yahan par phool bhi hai aur kaante bhi, yahan par khawab bhi hai aur haqeeqat bhi, yahan dil bhi hai aur dard bhi
Trans: Life is very beautiful ... here there is sunshine and shade as well, here there are hopes and disappointment as well, here there are flowers and thorns as well, here there are dreams and reality as well, here there is a heart and pain as well

Title: Shatranj
Quote: Wahan ka zarra zarra apni halat par salamat hai ... tumhare ek na hone se wahan lekin qayamat hai
Trans: Every bit of there is doing well in it's condition ... but if just you're not there then there will be a disaster

Title: Shatranj
Quote: Jis desh mein humne janam liya hai ... us desh mein sachai ki puja hoti hai ... sach ke sivah zubaan par kuch nahi aa sakta
Trans: The country in which we are born ... in that country truth is worshipped ... and I'll say nothing but the truth

Title: Shatranj
Quote: Jab bhi hamari tumhari mulaqat hoti hai ... koi na koi baat zaroor pehda hoti hai
Trans: Whenever you and I meet ... something or the other definitely happens

Title: Shatranj
Quote: Aye meri jaane-jigar, patthar ka seena cheerkar, sari deewarein todkar, sabko akela chhodkar ... toofano se lad jaonga, tujhko magar le jaonga aur apne ghar jake garam garam chai pilaonga ... aur reh jayenge sab taapte, ek dujhe ka mooh taakte ... band karke raste aur tumhare vaste gajar ka halwa laonga
Trans: Oh my love, I'll tear apart a stone, I'll break all the walls, I'll leave everyone alone ... I'll fight with the storms, but I'll take you to my house and serve you hot tea ... and everyone will be jealous, and will watch each others face ... I'll close the roads and bring a carrot dessert for you

Title: Ardh Satya
Quote: Chakravyuh mein ghusne se pehle kaun tha main aur kaisa tha, yeh mujhe yaad hi na rahega ... chakravyuh mein ghusne ke baad mere aur chakravyuh ke beech sirf jaanleva nikatta thi, iska mujhe pata hi na chalega ... chakravyuh se bahar nikalne par main mukt ho jaon bhale hi, phir bhi chakravyuh ki rachna mein fark hi na padega ... maron ya maaron, maara jaon ya jaan se maardon, iska faisla kabhi na ho payega ... soya hua aadmi jab neend mein se uthkar chalna shuru karta hai, tab sapnon ka sansar usse dobara dikh hi na payega ... us roshni mein joh nirnay ki roshni hai, sab kuch samaan hoga kya ... ek palhade mein napunsakta, doosre palhade mein parush aur theek tarazu ke kaante par ardh satya
