Trans: Before I entered the maze who was I and how I was, I won't remember that ... after entering the maze there was only life-threatening proximity between me and the maze, I didn't realize that ... after getting out of the maze even if I'm free, even then the structure of the maze will be unaffected ... whether I die or kill, whether I get killed or take someone's life, that will never be decided ... when a man starts walking after waking up from his sleep, then he can never see the world of dreams again ... in that light which is the light of decision, will everything be equal ... balancing impotence on one side of the scale with manhood on the other, and at the center is a half-truth

Title: Ardh Satya
Quote: Apni life ka goal fixed ... naukri aur chokri ... front portion for chokri, back portion reserved for naukri
Trans: The goal of my life is fixed ... a job and a girl ... front portion for the girl and the back portion reserved for the job

Title: Ardh Satya
Quote: Kriti ke pehle aaya hua vichar aur vichar ke baad waali kriti ... inke darmiyan aahuti joh maine di ... jin jin shanon mein main bhool gaya tha dehbaan ... jin jin shanon mein ulajh gaya tha kriti mein ... unhi shanon mein mujhe dikhai di tumhari sambhavna ki sampoorna akruti ... ho chuki hai ab meri kriti poori aur tumhari akruti bujh gayi
Trans: The idea that comes before the action and the action after the idea ... between these the sacrifice that I have given ... in all the moments when I lost my senses ... in all the moments when I was involved in the action ... in those moments I saw the complete form of your likelihood ... now my action is complete and your form has vanished

Title: Masoom
Quote: Joh mazaa apne bete ko jawan hote dekhkar aata hai ... woh apni jawani mein bhi nahi aata tha
Trans: The joy that you get in seeing your son growing young ... that much joy we didn't get in your own youth as well

Title: Masoom
Quote: Angdhai na lena aaise haathon ko uthakar ... seene se tere dekh dupatta na satak jaye
Trans: Don't raise your hands and pandiculate ... since your scarf might fall from your body

Title: Dil Ne Jise Apna Kahaa
Quote: Pyar waqt nahi hai ... joh agar guzar jaye toh vapas nahi aata
Trans: Love is not time ... that once it passes, it doesn't come back

Title: Dil Ne Jise Apna Kahaa
Quote: Lamhon ko yaadein nahi ... yaadgar banate hai
Trans: Don't make moments into memories ... but make them memorable

Title: Dil Ne Jise Apna Kahaa
Quote: Joh guzar gaya woh kal tha ... joh aane waala hai woh bhi kal hai ... faisla tumhe karna hai tum kis kal mein jeena chahte ho
Trans: What has past was yesterday ... what is going to come is tomorrow ... and you have to decide in which one you want to live

Title: Dil Ne Jise Apna Kahaa
Quote: Tumhara dil roaming hai ... kyun ki tumhara roam roam tumhara dil hai
Trans: Your heart is roaming around ... because every part of your body is your heart

Title: Khel Khel Mein
Quote: Pyar aur sadbhavna ki badi se badi deewar bhi ... zindagi aur maut ke beech nahi khadi ho sakti hai
Trans: Even the biggest of the walls of love and good will ... can't stand in between life and death

Title: Khel Khel Mein
Quote: Char-aane kamane ke liye aath-aane ka jhoot bolna padta hai
Trans: To make 25 paise you have to lie worth 50 paise

Title: Raja Ki Aayegi Baaraat
Quote: Stri ko apne pati ka saaya bankar rehna chahiye ... chahe sukh mein ho ya dukh mein
Trans: A woman should stay with her husband like a shadow ... be it in happiness or sadness

Title: Raja Ki Aayegi Baaraat
Quote: Insaan paison se nahi ... parvarish se bada hota hai
Trans: A person is considered big by his upbringing ... and not by his money

Title: Raja Ki Aayegi Baaraat
Quote: Yeh sindoor bazar mein do paise mein zaroor milta hai ... lekin jab kisi aurat ki maang mein bhar diya jaata hai ... toh iski keemat bhagwan bhi nahi chuka sakta
Trans: You get vermilion in the market for two bucks ... but when it is applied to the hair parting of a woman ... then even god can't pay the price for it

Title: Raja Ki Aayegi Baaraat
Quote: Main Bharat sarkar ka sipahi hoon ... jisse yeh haq diya gaya hai ki joh kanoon ki lakeer par paon rakhe ... uske paon kaatkar phek doon
Trans: I'm a soldier of the Indian government ... who has been given the right that if someone sets their feet on the line of the law ... then to cut their legs and throw them away

Title: Hello Hum Lallan Bol Rahe Hain
Quote: Zindagi kya hai, sab time aur naseeb ka khel hai ... khel main hota kya hai ... ek jeetta hai, ek haarta hai ... joh haarta hai uska naseeb, joh jeetta hai uska taqdeer
Trans: What is life, nothing but a game of time and destiny ... what happens in a game ... one wins, one loses ... the one who loses it's his destiny, and the one who wins it's his luck

Title: Hello Hum Lallan Bol Rahe Hain
Quote: Atma bal, atma samman, atma raksha ... hamara karam, hamara lakshya hai suraksha
Trans: With self sacrifice, self respect, self defense ... our duty and our goal is protection

Title: Tirchhi Topiwale
Quote: Mard ki zaat par hamesha lagaam kaskar rakhni chahiye ... zara dheeli chhod do toh awara behl ho jaate hai
Trans: You should always hold the reins of a man tight ... the moment you let it lose they turn into a tramp ox

Title: Tirchhi Topiwale
Quote: Mehfil mein baithkar bhi nigaahen darwaze par tiki ho ... toh samjho kisi ka intezar hai
Trans: If you are sitting in a party and your eyes are stuck on the door ... then understand that you are waiting for someone

Title: Udhar Ka Sindur
Quote: Tum jaisi patni pakar apni taqdeer ki aarti utaarne ko dil chahta hai
Trans: I wish to worship my destiny after getting a wife like you

Title: Udhar Ka Sindur
Quote: Zabaan aadmi ko neecha dikha deti hai ... usse zyada nahi chalana chahiye
Trans: Talking makes a person look shallow ... hence you should not talk much

Title: Udhar Ka Sindur
Quote: Andhe paramatma ko pehchante hai ... aur aankhon waale aadhe ko bhi nahi pehchante
Trans: The blind people recognize god ... and the people who can see don't even recognize the half of it

Title: Udhar Ka Sindur
Quote: Sukh na rahe toh dukh apas mein milkar baant lena chahiye
Trans: If there isn't any happiness then you should share your sadness with others

Title: Bin Phere Hum Tere
Quote: Jeene waala kisi ki jaan bankar bhi jeeta hai ... aur kisi ko jaan banakar bhi jeeta hai
Trans: The one who lives becomes someone's life and lives ... and he also lives by making someone as his own life

Title: Bin Phere Hum Tere
Quote: Sudharne mein sadiyan lag gayi ... bighadne mein sirf ek pal
Trans: It took ages to change for the better ... but only a moment to degenerate

Title: Bin Phere Hum Tere
Quote: Maa ka matlab joh mujhe kisi dictionary ne nahi, balki zindagi ne sikhaya hai ... woh hai ek aaisi aurat jiski aankhon se bacha dekhna seekhta hai, jiski zabaan se bacha bolna seekhta hai aur jiske pairon se bacha chalna seekhta hai
Trans: Life has taught me the meaning of the word mother and not any dictionary ... and it means that she is a woman through the eyes of whom a child learns to see, through the words of whom a child learns to speak and through the legs of whom a child learns to walk

Title: Sahi Dhandhe Galat Bande
Quote: Kuch bacha nahi toh kuch kho nahi sakte ... jab kuch kho hi nahi sakte toh dar kis baat ka
Trans: If we don't have anything left then we can't lose anything ... and if we can't lose anything then what are we scared of

Title: Sahi Dhandhe Galat Bande
Quote: Jab gehun ki zaroorat hoti hai toh ye zameen kisaano ki hoti ... aur jab factory ki zaroorat hoti hai toh ye zameen public purpose ke liye ho jaati hai
Trans: When you need wheat then the land belongs to the farmers ... and when you need a factory then the land is used for public purpose

Title: Sahi Dhandhe Galat Bande
Quote: Jab kuch bolne ka fayda na ho toh ... chup hi rehna chahiye
Trans: When there is no benefit in saying something ... then you should stay quiet

Title: Budtameez
Quote: Aaisi nafrat bhi achi nahi ... joh ghate toh nafrat aur bade toh mohabbat ban jaye
Trans: Such hatred is also not good ... which when reduces becomes hate and when it grows it becomes love

Title: Budtameez
Quote: Jaise sugandh ke bina phool adhoora reh jaata hai ... waise hi naari ka jeevan bina jeevan saathi ke adhoora reh jaata hai
Trans: Just like a flower is incomplete without fragrance ... just like that the life of a woman remains incomplete without a life partner

Title: Budtameez
Quote: Nasha pilake girana toh sabko aata hai ... aare mazaa toh tab hai ki girton ko thaam le saakhi
Trans: Everyone knows how to make someone drink alcohol and fall ... but my friend the fun is when you help the people falling

Title: Budtameez
Quote: Jab itni bewafai par tujhe dil pyar karta hai ... aare zalim agar tu bawafaa hota toh kya hota
Trans: When the heart loves you with even such little unfaithfulness ... then what will happen when you become completely unfaithful

Title: Gair
Quote: Prayashchit insaan ke paapo ko mitta deta hai ... woh buzdil hote hai joh apne paapo ko mittane ke bajaye khud ko mitta dete hai
Trans: Remorse erases the sins of a person ... but those who erase themselves instead of their sins are cowards

Title: Gair
Quote: Jeet ki khushi zahir karna achi baat hai ... lekin maghroor hona munasib nahi
Trans: It's good to show happiness when you win ... but it's not right to be arrogant

Title: Gair
Quote: Main "gaa" bajhata hoon toh "saa" bajhta hai, main "paa" bajhata hoon toh "maa" bajhta hai ... yane ki main kuch bhi bajha saku, usse pehle meri bajh jaati hai
Trans: When I play "gaa" then it sounds like "saa", when I play "paa" then it sounds like "maa" ... basically I get screwed even before I play anything

Title: Gair
Quote: Dobara agar isne mere beete hue kal mein jhaankne ki koshish ki ... toh isse aane waala kal dekhna naseeb nahi hoga
Trans: If he tries to peek into my past once again ... then he won't be lucky enough to see his future

Title: Mr. X
Quote: Main woh Raghuram Rathod nahi joh kanoon ke dayire mein rehkar nainsaafi bardasht karega ... main woh Mr. X hoon joh kanoon todkar insaaf karega
Trans: I'm not Raghuram Rathod who will stay within the limits of law and tolerate injustice ... I'm Mr. X who will break the law and do justice

Title: Mr. X
Quote: Joh tha jalkar khaak ho gaya, ab sirf ek saaya hoon ... Mr. X naam hai mera, tumhari maut bankar aaya hoon
Trans: Whatever I had got burnt into ashes, now I'm only a soul ... my name is Mr. X and I've come as your as death

Title: Mr. X
Quote: Agar shaitan chupkar kaam kar raha hai ... toh bhagwan ko bhi chupkar kaam karna hoga
Trans: If the devil is hiding and doing his work ... then even god will have to hide and do his work

Title: Mr. X
Quote: Arjun ko toh Krishna ki zaroorat hamesha padti hai ... lekin kabhi kabhi Krishna ko bhi Arjun ki zaroorat padti hai
Trans: Arjun always needs help from Lord Krishna ... but sometimes even Lord Krishna needs help from Arjun

Title: Goonj Uthi Shehnai
Quote: Jinka intezar hota hai woh kahan milte hai ... aur jinko khawab mein bhi na socha ho woh baar baar milte hai
Trans: You don't meet the people whom you wait for ... and the people about whom you haven't even dreamed, meet many a times

Title: Goonj Uthi Shehnai
Quote: Sangeet cheez hi aaisi hai ... joh us mein kho nahi jaata woh usse paa bhi nahi sakta
Trans: Music is such a thing that ... a person who doesn't get lost in it, doesn't achieve it

Title: Goonj Uthi Shehnai
Quote: Akhiyan bhool gayi hai sona ... dil par hua hai jadoo tona
Trans: The eyes have forgotton sleeping ... and their has been some black magic on the heart

Title: Gopichand Jasoos
Quote: Roshni chand se hoti hai sitaron se nahi ... dosti ek se hoti hai hazaron se nahi
Trans: Light comes from the moon and not the stars ... you can be friends with one and not with thousands

Title: Gopichand Jasoos
Quote: Pehle mal-malke nahaongi ... aur phir aapki bahon mein aaongi
Trans: First I'll scrub and take a bath ... and then I'll come in your arms

Title: Chandi Sona
Quote: Kutte ki zaat pehchanni ho toh uske aage haddi daal do ... aur aadmi ko pechanna ho toh usse daulat aur taqat de do
Trans: If you want to know the character of a dog then put a bone in front of him ... and if you want to know the character of a person then give him money and power

Title: Chandi Sona
Quote: Kisi ki shab-e-vasl haste kate hai, kisi ki shab-e-hijr rote kate hai ... hamari yeh shab kaisi shab hai ki ya rab, na haste kate hai na rote kate hai
Trans: The night of meeting for some people passes by in happiness, the night of separation for some people passes by in sadness ... oh god what kind of night is my night, it doesn't pass by in happiness and neither in sadness

Title: Chandi Sona
Quote: Bina mushkil mein padhe kamyabi milti bhi toh nahi ... mushkilen itni padhi mujhpar ki aasaan ho gayi
Trans: Without falling into difficulties you don't get success ... and there were so many difficulties on me that it actually became simple

Title: Chandi Sona
Quote: Mohabbat mein chirag-e-gul zamane ki hawa thandi ... chahe jitni bhi aag jale ishq ki, hawa thandi ki thandi
Trans: In love the air flowing in the world of lightened flowers is cold ... no matter how much fire burns of romance, the air is still cold

Title: Kyun Ho Gaya Na
Quote: Zindagi mein kabhi jeet hai toh kabhi haar ... lekin agar hum koshish karne se pehle hi haar maan le ... toh hum mein pata kaise chalega ki hum haarne waale the ya phir shayad jeetne waale
Trans: In life sometimes you win and sometimes you lose ... but if we accept defeat even before we try ... then how will we know whether we were going to lose or perhaps may be win

Title: Kyun Ho Gaya Na
Quote: Zindagi mein dil ki baat kehne ki himmat tabhi aati hai ... jab hamara pyar hamare hi samne kisi aur ka ho raha ho
Trans: In life you get the courage to say what is in your heart when ... our love is becoming someone else's in front of our own eyes

Title: Kyun Ho Gaya Na
Quote: Pyar ko waqt ki nahi ... ek lamhe ki zaroorat hoti hai
Trans: Love doesn't need time ... it just needs a moment

Title: Kyun Ho Gaya Na
Quote: Race chahe car ki ho chahe zindagi ki ... jab tum sirf jeetne ke liye kheloge na ... zaroor jeetoge
Trans: Be it a car race or a race of life ... when you'll play only to win ... you'll definitely win

Title: Sangdil
Quote: Duniya mein asli shanti kisi ke sache pyar mein hi mil sakti hai ... uske bagair duniya jise shanti kehti hai, woh shanti ek thakan hai ... shakast ya maut ka doosra naam hai
Trans: In this world true peace can only be found by falling in love with someone ... without that what the world calls peace, that peace is tiredness ... which is the other name for defeat or death

Title: Sangdil
Quote: Zindagi aur waqt ka dariya aaisa hai ... aadmi ek baar usse laang jaye toh phir kabhi vapas nahi aa sakta
Trans: The sea of life and time is such that ... once a person crosses it then he can never come back

Title: Sangdil
Quote: Main kisi se nahi darta ... main zindagi se nahi darta, maut se nahi darta, andheron se nahi darta ... darta hoon toh sirf khoobsurati se
Trans: I'm not scared of anyone ... I'm not scared of life, I'm not scared of death, I'm not scared of darkness ... if I'm scared, then I'm only scared of beauty

Title: Sangdil
Quote: Din ke waqt toh phool achche lagte hi hai ... magar chandni mein dekhiye toh yun lagta hai ... jaise nanne nanne shokh farishtey door ke dariya mein tairte phir rahe ho
Trans: Flowers do look good during the day ... but when you see them in the moonlight then it feels like ... small lively angels are swimming in a distant river

Title: Razia Sultan
Quote: Husn hai zaat meri, ishq sifat hai meri ... hoon toh main shamma, magar bhes hai parwaane ka
Trans: Beauty is my forte, love is my character ... though I'm a flame, but my outlook is of a fire fly

Title: Razia Sultan
Quote: Tujhe main marne se pehle agar dekh loonga ... toh mar jaane ke baad bhi meri aankhen zinda reh jayengi
Trans: If I see you before dying ... then even after my death my eyes will remain alive

Title: Razia Sultan
Quote: Falak se awaaz hai ke aao ... tumhare layak na thi woh duniya ... tumhari khatir hum aasman par ek aur duniya saja rahe hai ... khuda ka irshaad ho raha hai ... falak nasheeno salaam bhejo ... lahu mein doobey shaheed-e-ulfat meri panahon mein aa rahe hai ... meri panahon mein aa rahe hai ... meri panahon mein aa rahe hai
Trans: There is a call from the skies to come ... this world is unfit for you ... we are decorating another new world for you in the skies ... it's God's order ... that the shining stars in the skies send your message ... the martyrs of love drenched in blood are coming into my protection ... are coming into my protection ... are coming into my protection

Title: Dolly Ki Doli
Quote: Joh log social nahi hote woh social networking sites pe hote hai
Trans: People who are not social are found on social networking sites

Title: Dolly Ki Doli
Quote: Asal mein log joh karte hai, woh wohi kar sakte hai ... joh woh ho sakte hai, wohi woh hote hai
Trans: In reality what people do, they can only do that ... and what they can become, they are that only

Title: Dolly Ki Doli
Quote: Aa rahi hai woh haseen mohtarma jiske samne na chalta hai filmy duniya ka fashion ... aur naa hi chalta hai aap jaise deewano ka paisan
Trans: Coming up is a beautiful girl in front of whom the fashion of the film world doesn't have any value ... and neither does the money of people like you has any value

Title: Dolly Ki Doli
Quote: Biwiyan toh dono hi lootati hai ... jeevan bhar saath dene waali bhi aur agle din faraar hone waali bhi
Trans: Both kinds of wife's cost a lot ... the one who stays together for the entire life and the one who runs away the very next day

Title: Dil Diya Dard Liya
Quote: Bhagwan ne kitni achchi tarah tumko sajakar is duniya mein behja hai ... aankhen jaise jheel mein khile hue do kamal ... dekhti hai toh aakash mein indradhanush khil uthte hai ... sharamati hai toh kaliyon ka sar jhuk jaata hai
Trans: God has decorated you so well and sent you in this world ... your eyes are like two blossomed lotus flowers in a lake ... when they see then rainbows are formed in the sky ... and when they feel shy then flowers bow their head down

Title: Dil Diya Dard Liya
Quote: Maine tumhari mohabbat ko ishwar ka vardaan samajhkar seene se lagaye rakha ... aur uske badle mein tumne mujhe kya diya? ... apni bewafai ka yeh zehar ... yeh zehar jisne meri nas-nas mein nafrat aur inteqam ke jwalamukhi bhar diye
Trans: I kept your love in my arms thinking it was a blessing from god ... and instead of that what did you give me? ... this poison of your betrayal ... this poison that has filled volcanoes of hatred and revenge in my veins

Title: Dil Diya Dard Liya
Quote: Hazaron beh gaye in botalon ke bandh pani mein ... glasson mein joh doobe phir na ubhare zindagani mein
Trans: Thousands have been washed away with the liquid enclosed in these bottles ... those who drowned in the glasses have never come back in life

Title: Dil Diya Dard Liya
Quote: Aurat ki izzat uska dharam hota hai
Trans: The dignity of a woman is her duty

Title: Ram Balram
Quote: Jab ek policeman khada ho jaata hai ... toh sau chor chup jaate hai
Trans: When one policeman stands up ... then 100 thieves go into hiding

Title: Ram Balram
Quote: Jis jurm par mera naam likha jayega uspar tumhara naam pehle se likha hoga ... aur jis gali mein main kutte ki maut maara jaonga ... us gali mein ek bahut bada kutta pehle se mara pada hoga
Trans: The crime on which my name will be written, your name will be written on that before mine ... and the lane in which I'll die a dog's death ... in that lane one big dog will be lying dead before me

Title: Ram Balram
Quote: Joh khuda ke pyare hote hai ... woh waqt se pehle khuda ko pyare nahi hote
Trans: Those who are god's beloved ... god doesn't call them ahead of time

Title: ABCD 2: Any Body Can Dance 2
Quote: Sahi direction mein utha har kadam ... apne aap mein ek manzil hai ... after all life is all about the next step
Trans: Every step that moves in the right direction ... is a goal in itself ... after all life is all about the next step

Title: ABCD 2: Any Body Can Dance 2
Quote: Agar koi music feel kar sakta hai ... then anybody can dance!
Trans: If someone can feel music ... then anybody can dance!

Title: ABCD 2: Any Body Can Dance 2
Quote: We dance to express ... not to impress
Trans: We dance to express ... not to impress

Title: ABCD 2: Any Body Can Dance 2
Quote: Galatiyan sabse hoti hai ... but life is all about a second chance
Trans: Everyone commits mistakes ... but life is all about a second chance

Title: Amit Sahni Ki List
Quote: First love jitna special hota hai na ... utna hi painful first heart break hota hai
Trans: How much special first love is ... that much painful the first heart break is

Title: Amit Sahni Ki List
Quote: Thappad aaise hi hote hai ... jab expect karo toh nahi milte hai ... aur jab na expect karo toh bijli ki tarah lapak ke padte hai
Trans: Slaps are like that only ... when you expect them, then you don't get them ... and when you don't expect them, then they come at you like lightning

Title: Amit Sahni Ki List
Quote: Jab insaan Doordarshan dekhne par utar aata hai ... toh samajh lo all is not well
Trans: When a person starts watching Doordarshan ... then understand that everything is not well

Title: Amit Sahni Ki List
Quote: Dil tootne ka ek side effect yeh bhi hota hai ... ki bill bhi choot jaate hai
Trans: One side effect of a heart break is also that ... even the bills get left behind

Title: Maharathi
Quote: Har badi daulat ke peeche koi na koi jurm hota hai
Trans: Behind every great fortune there is a crime

Title: Maharathi
Quote: Kam jokhim aur kam munafa, usse business kehte hai ... zabardast jokhim aur zabardast munafa, usse jua kehte hai ... lekin kam jokhim aur zabardast munafa, usse mauka kehte hai
Trans: Less risk and less profit is called as business ... more risk and more profit is called as gambling ... but less risk and more profit is called as opportunity

Title: Maharathi
Quote: Agar zindagi bhar ka hisaab lagaya jaye ... toh gairon ke muqabale apne hi zyada khatarnak sabit hue hai
Trans: If you account for the entire life ... then in front of strangers it is our dear ones that have proved to be more dangerous

Title: John Jani Janardhan
Quote: Jab tak tum jaise log is desh mein zinda hai ... tab tak sach bolne waalon ka dum ghutta rahega, hinsa ka gala dabta rahega ... lekin mere jeete jee main yeh nahi hone doonga ... main tum logon ke haath kaat daalonga aur gala ghoot doonga
Trans: Until people like you are living in this country ... till then people who say the truth will suffocate, and the neck of violence will be pressed ... but I won't let that happen until I'm living ... I'll cut your hands and squeeze your neck

Title: John Jani Janardhan
Quote: Tumhari jaan mere liye bahut keemti hai ... magar meri jaan mere liye, tumhari jaan se zyada keemti hai
Trans: Your life is very precious to me ... but my life for me, is much more precious than your life

Title: Haathkadi
Quote: Joh log baimaani ke bazaar mein khud kaudiyon ke daam bikke ho na ... woh doosron ki wafaadari ki keemat nahi lagate
Trans: Those who themselves have been sold cheaply in the market of dishonesty ... they don't put a price on the honesty of other people

Title: Haathkadi
Quote: Dekh is panje ko ... desh bhakti, wafaadari, khuddari, sachai aur mardaangi ka yeh panja agar bhoole se tere thopde par pada na ... toh teri bateesi bahar nikal jayegi
Trans: Look at this hand ... if you get punched in the face even by mistake by this hand of patriotism, honesty, self respect, truth and manliness ... then your teeth will fall out

Title: Haathkadi
Quote: Yeh joh raajneeti hai na, yeh one day cricket match ki tarah hai ... is mein faisla kabhi kabhi aakhri gendh par hota hai
Trans: Politics is like a one day cricket match ... in this sometimes the result is decided on the last ball

Title: Haathkadi
Quote: Style marna mera kaam ... kyun ki Rajinikanth mera naam
Trans: It's my job to be in style ... because Rajinikanth is my name

Title: Judge Mujrim
Quote: Udhar log mitane jaate hai gham ... aur uska naach dekhke nikal jaata hai ache-achon ka dum
Trans: People go there to erase their sadness ... and after seeing her dance even the best of the best are left helpless

Title: Judge Mujrim
Quote: Yeh upar waala hai na hamesha chuhe billi ka khel khelta hai ... kabhi itna sukh deta hai ki sambhala nahi jaata ... kabhi itna dukh de deta hai ki dil se nikala nahi jaata
Trans: God always plays the game of cat and mouse ... sometimes he gives so much happiness that you can't handle it ... and sometimes he gives so much sorrow that you can't remove it from the heart

Title: Judge Mujrim
Quote: Tumne khud mujhe zindagi ke aaise modh par akela chhoda hai ... jahan se aage main badh nahi sakti aur peeche hatne ke kabil nahi rahi
Trans: You yourself have brought and left me on such a path of life ... from where I can't move forward and I'm not in a position to move back

Title: Judge Mujrim
Quote: Apne maqsad mein kamyaabi haasil karne ke liye ... taqat se zyada himmat ki zaroorat hoti hai
Trans: To get success in your motive ... more than strength you need to have courage

Title: Muqabla
Quote: Pehle tolo ... phir bolo!
Trans: First think ... and then talk!

Title: Muqabla
Quote: Aaj ke zamane mein izzat ussi ki hai ... joh ya toh kisi ka kuch bighad sakta ho ya phir savaar sakta ho
Trans: In today's time only that person is respected ... the one who can destroy someone or else the one who can improve someone

Title: Muqabla
Quote: Agar mere bhai ke jism par itni si bhi kharash aayi na ... toh main tumhara aur tumhare bhaiyon ka woh haal karoonga ... ki poore shehar ki police tum logon ke mooh par thookna bhi pasand nahi karegi
Trans: Even if a small scratch comes on my brothers body ... then I'll make such a condition of you and your brothers ... that the police of the entire city won't even like to spit on your face

Title: Muqabla
Quote: Aapke facing, dressing, cutting sab kuch dekh ke mujhe ho raha hai doubting ... issi liye keh diya auraton ko no outing
Trans: Looking at your face, dressing, cutting and everything else I'm in doubt ... hence I've asked women not to step out

Title: Mr Ya Miss
Quote: Ladke sirf do hi condition mein raat bhar jaagte hai ... ya toh India Pakistan ka final ho ... ya toh phir kisi ladki ke saath ho
Trans: Guys stay awake in the night only on two conditions ... either there is a India vs Pakistan final (match) ... or else if he is with a girl

Title: Mr Ya Miss
Quote: Khoobsurati ki tareef na ho ... toh khoobsurati ki tauheen kehlati hai
Trans: If you don't praise beauty ... then it's like giving disrespect to beauty

Title: Mr Ya Miss
Quote: Woh maut bhi kitni haseen hogi ... apne janaze ke paas dus barah kudiyan namkeen hogi
Trans: How beautiful will that death be ... when there will be 10 to 12 beautiful girls at my funeral

Title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
Quote: Tum bhi mujhse pyar karti ho bahut pyar, lekin kahogi nahi ... tadapogi mere bagair lekin jataogi nahi ... mere paas aana chahti ho, seene se lagke rona chahti ho, dil mein rehna chahti ho lekin rahogi nahi ... lekin main tumhari tarah nahi hoon ... main toh reh hi nahi sakta yeh kahe bina ki mujhe tumse ishq hai
Trans: You also love me very much, but you won't say that ... you'll wriggle without me but you won't show that ... you want to come to me, you want to hug me and cry, you want to stay in my heart but you won't stay ... but I'm not like you ... I can't live without saying that I love you

Title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
Quote: Dard kam hota hai khushi dene se ... dukh kam hota hai sukh dene se
Trans: Pain reduces by giving joy ... sadness reduces by giving happiness

Title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
Quote: Hum kisi aur se pyar tabhi kar sakte hai ... jab hum apne aap se karna chhod de
Trans: We can love someone else only when ... we stop loving ourselves

Title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
Quote: Yahi toh kiya hai tum jaise mardon ne hum jaisi auraton ke saath ... kabhi kook mein hi maar dala toh kabhi pehda hote hi ... yeh kaisi ajeeb parampara hai tum logon ki ... sab kuch tumhare naam ka ... maang meri sindoor tumhare naam ka, gala mera mangalsutra tumhare naam ka, kalai meri chudiyan tumhare naam ki ... yahan tak ki kook meri, khoon mera, doodh mera aur bacha tumhare naam ka ... sab kuch tumhare naam ka ... phir yeh batao aakhir tumhare paas kya hai mere naam ka?
Trans: This is what men like you have done to women like me ... sometimes you kill us when we are in the womb and sometimes just after we are born ... what kind of tradition you guys have ... where everything is in your name ... the hair parting is mine but the vermilion powder is in your name, the neck is mine but the wedding necklace is in your name, the wrist is mine but the bangles are in your name ... infact even the womb, blood, milk all are mine but the child is in your name ... everything is in your name ... now tell me what do you have in my name?

Title: Superman
Quote: Har positive ka negative hota hai ... roshni ke baad andhera zaroor hota hai
Trans: Every positive has a negative ... and after daylight comes darkness

Title: Superman
Quote: Jai Maa Durga, pakad ke laya hoon murga ... jaldi se isko kaato aur maal apas mein baanto
Trans: By the grace of Goddess Durga, I've caught and brought a chicken ... now lets cut it quickly and share the money

Title: Hum Se Na Takrana
Quote: Ameeron se gareebon ki haddiyan toh chabayi ja sakti hai ... unke ghar ki roti nahi
Trans: Rich people can chew the bones of poor people ... but not the food of their house

Title: Hum Se Na Takrana
Quote: Ab hua malum aahon ka dhuan hota hai kya ... apne daaman mein lagi aag toh rota hai kya?
Trans: Now you know how it feels like to be in pain and sorrow ... and now that you're on fire, you're crying?

Title: Hum Se Na Takrana
Quote: Main tera khoon karoonga aur tera ghost apni gali ke kutton ko khilaonga
Trans: I'll kill you and give your meat to the dogs of my colony

Title: Hum Se Na Takrana
Quote: Jab gareeb ka khoon khaulta hai ... toh uske gusse ke sailaab mein daulat ke bade se bade pahad toot jaate hai
Trans: When the blood of a poor person boils ... then in that flood of anger even the biggest mountain of money breaks apart

Title: Haatim Tai
Quote: Ulfat ke raaste mein na deewar koi aaye ... jaise mile hai hum, khuda sabko yunhi milaye
Trans: No wall should come in between the path of love ... the way we have met, oh god please make everyone meet like this

Title: Haatim Tai
Quote: Jiske dil mein Allah ka noor hota hai ... woh andha hokar bhi sab kuch dekh sakta hai
Trans: The one who has the light of god in his heart ... he can see everything even if he is blind

Title: Haatim Tai
Quote: Bewafaa tujhko pukarenge zamane waale ... na chura aankh mere dil ko churane waale
Trans: The people of the world will call you unfaithful ... oh my love don't look away from me

Title: Haatim Tai
Quote: Dil ko rahat sukoon nazaron ko, dono aalam pe tera sayaa hai ... husn-e-jaad karne waale ne tujhe kuch soch ke banaya hai
Trans: Relief to the heart and peace to the eyes, your shadow is in both conditions ... the creator of the body must have made you after thinking about something

Title: Ghar Mein Ram Gali Mein Shyam
Quote: Naye pati patni jahan bhi akele ho ... usse apna bedroom bana lete hai
Trans: Wherever a recently married husband and wife are alone ... they make their bedroom out there

Title: Ghar Mein Ram Gali Mein Shyam
Quote: Izzatdar aur bazaru aurat mein sirf ek hi farak hota hai ... suhaag ki nishani mangalsutra
Trans: There is only one difference between a respectful and a disrespectful woman ... the sign of being married, that is her wedding necklace

Title: Ghar Mein Ram Gali Mein Shyam
Quote: Tareef joh hai na woh ek promissory note ki tarah hai aur gaali hai ready cash ki tarah ... tareef karke kisi ko kharab karne se achcha hai ... ki gaali dekar usko sudhara jaye
Trans: Appreciation is like a promissory note and cursing is like ready cash ... rather than appreciating someone and spoiling them ... it's better to improve them by cursing

Title: Ghar Mein Ram Gali Mein Shyam
Quote: Aurat woh shola hai joh pyar se aadmi ki zindagi ko roshan kar sakti hai ... aur agar nafrat kare toh uski zindagi ko jalakar raakh kar sakti hai
Trans: A woman is that flame which can lighten a man's life with love ... but if she hates him then she can burn his life into ashes

Title: Khiladi 420
Quote: Phooti hui taqdeer aur tezz dimag bahut hi khatarnak combination ho sakta hai
Trans: The combination of bad luck and a sharp mind can be very deadly

Title: Khiladi 420
Quote: Bhagwan ke saath khel, sentimental hai maaf kar dega ... bhai mental hai, cheerke rakh dega
Trans: Play with god, he will forgive you since he is sentimental ... I'm mental and I'll tear you apart

Title: Khiladi 420
Quote: Teen cheezon ki wajah se rishtey bante bighadte hai ... aapke dil mein kya hai, aapki kismat mein kya hai aur aapki jeb mein kya hai
Trans: Because of three things relationships are made or destroyed ... what is in your heart, what is in your destiny and what is in your pocket

Title: Khiladi 420
Quote: Kayi baatein is chewing gum ki tarah hoti hai ... jab tak mooh mein rehti hai achcha lagta hai ... bahar aate hi pareshani ban jaati hai
Trans: Many things are like this chewing gum ... until they stay in the mouth it feels good ... and when they come out they become a problem

Title: Hum Ho Gaye Aap Ke
Quote: Jab maa baap pyar ke khilaaf hote hai toh pyar ke dushman nahi ... balki pyar ko aur mazboot karte hai
Trans: When parents are against love then they are not the enemies of love ... instead they make the love more stronger

Title: Hum Ho Gaye Aap Ke
Quote: Kabhi kabhi koi baat hum mein galat lagti hai ... aur kuch samay baad wohi hum mein sahi lagti hai
Trans: Sometimes what we feel is wrong ... after sometime it feels right to us

Title: Hum Ho Gaye Aap Ke
Quote: Kabhi na kabhi, kahin na kahin yeh deewana maara jayega ... sheeshay mein dil ke utara jayega
Trans: Someday, somewhere you'll fall in love ... and you'll be locked into the bottle of the heart

Title: Dil Ne Phir Yaad Kiya
Quote: Chutki bhar sindoor ki keemat bhale hi tumhari nazaron mein ek lal rang se zyada na ho ... lekin ek suhagan ke liye yeh sindoor hi uska suhaag, uski taqat hoti hai
Trans: The value for a pinch of vermilion may be just a red powder in your eyes ... but for a married woman this vermilion is her husband and her strength

Title: Dil Ne Phir Yaad Kiya
Quote: Us insaan ka marna bhi kya hai ... jiske marne ke baad usko koi dil yaad na kare
Trans: What good is the death of a person ... who is not remembered by any heart after dying

Title: Dil Ne Phir Yaad Kiya
Quote: Pyar aur shaq ka purana rishta hai ... jitna zyada pyar utna hi zyada shaq
Trans: Love and suspicion have an old relationship ... the more the love, that much more suspicion there is

Title: Dil Ne Phir Yaad Kiya
Quote: Yakeen aur jeet mein bahut kam farak hota hai ... aur jeetne waale kabhi harne ke bare mein nahi sochte
Trans: There is very less difference between certainty and victory ... and those who win don't think about losing

Title: Jhumroo
Quote: Zulm ka badla lene ka mauka zindagi mein ek baar har insaan ko milta hai
Trans: Everyone gets a chance in life to take revenge for injustice

Title: Jhumroo
Quote: Gareeb ameer ka farak sirf haisiyat se hi nahi ... dil se bhi hota hai
Trans: The difference between the poor and the rich is not only of the status ... but also of the heart

Title: Jhumroo
Quote: Bachpan mein tu jab rota tha tab log samajhte the ki tu sur mein gaa raha hai ... aur ab main jab gaata hoon toh log samajhte hai ki main ro raha hoon
Trans: In childhood when I used to cry then people used to think that I'm singing melodiously ... and now when I sing then people think that I'm crying

Title: Jhumroo
Quote: Ladke ko akal se aur ladki ko shakal se pehchana jaata hai
Trans: You recognize a guy with his mind and a girl with her face

Title: Pyaar Tune Kya Kiya
Quote: Aadmi agar achche mann aur lagan se kaam kare ... toh nothing is impossible
Trans: If a man works with a clean heart and devotion ... then nothing is impossible

Title: Pyaar Tune Kya Kiya
Quote: Bhook lagegi toh aam ke pedh ke upar chadkar aamiya kha lenge ... pyaas lagi toh kuaan se pani pee lenge ... neend lagi toh peepal ke pedh ke neeche soo lenge ... aur aapka yaad aaya toh chup-chap akele mein ro lenge
Trans: If I feel hungry then I'll climb on a mango tree and eat mangoes ... if I feel thirsty then I'll drink water from the well ... if I feel sleepy then I'll sleep under the fig tree ... and if I miss you then I'll cry when I'm alone

Title: Indrajeet
Quote: Aurat chahe maa ho, behen ho ya beti ho ... uske bhagya mein rona hi likha hai ... woh chahe bhagwan ko bhi janam de ... uske naseeb mein aasoon hi aasoon hai
Trans: Whether a woman is a mother, a sister or a daughter ... crying is written in her destiny ... and even if she gives birth to god ... she still will have tears in her fate

Title: Indrajeet
Quote: Police ki naukri karne ke liye jigar ispat ka aur badan faulad ka banana padta hai
Trans: To do the job of police you need to have the courage of steel and a strong body

Title: Indrajeet
Quote: Vishvas ek bahut hi nazuk sheesha hota hai ... ek baar toot jaye toh dobara judta nahi
Trans: Trust is a very brittle mirror ... once it breaks then it can never be fixed

Title: Indrajeet
Quote: Apradh agar pataal ke andheron mein bhi chup jaye ... toh bhi sazaa peecha karte hue wahan pahunch jaati hai
Trans: Even if crime hides in the darkness of the underworld ... still punishment will follow it and get there

Title: Neel Kamal
Quote: Bhagwan jin do aatmaon ko ek bandhan mein band dete hai ... wohi sansar mein janam lekar vivah bandhan mein bandte hai
Trans: The two souls that god connects into one bond ... they take birth in this world and get connected with the bond of marriage

Title: Neel Kamal
Quote: Shahi talwarein mohabbat ki gardan par chalti rahi hai ... lekin mohabbat ka naam hamesha roshan hota raha hai
Trans: Royal swords have charged the neck of love since a long time ... but the name of love has always been shining

Title: Neel Kamal
Quote: Aashiqkon ki chittaon par lagenge har baras mele ... ishq par marne waalon ka yahi baqi nishaan hoga
Trans: There will be exhibitions every year on the pyres of lovers ... and that will be the eternal sign of those who die for love

Title: Neel Kamal
Quote: Har dam duayen dena, har lamha aahen bharna ... unka bhi kaam karlo aur apna bhi kaam karna
Trans: Always give blessings and every moment take a sigh ... do their work and my work as well

Title: Mulzim
Quote: Ek achcha insaan banane ke liye aadmi ko puri zindagi bhi kam padti hai ... aur bura insaan banane ke liye sirf ek lamha kaafi hai
Trans: For a person to become into a good human being, even the whole life is less ... and to become into an evil person, even one moment is more than enough

Title: Mulzim
Quote: Duniya mein ooncha naam kamane waale waqt se pehle apne iraade zahir nahi karte
Trans: People who make a big name in the world don't disclose their intentions before time

Title: Mulzim
Quote: Duniya mein jis insaan ka zameer zinda hai ... woh maut bardasht kar lega lekin apni beizzati aur apmaan nahi
Trans: In this world a person whose conscience is alive ... he will tolerate death but not his disrespect and insult

Title: Mulzim
Quote: Hukumat karne waale ke haath se taqat aur aurat ke haath se jab mard nikal jaata hai ... toh woh dono zyada der tak chup nahi reh sakte
Trans: When power from a person ruling and a man under a woman's hand are lost ... then they both can't stay quiet for long

Title: Raaj Tilak
Quote: Talwar woh hathyar hai joh dost ke haath mein ho toh usse badkar koi dost nahi ... aur agar yahi talwar dushman ke haath lag jaye toh usse bura koi dushman nahi
Trans: A sword is a weapon which when is held by a friend then there is no bigger friend than him ... and if the same sword is held by an enemy then there is no bigger enemy than him

Title: Raaj Tilak
Quote: Jinki ragon mein Rajputi khoon hota hai ... unke jism par dushman ke diye hue ghaav toh hote hai ... lekin unki talwar kafan ki tarah kori nahi hoti
Trans: Those who have royal blood in their veins ... they do have the marks given by the enemy on their body ... but their sword is not as clean as a shroud

Title: Raaj Tilak
Quote: Ek sacha musalman wafaa ke naam par jaan tak kurbaan kar deta hai ... magar gaddari ka taj pehenkar jee nahi sakta ... chahe us mein Kohinoor ka heera hi kyun na jada ho
Trans: A true Muslim can give up his life in the name of loyalty ... but he will not be able to live wearing a crown of betrayal ... even if it has the Kohinoor diamond on it

Title: Raaj Tilak
Quote: Meri zindagi ek saaz ban gayi hai ... aur iske har taar par sirf tumhare hi pyar ka geet gaya ja sakta hai
Trans: My life has become a musical instrument ... and on every string of it, only the song of your love can be played

Title: Nachnewale Gaanewale
Quote: Is duniya mein jis kisi ko tarakki ki seedi se upar chadna hota hai na ... usse na anpadh jahil hona chahiye ... aur na hi anpadh aur jahilon se koi rishta rakhna chahiye
Trans: In this world a person who wants to climb the ladder of success ... he must not be uneducated and ignorant ... and neither must he keep any relationship with the uneducated and ignorant

Title: Nachnewale Gaanewale
Quote: Shayaron ki mehfil mein jaate hai toh shayar ho jaate hai ... aur koi apne se tagda mil jaye toh kayar ho jaate hai ... zindagi ki gadi mein fit kardo toh tyre ho jaate hai ... aur agar bandook mein fit kardo toh fire ho jaate hai
Trans: When we go in a party of poets then we become a poet ... and if we get someone stronger than us then we become cowards ... if you fit us in the car of life then we become tyres ... and if you fit us in a gun then we get fired

Title: Nachnewale Gaanewale
Quote: Sitaron se aage jahaan aur bhi hai ... abhi ishq ke imtihan aur bhi hai
Trans: There is a world beyond the stars ... and there are still more examinations left in love

Title: Nachnewale Gaanewale
Quote: Maine is duniya mein bahut saare logon ko daulat aa jaane ke baad apna ghar badalte dekha hai, halaat badalte dekha hai, kapde badalte dekha hai ... maa baap badalte kisi ko nahi dekha hai
Trans: I have seen a lot of people in this world who have changed their house, changed their conditions, changed their clothing after getting money ... but I've never seen anyone changing his parents

Title: Jeete Hain Shaan Se
Quote: Rishte sirf teen hote hai ... ek roti ka bhook se, doosra dosti ka dushmani se aur teesra zindagi ka maut se
Trans: There are only three types of relationships ... one of bread with hunger, second of friendship with enmity and third of life with death

Title: Jeete Hain Shaan Se
Quote: Apun ki parchai maut ka pehghaam lati hai ... apun ki awaaz jung ka elaan karti hai ... aur apun ki maujoodgi sare bazar dushman ko nanga karti hai
Trans: My shadow brings the message of death ... my voice announces the war ... and my presence makes the enemy naked in the middle of the market

Title: Jeete Hain Shaan Se
Quote: Aaisa dimak bankar khaonga ki kab tootta, kab bhikra aur kab tabah hua ... teri parchaiyon ko bhi pata nahi chalega
Trans: I'll become such a termite and eat you that when you'll break, when you'll separate and when you'll be destroyed ... even your shadow won't come to know of that

Title: Jeete Hain Shaan Se
Quote: Jaise sher ki aankhon mein dekhkar uska shikaar apni jagah se hil nahi sakta ... waise hi mere dushman meri izaazat ke bagair kahin nahi jaa sakta
Trans: Just like a prey can't move from its spot after looking into the tiger's eye ... just like that my enemy can't go anywhere without my permission

Title: Chacha Bhatija
Quote: Shehar kitna bhi ajnabee kyun na ho ... koi na koi toh apna mil hi jaata hai
Trans: No matter how alien a city is ... you do find someone that is near to you

Title: Chacha Bhatija
Quote: Anaaj toh bahut pehda hota hai seth ... magar usse gareebon ke pet nahi tum logon ke godaam bhare jaate hai ... tabhi toh tum logon ki tijori mein rakha hua paisa nahi gina ja sakta ... magar gareebon ke jism ki pasliyan zaroor gini ja sakti hai
Trans: A lot of crops get harvested sir ... but your warehouses are filled with it, instead of the stomach of poor people ... and that's why the money stored in your vault's cannot be counted ... but the bones within the bodies of poor people can definitely be counted

Title: Chacha Bhatija
Quote: Mujhe na chhedo yaaron main nashe mein hoon ... sheeshay mein main, main mein nasha, main nashe mein hoon
Trans: Don't tease me my friends since I'm intoxicated ... I'm in a bottle, intoxication is within me, and I'm intoxicated

Title: Chacha Bhatija
Quote: Duniya mein saare rishte mohabbat ke rishte hote hai ... agar mohabbat hai toh paraye bhi apne ho jaate hai ... agar mohabbat nahi toh khoon bhi khoon ko nahi pehchanta
Trans: All the relationships in the world are that of love ... if there is love then even strangers become our dear ones ... and if there is no love then people don't even recognize their own blood

Title: Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke
Quote: Hoga, na jaane kaisa hoga ... kahin na kahin, koi na koi, uparwaale ne meri kismat mein bhi likha hoga
Trans: There will be someone but I don't know how will he be ... god has written someone, somewhere in my destiny as well

Title: Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke
Quote: Pyar kabhi kabhi door hoke bhi itna paas hota hai ... aur kabhi paas hoke bhi kitna door ki mann usse dekhne ke liye itna tarasta hai jaise ... tapta reghistan baarish ki pehli boond ko tarasta hai ... kabhi bhaad ki tarah aata hai toh sab kuch baha le jaata hai ... kabhi os bankar girta hai, sab toot jaata hai ... par pyaas nahi bhujti ... aaisa anokha hota hai pyar
Trans: Sometimes love being so far is still so close to us ... and sometimes being so close is still so far from us, that the heart yearns to see to her just like ... a hot desert yearns for the first drop of rain ... sometimes it comes like a flood and takes away everything with it ... sometimes it falls like a dewdrop and everything breaks ... still the thirst doesn't end ... that's how unusual love is

Title: Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke
Quote: Log pyar ko kahan kahan talash nahi karte hai ... par pyar apne aashiqon ko khud dhoond leta hai
Trans: People search for love in so many places ... but love itself finds its lovers

Title: Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke
Quote: Andhere mein insaan pal do pal ke liye tehar toh sakta hai, aaram kar sakta hai ... par zindagi jee nahi sakta
Trans: In darkness a person can stand for a moment or two, he can relax ... but he cannot live his life over there

Title: Bas Ek Pal
Quote: Main tumhara hoon aur hamesha rahoonga ... tum na meri thi aur na kabhi hogi
Trans: I'm yours and I'll always be yours ... you were never mine and you'll never be mine

Title: Bas Ek Pal
Quote: Tumhara saath chahiye zindagi bhar ke liye ... taki main tumhe itna pyar de sakon ... jitna is duniya mein hai hi nahi
Trans: I need your companionship for the entire life ... so that I can give you so much love ... more than what is there in this world

Title: Sur: The Melody of Life
Quote: Kisi ke kehne se insaan chota nahi hota ... agar chota hota hai toh khud apne ehsaas se
Trans: A person doesn't become small just by someone calling him ... if he is small then only by his feelings

Title: Sur: The Melody of Life
Quote: Ek baat toh sabit ho gayi ki hunar joh hai woh insaan ke khoon mein basta hai ... daala nahi ja sakta
Trans: One thing is proved that talent resides in the blood of a person ... it cannot be inserted

Title: 8 x 10 Tasveer
Quote: Har tasveer ek lamhe ko giraftar kar leti hai
Trans: Every photo captures a moment in time

Title: 8 x 10 Tasveer
Quote: Insaan ke jeevan ko tasveeron ka ek caravan samjho ... saikado tasveeron ka caravan
Trans: Consider the life of a person as a caravan of photos ... a caravan of many photos

Title: Paying Guests
Quote: Zindagi ek echo sound ki tarah hoti hai ... isse jis tarah sawaal pocha jaye na ... us tarah mudkar jawab bhi mil jaata hai
Trans: Life is like an echo sound ... the type of question you ask to it ... that kind of answer you'll get back in return

Title: Paying Guests
Quote: Ek toh hotel thanda, dhanda manda, upar se tu zaleel bandha
Trans: First of all there is no one in the hotel, the business is slow, and on top of that you're a humiliating person

Title: Paying Guests
Quote: Arrey duniya waalon ne toh chand tak ko nahi chhoda ... toh ek abla besahara aurat ko kya chhodenge ... duniya ki ungliyan uspar uthti rahengi aur aurat ka dum ghutta rahega
Trans: People of the world have not left the moon alone ... then how will they leave an helpless woman alone ... the fingers of the world will keep pointing at her and she will keep suffocating

Title: Tanu Weds Manu Returns
Quote: Reebok nahi toh reebokey sahi
Trans: If you didn't get the original Reebok (shoes) then you're alright with the duplicate

Title: Tanu Weds Manu Returns
Quote: Hum thode bewafaa kya hue ... aap toh badchalan ho gaye
Trans: I became slightly dishonest ... and you became totally immoral

Title: Tanu Weds Manu Returns
Quote: Rishtey tab bante hai jab rishton ko sambhal ke rakha jaata hai
Trans: Relationships are made when you maintain relations

Title: Tanu Weds Manu Returns
Quote: Chehre ki khushi, dil ki hassi, sharm-o-haya ... tujhpe vaar aaye hai tere deewane, jaane kya kya
Trans: The happiness on the face, the smiling of the heart, the shyness ... who knows what all have your lovers lost in your love

Title: Hitler
Quote: Tareef us khuda ki jisne hum sabko banaya hai ... zara aapko yeda banaya, humko teda banaya hai
Trans: Praise the lord who has created all of us ... he has made you slightly mad and made me crazy

Title: Hitler
Quote: Paapiyon ka anth karne waale tumse pehle bhi kahi avtaar le chuke hai ... lekin is dharti par na paap khatam hua hai aur na hi paapi
Trans: People before you who have tried to end the sinners have taken many a forms ... but neither has sin ended on this earth nor have the sinners

Title: Hitler
Quote: Aaj ke yug mein sache insaan ki koi keemat nahi hai ... wafaadari ki koi keemat nahi hai ... imaandari ki koi keemat nahi hai
Trans: In today's age there is no value of a honest person ... there is no value of loyalty ... there is no value of honesty

Title: Tum Se Achcha Kaun Hai
Quote: Aasoon peeke bhi joh muskuraye ... wohi toh zamane ko jeet paye
Trans: The one who smiles after drinking his tears ... only he can win over the world

Title: Tum Se Achcha Kaun Hai
Quote: Jab zindagi mein maqsad mil jaata hai ... toh jeene ki wajah bhi mil jaati hai
Trans: When you find a motive in life ... then you also get a reason for living

Title: Tum Se Achcha Kaun Hai
Quote: Itni pila, itni pila saaki ki mehak jaon main ... yeh toh mumkin nahi hai ki bahek jaon main
Trans: Oh my friend make me drink so much that I get high ... because it's not possible that I can be lost

Title: Tum Se Achcha Kaun Hai
Quote: Dost wahi hai joh dosti nibha sakta hai ... aur mushkilon ke waqt dost hi dost ke kaam aa sakta hai
Trans: A friend is someone who can fulfill his friendship ... and in the time of need only a friend can come useful to a friend

Title: Naya Daur (1978)
Quote: Jab hamari dharti par raat utarti hai toh paap jaag uthta hai ... insaan shaitan ka roop dharan kar leta hai ... aur lagta hai shayad subah kabhi na ho
Trans: When night falls on our world then sin awakens ... humans take the guise of a devil ... and it feels like morning will never come

Title: Naya Daur (1978)
Quote: Zindagi ki university mein aaj tumhara pehla imtihan hai ... agar pass ho gaye toh degree ki jagah maal hi maal hai ... aur agar fail ho gaye toh inaam mein police ki goliyan ya jail
Trans: Today is your first exam in the university of life ... if you pass then instead of a degree you'll get a lot of money ... and if you fail then as a prize you'll get bullets from police or jail

Title: Naya Daur (1978)
Quote: Tumne is waqt aaise aadmi ka haath pakad rakha hai ... jiske apne haathon mein sivah lakeeron aur kuch bhi nahi
Trans: You have held the hand of such a person at this moment ... who has nothing but the lines of destiny in his hand

Title: Naya Daur (1978)
Quote: Kisi aadmi ki aukaat janane ke liye ... uske jooton par hi ek nazar dalna kaafi hai
Trans: To know the status of a person ... one look at his shoes is more than enough

Title: Around The World
Quote: Kaaba na sahi, butkhana sahi ... hum chahne waale tere sanam, tujhe dhoond hi lenge kahin na kahin
Trans: Neither I'm a shrine nor a temple ... I'm your lover and I'll find you somewhere or the other

Title: Around The World
Quote: Jab aurat ke haath mein kaanta ho toh dil mein phool khilte hai ... jab haath mein phool ho toh dil mein kaante chubte hai
Trans: When a woman has thorns in her hand then flowers are blossoming in her heart ... and when she has a flower in her hand then thorns are poking in her heart

Title: Around The World
Quote: Jab dil mein khushi ho na ... toh sadiyan bhi minuton mein khatam ho jaati hai
Trans: When there is happiness in the heart ... then even decades end in minutes

Title: Around The World
Quote: Dil sadda hai Hindustani, camera sadda je Japani ... te photo khichega suhani
Trans: My heart is Indian, my camera is Japanese ... and I take very beautiful photos

Title: Hum Tumhare Hain Sanam
Quote: Sirf ghar se bahar jaane waali aurat badchalan nahi hoti ... ghar ki baatein charon taraf bahar karne waali aurat bhi badchalan hoti hai
Trans: Not only a woman who stays out of the house is characterless ... but also a woman who gossips about the house everywhere outside is also characterless

Title: Hum Tumhare Hain Sanam
Quote: Mere dil mein toh sirf tum hi tum ho ... lekin tumhare dil mein main hoon ya nahi ... main nahi jaanta
Trans: It's just you and only you in my heart ... but whether I'm there in your heart or not ... I don't know that

Title: Hum Tumhare Hain Sanam
Quote: Sirf bistar par saath mein sona hi ek biwi ka farz nahi hai ... mann se mann milna chahiye
Trans: Just sleeping together on the bed is not the only duty of a wife ... the heart must connect with the heart

Title: Hum Tumhare Hain Sanam
Quote: Agar aurat kisi se pyar karti hai, woh chahe kitna hi ghatiya ho ... lekin wohi uske liye sab kuch hai ... aur kisi se nafrat karti hai, woh chahe kitna hi mahaan ho ... lekin uske liye kuch bhi nahi
Trans: When a woman loves someone then no matter how bad he is ... but still he is everything for her ... and when she hates someone then no matter how great he is ... but still he is nothing for her

Title: Loafer (1996)
Quote: Aaj raajneeti woh vaishya hai jiski kamai bazar ke sab log khana chahte hai ... aur neta ki kursi kutton ke beech padi hui haddi ki tarah hai ... ab is desh ka vatavaran do hi sooraton mein badla ja sakta hai ... ya toh sare netaon ko bhrashtachar ki kanooni azaadi di jaye, ya kisi bhi bhrasht neta ko zinda na chhoda jaye
Trans: Today politics is a prostitute whose income everyone in the market wants to eat ... and the chair of a politician is like a bone in the middle of dogs ... now the atmosphere of this country can only be changed under two conditions ... either give all the politicians the freedom of corruption or else don't leave any corrupt politician alive

Title: Loafer (1996)
Quote: MLA janta ka pratineedhi hai, uske sukh dukh ka saathi ... lekin aapne toh un teeno aksharon ka matlab hi badal diya ... "M" for murder, "L" for loot, "A" for Atrocities ... yani atyachar
Trans: An MLA (Member of Legislative Assembly) is the representative of the people, he is a companion of their happiness and sadness ... but you have changed the meaning of those 3 letters ... "M" for murder, "L" for loot, "A" for Atrocities ... as in brutality

Title: Loafer (1996)
Quote: Pehle din Meena, doosre din Tina, teesre din Reena aur aaj yeh nagina
Trans: First day Meena, second day Tina, third day Reena and today you've bought this pearl

Title: Loafer (1996)
Quote: Gareeb ki taqat uski vote hoti hai
Trans: The power of the poor is their vote

Title: Gurudev
Quote: Tumhare aur hamare beech sirf ek hi cheez ka batwara ho sakta hai ... aur woh hai tumhare hisse ki maut
Trans: Between you and me there is only one thing that can be divided ... and that is the death of your share

Title: Gurudev
Quote: Baap ke kandhe ke barabar jab bete ka kandha ho jaata hai ... toh woh baap ki zimmedari aur jawabdari dono ka bhoj uthane ke kabil ho jaata hai
Trans: When the shoulder of a son reaches his father's shoulder ... then he becomes capable of taking care of his father and his father's responsibilities

Title: Gurudev
Quote: Tu toh meri umeedon ka junction hai ... dil se dil ka relation hai, connection hai, attraction hai, action hai, reaction hai ... yane ki tu meri mohabbat ka main station hai
Trans: You're the junction of my hopes ... you're the relation, connection, attraction, action, reaction from heart to heart ... which means you're the main station of my love

Title: Gurudev
Quote: Bambai mein kaam kam hota hai hartaalein zyada hoti hai ... kabhi taxi waalon ki hartaal, kabhi bus waalon ki hartaal, kabhi mill waalon ki hartaal ... aur kabhi hartaal ka kaaran na milne par hartaal ko practice karne ki hartaal
Trans: In Mumbai less work gets done and more strikes do happen ... sometimes the taxi drivers are on strike, sometimes the bus drivers are on strike, sometimes the mill workers are on strike ... and sometimes when they don't have a reason to strike then they strike to practice for a strike

Title: Chauraha
Quote: Bure waqt se badi khatarnak koi cheez nahi hai is duniya mein
Trans: There is nothing more dangerous in this world than bad time

Title: Chauraha
Quote: Kagaz phadne se likhai mitt sakti hai lekin sachai nahi
Trans: By tearing paper you can only erase the writing and not the truth

Title: Chauraha
Quote: Main jis file ko kholta hoon na ... woh mujrim ko jail mein bandh karne ke baad hi bandh karta hoon
Trans: The file that I open ... closes only after I lock the criminal in jail

Title: Chauraha
Quote: Hum hai police ki naak ke baal, insaaf ki dhaal, havaldar Bankelal ... chal do rupai nikaal
Trans: I'm a hair from police's nose, an armour of justice, I'm Sergeant Bankelal ... now come on give me two rupees

Title: Tumko Na Bhool Paayenge
Quote: Agar kisi ne maut ko kareeb se dekha ho ... toh usse pichle janam ki baatein yaad aati hai
Trans: If someone has experienced death from near ... then they start to remember things about their past life

Title: Tumko Na Bhool Paayenge
Quote: Distance always makes the heart grow fonder
Trans: Distance always makes the heart grow fonder

Title: Tumko Na Bhool Paayenge
Quote: Izzat, zillat, shohrat, maut ... sab uske haath mein hai
Trans: Respect, humiliation, wealth, and death ... is in the hands of God

Title: Vinashak
Quote: Zehar toh sirf uske khane waale ko maarta hai ... lekin drugs khane waale ke saath saath uske pariwar ko bhi jeete jee maarti hai
Trans: Poison only kills the person who eats it ... but drugs along with the person who consumes it also kills their families

Title: Vinashak
Quote: Vardi kisi neta ki topi nahi hai ... jise apne matlab ke liye jab chaha pehan liya aur jab chaha utaar diya
Trans: A police uniform is not a politician's cap ... which can be worn and removed as and when needed

Title: Vinashak
Quote: Vardi ka najayaz fayda uthakar jurm ki hukumat karne waale agar tum jaise shaitan is desh mein maujood hai ... toh issi vardi ke liye apna sar katane waale janbaaz bhi is desh mein maujood hai
Trans: If devils like you who use the police uniform illegitimately to allow crime to rule are alive in this country ... then so are courageous people also alive in this country who are ready to die for this police uniform

Title: Vinashak
Quote: Woh chahe phone par mujhe kitni hi dhamkiyan de ... mera aur mere pariwar ka khoon karde ... lekin main apni aakhri saans tak sachai ka khoon nahi hone doonga
Trans: No matter how much they threaten me over the phone ... even if they kill me and my family ... but still I won't let the truth be murdered until my last breath

Title: Gundagardi
Quote: Main shehar ki dahshat ko mitane ke liye kanoon ke ek aaise muhafiz ko tainaat karoonga ... joh kanoon ki aan ke liye apni jaan bhi de sakta hai ... joh vardi ki shaan ke liye dono jahan se ladh sakta hai
Trans: To end the terror in the city I'll deploy such a guardian of the law ... who can give his life for the honour of the law ... and who can fight against both the worlds for the reputation of the police uniform

Title: Gundagardi
Quote: Mana ki bandook aur talwar mein bahut dum hai ... lekin kalam aur kalam ki awaaz hazaron bandookon aur lakhon talwaron par bhari hai
Trans: I agree that there is a lot of power in a gun and a sword ... but a pen and the words from a pen can overcome thousands of guns and millions of swords

Title: Gundagardi
Quote: Yeh vardi mehaz sood ka dagha nahi ... Hindustan ki izzat hai
Trans: This police uniform is not only a piece of thread ... it's the honour of India

Title: Gundagardi
Quote: Maut aur zindagi ki lakeer toh pehda hote hi uparwaala likh deta hai
Trans: The lines of life and death are written by god when you're born

Title: Hasti
Quote: Aadmi janam se juari hota hai ... taqdeer ki baat hai ki kuch log jua mein sab kuch haar jaate hai aur kuch log crorepati ban jaate hai
Trans: Humans are gamblers by birth ... it's just a matter of luck that some people lose everything in gambling and some people become millionaires

Title: Hasti
Quote: Har crorepati apni zindagi ek rupai se shuru karta hai ... aur har bikhari bhi
Trans: Every millionaire starts his life with one rupee ... and so does every beggar

Title: Hasti
Quote: Do kisam ke log zaroorat se zyada imaandari ka dhol peetate hai ... ek woh joh imaandar hote hai aur doosre woh joh puri tarah se baimaan hote hai
Trans: Two types of people keep talking about honesty more than needed ... one those who are honest and second those who are completely dishonest

Title: Hasti
Quote: Ek maa ke dil se nikli hui dua ... uske bete ko zameen se aasman ki bulandi tak pahuncha sakti hai ... aur ussi maa ke dil se nikli hui baddua ... tere in mahalon ko jalakar raakh bhi kar sakti hai
Trans: A prayer that comes from the heart of a mother ... can take her son from the bottom all the way to the top ... and a curse that comes from the heart of the same mother ... can also burn your mansions into ashes

Title: Dhaal
Quote: Tum police khareed sakte ho kuch hadh tak ... malum hai yahan neta bikau hai, hukumat ki machiney bikau hai kuch hadh tak ... tum kanoon aur insaaf tak ko khareed sakte ho kuch hadh tak ... lekin yaad rakhna woh hadh mujhpar aakar khatam ho jaati hai ... tum sab kuch khareed sakte ho lekin ek sache imaandar police officer ki imaandari nahi khareed sakte
Trans: You can buy the police till a certain limit ... I also know that here politicians and the machines of government can be bought till a certain limit ... you can buy the law and justice till a certain limit ... but remember that limit ends when it comes to me ... you can buy everything but not the honesty of a true and honest police officer

Title: Dhaal
Quote: Yeh halat hui hai iski, pee peekay rum aur whiskey ... liver bhi ho gaya risky ... yeh uski hai na iski, badhon badhon ki jaan hai khiski ... oo peene waale sun, teri jaan ki dushman whiskey ... agar tu saath na iska chhodega, yamraj se naata jodega ... apna bhala bura pehchan, beta hum badhon ki baat ko maan ... yeh whiskey bahut hai risky, yeh whiskey bahut hai risky ... badhon badhon ki jaan hai khiski
Trans: His condition is like this because of drinking rum and whiskey ... his liver has become risky ... it belongs to no one, the greatest of the greats have lost their life due to it ... the one who is drinking please listen, the whiskey is an enemy of your life ... if you don't leave it then you're connecting with the god of death ... recognize your good and bad, listen to elders like me ... this whiskey is very risky, this whiskey is very risky ... the greatest of the greats have lost their life due to it

Title: Dhaal
Quote: Tumne apne paon se utni dhool nahi udhayi hogi ... jitni daulat hum apne haathon se udha chuke hai
Trans: The amount of money that I've blown with my hands ... you haven't even blown that much dirt with your feet

Title: Dhaal
Quote: Aaj ki duniya mein imaandari woh khotta sikka hai joh bazar mein kahin nahi chalta
Trans: In today's world honesty is that false coin which can't be used anywhere in the market

Title: Wazir
Quote: Khel khel mein, khel khel ke, khel khel yeh aa jayega ... haar jeet se, haar jeet ke, jeet haarna sikhayega ... khel khel mein
Trans: You'll learn the game when you play the game ... when you win and lose, then winning will teach you losing ... when you play the game

Title: Wazir
Quote: Zindagi aur shatranj mein yahi toh farak hai ... zindagi mein doosra mauka milta nahi ... yahan shatranj mein mil jaata hai
Trans: This is the difference between life and a game of chess ... in life you don't get a second chance ... but here in the game of chess you get that

Title: Wazir
Quote: Agar pyada badshah ke saath ladega ... toh bahut buri maut marega
Trans: If a pawn will fight against the king ... then it will die a very dreadful death

Title: Wazir
Quote: Maut toh ek din muayyan hai, neend kyun raat bhar nahi aati ... hum wahan hai jahan se humko bhi kuch hamari khabar nahi aati
Trans: Death is destined to come one day, but why can't I sleep all night ... I'm in a place from where I myself don't get any news about me

Title: Biwi Ho To Aisi
Quote: Jis tarah parayi biwi apne ghar mein laane se apni nahi ho jaati na ... ussi tarah paraya music apne desh mein bajane se apna nahi ho jaata hai
Trans: Just like by bringing a stranger's wife in your house, she doesn't become yours ... just like that by playing foreign music in our country, it doesn't become ours

Title: Biwi Ho To Aisi
Quote: Is duniya mein insaan ki aukaat uski haisiyat uske paise se nahi ... balki uske karamon se pehchani jaati hai
Trans: In this world the capacity and status of a person is not judged by his money ... instead it is judged by his deeds

Title: Dil Tera Aashiq
Quote: Pyar ek aaisa rishta hai, ek anmol heera hai ... jise sirf pyar khareed sakta hai ... duniya ki koi daulat khareed nahi sakti
Trans: Love is a relation, it's a priceless diamond ... which can only be bought with love ... no other money of the world can buy it

Title: Dil Tera Aashiq
Quote: Jab koi dushman dushmani ka chola pehenkar samne aata hai toh pehchana jaata hai ... lekin jab koi dushman apno ka chola pehenkar samne aata hai toh badhe badhe dokha khakar reh jaate hai
Trans: When an enemy comes forward wearing the dress of an enemy then you can recognize him ... but when an enemy comes forward wearing the dress of one of your own then even the best of the best get tricked

Title: Dil Tera Aashiq
Quote: Ab yeh dard saha nahi jaye aur bin kahe bhi raha nahi jaye ... meri samajh mein kuch kuch aaye, machi hai kyun hai-hai ... pyare yahi toh ishq kehlaye
Trans: Now I can't take this pain and I can't stay without saying it ... I do understand a little bit as to why you're worried ... this is what is called as love my friend

Title: Dil Tera Aashiq
Quote: Kabhi veerane the, abhi gul-o-gulzaar nazar aate hai ... badle badle dar-o-deewar nazar aate hai
Trans: Earlier it was deserted, but now it looks like a flower garden ... and the doors and walls look different

Title: Rang
Quote: Tum woh badnaseeb aurat ho joh pati ke hote hue patni na ban saki ... aulad ke hote hue maa na ban saki ... nawasi ke hote hue nani na ban saki
Trans: You're that unfortunate woman who inspite of having a husband couldn't become a wife ... who inspite of having a child couldn't become a mother ... who inspite of having a grand-daughter couldn't become a grandmother

Title: Rang
Quote: Mujhko meri awaaz sunai nahi deti ... kaisa yeh mere jism mein ek shor macha hai
Trans: I'm not able to hear my own voice ... what kind of noise is there in my body

Title: Insaaf Ki Devi
Quote: Mere liye Lakshmi Devi, Saraswati Devi, Durga Devi, Kali Devi, duniya ki har devi joh hai ... woh hai insaaf ki devi
Trans: For me goddess Lakshmi, goddess Saraswati, goddess Durga, goddess Kali, every goddess of the world ... is the goddess of justice

Title: Insaaf Ki Devi
Quote: Mujh jaise vakil se kabhi mat lena panga ... varna kapde pehne rahoge aur duniya samjhegi nanga
Trans: Don't you ever confront a lawyer like me ... or else you'll be wearing clothes but the world will consider you naked

Title: Insaaf Ki Devi
Quote: Mere bedroom ka darwaza bhi meri tarah romantic hai ... ladki andar aa jaye aur jab tak romance poora na ho ... tab tak khulta hi nahi hai
Trans: The door of my bedroom is romantic like me ... once a girl comes in and till the romance is not over ... it doesn't open until then

Title: Insaaf Ki Devi
Quote: Aaj agar samaaj se apradh ko khatam karna hai toh usse jadh se mitana hoga ... us pedh ko hi kaatna hoga jispar apradh ke phal pehda hote hai ... aur woh pedh tu hai
Trans: Today if we want to end crime in the society then we'll have to eradicate it from its roots ... we'll have to cut the tree on which the fruits of crime grow ... and you are that tree

Title: Guru Suleman Chela Pahelwan
Quote: Main bewda us waqt peeta hoon jab mereko gaanja nahi milta ... aur gaanja us waqt peeta hoon jab mereko afeem ki goli nahi milti ... aur goli main us waqt khata hoon jab mereko Campa Cola jaisi bottle waali koi potti na mile
Trans: I drink alcohol when I don't get marijuana ... and I take marijuana when I don't get a pill of opium ... and I take a pill of opium when I don't get a girl who has the shape of a Campa Cola bottle

Title: Guru Suleman Chela Pahelwan
Quote: Jab koi ladki tofha qabool karle toh samjho uske dil mein pyar ki ganti ke bajaye ... ganta bajhne lagta hai
Trans: When a girl accepts a gift then understand that instead of bells ringing in her heart ... big bells are ringing

Title: Guru Suleman Chela Pahelwan
Quote: Logon ki kismat mein toh lutna hi likha hai ... amir gareebon ko lootte hai, vyapari grahakon ko lootte hai aur neta janta ko lootti hai ... sabhi toh sabko lootte hai ... kalyug mein yahi hota raha hai aur yahi hota rahega
Trans: People are destined to be robbed ... the rich rob the poor, the businessmen rob their customers and the politicians rob their people ... everyone robs everyone ... this has been happening in the age of vice and this will continue on

Title: Guru Suleman Chela Pahelwan
Quote: Haath kangan ko aarsi kya ... joh Urdu padhe uske liye Farsi kya
Trans: Who needs a mirror to see the beauty of an arm band ... the one who can read Urdu can comprehend Persian easily

Title: Pukar (1983)
Quote: Maa aurat ka sabse pavitra roop hota hai
Trans: A mother is the most purest form of a woman

Title: Pukar (1983)
Quote: Jab tak bandook mein aakhri goli hoti hai ... jung jeeti ja sakti hai
Trans: Until there is one last bullet left in the gun ... a war can be won

Title: Aadmi Khilona Hai
Quote: Aap jaise logon ke seene mein dil ki jagah gandagi ka woh dher pada hota hai ... jis mein gulab nahi, hawas aur apradhon ka woh keechad ughta aur behta hai ... jise koi haath bhi lagana pasand nahi karta
Trans: People like you have a bunch of squalor in your body instead of the heart ... in which the sludge of lust and crime grows instead of roses ... which no one even likes to touch

Title: Aadmi Khilona Hai
Quote: Jeevan ke indradhanushi guldaste mein dheron rang ke phool hote hai ... aur jab in mein pyar ka rang bhi shamil ho jaata hai ... toh rangon ki mehfil mein khushbuyon ke mele bhi judh jaate hai
Trans: There are many colourful flowers in the rainbow like bouquet of life ... and when the colour of love mixes with them ... then in the party of colours even the exhibition of fragrances join in

Title: Aadmi Khilona Hai
Quote: Side se dekho toh Vyjayanthimala, peeche se dekho toh Madhubala, samne se dekho toh husn ka pyala
Trans: She looks like Vyjayanthimala from the side, she looks like Madhubala from the back, and she looks like a beautiful bowl from the front

Title: Aadmi Khilona Hai
Quote: Padhoge likhoge toh hoge kharab ... kheloge koodoge toh banoge nawab
Trans: If you study and write then you'll become useless ... if you play and jump then you'll become an emperor

Title: Dana Paani
Quote: Jab tak chance rahega baki ... main nahi bandwaonga rakhi
Trans: Until there is a chance ... I won't get the thread of brotherhood tied from you

Title: Dana Paani
Quote: Bijnor mein gunda pakda gaya ... hairan hoon is daur mein gunda pakda gaya
Trans: A goon was caught in Bijnor ... I'm surprised that a goon was caught in this era

Title: Dana Paani
Quote: Pajame ne kaha dhoti se ... bane hum dono ek dhaage se ... farak agar hai hum mein toh sirf itna ... tu khulti peeche se, main aage se
Trans: The pajama said to a loincloth ... we both are made from one thread ... if there is a difference between us then it's only that ... you open from the back and I open from the front

Title: Dana Paani
Quote: Bambai ki ladki aur Bambai ki barish ... kabhi bhi aayegi, kabhi bhi jayegi
Trans: Mumbai girls and Mumbai rains ... they come anytime and they go anytime

Title: Mawali No.1
Quote: Maa ka doodh toh har koi peeta hai ... lekin badi badnaseeb hoti hai woh maatayen joh tujh jaise sapole ko doodh pilati hai
Trans: Everyone drinks mother's milk ... but those mothers are very unfortunate who feed milk to snakes like you

Title: Mawali No.1
Quote: Is samaaj ke bhediye ne unki izzat ki kagaz par vasna ki kali syahi se balatkar ka ghinauna itihaas likh diya
Trans: This coyote of the society wrote the disgusting history of rape on the paper of her dignity with the black ink of his lust

Title: Mawali No.1
Quote: Izzat ke moti insaan ki aankhon ke samundar ka woh sailaab hota hai ... joh aasoon bankar tapakta hai
Trans: The pearls of honour are floods from the sea of human eyes ... which flow in the form of tears

Title: Mawali No.1
Quote: Jab jab paapiyon ka bhav badta hai ... tab tab paapiyon ka papad banane koi na koi aa hi jaata hai
Trans: Whenever the value of sinners rises ... then someone or the other comes to make a Papadum out of the sinners

Title: Roti
Quote: Insaan ko dil de, jism de, dimaag de lekin yeh kambakht pet mat de ... usse pet deta hai toh usse bhook mat de ... usse bhook deta hai toh do waqt ki roti ka intezam karke bhej ... varna tujhe insaan ko paida karne ka koi haq nahi hai
Trans: Give a heart, body, brain to a human but don't give this wretched stomach ... if you give a stomach then don't give him hunger ... if you give him hunger then send him with food arranged for twice a day ... or else you don't have the right to create humans

Title: Roti
Quote: Aadmi ke seene mein khanjar bhokane se woh sirf ek baar marta hai ... lekin jab kisi ka dil tootta hai na toh usse bar-bar marna padta hai, har roz marna padta hai
Trans: By stabbing a person with a knife he dies only once ... but when someone's heart breaks then he has to die many a times, he has to die everyday

Title: Roti

Trans: If we want to eradicate sin and crime from today's society forever ... then we'll have to finish those devils who for a little bit of money buy the honesty and humanity of the poor and sow the seeds of crime in their hearts ... who raise them in the shadow of sin ... who compel people to drink blood of others and grow

Title: Roti
Quote: Roti roti mein bhi farak hota hai mere dost ... ek roti woh hoti hai joh cheenke khai jaati hai jis mein kisi ke khoon ki boo aati hai ... lekin mujhe woh roti chahiye jis mein kisi ke khoon ki boo nahi, balki mere paseene ki mehak aati ho
Trans: My Friend there is a difference even between breads ... there is one type of bread which is eaten by snatching and which has the smell of someone's blood ... but I want that bread which doesn't have the smell of someone's blood, but instead has the fragrance of my sweat

Title: Meri Biwi Ka Jawab Nahin

Title: Meri Biwi Ka Jawab Nahin

Title: Meri Biwi Ka Jawab Nahin

Title: Mere Dost Picture Abhi Baki Hai

Title: Mere Dost Picture Abhi Baki Hai

Trans: After thinking and understanding try to understand the thought ... even thinking and understanding is a thought ... the one who doesn't understand even after thinking and understanding is silly in my opinion ... hey you silly, don't think I'm foolish ... my thinking is beyond what you can think ... do you understand that?

Johnson baby powder aave hai, uski pudiya teri jeb mein daalke na drug ka smuggler bana sakti hai police ... aur toh aur teri shakal police waale se sketch karvake Osama Bin Laden se mila sakti hai police
Trans: (What can police do without any evidence?) ... The police can put a CD of Ghulam Ali in your pocket and make you into an ISI ( Inter-Services Intelligence) agent ... the police can take your photo in front of a beauty parlour and can make you into a pimp of girls ... the police can put a packet of Johnson baby powder in your pocket and can make you into a drug smuggler ... and above all the police can have a policeman draw your sketch and match to that of Osama Bin Laden

Title: Papi Pet Ka Sawal Hai

Trans: Death is the other side of every picture of life ... if you have done good deeds then you get a good death ... it slides down the throat like water ... and if you have done bad deeds then you also get a bad death ...   it gets stuck in the throat like a dry piece of bread ... it doesn't go down

Trans: This world is a game of a street performer, of smartness, of advertency ... look the drums of sadness play a nice tune with the flute of life ... so tell me you street performer why are you impersonating ... it's because I need to feed my stomach

Trans: The two hands of a person are his entire life and not just two hands ... with these two hands he earns food, cooks food and eats food

Trans: From now on if any man tries to rape a woman ... then he must remember that he is not showing his manliness, instead he is committing suicide ... because after today whenever in life and wherever that woman will see that man ... then she will have the right to kill that rascal

Title: Prem Granth
Quote: Bahut bada durbhagya hai is desh ka ... jahan charitra aur naitikta jaise oonchi aur keemti cheezon ko insaan ke jism ke do inch ke hisse se naapa jaata hai ... charitra toh mannsa, vaacha, karmana hota hai ... jiska mann shudh ho, vichar shudh ho, ache bol bolta ho, ache kaam karta ho ... wohi charitravan hota hai
Trans: This country is very unfortunate ... because priceless qualities like character and virtue are measured using a two inch part of a human's body ... a character is based on the heart, words and deeds ... the one who has a clean heart, clean thoughts, speaks good words, does good deeds ... that person has a good character

Title: Ehsaas
Quote: Zindagi mein kuch banana hai, kuch hasil karna hai toh sabse important cheez hai discipline ... discipline ke bina aadmi apne destination tak nahi pahunchta
Trans: In life if you want to become something, achieve something then the most important thing is discipline ... without discipline a person cannot reach his destination

Title: Ehsaas
Quote: Yeh duniya haarne waalon ka kabhi saath nahi deti
Trans: This world never stands by the people who lose

Title: Dushman Devta
