Quote: Na sode ke saath, na pani ke saath ... main toh peeyunga apni rani ke saath
Trans: Not with soda, neither with water ... I'll drink with my queen

Title: Dushman Devta
Quote: Is revolver ki che ki che goliyan tere seene mein maut ki keel banakar tokh doonga
Trans: I'll smash the 6 bullets of this revolver in your body like the nails of death

Title: Dushman Devta
Quote: Jaise daane daane par khane waale ka naam likha hota hai ... vaise hi meri har goli par marne waale ka naam hota hai
Trans: Just like on every bite of food is written the name of the person who will eat it ... just like that on every bullet of mine is written the name of the person who will die from it

Title: Diya Aur Toofan
Quote: Tum nahi ho toh khum aur sagar-o-meena kya hai ... rasam-e-maikhana nibha lete hai peena kya hai ... hum barasti hui boondon mein jale hai barso ... humse pooche koi savan ka mahina kya hai
Trans: If you're not there then the bottle and alcohol mean nothing ... I followed the custom of going to the bar but drinking meant nothing ... I have burned for years in the drops that fall ... someone please ask me what does the monsoon month mean

Title: Diya Aur Toofan
Quote: Kabhi kabhi joh aankhon se dekha jaata hai woh sach nahi hota ... aur joh kaano se suna jaata hai woh bhi sach nahi hota ... sach woh hota hai joh tehkikaat aur jaanch partal karke jaana jaata hai
Trans: Sometimes what you see from your eyes is not the truth ... and what you hear from your ears is also not the truth ... the truth is something that you find out after inquiry and investigation

Title: Diya Aur Toofan
Quote: Main unse aaisa bayanak badla loonga ... ki doosri bar janam lete hue unki maa ki kook tadhtada jayegi ... unki zindagi ka ek ek din barbaadi ka din bana doonga
Trans: I'll take such a dangerous revenge from them ... that when they are born in their next life then their mother's womb will wriggle ... and I'll make each and every day of their life as a day of destruction

Title: Diya Aur Toofan
Quote: Tan-e-tanha zindagi se bezaar, ek ladki se kiya pyar ... usse mila na iqraar, na bani woh dildar ... bas yeh cigarette hai wafaadar, woh bhi hai baldaar
Trans: Bored and alone in life I fell in love with a girl ... she said no and declined my love ... now only this cigarette is loyal and that also is twisted

Title: Train to Pakistan
Quote: Taqdeer badi dokhebaaz hai ... pehle burre patte baantati hai aur jab sab kuch haar jaate hai toh ache patte deti hai
Trans: Destiny is very deceitful ... first it deals bad cards to us and when we lose everything then it gives good cards to us

Title: Train to Pakistan
Quote: Kabhi kabhi bade punya karan ke liye chota paap karna padta hai
Trans: To do a great right we must do a little wrong

Title: Sau Din Saas Ke
Quote: Har ladki apne maikke ki chaya chhodkar sasural mein aati hai ... agar maa baap ki jagah saas sasur lele ... toh sasural mein maikke ki kami nahi hoti
Trans: Every girl leaves the shadow of her parents house and comes into her in-laws house ... if the mother-in-law and father-in-law take the place of the mother and father ... then in her in-laws house she doesn't miss her parents house

Title: Sau Din Saas Ke
Quote: Pati ka pyar milne se patni mein sab kuch sehne ki shakti aa jaati hai
Trans: A wife gets the strength to tolerate everything when she gets the love of her husband

Title: Benazir
Quote: Aaj sheeshay mein bar bar unhe dil ki moorat dikhai deti hai ... apni soorat nazar nahi aati, meri soorat dikhai deti hai
Trans: Today in the mirror she is continuously seeing the sculpture of the heart ... she is seeing my face instead of her own face

Title: Benazir
Quote: Hum mein apna ilaaj-e-dard-e-dil karna bhi aata hai ... hum aaise jeene waale hai jinhe marna bhi aata hai
Trans: I know how to cure for my sorrow heart ... I'm someone who lives and also knows how to die

Title: Benazir
Quote: Phoola chaman khushi ka jaane bahar aaya ... aankhon ka noor aaya, dil ka qaraar aaya ... dekhe joh khwab dil ne, tabeer hai yeh unki ... humko bhi zindagi ka ab aetbaar aaya ... joh phool-e-ilahi, hasta rahe hamesha ... joh bagh-e-zindagi mein bankar bahar aaya
Trans: The flower garden blossomed when spring came ... my eyes were able to see the light and my heart was at peace ... this is an interpretation of the dreams that my heart had seen ... now even I was able to have faith in life ... let the god of flowers always be happy ... the one who has come in the garden of my life as spring

Title: Benazir
Quote: Ab tak na khabar thi mujhe ujhade hue ghar ki ... aap aaye toh ghar be-sar-o-saman nazar aaya
Trans: Until now I wasn't aware of my ruined house ... when you came only then I was able to see my destituted house

Title: Ishk Ishk Ishk
Quote: Intezari ka waqt aur dil se bahut taluk hota hai ... jab humne intezar kiya toh unka dil nahi tha ... aur jab unhone intezar kiya toh hamara dil nahi tha
Trans: There is a big connection between waiting time and the heart ... when I was waiting then her heart was not there ... and when she was waiting then my heart was not there

Title: Ishk Ishk Ishk
Quote: Ghar ek qila ki tarah hota hai ... aur us mein basne waale log maa, baap, bhai, behen, bachche uski deewar ... kisi bhi deewar mein zara si bhi daraar padh jaye ... toh deewar hi nahi gir jaati balki ghar hi toot girta hai
Trans: A home is like a fort ... and the people who live it like mother, father, brother, sister, children are its walls ... if even a small crack builds in any of the walls ... then not only the wall falls but also the entire house breaks and falls

Title: Ishk Ishk Ishk
Quote: Agar ichcha mein bal ho toh woh azaad hoti hai ... aur shakti bhi azaadi se aati hai, bandish se nahi
Trans: If your desires are strong then they are free ... and even strength comes from freedom and not from restriction

Title: Devdas (1955)
Quote: Kaun kambakht hai joh bardaasht karne ke liye peeta hai ... main toh peeta hoon ki bas saans le sakun
Trans: Who the hell drinks to tolerate ... I drink so that I can breath

Title: Devdas (1955)
Quote: Tum ruki kya dil hamara ruk gaya ... gham ke maare aasman bhi jhuk gaya
Trans: My heart stopped when you stopped ... in this sadness even the sky bowed down

Title: Devdas (1955)
Quote: Maine zindagi mein prem ka karobar bahut dino tak kiya hai ... lekin prem sirf ek baar
Trans: In life I have done the business of love for many days ... but I have loved only once

Title: Chhalia
Quote: Pyar duniya ki sabse khoobsurat sachai hai
Trans: Love is the most beautiful truth of the world

Title: Chhalia
Quote: Duniya kitni choti hai ... lekin do aadmiyon ke beech ka faasle kitne lambe ho sakte hai ... kitne bhayanak aur kitne kaale
Trans: The world is so small ... but the distance between two people can be very big ... very scary and very dark

Title: Chhalia
Quote: Aadmi jab sant banta hai toh jaat paat, oonch neech, Hindu Muslim, desh videsh, rang nasal ke tamaam bedh bhav bhool jaata hai
Trans: When a person becomes a saint then he forgets all the differences between caste, status, religion, countries, colour

Title: Chhalia
Quote: Kahi bar marna aasaan malum hota hai aur jeena mushkil
Trans: Many a times dying seems to be much easier than living

Title: Bairaag
Quote: Pyar devtaon ka vardaan hai joh sirf bhagyashaliyon ko milta hai
Trans: Love is a blessing of gods that only the lucky ones get

Title: Bairaag
Quote: Kaatilon ke aage koi rasta nahi hota ... sirf kanoon ki ek kali deewar hoti hai
Trans: Killers have no path in front of them ... they only have the dark wall of the law in front of them

Title: Khatron Ke Khiladi
Quote: Koi shayar, koi pagal, koi bepeer ban jaye ... teri tasveer joh dekhe woh khud tasveer ban jaye
Trans: People might become a poet, or a crazy person, or unforgiving ... the one who sees your photo will himself turn into a photo

Title: Khatron Ke Khiladi
Quote: Aurat aur zevar dono ka sangam is duniya ki sabse badi sundarta hai
Trans: The union of a woman and jewellery is the biggest beauty of this world

Title: Khatron Ke Khiladi
Quote: Bhagwan ki adalat ka faisla insaan ko pata nahi chalta ... is liye woh gunah pe gunah kiye jaata hai ... aur insaan ki adalat kabhi kabhi faisla karne mein dokha kha jaati hai ... is liye maine banayi hai teesri adalat joh tum jaise hathyaron ko sazaa degi ... saza-e-maut
Trans: A human doesn't come to know of the decision in the court of god ... that's why he keeps on committing crimes ... and sometimes the court of humans makes a mistake in taking decisions ... that's why I've made a third court which will punish killers like you ... with the punishment of death

Title: Inaam Dus Hazaar
Quote: Tere teer-e-neemkash ko koi mere dil se pooche ... yeh khalish kahan se hoti joh jigar ke paar hota ... joh nigah ki thi zalim toh phir aankh kyun churai ... wohi teer kyun na maara joh jigar ke paar hota
Trans: Someone should ask my heart about your half drawn arrow ... where would this pain have come from if it had pierced through my body ... why did you look away from me after looking into my eyes ... why didn't you fire the arrow that would have pierced through my body

Title: Inaam Dus Hazaar
Quote: Muskurate hue yun aaye woh maikhane mein ... ruk gayi saans chalakte hue paimaane mein
Trans: She came smiling into the bar in such a way that ... my breath stopped in the spilling goblet

Title: Inaam Dus Hazaar
Quote: Is safar mein isse khoobsurat ghatna aur kya ho sakti hai ... ki tera haath, haath mein aa gaya ... chirag raah mein jal uthe
Trans: In this journey there cannot be a more beautiful event than this ... where your hand comes in my hand ... and the lamps on the road start to glow

Title: Nazrana
Quote: Shama bujhao ki sailaab-e-noor aaya hai ... ya phalak se koi tara hi utar aaya hai
Trans: Blow the candle since the flood of lights has come ... or is it that some star has come down from the skies

Title: Nazrana
Quote: Chaddaron par lage hue daag toh saaf kiye ja sakte hai ... lekin dil pe lage hue daag kabhi nahi mitaye ja sakte
Trans: The stains on a bedsheet can be erased ... but the stains on a heart can never be erased

Title: Jai Veeru: Friends Forever
Quote: Pahadon pe sunrise dekhne jaisa aur samundar kinare sunset dekhne jaisa aur kuch nahi hai
Trans: There is nothing like watching sunrise from the mountains and watching sunset on the seashore

Title: Jai Veeru: Friends Forever
Quote: Koi bhi criminal innocent nahi hota
Trans: No criminal is innocent

Title: Aashiq Hoon Baharon Ka
Quote: Yeh aasoon bhi bade baimaan hote hai ... na gham chupane dete hai, na khushi
Trans: Tears are very fraudulent ... they don't let you hide sadness and neither happiness

Title: Aashiq Hoon Baharon Ka
Quote: Insaan ki do maayen hoti hai ... ek maa joh insaan ko janam deti hai aur doosri us desh ki dharti jahan pe woh janam leta hai
Trans: A human has two mothers ... one who gives birth to him and second the soil of the country where he is born

Title: Aashiq Hoon Baharon Ka
Quote: Daulat se bhi badkar koi cheez hai aur woh hai pyar ... pyar se bhi ooncha kuch hai aur woh hai aadmi ka apna usool
Trans: There is something bigger than money and that is love ... and there is something bigger than love as well and that is the principles of a person

Title: Aashiq Hoon Baharon Ka
Quote: Na tera koi dharam hai, na tera koi karam hai ... tu bada besharam hai
Trans: You have no faith, no generosity ... you're very shameless

Title: Mehbooba
Quote: Sangeet cheez hi aaisi hai ... saaz ho ya awaaz, kaano mein padte hi dil ke taar jhun-jhuna uthte hai ... aur chanchal mann ko shanti mil jaati hai
Trans: Music is such a thing ... be it a musical instrument or a voice, the moment it reaches the ears the strings of the heart start to dance ... and the soft heart comes to peace

Title: Mehbooba
Quote: Jeevan mein mahan wohi hota hai ... joh doosron ki muskaan ke liye apne aasoon pee le
Trans: A person is defined great in life ... if he drinks his own tears for the smile of others

Title: Mehbooba
Quote: Mere sapne ka sambandh aankhon se nahi hai, dil se hai ... jise mehsoos kiya ja sakta hai, dekha nahi ja sakta
Trans: My dream is connected to my heart, and not my eyes ... hence you can feel it, but can't see it

Title: Mehbooba
Quote: Joh doosron ka adhikar cheenane mein kamyab nahi hote ... woh kisi na kisi tarah unki zindagi mein zehar bhar dete hai
Trans: Those who are unsuccessful in snatching the rights of others ... they somehow or the other fill poison in their life

Title: Bandhan Kuchchey Dhaagon Ka
Quote: Zindagi ke meethe sur jhoot ke taaron se nahi ... vishvas ke saaz se nikalte hai
Trans: The sweet tunes of life come from the musical instrument of trust ... and not from the strings of lies

Title: Bandhan Kuchchey Dhaagon Ka
Quote: Dost agar dosti mein dosti ka interest 100% na le ... toh dosti nahi rehti
Trans: Within friendship if a friend doesn't take 100% interest in friendship ... then it's not friendship

Title: Bandhan Kuchchey Dhaagon Ka
Quote: Khamoshi mein udasi ab rahi kahan ... tumhe dekh liya phir se toh sari udasiyan khamosh ho gayi hai ab toh jaise
Trans: Sadness doesn't exist in silence anymore ... and now that I've seen you, all the sadness has become silent

Title: Bandhan Kuchchey Dhaagon Ka
Quote: Log toh ghar basakar, tamaam rishtey naate banakar bhi pyar ke chand lamhe nahi jee paate aksar ... lekin maine toh chand lamhon mein pyar ki mukammal zindagi ko paa liya hai tumse
Trans: People even after making relationships and settling in houses are often not able to live a few moments of love ... but I've achieved a complete life of love with you in just a few moments

Title: Sabse Bada Rupaiya
Quote: Yeh duniya than-than gopal ki hai ... jiske paas rupaiya nahi woh kuch nahi
Trans: This world belongs to those who have money ... those who don't have money are nothing

Title: Sabse Bada Rupaiya
Quote: Insaan ki sabse badi daulat hai uski insaaniyat, uska character
Trans: The biggest wealth of a person is his humanity, his character

Title: Sabse Bada Rupaiya
Quote: Dhan daulat ko chalti phirti chaya kaha gaya hai ... aaj hai toh kal nahi ... fakr toh us daulat pe kiya jaye joh kabhi insaan ka saath na chhode ... aur woh hai sachai aur imaan ki daulat ... insaaniyat, daya aur dharam ki daulat
Trans: Money and wealth has been called as a moving shadow ... today it's there and tomorrow it's gone ... you should only be proud of the wealth that never leaves the company of a person ... and that is the wealth of truth and honesty ... the wealth of humanity, sympathy and faith

Title: Sabse Bada Rupaiya
Quote: Aadmi ki achchai, uska character tab puja jaata hai jab uske paas rupaiya ho ... jab rupaiya paas na rahe toh aam logon ki nazar badal jaati hai
Trans: The honesty and character of a person is appreciated when he has money ... when you don't have money then the general public changes their viewpoint

Title: Trinetra
Quote: Meri maa ka ek ek aasoon teri chitta ka angaar banega ... aur teri sau sau cheekhen mere pita ki ek ek cheekh ka muhafaza degi
Trans: Every tear drop of my mother will turn into the ember of your pyre ... and hundreds of your screams will pay the price for every scream of my father

Title: Trinetra
Quote: Tu utne din hi zinda hai jitne din tak main jail mein hoon ... meri azaadi ka pehla din teri zindagi ka aakhri din hoga
Trans: You will only stay alive for the days that I'm in jail ... the first day of my release will be the last day of your life

Title: Trinetra
Quote: Taqat jism ki nahi hoti, taqat haddiyon ki nahi hoti ... taqat irradon ki hoti hai
Trans: Strength of the body doesn't matter, strength of the bones doesn't matter ... what matters is the strength of the intentions

Title: Trinetra
Quote: Mera beeta hua kal, mera aaj aur mera aane waala kal ... teeno par khoon ke dastakhat hai ... kal mere haathon ek khoon hua tha ... aaj main ek ek din apni nazaron mein nafrat bharkar ek aur khoon karne ki taqat jutta rahi hoon ... aur kal mere haathon ek aur khoon hoga
Trans: My past, my present and my future ... all three have the signature of blood on them ... yesterday I killed someone with my hands ... today one day at a time I'm filling hatred in my eyes and collecting the strength to kill one more person ... and tomorrow I'll kill one more person with my hands

Title: Bheja Fry 2
Quote: Aadmi chilata toh gale se hai lekin kharab kaan ho jaate hai
Trans: A person shouts from the mouth but the ears are the ones that go bad

Title: Bheja Fry 2
Quote: Dhanwan logon ke jeevan mein aaram toh hai ... lekin vishram nahi hai
Trans: Wealthy people have comforts in their life ... but they don't have relaxation

Title: Bheja Fry 2
Quote: You're not following the call of duty and you're following doll of beauty
Trans: You're not following the call of duty and you're following doll of beauty

Title: Bheja Fry 2
Quote: Ladai ladai maaf kar ... kutte ki tatti saaf kar
Trans: Let's forgive and not fight ... go and clean dog's poop

Title: Mawaali
Quote: Maa bhi bhagwan ne duniya mein ek nirali hi cheez banayi hai ... janam dene se lekar bete ki aakhri saans tak, har gadhi yeh hi kehti hai ... "jug jug jiyo beta, jug jug jiyo"
Trans: In this world god has made mother as a very particular thing ... from birth until the last breath of her son, every moment she keeps saying that ... "live long my son, live long"

Title: Mawaali
Quote: Jeevan ek sapna hai, duniya ek maya hai ... yeh main nahi kehta hoon, yeh vedon ne bataya hai
Trans: Life is a dream, world is an illusion ... I'm not saying that, it has been written in the Vedas

Title: Mawaali
Quote: Mujhse baimaani mat karna main bahut pahuncha hua aadmi hoon ... baimaani mein shaitan ko tuition deta hoon
Trans: Don't cheat with me since I'm a very recognized person ... and when it comes to cheating then I give tuitions to the devil

Title: Mawaali
Quote: Daulat waalon se kabhi dil lagana nahi chahiye ... woh kapde aur gadiyon ki tarah dil bhi badalte rehte hai
Trans: You should never fall in love with rich people ... like clothes and cars they keep changing their heart as well

Title: Koyla
Quote: Ghaas aur dushmani kahin bhi aur kabhi bhi pehda ho sakte hai
Trans: Grass and enmity can grow anywhere and anytime

Title: Koyla
Quote: Main inteqam ka ek aaisa dahekta hua koyla hoon ... jiski uthti hui aag ki lapton mein tum sabki zindagiyan aa chuki hai ... aur is jalte hue koyle ki aag mein tum sab bari-bari jalkar raakh ho jaoge
Trans: I'm a burning charcoal of revenge ... in the flames of which all of your lives have been caught ... and in the fire of this charcoal you all will burn into ashes one by one

Title: Koyla
Quote: Bacha maa ki kok mein baad mein panapta hai ... humra ghulam pehle banta hai
Trans: A child grows later in a mother's womb ... first he becomes my slave

Title: Koyla
Quote: Main teri ek ek saans maut ke bazaar mein bechkar aaya hoon
Trans: I have sold every single breath of yours in the market of death

Title: Yaar Gaddar
Quote: Yeh toh sirf hamare yaar hai ... aur hum janam jaat se hi gaddar hai
Trans: They are only our friends ... and we are traitors since birth

Title: Yaar Gaddar
Quote: Hum business karne se pehle aadmi aur maal dono ki khabar nikaal lete hai
Trans: I check the background about the person and goods both before I do business with them

Title: Yaar Gaddar
Quote: Waise zinda rehne ka mujhe bhi koi shauk nahi ... aakhri safar tumhare saath hi sahi
Trans: Even I have no interest in living anymore ... so why not make my last trip with you

Title: Pyasi Sham
Quote: Main ek aurat hoon mitti ka dher nahi ... jiski joh chahe shakal bana li, jahan jee chahe rakh diya
Trans: I'm a woman and not a pile of dirt ... which can be made to look as you desire and can be kept wherever you want

Title: Pyasi Sham
Quote: Koi bhi pauda itni jaldi bada nahi hota jitni jaldi ke ladki
Trans: No plant can grow as fast as a girl

Title: Pyasi Sham
Quote: Door se main aap nazar aata hoon ... zara paas aa jaon toh baap nazar aata hoon ... aur bhi paas aa jaon toh phir potato chaap nazar aata hoon ... aur agar bilkul paas aa jaon toh phir chup-chap nazar aata hoon
Trans: From far I look respectful ... when I come slightly closer then I look like a father ... and if I come even more closer then I look like a patty of potato ... and if I come absolutely close then I look very silent

Title: Chameli Ki Shaadi
Quote: Aurat ganne ka ras nikalne waali machine ki tarah hai ... joh mard ko khokla bana deti hai
Trans: A woman is like a sugarcane juice machine ... who squeezes a man totally dry

Title: Chameli Ki Shaadi
Quote: Chadte tave ke upar agar do teen rotiyan faltu pakayi jaaye toh koi harz nahi hai ... ek baar tava utar gaya toh mamla thanda ho jaata hai
Trans: If you cook two or three extra breads on a hot skillet then there is no issue ... since once the skillet is taken down then it becomes cold

Title: Jaanwar Aur Insaan
Quote: Hota hai woh kaam achcha jiska ho anjaam achcha
Trans: Anything that has a good ending is a good deed

Title: Jaanwar Aur Insaan
Quote: Iss tarah aanchalon se ulajhne ke shaukh ya kaanton ko hota hai ya mardon ko ... sheron ko nahi
Trans: Either thorns or men like to play with scarfs ... not tigers

Title: Jaanwar Aur Insaan
Quote: Vaada kiya tha yaar ne aayenge din dhale ... suraj khuda ke vaaste ho ja tale tale
Trans: My friend had promised that she will come in the evening ... oh please sun go away for the sake of god

Title: Jaanwar Aur Insaan
Quote: Junglee janwaron ke ghosh par jeene waala sher ... goli se ghayal hokar insaan ke ghosh ka bhookha ho jaata hai
Trans: A tiger that lives on the flesh of wild animals ... becomes hungry for the flesh of humans if he is injured by a bullet

Title: Kahin Pyaar Na Ho Jaaye
Quote: Dukh mein peeyo daru, sukh mein peeyo soup ... ameer aadmi ki party mein, gareeb aadmi chup
Trans: Drink alcohol when you're sad, drink soup when you're happy ... a poor man stays quiet in a rich man's party

Title: Kahin Pyaar Na Ho Jaaye
Quote: Swarg mein uparwaala premiyon ki jodi banata hai ... aur yahan dharti par unhe milata hai
Trans: God makes the pairs of lovers in heaven ... and he makes them meet here on earth

Title: Kahin Pyaar Na Ho Jaaye
Quote: Jodi toh hoti hai gajar aur mooli ki ... red and white absolutely bright ... log kahenge dekho inka pyar, inka laad ... just like a salad
Trans: Carrots and radish form a great pair ... red and white absolutely bright ... people will say look at their love, their affection ... is just like a salad

Title: Hum Kisise Kum Nahin
Quote: Bandook se kisi ki jaan li ja sakti hai ... kisi ka dil nahi jeet sakte
Trans: You can take someones life with a gun ... you can't win someones heart with it

Title: Hum Kisise Kum Nahin
Quote: Apun ke ghar mein aake, apun ko gaali deke, apun ko dhamkakar, apun ko badmash bolkar agar tum zinda khada hai na ... toh isse badke aur koi sharafat nahi ho sakti
Trans: After coming into my house, after cursing me, after threatening me, after calling me a rowdy person if you're standing alive ... then there is no decency bigger than that

Title: Police Force: An Inside Story
Quote: Yeh ek zakhm khaye hue naujawan ka haath hai ... yeh jiske gaal pe padta hai uski duniya ghoom jaati hai
Trans: This is a hand of a wounded young person ... and the one who gets a slap from it, their world spins around

Title: Police Force: An Inside Story
Quote: Raajneeti mein kabhi kabhi apne support karne waale ko bhi marwana padta hai
Trans: In politics sometimes you have to even get a person supporting you killed

Title: Police Force: An Inside Story
Quote: Sachai aur burai ki jab bhi bhidant hui hai ... dum hamesha burai ne hi todha hai
Trans: Whenever truth and evil have had a clash ... evil has always lost it's life

Title: Gora Aur Kala
Quote: Sau baar jahannam mein jalana ya rab ... jee chahe toh phansi pe chadana ya rab ... mashooq kahe humko buzurg ... woh din na dikhana ya rab
Trans: Oh god burn me 100 times in hell if you want ... oh god hang me to death if you want ... but my lover calling me an old person ... oh god don't make me see that day

Title: Gora Aur Kala
Quote: Hamari shayari mein apne husn ka rang bhar do ... hamari awaaz ko apni adaon ka saaz do ... hamare tassavur ko zindagi bhaksh do
Trans: Fill the colour of your body in my poem ... give the music of your style to my voice ... grant life to my imagination

Title: Gora Aur Kala
Quote: Zindagi mein yahi tamanna bhi thi hamari ... ki jab bhi pyar karenge ya toh taaron ki chaon mein ya talwaron ke saaye mein
Trans: In life I've always wished that ... whenever I fall in love it will be under the shade of stars or under the shadow of swords

Title: Gora Aur Kala
Quote: Ya rab tu apni jannat ko rehne de apne paas ... humne zameen pe kar liya jannat ka nazara
Trans: Oh god keep your heaven to yourself ... since I have seen heaven on earth itself

Title: Smuggler
Quote: Tu zulm badhata ja hum sabrr badha lenge ... mitt jayenge hum lekin tujhko bhi mitaa denge
Trans: You keep increasing the cruelty and I'll increase the patience ... I'll get erased but I'll erase you as well

Title: Smuggler
Quote: Aurat ki sabse badi himmat hoti hai kisi gair mard ke aage apne jism se kapde utarna
Trans: The biggest courage that a woman can have is to take her clothes off in front of a strange man

Title: Smuggler
Quote: Kaisi deewani hoon main, kaun pehchane ...  jisne deedar kiya bas wohi jaane
Trans: Who can recognize how crazy am I ... the one who has seen me only he will know that

Title: Smuggler
Quote: Kitna haseen hai shabab dekhoge tab janoge ... kahan kahan khilte hai gulaab chuoge tab janoge
Trans: You'll come to know how beautiful is my body when you'll look at it ... you'll come to know where all do roses blossom when you'll touch it

Title: Jis Desh Mein Ganga Rehta Hai
Quote: Joh log maaf kar dete hai na woh kabhi udhas nahi hote
Trans: People who forgive never feel sad

Title: Jis Desh Mein Ganga Rehta Hai
Quote: Gaon ki shudh hawa khai hai maine, cigarette ha dhuan nahi ... faulad ka seena hai mera, haddiyon ka pinjra nahi
Trans: I've taken in fresh air of the village and not the smoke from a cigarette ... my body is made from steel and it's not a cage of bones

Title: Ab Bas!
Quote: Uparwaala shayad insaan ko utna hi dukh deta hai ... jitna woh seh sake
Trans: God only gives so much sorrow to a person ... how much he can handle

Title: Ab Bas!
Quote: Aurat jab tak mard se prem karti hai tab tak hi sehti hai ... aur jab nafrat karti hai toh Chandika banti hai
Trans: A woman tolerates everything till she loves a man ... and when she hates him then she turns into goddess Chandika

Title: Ab Bas!
Quote: Mard tab tak hi mard hota hai jab tak aurat usse mard samajhti hai
Trans: A man is a man only until a woman considers him to be a man

Title: Ab Bas!
Quote: Kab tab aurat sehti rahegi ... kab tak Sita agnipariksha deti rahegi ... kab tak Draupadi ka vastraharan hota rahega ... ab bas!
Trans: Until when will a woman bear everything ... until when will goddess Sita go through the ordeal of fire ... until when will Draupadi be stripped of her clothes ... now it's enough!

Title: Krishna
Quote: Main haraam ke paise leta nahi aur halaal ke chhodta nahi
Trans: I don't take money that you get for free and I don't leave money earned by hardwork

Title: Krishna
Quote: Main khud police waala nahi hoon lekin kanoon ka ek aaisa sipahi hoon ... joh khud police ki vardi nahi pehanta ... balki maut ki vardi pehnata hai gunehgaron ko
Trans: I'm not a policeman myself but I'm such a soldier of the law ... who himself doesn't wear the police uniform ... but instead I make the criminals wear the uniform of death

Title: Krishna
Quote: Hindustan ki janta ko koi taqat se nahi jeet sakta ... jeet sakta hai toh sirf aasunyon se
Trans: No one can win over the people of India with power ... if someone can win then it's just with tears

Title: Krishna
Quote: Main toh samajhta tha ki insaan ka muqadar aasman pe behta bhagwan likhta hai ... lekin mera muqadar toh likha hai aapne woh bhi kaali syahi se nahi ... lal khoon se
Trans: I used to think that destiny of a person is written by god sitting in the sky ... but you have written my destiny and that to not with black ink ... but with red blood

Title: Sargam
Quote: Pehlu-e-hoor mein langoor, khuda ki kudrat ... kauve ki chaunch mein angoor, khuda ki kudrat ... gadhe ko de diye khane badam ... kaisi yeh jodi milayi mere Ram
Trans: A monkey inside a human, is God's act ... a grape in the mouth of a crow, is God's act ... we gave a donkey almonds to eat ... what a pair have you made lord Ram

Title: Sargam
Quote: Bandar ke haath mein yeh saaz dekhiye aur ulloo ke sar pe yeh taj dekhiye ... joh dekha kabhi na woh aaj dekhiye ... hasegi joh dekhegi duniya tamaam ... kaisi yeh jodi milayi mere Ram
Trans: Look at the musical instrument in the hands of a monkey and look at the crown on the head of an owl ... today look at what you have never seen before ... the whole world will laugh when they look at this ... what a pair have you made lord Ram

Title: Sargam
Quote: Sangeet woh awaaz hai joh kisi bhav ko lekar ek gatti mein nikalti hai ... aur dilon ko hila deti hai
Trans: Music is that voice which takes an emotion and goes in one direction ... and shakes up the hearts

Title: Sargam
Quote: Budah hai ghoda, laal hai lagaam ... kaisi yeh jodi milayi mere Ram
Trans: The horse is old, the bit is red ... what a pair have you made lord Ram

Title: Bombai Ka Babu
Quote: Pyar ek jazbe ka naam hai joh insaan ke mann mein hota hai
Trans: Love is the name of an emotion that is within the heart of a person

Title: Bombai Ka Babu
Quote: Woh sab kuch joh mujhe nahi kehna chahiye tha main tumse hamesha kehta raha ... ab jab kuch kehna chahta hoon toh kuch keh nahi pa raha hoon
Trans: Everything that I shouldn't have said I always kept telling you ... and now when I want to say something then I'm not able to say anything

Title: Bombai Ka Babu
Quote: Duniya ek dhol zaroor hai lekin awaaz bajane waale ke haath mein hai ... jaisa haath vaisi awaaz
Trans: The world is definitely a drum but the sound is in the hands of the person playing it ... and the sound is related to the type of hands

Title: Bombai Ka Babu
Quote: Har maa ke dil ke kisi kone mein ek bahu chupi hoti hai ... joh ek din haathon mein kadhe, paon mein chhade ... cham-cham karti chali aati hai
Trans: Inside every mother's heart in some corner there is a daughter-in-law hidden ... who one day wears bangles in her hands, anklets in her feet ... and comes over chiming in

Title: Patthar Ke Sanam
Quote: Jab aap chalti hai toh raaste ke patthar bhi phool ban jaate hai
Trans: When you walk then even the stones on the road turn into flowers

Title: Patthar Ke Sanam
Quote: Kasam lelo joh mehfil mein tumhe danista dekha ho ... nazar aakhir nazar hai beirrada uth gayi hogi ... tajub kya lagi agar aa gaye Meena ji seene mein ... hazaron dil mein angaray bhare the, dab gayi hogi
Trans: I swear I didn't stare at you deliberately in the party ... the eyes are after all eyes and they must have raised unintentionally ... it's not strange that Ms. Meena is in my heart ... there were thousands of heart filled with flames and she must have been crushed in

Title: Welcome Back
Quote: Dye karne ki umar mein ladai karne nikle hai
Trans: In the age of dyeing you're trying to fight

Title: Welcome Back
Quote: Upar waale ne ek din inki life mein aaisa piece bheja ... joh two piece pehne huye tha
Trans: One day God sent such a beautiful piece (girl) in their life ... who was wearing a two piece (bikini)

Title: Welcome Back
Quote: Aye chalte huye gas ke gubbare
Trans: Hey you, moving gas balloon

Title: Welcome Back
Quote: Aaj kisses ... kal misses
Trans: Kisses today and misses tomorrow

Title: Kasauti
Quote: Duniya mein har cheez bik sakti hai ... lekin gareeb ka samman nahi
Trans: Everything in the world can be sold ... but not the honour of a poor person

Title: Kasauti
Quote: Jis tarah ladki ka thopda bighad jaane se usse dulha nahi milta na ... ussi tarah gadi ka thopda bighad jaane se usse savari nahi milti
Trans: Like a girl doesn't find a husband if her face goes bad ... just like that a car doesn't find a passenger if its body looks bad

Title: Kasauti
Quote: Issi ka naam zindagi hai ... koi jaata hai, koi aata hai ... koi khota hai toh koi paata hai ... lekin yeh zindagi apni raftaar se chalti rehti hai
Trans: This is what is called as life ... somebody goes and somebody comes ... somebody loses and somebody gains ... but life keeps moving at its own pace

Title: Kasauti
Quote: Gareebi se sharmana, usse nafrat karna ... sabse bada apradh hai
Trans: To be shy of poverty and to hate it ... is the biggest crime

Title: Bahubali: The Beginning
Quote: Kya hai mrityu ... hamare haathon se shatru ka mar jaana yeh sochna hai mrityu ... ranbhoomi mein shatru se bhaybheet hokar jeevat rehna hai mrityu?
Trans: What is death ... is death a thought that the enemy should die from our hands ... or is death to stay alive in the battlefield being scared of the enemy?

Title: Bahubali: The Beginning
Quote: Ek raja ka dharam sirf shatru ko maarna hi nahi hota ... praja ko bachana bhi hota hai
Trans: A king's duty is not only to kill the enemy ... but also to protect his people

Title: Bahubali: The Beginning
Quote: Is rajya mein sirf do log uska naam lete hai ... tum aur main ... tum ki apni maut se pehle usse aakhri baar dekh pao ... main taa ki ek baar aur usse apne haathon se maar paon
Trans: In this state only two people take his name ... you and me ... you so that you can see him one final time before you die ... and me so that I can kill him one more time with my hands

Title: Bahubali: The Beginning
Quote: Yudh mein saikadon ko maarne waala nayak hai ... lekin joh kisi ek ke bhi pran bachaye woh devta hai
Trans: The one who kills many in a war is a hero ... but the one who saves even one life is god

Title: Luv Ka The End
Quote: Just because we don't have them ... doesn't mean we don't know how to kick them
Trans: Just because we don't have them ... doesn't mean we don't know how to kick them

Title: Luv Ka The End
Quote: Tu na top model banegi pooch kyun ... (kyun?) ... tera top floor khali hai na
Trans: You'll become a top model ask me why ... (why?) ... since your top floor (brain) is empty

Title: Luv Ka The End
Quote: Aaiyash nigahon ko multiplex bhi maikhana lagta hai ... lehenge mein lapeto toh Rustam bhi Rukhsana lagta hai
Trans: Even a multiplex looks like a bar to the passionate eyes ... and even a guy in a skirt looks like a girl to him

Title: Luv Ka The End
Quote: You're like if Rajinikanth, Jackie Chan ke saath shaadi karta ... aur uska joh beta hota na woh James Bond ke saath shaadi karta ... toh uska joh beta hota na tu usse bhi bada player hota
Trans: You're like if Rajinikanth married Jackie Chan ... and if their son married James Bond and if they had a son ... then you'll be an even bigger player than him

Title: Mera Desh Mera Dharam
Quote: Hum vatan parasth hai aur vatan hi hamara dharam hai
Trans: I'm a patriot and my country is my religion

Title: Mera Desh Mera Dharam
Quote: Yeh husn Allah Allah, nazar tauba tauba ... ki ek hi jhalak mein khudai bhula di ... haseeno ne loota hum mein ... aur humne haseeno pe sari jawani luta di
Trans: Oh my god this body and these eyes ... it makes me forget godliness in just one sight ... the beauties have looted me ... and I lost my whole youth on these beauties

Title: Mera Desh Mera Dharam
Quote: Matwaali raftar qayamat, payal ki jhankar qayamat ... aaj qayamat se pehle hi, aa pahunchi sarkar qayamat
Trans: This great speed is catastrophic, the sound from the anklets is catastrophic ... today even before catastrophe my beautiful boss has arrived

Title: I M 24
Quote: Jali ko aag kehte hai, bhuji ko raakh kehte hai ... jis raakh se barood banti hai usse Raghav Prakash kehte hai ... aag laga doonga yeh aasman jaala doonga ... teri yaad mein janam yeh jahaan hila doonga
Trans: Burning flames is called fire, after burning what is left is called ash ... and the ash used to make gunpowder, is called Raghav Prakash ... I'll start a fire and burn the sky ... in your memory my love I'll shake this world

Title: I M 24
Quote: Jhoot pe sach ki vijay aur burai pe achchai ki jeet ... yahi duniya ka satya hai
Trans: The victory of truth over lies and good over bad ... is the truth of the world

Title: I M 24
Quote: Sapna kabhi jhoot nahi hota kyun ki woh hota hai ... hota hai is liye toh aap dekh paate hai usse
Trans: A dream can never be fake since it exists ... and since it exists that's why you're able to see it

Title: Deewana Mujh Sa Nahin
Quote: Khamoshi mein joh baat kahi jaati hai ... usse samajhne ke liye ek dard bhara dil chahiye
Trans: The point that is said in silence ... to understand that you need a heart full of pain

Title: Deewana Mujh Sa Nahin
Quote: Woh meri zindagi hai, meri aatma hai ... woh meri hai bilkul ussi tarah jis tarah is seene mein dhadakta hua dil mera hai ... is seene mein chalti hui saans meri hai ... in ragon mein daudta hua khoon mera hai
Trans: She is my life, she is my soul ... she is mine just like the heart beating in my chest is mine ... just like the breath in my heart is mine ... just like the blood flowing in my veins is mine

Title: Deewana Mujh Sa Nahin
Quote: Chai ki chah hai kuch aur nahi hai ... ek cup agar mil jaye parvah nahi hai
Trans: I wish for tea and nothing else ... if I can get a cup of it then I don't mind it

Title: Deewana Mujh Sa Nahin
Quote: Samajh samajhke samajh ko samajho ... samajh samajhna bhi ek samajh hai ... samajh samajhke na joh samajhe meri samajh mein woh nasamajh hai ... teri samajh hi samajh nahi hai, samajh parayi ko bhi toh samajho ... samajh parayi ko joh na samajhe ... meri samajh mein woh nasamajh hai
Trans: After thinking and understanding try to understand the thought ... even thinking and understanding is a thought ... the one who doesn't understand even after thinking and understanding is silly in my opinion ... your thought is not the only thought, try to understand someone else's thought as well ... the one who doesn't understand someone else's thought ... is silly in my opinion

Title: Gardish
Quote: Maine tumhe apne dil mein qaid kar rakha hai aur us dil ki chabi us samundar mein phekh di hai
Trans: I have locked you inside my heart and I have thrown away the key of my heart into the sea

Title: Gardish
Quote: Main Trishanku ki tarah hoon ... chahe mere haath pair cheer daalo, tukde tukde kar dalo ... main phir ek ho jaonga ... yahi meri fitrat hai
Trans: I'm like Trishanku ... even if you cut my hands and legs, even if you cut me into pieces ... I'll still unite into one ...  and that's my nature

Title: Gardish
Quote: Thane mein daayan pair aage rakho toh kehte hai tumhare baap ka ghar hai ... aur baayan rakho toh kehte hai bura shagun hai
Trans: If you step inside a jail with your right leg then they say is this your father's house ... and if you step with your left leg then they say it's a bad omen

Title: Joroo Ka Ghulam
Quote: Jhoot ka mazaa ek din ka hota hai aur sach ka mazaa hamesha ka
Trans: The fun with lies lasts only for a day and the fun with truth lasts forever

Title: Joroo Ka Ghulam
Quote: Duniya looti makkar se aur roti khayi shakkar se
Trans: You steal from the world cunningly and you eat bread with sugar

Title: Joroo Ka Ghulam
Quote: Kyun be mere pote, ek number ke khote ... bhare din joh hote, toh aaisi musibat mein phaskar kabhi na rote
Trans: My grandson you're a false person of top quality ... had you spent your days properly then you wouldn't be crying being stuck in this problem

Title: Awwal Number
Quote: Baalebaazon ki jagah gulli danda khelne waale bhi bharti karle apne team mein ... toh bhi farak nahi padega jaani
Trans: If instead of batsmen even if you put in players who play tip-cat ... then to it won't make any difference

Title: Awwal Number
Quote: Har great player ke peeche ek greater player hota hai
Trans: Behind every great player there is an even greater player

Title: Awwal Number
Quote: Zameer aur discipline ke binah par kiya gaya faisla kabhi galat nahi hota
Trans: A decision made on the basis of conscience and discipline can never be wrong

Title: Awwal Number
Quote: Ek hi sixer se century nahi banti hai ... baar baar lagane padte hai
Trans: You don't score a century with just one six ... you have to keep hitting them

Title: Funtoosh
Quote: Zindagi ke do hisse hote hai ... ek sawal doosra jawab
Trans: Life has two parts ... one is question and other is the answer

Title: Funtoosh
Quote: Mera daata mujhpar meherban hai ... mere mooh mein chandi ki zabaan hai ... mere haath mein sone ki kamaan hai ... joh bhi mere aage aayega ... muft mein joote khake jayega
Trans: I have the blessing of my lord ... I have a silver tongue in my mouth ... I have a golden bow in my hand ... whosoever comes in front of me ... will be smashed with shoes for free

Title: Funtoosh
Quote: Kabhi tera dar, kabhi darbadar, kabhi arsh par, kabhi farsh par ... arre gham-e-aashiqui tera shukriya, main kahan kahan se guzar gaya
Trans: Sometimes at your door, sometimes from door to door, sometimes on a throne, sometimes on the floor ... thanks to the sorrow in love, I have been to so many places

Title: Funtoosh
Quote: Aankh jhukakar baithne waale, aankh uthakar dekh zara ... hum bhi hai tere chahne waale, teer chalakar dekh zara
Trans: The one who is hiding her eyes, raise your face and look here ... I'm also your lover, so try and fire the arrow

Title: Duniya Meri Jeb Mein
Quote: Tumhari mohabbat ek phuljadi ki tarah hai mere dost ... joh ek hi minute mein saikado taare bikherti hai aur bujh jaati hai ... magar hamara pyar toh umar bhar ka sauda hai
Trans: Your love is a like a sparkler my friend ... which spreads many a flames in one minute and then goes off ... but my love is a deal that will last for life

Title: Duniya Meri Jeb Mein
Quote: Machli tairne ke liye gehrai aur kalabaaz udhne ke liye oonchai se nahi darta
Trans: A fish is not scared of depth when swimming and a acrobat is not scared of heights when flying

Title: Duniya Meri Jeb Mein
Quote: Daulat ki bisat par joh jua tumne khela tha us mein pehli chaal tumne chali thi ... ab meri bari hai
Trans: You had played the first move when gambling on the chessboard of money ... and now it's my turn

Title: Duniya Meri Jeb Mein
Quote: Main jaanta hoon kanoon behra hota hai, insaaf andha hota hai aur mohabbat bechari bezubaan hoti hai
Trans: I know that law is deaf, justice is blind and poor love is mute

Title: Laawaris (1999)
Quote: Jab zindagi aapke samne saare darwaze bandh kar deti hai na ... tab sharafat aur gundagiri mein zyada kuch farak nahi reh jaata
Trans: When life closes all the doors in front of you ... then hardly any difference is left between honesty and rowdyism

Title: Laawaris (1999)
Quote: Ek laawaris ko roti ki bheek di jaati hai pyar ki nahi ... usse zillat milti hai lekin apni sachai ko badalne ka mauka nahi milta
Trans: A derelict can be given food if he begs but not love ... he gets humiliation but not a chance to change his truth

Title: Laawaris (1999)
Quote: Na toh mujhe maafi maangni aati hai na hi pyar karna aata hai ... mujhe toh sirf koshish karni aati hai
Trans: Neither do I know how to apologize nor do I know how to love ... I only know how to try

Title: Laawaris (1999)
Quote: Jis tarah kuch log doosron ke liye marte hai ... ussi tarah kuch ko doosron ke liye jeena padta hai
Trans: Like some people die for others ... just like that some people have to live for others

Title: Laat Saab
Quote: Darr aur dehshat ki eenton par hi daulat ka jhanda lehraya jaata hai
Trans: The flag of money flies on the bricks of fear and terror

Title: Laat Saab
Quote: Lambe lambe baal Bengal ke, sudol jism UP ka, gora rang Kashmir ka, kali kali aankhen Madras ki ... aaisa lagta hai jaisa pura Hindustan ek hi soorat mein sama gaya ho
Trans: She has long hair from Bengal, beautiful body from UP (Uttar Pradesh), fair colour from Kashmir, black eyes from Madras ... it looks like the whole of India is collected in one person

Title: Laat Saab
Quote: Yeh woh shehar hai jahan sasta khoon aur mehanga pani hai ... apni pyaas bhujane ka hai toh apne aasoon se bhuja ... aasoon pee aur jee
Trans: This is a city in which blood is cheap and water is expensive ... if you want to fulfill your thirst then do that with your tears ... drink your tears and live

Title: Khoj
Quote: Pati patni saath rehte rehte ek doosre ko itni achchi tarah janne lag jaate hai ... ki ek doosre ke liye aaina ban jaate hai
Trans: A husband and wife staying together understand each other so well ... that they become a mirror for each other

Title: Khoj
Quote: Jab dil mein paap ka andhera ho ... toh koi bhi pooja, kaisi bhi prarthana ujaala nahi kar sakti
Trans: When there is darkness in the heart from sins ... then no worship, no prayer can create brightness

Title: Khoj
Quote: Chahe insaan ki gardan ho ya telephone ka taar ... katne mein zyada waqt nahi lagta
Trans: Be it a human's neck or a telephone wire ... it doesn't take time to cut it

Title: Khoj
Quote: Beete dino ki yaad ka sahara toh tab liya jaata hai ... jab sirf yaadein hi reh gayi ho
Trans: You take the support of the past days ... when only memories are left

Title: Bekhudi
Quote: Jab apne hi ghar mein ghumshuda naujawan ladka tanhaiyon sargoshiyan karta dikhai de ... jab kisi se baat karte hue uske alfaaz uska saath dene se inkar karde ... kisi ki yaad uski masroofiyat ban jaaye toh samjho ... he is in love
Trans: When a young guy is seen lost and whispering alone in his own house ... when talking to someone his own words refuse to take his side ... when the memories of someone become his occupation then understand that ... he is in love

Title: Bekhudi
Quote: Mummy daddy meri shaadi karva rahe hai ... Sunday ko ladke waale ghar aa rahe hai ... meri baraat mein tum bhi aao ... koi pyara sa tofha lao ... jee na jalao
Trans: Mom and dad are getting me married ... the guy's family is coming to my house on Sunday ... you also come in my wedding procession ... bring some lovely gift ... and don't hurt my heart

Title: Bekhudi
Quote: Yeh daur patthar khane waale Majnu ka nahi ... yeh daur us aashiq ka hai joh apni mehbooba ke liye seene par goliyan kha jaye
Trans: This era doesn't belong to lover's who get pelted by stones ... this era belongs to lover's who can take a bullet in their body for their lover

Title: Bond 303
Quote: Yeh kahan le aaye kaptan ... nazar aata nahi koi makan ... sirf kabristan kabristan
Trans: Where did you bring me captain ... I don't see any house here ... it's only a graveyard

Title: Bond 303
Quote: Ye ada jaane tamanna aap se seekhe koi ... jaankar anjaan banna aap se seekhe koi
Trans: Someone should learn this lovely style from you ... someone should learn from you how to act as a stranger even after knowing them

Title: Bond 303
Quote: Log phoolon ki khushboo ko bhool jaate hai lekin kaanton ki chuban ko nahi bhoolte
Trans: People can forget the fragrance from a flower but they can't forget the sting from thorns

Title: Bond 303
Quote: Jisse barfo mein ice-cream khane ka shauk ho ... usse sardi nahi lagti
Trans: Those who like to eat ice-cream in snow ... they don't feel cold

Title: Kuch Naa Kaho
Quote: Main jaanta hoon ki mujhe apne aap se door karne ki tumhare paas hazar wajah hongi ... par tumse door na jaane ki mere paas sirf ek hi wajah hai ... main tumhare bina jee nahi sakta
Trans: I know that you may have thousands of reasons to keep me away from you ... but I only have one reason to not go far away from you ... which is that I can't live without you

Title: Kuch Naa Kaho
Quote: Shaadi ke bagair aadmi adhoora hota hai ... aur phir poora ho jaata hai
Trans: Without marriage a man is incomplete ... and after that he's completely gone

Title: Asoka
Quote: Yudh ka ek hi niyam hota hai ... vijay!
Trans: War has only one rule ... victory!

Title: Asoka
Quote: Prem ek ghaav hai joh na jeene deta hai aur na marne deta hai
Trans: Love is a wound that doesn't let you live and neither let's you die

Title: Asoka
Quote: Main tumse prem karta hoon, kewal tumse ... tumhare sivah na kuch chahta hoon, na kuch sochta hoon ... jabse tumko dekha hai sab badal sa gaya hai, main badal sa gaya hoon ... kuch samajh nahi aata ... na kehta toh pagal ho jaata
Trans: I love you and only you ... I don't want anything else other than you and neither do I think about anything else ... since I've seen you everything has changed, I've kind of changed ... I don't understand anything ... and I would have gone mad if I didn't tell you all this

Title: Main Aisa Hi Hoon
Quote: Jis jhoot se kisi ko faida ho ... woh jhoot, jhoot nahi sach hota hai
Trans: A lie with which someone benefits ... that lie is a truth and not a lie

Title: Main Aisa Hi Hoon
Quote: Yeh joh kanoon ke aankh par kaali patti bandi hai ... woh sirf hamare aankhon ko hi andha nahi karti ... usne hamare dilon par bhi patthar rakh diya hai
Trans: This black cloth that blind folds the eyes of law ... not only blind folds our eyes ... but also it has placed a rock on our hearts

Title: Main Aisa Hi Hoon
Quote: Pyar mein itni taqat hai ki duniya bhar ka paisa bhi uske samne gareeb hai
Trans: Love has so much power that all the money of the world together is still poor in front of it

Title: Main Aisa Hi Hoon
Quote: Paise kamane aur bade banane ki aad mein ... hum sab ne hamara bachpana, hamari innocence, hamari saadgi kahin kho di hai
Trans: In the rush to earn money and become big ... we all have lost our childishness, our innocence, our simplicity somewhere

Title: Prem Pratigyaa
Quote: Biwi ko achcha khana pakana aur achcha gaana toh zaroor aana chahiye
Trans: A wife should definitely know how to cook well and how to sing well

Title: Prem Pratigyaa
Quote: Khushi hazar sahi, gham judha nahi hota ... gareeb kitni bhi pee le, nasha nahi hota
Trans: No matter how much happiness is there, sadness doesn't leave us ... no matter how much a poor person drinks, he doesn't get drunk

Title: Prem Pratigyaa
Quote: Achcha bura toh waqt hota hai ... aadmi nahi ... bure waqt hi pata chalta hai aadmi bura hai ki achcha
Trans: Time happens to be good or bad ... not a person ... and during bad times is when you get to know if a person is good or bad

Title: Prem Pratigyaa
Quote: Aurat ki bewafai ko samajhna duniya ke kisi mard ke bas ki baat nahi
Trans: No man in the world can understand the dishonesty from a woman

Title: Zahreelay
Quote: Jab dost ke irrade pakke ... toh dushman ke chutte chakke
Trans: When the intentions of friends are strong ... then the enemies will bite dust

Title: Zahreelay
Quote: Mukka-laat ke baad joh mulaqat hoti hai ... badi pakki hoti hai
Trans: The meeting that happens after a fight ... is very strong

Title: Zahreelay
Quote: Joh hamara taraf aankh uthayega, hum uska aankh phod dalega ... joh saala awaaz uthayega, hum uska zubaan kaat dalega ... aur joh sar uthayega, uska sar todh dega
Trans: The one who will look into my eyes, I'll smash his eyes ... the one who will raise his voice, I'll cut his tongue ... and the one who will raise his head, I'll break his head

Title: Zahreelay
Quote: Jab tarazu mein paise ka palhada halka ho jaata hai ... tab maut ka palhada bhari ho jaata hai
Trans: In a beam balance when the pan of money becomes light ... then the pan of death becomes heavy

Title: Aflatoon
Quote: Zindagi ko jaana humne kareeb se ... shaadi karenge toh sirf gareeb se
Trans: We understand life much better now ... and we'll marry only a poor person

Title: Aflatoon
Quote: Raja hoga uska pati ... joh hogi crorepati
Trans: Raja will be a husband of ... someone who is a millionaire

Title: Fareb
Quote: Bure sapno ka ek hi ilaaj hai ... achche sapno ko sach banana
Trans: Bad dreams have only one cure ... which is to make good dreams come true

Title: Fareb
Quote: Hum zindagi se naraaz ho jaye toh zindagi ko toh kuch bhi farak nahi padta ... woh toh chalti hi rahegi ... hum mein zindagi se kuch khushiyan churani hai
Trans: If we get disappointed with life then life is not affected by that ... it will keep on moving ... but we have to steal some happiness from life

Title: Veeru Dada
Quote: Main tujhe aaisi maut maroonga ... ki marne ke baad tera bejaan jism mere naam se kaanpega
Trans: I'll give you such a death that ... after dying your lifeless body will shiver hearing my name

Title: Veeru Dada
Quote: Mera baap ne mera naam Gulanand aaisi hi nahi rakha ... joh log mere saath anand se pesh aate hai ... unhe main gulab ki khushboo deta hoon ... aur joh log mere saath khroad se pesh aate hai ... unhe main gulab ke kaanton ki tarah chubne par majboor ho jaata hoon
Trans: My dad named me Gulanand not just like that ... those who behave with me peacefully ... I give them the fragrance of a rose flower ... and those who behave with me angrily ... I get compelled to hurt them like the thorns of a rose flower

Title: Veeru Dada
Quote: Mohabbat ek aaisa amrit hota hai ... ki jiski ek boond bhi agar tumhare jism mein utar jaye ... toh yeh duniya tumhe sabse zyada khoobsurat nazar aayegi
Trans: Love is such a divine syrup ... that even if one drop of it enters your body ... then this world will look as the most beautiful thing to you

Title: Veeru Dada
Quote: Aurat ke husn ka nishana kabhi khali nahi jaata
Trans: The aim of a woman's body never goes empty

Title: Anurodh
Quote: Marte marte main itna mar chuka hoon ... ki mujhe toh apne jeene par bhi shaq hone laga hai
Trans: By dying bit by bit, I'm so dead that ... I've started to doubt on my existence

Title: Anurodh
Quote: Aapke anurodh pe main yeh geet sunata hoon ... apne dil ki baaton se aapka dil behlata hoon
Trans: On your request I'm singing this song ... I'm entertaining you with the stories of my heart

Title: Appu Raja
Quote: Chote teer ghaav gambhir ... bahut chubte hai
Trans: Small arrows give deep wounds ... they hurt a lot

Title: Appu Raja
Quote: Aai aai yo aaiyo ... aai aai aai yooo!
Trans: Oh my god ... oh my god!

Title: Appu Raja
Quote: Vidhaata ki laathi beawaaz hoti hai
Trans: The stick of god is silent

Title: Appu Raja
Quote: Kitni door pahunch gaye sir!
Trans: Sir you've come so far ahead!

Title: Ladies Tailor
Quote: Gents kapde seene mein main failure hoon ... issi liye main ladies tailor hoon
Trans: I'm a failure in stichting men's clothes ... that's why I'm a ladies tailor

Title: Ladies Tailor
Quote: Bhagya aur karam ek saath chalte hai
Trans: Destiny and deeds work together

Title: Ladies Tailor
Quote: Jahan jahan tumhara khoon bahega ... wahan wahan mera paseena paseena bahega
Trans: Wherever your blood will flow ... there my sweat will also flow

Title: Tawaif
Quote: Hum kahan aaise ki soche koi ... tumne socha toh yeh ehsaan hua
Trans: I'm not so good that someone will think about me ... it's a favour that you thought about me

Title: Tawaif
Quote: Pehli baar jana ki chudi bhari kalaiyon ka matlab suhaag hota hai ... pehli baar jana ki subah ghar se nikle mard ke lautte kadamo ki aahat sunane ki koshish ko intezar kehte hai ... pehli baar jana ki biwi kehlane se hi aurat ke jism mein rooh padti hai
Trans: For the first time I understood that a wrist full of bangles means to be married ... for the first time I understood that trying to listen to the footsteps of a man returning back home is called as waiting ... for the first time I understood that only when a woman is called a wife, a soul enters her body

Title: Tawaif
Quote: Duniya mein har aurat ek bikau maal hai ... woh chahe toh ghar mein bikke, chahe bazar mein ... kabhi woh paise ke liye bikti hai, kabhi ghar grahasti ke liye ... kahin woh khud bikti hai apni marzi se, kahin woh bech dali jaati hai
Trans: In this world every woman is there to be sold ... she either sells in the house or in the market ... sometimes she is sold for money and sometimes for household duties ... somewhere she sells herself at her own wish and somewhere she is sold

Title: Tawaif
Quote: Kothe ki dehleez par aag hoti hai ... us par pair rakhte hi ladki ki izzat jal jaati hai ... aur woh izzatdar se tawaif ban jaati hai
Trans: There is fire on the threshold of a brothel ... and a girl's honour burns when she steps on it ... and she turns from a respected person into a prostitute

Title: Sunny
Quote: Pyar ka naam hai judaai ... yahi judaai pyar ka inaam bhi hai aur pyar ki sazaa bhi
Trans: The name of love is separation ... this separation is the award of love and also the punishment of love

Title: Sunny
Quote: Tab tak mere samne mat aana jab tak meri aankhen na kamzor ho jaye
Trans: Don't come in front of me until my eyes become weak

Title: Bin Badal Barsaat
Quote: Sookha jungle, geela parbat, jadugar ki kasam ... ek kadam bhi aage aaya, ho jayega bhasam
Trans: Dry jungle, wet mountain, and I swear on the magician ... if you come forward even one step then you'll turn into ash

Title: Bin Badal Barsaat
Quote: Moti chachi, lamba chacha jab aayenge home ... patthar jaisa dil dono ka ban jayega maum
Trans: When fat aunty and tall uncle will come home ... then their stone like hearts will turn into wax

Title: Kath Putli
Quote: Mujhe yeh aalishan makaan nahi, ghar chahiye ... mujhe daulat aur shohrat nahi, sukh chahiye ... mujhe logon ki tareef nahi, tumhari mohabbat chahiye
Trans: I don't need this luxurious house, I need a home ... I don't need money and wealth, I need happiness ... I don't want the praise from people, I need your love

Title: Kath Putli
Quote: Aasoon ki buniyad par khushi ka mahal khada nahi ho sakta
Trans: The mansion of happiness can't stand on the foundation of tears

Title: Naksha
Quote: Jeevan mein jab bhi rasta dhundla dikhai de ... toh bhagwan ki ungli thamkar hi insaan ko sahi rasta milta hai
Trans: In life whenever the path looks foggy ... then only by holding the finger of god can a person find the right path

Title: Naksha
Quote: Insaan jitna bhi kyun na bhaage ... maut se nahi bach sakta
Trans: No matter how much a person tries to run ... he still can't escape death

Title: Gola Barood
Quote: Kanoon ek aaisa hathyar hai joh sau achaiyon ko bhool jaata hai ... magar ek galati ho jaye toh gardan kaat deta hai
Trans: The law is a weapon that forgets hundreds of good deeds ... but if you do one mistake then it'll cut your neck

Title: Gola Barood
Quote: Marne waala chahe apne aap ko lohe ki deewaron mein bhi band karle ... bach nahi sakta ... aur jeene waala chahe lakhon goliyon ki bauchaar se guzar gaye ... mar nahi sakta
Trans: The one who is supposed to die, even if he locks himself up inside the walls of iron ... he still won't escape ... and the one who is supposed to live, even if he goes through millions of raining bullets ... he still won't die

Title: Gola Barood
Quote: Hazar bura aadmi burai ka rasta akhtyar kare toh itna khatarnak nahi ... lekin jab ek achcha aadmi burai ka rasta akhtyar karta hai na ... toh burai ka seena bhi kaanp uthta hai
Trans: Even if thousands of evil people adopt the path of evilness it's still not dangerous ... but when a single good person adopts the path of evilness ... then even the body of evilness shivers

Title: Gola Barood
Quote: Doosron ko maarkar jeena koi gaurav ki baat nahi ... magar khud ko maarkar kisi aur ke liye jeena hi jeena hai
Trans: It's not prideful to live by killing someone ... but to kill yourself and then to live for someone else is called as living

Title: Brothers
Quote: Joh mistake tune ki hai uski sazaa hoti hai ... maafi nahi
Trans: The mistake that you have done has a punishment ... not an apology

Title: Brothers
Quote: Main deserve karta hoon ki nahi yeh main nahi jaanta ... lekin meri family yeh chance zaroor deserve karti hai
Trans: I don't know if I deserve this or not ... but my family definitely deserves this chance

Title: Brothers
Quote: Duniya badi zalim hai ... dard pe hasti hai
Trans: This world is very ruthless ... it laughs on your pains

Title: Brothers
Quote: Fighter ki want uski jeet ka formula hoti hai
Trans: The want of a fighter is the formula for his victory

Title: Goonj
Quote: Kya mazaa baar baar milta hai tumhe humse rooth jaane mein ... roothne mein lagti hai do ghadiyan, umar kat jayegi manane mein
Trans: What fun do you get in being upset with me ... it only takes 2 seconds to be upset, but it'll take a whole life in trying to cheer up

Title: Goonj
Quote: Har achcha aadmi, har naik aadmi jab burai ke andhere ko mitaane ke liye bahar nikalta hai ... toh burai ke kaale naag samne aake khade ho jaate hai
Trans: When every good person, every honest person steps out to erase the darkness caused from evil ... then the black snakes of evil come and stand in front of you

Title: Goonj
Quote: Main apni har cheez bhool sakta hoon ... lekin tumhare zindagi se judhi koi cheez kabhi nahi bhool sakta
Trans: I can forget everything that I have ... but I can never forget anything that is connected with your life

Title: Maqsad
Quote: Dhan ko, hukumat ko mutthi mein rakhkar raj karne waale ameeron ko agar khatam kar diya jaye ... toh is duniya se ameeri aur gareebi ka farak hamesha hamesha ke liye khatam ho jayega
Trans: If you kill the rich people who rule by keeping money and government in their hand ... then the difference between the rich and the poor will end forever from this world

Title: Maqsad
Quote: Ishwar hazar gunah karne ke baad maaf kar deta hai ... lekin ek baar maa ka dil dukhao toh woh kabhi maaf nahi karta
Trans: God forgives you even if you commit 1000 crimes ... but he will never forgive you, if you make your mother sad even once

Title: Maqsad
Quote: Ban gaya main bhi mazdoor aaj se ... aaj chutti hai, kaam karoonga kal se
Trans: From today even I have become a worker ... today is a holiday, so I'll work from tomorrow

Title: Maqsad
Quote: Nahi dalenge hum haath izzat pe tumhari ... pehnayenge mangalsutra yahi khwaish hai hamari
Trans: I won't raise my hand on your honour ... but it's my wish to make you wear a wedding necklace

Title: Naukar Biwi Ka
Quote: Pehle shohrat ka bahut nasha hota hai ... lekin baad mein pata chalta hai shohrat kitni mehangi padti hai
Trans: First you are very crazy about wealth ... but later on you come to know how expensive wealth really was

Title: Naukar Biwi Ka
Quote: Dhan daulat ke shor mein nirdhan ki awaaz ko hamesha kuchal diya jaata hai
Trans: The voice of the poor always gets crushed in the noise of money and wealth

Title: Piku
Quote: Death aur shit ... yeh do cheezen kisi ko, kahin bhi, kabhi bhi aa sakti hai
Trans: Death and shit ... these two things can come to anyone, anywhere, anytime

Title: Piku
Quote: Insaan ka emotion uska motion ke saath juda hua hai
Trans: The emotion of a person is connected with his motion

Title: Kuch Kuch Locha Hai
Quote: Bottle aur aadmi ka rishta pehda hone se lekar marne ke baad tak ka rehta hai ... pehda hone pe kaunsi bottle milti hai ... doodh ki ... uske baad school mein kaunsi bottle milti hai ... water bottle ... phir jawani mein beer bottle ... shaadi ke baad whiskey ki bottle ... aur marne ke baad gangajal ki bottle
Trans: The relationship of a bottle and a man exists from birth and lasts even beyond his death ... which bottle does he get when he is born ... milk bottle ... after that which bottle does he get in school ... water bottle ... then a beer bottle when he becomes young ... a whiskey bottle after he gets married ... and after death he gets the bottle of holy water

Title: Kuch Kuch Locha Hai
Quote: Joh bhabhiyon se kare pyar ... woh shaadi se kare hamesha inkaar
Trans: The one who loves married women ... he always refuses from getting married

Title: Kuch Kuch Locha Hai
Quote: Aap agar Shanaya hai toh main mooli hoon ... aap agar patang hai toh main aapka solar cell hoon ... aap agar saand hai toh main aapki ghanti ki bell hoon
Trans: If you're Shanaya then I'm radish ... if you're a kite then I'm your solar cell ... if you're a bull then I'm your bell

Title: Kuch Kuch Locha Hai
Quote: Hakuna matata ... mere jeevan mein sirf raas, garba aur batata
Trans: I have no problems ... I only have Gujarati folk dance and potatoes in my life

Title: Lingaa
Quote: Kisi bhi cheez ki kamyabi mein saath toh bahut log dete hai ... lekin uski wajah banta hai ek dushman
Trans: In any success many people give their support ... but the reason behind it is one enemy

Title: Lingaa
Quote: Aankh, kaan, naak, mooh, dil, dimaag, haath, pair ... yeh saare purze milkar jis kaam par mehnat karte hai ... us hi ko chori kehte hai
Trans: Eyes, ears, nose, mouth, heart, mind, hands, legs ... when all these parts come together and work hard on something ... then that work is called as stealing

Title: Lingaa
Quote: Main kisi kaam mein utar gaya toh poora kiye bina nahi chhodta ... aur naa hone waala kaam leta hi nahi
Trans: Once I take up a job then I don't leave it without completing it ... and I don't take a job that cannot be completed

Title: Lingaa
Quote: Idea aur papad ek jaise hai ... thanda parne padh bekaar ho jaate hai
Trans: An idea and papadum are similar ... they become useless once they go cold

Title: Mrityudaata
Quote: Ek baar ghulami se peecha chhudaya tha hamare buzurgon ne ... toh kya aaj hum phir ghulam ban jayenge? ... chand aaise gaddar netaon ke haathon mein desh ki bhaag-daur ko saunp denge ... jinki gaadiyan bullet-proof, kapde daag-proof, kaan sound-proof aur aankhen sharam-proof? ... bolo, jawaab do!
Trans: Our elders had saved us once from slavery ... so today will we become slaves once again? ... will we give the operations of our country into the hands of a few corrupt politicians ... whose cars are bullet-proof, clothes are stain-proof, ears are sound-proof and eyes are shame-proof? ... tell me, answer me!

Title: Mrityudaata
Quote: Zabaan kabu mein rahe toh zabaan rehti hai ... bekabu ho jaye toh kataar bankar ki masoom begunah ka seena cheer sakti hai
Trans: If a tongue in under control then it's called a tongue ... if it becomes uncontrollable then it turns into a blade and tears the body of infallible innocent people

Title: Mrityudaata
Quote: Insaaf bik raha hai, emaan bik raha hai ... bazar sa laga hai, samaan bik raha hai ... is Ram ki dharti par Ravan ka raj hai ... kanoon thak chuka hai, napunsak samaaj hai ... har modh par yahan toh insaan bik raha hai ... bazar sa laga hai, samaan bik raha hai ... noton ke naam par, kahin voton ke naam par ... tirthon ke naam par, kahin dharamon ke naam par ... lag rahi hai boliyan, bhagwan bik raha hai ... bazar sa laga hai, samaan bik raha hai ... manavta lut rahi hai, khamosh hai vidhata ... dharti par badte paapon ko mitaane ... janam kyun nahi leta koi mrityudaata
Trans: Justice is being sold, faith is being sold ... a market is setup and goods are being sold ... Ravana rules on this land of Lord Ram ... the law is tired, the society is impotent ... on every corner here a human is being sold ... a market is setup and goods are being sold ... somewhere in the name of money, somewhere in the name of votes ... somewhere in the name of holy places, somewhere in the name of religions ... the prices are being set and god is being sold ... a market is setup and goods are being sold ... humanity is being stolen and god is silent ... to erase the growing sins on earth ... why doesn't some giver of death take birth

Title: Mrityudaata
Quote: Hamara raaj aur tumhari neeti ... in dono ke gathbandan se hi chalti hai tumhari raajneeti
Trans: My rule and your policy ... your politics runs on the union of these two

Title: Prithvi
Quote: Teri maut tujhse utni hi door hai ... jitni door main tujhse hoon
Trans: You death is only that much far from you ... as much far I am from you

Title: Prithvi
Quote: Mera bas chale toh ek minute mein 60 seconds, ek ghante mein 60 minute aur ek din mein 24 ghante ... bas tumhe dekhta rahoon, tumhe choomta rahoon
Trans: If it was in my control then for 60 seconds in one minute, 60 minutes in one hour and 24 hours in one day ... I would just look at you and kiss you

Title: Prithvi
Quote: Jab tak main tujhe maar nahi deta ... maut bhi mujhe maar nahi sakti
Trans: Until I kill you ... even death won't be able to kill me

Title: Baat Ban Jaye
Quote: Shaadi woh pavitra bandhan hai joh baaki saare bandhano ko kamzor bana deta hai
Trans: Marriage is that pure bond which makes all other bonds weak

Title: Baat Ban Jaye
Quote: Shaadi aurat ko majboot bana deti hai aur mard ko kamzor
Trans: Marriage makes a woman strong and a man weak

Title: Baat Ban Jaye
Quote: Jis manushya ka bank mein bahut rupaiya ho uske hridhay mein bhagwan hote hi nahi hai ... uske hridhay mein toh noton ki gaddiyan hoti hai jinse woh kabaddiyan khelta hai
Trans: A person who has a lot of money in his bank doesn't have god in his heart ... instead he has bundles of cash in his heart with which he plays kabaddi

Title: Baat Ban Jaye
Quote: Din mein sirf chaubees ghante hote hai aur kaam ek sau chaubees
Trans: There are only 24 hours in a day and 124 things to do

Title: Barood: The Fire
Quote: Arre vaah Ramji chori kya banai ... kahin rasgulla aur kahin malai
Trans: Oh lord Ram you have created great women ... somewhere there is rasgulla (dessert) and somewhere there is malai (cream)

Title: Barood: The Fire
Quote: Kya husn hai, kya jawaani hai ... yeh ladki hai ya pariyon ki rani hai
Trans: What a beautiful body, what youthfulness ... is she a girl or a queen of fairies

Title: Barood: The Fire
Quote: Khel mein haare hue khiladi aur jua mein haare hue juari ... dono hi mere kisi kaam ke nahi
Trans: A player who loses in a game and a gambler who loses in gambling ... both are of no use to me

Title: Barood: The Fire
Quote: Dhaal se chuka bandar aur baat se chuka aadmi ... kabhi bharose ke kabil nahi hote
Trans: A monkey that slips from a branch and a person that slips from his words ... can never be trusted

Title: Army
Quote: Agar aap log mera saath chhodkar gaye ... toh zindagi aap logon ka saath chhod degi
Trans: If you guys leave me and go ... then life will leave you guys

Title: Army
Quote: Duniya mein koi bhoot pret, koi jungli janwar is insaan naam ke janwar se zyada khatarnak nahi hota ... nuksaan toh sirf jeete jaagte insaan hi pahunchate hai
Trans: In this world no ghost or spirit, no wild animal is more dangerous than the animal named human ... because only the living humans hurt us

Title: Army
Quote: Badle ke aag mein jalti hui naari aur chot khai hui nagin ... dono ek samaan hoti hai
Trans: A woman burning in the fire of revenge and an injured snake lady ... both are the same

Title: Army
Quote: Lohe ke darwaze taqat se tootte na tootte ... akal se khule zaroor ja sakte hai
Trans: It doesn't matter if the doors of steel can be broken with strength or not ... they can definitely be opened with a mind

Title: Mr. Bechara
Quote: Ladkiyan kapur ki tarah hoti hai ... teeli lagi nahi ki jalkar roshni dene lagti hai ... aur tum ladke tubelight ki tarah hote ho ... bahut der se jalte ho
Trans: Girls are like a camphor ball ... the moment a matchstick ignites they start spreading the light ... and you boys are like a tubelight ... you start very late

Title: Mr. Bechara
Quote: Maa se badkar duniya mein koi cheez nahi hoti ... koi rishta nahi hota ... koi jazba nahi hota
Trans: In this world there is nothing greater than a mother ... no relation is stronger than that ... no emotion is stronger than that

Title: Mr. Bechara
Quote: Yaadon ke aaine mein jab waqt ki dhool jamti hai ... toh chehre dhundale ho jaate hai
Trans: When the mirror of memories becomes dusty by the sands of time ... then the images seen in them look obscured

Title: Dahek
Quote: Zindagi achche burre tajurbon ka silsila hai ... burre ko toh bhool jaana chahiye aur achche ko seene se lagake rakhna chahiye
Trans: Life is a sequence of good and bad experiences ... you should forget the bad ones and you should keep the good ones close to your heart

Title: Dahek
Quote: Jab mohabbat ki aag dahek uthti hai na toh woh mandir aur masjid ki taraf nahi dekhta hai ... un aankhon mein sirf dekhta hai jinhe woh pyar karta hai
Trans: When the fire of love erupts then one doesn't look towards temples or mosques ... but they only look into the eyes of the person whom they love

Title: Dahek
Quote: Koi bhi baat agar zor zabardasti se manvayi jaye ... chahe woh mazhab ke baare mein ho, apne aqeeday, apne imaan ke baare mein ho ... ya phir apne usoolon ke baare mein ho ... uska asar zyada der nahi rehta aur nateeja tabahi hi hota hai
Trans: If you get something done forcefully ... whether that's for religion, for your deism, for your faith ... or may be for your principles ... the effect of that doesn't last long and the result is always destruction

Title: Dahek
Quote: Tumko kya malum Shabnam guzarti kaisi hai meri raatein ... teri tasveer aankhon mein basaye bhatakta rehta hoon, karta hoon bas tumhari baatein ... tum shama ho Shabnam aur Manzoor parwana ... tumse lipatkar jalne ko tayaar hai deewana
Trans: Shabnam you don't know how I spend my nights ... I keep wandering with your picture in my eyes and I only talk about you ... Shabnam you're a lamp and Manzoor is a moth ... this crazy lover is ready to burn in your arms

Title: Singh Is Bliing
Quote: Chidiyon se main baaz ladaun ... gidderon se main sher banaun ... sawa lakh se ek ladaun ... tabhe Gobind Singh naam kahaun
Trans: I make the sparrows fight with the hawks ... I make lions out of wolves ... when one fights against many ... only then he is called as Gobind Singh (Guru)

Title: Singh Is Bliing
Quote: Ladkiyon ko nakhun sirf rang lagane ke liye nahi bhadana chahiye ... koi chhede toh uske chehre ko noch lena chahiye
Trans: Girls should grow their nails not only to colour them ... but also to use it to scratch the face of someone who teases them

Title: Singh Is Bliing
Quote: Koi bole Ram-Ram, koi khudaye, koi sevegosaiya, koi alaye ... rab ko manne ke tarike aur jagah alag alag ho sakte hai ... par rab ka ghar ek hi hota hai
Trans: Some say hail Lord Ram, some say hail Allah ... there can be many different ways and places to believe in God ... but God has only one house

Title: Singh Is Bliing
Quote: Singh jahan pair rakhta hai ... woh ilaaka uska ho jaata hai
Trans: Wherever Mr.Singh puts his feet ... that area becomes his

Title: Manjhi: The Mountain Man
Quote: Bhagwan ke bharose mat baithye ... kya pata bhagwan humre bharose baitha ho
Trans: Don't sit and wait around for God to do something ... who knows God is probably waiting for us to do something

Title: Manjhi: The Mountain Man
Quote: Shandar, zabardast, zindabad!
Trans: Splendid, amazing, live long!

Title: Manjhi: The Mountain Man
Quote: Jab tak todenge nahi ... tab tak chhodenge nahi
Trans: Until I break it ... till then I won't leave it

Title: Manjhi: The Mountain Man
Quote: Tohar ko itna chahte hai, itna chahte hai, itna chahte hai, itna chahte hai, itna chahte hai ... kitna chahte hai ka batayen ... seena cheer ke  dikhayen Bajrangbali jaisa?
Trans: I love you so much, love you so much, love you so much, love you so much, love you so much ... how should I tell you how much I love you ... should I tear apart my heart like Lord Hanuman?

Title: Udhaar Ki Zindagi
Quote: Zindagi woh zalim imtehan hai joh bagair ittala diye aa jaata hai ... aur manhoos haadse bagair ijazat zindagi ko apni lapet mein le lete hai
Trans: Life is that ruthless exam which comes without any notification ... and inauspicious events take life in their arms without any permission

Title: Udhaar Ki Zindagi
Quote: Yeh zindagi thode aasoon aur thodi hassi se milkar bani hai ... aankh se tapke hue har aasoon mein aane waali khushi ki kiran chupi hai ... jeevan ka sangeet chupa hai
Trans: Life is made with a combination of little tears and little laughter ... in every teardrop that falls from the eyes there is hidden a ray of happiness ... there is hidden the music of life

Title: Nikaah
Quote: Ab ke hum bichade toh shayad kabhi khwabon mein mile ... jis tarah sookhe hue phool kitaabon mein mile
Trans: If we separate now then may be we will meet in dreams ... just like dried flowers are found in books

Title: Nikaah
Quote: Jin labon ko yeh muskurahat mili hai, un labon ka ... jis haseen chehre ko yeh lab mile hai, us chehre ka ... jis chehre ko yeh badan mila hai, us badan ka ... jis badan ko yeh rooh mili hai, us rooh ka ... dono aalam mein koi jawab nahi hai
Trans: The lips that have this smile, those lips ... the beautiful face that has these lips, that face ... the body that has this face, that body ... the soul that has this body, that soul ... there is nothing like these things in both the worlds

Title: Nikaah
Quote: Aaj toh bas main aur tum, tum aur main ... darmiyan kuch na rahe, agar rahe toh pyar rahe
Trans: Today it's just me and you, you and me ... nothing should be in between us, and if there has to be something then it must be love

Title: Nikaah
Quote: Unko aata hai pyar pe gussa ... humko gusse pe pyar aata hai
Trans: She gets angry when it comes to love ... and I love it when she gets angry

Title: Nishchaiy
Quote: Peetal par sone ka pani chadene se ... peetal sona nahi ban jaata
Trans: By applying a gold coating on brass ... brass doesn't turn into gold

Title: Nishchaiy
Quote: Jaako raakhe saaiya maar sake na koi ... aur jaako maare saaiya usse bacha sake na koi
Trans: No one can harm the one who is protected by god himself ... and the one whose life god is supposed to take, no one can save him

Title: Nishchaiy
Quote: Main sirf teri jaan lena nahi chahta ... main yeh chahta hoon ki tu tadap tadapkar mare ... guzarne waala har pal tujhse kahe ki yamdoot tere peeche peeche aa rahe hai
Trans: I don't just want to take your life ... I want that you should suffer and die ... and every moment that passes by should tell you that the god of death is coming behind you

Title: Mahaanta
Quote: Jurm ki ret pe chalne waale kabhi kadamon ke nishaan nahi chhodte
Trans: Those who walk on the sands of crime don't leave behind the marks of their footsteps

Title: Mahaanta
Quote: Na main teri tarah kisi ko supari doonga, na hi saboot mittaonga ... balki jis din main tum logon ke naam ke matke phodonga na ... us din is shehar ka bachcha bachcha bolega ... tapka re tapka ... ek aur tapka
Trans: Like you I won't pay someone to kill, neither will I erase any proof ... instead the day when I break the pot of your names ... that day every child in the city will say ... someone died ... one more person died

Title: Mahaanta
Quote: Khaaki rang hai yeh ... aur joh log khaak ko audhna aur bichauna bana lete hai ... woh ya toh khud mitt jaate hai ya doosron mitta dete hai
Trans: This is khaaki colour (of a uniform) ... and those who make the uniform as their blanket and sheet ... they either themselves die or they erase others

Title: Chor Pe Mor
Quote: Woh maar maroonga tujhe ... joh shaitan ne apni sauteli aulaad ko bhi nahi maari hogi
Trans: I'll hit you in such a way ... which not even the devil would have used on his step children

Title: Chor Pe Mor
Quote: Tujhe main itne dino tak bandh rakhunga saale ... jab tak tu chakki pees-peeskar sarkar ke liye itna paisa kama le ... ki sarkar ka jail banane ka karcha vasool ho jaye
Trans: I'll keep you locked up for so many days ... until you earn enough money for the government by grinding flour ... which would cover the expenses of the government for building the jail

Title: Chor Pe Mor
Quote: Woh aaye apun ke ghar khuda ki kismat hai ... kabhi apun darwaza bandh kar dete hai, kabhi kholte hai
Trans: It's a blessing of god that you came to my house ... sometimes I close my door and sometimes I open it

Title: Chor Pe Mor
Quote: Mujh mein itna zehar bhara hai ... ki mujhe kaatkar shaitan bhi zinda nahi reh sakta
Trans: I have so much poison in me ... that even the devil won't be able to stay alive after cutting me

Title: Wardat
