Quote: Pistol ke khel ka bas yahi toh mazaa hai ... jisne pehle chalayi uski jeet ... joh chuk gaya uski maut
Trans: The only fun in the game of a pistol is that ... the one who fires first wins ... and the one who misses dies

Title: Wardat
Quote: Farz ke aage main saathi, premika aur apni jaan tak kurbaan kar sakta hoon ... aur is waqt mera farz hai tumhari jaan lena
Trans: In front of my duty I can even sacrifice my companion, my love and my life ... and at this moment it's my duty to kill you

Title: Wardat
Quote: Main aadmi ke dimag ko bhi kaabu mein kar sakta hoon ... uske baad koi bhi aadmi kutte ki tarah dum hilakar mere ishaaron par chalne lagta hai
Trans: I can even control the mind of a person ... and after that any person will follow my instructions like a dog wagging his tail

Title: Sapno Ka Saudagar
Quote: Aurat ke aanchal mein kutumb ki, desh ki, insaan ki aabroo hoti hai
Trans: The honour of a family, a country, a person lies in the scarf of a woman

Title: Sapno Ka Saudagar
Quote: Zindagi mein jis cheez ki tamanna ho usse logon mein baant do ... dhan chahiye dhan do, sukh chahiye sukh do, pyar chahiye pyar do ... sirf do aur dete raho ... kabhi kisi se kuch maango mat bas aankh bandh karke diye jao, diye jao
Trans: In life distribute in people the thing that you desire for ... give money if you want money, give happiness if you want happiness, give love if you want love ... just give and keep on giving ... never ask for anything from anyone, just close your eyes and keep on giving

Title: Sapno Ka Saudagar
Quote: Jeevan ke sare sapne vishvas ke bal par hi toh sache hote hai
Trans: All the dreams of life come true on the strength of belief

Title: Sapno Ka Saudagar
Quote: Jis desh ki ladkiyan besharam ho jaati hai ... wahan ke mardon ko sharam aane lagti hai ji
Trans: A country in which the girls becomes shameless ... over there the men feel shy

Title: Ekka Raja Rani
Quote: Daulat itni daulatmand nahi joh sacha pyar khareed sake
Trans: Money is not that wealthy that it can buy true love

Title: Ekka Raja Rani
Quote: Ekka bhale hi sabse bada ho ... magar rani hamesha raja ki hoti hai
Trans: Even if the ace is the highest card ... but still the queen always belongs to the king

Title: Ekka Raja Rani
Quote: Falak ko zid hai jahan bijliyan girane ki ... hum mein bhi zid hai wahin apna aashiyan banane ki
Trans: Where the sky is stubborn to throw lightning ... even I'm stubborn to make my mansion over there

Title: Ekka Raja Rani
Quote: Judai ke dard ka mol kabhi chukaya nahi ja sakta ... usse sirf samjha jaata hai
Trans: You can never pay a price for the pain of separation ... you can only understand it

Title: Janam Kundli
Quote: Mard ki fitrat bahut ajeeb hoti hai ... behta hai toh dariya ki tarah behta hai ... lekin jab rang badalta hai toh kinaro ke saath baaki ki zameen bhi bahakar le jaata hai
Trans: The nature of men is very strange ... when he flows he flows like a river ... but when he changes his colour then along with the shores he also takes with him the rest of the land

Title: Janam Kundli
Quote: Main tumhe aaise apahij karoonga ... ki tum doosron ka sahara lekar bhi apahij hi rahoge
Trans: I'll make you handicap in such a way that ... even after taking the support of others you'll still be handicap

Title: Janam Kundli
Quote: Milne se kahan milta hai ek baar aadmi ... har aadmi mein hote hai do char aadmi
Trans: You don't understand a person just by meeting them once ... in every person there are two to four personalities

Title: Janam Kundli
Quote: Izzat ek nazuk sa kaanch hai ... chatak gaya toh awaaz bahut door tak jayegi
Trans: Honour is a very delicate glass ... if it breaks then the noise will go very far

Title: Mera Pati Sirf Mera Hai
Quote: Pati toh sabhi ko mil sakta hai ... lekin achcha insaan kisi kisiko milta hai
Trans: Everyone finds a husband ... but only a few find a good person

Title: Mera Pati Sirf Mera Hai
Quote: Waqt aur taqdeer se jeetna bahut mushkil hota hai
Trans: It's very hard to win against time and destiny

Title: Mera Pati Sirf Mera Hai
Quote: Agar kisi stree ko apne purush ka mann jeetna ho toh uske liye do hi raste hai ... ek khane ka aur doosra sone ka
Trans: If any woman wants to win the heart of her man then there are only two ways for that ... one of food and other of sleeping

Title: Mera Pati Sirf Mera Hai
Quote: Agar kisi ko jaan se maar dena kanoonan jurm hai ... toh kisi ke charitra ki hatya karna bhi ek sangeen jurm se kam nahi
Trans: If killing someone is a crime and against the law ... then to kill someone's character is also nothing less than a serious crime

Title: Jail
Quote: Dekhunga yeh khula aasman doobara kabhi socha na tha ... maan jayega mera rootha khuda kabhi socha na tha ... gham mein bahut roya ab talak ghalib ... khushi se ro padunga ek din kabhi socha na tha
Trans: I had never thought that I'll see the open skies again ... I had never thought that my unhappy god will be happy with me ... until now this poet has cried a lot in sadness ... I had never thought that one day I would cry in happiness

Title: Jail
Quote: Politics ka bukhaar bura hota hai, kursi ka khumaar bura hota hai ... is desh ke netaon se bachke rehna doston, in logon ka toh pyar bhi bura hota hai
Trans: The fever of politics is bad, the intoxication of a position is bad ... friends beware of the politicians of this country, since even their love is bad

Title: Jail
Quote: Sapno ko bikharte dekha hai yahan ... umeedo ko simatte dekha hai yahan ... suna hai yahan bighade huon ko sudharte hai ... magar sudhre hue ko bighadte dekha hai yahan
Trans: I've seen dreams scatter here ... I've seen hopes shrink here ... I've heard that here they turn the bad guys into good ones ... but I've seen the good ones turning into bad guys here

Title: Jail
Quote: Nahalo, dholo, nikalo kitna bhi mail badan ka ... phir bhi na nikle mail badan ka, kyun ki yeh pani hai jail ka
Trans: Take a bath, wash it, no matter how much dirt you remove from your body ... but still the dirt won't come out since this water is from a jail

Title: Ishq Hai Tumse
Quote: Sitaron ki mehfil sajji hai, us mein ek hoor ek pari hai ... joh zindagi hamari hai, hum mein jaan se bhi pyari hai
Trans: There is a party of stars and in that there is one beautiful fairy ... who is my life, and is more special to me than my life

Title: Ishq Hai Tumse
Quote: Is shehar ki khushboo woh bheeni bheeni raat ... bhatke sari duniya, na mili Lucknow waali baat
Trans: That beautiful night with the fragrance of this city ... I roamed all around the world, but there was nothing like Lucknow

Title: Ishq Hai Tumse
Quote: Ishq kare koi kisi se hum mein kya harz hai bhai ... nuksaan joh hamara hoga kaun karega bharpai
Trans: Why would I be bothered if people are in love ... but if I'm at loss then who will pay for it

Title: Ishq Hai Tumse
Quote: Humne tumhare naam ki titli daboch li ... sab rang kayanat ke mutthi mein aa gaye
Trans: I held a butterfly in your name ... and all the colours of the universe came into my hand

Title: Jazbaa
Quote: Yahan sabka ek hi takia-kalaam hai ... hazaar ke note pe Bapu ko salaam hai
Trans: Here everyone has the same catch-phrase ... they salute Mahatma Gandhi who is on the Rs.1000 note

Title: Jazbaa
Quote: Neend na mashooka ki tarah hoti hai ... waqt na do toh bura maanke chali jaati hai
Trans: Sleep is like a girlfriend ... if you don't give time to it, then it gets upset and leaves

Title: Jazbaa
Quote: Sharafat ki duniya ka kissa hi khatam ... ab jaisi duniya vaise hum
Trans: Let's end the story of the world of innocence ... now I'll be just like the world is

Title: Jazbaa
Quote: Mohabbat hai is liye jaane diya ... zidd hoti toh baahon mein hoti
Trans: I let her go since she is my love ... had she been my stubbornness then she would have been in my arms

Title: Bajirao Mastani
Quote: Putra agar pita ki paghdi pehan le toh usmein pita ki buddhi toh nahi aa jaati ... chandan ke vrush ko bhi sugandh dene ke liye ek umar ki avashakta hoti hai
Trans: If a son wears the headdress of a father, then he doesn't get the brains of his father ... even a Sandalwood tree needs to age so that it can give its fragrance

Title: Bajirao Mastani
Quote: Aandhi roke toh hum toofan ... toofan roke toh hum aag ka dariya
Trans: If you can stop strong winds then we're a storm ... if you can stop a storm then we're a sea of fire

Title: Bajirao Mastani
Quote: Adhoori mulaqat hi toh phir se milne ka vaada hota hai
Trans: An incomplete meeting is a promise to meet again

Title: Bajirao Mastani
Quote: Tujhe yaad kar liya hai aayat ki tarah ... ab tera zikr hoga ibadat ki tarah
Trans: I've memorized you like a holy verse from the Quran ... now you will be mentioned like a prayer

Title: MSG-2: The Messenger
Quote: Na Hindu bura hai ... na hi Sikh, Isai, Musalman bura hai ... burai pe utar aaye woh insaan bura hai
Trans: Neither Hindus are evil ... nor are Sikhs, Christians and Muslims evil ... a person who comes down to evilness is evil

Title: MSG-2: The Messenger
Quote: Haath agar aaise (khula haath) rehta hai toh gundon aur rakshason ko bhakt bana deta hai ... aur agar haath aaise (band mutthi) ho jaata hai toh rakshas bhi trahimam trahimam kar uthte hai
Trans: If a hands stays open palm then it turns goons and devils into devotees ... and if a hand turns into a closed fist then even devils get scared and surrender

Title: MSG-2: The Messenger
Quote: Kahin aam ke bhooleke bomb na nighal jaana ... pata nahi chalega kitna phatta hai aur kitna baki reh gaya
Trans: Don't gulp a bomb thinking it's a mango ... because then we won't come to know how much it blasted and how much is left over

Title: MSG-2: The Messenger
Quote: Main woh agjar hoon joh apne shikaar ko apni phoonkar se kheenchkar bina chabaye nighal jaata hoon
Trans: I'm that python who pulls, sucks and gulps his prey without evening chewing it

Title: Radha Ka Sangam
Quote: Ishq jab ek taraf hoye toh sazaa deta hai ... aur jab dono taraf hoye toh mazaa deta hai
Trans: When love is one sided then it punishes ... and when it's on both sides then it gives rejoicement

Title: Radha Ka Sangam
Quote: Is paar nahi toh phir, us paar milenge hum ... sau baar bichadke bhi, ek baar milenge hum
Trans: If not on this side, then we'll meet on the other side ... even after separating 100 times, we will meet for once

Title: Sardar
Quote: Sirf siddhant ke bal par raajneeti nahi chalti ... iske liye stithi ko samajhna zaroori hai, samay ki chaal ko pehchanna zaroori hai
Trans: Politics can't run only on the power of principles ... that's why it's important to understand the situation, it's important to recognize the game of time

Title: Sardar
Quote: Raajneeti asambhav ko sambhav bana dene ki kala hai
Trans: Politics is an art to make the impossible possible

Title: Aap Aye Bahaar Ayee
Quote: Zindagi ki har badi ladai insaan apne aap se hi ladta hai ... apne hi andar insaan Mahabharat jaisi kahi ladaiyon se guzar jaata hai
Trans: A person fights all the big fights of life with himself ... within himself he goes through many fights like the Mahabharata

Title: Aap Aye Bahaar Ayee
Quote: Meri mohabbat ka tum yakeen karlo ... kahin na umar guzar jaye aazmane mein
Trans: Have trust in my love ... or else your life will pass by just trying it

Title: Aap Aye Bahaar Ayee
Quote: Pooche joh koi mujhse bahaar kaisi hoti hai ... naam tera leke keh doon yaar aaisi hoti hai
Trans: If someone will ask me how is spring ... then I'll take your name and say my friend it's like her

Title: Aap Aye Bahaar Ayee
Quote: Yeh nazar unki nazar se aaisi takrayi ki bas ... hosh rukhsat ho gaye woh bekhudi chai ki bas ... zulf bikhri aur lipatkar mere dil se reh gayi ... meri duniya khushbuon se aaisi mehakai ki bas
Trans: Her eyes connected with my eyes ... my senses left and I was unaware ... her hair flew and hugged my heart ... and my world started to smell so good

Title: Mother
Quote: Kabhi kabhi ek jhoot bhi insaan ko tabaah kar sakta hai ... aur kabhi ek sach bhi
Trans: Sometimes even one lie can destroy a person ... and sometimes even one truth

Title: Mother
Quote: Aurat ka charitra safed chaddar hota hai ... aur agar uspar daag lag jaye toh woh kabhi nahi dhulta
Trans: The character of a woman is a white sheet ... and if it gets dirty then it can never be washed

Title: Mother
Quote: Jis jhoot se kisi ki izzat bach jaye ... aaisa jhoot toh hazaron sach se bhi mahaan hota hai
Trans: A lie that protects the honour of someone ... that lie is even bigger than thousands of truths

Title: Jaani Dushman: Ek Anokhi Kahani
Quote: Insaan aur aatma ki jung mein ... jeet parmatma ki honi chahiye
Trans: In the battle between human and soul ... God is the one who should win

Title: Jaani Dushman: Ek Anokhi Kahani
Quote: Ab agar teri maut bhi chahe ... toh bhi teri maut tal nahi sakti
Trans: Now even if your death desires ... then to your death can't be avoided

Title: Jaani Dushman: Ek Anokhi Kahani
Quote: Jis tarah dhanush se nikla hua baan vapas nahi aa sakta ... jis tarah chitta jalne ke baad manushya jeevit nahi ho sakta ... ussi tarah se mera diya hua shraap bhi vapas nahi laut sakta
Trans: Like an arrow that has left the bow can't come back ... like once the pyre has burned a person can't come back ... just like that a curse that I've given can't be taken back

Title: Jaani Dushman: Ek Anokhi Kahani
Quote: Main un sabko aaisi bhayanak maut doonga ... ki agla janam lene se pehle un sabki rooh kaanp uthegi
Trans: I'll give all of them such a scary death ... that their souls will tremble before they are born in their next life

Title: Suryaa
Quote: Gareeb ka dil agar sone ka hota hai ... toh haath faulaad ke hote hai
Trans: If the heart of a poor person is made from gold ... then his hands are made from steel

Title: Suryaa
Quote: Mazdoor ko mazdoori paseena sookhne se pehle mile ... aur mazloom ko insaaf dard mitne se pehle
Trans: A worker should be paid before his sweat dries up ... and a victim should get justice before his pain ends

Title: Suryaa
Quote: Haqeeqat chup nahi sakti banavat ke usoolon se ... ki khushboo aa nahi sakti kabhi kagaz ke phoolon se
Trans: The truth cannot be hidden by the principles of lies ... and fragrance can never come from flowers made out of paper

Title: Suryaa
Quote: Inteqam bhi ek tarah ka insaaf hi hota hai ... joh saboot ka mohtaj nahi hota
Trans: Even revenge is a kind of justice ... which doesn't depend on any proof

Title: Prem Deewane
Quote: Amir aadmi kabhi kabhi itna gareeb hota hai ... ki uske paas paise ke sivah aur kuch nahi hota hai
Trans: Sometimes a rich person is so poor that ... he has nothing else other than money

Title: Prem Deewane
Quote: Main samajhti thi ki shaadi do insaano mein hoti hai ... lekin tumhare pitaji se pata chala ki shaadi ek insaan ki doosre insaan ke saath nahi ... ek bank balance ki doosre bank balance ke saath, ek haisiyat ki doosre haisiyat ke saath, ek rutbe ki doosre rutbe ke saath hoti hai
Trans: I used to think that a marriage happens between two people ... but I learnt from your father that one person doesn't marry another person ... a bank balance marries another bank balance, a capacity marries another capacity, a status marries another status

Title: Prem Deewane
Quote: Ladki jab ek baar suhag ka joda pehenle aur uski shaadi na ho ... toh wohi joda uske liye kafan ban jaata hai
Trans: When a girl wears a bride's dress and then if she doesn't get married ... then that dress becomes a shroud for her

Title: Prem Deewane
Quote: Dard ka ehsaas jinhe hota hai ro sakte hai ... gair ke ashq bhi daaman ko bhigo sakte hai ... neend aati nahi phoolon pe akalmandon ko ... prem deewane toh kaanton pe bhi soo sakte hai
Trans: Those who feel the pain can cry ... even teardrops of a stranger can moisten us ... smart people can't sleep on flowers ... crazy lovers can even sleep on thorns

Title: Jeevan Ek Sanghursh
Quote: Waqt kaise bhi guzar jaata hai ... waqt ki yahi ek achchi baat hai
Trans: Time passes by somehow or the other ... this is the only best thing about time

Title: Jeevan Ek Sanghursh
Quote: Jurm ki zindagi ek aaisa dhagaa hai ... jis mein agar ek baar aadmi uljha toh bas ulajhta hi jaata hai
Trans: The life of crime is such a thread that ... if a person gets tangled in it once then he only gets more and more tangled in it

Title: Maseeha
Quote: Mann mein badle ki bhavna lekar insaan jeeta nahi hai ... mar jaata hai
Trans: A person does not live with the fire of revenge in him ... he simply dies

Title: Maseeha
Quote: Kya kare pyar ishq mohabbat mein kehna padta hai ... kabhi khushi kabhi gham sehna padta hai ... khullam khulla pyar karenge kehna padta hai
Trans: What can I do, you have to say all this in love and romance ... you have to tolerate sometimes happiness and sometimes sadness ... you have to say that we will love openly

Title: Maseeha
Quote: Yeh basti mere zulm ka kabristan hai ... aur tum sab log mere zulm par bichi hui ek safed chaddar
Trans: This locality is a graveyard of my atrocities ... and all you people are a white sheet spread on top of my atrocities

Title: Agar Tum Na Hote
Quote: Vishvas aur himmat do aaisi taqatein hai ... joh namumkin ko mumkin bana sakti hai
Trans: Faith and courage are two such strengths ... that can make the impossible possible

Title: Agar Tum Na Hote
Quote: Milna bichadna jeevan ki reet hai ... do pehlu hai ... ek gham ka doosra khushi ka
Trans: Meeting and separation are part of life ... they are the two sides ... one of sadness and other of happiness

Title: Agar Tum Na Hote
Quote: Hindustani businessman ki ek bahut badi khoobi hai ... woh kam se kam paisa dekar achche se achcha result maangta hai
Trans: An Indian businessman has one very big speciality ... that he expects the best results by spending the least amount of money

Title: Ek Tha Raja
Quote: Kapdon se izzatdar ... karamon se kaatilon ke pehredar ... police station chaloge mere sarkar?
Trans: You're respectful by the clothes you wear ... you're a guard of killers by deeds ... Sir will you come to the police station?

Title: Ek Tha Raja
Quote: Agar ladki haan bole na toh chhodna nahi ... aur agar na bole toh chhedna nahi
Trans: If a girl says yes then don't leave her ... and if she says no then don't tease her

Title: Ek Tha Raja
Quote: Is shehar ki kisi bhi adalat mein woh typing machine nahi hai ... joh warrant par Baba ka naam type kar sake
Trans: No court of this city has a typing machine ... which can type Baba's name on a warrant

Title: Ek Tha Raja
Quote: Jinke khoon mein wafaadari hoti hai ... woh gaddari ke bare mein sooch bhi nahi sakte
Trans: Those who have loyalty in their blood ... they can't even think about cheating

Title: Saawan: The Love Season
Quote: Har ek ki khushi ke saath kisi ka dukh judha hota hai ... aur har ek ki zindagi ke saath kisi ki maut
Trans: With everyone's happiness someone's sadness connected ... and with everyone's life someone's death is connected

Title: Saawan: The Love Season
Quote: Mere hi haathon mein likhi hai taqdeer meri ... aur meri hi taqdeer pe mera bas nahi chalta
Trans: My destiny is written in my own hands ... and I have no control over my own destiny

Title: Saawan: The Love Season
Quote: Is duniya mein do logon ki koi kadar hi nahi ... ek joh haan bole, bhale hi woh maut ke liye haan bole ... doosra joh de, bhale hi woh apni jaan de
Trans: Two kinds of people don't get any respect in this world ... one who say yes, even if it is for death ... second who give, even if they give their life

Title: Saawan: The Love Season
Quote: Jinse nafrat hai unse pyar karna seekho ... magar unse nafrat mat karo joh tumhe pyar karte ho
Trans: Learn to love those whom you hate ... but don't hate the people who love you

Title: Aya Sawan Jhoom Ke
Quote: Sharif aadmi England toh kya kisi bhi land mein chala jaye ... apni motherland ko kabhi nahi bhoolta
Trans: Whether a respectful man goes to England or any other land ... he still doesn't forget his motherland

Title: Aya Sawan Jhoom Ke
Quote: Ek sharif aurat zindagi mein ek hi baar pyar karti hai ... yeh kali ek hi baar khilti hai ... ek baar nigahen milti hai ... ek baar mohabbat hoti hai
Trans: A respectful woman only falls in love once in her life ... this flower blossoms only once ... the eyes connect only once ... she loves only once

Title: Aya Sawan Jhoom Ke
Quote: Naari aur sangeet ka bahut kareeb rishta hai ... dono mein narmi hai, loch hai, lachak hai, dard hai, soz hai, tadap hai, khichav hai, kashish hai
Trans: A woman and music are closely connected ... they both have softness, flow, sway, pain, ardency, yearning, pull and attraction

Title: Aya Sawan Jhoom Ke
Quote: Yeh komal kali, naazon ki pali, misri ki gali ... hamare hi kul mein lagegi bhali
Trans: A delicate girl like her raised with affection, and who is a crystallized sugar lump ... will only look good in my family

Title: Aap Ki Kasam
Quote: Dukh toh sabhi ki zindagi mein hota hai ... kisi ko bin maange mil jaata hai meri tarah ... aur koi jaan-mooch ke modh le leta hai tumhari tarah
Trans: Everyone has sorrow in their life ... some people like me get it without asking for it ... and some people like you purposely call for it

Title: Aap Ki Kasam
Quote: Tum mere jeevan mein us rog ki tarah ho ... jis mein aadmi ghulta rehta hai, tadapta rehta hai ... na jee sakta hai, na mar sakta hai
Trans: You're like a disease in my life ... in which a person keeps sulking, keeps wriggling ... where neither can he live, nor can he die

Title: Aap Ki Kasam
Quote: Dost ki galati bhi dosti ki saughat hoti hai
Trans: Even the mistake of a friend is a gift in friendship

Title: Aap Ki Kasam
Quote: Shaadi shuda zindagi ki buniyad hai ... pati aur patni ka ek doosre par atal vishvas
Trans: The foundation of a married life is ... the strong trust of a husband and wife on each other

Title: Raghuveer
Quote: Main hoon aag ka dariya na ulfat ka geet ... yugon se nibhaye joh Raghukul ke reet ... mitta doonga is jag se zulm ka andhera ... main roshni ka aashiq mera naam Raghuveer
Trans: I'm a sea of fire and not a love song ... the one who has followed the customs of ancient dynasty for years ... I'll erase the darkness of cruelty from this world ... I'm a lover of light and my name is Raghuveer

Title: Raghuveer
Quote: Raajneeti ke rath ko wohi ghode keenchte hai ... jinki aankhon pe wafaadari ki patti bandhi ho
Trans: Only those horses pull the chariot of politics ... who are blindfolded by honesty

Title: Raghuveer
Quote: Jhoot ke kaale badal suraj ko kitna bhi dhak le ... ek din ujaala hokar hi rahega
Trans: No matter how much the dark clouds of lies cover the sun ... one day there will be brightness

Title: Raghuveer
Quote: Khoon jaise apna rang nahi badalta ... vaise hi khoon apne khoon ke sar ki jhooti kasam nahi khaata
Trans: Like blood doesn't change its colour ... just like that blood can't make a false promise in the name of its own blood

Title: Agneekaal
Quote: Gadhe ki peeth par vakalat ki kitaab rakhne se ... gadha vakil nahi banta
Trans: By putting a book of law on the back of a donkey ... the donkey doesn't become a lawyer

Title: Agneekaal
Quote: Ekta ne jab jab khoon bahaya hai ... tab tab kranti aayi hai
Trans: Whenever unity has shed its blood ... then a revolution has come

Title: Hero (2015)
Quote: Pyar karne waale kabhi darte nahi ... joh darte hai woh pyar karte nahi
Trans: People who are in love are not scared ... those who are scared are not in love

Title: Hero (2015)
Quote: Ishq ne bahut logon ko nikamma bana diya hai yeh toh suna tha ... magar tujhe toh gaddar bana diya
Trans: I had heard that love makes many people useless ... but it has made you into a traitor

Title: Hero (2015)
Quote: Do hi toh kaam aate hai mujhe ... dadagiri karna aur doosra body banana
Trans: I only know to do two things ... to be rowdy and second building my body

Title: Hero (2015)
Quote: Purane rishtey todke naye rishtey nahi banaye jaate hai
Trans: You don't make new relations by breaking old ones

Title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2
Quote: Har ladki ki life mein ek umar aati hai jab usse realise hota hai ki ab uski life ... ek driver, ek bodyguard, ek naukar aur ek ATM ke bina nahi chal sakti ... aur ab ladki itna sab kuch toh afford kar sakti nahi na ... toh ladkiyan dhoondti hai boyfriend
Trans: In every girl's life there comes a moment when she realises that now her life ... will not work without a driver, a bodyguard, a servant and an ATM machine ... and since every girl can't afford all of this ... that's why girls look for a boyfriend

Title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2
Quote: Aadmi ka dimaag jeevan ka gyan sookne ke liye bana hai ... lekin kuch ch*tiye isse auraton ka ch*tiyapa sookne ke liye istemaal karte hai
Trans: The brain of a man is made to capture the knowledge of life ... but some crazy people use it to capture the bullshit of women

Title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2
Quote: Ek relationship mein pade huye aadmi ka dimaag nichhodke agar aap dekhe ... toh aapko balti bharke ch*tiyapa milega
Trans: If you squeeze the brain of a man who is in a relationship ... then you will get a bucket full of bullshit

Title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2
Quote: Woh tumhare maa baap ke baare mein kuch bhi bol le ... koi tension nahi ... tum unke maa baap ke baare mein zara si ek line bol do ... toh 3rd aur 4th world war dono ek saath ho jayenge
Trans: She can say anything against your parents ... there is no issue ... but if you say even one line against her parents ... then the 3rd and 4th world war, both will start together

Title: Shaheed
Quote: Joh insaan ki maut marna nahi jaanta ... yeh duniya usse insaan ki zindagi jeene nahi deti
Trans: The one doesn't know how to die with respect ... this world doesn't let him live with respect

Title: Shaheed
Quote: Duniya ke barbaadi ki jadh hai ... ek insaan ka doosre insaan pe hukumat karne ka shauk
Trans: The reason why the world is being destroyed ... is the pursuit of one person to rule over another person

Title: Shaheed
Quote: Watan pe marne waale marte nahi ... amar ho jaate hai
Trans: People who die for the country are not dead ... they become a martyr

Title: Shaheed
Quote: Yeh veer kitne mahaan hai jinhone is desh ki mahaanta ko adarsh ka roop diya ... mahaan hai yeh desh jis mein aaise veeron ne janam liya
Trans: The heroes who have morphed the greatness of this country into a role model are great ... this country is great who has given birth to such heroes

Title: Lootere
Quote: Main gareebi ka woh nivala hoon ... joh amir ke gaale mein atak jaye toh uska halak cheer ke rakh de
Trans: I'm that bite of poverty ... which if it gets stuck in the throat of a rich person then it tears apart his interiors

Title: Lootere
Quote: Ittihas yeh nahi dekhta kya sahi tha, kya galat ... kya mushkil tha, kya aasaan ... yaad toh yahi reh jaata hai ki kaun jeeta aur kaun haara
Trans: History doesn't look at what was right and what was wrong ... what was hard and what was easy ... the only thing that gets remembered is who won and who lost

Title: Lootere
Quote: Shaheedon ke mazaaron par diye zaroor jalte hai ... lekin unke gharon mein choolay tak nahi jalte
Trans: Candles definitely light up on the shrine of martyrs ... but the stoves in their house don't light up

Title: Lootere
Quote: Mehfil lagi hai yahan mohabbat karne waalon ki ... koi lutta hai toh koi lootta hi hai ... dilon ke khel mein aksar kahin na kahin sheesha tootta hi hai
Trans: There is a party here of people in love ... some lose and some only steal ... often in the game of hearts a mirror breaks somewhere or the other

Title: Policewala Gunda
Quote: Watan pe mitne waalon ki yun khatam nahi hoti kahaniyan ... hum mein toh phir bhi yaad rakhegi duniya, nahi rahengi tumhari nishaaniyan
Trans: The stories of people who die for their country don't end ... the world will still remember me, but your traces won't even survive

Title: Policewala Gunda
Quote: Yeh na samajhna ki samne koi murdaar khada hai ... kehte hai jisse Chauhan yeh tumhara baap khada hai
Trans: Don't think that someone weak is standing in front of you ... the one who is called as Mr. Chauhan is your father and he is standing in front of you

Title: Policewala Gunda
Quote: Mehnat se mile daulat toh Allah ki rehmat hai ... mile haraam ki toh shaitan ki laanat hai ... peeth par maarkar apno ke khanjar joh mile daulat ... arre woh laanat hai, woh laanat hai, woh laanat hai
Trans: If you earn money by hardwork then it's a blessing of Allah ... if you get it for free then it's a curse from the devil ... if you get money by stabbing your dear ones on the back with a knife ... then it's a curse, it's a curse, it's a curse

Title: Policewala Gunda
Quote: Duty nibhate hai hum issi liye hum hum hai, varna haramkhor kehlate ... rishvat khate mujrimon se aur rishvatkhor kehlate
Trans: I fulfill my duty and that's why I am who I am, or else I would have been called useless ... and I would have taken bribe and would have been called someone who takes bribe

Title: Dost (1974)
Quote: School aur college ka imtihaan khatam hone se student life khatam nahi hoti ... zindagi ke har modh par har insaan ek student hai
Trans: Student life does not end when the exams of school and college end ... every person is a student at every corner of life

Title: Dost (1974)
Quote: Jhoot ki raakh se sachai ki aag ko nahi bhujaya jaa sakta
Trans: The ash of lies can't extinguish the fire of truth

Title: Dost (1974)
Quote: Sachai par chalne waala insaan ... waqt aane par gundon se kahin zyada khatarnak ban jaata hai
Trans: A person who walks on the path of truth ... can become much more dangerous than goons if the times call for it

Title: Chaand Kaa Tukdaa
Quote: Hindustani nariyan joh hoti hai chikni machliyon ki tarah hoti hai ... haath se phisal jaati hai
Trans: Indian women are like slippery fishes ... they slip from the hands

Title: Chaand Kaa Tukdaa
Quote: Insaan chahe zaalim ho ya masoom ... woh atyachar karne ke liye bandook uthaye ya atyachar mitaane ke liye ... kanoon ki nazaron mein mujrim ban jaata hai
Trans: No matter if a person is evil or innocent ... whether he picks up a gun to be cruel or to stop cruelty ... he becomes a criminal in the eyes of the law

Title: Chaand Kaa Tukdaa
Quote: Aag petrol ko nahi chhodti ... nevla saanp ko nahi chhodta ... aur jab main paison ka hisaab jodhta hoon toh main apne baap ko nahi chhodta
Trans: Fire doesn't leave petrol alone ... a mongoose doesn't leave a snake alone ... and when I account for my money then I don't even leave my father alone

Title: Chaand Kaa Tukdaa
Quote: Joh main dikhai deta hoon woh main nahi hoon ... aur joh hoon woh dikhai nahi deta
Trans: I am not what I look like ... and what I am that can't be seen

Title: Bhaag Johnny
Quote: Tumhari jaisi ladki ke saath koi do teen din nahi bita sakta ... poori zindagi bita sakta hai
Trans: No one can spend 2 to 3 days with a girl like you ... instead he can spend his entire life

Title: Bhaag Johnny
Quote: Jab bhi hum mein lagta hai ki hamare paas koi rasta nahi hai ... toh us waqt bhi hamare paas koi na koi rasta zaroor hota hai
Trans: Whenever we think that we don't have any path to take ... then even at that time we have some path or the other to take

Title: Bhaag Johnny
Quote: Bhavishya aur kuch nahi, sirf apne faislon ka nateeja hai ... sahi faisla kar, bhavisya sahi ho jayega
Trans: The future is nothing but the results of our decisions ... so take the right decisions and the future will be alright

Title: Bhaag Johnny
Quote: Pyar ke bagair mar marke jeene se achcha hai ... ke kuch hi pal pyar mein jeeke mar jaao
Trans: Rather than dying bit by bit without love ... it's better to live for a few moments in love and then die

Title: Calendar Girls
Quote: Yahan pe log rone ke liye kandha nahi dete ... marne tak ka intezar karte hai
Trans: People hear don't lend a shoulder to cry ... they wait for you to die

Title: Calendar Girls
Quote: Cricket league is desh ka sabse bada gambling adda hai
Trans: Cricket league is the biggest gambling stage in this country

Title: Calendar Girls
Quote: Platform ya track se zyada humein dhyaan dena chahiye individual choices par ... life is all about the individual choices we make ... isn't it
Trans: More than a platform or track we should concentrate on individual choices ... life is all about the individual choices we make ... isn't it

Title: Calendar Girls
Quote: Aas paas jitni bheed hoti hai ... insaan utna hi akela hota hai
Trans: The bigger the crowd one has around them ... that much lonely that person is

Title: Waqt: The Race Against Time
Quote: Apni aulad ke khatir zindagi toh maa baap de hi dete hai ... lekin aapne toh apni maut tak kurbaan kardi
Trans: Parents do sacrifice their life for the sake of their children ... but you also sacrificed your death

Title: Waqt: The Race Against Time
Quote: Apni lakeeron par itna bharosa mat karo ... yeh kehti kuch aur hai ... aur karti kuch aur
Trans: Don't believe a lot on the lines of your palms ... they say something ... and they do something else

Title: Love And God
Quote: Badkismati aur khushkismati mein bahut kam faasla hai ... dono ke palatne mein der nahi lagti
Trans: There is a very small distance between badluck and goodluck ... it doesn't take time for both to change

Title: Love And God
Quote: Gham ki aandhiyon se mohabbat ke chirag nahi bhujte
Trans: The storms of sadness can't blow off the candles of love

Title: Love And God
Quote: Khuda khud haseen hai aur har haseen cheez mein nazar aata hai
Trans: God himself is marvelous and is visible in every marvelous thing

Title: Love And God
Quote: Dil woh aaina hai jiski keemat tootne ke baad badhti hai
Trans: A heart is that mirror whose value increases after it breaks

Title: Mere Mehboob
Quote: Kaam ki na kaaj ki ... dushman meri jaan ki
Trans: You're a useless and hopeless person ... who is an enemy of my life

Title: Mere Mehboob
Quote: In cheezon se bhar chuka hai pet-e-natamam ... ab toh kuch aur hi khane ko jee chahta hai
Trans: My imperfect stomach is tired of eating all this ... now I wish to eat something else

Title: Mere Mehboob
Quote: Mujhko kyun dete ho zehar-e-zindagi ... mujhko marke nagahani chahiye ... dil abhi poori tarah toota nahi ... doston ki meharbani chahiye
Trans: Why are you giving me a life full of poison ... I want to die and get the unexpected ... my heart has not yet broken completely ... I want the kindness from my friends

Title: Mere Mehboob
Quote: Insaan ki izzat jab jaati hai jab woh sachai aur imaan ka daaman chhod deta hai ... insaan ki izzat jab jaati hai jab woh apne zameer ko bech deta hai, insaaniyat ko bech deta hai, sharafat ko bech deta hai ... eent aur patthar ke bane huye makaano ke bikne se insaan ki izzat nahi jaati
Trans: A person loses his respect when he leaves the position of truth and faith ... a person loses his respect when he sells his conscience, when he sells his humanity, when he sells his honesty ... by selling houses made from bricks and stones a person doesn't lose his respect

Title: Hum Paanch
Quote: Jab jab adharm ka sar uthta hai ... tab tab dharm devta ka paon usse kuchal deta hai ... jab jab Ravan pehda hota hai ... Ram ko janam lena hi padta hai ... jab bhi Kaurav atyachar karenge ... Pandav unhe nasht kar denge ... yahi yudh dharm hai, yahi jeevan karam hai
Trans: Whenever unrighteousness has raised its head ... then the leg of the god of righteousness smashes it ... whenever Ravana is born ... then Lord Ram has to take birth ... whenever the Kaurava's will do injustice ... then the Pandava's will destroy them ... this is the righteous nature of war, this is the graceful nature of life

Title: Hum Paanch
Quote: Machli toh jal mein rahe, phir bhi baas na jaye ... naaho dho kuch karo, satsang mail mitaye
Trans: A fish lives in the water but still it smells ... no matter even if you take a bath or wash, only spiritual discourse can clean the dirt

Title: Hum Paanch
Quote: Aurat ke gusse aur khoobsurati mein kamaal ka connection hai
Trans: There is a great connection between the anger and beauty of a woman

Title: Hum Paanch
Quote: Joh vishvas aankhen hote huye bhi aadmi ko andha karde ... unhe mitana zaroori hai
Trans: A belief that makes a person blind even when he has eyes ... should be erased

Title: Peepli Live
Quote: Caren hai bahut zyada par tel bahut kam hai ... issi liye Iraq pe giraye gaye itne bomb hai
Trans: There are a lot of cars but very less petrol ... that's why there were so many bombs dropped on Iraq

Title: Peepli Live
Quote: Kapda hai bahut zyada par kameez bahut tang hai ... badal hai bahut zyada par baraste kitne kam hai
Trans: There is a lot of cloth but the shirt is very short ... there are a lot of clouds but they shower so less

Quote: Rajneeti mein matbhed ho sakta hai ... dushmani nahi hogi
Trans: There can be differences in politics ... but not enmity

Quote: Zindagi aaise ho gayi hai jaise bell-bottom aur khudkhushi jeans ki pant
Trans: Life has become like a bell-bottom (pant) and suicide like a jeans pant

Title: Tamasha (2015)
Quote: Wahi kahani phir ek baar ... Majnu ne liye kapde phaad ... maar tamasha beech bazar
Trans: It's the same story once again ... Mr. Majnu rips his clothes ... and total entertainment in the middle of the market

Title: Tamasha (2015)
Quote: Jhand fakeer, soovar ki aulaad, marjha saale kamine ... thank you!
Trans: Worthless beggar, son of a pig, go and die you rascal ... thank you!

Title: Tamasha (2015)

Trans: Whatever we say about us we will lie ... and we will say nothing but the lie

Trans: You're the one who goes to office and comes home in the evening ... the one who gets a scolding from his boss and doesn't tell anyone

Title: Phool Khile Hain Gulshan Gulshan

Trans: There are so many bodies whose sweat has more fragrance than a perfume

Title: Phool Khile Hain Gulshan Gulshan
Quote: Apna paseena boyega toh sona ughayega
Trans: If you sow your sweat then you will reap gold

Title: Phool Khile Hain Gulshan Gulshan
Quote: Apne maathe se paseena poch ... agar tere gande paseene ki ek boond bhi is dharti par gir gayi ... toh is dharti se anaaj ughna band ho jayega
Trans: Wipe the sweat from your forehead ... even if a single drop of your dirty sweat falls on this soil ... then this soil will stop growing crops

Title: Phool Khile Hain Gulshan Gulshan
Quote: Gareeb ki beti jis pal bhoj ban jaati hai na ... usse rukhsat kar dete hai
Trans: The moment a poor man's daughter becomes a liability ... then she is married to someone

Title: Yeh Aag Kab Bujhegi
Quote: Jis shaadi ka aadhaar prem na ho, maan samaan na ho ... woh shaadi shaadi nahi ... balki hamari sanskriti ka apmaan hai
Trans: The marriage whose foundation is not on love, which doesn't have respect ... that marriage is not a marriage ... instead it's a disgrace to our culture

Title: Yeh Aag Kab Bujhegi
Quote: Gawahi na kisi ke haq mein hoti hai na kisi ke khilaaf ... gawahi toh gawahi hoti hai
Trans: A testification neither favours anyone nor does it go against anyone ... a testification is simply a testification

Title: Yeh Aag Kab Bujhegi
Quote: Betiyan baap ki pagdi mein lipti hoti hai ... pagdi utar jaye toh woh nangi ho jaati hai
Trans: Daughters are wrapped in the turban of fathers ... when the turban comes down then they become naked

Title: Yeh Aag Kab Bujhegi
Quote: Jab koi ladki jala di jaati hai us waqt mera mann karta hai ki ... is samaaj ko purane akhbaar ki tarah raddi ki tokri mein daal doon
Trans: Whenever a girl is burnt (Sati) then at that time I feel like .... I should take this society and put it in a basket of waste like an old newspaper

Title: Raja Ko Rani Se Pyar Ho Gaya
Quote: Soyi hui kismat ko jagana ... wohi himmat ka kaam hai
Trans: To wake up your sleeping destiny ... is something that needs courage

Title: Raja Ko Rani Se Pyar Ho Gaya
Quote: Sapno ki duniya mein safalta pana aasaan hai ... par asli zindagi mein mushkil
Trans: It's easy to achieve success in the world of dreams ... but hard in real life

Title: Mere Do Anmol Ratan
Quote: Uparwaale ne daulat aur khane ka muqaddar alag alag kaagazon pe likha hua hai ... jisko daulat zyada deta hai uska khana kam kar deta hai ... jisko khana zyada deta hai uski daulat kam kar deta hai
Trans: God has written the destiny of money and food on different papers ... the one who has a lot of money doesn't have a big appetite for food ... the who has a big appetite for food doesn't have a lot of money

Title: Mere Do Anmol Ratan
Quote: Yeh ladki hai ya qayamat ... arre yeh sapna hai ki haqeeqat
Trans: Is she a girl or a goddess ... is this a dream or reality

Title: Mere Do Anmol Ratan
Quote: Jahan meri maa nahi ... wahan mera bhagwan nahi
Trans: The place where my mother is not there ... over there my god is not there

Title: Mausam (1975)
Quote: Chook gaye do nain se aur thokaren kha gaye paon ... moorakh mukhiya bhool kare aur bhugte saara gaon
Trans: You slipped from both your eyes and your legs got hurt ... a foolish chief does a mistake and the whole village pays for it

Title: Mausam (1975)
Quote: Kaam kare so soonth kare aur kuch kare afeem ... karmo ki gath prani bhukte theli bhare hakeem
Trans: Dried ginger does the work and a little is done by drugs ... a human pays for his deeds and the doctor fills his bags

Title: Mausam (1975)
Quote: Punya kamaye kikri aur peepal daan kare ... jungle jaisa vaid kahan joh sabka dhyan kare
Trans: The kikar tree earns the virtue and the fig tree does the donation ... there is no doctor like the jungle who cares for everyone

Title: Welcome to Sajjanpur
Quote: Koi hawa toh chale, koi patta toh hile ... kaun hai apna kuch pata toh chale
Trans: Some wind should blow, some leaves should move ... we must know who are our dear ones

Title: Welcome to Sajjanpur
Quote: Boni na batta khelne aa gaye satta
Trans: I have not even made any money yet and you guys have come to gamble

Title: Khalifa
Quote: Aadmi chahe kitna bhi sangdil ho ... lekin uske andar ka insaan ekdum mar nahi jaata ... purani yaadein uska peecha nahi chhodti
Trans: No matter how ruthless a person is ... but the human inside him just can't die lie that ... the old memories don't leave him alone

Title: Khalifa
Quote: Baat pistol ki goli hoti hai ... joh ek baar nikal jaye doobara vapas nahi aati
Trans: Words are like a bullet from a gun ... once they come out then they can't go back

Title: Nayee Padosan
Quote: Tum middle class logon ki yehi problem hai ... ladki ko bhi local train ka khidki waala seat samajhta hai ... pehla rumaal rakh diya matlab seat tumhari ho gayi?
Trans: You middle class people have this problem ... you consider even a girl as if she is a window seat of a train ... where you put a napkin first on the seat then that seat belongs to you?

Title: Nayee Padosan
Quote: Maa baap apne bachon par haat uthane ka haq rakhte hai ... par jis din bachon ne apne maa baap pe haat utha diya na ... us din rishtey khatam ho jaate hai
Trans: Parents have the right to raise their hands on their kids ... but the day kids raise their hands on their parents ... that day the relationships end

Title: Nayee Padosan
Quote: Naya ho chahe ho purana, hai toh tumhari nishaani ... kal subhe saat bajhe se shuru hogi teri meri prem kahani
Trans: Be it new or old, it's still your souvenir ... tomorrow morning from 7 am, our love story will start

Title: Kis Kis Ki Kismat
Quote: Mujhe zero ki nahi heeron ki ginti mein interest hai
Trans: I'm interested in counting diamonds and not zeroes

Title: Kis Kis Ki Kismat
Quote: Kis lallu se meri behen ne pallu bandha ... ek number ke ullu se ghar waalon ne rishta maanga
Trans: Which crazy person did my sister marry ... my family members asked a high quality fool for his hand

Title: Raja Aur Runk
Quote: Gareeb ka janamdin toh uska maramdin hota hai ... janamdin, khansi-din, cheek-din yeh sab ameeron ke hote hai
Trans: The birthday of a poor person is death-day for him ... birthday, cough-day, sneeze-din are only there for the rich people

Title: Raja Aur Runk
Quote: Kyun behti ho khoyi khoyi ... mere yogya hai seva koi?
Trans: Why are you sitting as if you're lost ... is there anything that I can do?

Title: Tapasya
Quote: Woh pyar hi kya joh samay ke parivartan ke saath badal jaye
Trans: What good is that love which changes with the change in time

Title: Tapasya
Quote: Zindagi bhi ajeeb hai ... koi kisi ke itna kareeb hote huye bhi kabhi kabhi kitna door nazar aane lagta hai
Trans: Life is strange ... a person may be very close to someone but still sometimes they seem to be so far

Title: Mere Hamdam Mere Dost
Quote: Jab hawa shabd ko badalti hui pehlu aayi ... muddaton apne badan se teri khushboo aayi
Trans: When the air changed course and came on my side ... for a long time your fragrance was coming from my body

Title: Mere Hamdam Mere Dost
Quote: Apni aankh ka shateer bhi tinka nazar aata hai ... aur doosron ki aankh ka tinka shateer nazar aata hai
Trans: Even a huge thing in our eye looks like a particle to us ... and even a particle in someone else's eyes looks huge to us

Title: Kaun Apna Kaun Paraya
Quote: Zindagi bhagwan ki di hui daulat hai ... usse apne hi haathon gavana insaan ki kamzori ke saath saath jurm hai
Trans: Life is the wealth given by god ... to lose it from our own hands is not only the weakness of mankind but also a crime

Title: Kaun Apna Kaun Paraya
Quote: Kele ka chilka pair ke neeche joh aa gaya ... jalwe bhi unke saath saath par phisal gaya
Trans: When the banana skin came under his feet ... his talent also slipped down with him

Title: Kaun Apna Kaun Paraya
Quote: Dono jahaan teri mohabbat mein haarke ... woh chal diya bechara baithakke maar maarke
Trans: He lost both the worlds in your love ... the poor guy died doing squats

Title: Kaun Apna Kaun Paraya
Quote: Rishtey naate ke liye khazana nahi ... gharana dekha jaata hai
Trans: To build relations you look at family members of the house ... and not money

Title: Bhai
Quote: Doobara agar aaisi harkat ki toh tumhara woh haal karoonga ... ki kursi par baithna toh door bistar par letne ke bhi kaabil nahi rahoge
Trans: If you do this thing again then I'll make your condition such that ... forget sitting on a chair you won't even be able to lie down on a bed

Title: Bhai
Quote: Sau badmaasho ko chaano toh ek kameena nikalta hai ... sau kameeno ko chaano toh ek harami nikalta hai ... aur yeh suvar sau haramiyo ko chaankar nikla hai
Trans: When you filter 100 bad guys then you get one rascal ... when you filter 100 rascals then you get one bastard ... and this pig has come out after filtering 100 bastards

Title: Bhai
Quote: Zinda rakhna chahe woh toh koi fanaa kar nahi sakta ... aur in gunehgaron ko aaj tabahi se koi bacha nahi sakta
Trans: If god wants to keep one alive then no one can destroy him ... and no one can save these criminals today from destruction

Title: Bhai
Quote: Tumne toh kamaal kar diya ... dhoti ko phaadkar rumaal kar diya
Trans: You have done such a great job ... you ripped a loincloth and made it into a handkerchief

Title: Raampur Ka Lakshman
Quote: Main paidahishi imaandar hoon ... baimaan ki maut marna mere liye beizzati hai
Trans: I'm honest from birth ... to die the death of a cheater is dishonour for me

Title: Raampur Ka Lakshman
Quote: Kadve sach se meetha jhoot kabhi kabhi achcha hota hai
Trans: Sometimes a sweet lie is better than the sour truth

Title: Raampur Ka Lakshman
Quote: Likhna padhna toh school mein sikhaya jaata hai ... lekin insaaniyat school mein nahi, sanskaron se aati hai
Trans: Writing and reading is taught in school ... but humanity doesn't come from school, it comes from values

Title: Raampur Ka Lakshman
Quote: Joota kitna bhi keemti ho paon mein hi pehna jaata hai ... sar pe nahi
Trans: No matter how expensive a pair of shoes are, they are still worn in the feet ... and not on the head

Title: The Train (1970)
Quote: Dil insaan ka sabse bada dost bhi hai ... dushman bhi
Trans: The heart is the biggest friend of a person ... and enemy as well

Title: The Train (1970)
Quote: Insaan badal jaate hai ... insaano ke naam nahi badalte
Trans: People change ... but their names don't change

Title: The Train (1970)
Quote: Aurat woh haseen paheli hai jisse samajhne ke liye insaan baar baar galati karta hai ... magar phir bhi samajh nahi paata
Trans: A woman is that beautiful riddle which a man tries to solve and makes a mistake multiple times ... but still he is not able to solve it

Title: The Train (1970)
Quote: Jis tarah main apne pyar ko ruswa nahi kar sakta ... us hi tarah apne farz ko bhi sharminda nahi kar sakta
Trans: Just like I can't dishonour my love ... like that I can't make my duty feel ashamed as well

Title: Aashiq
Quote: Magarmach ke mooh se shayad gosh ka tukda nikalna aasaan hai ... lekin Baburao jisko apne daanton mein daboch le na ... usse na toh aaj tak koi chhuda paya hai aur na chhuda payega
Trans: It may be easier to pull out a piece of meat from a crocodile's mouth ... but the one who Baburao catches with his teeth ... no one till today has been able to free him and neither anyone will be able to free him

Title: Aashiq
Quote: Tera ek ek aasoon mere liye bada bada samundar hai
Trans: Each and every tear drop of yours is a big ocean for me

Title: Aashiq
Quote: Kya bachon ki tarah cricket khel rahe ho? ... khelna hai toh mere kaale kaale lambe baalon se khel ... mere reshmi dupatte ke aanchal se khel ... mere khwabon mein aakar mere khayalon se khel
Trans: Why are you playing cricket like the kids? ... if you want to play then play with my black long hair ... play with the edge of my silky scarf ... come in my dreams and play with my thoughts

Title: Aashiq
Quote: Jis din tu mere hatthe chad gaya ... samajhna us hi din tu sooli par chad gaya
Trans: The day you come in my hands ... understand that, that day you will be hanged

Title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
Quote: Har family mein problem hai ... par woh khush naseeb hai jinki family hoti hai
Trans: In every family there are problems ... but those who have a family are lucky

Title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
Quote: Kisi ke haath chalte hai toh kisi ke pair ... hamare dono chalte hai
Trans: Some people move their hands and some move their legs ... I can move both

Title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
Quote: Saari shikayatein ek saath likhva dijiye ... mooch, shirt, tie, pant, underwear, banyan, kuch mat chhodiye ... dhajjiyan udha dijiye ... lekin pyar nahi karta, yeh mat likhvaiye
Trans: Note down all your complaints against me ... moustache, shirt, tie, pant, underwear, banyan, don't leave anything ... tear me apart ... but don't say that I don't love you

Title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
Quote: Tumhe roothne ka poora haq hai ... lekin tumhe manane ka adhikaar mujhse koi nahi cheen sakta
Trans: You have the full right to be upset ... but no one can snatch the right to coax you from me

Title: Sadak Chhap
Quote: Aadmi ke do haath toh hote hai magar neta banane ke baad ... ek haath ekdum lamba aur ek haath ekdum chota ho jaata hai ... woh lambe haath se vote kheenchta hai aur chote haath se note deta hai
Trans: A person does have two hands but after becoming a politician ... one hand becomes very long and the other hand becomes very short ... with the long hand he pulls the votes and with the short hand he gives away money

Title: Sadak Chhap
Quote: Aapke aasoon mera dard ban jayenge ... aur aapki takleefien meri pareshaniyan kehlayengi
Trans: Your tears will turn into my pain ... and your problems will be called as my worries

Title: Sadak Chhap
Quote: Haath chhodke baat kar varna yamdoot ke hawale kar doonga
Trans: Leave my hand alone and talk or else I'll send you to the god of death

Title: Sadak Chhap
Quote: Main un netaon mein se nahi hoon joh vote lene ke liye note baantte hai ... aur vote mil jaane ke baad noton mein ulajh jaate hai
Trans: I'm not one of those politicians who give away money to buy votes ... and who after getting the votes get engrossed in money

Title: Main Solah Baras Ki
Quote: Woh kaunsi mehakti hawa ka jhonka hai jis mein main dolna chahungi ... woh kaunsa bhavishya hai mere liye jiske haath mein main apna haath thamana chahungi ... woh kaunsa devta hai jiske bagair mera jeevan suna aur meri aatma adhoori hai ... aur woh kaunsa tirth staan hai jahan mere dil ka kisi dil se sangam hoga?
Trans: Where is the air with fragrance with which I would like to flow ... what is the future for me in whose hands I'll give my hands ... which is the god without whom my life is lonely and my soul is incomplete ... and which is that holy place where my heart will unite with another heart?

Title: Main Solah Baras Ki
Quote: Parivar hi insaan ka gadh hai, qila hai ... joh kabhi tootna nahi chahiye
Trans: Family is the foundation and the fort of a person ... which should never break

Title: Main Solah Baras Ki
Quote: Mere pyaase honthon pe kisi ke honth ... jaise amrit ke ghonth
Trans: Someone's lips on top of my thirsty lips ... are like a sip of nectar

Title: Halaal Ki Kamai
Quote: Zameen pe rhengne waala keeda kitna bhi bada kyun na ho ... usse masalne ke liye pair ka ek angootha hi kaafi hai
Trans: No matter how big an insect which crawls on the floor is ... you only need one big toe finger to crush it

Title: Halaal Ki Kamai
Quote: Haraam ki kamai ke hazaron lakhon rupaye se ... us ek rupaye mein zyada barkat hoti hai joh halaal ki kamai ka hota hai
Trans: Better than thousands and lakhs of rupees earned from cheating ... is one rupee that is earned with honesty

Title: Halaal Ki Kamai
Quote: Arre hum toh woh shikaari hai ... joh hawaon se shikaar ka pata pooch lete hai
Trans: I'm that hunter ... who gets the location of the prey from the winds

Title: Jajantaram Mamantaram
Quote: Boss apun haath pair todta hai ... lekin vishvas nahi todta hai
Trans: I do break hands and legs ... but I don't break someones trust

Title: Jajantaram Mamantaram
Quote: Vaah re neeli chatri waale tu toh chatri kholke upar baith gaya ... aur lafde ka baarish mein main bheeg raha hai idhar
Trans: Oh god, you're sitting up there with a blue open umbrella ... and I'm the one here who is getting drenched in the rain of problems

Title: Krodhi
Quote: Aurat ko apna maan, bhakt ko uska bhagwan, gareeb ko uski aan aur amir ko uski shaan ... bahut pyari hoti hai
Trans: Respect to a woman, god to a devotee, self-respect to a poor person and status to a rich person ... are very important to them

Title: Krodhi
Quote: Bhagwan kuch bhi nahi ek insaan hai joh mahaan hai ... bhakti kuch bhi nahi ek shakti hai ... karam kuch bhi nahi ek kartavya hai ... prem kuch bhi nahi ek anand hai ... yeh anand agar tumhe prapt karna hai toh tumhe usse, mujhse, har ek se prem karna hoga
Trans: God is nothing but a human who is great ... devotion is nothing but divine energy ... virtue is nothing but duty ... love is nothing but peace ... and if you want to achieve this peace then you'll have to love him (god), me, and everyone

Title: Krodhi
Quote: Bhagya ki rekhayein haathon mein nahi hoti ... insaan ke karamon mein hoti hai
Trans: The lines of destiny don't exists in the hands ... they exists in the deeds of a person

Title: Krodhi
Quote: Duniya mein aaisa mujrim koi pehda nahi hua ... jiska anth kanoon ne na likha ho
Trans: No criminal has ever been born in this world ... whose end is not written by the law

Title: Chura Liyaa Hai Tumne
Quote: Dil ki lagi mein dhadkano pe ikhtiyar nahi hota ... ishq woh jalwa hai joh pardanasheen nahi hota
Trans: In love you don't have any control over your heartbeats ... love is that magic which can't be hidden

Title: Chura Liyaa Hai Tumne
Quote: Sab kuch jhoot ho sakta hai ... lekin mera pyar jhoota nahi hai
Trans: Everything can be a lie ... but my love for you is not a lie

Title: Jung (2000)
Quote: Bata kya lega ... thanda, chai garam ... Bacardi, beer, rum
Trans: Tell me what will you have ... cold drink, hot tea ... Bacardi, beer, or rum

Title: Jung (2000)
Quote: Every Sunday is not a day
Trans: Every day is not a Sunday

Title: Dream Girl (1977)
Quote: Insaan ko uske janam se nahi ... karam se parakhna chahiye
Trans: A person should be judged by his deeds ... not by his birth

Title: Dream Girl (1977)
Quote: Satyam, shivam, sundaram ... policesam, arrestam, andarham
Trans: Think about truth, godliness and beauty ... forget it since the police is coming to arrest you and take you into captivity

Title: Dream Girl (1977)
Quote: Sachai ka rishta khoon ke rishtey se ooncha hota hai
Trans: The relationship of truth is bigger than the relationship of blood

Title: Kudrat (1981)
Quote: Kanoon jurm ko dekhta hai, insaan ko nahi dekhta ... uske samne raja aur runk, ameer aur gareeb, maalik aur ghulam ... sab barabar hai
Trans: The law looks at the crime and not at the person ... in front of it a king and a pauper, a rich person and a poor person, a boss and a slave ... are all equal

Title: Kudrat (1981)
Quote: Jis tarah insaan purane kapde phekkar naye kapde pehan leta hai ... us hi tarah aatma bhi purane jism ko chhodkar naya jism dharan kar leti hai
Trans: Just like a person throws his old clothes and wears new clothes ... just like that even the soul leaves the old body and occupies a new body

Title: Kudrat (1981)
Quote: American ladki se ishq kar sakte hai ... shaadi nahi kar sakte ... aur desi ladki se shaadi kar sakte hai ... ishq nahi kar sakte
Trans: You can romance an American girl ... but you can't marry her ... and you can marry an Indian girl ... but you can't romance her

Title: Dil Dhadakne Do
Quote: Agar koi alag tarah jeena chahta hai, toh usse jeene do ... har dil apni hi tarah dhadakta hai, har dil dhadakne do
Trans: If someone wants to live differently, then let them live ... every heart beats in its own way, so let every heart beat

Title: Dil Dhadakne Do
Quote: Dil se faisla karo tumhe kya karna hai ... dimaag tarkeeb nikaal lega
Trans: Decide from the heart what you want to do ... the mind will find a solution for it

Title: Dil Dhadakne Do
Quote: Aaisa kyun hai ki jab koi saath hai toh insaan usse kitni baatein kehna bhool jaata hai ... aur aaisa kyun hai ki jab koi door chala jaata hai ... toh insaan ko kitni baatein yaad aati hai joh keh deni chahiye thi
Trans: Why is it that when someone is with us then we forget to tell them so many things ... and why is it that when a person goes far away from us ... then we remember so many things which we should have said

Title: Dil Dhadakne Do
Quote: Khel mein toh haar jeet lagi rehti hai ... afsoos woh karte hai jinka khel khatam ho gaya ho
Trans: Winning and losing is part of the game ... but only those people repent whose game is over

Title: Deewane
Quote: Yeh kaunsi manzil hai, yeh kaunsa makaam hai ... aankhon mein koi chehra, hothon pe koi naam hai
Trans: What destination is this, what route is this ... there is one face in the eyes, and another name on the lips

Title: Deewane
Quote: Jitna tum karti ho mujhse pyar ... us mein 10% aur jodh lo yaar
Trans: The amount of love that you have for me ... add 10% to that

Title: Deewane
Quote: Aurat ke dil ke andar joh jhankkar uske har khwab ko dekh sake ... wohi uska asli haqdaar hota hai
Trans: He who can peep into a woman's heart and read every dream of hers ... has the real right over that woman

Title: Deewane
Quote: Dar pe phir sawaali aaya hai ... woh kis se pyar karti hai, yahi sawaal laya hai?
Trans: The monger has come again at the doorstep ... with the question, who does she love?

Title: Charlie Kay Chakkar Mein
Quote: Ek sach ko jhooth banne ke liye ... ek jhooth ko sach banna padta hai
Trans: For a truth to turn into a lie ... a lie has to turn into a truth

Title: Charlie Kay Chakkar Mein
Quote: Joh namumkin hai agar usse hata diya jaye ... toh baaki joh bhi bachta hai, chahe kitna hi ajeeb kyun na ho ... sach ke aas paas hi hoga
Trans: If you eliminate the impossible ... then whatever is left, no matter how strange it is ... it has to be close to the truth

Title: Charlie Kay Chakkar Mein
Quote: Badi machli jaal mein na aaye ... is liye choti machli ko kaante mein phasna padta hai
Trans: So that the big fish doesn't get caught in the net ... that's why the small fish has to get caught in the hook

Title: Charlie Kay Chakkar Mein
Quote: Game khelne ke liye, game toh khelna hi padta hai
Trans: To play the game you have to play the game

Title: Padmashree Laloo Prasad Yadav
Quote: Tumhe dekhkar mera badan sizzler ki tarah hot ho jaata hai ... ice cream ki tarah pighalta hai ... boiled ande ki tarah ubalta hai
Trans: On seeing you my body becomes hot like a sizzler ... melts like an ice cream ... boils like a boiled egg

Title: Padmashree Laloo Prasad Yadav
Quote: Pehle bath phir saath ... hum aur tum din raat, din raat, din raat
Trans: First take a bath then we will be together ... you and me day and night, day and night, day and night

Title: Padmashree Laloo Prasad Yadav
Quote: Is tarah tumhara take care karoonga ... ki tum mujhe hamesha ke liye apna caretaker banaogi
Trans: I'll take care of you in such a way that ... you'll make me your caretaker forever

Title: Padmashree Laloo Prasad Yadav
Quote: Jinke apne bistar doosron ke ghar laga karte hai ... woh teesron ke ghar ki chaddar gina nahi karte
Trans: Those who sleep on beds in other people's house ... they don't count the bedsheets in a third person's house

Title: Rishtey
Quote: Yeh sach hai ki janam mujhe bhagwan ne diya ... lekin meri zindagi mere papa ne di hai ... I love you papa, I love you!
Trans: It's true that God gave me birth ... but my dad has given me my life ... I love you dad, I love you!

Title: Rishtey
Quote: Yeh aasoon mere dil ki zubaan hai ... mere vaaste na koi ghar hai, na makaan hai
Trans: These tears are the words of my heart ... for me there is no house and no mansion

Title: Rishtey
Quote: Ab yeh duniya, yeh mehfil mere kaam ki nahi ... Vaijanti ki jawani koi daam ki nahi
Trans: Now this world, this party is not for me ... Vaijanti's youth has no value

Title: Rishtey
Quote: Kanoon us andhe musafir ki tarah hai joh apna rasta ... sabooton aur gawahi ki baisakhiyon ke sahare tay karta hai
Trans: The law is like the blind traveller who travels his path ... using the support of crutches made by proofs and testimonies

Title: Shandar
Quote: Ek gareeb ki sabse badi daulat uski izzat hai ... aur woh izzat dekar bhi apna pyar, apne sapne kabhi nahi khareed sakta
Trans: The biggest wealth of a poor person is his respect ... and even if he gives away his respect, he still won't be able to buy his love, his dreams

Title: Shandar
Quote: Main akela hi chala tha apni manzil ki taraf ... log saath aate gaye aur karavan banta gaya ... khoon-e-dil se humne likhi gham ki yoon dastan ... zindagi ka shandar ek gulsitan banta gaya
Trans: I started alone towards my destination ... people joined and it started to become a caravan ... I wrote the story of sorrow with the blood of my heart ... and the spectacle of life turned into a garden

Title: Shandar
Quote: Har daulat ke peeche koi na koi jurm hota hai ... aur jab tak jurm nahi karta na koi lakhpati banta hai, na crorepati
Trans: There is a crime behind every piece of money ... and until a person commits a crime, he doesn't become a millionaire

Title: Shandar
Quote: Sona ho ya chandi, usse tolne ka tarazu lohe ya peetal hi ka hota hai ... is hi tarah duniya ki har cheez insaaniyat ke tarazu pe toli jaati hai
Trans: Be it gold or silver, the balance used to weigh them is made of iron or brass ... just like that everything in this world is weighed on the balance of humanity

Title: Guddu Ki Gun
Quote: Kyun ki aapne itni ladkiyon ke saath hai khela ... upar waale ne golden kar diya hai aapka kela
Trans: Since you have played around with so many girls ... that's why God has made your penis into sold gold

Title: Guddu Ki Gun
Quote: Sunehre aksharon mein jayegi aapki kahani rachi ... aur cheer dalenge hum tumhari jaan bachi kuchi
Trans: Your story will be written in golden words ... and I'll tear apart your remaining life

Title: Guddu Ki Gun
Quote: Jab shareer pe chot lagti hai na toh mooh se gaali nikalti hai ... par jab dil pe chot lagti hai na toh mooh se baddua nikalti hai
Trans: When your body gets hurt then only bad words come out from your mouth ... but when your heart gets hurt then a curse comes out from your mouth

Title: Guddu Ki Gun
Quote: Aate se hoga keval ghaata ... agar khaoge band gobi toh dukaan band hogi ... agar khaoge butter toh down hoga shutter ... pyaaz se badega byaaj aur sauce se hoga sirf loss ... issi liye khao keval daal aur kamao dher sara maal
Trans: With flour there will only be loss ... if you'll eat cabbage then you're shop will close down ... if you'll eat butter then you're shutter will come down ... with onion your interest will rise and with sauce you'll only bear loss ... that's why only eat lentils and earn a lot of money

Title: Bumper Draw
Quote: Yahan sadak par bheek mil jaati hai, chokri mil jaati hai ... naukri waukri nahi milti
Trans: Here on the road you'll get money if you beg, you'll also find a girl ... but you won't find a job

Title: Bumper Draw
Quote: Lakshmi darwaaze par hoti hai aur badnaseeb insaan mooh dhone gaya hota hai ... lekin yahan toh saala yeh hugne gaya tha
Trans: An unlucky person goes to wash his face when the goddess of wealth is on his door ... but here this rascal was gone to do potty

Title: Bumper Draw
Quote: Apne dukhon ka khadhhar road ab khatam hone jarela hai ... aur khushiyon ka flyover aane jarela hai
Trans: The broken road of our sadness is about to end ... and the flyover of our happiness is about to come

Title: Bumper Draw
Quote: Baba ki godh mein ghus ja tel laga ke ... bhootni ke chale aate hai taang uthake yahan pe
Trans: Apply oil and sit in Baba's lap ... crazy people come here lifting their leg up

Title: Kshatriya
Quote: Aurat ka dil toh itna vishal hota hai ... ki sari duniya ki khushi us mein samaa jaye
Trans: The heart of a woman is so big that ... all the happiness of the world can fit in it

Title: Kshatriya
Quote: Dosti bhulayi ja sakti hai ... dushmani nahi
Trans: Friendship can be forgotton ... but not enmity

Title: Kshatriya
Quote: Dushmani ki talvar ki dhaar ek taraf nahi hoti hai ... dono taraf hoti hai
Trans: The sword of enmity is not sharp only on one side ... it is sharp on both the sides

Title: Kshatriya
Quote: Insaan halaat ke bas mein hota hai ... halaat insaan ke bas mein nahi hote hai
Trans: A human is controlled by situations ... situations are not controlled by humans

Title: Saat Hindustani
Quote: Tiranga ek nishaani hai ... Hindustan ke ekta ki, Hindustan ke izzat ki aur Hindustan ke taqat ki
Trans: The tri-coloured flag is a sign of ... India's unity, India's respect and India's strength

Title: Saat Hindustani
Quote: Aandhi aaye ki toofan koi gham nahi ... hai yahi aakhri imtihaan saathiyon
Trans: Let a squall or a storm come along, there is no problem ... friends this is our last test

Title: Saat Hindustani
Quote: Aye meri sundar aankhon waali mehbooba ... apni lambi kaali zulfein mat bikhra ... kyun ki in mein hazaron kaale naag bandhe hai ... in zulfon ke jaal mein mujhko mat uljha
Trans: Hey my beautiful eyed beloved ... don't spread your long black hair ... because there are thousands of black snakes tied in it ... don't get me trapped in these hairs

Title: Heera Lal Panna Lal
Quote: Chaar kilo alu kha gaya bhalu ... tu bhi chalu aur main bhi chalu
Trans: The bear ate 4 kgs of potato ... you're also oversmart and I'm also oversmart

Title: Heera Lal Panna Lal
Quote: Agar tu sudhar gaya toh isse fighting ka the end samajhna ... varna yeh interval hai ... agli mulaqat mein climax kar doonga
Trans: If you are fixed then consider this as the end of fighting ... or else this will be the interval ... and in the next meeting I'll complete your climax

Title: Heera Lal Panna Lal
Quote: Aapko kahan kahan nahi dhoonda ... Japan ki jail mein, America ki rail mein, khatte meethe bhel mein, khopre ke tel mein ... samose mein dhoonda, alu mein dhoonda, pyaz mein dhoonda ... magar na mila baap ... mila ghaas mein chupa saanp
Trans: I looked for you everywhere ... in Japan's jail, in America's rail, in sweet and sour snacks, in coconut oil ... in a samosa, in potato, in onion ... but I couldn't find my father ... I only found a snake hidden in the grass

Title: Heera Lal Panna Lal
Quote: Share bazar mein lute huye vyapari ki tarah roiye ... club mein haare huye juari ki tarah roiye ... signal pe bheek maangte huye bikhari ki tarah roiye ... magar roiye, please roiye
Trans: Cry like a businessman who has lost in the stock market ... cry like a gambler who has lost in the club ... cry like a beggar who begs on a traffic light ... but cry, please cry

Title: Insaniyat Ke Devta
Quote: Har ek aashiq ke dil mein darr hai apna ... ki har mashooq ab dilbar hai apna ... hatheli par liye phirte hai sar hum ... haseeno ke dilon mein ghar hai apna
Trans: In every lover's heart there is my fear ... that every beauty is my beloved ... I roam around holding my head in my hands ... my home is in the hearts of the beauties

Title: Insaniyat Ke Devta
Quote: Is dharti par paapi pehda toh hote hai ... lekin un paapiyon ka anth karne waalon ko yeh dharti maa pehle hi janam de chuki hoti hai
Trans: Evil people are born on this earth ... but those who will kill the evil people ... this earth gives birth to them before

Title: Insaniyat Ke Devta
Quote: Jab khoon tapakta hai toh jamm jaata hai ... apna nishaan chhod jaata hai ... aur phir cheek cheekar pukarta hai ki mera inteqam lo, mera inteqam lo
Trans: When blood flows out then eventually it dries up ... and it leaves behind its marks ... and then it screams and shouts that take my revenge, take my revenge

Title: Insaniyat Ke Devta
Quote: Delhi jeetne se zyada mushkil hota hai kisi ka dil jeetna
Trans: It's more difficult to win over someone's heart rather than winning over Delhi (the government)

Title: Don No. 1
Quote: Shukar kar ki tu mehmaan hai is liye bach gaya ... nahi toh laat ghooson ki machine mein dalkar pees-peeskar tera keema bana deta
Trans: Be happy that you're a guest and hence I left you alone ... or else I would have put you into a machine of kicks and punches and would have crushed you into shredded meat

Title: Don No. 1
Quote: Surya aag ka gola hai, dahekta hua shola hai ... usse chuhoge toh jal jaoge, raakh banke bikhar jaoge ... hai woh gareebon ka maseeha, karta hai zaalimon ka khaatma ... usse pyara hai watan, kehlata hai Don No. 1
Trans: Surya is a ball of fire, he is a burning ember ... you'll burn if you touch him, you'll turn into ash and scatter ... he is a divine angel for the poor, he puts an end to cruel people ... he loves his country, and he is called Don No. 1

Title: Don No. 1
Quote: Duniya mein toh sabhi log ladte hai ... lekin jeet us hi ki hoti hai jinke paas akal hoti hai
Trans: Everyone in the world fights ... but only those people win who have a brain

Title: Don No. 1

Trans: I'm an atom bomb for a bomb ... I hit more and I scare less

Title: Hate Story 3

Title: Hate Story 3

Trans: Don't do this mistake again ... or else the next time you won't even get an opportunity to repent for it

Trans: You're ready to lose your life but you won't let the intercourse happen

Title: Kudiyon Ka Hai Zamaana
Quote: Pyar kabhi kabhi aadat ban jaata hai ... lekin tum sirf ek aadat nahi ab meri zaroorat ban chuke ho
Trans: Love sometimes can turn into a habit ... but you're not only a habit, you've become my necessity

Title: Kudiyon Ka Hai Zamaana
Quote: Romance time dekh karke todhi na aata hai ... romance bhi divorce ki tarah ho jaata hai bas
Trans: Romance doesn't happen looking at the time ... romance also happens by itself, just like divorce

Title: Kudiyon Ka Hai Zamaana

Trans: We don't meet people just like that ... we only meet those people whom we are supposed to meet

Title: Khoya Khoya Chand

Trans: It's easy to be ahead of your time ... but it's very hard to bear it

Trans: No one cheats anyone ... only the situations cause them

Trans: In life someone can only find us ... only when we want that to happen

Title: Aaghaaz

Trans: Don't come in between me and my love ... or else I'll bury you in Juhu beach

Title: Aaghaaz
Quote: Main tere saath lagane ko tayaar hoon saat chakkar ... kyun ki mera dil bechain hai tere dil se lene ko takkar
Trans: I'm ready to take seven rounds with you (around the holy fire) ... because my heart is restless to clash with your heart

Title: Aaghaaz
Quote: Na main hoon nikamma, na tu hai nikammi ... shaadi karke hum dono banenge daddy aur mummy
Trans: Neither I'm useless, nor are you useless ... we will get married and become daddy and mummy

Title: Aaghaaz
Quote: Vapas karde mera meter mujhko ... nahi toh ek jhappad mein bhej doonga Punjab tujhko
Trans: Return my meter to me ... or else I'll send you to Punjab with one tight slap

Title: Love Marriage
Quote: Joh insaan kamzori ka shikaar hoke gir jaye ... woh insaan, insaan nahi rehta
Trans: A person who becomes a prey of weakness and falls ... that person is not a person

Title: Love Marriage
Quote: Khoob parda hai ke chilman se lage baithe hai ... saaf chupte bhi nahi, samne aate bhi nahi
Trans: There is a lot hidden when you're sitting next to the curtain ... neither do you hide completely, nor are you visible clearly

Title: Qaid Mein Hai Bulbul
Quote: Mann ke haare haar hai ... aur mann ke jeete jeet
Trans: You lose when your heart loses ... and you win when your heart wins

Title: Qaid Mein Hai Bulbul
Quote: Isse main hazar tarah se, hazar baar, hazar maut maaroonga
Trans: I'll give him a thousand deaths, in thousand ways, and thousand times

Title: Qaid Mein Hai Bulbul
Quote: Jab koi bulbul qaid ho jaati hai ... toh uski tadap usse aur bhi khoobsurat bana deti hai
Trans: When a beautiful girl is captured ... then her wriggling makes her more beautiful

Title: Mahaveera
Quote: Farz ki ibaadat aur usool ke maqaam par pahunchne ke liye ... bahut kuch peeche chhod dena padta hai ... taki farz ke raaste mein koi jazba rukavat na pehda kar sake
Trans: To achieve the devotion for duty and the peak of principles ... you have to leave behind a lot ... so that no emotion can come in the way of duty

Title: Mahaveera
Quote: Bahut kam baha khoon zameeno ki khatir ... katte sar hazaron haseeno ki khatir
Trans: Very less blood has been shed for earth ... but thousands of heads have been chopped for beautiful women

Title: Mahaveera
Quote: Main tujhe apne nange haathon se maaronga aur woh anjaam doonga ... ki marne se pehle tera dil phat jayega ... aankhen pathrane se pehle bahar nikal aayengi ... cheekte cheekte tere halak ki awaaz sookh jayegi
Trans: I'll kill you with my naked hands and I'll make such a condition of yours that ... your heart will blast before you die ... your eyes will pop out before they close ... and the voice from your throat will dry up as you shout

Title: Mahaveera
Quote: Kisi ka maara hua shikaar khana mera usool nahi ... aur maal ko baantkar lena mera pesha nahi
Trans: It's not my principle to take someone else's dead prey ... and it's not my business to divide and take the bounty

Title: Qatil

Trans: A player who aims for two targets with one arrow ... sometimes he himself becomes the prey of his own arrow

Title: Qatil
Quote: Talvar jab tootti hai toh aadmi ki jaan bach jaati hai ... lekin kalam ki nok jab tootti hai toh aadmi ki jaan chali jaati hai
Trans: When a sword breaks then a person's life is saved ... but when the tip of a pen breaks then a person loses his life

Title: Qatil
Quote: Bada pyara hai pyare yeh ladki ka chakkar ... nahi mili toh shayar, mil gayi toh shohar
Trans: Running behind a girl is a lovely thing ... you become a poet if you don't achieve her, or you become a husband if you achieve her

Title: Qatil

Trans: You can claim possession on a dead body after death ... but not on their heart

Trans: You're still small, and not a brave person ... you're a gutter of Mumbai, and not the sea

Title: Namak
Quote: Tum mujhe bahut achchi lagti ho ... jab samne rehti ho toh dil karta hai ki tumhe dekhta rahoon ... aur jab door rehti ho toh mann chahta hai ki tumhare bare mein sochta rahoon
Trans: I like you a lot ... when you're near me then I only want to see you ... and when you're away from me then my heart only wants to think about you

Title: Namak
Quote: Chakke mile the tumko, sikandar nahi mila ... ab tak gutter mile the tumko, samundar nahi mila
Trans: You only came across eunuch's and not a brave person ... until now you only came across gutters and not the sea

Trans: Punjab, Sind, Gujarat, Maharashtra ... be it Bengal or Hyderabad ... we belong to India ... and India is ours

Title: Tumse Achha Kaun Hai
Quote: Ladki khandan ki ek band mutthi hai ... jab tak yeh mutthi band hai sharafat, sharafat hai ... jis din yeh mutthi khul gayi ... ek shareef ladki aur ek bazaari aurat mein koi farak nahi
Trans: A woman is like a closed fist of a family ... as long as the fist is closed till then decency is decency ... the day the fist opens up ... that day there will be no difference between a decent girl and a prostitute

Title: Tumse Achha Kaun Hai

Trans: Living for yourself is only life ... but living for others is not just life ... infact it's worship, it's devotion

Title: Tumse Achha Kaun Hai

Trans: You can remove jewellery and wear it again ... but the respect of the house is that jewellery which can't be worn again once it has been removed

Title: Mahaadev
Quote: In sarmayedaron ne kanoon ki haisiyat us andhe bikhari ki tarah bana di hai ... jisse apna pet bharne ke liye saboot ki rotiyan chahiye ... phir kyun na woh paap ke aate se bani ho aur gunaah ki bhatti mein pakki ho
Trans: These capitalists have turned the status of the law as that of a blind man ... who needs the bread of evidence to fill his stomach ... even if it is made from the dough of sins and cooked in the oven of crime

Trans: I'll punish you for this devilish act in such a way that ... even vultures and crows will not tear apart your dead body

Trans: You guys all together might not have drunk so much mother's milk ... as much as there is blood on this shirt ... now since there is no mother's milk left in your blood ... that's why I've come to teach you guys a lesson

Quote: Woh log jinke kandhon par insaaf aur kanoon ki imaaratein khadi hai ... unke apne hi pair paap ke dal-dal mein dhasse hue hai
Trans: The people on whose shoulders the buildings of law and justice are standing ... their own feet are stuck in the bog of sins

Quote: Bharatiya naari ke jeevan mein talaak ya divorce nahi hota ... usse toh apne pati se sirf maut hi alag kar sakti hai ... divorce nahi
Trans: There is no divorce in the life of an Indian woman ... only death can separate her from her husband ... and not divorce

Quote: Haara hua pyar ghar-baar nahi bassa sakta ... aur bassa bhi le toh chala nahi pata

Trans: A bride should be one who is loved by her groom ... and one who brings dowry with her

Quote: Jisne pyar na kiya ... woh jiya toh kya jiya ... aaj khule aam kehte hai ... rab se pyara hai piya ... yaar ke baahon mein jiye ... aur yaar ke kandhon pe mare ... yaar se yaari nibhayein ... dil se dildaari karen
Trans: The one who hasn't be in love ... their life is not a life ... today I'm saying this openly ... my beloved is more precious to me than God ... I'll live in the arms of my beloved ... and I'll die on the shoulders of my beloved ... I'll fullfil my friendship with my friend ... and I'll love with my heart

Trans: We will have to set an example ... in which the grief of one person turns into the grief of the entire city ... if a neighbour gets injured then the pain is felt by the entire neighbourhood ... and may that neighbourhood be the entire country of India
