Trans: What kind of era is this ... everyone is a stranger ... there is a curtain on every eye ... there is a lock on every lip ... but in this era there might be someone who is the messenger of God ... he won't be selfish, he won't be  unsympathetic ... he will raise his voice against injustice ... that person is somewhere here, that person is somewhere here

Title: Zubeidaa

Trans: It was my face and his eyes ... his conversations even in the silence ... writing a poem on my face ... were his eyes reciting a verse

Trans: Younger people should not smoke a cigarette in front of their elders ... and strong people should not do injustice on the weak ... hence if someone smokes a cigarette then blow it off ... and if someone does injustice then simply erase them

Trans: A person's heart and death cannot be trusted ... when, on who, and at what time they come ... you can't say that

Trans: Lord Brahma has written the destiny of every person that comes in this world ... happiness and sadness are important parts of it ... and those who understand that and live, know the real definition of life

Trans: Whenever a big change comes in life, then a person's behaviour becomes just like this ... where he reaches an unknown junction ... and from there he keeps looking back towards the old paths

Trans: When I close my eyes keeping your face in my mind ... then I'm scared to open them ... since you can disappear

Trans: I give education to the poor children ... inspiration to widowed mothers ... and masturbation to unmarried men

Title: Prem Patra

Trans: I'm not scared of the darkness from the eyes ... I'm scared from the darkness within the heart

Trans: In reality we are all skeletons and bones from inside ... the only difference is that on some people there is a smooth and slippery coating like that of butter ... and on some people there is a thick skin coating like that of a rhinoceros

Trans: What should I say about the softness of your lips ... it is like a petal of a rose flower

Trans: I run away from girls who cry ... but when you cry then I want to just kiss you

Trans: People don't live together since they forget about the past ... people live together since they forgive about the past

Trans: I love you to the square of infinity

Trans: To stop her tears, I can kill someone ... and I can even die also

Trans: How many days we live is not important ... what's important is how much we live in those days

Trans: Sometimes in one moment we get the love that we need for our entire life ... and sometimes even after searching for your entire life, you don't get love even for a moment

Trans: We are born multiple times ... sometimes as husband and wife, sometimes as lovers, and sometimes as strangers ... but in the end we definitely meet ... because the story won't end if we don't meet ... this is what is called as love

Trans: I've lost you so many times that now I'm even scared to close my eyes

Title: Jai Gangaajal

Trans: Today the society respects those who break the law ... but I respect those, who break the people who break the law

Trans: I have so many solid files of your crimes ... that I'll get you hanged at least 7 times along with 113 years of jail

Trans: When the colour of the police uniform is right ... then it doesn't matter if a man or a woman wears it ... it's more than enough to bring down impotent people like you in a snap

Title: Jai Gangaajal

Trans: To wash mud away you need clean water ... and not dirty water

Trans: You need stablility and sensibility to kill your enemy ... not vigour and insanity

Title: Cheetah
Quote: Insaan ko zindagi mein sab kuch mil toh nahi jaata ... tamannayein toh bahut hoti hai lekin sabhi poori nahi hoti ... fark sirf itna hai ki kuch log aansoon bahakar jeete hai aur kuch log apne dil ka dard chupakar jeete hai
Trans: A person doesn't get everything in life ... there are a lot of desires and not all of them get fulfilled ... the only difference is that some people live shedding tears and some people live hiding the pain in their heart

Title: Cheetah
Quote: Balle O balle ... mujrimon ki anjar panjar dhille ... mooh peele te kapde geele
Trans: Dance with joy ... the body parts of criminals are loose ... their face is yellow and their clothes are wet

Title: Cheetah
Quote: Duniya mein insaan sirf apne liye pehda nahi hua hai ... doosron ke liye jeekar dekho ... zindagi ka matlab samajh jaogi
Trans: Humans are not just born for themselves ... try to live for others and see ... you'll understand the meaning of life

Title: Chacha Chowdhary
Quote: Insaan aksar bewafa hote hai ... lekin kudrat bewafa nahi hoti
Trans: Humans often are unfaithful ... but nature is never unfaithful

Title: Chacha Chowdhary
Quote: Har insaan bhool karta hai ... aur joh bhool nahi karta uska naam hai bhagwan
Trans: Every person makes a mistake ... and the one who doesn't do a mistake, his name is God

Title: Pyaasa (1957)
Quote: Jab hum chale toh saaya bhi apna na saath de ... jab tum chalo zameen chale, aasmaan chale ... jab hum ruke toh saath ruke shaam-e-bekasi ... jab tum ruko bahaar ruke, chandni ruke
Trans: When I walk, then even my shadow doesn't accompany me ... when you walk, the earth and the skies stroll with you ... when I stop, then the evening of helplessness stops with me ... when you stop, both spring and moonlight stop with you

Title: Pyaasa (1957)
Quote: Zindagi ki asli khushi doosron ko khush rakhke haasil ki jaati hai
Trans: The real happiness of life is achieved by making others happy

Title: Pyaasa (1957)
Quote: Gham is kadar badhe ke main ghabra ke pee gaya ... is dil ki bebasi pe taras khake pee gaya ... thukra raha tha mujhko badhi der se jahaan ... main aaj sab jahaan ko thukra ke pee gaya
Trans: I drank since my sadness increased ... I drank feeling pity for the helplessness of this heart ... the world was ignoring me since a long time ... today I drank ignoring the whole world

Title: Pyaasa (1957)
Quote: Tang aa chuke hai kashmakash-e-zindagi se hum ... thukra dein jahaan ko kahin bedili se hum ... hum ghamzada hai laaye kahan se khushi ke geet ... denge wohi joh paayenge is zindagi se hum ... ubhrenge ek baar abhi dil ke valvale ... maana ke dab gaye hai gham-e-zindagi se hum ... lo aaj humne todh diya rishta-e-umeed ... lo ab kabhi gilaa na karenge kisi se hum
Trans: I'm tired of the dilemma in life ... I'll ignore the world with dissatisfaction ... I'm full off sorrows, from where should I get the songs of happiness ... I'll give what I get from this life ... the spirit of the heart will rise for once ... I agree that I'm supressed by the sadness in my life ... today I've broken the relationship of hope ... hence now I won't complain to anyone

Title: Mastizaade
Quote: Kabhi aapko waqt mile toh mere ghar aao na ... main aapko chawal doonga phir daal doonga ... dal maa ke haath ki dal
Trans: If you get time then please come to my house ... I'll give you rice and then I'll insert it ... I mean lentil cooked by my mom

Title: Mastizaade
Quote: Phikar mat ki jiye ... aapko shikayat ka mauka nahi doonga
Trans: Don't worry ... I won't give you a reason to complain

Title: Mastizaade
Quote: Jise duniya kehti hai haramzaada ... jise pyar se ladkiyan kehti hai aur zyada ... wohi hota hai asli mastizaada
Trans: Whom the world calls as a rascal ... whom the girls with love say a little more ... he's the person who has the real fun

Title: Mastizaade
Quote: Sikka hila toh pass!
Trans: You pass if the coin moves!

Title: Jagte Raho
Quote: Kangi ko narangi kahein ... bane dhoodh ko khoya ... chalti ko gaadi kahein ... dekh Kabira roya
Trans: He calls the comb as an orange ... boiled milk as thickened milk ... he calls anything moving as a car ... look Kabira is crying

Title: Jagte Raho
Quote: Vishvas, dharam, sanskar ke mamle hi badhe nazuk hote hai ... insaan ki bhavnaon se khelna koi mazaak nahi hai
Trans: The matters of trust, religion, and values are very delicate ... it's not funny to play with the emotions of humans

Title: Kaal Chakra
Quote: Phool murjhane se bhi kaante nahi ho jaate ... us hi tarah sach ke haar jaane se woh jhooth nahi ban jaate
Trans: When flowers wither then they don't turn into thorns ... just like that when the truth loses then it doesn't turn into lies

Title: Kaal Chakra
Quote: Thane aur aspataal na koi apne marzi se jaata hai ... na apne marzi se aata hai
Trans: No one goes to a police station and hospital at their own will ... and neither do they come back from there at their own will

Title: Kaal Chakra
Quote: Neta logon ki aadat hi hai ... jab soote hai toh soote rehte hai ... aur jab jagenge toh cheenkhne chilaane lagte hai
Trans: Politicians have this habit ... when they sleep then they sleep for a long time ... and when they wake up they start to scream and shout

Title: Kaal Chakra
Quote: Ek murde ko kafan pehnane mein jitna time lagta hai na ... usse bhi kam time mein main tera vardi utaar sakta hai
Trans: The amount of time it takes to put a shroud on a dead body ... in less time than that I can get your police uniform stripped from your body

Title: Airlift
Quote: Saath hai toh kuch hai ... varna nothing
Trans: We are something if we are together ... or else we are nothing

Title: Airlift
Quote: Aadmi ki fitrat hi aaisi hai ... chhot lagti hai na toh aadmi maa maa hi chilata hai sabse pehle
Trans: It's in the nature of humans ... that when they get hurt then they first call out for their mother

Title: Airlift
Quote: Galati pe tokna bahut aasaan hai ... par galati karne ki himmat rakhna bahut mushkil
Trans: It's very easy to taunt on a mistake ... but it's very hard to have the courage of committing a mistake

Title: Fitoor
Quote: Qayamat bhi kya cheez hai ... na dastak, na aaghaaz ... jab mann kiya sar uthake aa jaati hai aur sab jalakar raakh kar deti hai
Trans: Disaster is also such a strange thing ... without any news or notification of coming ... it comes straight at us and burns everything to ashes

Title: Fitoor
Quote: Ek bas seene mein dil chahiye ... aap poori kaiyanaat se ladh padoge
Trans: All you need is a heart in your body ... and you'll be ready to fight the entire universe with it

Title: Fitoor
Quote: Khuda ki barkat hai mohabbat ... mohabbat karo toh toot ke, bina khauf ke, bina sharm ke, bina soch ke ... agar jeet gaye toh kya kehna ... haare bhi toh baazi maat nahi
Trans: Love is God's blessing ... if you love then do it to the fullest, without fear, without feeling shy, without thinking ... if you win then nothing like it ... and even if you lose, then still the battle is not lost

Title: Fitoor
Quote: Khud se azaadi toh sirf maut hi de sakti hai ... ya phir ishq
Trans: Only death can free you from yourself ... or else love

Title: Amar Deep
Quote: Pyar toh na bikne ki cheez hai, na khareedne ki cheez hai ... pyar toh sirf karne ki cheez hai
Trans: Love is not something that can be sold or bought ... love is something that can only be done

Title: Amar Deep
Quote: Aadmi apni buraiyon ke liye doosron ko dosh deta hai ... par sach toh yeh hai ... ki aadmi ke bheetar chupi apni hi koi kamzori hoti hai jiske kaaran woh bura banta hai
Trans: A person blaims someone else for his evil doings ... but the reality is that ... there is some weakness hidden inside that person which makes him do the evil things

Title: Amar Deep
Quote: Kisi kisi dukh ke peeche ek bada sukh chupa hota hai
Trans: Behind some sorrows there is a big happiness hidden

Title: Amar Deep
Quote: Duniya ek bahut badi mandi hai, bazar hai ... jahan pe har cheez ka bhaav hai, mol hai ... jahan pe har cheez ek bikau maal hai
Trans: The world is a big market ... where everything has a price, a value ... where everything is for sale

Title: Kaagaz Ke Phool
Quote: Insaan har cheez se door bhaag sakta hai ... lekin apni kismat se nahi
Trans: A person can run away from everything ... but not from his destiny

Title: Kaagaz Ke Phool
Quote: Ulte seedhe daanv lagaye ... hans hans phenka paasa ... arre bhagya ki chaal bhi dekh deewane ... kaisa tujhko phaansa
Trans: By placing all the weird bets ... you changed the game laughingly ... but look at the plot of destiny ... as to how it trapped you

Title: Kaagaz Ke Phool
Quote: Filmy duniya mein insaan ek baar gira ... toh girta hi jaata hai
Trans: In the world of cinema once a person falls ... then he keeps on falling

Title: Kaagaz Ke Phool
Quote: Film line ki yahi reet hai ... naam aur shohrat milte bhale hi der lag jaaye ... naam aur nishaan mitate der nahi lagti
Trans: The line of cinema has this quality ... it may well take time to build your name and wealth ... but it doesn't take time to destroy your name and identity

Title: Love Shagun
Quote: Shaadi ke liye har koi kabhi na kabhi gyaan ka shagun deta hai ... par gyaan ke shagun se zyada zaroori hota hai love ka shagun
Trans: Everyone gives auspicious knowledge about marriage at some time or the other ... but more important than auspicious knowledge is auspicious love

Title: Love Shagun
Quote: Aapki yeh-ich baat ne na mere dil ko touch kiya hai ... ki aapne mereko touch nahi kiya karke
Trans: This quality of yours has touched my heart ... that you didn't touch me

Title: Love Shagun
Quote: Woh toh Hitler ki amma nikli
Trans: She turned out to be Hitler's mom

Title: Love Shagun
Quote: Abbe guchcha toot raha hai ladkiyon ka tere pe ... guchcha
Trans: A bunch of girls are falling for you ... a bunch of them

Title: Bollywood Diaries
Quote: Manzil toh mil hi jayegi, bhatakkar hi sahi ... gumrah toh woh hai joh ghar se nikle hi nahi
Trans: I'll get to my destination, even if I get strayed ... but lost are those people, who don't even leave their house

Title: Bollywood Diaries
Quote: Agar zindagi mein kuch karna hai na toh kar lena ... sahi samay ka intezar mat karna ... kyun ki kahi baar woh sahi samay aata hi nahi hai
Trans: If you want to do something in life then just do it ... don't wait for the right time ... because many a times that right moment never comes

Title: Bollywood Diaries
Quote: Koi farak nahi padta, chamdi gori ho ya kali ... bas chamdi mein talent hona chahiye
Trans: It doesn't matter if the skin is fair or dark ... there must be talent behind the skin

Title: Bollywood Diaries
Quote: Agar Bollywood cinema nahi hota toh shayad main nahi hota
Trans: Had there not been Bollywood cinema, then I wouldn't have been there

Title: Red: The Dark Side
Quote: I'm ready to die in love, I'm ready to kill in love ... but I'm not ready to be a fool in love
Trans: I'm ready to die in love, I'm ready to kill in love ... but I'm not ready to be a fool in love

Title: Red: The Dark Side
Quote: Aage ka raasta dhoondne ke liye kabhi kabhi ... chaar kadam peeche jaana padta hai
Trans: Sometimes to find the path ahead ... you have to take four steps back

Title: Red: The Dark Side
Quote: You've not only given me a life ... but also become my reason to live
Trans: You've not only given me a life ... but also become my reason to live

Title: Red: The Dark Side
Quote: Duniya ke saare jhagadon ki teen hi wajah hoti hai ... zarr, zurro aur zameen
Trans: There are only three reasons for all the fights that happen in the world ... wealth, wife and property

Title: Yatra
Quote: Yakeen aaye na aaye tumko lekin yeh haqeeqat hai ... mile ho jabse tum mujhko yeh duniya khoobsurat hai
Trans: Whether you believe it or not, it's the reality ... since I've met you, this world looks beautiful to me

Title: Yatra
Quote: Yaadein anth mein kiska haath pakadkar jaati hai maloom? ... maut ka
Trans: Do you know in the end, memories leave holding whose hand? ... the hand of death

Title: Yatra
Quote: Kisi bhi kahani mein ya upanyas mein ... apni zindagi ka anubhav aur tajurbe ka reflection dikhta zaroor hai
Trans: In any story or novel ... you definitely see the experience of your life and the reflection of your experience

Title: Yatra
Quote: Paisa, paisa ... sote ko jagaye paisa, rote ko hasaye paisa, kanoon banaye paisa, dharam ko nachaye paisa, barood bichaye paisa, sheharon ko jalaye paisa
Trans: Money, money ... money wakes up the one sleeping, money brings a smile to the one crying, money creates the law, money makes faith to dance, money spreads gunpowder, money burns the cities

Title: Jaanwar
Quote: Itne barson ke baad aaj tu mujhe mila ... khush hone ke bajaye seedhe aag ughalne laga
Trans: You've met me after so many years ... and instead of being happy, you're directly throwing flames

Title: Jaanwar
Quote: Hum gareebon ke paas ek hi chaddar hoti hai ... joh aankh khuli rehne tak oodhi jaati hai ... aankh bandh ho jaane ke baad us hi ka kafan bana diya jaata hai
Trans: We poor people only have one blanket ... which is used to cover as long as the eyes are open ... and when the eyes get closed then the same is turned into a shroud

Title: Jaanwar
Quote: Gareebi se bada is duniya mein koi shraap nahi hai ... aur bhook se bada koi dukh nahi
Trans: There is no bigger curse than poverty in this world ... and no bigger sorrow than hunger

Title: Jaanwar
Quote: Jurm ki duniya mein aane ke anginat raaste hai ... lekin yahan se bahar jaane ka koi raasta nahi hai
Trans: There are countless ways to enter into the world of crime ... but there is not a single way to leave it

Title: Samraat
Quote: Kal mila waqt toh zulfein teri suljha doonga ... aaj uljha hoon halaat ke suljhane mein
Trans: Tomorrow if I get time then I'll make your hair ... today I'm busy in fixing the situation

Title: Samraat
Quote: Meri jaan tujhe mere haathon marna hai ... usko yaad karle jisse yaad karna hai
Trans: You have to die from my hands ... so remember whomever you want to remember

Title: Samraat
Quote: Do mithiyan galaan kar kudiye haske sadde naal ... arre saath khade hum dono lagte hai Sohni Mahiwal
Trans: Talk with me smilingly for a short while ... we both standing together look like great lovers

Title: Samraat
Quote: Us rakshas ki di hui maut tumhari di hui zindagi se kahi behtar hogi ... woh ek baar ki maut hogi ... lekin tumhari di hui zindagi ke har pal main ek maut marta raha hoon
Trans: Death by that devil will be better than the life that you've given me ... that death will come to me at once ... but in the life that you've given me, I die every moment

Title: Nirdosh (1973)
Quote: Sari duniya bhi joh thukraye toh kya hota hai ... jiska koi nahi hota uska khuda hota hai
Trans: So what if the whole world rejects you ... the one who has no one by his side, has God

Title: Nirdosh (1973)
Quote: Aurat ko apni jaan se zyada apni aabru azeez hoti hai ... aur apni pavitrata ki raksha ke liye aurat jaan de sakti hai aur jaan le sakti hai
Trans: For a woman her honour is more important to her than her life ... and for the protection of her sanctity, a woman can give her life and she can also take one

Title: Nirdosh (1973)
Quote: Pyar ki maar bahut buri maar hoti hai ... aadmi jeete jee mar jaata hai
Trans: The wound of love is very bad ... a person dies even if he his living

Title: Nirdosh (1973)
Quote: Mitt gaye jiske liye naam tak uska na liya ... kaash is baat ki usko bhi khabar ho jaati
Trans: I didn't even take the name of the one whom I can die for ... I wish she knew about this

Title: Teraa Surroor
Quote: Har insaan ne kabhi na kabhi, kisi na kisi se pyar kiya hai ... us hi pyar ke naam zindagi kurbaan
Trans: Every person at some point has loved someone ... I'll sacrifice my life in the name of that love

Title: Teraa Surroor
Quote: Duniya mein koi aaisa taala nahi bana jiski chaabi bhi na bani ho
Trans: There is no lock made in this world which doesn't have a key to it

Title: Teraa Surroor
Quote: Joh insaan apni zid ko iraade mein badal de ... us insaan ko apni manzil tak pahunchne se koi nahi rok sakta
Trans: A person that transforms his stubbornness into his intention ... no one can stop that person from reaching his destination

Title: Teraa Surroor
Quote: Osama ko pakadne ke liye mulk, mazhab, maal aur military lag jaati hai ... ask the neighbouring country ... magar ek General Dyer ko maarne ke liye sirf ek Hindustani jigra aur yeh desi tamancha hi kaafi hai ... ask the world
Trans: A country, religion, money and military was needed to catch Osama ... ask the neighbouring country ... but to kill General Dyer, you only need the courage of a single Indian and a locally made gun ... ask the world

Title: Direct Ishq
Quote: Dilwale dulhania la rahe hai ... panditain hum aa rahe hai
Trans: The lovers are bringing the bride ... hey religious girl, I'm coming

Title: Direct Ishq
Quote: Mohabbat ki mandi mein risk hi risk ... toh bhaiya kar liya humne bhi direct ishq
Trans: In the market of love there is a lot of risk ... so brother, even I went for direct love

Title: Direct Ishq
Quote: Tum saala viagra khane waalon ka yehi problem hai ... shak bahut karte ho
Trans: You people who take viagra have this problem ... that you suspect a lot

Title: Direct Ishq
Quote: Jab woh maan gaye gulfaam ... tab subah ho ya shaam ... pyar hi pyar hai apna kaam
Trans: Now that my florid beloved has agreed ... then be it morning or evening ... only being in love is my job

Title: Gautam Govinda
Quote: Dushman jab humdard bankar aaye toh unki baaton se sachai nahi ... jhoot ki badbu aati hai
Trans: When an enemy comes forward as someone who wants to share your pain, then truth doesn't flow from their words ... instead the odour of lies flows from them

Title: Gautam Govinda
Quote: Husn pariyon se chamak chaand se laya hoga ... shabhnami phoolon se honthon ko sajaya hoga ... zulf bhikre toh ghattaon ko paseena aaye ... badi fursat se tujhe rab ne banaya hoga
Trans: He must have brought a beautiful body from fairies and fairness from the moon ... he must have decorated these lips with moist flowers ... if you open your hair then the clouds sweat ... God must have created you with a lot of his time

Title: Gautam Govinda
Quote: Jise jurm ka ehsaas ho jaye ... usse sazaa nahi, maafi milni chahiye
Trans: The one who repents for his crime ... he should be forgiven, and not punished

Title: Gautam Govinda
Quote: Husn ki taazgi pe ishq waale jaan diya karte hai ... mastiyan lootne se pehle yoon hi baat kiya karte hai ... roop ko chaand aur zulfon ko ghatta kehte hai ... karke tareef mazaa loot liya karte hai
Trans: People in love die for the freshness of a body ... they talk just like this before stealing all the fun ... they call appearance as the moon and hair as clouds ... they praise and steal all the fun

Title: Aaye Din Bahaar Ke
Quote: Teri tasveer mein tujhse bhi ek khoob nirali hai ... lipat lo jitna jee chahe, na gussa hai na gaali hai
Trans: Your photo has one good thing more than you ... you can embrace it how much ever you want, it doesn't get angry nor does it curse

Title: Aaye Din Bahaar Ke
Quote: Pyar ki raah mein na kadam rakhne se pehle socha jaata hai ... na kadam rakhne ke baad
Trans: You don't think before you step into the path of love ... and neither after you step in it

Title: Aaye Din Bahaar Ke
Quote: Sarkari sadak hai yeh tera ghar toh nahi hai ... hum kyun na kare ishq, tera darr toh nahi hai
Trans: It's the road of the government and not your house ... why shouldn't I fall in love, I'm not scared of you

Title: Aaye Din Bahaar Ke
Quote: Daulat kabiliyat nahi paida kar sakti ... magar kabiliyat daulat pehda kar sakti hai
Trans: Money can't give birth to capability ... but capability can give birth to money

Title: Rocky Handsome
Quote: Deadly, dangerous ya Rocky ... is naam se mujhe woh jaante hai joh mujhe janana nahi chahte hai ... baaki sab ke liye, I'm just handsome
Trans: Deadly, dangerous or Rocky ... people who don't want to know me, know me by these names ... for everyone else, I'm just handsome

Title: Rocky Handsome
Quote: Kal ki baat karne waala kal nahi marta ... kal ki baat karne waala aaj marta hai ... sirf aaj ka sochne waale ke haathon ... aur main sirf abhi ki sochta hoon
Trans: The one who talks about tomorrow, doesn't die tomorrow ... the one who talks about tomorrow, dies today ... only from the hands of the one who thinks about today ... and I only think about the present

Title: Rocky Handsome
Quote: Tujhse kitni badi galati hui hai woh tujhe teri sazaa batayegi
Trans: Your punishment will tell you how big a mistake have you done

Title: Albela
Quote: Is duniya ke andar apne pyar ka gala ghontana bahut mushkil hai ... magar joh aadmi apun ko pyar karta hai ... uska dil todna bahut paap hai
Trans: In this world it's very hard to squeeze the neck of your love ... but the one who loves us ... it's a very big sin to break their heart

Title: Albela
Quote: Kisi aaise aadmi ke saath din guzaro ... joh raatein tumhari yaad mein guzarta ho
Trans: Spend your days with a person ... who spends his nights in your memories

Title: Albela
Quote: Jab zindagi mein pehli baar koi kisi ko I love you bolta hai na ... kya lagta hai ... aaisa lagta hai ki ek bottle daru aang ke andar ghus gaya ho ... aur daru bhi aaisa jis mein mithaas bhi hai aur nasha bhi
Trans: When someone says I love you to someone for the first time ... then it feels so good ... it feels as if a bottle of alcohol has entered in the body ... and that kind of alcohol in which there is sweetness and intoxication as well

Title: Albela
Quote: Yeh aag hoti hi aaisi hai ... sab kuch jala deti hai ... fark bas itna hai ki kahin dikhai deti hai aur kahin nahi dikhai deti
Trans: Fire has this characteristic ... it burns everything ... the only difference is that somewhere it can be seen and somewhere it can't be seen

Title: Qaidi No. 911
Quote: Insaan ki zindagi tarazu ka ek palhada hai ... joh kabhi upar aur kabhi neeche
Trans: The life of a person is like the side of a beam balance ... which is sometimes up and sometimes down

Title: Qaidi No. 911
Quote: Mehnat se din raat padhoonga ... pehla number pass karoonga
Trans: I study hard day and night ... and I'll come first in the examination

Title: Qaidi No. 911
Quote: Baimaani ke chocolate se imaandari ki chane hazar gunah zyada achche hai
Trans: The nuts of honesty are thousand times better than the chocolate of cheating

Title: Qaidi No. 911
Quote: Jab main dushmani pe utar aata hoon ... toh insaan ko pataal mein bhi chain naseeb nahi hota
Trans: When I come down to enmity ... then a person doesn't even get space in the world below the earth

Title: Ki And Ka
Quote: Robo hai tu robo, corporate robo ... tere hardware mein koi soft feelings hi nahi hai
Trans: You're a robot, a corporate robot ... there are no soft feelings in your hardware

Title: Ki And Ka
Quote: Mera maqsad mehnat se bachna nahi ... meri mehnat faltu maqsad se bachke rehna hai
Trans: My goal is not to stay away from hard work ... I work hard to stay away from useless goals

Title: Ki And Ka
Quote: Tere spaghetti jaise ghane lambe baal ... olives jaisi kaali kaali, actually not so kaali kaali aankhen ... baby corn jaisi nukeeli naak ... cherry tomatoes jaise laal laal gaal ... sliced bell pepper se bane honth ... jalapeno si teekhi zubaan ... chalti phirti pasta dish ho
Trans: You have dense black hair like spaghetti ... black eyes like olives, actually not completely black ... sharp nose like baby corn ... red cheeks like cherry tomatoes ... lips made from sliced bell pepper ... spicy tongue like jalapeno ... you're a walking pasta dish

Title: Ki And Ka
Quote: Sugarfree biscuit jis mein sugar kam hai ... sugar waale biscuit se double mehenga ... slim milk jis mein doodh kam hai ... woh doodh waale milk se zyada mehenga hai ... kam khana zyada khane se expensive ho gaya hai
Trans: Sugarfree biscuits which have less sugar ... are double the price of the sugar biscuits ... slim milk which has less milk ... is more expensive than regular milk ... eating less has become more expensive than eating more

Title: Kapoor And Sons
Quote: Marne se pehle main chahta hoon ke mere pariwar ke saath ek family photo ho ... jiske neeche title hoga "Kapoor and Sons", since 1921
Trans: Before dying I wish to have a family photo with my family ... on the bottom of which it will be written "Kapoor and Sons", since 1921

Title: Fan
Quote: Pehle fan star ke peeche bhaagta tha ... ab star fan ke peeche bhaagega
Trans: First the fan was chasing the star ... and now the star will chase the fan

Title: Fan
Quote: Connection bhi na kamaal ki cheez hai ... bas ho gaya toh ho gaya ... Wi-Fi, bluetooth se bhi zyada strong hai apna connection
Trans: Connection is a very strange thing ... it just happens ... our connection is stronger than Wi-Fi and bluetooth

Title: Fan
Quote: Woh sirf star nahi hai ... duniya hai meri
Trans: He's not just a star ... he's my world

Title: Fan
Quote: Joh aapko pyar karta hai uska dil todna bhi crime hi hai
Trans: It's a crime to break the heart of the one who loves you

Title: Farz Aur Kanoon
Quote: (Kaun ho tum?) ... Zulm ke andhere mein kanoon ki roshni ko jalakar ... masoomon ko zindagi dekar ... zaalimon ko maut ki neend sulaane waala ... inspector Ranjit Kumar
Trans: (Who are you?) ... The one who starts the light of law in the darkness of injustice ... the one who gives life to the harmless ... and the one who gives the sleep of death to the evil people ... I'm inspector Ranjit Kumar

Title: Farz Aur Kanoon
Quote: Yeh rishtey toh pehda hone se pehle hi uparwaala muqadar ki kitaab mein likh deta hai ... us likhai ko badalna hamare bas ki baat nahi hai
Trans: God writes our relationships in the book of destiny even before we are born ... and it's not in our hands to change what's written in that

Title: Farz Aur Kanoon
Quote: Main daulat ke maidaan mein gareeb zaroor hoon ... lekin imaandari aur sharafat ke maindaan mein bahut zyada amir hoon
Trans: I may be poor on the grounds of money ... but on the grounds of honesty and righteousness, I'm very rich

Title: Farz Aur Kanoon
Quote: Dukh aur sukh ki tarah galatiyan bhi aadmi ke muqadar mein likhi hoti hai ... galatiyan karke joh pachtata hai wohi insaan kehlata hai
Trans: Like sadness and happiness, even mistakes are written in the destiny of a person ... and the one who repents after committing a mistake is called a human

Title: Global Baba
Quote: Baba matlab note jhapat ... dikha jannat ka shortcut
Trans: A religious saint means to jump on money ... by showing people the shortcut to heaven

Title: Global Baba
Quote: Police wale do hi mauke par muft ki daawat dete hai ... ek baar tab jab usse apni vardi utarne ka khatra ho ... aur doosri baar jab usse sarkar se medal milne ki umeed ho
Trans: A police officer gives a treat only under two circumstances ... one when he's concerned that he's going to loose his job ... and second when he has the hope of getting a medal from the government

Title: Global Baba
Quote: Desh do hi log chalate hai ... mahatma aur Gandhi ... mahatma woh jinke gunahon ka koi saboot na ho
Trans: Only two people run this country ... a holy person and Mahatma Gandhi (money) ... a person is called holy when there are no proofs to his crime

Title: Global Baba
Quote: Yeh Global Baba ka kal kya hoga pata nahi ... lekin aaj iska bal global hai
Trans: We don't know what will happen to Global Baba tomorrow ... but today his power is global

Title: Love Games
Quote: Roses are red, violets are blue ... sex can be dangerous, but love can be to
Trans: Roses are red, violets are blue ... sex can be dangerous, but love can be to

Title: Love Games
Quote: Mujhe sirf teen cheezein pasand hai ... winning, cocaine aur love games
Trans: I only like three things ... winning, cocaine and love games

Title: Love Games
Quote: Life is not worth living until you find someone or something to die for
Trans: Life is not worth living until you find someone or something to die for

Title: Love Games
Quote: Love woh bahana hai joh lust apna matlab poora karne ke liye use karti hai
Trans: Love is that excuse which lust uses to fulfill its needs

Title: Sarphira
Quote: Jab mujhpar koi haath uthata hai toh mera sar phir jaata hai ... aur jab mera sar phir jaata hai toh main saamne waale ki duniya phira deta hoon
Trans: When someone raises their hand on me then my mind spins ... and when my mind spins then I spin the world of the person who attacks me

Title: Sarphira
Quote: Maa ki mamta aulad ki zindagi ke liye amrit hai ... lekin jab woh mamta andhi ho jaye toh zehar ban jaati hai
Trans: A mother's love is a divine syrup for the life of her child ... but when that love becomes blind, then it turns into poison

Title: Sarphira
Quote: Jawaani ki pasand ko tajurba aur dil ki pasand ko dimaag agar tol le ... toh thokar nahi lagti
Trans: If experience balances the choice of youth and the mind balances the choice of the heart ... then you don't stumble

Title: Yaarana (1995)
Quote: Kab se tadap raha tha deedar ke liye ... aankhen taras gayi apne yaar ke liye
Trans: Since so long I've been waiting for your sight ... my eyes are yearning for my beloved

Title: Yaarana (1995)
Quote: Upar waale ne tere liye sirf teen manzilein banayi hai ... pehda hone se pehle teri maa ke pet mein ... marne ke baad chitta par ... aur jab tak tu zinda rahegi tu hamari banke rahegi
Trans: God has only made three stories for you ... first the womb of your mother before you were born ... then your pyre after you die ... and until you're alive you'll remain as mine

Title: Baaghi: A Rebel For Love
Quote: Agar tera mera koi connection hai, toh agli baar jab baarish hogi ... hum apne aap mil jayenge
Trans: If you and I have any connection, then the next time it rains ... we both will meet automatically

Title: Baaghi: A Rebel For Love
Quote: Maana mera tareeka galat tha ... par kya karoon, tumse bahut pyar karta hoon
Trans: I agree that my way was wrong ... but what can I do, I love you a lot

Title: Baaghi: A Rebel For Love
Quote: Itni jaldi kya hai ... abhi toh maine start kiya hai
Trans: What's the hurry ... I've just started now

Title: Baaghi: A Rebel For Love
Quote: Tu bahut aage jayega ... kyun ki tu jahan bhi jayega na ... log bolenge chal beta aage bhad
Trans: You will go very forward in life ... because wherever you'll go ... people will say that, come on move ahead and go away

Title: Bhagyawan
Quote: Mera farz is vardi ka mohtaj nahi hai ... yeh vardi toh mehaz ek mayaan hai jis mein main apne farz ki talwar mehfooz rakhta hoon
Trans: My duty is not dependent on my police uniform ... this uniform is just a scabbard in which I keep the sword of my duty secured

Title: Bhagyawan
Quote: Pati ek bank balance hota hai, ek tijori hota hai ... jis mein se paise nikaal nikaalkar gehne banwao, sareeyan khareedo, mauj karo mauj ... lekin unka dil rakhne ke liye kabhi unka sar dabao, kabhi unke pair dabao ... haala ki dil toh karta hai ki unka gala dabao, taaki jhanjhat hi khatam
Trans: A husband is like a bank balance, like a vault ... from which you remove money and make jewellery, buys sarees, and have fun ... but to keep their heart sometimes we have to massage their head, their legs ... when we wish that we could simply press their neck, so that the problem is over once and for all

Title: Bhagyawan
Quote: Jis din kisi ghar ki deewaron ke kaan nikal aate hai ... us din us ghar ki buniyaad mein dimak lag jaati hai
Trans: The day the walls of a house get their ears out ... that day termites enter the foundation of that house

Title: Bhagyawan
Quote: Shaadi karne ka sirf ek hi faiyda hai ... ki agar aadmi markar narak mein bhi jaaye ... toh lagta hai swarg mein aa gaya
Trans: There is only one advantage of getting married ... that even if a person goes to hell after dying ... then it feels like heaven

Title: Agnichakra
Quote: Zindagi mein jitne chahe dushman bana lena ... magar kabhi kisi ko apna dost nahi banana ... kyun ki dost ek aisa naag hai jis logon ko peekar jeeta hai ... ek din apna saara zehar us hi logon mein bhar deta hai
Trans: Make as many enemies as you want in your life ... but don't make anyone as your friend ... because a friend is a snake ... who puts all his poison in the person who helps him to live

Title: Agnichakra
Quote: Joh aadmi time ko salute nahi karta ... uska life maut se bhi dangerous hota
Trans: The one who doesn't salute time ... their life becomes more dangerous than death

Title: Dil Hi To Hai
Quote: Tune ek kadam bhi aage badhaya toh talwarein chal jayengi ... aur tere is saathi ki choti choti botiyan banke hawa mein bikhar jayengi
Trans: Even if you move one step forward then the swords will be used ... and your partner will be cut into pieces and he'll be scattered in the air

Title: Dil Hi To Hai
Quote: Kya cheez hai yeh aansun bhi ... aaisa lagta hai jaise barson ka bhukhaar joh mann mein bhara hua tha ... in do qatre aansuyon mein behke nikal gaya
Trans: Tears are such a strange thing ... it feels that the fever that was accumulated for years in this heart ... that has flown out with these two tears

Title: Dil Hi To Hai
Quote: If you want to be what you want to be ... be what you want to be ... and to be what you want to be ... believe what you want to be
Trans: If you want to be what you want to be ... be what you want to be ... and to be what you want to be ... believe what you want to be

Title: Dil Hi To Hai
Quote: Tera bhi jawaab nahi uparwaale ... chokri na mili, naukri mil gayi ... stree na mili, istree mil gayi
Trans: God you're great ... I didn't find a girl, but I found a job ... I didn't find a woman, but I found an iron

Title: Azhar
Quote: Sau sahi kaam karlo koi yaad nahi rakhta ... ek galat ilzaam aur sabne bhula diya
Trans: No one remembers you when you do a hundred good things ... but with one wrong allegation everyone forgets you

Title: Azhar
Quote: Jinke paas dost kam hote hai na ... woh amir nahi hote
Trans: Those who have only a few friends ... they are not rich

Title: Azhar
Quote: Ab farak nahi padta ... kyun ki jab farak nahi padta zindagi mein ... farak tabhi aata hai
Trans: Now I don't care ... because when you don't care in life ... only then a change comes along

Title: Azhar
Quote: Tumhare aage badne ki duayein maine maangi ... aaj mujhe hi peeche chhod diya
Trans: I prayed for you to move ahead ... and today you've left me behind

Title: Ek Musafir Ek Hasina
Quote: Baat nazaron ki hai, baat kuch bhi nahi ... jisko dil chahe duniya mein hai woh haseen
Trans: It's all about the way you see and nothing else ... the one whom the heart loves in this world, seems like a beautiful person

Title: Ek Musafir Ek Hasina
Quote: Kyun aag lagati phirti ho, jab garam hawa se darti ho ... dil pehle jalakar khaak kiya, ab thandi saansein bharti ho
Trans: Why do you ignite a fire everywhere when you're scared of hot air ... first you burnt my heart into ashes, and now you're blowing cold air

Title: Ek Musafir Ek Hasina
Quote: Insaan duniya ki har cheez bhool sakta hai ... magar apni biwi ko nahi bhool sakta, apne ghar ko nahi bhool sakta ... un cheezon ko kabhi nahi bhool sakta jinpar uski zindagi ka daromadar hai
Trans: A person can forget everything in this world ... but he cannot forget his wife and his house ... he cannot forget those things which are the foundation of his life

Title: Dil Tera Diwana
Quote: Ab tak meri zubaan tujhse sawaal pooch rahi thi ... lekin ab jawaab degi teri zubaan aur sawaal karega hamara inteqam
Trans: Until now my mouth was asking you the question ... but now your mouth will give the answer and my revenge will ask the question

Title: Dil Tera Diwana
Quote: Bambai mein bus ki aur chokariya ki intezar nahi karni chahiye ... pati nahi kab aa jaye ... aaye aaye nahi aaye
Trans: In Mumbai one should not wait for a bus or a girl ... who knows when they'll come ... or may be whether they'll even come or not

Title: Dil Tera Diwana
Quote: Mujhe sone chandi se nahi ... un baazuon se pyar hai joh do waqt ki roti toh kama sake ... jinko duniya unki mehnat, unke naam se jaane ... jinki peeth par apne A1 baap ke naam ka stamp nahi hota
Trans: I don't love gold and silver ... I love those hands who can earn to feed food twice a day ... whom the world knows because of their hard work and their own name ... and who don't have an famous stamp of their father on their back

Title: Housefull 3
Quote: I can laugh English, I can walk English ... but I cannot talk English
Trans: I can laugh in English, I can walk in English ... but I cannot talk in English

Title: Housefull 3
Quote: Love is blind ... but in my case the lover is blind
Trans: Love is blind ... but in my case the lover is blind

Title: Housefull 3
Quote: Insaan ke sanskar badhe hi hone chahiye ... chota toh Bheem bhi hota hai
Trans: The values of a person must be high ... since even Bheem by himself is small

Title: Housefull 3
Quote: Insaan ko hamesha clean hi hona chahiye ... dirty toh picture bhi hai
Trans: A person must always be clean ... since even a movie can be dirty

Title: Main Aur Charles
Quote: Kehte hai ki sachai ki hamesha jeet hoti hai ... par burai kabhi haarti nahi
Trans: It is said that truth always wins ... but evil never loses

Title: Main Aur Charles
Quote: Criminal ko punishment se zyada pakde jaane ka fear hota hai
Trans: A criminal fears more about getting caught than about the punishment

Title: Main Aur Charles
Quote: He can escape ... but no one can escape him
Trans: He can escape ... but no one can escape him

Title: Main Aur Charles
Quote: It is good to be evil
Trans: It is good to be evil

Title: Talvar
Quote: Saboot aur saza jaise jacha aur bacha ... tandurust jacha toh mazboot bacha
Trans: Proof and punishment are like motherhood and a baby ... if the motherhood is strong only then will the baby be strong

Title: Talvar
Quote: Har koi apni biwi ko pyar toh karta hi hai ... aur na bhi karta ho toh karne ki acting toh karta hi hai
Trans: Everyone loves their wife ... and even if they don't, yet they do the acting of loving her

Title: Sarbjit
Quote: Aap logon ko bas peeth par vaar karna aata hai ... par hum Hindustaniyon ne kabhi peeth dikhana seekha hi nahi hai
Trans: You guys only know how to attack behind the back ... but we Indians have never learnt how to turn our backs to someone

Title: Sarbjit
Quote: Mashaal ek ho ya ek lakh ... sirf ek chingaari ki zaroorat hai usse jalane ke liye
Trans: Whether there is one or millions of torches ... you only need one spark to ignite them

Title: Sarbjit
Quote: Yeh lakeeran na badhi dheet hai ... mutthi mein toh band ho jaati hai par qaabu mein nahi aati
Trans: These palm lines are very stubborn ... you can enclose them in your fist but you can't control them

Title: Sarbjit
Quote: Na kar bandeya meri teri ... char dinan da phair hai duniya ... phir tu bhi mitti, main bhi mitti
Trans: Don't do yours and mine ... life is nothing but four days long ... after that we both will turn into dust

Title: One Night Stand
Quote: Samundar aur aasmaan bhi mil jaate hai hamari tarah ... aur jahan woh milte hai wahan duniya khatam ho jaati hai
Trans: Even the ocean and the sky meet just like us ... but where they meet, the world ends there

Title: One Night Stand
Quote: Tum jaisi auratein mard ke bagair reh nahi sakti ... oh sorry in your case mardon ke bagair
Trans: Women like you can't live without a man ... oh sorry in your case without men

Title: One Night Stand
Quote: Zindagi ka problem yehi hai ... galatiyan pal mein ho jaati hai ... lekin saza badi lambi chalti hai
Trans: This is the problem of life ... mistakes happen in a moment ... but their punishment lasts for a long time

Title: One Night Stand
Quote: Kehte hai har saat saal mein insaan ke body cells badal jaate hai ... iska matlab insaan poora ka poora naya ho jaata hai ... lekin kabhi kabhi insaan ko badalne mein kuch din hi kaafi hote hai
Trans: It's said that the human body cells change every 7 years ... which means that a person changes completely ... but sometimes only a few days are enough for a person to change

Title: All Is Well
Quote: Zindagi se bhaagte bhaagte ek modh aaisa aata hai ... jab aage badne se pehle aapko rukna padta hai
Trans: When you run behind life there comes a turn ... when you have to pause before you move ahead

Title: All Is Well
Quote: Kuch log sapno ke peeche bhaagte hai kyun ki woh unhe sach karna chahte hai ... lekin kuch log sapno ki peeche is liye bhaagte hai kyun ki unhe apni sachai se bhaagna hota hai
Trans: Some people run behind their dreams since they want to make them true ... but some people run behind their dreams since they want to run away from their truth

Title: Sultan
Quote: Izzat aur guroor mein dhaage bhar ka pharak hove hai
Trans: The difference between respect and arrogance is as thin as a thread

Title: Sultan
Quote: Yeh haath nahi hatauda hai hatauda ... mooh pe pada na ... daant popcorn ki tarah bahar aa jayenge
Trans: These hands are like a hammer ... if it falls on your face ... then your teeth will come out like popcorn

Title: Sultan
Quote: Asli pehalwan ki pehchaan akhade mein nahi, zindagi mein hove hai ... taki jab zindagi tumhe patke toh tum phir khade ho ... aur aaisa daanv maro ki zindagi chitt ho jaye
Trans: A true fighter can be identified in life, and not in a fighting ring ... so that you get up again when life pushes you down ... and then play in such a way that life gets defeated

Title: Sultan
Quote: Agar tune aaj give up kiya ... toh shayad bahar se zinda reh jaye ... magar andar se mar jayega hamesha ke liye
Trans: If you give up today ... then may be you'll be alive from the outside ... but from within you'll be dead forever

Title: Junooniyat
Quote: Har sher mein alfaaz toh hote hai ... par har alfaaz shayari nahi ... pyar toh sab karte hai ... par har pyar junooniyat nahi
Trans: In every poem there are words ... but not every word is a poem ... everyone falls in love ... but not each and every love is passionate

Title: Junooniyat
Quote: Ek hawa chhuke gayi abhi abhi ... chandni pighal abhi abhi ... yeh mujhe kya ho gaya ... yeh kahan main kho gaya
Trans: Just now a gust of wind has touched me ... just now the moonlight has melted ... what has happened to me ... where have I lost myself

Title: Junooniyat
Quote: Pyar ek parchai ki tarah hai ... jab tak uski aadat padh jaati hai, shaam ho jaati hai
Trans: Love is like a shadow ... the sun sets by the time you get used to it

Title: Junooniyat
Quote: Jahan pyar hota hai wahan khalish nahi hoti ... aur agar khalish ho toh samjho pyar tha hi nahi
Trans: Where there is love, there is no pain ... and if pain is there, then understand that there was no love

Title: Dishoom
Quote: Tu Munna Bhai hoga lekin main Circuit nahi hoon ... tu Batman hoga lekin main Birdman nahi hoon ... tu hero hoga lekin ab main bhi hero hoon
Trans: You may be Mr. Munna, but I'm not Mr. Circuit ... you may be Batman, but I'm not Birdman ... you may be a hero, but now even I'm a hero

Title: Dishoom
Quote: Kamata hoon Dirham mein lekin kharachta hoon rupai mein ... khata hoon inki lekin sunta hoon sirf Modi ji ki
Trans: I earn money in Dirhams but I spend in Rupees ... I take money from these guys but I only listen to Narendra Modi

Title: Dishoom
Quote: (Mat piyo, it's killing you) - Bullets nahi maar payi ... yeh cigarette kya cheez hai
Trans: (Don't smoke, it's killing you) - The bullets couldn't kill me ... this cigarette is nothing in front of it

Title: Dishoom
Quote: Yeh Arabiyon ka Dongri hai beta ... yahan shaanpatti sirf shaano pe jachti hai ... police waalon pe nahi
Trans: This is the local area of Arabs ... here only the smart people look good acting smart ... not the police

Title: Banjo
Quote: Tu nikal apne sapne ke peeche ... aur jidhar bhi palatkar dekhegi na ... apan khada milega tere peeche
Trans: You go behind your dream ... and wherever you'll turn around and see ... you'll find me standing right behind you

Title: Banjo
Quote: Zindagi do choice deta hai ... joh milta hai woh haath phailakar le lo ... ya phir joh maangta hai woh haath uthakar cheen lo
Trans: Life gives us two choices ... open your hands and take what you get ... or else raise your hand and snatch what you want

Title: Banjo
Quote: Iska haath agar aadmi pe padhe toh aadmi hil jaata hai ... aur agar banjo pe padhe toh bhi aadmi hil jaata hai
Trans: If his hand lands on a person then that person shakes ... and if his hand lands on a banjo then also that person shakes

Title: Banjo
Quote: Kabhi socha hai ki Mumbai ko sapno ka shehar kyun kaha jaata hai ... kyun ki yahan pe sapne sirf bungalow aur imaraton mein nahi ... galiyon ki gandi naaliyon mein bhi palte hai
Trans: Have you ever thought as to why Mumbai is called as the city of dreams ... because here dreams are not only seen in bungalows and buildings ... but they are also seen in the dirty gutters of the streets

Title: Milap
Quote: Is duniya mein paisa nahi toh kuch nahi ... baap ki shafqat paisa, maa ki mamta paisa, aurat ka pyar paisa ... paisa, paisa, paisa
Trans: In this world if you don't have money, then you don't have anything ... the kindness of a father is money, the motherly love of a mother is money, the love of a woman is money ... money, money, money

Title: Milap
Quote: Na hui sard dil ki lagi ... barf mein bhi laga ke dekh liya ... itna sher garam tha ... magar barf mein daal ke thanda kar diya
Trans: The love of my heart didn't go cold ... I even tried to put it in ice ... the poem was so warm and nice ... but by putting it in the ice you made it cold

Title: Milap
Quote: Ishq toh sabhi karte hai ... lekin sabka kurta pyjama, coat patloon nahi ban jaata
Trans: Everyone falls in love ... but not everyone's simple clothes turn into a suit and a pant

Title: Great Grand Masti
Quote: Gaanv mein wow ... maska pav ... meow!
Trans: Something wow in the village ... like butter and bun ... meow!

Title: Great Grand Masti
Quote: Hum is baar shehar ki mem ke saath A-B-C-D nahi ... gaanv ki gori ke saath Ka-Kha-Ga ... Fa karenge
Trans: This time we don't do A-B-C-D with a gorgeous city girl ... but with a beautiful village girl we'll do Ka-Kha-Ga ... and F**k

Title: Great Grand Masti
Quote: Sapne mein matka ... reality mein jhatka ... upar wale tu kahan laake patka
Trans: A pot in the dreams ... a jerk in reality ... oh god, where have you thrown me

Title: Great Grand Masti
Quote: Duniya bhar ki masti tumhare pyar ki barabari nahi kar sakti ... aur aaj us hi pyar ki kasam khate hai ... mar jayenge par tumhe kabhi dhokha nahi denge
Trans: All the entertainment of the world can't equal your love ... and today I swear on that love ... that I'll die, but I'll never cheat on you

Title: Fever
Quote: It takes courage to love someone who doesn't love you
Trans: It takes courage to love someone who doesn't love you

Title: Fever
Quote: Mere liye khoobsurati aam baat hai ... aur khoobsurat ladkiyan roz ki baat hai
Trans: Beauty is just a normal thing for me ... and beautiful women are a regular thing for me

Title: Fever
Quote: Joh cheez jaan le sakti hai woh jaan bacha bhi sakti hai
Trans: The thing that can take a life can also save a life

Title: Fever
Quote: They say love kills ... it actually does
Trans: They say love kills ... it actually does

Title: Do Lafzon Ki Kahani
Quote: Joh log kam bolte hai na ... un mein yaadon ka ek jwalamukhi bhara hota hai ... jis mein woh jalte rehte hai, jalte rehte hai
Trans: People who speak less ... have a volcano of memories within them ... in which they keep on burning

Title: Do Lafzon Ki Kahani
Quote: Ek boxer ka sabsa bada dushman hai reham ... joh tumhara opponent tumpar kabhi nahi karega
Trans: The biggest enemy of a boxer is his mercy ... which your opponent will never do on you

Title: Ek Dil Sau Afsane
Quote: Aatma woh vastu hai ... jise na talwar kaat sakti hai na aag jala sakti hai
Trans: A soul is such a thing ... which cannot be cut by a sword and neither can't it be burned by fire

Title: Ek Dil Sau Afsane
Quote: Pati patni ghar banate hai ... bache us hi ghar ko swarg bana dete hai
Trans: A husband and wife make a home ... but children are the ones who turn that home into heaven

Title: Raju Chacha
Quote: Woh bache jinke mummy pappa nahi hote na ... God ke sabse special bache hote hai
Trans: Those kids who don't have parents ... are the most special kids of God

Title: Raju Chacha
Quote: Tere labon pe inkaar hai, mere labon pe ikraar hai ... haan yahi toh hai sab nishaaniyan, haan issi ka naam toh pyar hai
Trans: There is no on your lips, there is yes on my lips ... these are all the signs, this is what is called as love

Title: Raju Chacha
Quote: Jhooth ko sach banane ke liye saboot ki zaroorat hoti hai ... sach toh khud ek saboot hai
Trans: You need proof to turn a lie into the truth ... but truth by itself is a proof

Title: Kissa Kursi Ka
Quote: Politics mein right aur wrong nahi hota ... politics mein manzil hi sab kuch hai ... rasta chahe koi bhi ho
Trans: There is no right or wrong in politics ... in politics the destination is everything ... no matter what the path is

Title: Kissa Kursi Ka
Quote: Chunaav aur politics akal ka khel hai ... umeedvaar chahe koi bhi ho ... agar uske peeche akal hai, organization hai, planning hai toh woh zaroor jeetta hai
Trans: Elections and politics is a mind game ... no matter who the candidate is ... if he has brains, an organization and planning behind him, then he will definitely win

Title: Pati Parmeshwar
Quote: Chup chaap anyay sehna kamzori hai ... magar anyay karne waale ko chetavani dekar muqabale ki ghoshana karke ... mann ki dhirdta se, magar ahinsa se uske anyay ka anth dekhna kamzori nahi, shakti hai
Trans: It is weakness to bear injustice ... but challenging a sinner, announcing a battle ... and to watch the end of injustice with non-violence and a strong heart is power, and not weakness

Title: Pati Parmeshwar
Quote: Dharti par itna anyay karne ke baad bhi ... insaan ko jeene ke liye, palne ke liye, yahan tak ki marne ke liye bhi dharti ko gaud chahiye ... yahi dharti ki jeet hai
Trans: Even after committing so many sins on the earth ... to live, to grow and even to die a human needs the lap of the earth ... this is victory for the earth

Title: Pati Parmeshwar
Quote: Atmavishvas se insaan ko hi nahi ... bhagwan ko bhi jeeta ja sakta hai
Trans: With self confidence you can not only win a person ... but God as well

Title: Beiimaan Love
Quote: Har successful aadmi ke peeche ek aurat ka haath hota hai ... lekin main yeh kehna chahti hoon ki ... ek kaamyab aurat ke peeche ek kaamyab aadmi ka haath hota hai
Trans: Behind every successful man there is a woman ... but I want to say that ... behind every successful woman there is a successful man

Title: Beiimaan Love
Quote: Na main kisi saanp se darti hoon na kisi seedi se ... I'm way above your snakes and ladders game
Trans: I'm not scared of snakes nor ladders ... I'm way above your snakes and ladders game

Title: Beiimaan Love
Quote: Zindagi mein jab ek darwaza band hota hai ... aur aapko lagta hai thak gaye, haar chuke ho ... toh sirf aur sirf aapki himmat aur shakti aapke liye kayi aur darwaze khol deti hai ... and that's what makes you discover the real you, the fighter in you
Trans: When one door closes in life ... and when you think that you're tired and defeated ... then only your courage and your willpower can open many other doors for you ... and that's what makes you discover the real you, the fighter in you

Title: Beiimaan Love
Quote: Aaj mera paas sab kuch hai lekin phir bhi kuch nahi hai
Trans: Today I have everything but still I don't have anything

Title: Rustom
Quote: Matlab baazi jeetne se hai ... phir chahe pyada qurbaan ho ya phir rani
Trans: Winning is important ... it doesn't matter if you sacrifice your pawn or your queen

Title: Rustom
Quote: Meri uniform meri aadat hai ... jaise ki saans lena, apne desh ki raksha karna
Trans: My uniform is my habit ... just like breathing and protecting my country

Title: Rustom
Quote: Tune aankhon se joh keh di thi woh baat kaise bhoolunga ... tere sang mein joh guzri thi woh raat kaise bhoolunga
Trans: How can I forget what you had said from your eyes ... how can I forget the night that I had spent with you

Title: Rustom
Quote: Khushboo tumhari zulfon ki ab tak basi hai saanson mein ... mehak jaati hai rooh meri jab aati ho tum baahon mein
Trans: The fragrance of your hair is still there in my breaths ... my soul picks up the aroma when you come in my arms

Title: Raman Raghav 2.0
Quote: Bade police waale ki aankh mein aankh daalke baat karne ka mazaa hi zabardast hota hai
Trans: The fun of looking into the eyes of a senior police officer and talking to him is amazing

Title: Raman Raghav 2.0
Quote: Isko bol gun neeche kare ... nahi toh mera team joh bahar behta hai na ... isko kamre mein le jaake itna maaregi ki 480 bhashayein jitni Bharat mein boli jaati hai, sab bolne lagega
Trans: Tell him to lower the gun ... or my team that is sitting outside ... will take him into a room and hit him so badly that he will start speaking all the 480 languages that are spoken in India

Title: Teesri Aankh: The Hidden Camera
Quote: Main bhi wohi karta hoon joh upar waala kehta hai ... woh nahi joh yeh upar waale kehte hai
Trans: I do what God tells me ... and not what these people above me tell me

Title: Teesri Aankh: The Hidden Camera
Quote: Hum gunde hai aur jab tak hum hamare andar ke gunde ko khatam nahi karenge ... tab tak samaaj mein gundagardi khatam nahi hogi
Trans: We are goons and until we eliminate the goon within us ... till then rowdyism in the society will not end

Title: Teesri Aankh: The Hidden Camera
Quote: Sakht kanoon banane se nahi ... kanoon ka sakhti se paalan karne se hi atyachar kam honge
Trans: Not by making stricter laws ... but injustice will reduce by following the laws in a strict manner

Title: Teesri Aankh: The Hidden Camera
Quote: Bimari aur jurm ... chupane se dono badte hai
Trans: Disease and crime ... they both grow when you hide them

Title: Kaafila
Quote: Upar waale ne har insaan ko kisi na kisi hunar ya kabiliyat se nawaza hai ... agar hum usse pehchaan le toh kamyabi kahin bhi hasil ho sakti hai
Trans: God has gifted everyone with some talent, some ability ... if we are able to recognize that then success can be achieved anywhere

Title: Kaafila
Quote: Apno ko khokar kabhi sapne sach nahi hote
Trans: Dreams can never come true by losing your dear ones

Title: Kaafila
Quote: Zindagi koshish karke samajhne waali cheez ka naam nahi hai ... isne pehle bhi joh mujhe samjhana tha samjhaya hai ... aage bhi joh samjhana hoga samjhayegi, apne tareeke se
Trans: Life is not about trying and understanding something ... in the past it has made me understand what it wanted to ... and moving forward also it'll make me understand what it wants to, in its own style

Title: Udta Punjab
Quote: Hamaar sunba na toh ganiyan phatt jayi
Trans: If you listen to my story then your a*s will rip apart

Title: Udta Punjab
Quote: Nasha gala banda karta hai ... par aundha effect poori family te hota hai
Trans: An individual is the one who takes drugs ... but it's effect is felt by his entire family

Title: Udta Punjab
Quote: Saare gabru toh sooiyan lagake tight hai madam ... ab ladies ko kuch karna padega na
Trans: All the guys are intoxicated by taking the injection of drugs ... hence now the ladies will have to do something

Title: Udta Punjab
Quote: Maine aaj tak kabhi kisi ke liye kuch nahi kiya ... ek vaar kar lene de yaar ... mukti mil jaani hai mujhe
Trans: Till today I've never done anything for anyone ... let me do one thing my friend ... I'll get liberation from it

Title: A Flying Jatt
Quote: You're not one in a million ... you are the one
Trans: You're not one in a million ... you are the one

Title: A Flying Jatt
Quote: Har yug mein paap ka anth karne ke liye ... eeshwar khud kisi roop mein dharti par aate hai
Trans: In every era, to put an end to the sins ... god himself comes down to earth in some guise or the other

Title: A Flying Jatt
Quote: Agar hamare andar vishvas hai ki hum sahi hai ... toh hamare andar taqat apne aap aa jaati hai
Trans: If we have the belief within us that we are right ... then the strength comes to us automatically

Title: A Flying Jatt
Quote: Ek Sikh savah lakh ke barabar hota hai
Trans: A Sikh person is equal to more than a lakh people

Title: Awaargi
Quote: Sharaab bhi aaisi cheez hai ... koi gham mein peeta hai toh koi khushi mein ... magar main sharaab is liye peeyonga ... ki ab na gham raha na khushi
Trans: Alcohol is such a thing that ... someone drinks in sorrow and someone drinks in happiness ... but I'll drink alcohol because ... now there is no sorrow and no happiness left for me

Title: Awaargi
Quote: Kuch log chale jaate hai magar marte nahi ... aane waali zindagiyon mein khushboo bankar reh jaate hai
Trans: Some people leave but they don't die ... then stay like fragrance in the coming lives

Title: Awaargi
Quote: Mujhe zyada bolne ki aadat nahi hai ... main joh bolta hoon woh sun aur joh nahi bolta hoon woh dhyaan se sun
Trans: I'm not in the habit of saying a lot ... listen to what I'm saying and listen carefully to what I'm not saying

Title: Awaargi
Quote: Jab sangeet aur sangeetkar ek ho jaye ... toh us samay bhagwan ke darshan hote hai
Trans: When music and musician become one ... then at that moment you get to witness god

Title: Amiri Garibi
Quote: Shaadi vivah mein jab bhi jaana hota hai na ... toh hamari memsaab ko toh do din pehle bata dena padta hai ... unko sajne savarne mein itna waqt lag jaata hai ... ki shaadi ke din ki bajai hum pehle bache ke janam din par hi pahunch paate hai
Trans: Whenever we have to go for a wedding ... then I have to tell my wife atleast a couple of days ahead of time ... she takes so much time to get ready that ... instead of the wedding we end up reaching on the birthday of the couple's 1st child

Title: Amiri Garibi
Quote: Ek aurat ke liye uske pati ke pyar ke bina duniya ki tamaam daulat, saare sukh ke samaan ... us bejaan kagaz ke phool ki tarah hote hai ... jin mein banavati rang toh hote hai lekin zindagi ki khushboo nahi hoti
Trans: For a woman all the wealth and all the luxuries of the world, without her husband ... are like those lifeless paper flowers ... which have artificial colours in them but not the fragrance of life

Title: Amiri Garibi
Quote: Jab tu bahar se kisi daulat waale ka bangla dekhega na ... toh tujhe lagega ki bhagwan ne isse bahut kuch diya hai ... par jab andar jaake dekhega ... toh tujhe lagega bhagwan ne isse bahut kuch cheen bhi liya hai
Trans: When you'll look at a rich man's bungalow from outside ... then you'll feel that god has given him so much ... but when you'll go inside and see ... then you'll feel that god has also taken away a lot from him

Title: Amiri Garibi
Quote: Aurat ki sundarta aur jawaani ka mehatva tabhi hai ... jab us mein mard ko rijhane ki adayein ho ... patthar ko pighlane waale husn ka jaadu ho
Trans: The beauty and youth of a woman has value only when ... she has the style of pleasing a man ... she has the magical body that could melt a stone

Title: Har Har Mahadev
Quote: Pahadon se bhid jaane par bhi hridhay utna dukhi nahi hota ... jitna swabhimaan ko thes lagne par hota hai
Trans: Even on fighting against the mountains the heart doesn't feel that sad ... as much as it does when your self-respect gets hurt

Title: Har Har Mahadev
Quote: Kroadh ko hi tej manne waala tejasvi nahi ... usse jeetne waala tejasvi aur shaktishali hota hai
Trans: The one who believes that only anger is great, is not smart ... the one who wins over it, is smart and strong

Title: Har Har Mahadev
Quote: Sansaar mein gangajal se paap dhone ke saath saath ... punya ki bhi dhaara bahao
Trans: In this world, along with rinsing your sins in the water of river Ganges ... also do some good deeds

Title: Har Har Mahadev
Quote: Pran dene se paap ka anth nahi hota ... punya ke prabhav se hota hai
Trans: Sins don't end by ending your life ... they end with the effects of virtue

Title: Mohenjo Daro
Quote: Joh mutthi ab tak khuli hui thi ... usse band karne ka samay aa gaya hai
Trans: The fist that was open until now ... the time to close it has now come

Title: Mohenjo Daro
Quote: Tujhe Mohenjo Daro pe raj karna hai ... aur mujhe seva
Trans: You want to rule on Mohenjo Daro ... and I want to serve it

Title: Mohenjo Daro
Quote: Wahan log nahi ... lobh lalach baste hai
Trans: People don't live there ... greed and selfishness lives there

Title: Mohenjo Daro
Quote: Anyay ka virodh karna hi nyay karna hota hai
Trans: To stand against injustice is doing justice

Title: Kabali
Quote: Sapne mein chahe jitni bhi taqleefein ho ... aankh khulte hi sari taqleefein mitt jaati hai
Trans: No matter how many problems occur in dreams ... all the problems go away when you open your eyes

Title: Kabali
Quote: Sar jhukakar, jee malik bolkar khada ho jaata hai ... aisa kabali samjha hai kya ... kabali hai yeh!
Trans: The one who stands bowing his head down and says yes master ... do you think I'm such type of a servant ... not at all, I'm a gangster!

Title: Kabali
Quote: Teri muskaan se meri saansein chalti hai ... meri saans agar ruk bhi jaye toh is muskaan ko bachake rakhna
Trans: Your smile keeps my breath going ... even if my breaths stop, then to keep your smile going

Title: Baar Baar Dekho
Quote: Tum mera guzra hua kal thi ... aane waala kal hogi ... aur yeh pal ho
Trans: You're my past ... you'll be my future ... and you're my present

Title: Baar Baar Dekho
Quote: Joh guzar gaya woh haath mein nahi ... aane wala kal, joh kisse pata kya layega ... paas hamare sirf aaj hai, sirf ab hai ... us hi pe control hai ... bas yeh pal haath mein hai
Trans: What has past is not in our hands ... the tomorrow, who knows what it'll bring ... we only have today, this moment with us ... we only have control over that ... we only have this moment in our hands

Title: Baar Baar Dekho
Quote: Kabhi kabhi jab logon ko kuch samajh na aaye ... toh usse moden art keh dete hai
Trans: Sometimes when people don't understand anything ... then we call it modern art

Title: Baar Baar Dekho
Quote: Main apna har aaj sirf tumhare saath bitana chahta hoon
Trans: I want to spend every present moment of mine with you

Title: Magadheera
Quote: Dance ka matlab sirf body ko hilana nahi hota hai ... aise steps lo ki logon ki seetiyon se chatt udh jaye
Trans: Dance doesn't only mean to shake your body ... show such steps that the ceiling blows away by the whistles of the audience

Title: Magadheera
Quote: Agar maine thaan liya ki yeh cheez meri hai ... toh har keemat par woh meri hai
Trans: If I make a decision that, a thing will be mine ... then no matter what, that thing will become mine

Title: Magadheera
Quote: Face jitna bhola ... utna hi aag ka gola
Trans: Her face looks innocent ... but she's a fireball

Title: Magadheera
Quote: Guru gudh hi reh gaya ... chela shakkar ban gaya
Trans: The trainer remained as jaggery ... while the student turned into sugar

Title: Pyaasa (2002)
Quote: Ghar kabhi chota ya gareeb nahi hota ... ghar toh uske ghar waalo se bada hota hai
Trans: A house is never small or poor ... a house becomes big with the people living in it

Title: Pyaasa (2002)
Quote: Cheenkar pyaas bujhane mein woh maza nahi ... joh paakar pyaas bujhane mein hai
Trans: The fun in snatching and quenching your thirst is nothing ... as compared to the fun in attaining and quenching your thirst

Title: Pyaasa (2002)
Quote: Lambi hai taangein, mast hai chaal ... Brahmi Amla Kesh Tel ke lambe lambe baal ... gaal hai laal, ladki hai malamaal ... uff, uspe uske goggle ki mazboot hai dhaal
Trans: Long legs, gorgeous walking style ... long hair that uses Brahmi Amla Kesh Oil ... red cheeks, rich girl ... oh my, on top of that these stylish goggles

Title: Chirag
Quote: Tera haath, haath mein aa gaya ... ke chirag raah mein jal gaye
Trans: When your hand came in my hand ... then lamps lit in the path

Title: Chirag
Quote: Tu mere samne hai ... teri zulfein hai khuli, tera aanchal hai dhala ... main bhala hosh mein kaise rahoon, kaise rahoon
Trans: You're in front of me ... your hair is untied, your scarf is flowing ... how can I not lose my senses

Title: Babul
Quote: Khushi ke saath duniya mein hazaron gham bhi hote hai ... jahan bajhti hai shehnai wahan matam bhi hote hai
Trans: Along with happiness there are thousands of sorrows in the world as well ... where the wedding bells ring, over there at times there is mourning as well

Title: Babul
Quote: Mohabbat mein jeena, mohabbat mein marna ... na aansoon bahana, na fariyad karna
Trans: Live being in love, die being in love ... don't shed tears, don't make a request

Title: Samadhi
Quote: Bharatmata ki azaadi ki raah mein khaye huye zakhm ... zakhm nahi hai ... phoolon ke haar hai
Trans: The wounds received in the path of India's independence ... are not wounds ... they are a garland of flowers

Title: Samadhi
Quote: Watan ka jazba har jazbe se buland hota hai ... bhai, behan, maa, baap aur har jazbe se buland
Trans: The love for your country is the greatest love ... it's bigger than the love of a brother, a sister, a mother, a father and bigger than any other love

Title: Samadhi
Quote: Pachtave ka har aansoon ... ek lambi dua ke barabar hai
Trans: Every teardrop of remorse ... is equal to a long prayer

Title: Kunwara
Quote: Aadmi ke paas taqat ke saath saath dimaag ka hona bahut zaroori hai ... aur jiske paas dono cheezein hoti hai usse kehte hai complete man
Trans: It's very important for a man to have brains along with strength ... and the one who has both is called a complete man

Title: Kunwara
Quote: Samundar kitna hi bada kyun na ho kisi ki pyaas nahi bhuja sakta ... aur kuvaan kitna hi chota kyun na ho ... pyaas bhujane ke liye kuven ke pani ki hi zaroorat padti hai
Trans: No matter how large the ocean is, it can't quench your thirst ... and no matter how small a well is ... to quench your thirst you need the water of the well

Title: Maryada
Quote: Talash zindagi ka doosra naam hai ... kisi ko rozi ki talash hai aur kisi ko chain aur sukoon ki
Trans: Search is the second name of life ... someone is searching for a job and someone is searching for peace

Title: Maryada
Quote: Haste huye insaan ke saath saari duniya hasti hai ... lekin jab woh rota hai toh akela rota hai
Trans: The whole world laughs with the person who laughs ... but when he cries, then he cries alone

Title: Maryada
Quote: Har dayaar mein aati hai phir bahaar ... khilte hai phool bhi wahan daur-e-fiza ke baad
Trans: Spring comes in every region ... and even flowers bloom there, after the era of breeze

Title: Maryada
Quote: Main joh chahta hoon woh paata nahi ... aur joh paata hoon woh sirf ek ittefaq hai
Trans: I don't attain what I desire ... and what I attain, that's just an coincidence

Title: Freaky Ali
Quote: Khel koi bhi ho ... hum gareeb log ya toh jeette hai ... ya seekhte hai ... haarte kabhi nahi
Trans: No matter what the game is ... we poor people either win it ... or learn from it ... but we never lose

Title: Freaky Ali
Quote: Jeet mein toh har aadmi saath deta hai ... saathi toh woh hai joh haar mein bhi saath de
Trans: Every person is on your side when you win ... a true companion is one who stays by your side even when you lose

Title: Freaky Ali
Quote: Teri aane waali zindagi ek sahi shot aur ek galat faisle ke beech mein tiki hui hai
Trans: Your life's future is hanging between one right shot and one wrong decision

Title: Freaky Ali
Quote: Kafan mein pocket nahi hota aur upar account transfer nahi hota
Trans: There is no pocket in a shroud and you can't transfer your (bank) account to heaven

Title: Days of Tafree
Quote: Musafir hai hum aur kitne waqt beete hai ... abhe bhaad mein jaaye duniya, hum tafreeyon mein jeete hai
Trans: We are travellers and so much time has passed ... let the world go to hell, we live care-freely

Title: Days of Tafree
Quote: Tulsidas ji ne kaha hai ... ke matra pita se ooncha guru ka stann hota hai
Trans: The poet Tulsidas has said that ... a teacher's chest is bigger than your parents position

Title: Days of Tafree
Quote: Abhe tune teri shakal dekhi hai ... chudail kahinki ... tere mooh pe toh main paadon bhi nahi
Trans: Have you seen your face ... you're like a witch ... I wouldn't even fart on your face

Title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
Quote: Maine diya baalon ka balidaan aur you're acting like Irrfan Khan ... thoda toh overacting banta hai na
Trans: I sacrificed my hair and you're acting like Irrfan Khan ... a little bit of overacting should be there

Title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
Quote: Dare hue log aksar alfazon ke peeche chupte hai
Trans: People who are scared often hide behind words

Title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
Quote: Mauka hai, dastoor hai ... zakhaas raja, zakhaas rani aur raazi ... kyun na laga de Bollywood ki baazi
Trans: We have the opportunity and the ritual ... a great king and a great queen both agree ... so why not play something from Bollywood

Title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
Quote: Pyar cancer ki tarah hota hai ... bin bulaye aa jaata hai aur maarke chala jaata hai
Trans: Love is like cancer ... it comes without an invitation and it kills us and leaves

Title: Akira
Quote: Apahij woh nahi jiska koi ang na ho ... apahij woh hai joh apne ang ka istamaal na kare ... doosron ki madad na karne wale haath apahij hai ... zulm ko dekhkar mudne wali aankh apahij hai ... maa baap ko chhodkar bhaagne wale paanv apahij hai
Trans: Someone who doesn't have a body part is not a handicap person ... instead a person who doesn't use his body part is a handicap person ... the hands that don't help others are handicap ... the eyes that look at injustice and turn away are handicap ... the legs that leave their parents behind are handicap

Title: Akira
Quote: Laxmi samne se darshan dene ko tayaar hai ... aur aap joh hai line mein khade rehna chahte hai
Trans: The goddess of wealth is herself ready to come in front of you ... and you want to stand in a line to see her

Title: Salaami
Quote: Jab zindagi se khushi mitt jaye na ... toh Diwali sirf ek aag banke reh jaati hai
Trans: When happiness erases away from life ... then Diwali simply remains like a fire

Title: Salaami
Quote: Sab kuch khuda se maang liya tujhko maangkar ... uthte nahi hai haath mere is dua ke baad
Trans: I've asked everything from God, by asking for you ... now my hands don't rise after this prayer

Title: Salaami
Quote: Jung chahe farz ki ho ya dilon ki ... humein dono jeetna aata hai
Trans: Whether the war is for duty or for the hearts ... we know how to win them both

Title: Neerja
Quote: Agar yeh hota toh woh nahi hota ... agar woh hota toh yeh nahi hota ... hota toh wohi hai joh hona hota hai
Trans: Had this been there, then that wouldn't have happened ... had that been there, then this wouldn't have happened ... ultimately what has to happen, will happen

Title: Neerja
Quote: Tumhari awaaz main kaan se nahi ... dil se sunta hoon
Trans: I don't listen to your voice from my ears ... I listen to it from my heart

Title: Mashooq
Quote: Naam hai ishq mera, husn ka deewana hoon ... kabhi bhanwara kabhi bulbul, kabhi parwana hoon ... mere hi dum se haseeno mein mohabbat jaagi ... naaz-o-andaz-o-adashokhi shararat jaagi ... jab haseen log mera naam liya karte hai ... dono haathon se jigar thaam liya karte hai ... phir bhi tanhai ka ehsaas liye phirta hoon ... ek dariya hoon magar pyaas liye phirta hoon
Trans: My name is love and I'm crazy for a beautiful body ... sometimes I'm a bee, sometimes a bulbul bird, sometimes a moth ... it's due to me that the beauties have fallen in love ... they have grace and style due to me ... when beautiful people take my name ... then they hold their heart with both hands ... but still I roam around feeling lonely ... I'm a sea, but I roam around being thirsty

Title: Mashooq
Quote: Main yoon hi bekhudi mein keh gaya hoon dilruba tumko ... khuda ka khauff na hota toh keh deta khuda tumko
Trans: I've called you as my beloved in your intoxication ... if I didn't fear God, I would've called you God himself

Title: Mashooq
Quote: Wafa ki aag hum zalim tere dil mein laga denge ... kasam teri kisi din ishq karna bhi sikha denge
Trans: I'll ignite the fire of loyalty in your heart ... I swear on you, someday I'll also teach you how to fall in love

Title: Mashooq
Quote: Hum ahl-e-ishq hai, teer aur talwar se nahi darte ... nazar bhar dekh lo zalim toh khud hi mar jaayein
Trans: I'm a lover, and I'm scared of arrows and swords ... just look at me for once, and I'll simply die myself

Title: Mera Saaya
Quote: Chand tasveer-e-butaan, chand haseeno ke khutoot ... baad marne ke mere ghar se yeh samaan nikla
Trans: A few photos and a few letters of beautiful women ... were found from my house, after I died

Title: Mera Saaya
Quote: Saaya palkon ka na chug jaye tan-e-nazuk mein ... unse kehta hoon joh aankhon mein basa karte hai
Trans: I hope that the shadow of your eyes doesn't peck your delicate body ... I'm telling her who lives in my eyes

Title: Ishq Click
Quote: Woh nahi mere paas magar usse mohabbat hai toh hai ... yeh agar rasm-o-riwazon se bagavat hai toh hai
Trans: He's not with me but if I love him, then so be it ... if this is a revolution against customs and traditions, then so be it

Title: Ishq Click
Quote: Kitna pyar hai tumse yeh jaan lo ... tum hi zindagi ho meri is baat ko maan lo ... tumhe dene ko mere paas kuch bhi nahi ... bas ek jaan hai, jab jee chahe maang lo
Trans: Know this, that I love you a lot ... agree to the fact that you're my life ... I don't have anything to give to you ... I just have one life, ask for it whenever you want

Title: Ishq Click
Quote: Farishtey hi honge jinka hua ishq muqammal ... insaano ko toh humne sirf barbaad hote dekha hai
Trans: Those who attain their love must be angels ... since we have only seen humans getting destroyed

Title: Ishq Click
Quote: Ladaai mein koi jeet'ta nahi hai ... jeet bhale hi kisi ek ki ho ... lekin haarte dono hai
Trans: No one wins in a battle ... even if one person wins ... but still both lose

Title: Rangoli
Quote: Hamare mulk mein ladke umar se pehle hi jawaan ho jaate hai ... aur ladkiyan pehda hone se pehle
Trans: In our country boys become young before their age ... and girls before they are born

Title: Rangoli
Quote: Khoobsurati kapde ko char chaand laga deti hai ... toh kapda bhi ussi khoobsurati ko aasman pe uchaal deta hai
Trans: Beauty enhances the clothes that you wear ... and clothes also enhance the same beauty to the skies

Title: Rangoli
Quote: Moochein toh mard ki zevar hoti hai
Trans: Moustache is an ornament for men

Title: Tutak Tutak Tutiya
Quote: Khoobsurat ladki dil jeet'ti hai ... akalmand ladki shohrat jeet'ti hai ... aur jis ladki ke paas khoobsurati, akal, dono ho ... woh duniya jeet'ti hai
Trans: A beautiful woman wins the heart ... a smart woman wins wealth ... and a woman who has beauty and smartness both ... she wins the world

Title: Tutak Tutak Tutiya
Quote: Jitna heroine se door bhagoge, utna heroine tumhare peeche bhagegi ... women psychology ... old formula but cool formula
Trans: The more you run away from the heroine, the more that heroine will run behind you ... women psychology ... old formula but cool formula

Title: Tutak Tutak Tutiya
Quote: Jaise har sikke ke do pehlu hote hai ... us hi tarah har kahani badi banti hai ek zabardast twist se
Trans: Like every coin has two sides ... just like that every story becomes big with a great twist

Title: Tutak Tutak Tutiya
Quote: Uski life mein koi bhi problem ho ... mujhe lagta hai woh meri problem hai
Trans: If she has any problem in her life ... I feel as if it's my problem

Title: Tum Bin 2
Quote: Pyar reasonable nahi hota ... bas bewajah hota hai
Trans: Love is not reasonable ... love just happens without any reason

Title: Tum Bin 2
Quote: Kuch achcha hone pe joh sabse pehle yaad aata hai ... woh zindagi ka sabse keemti insaan hota hai
Trans: The person that you first remember when something good happens ... that person is the most valuable person of your life

Title: Tum Bin 2
Quote: Life mein joh hum chahte hai aur joh hum chunte hai ... uske beech mein hamari kamzori chupi hoti hai ... aur kabhi kabhi taqat
