Trans: In life what we desire and what we choose ... in between that our weaknesses are hidden ... and sometimes our strengths

Title: Tum Bin 2
Quote: Jab rona aaye toh phoot ke ro lo ... jab pyar aaye toh gale laga lo ... pyar mein bas yahi do sach hai
Trans: When you feel like crying then cry as much as you want ... when you love someone then embrace them ... these are the only two truths in love

Title: Pink
Quote: Aaj tak hum sab log ek galat direction mein effort karte rahe hai ... we should save our boys, not our girls ... because if we save our boys then our girls will be safe
Trans: Till today we all have given our efforts in the wrong direction ... we should save our boys, not our girls ... because if we save our boys then our girls will be safe

Title: Pink
Quote: "Na" sirf ek shabd nahi ... apne aap mein ek poora vakya hai ... isse kisi tarakh, spashtikaran, explanation ya vyakhya ki zaroorat nahi hoti ... na ka matlab na hi hota hai
Trans: "No" is not only a word ... it's a sentence by itself ... it doesn't need any explanation or interpretation ... no simply means no

Title: Pink
Quote: Hamare yahan ghadi ki sui character decide karti hai
Trans: Over here the hand of a clock determines the character

Title: Pink
Quote: You're a woman of questionable character!
Trans: You're a woman of questionable character!

Title: Raaz Reboot
Quote: Pagal woh nahi hote hai jise bhoot dikhte hai ... pagal woh hote hai jise insaan nahi dikhte
Trans: People who see ghosts are not mad ... instead people who don't see humans are mad

Title: Raaz Reboot
Quote: Apne pyar ko bachaye rakhne ke liye joh raaz hum dafan karne ki koshish karte hai ... woh dafan hote nahi ... bas intezar mein rehte hai ek aise waqt ke ... jab woh hamare pyar aur hamari zindagi ko tabah kar sakte hai
Trans: The secrets that we try to bury to protect our love ... cannot be buried ... they only wait for one such moment ... when they can destroy our love and our life

Title: Raaz Reboot
Quote: Secrets are the enemy of love ... yeh baat samajhne ke liye bahut badi keemat chukayi hai maine
Trans: Secrets are the enemy of love ... I've paid a very big price to understand this

Title: Asli Naqli (1962)
Quote: Anyay karne wale se anyay sehne wala zyada paapi hota hai
Trans: A person who tolerates injustice is more sinful than the one who does injustice

Title: Asli Naqli (1962)
Quote: Paise ki duniya badi matlabi duniya hai ... wahan har cheez, daya, maya, pyar, har cheez swaarth ke tarazu pe toli jaati hai
Trans: The world of money is a very mean world ... over there compassion, sympathy, love, everything is weighed on the scale of selfishness

Title: Asli Naqli (1962)
Quote: Ameer hai na, apni ameeri baant nahi sakte bechare ... lekin hum gareeb hai, apni gareebi baant lenge
Trans: The rich people can't share their richness ... but we poor people can share our poorness

Title: Asli Naqli (1962)
Quote: Woh jhooth sach se hazar gunah bada hai ... joh kisi dukhi ko shanti de, sukh pahunchaye
Trans: That lie is thousand times bigger than the truth ... which brings peace and happiness to someone who is sad

Title: Parched
Quote: Pyar koi chidiya nahi ... ek hi zindagi mili hai se humein ... aur ee zindagi mein hi milegi
Trans: Love is not a bird ... we have only one life ... and we'll find love in this life itself

Title: Parched
Quote: Yatra naryastu pujyante, ramante tatra devta
Trans: Where women are honoured, divinity blossoms there

Title: Rock On 2
Quote: Tumhara music kisi aur ki music ki goonj nahi, tumhara apna hona chahiye
Trans: Your music must be yours and not the echo of someone else'se music

Title: Rock On 2
Quote: Tumhari awaaz bahut khoobsurat hai ... aur tumhare suron mein tumhari andar ki awaaz sunai deti hai
Trans: Your voice is very beautiful ... and one can hear your inner voice in your singing

Title: Rock On 2
Quote: Artist duniya se chale jaate hai ... lekin unka art unhe hamesha zinda rakhta hai
Trans: Artist do leave the world ... but their art always keeps them alive

Title: Rock On 2
Quote: Tumhare andar joh sangeet hai woh bahut kam logon ko naseeb hota hai
Trans: The music that is inside you, only a few lucky people have that

Title: Apradhi
Quote: Janam ka pata nau mahine pehle chal jaata hai ... magar marne ka pata nau second pehle bhi nahi chalta
Trans: The birth of a human is known nine months in advance ... but the death of a human is not even known till the last nine seconds of life

Title: Apradhi
Quote: Kriya karam ka samaan koi bhi khareed ke laye ... magar kaam uske aata hai jiska waqt aaya ho
Trans: It doesn't matter who buys the stuff needed for a funeral ... but it's only useful for someone whose time has ended

Title: Apradhi
Quote: Main apne shikaar ko kabhi sote hue nahi maarta ... jagakar maarta hoon ... taki marte waqt usse shikayat na rahe ke maine usse apni zindagi bachane ka mauka nahi diya
Trans: I never kill my prey while he's sleeping ... I kill him after waking him up ... so that while dying he doesn't have a complaint that I didn't give him the opportunity of saving his own life

Title: Apradhi
Quote: Baap, baap hota hai ... beta dus janam lene ke baad bhi baap ka baap nahi ban sakta
Trans: A father will always be a father ... even if a son goes through ten rebirths, but still he won't become the father of his father

Title: Force 2
Quote: Apna ghar bech de aur bina khidki wale kamre mein rehne ki aadat daal
Trans: Sell your house and get used to living in a room without windows

Title: Force 2
Quote: Time badal chuka hai ... aur desh bhi ... ab hum ghar mein ghuske maarte hai
Trans: Time has changed ... and so has the country ... nowadays we go in their house and kill them

Title: Force 2
Quote: Gut feeling, aggression, common sense ... yeh hai Mumbai police ka kaam karne ka tareeka
Trans: Gut feeling, aggression, common sense ... this is how Mumbai police works

Title: Gandhigiri
Quote: Gandhiji ne kahan tha ke burai ko burai se khatam nahi kiya ja sakta ... yehi Gandhigiri hai
Trans: Mahatma Gandhi had said that you can't end evil with evil ... this is what is called as Gandhigiri

Title: Gandhigiri
Quote: Aap toh apne aap mein ATM hai ... (bole toh) ... All Time Mahatma
Trans: You yourself are an ATM ... (what do you mean) ... All Time Mahatma

Title: Gandhigiri
Quote: Achchai phailana chahte hai, baatna chahte hai ... toh pehle us achchai ko apne andar pehda karo ... un moolyon ko apne andar samaao ... tabhi aap doosron ko prabhavit kar sakenge
Trans: If you want to spread and distribute goodness ... then first create that goodness within yourself ... build those values within yourself ... only then you'll be able to impress others

Title: Gandhigiri
Quote: Insaan ke mann ki pavitra aatma aur sakaratmak soch ... uske aas paas ke mahol ko badal dete hai
Trans: The pure soul and positive thinking of one's heart ... changes the environment around him

Title: Anna
Quote: Agar desh ka vikaas karna ho ... toh pehle gaanv ka vikaas karna hoga
Trans: If you want to develop the country ... then first you'll have to develop the villages

Title: Anna
Quote: Hum apne liye jee nahi pa rahe hai ... aur yeh doosron ke liye marne ko taiyaar hai
Trans: We are not able to live for ourselves ... and he's ready to die for others

Title: Anna
Quote: Hindustan ki dharti par yeh tiranga issi tarah shaan se lehrata rahega ... jab tak Bharat maa ki rakhsha yeh sher sipahi karta rahega
Trans: The Indian flag will flow with pride on the land of India ... as long as the brave soldiers keep protecting mother India

Title: Anna
Quote: Jowar ke bhutte ko khet mein lehrate dekhne ke liye ... jowar ke ek daane ko pehle apne aapko zameen mein kurbaan karna hota hai
Trans: To see barley corn swinging in the fields ... initially one grain of barley has to sacrifice itself in the ground

Title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
Quote: Ek bowler wicket lega ... ek acha batsman kisi match mein aapke liye run banayega, kisi match mein nahi banayega ... lekin ek acha fielder har match mein aapke liye run bachayega
Trans: A bowler will take wickets ... a good batsmen will make runs in some matches, and will not in some matches ... but a good fielder will save you runs in every match

Title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
Quote: A captain is only as good as the team
Trans: A captain is only as good as the team

Title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
Quote: Mujhe yakeen hai ki sirf shehar chote hote hai, wahan ke log aur unke khwaab nahi ... mujhe yakeen hai aadmi ka kadh uske iraadon se naapa jaata hai ... mujhe yakeen hai naseeb ki baat sirf woh karte hai joh kabhi bhi maidaan mein utre hi nahi ... mujhe yakeen hai ki thakaan aur pressure sirf ek bhram hai ... mujhe yakeen hai haar aur jeet ke beech ka faasla bada hai, par namumkin nahi ... karo yakeen toh duniya tumhari
Trans: I'm confident that only cities are small, not the people from there or their dreams ... I'm confident that the height of a person is measured by his intentions ... I'm confident that only those who have never stepped on a playground talk about luck ... I'm confident that fatigue and pressure are both just a misconception ... I'm confident that the distance between losing and winning is big, but not impossible ... if you're confident then the world will be yours

Title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
Quote: Life mein sab ball ek samaan thodi na milega ... merit pe khelna hai aur tike rehna hai ... the score board will keep moving
Trans: In life you won't face the same ball always ... you've to play on merit and just hang in there ... the score board will keep moving

Title: MSG The Warrior: Lion Heart
Quote: Jab tak main is dhari pe zinda hoon ... meri talwar unki raksha karti rahegi
Trans: Till the time I'm alive on this earth ... my sword will keep protecting them

Title: MSG The Warrior: Lion Heart
Quote: Sher dahaadte hai toh kaanpte huye geedhar girte hai ... hum toh woh hai joh sheron ke mooh mein haath daalke unke daant ginte hai
Trans: When a lion roars then jackals shiver and fall down ... I'm someone who puts his hand in the mouth of a lion and counts his teeth

Title: MSG The Warrior: Lion Heart
Quote: Toofan kisi waqt ka mohtaj nahi hota ... unka toh jab mann kiya aaye aur tabahi machakar chale gaye
Trans: A storm is never dependent on time ... it comes whenever it wants to and creates a catastrophe and leaves

Title: Zorro
Quote: Aurat maa ban sakti hai, behan ban sakti hai, biwi ban sakti hai ... lekin dost kabhi nahi ... aur jab woh dost ban jaati hai toh badi khatarnak hoti hai
Trans: A woman can become a mother, a sister, a wife ... but she can never become a friend ... and if she becomes a friend then she's very dangerous

Title: Zorro
Quote: Inquilaab bhookhe pet se pehda hota hai ... aur inquilaab ki aag bade bade rajmahalon ko jalakar khaakh kar daalti hai
Trans: Revolution starts with an empty stomach ... and the fire of revolution can burn big mansions into ashes

Title: Zorro
Quote: Sadu, samay aur jal kabhi ek jagah nahi tikte ... suraj ki tarah chalte hi rehte hai
Trans: A saint, time and water can never stay in one place ... they keep moving like the sun

Title: Zorro
Quote: Joh talwar ke sahare jeeta hai ... woh talwar se hi maara jaata hai
Trans: The one who lives on the support of a sword ... dies from a sword

Title: Anari
Quote: Tum chokri log ka yahi toh musibat hai ... haar shringaar mein aadhi zindagi apni aur intezar mein aadhi zindagi doosre ka barbaad kar deta hai
Trans: You girls have this problem ... you waste half your life in getting ready and waste half of someone else's life in making them wait

Title: Anari
Quote: Aaj ka kaam kal karo, kal ka kaam parso ... itni jaldi kya hai, jab jeena hai barso
Trans: Do today's work tomorrow, do tomorrow's work day after ... why are you in such a hurry, when you have to live for years

Title: Wajah Tum Ho
Quote: Dil mein tum ho, dhadkan mein tum ho, meri har raah ki manzil bhi tum ho ... ab aur iske aage main kya kahoon ... mere jeene ki wajah tum ho
Trans: You're in my heart, you're in my heartbeats, you're the destination of every path of mine ... now what more can I say beyond this ... you're the reason why I'm living

Title: Wajah Tum Ho
Quote: Qatil koi aur hi hai ... yeh pata lagane mein hi toh is vardi ki shaan hai ... varna vardiyan toh kiraye pe bhi milti hai
Trans: The killer is someone else ... the pride of this police uniform lies in finding him ... otherwise you get police uniforms on rent as well

Title: Wajah Tum Ho
Quote: Crime aur sharaab jitni purani ho jaye ... utni keemat badhti hai
Trans: The more older crime and alcohol become ... their value increases that much

Title: Wajah Tum Ho
Quote: Aaj is bhatakti khushboo ko thikana de do ... main agar baarish hoon toh tumpe toot jaane ki izaazat de do
Trans: Today, give some settlement to this vagrant fragrance ... if I'm the rains, then give me permission to pour on you

Title: Shivaay
Quote: Zaroorat se zyada kabhi usse maanga nahi ... zaroorat se kam kabhi usne diya nahi
Trans: I've never asked God for more than what I need ... and God has never given me less than what I need

Title: Shivaay
Quote: Na aadi na anth hai uska ... woh sabka na inka unka ... wohi shunya hai, wohi ikai ... jiske bheetar basa Shivaay ... aankh moondkar dekh raha hai ... saath samay ke khel raha hai ... Mahadev maha ekaki ... jiske liye jagat hai jagi ... wohi shunya hai, wohi ikai ... jiske bheetar basa Shivaay ... Ram bhi uska, Ravan uska ... jeevan uska maran bhi uska ... tandav hai aur dhyan bhi woh hai ... agyani ka gyan bhi woh hai ... isko kaanta lage na kankar ... rann mein Rudra, gharon mein Shankar ... anth yahi sare vighno ka ... is bhole ka vaar bhayankar ... wohi shunya hai, wohi ikai ... jiske bheetar basa Shivaay
Trans: He has no beginning or end ... he is for everyone, not just one ... he is zero as well as one ... the one in whom resides Lord Shiva ... he is watching with closed eyes ... he is playing with time ... the God of Gods is the loneliest ... for him the world is just an exhibit ... he is zero as well as one ... the one in whom resides Lord Shiva ... Lord Rama as well as Ravan belong to him ... life as well as death belong to him ... he is chaos as well as meditation ... he is knowledge for the ignorant ... he does not get hurt by thorns or stones ... he is strong in the battlefield and Shankar at home ... he ends all the troubles ... the attack of this innocent one is fierce ... he is zero as well as one ... the one in whom resides Lord Shiva

Title: Shivaay
Quote: Mulaqaton ko din aur hafton se kyun gina jaata hai ... saanson se kyun nahi ... agar saanson se gina jaaye toh lagega ... bahut lambi umar hai is kam umar rishtey ki
Trans: Why do we count meetings in days and weeks ... why not in breaths ... if you count them by breaths then it'll feel like ... our short lived relationship has a very long life

Title: Shivaay
Quote: Joh shivaay ban jaaye ... usse kuch aur ban'ne ki zaroorat nahi
Trans: The one who becomes like Lord Shiva ... he has no need to become anything else

Title: Befikre
Quote: (Hum kyun nahi ek doosre ko I love you jaisi stupid baatein bolenge) ... Kyun ki phir sab emotional ho jaata hai, senty ho jaata hai aur masti ka the end ho jaata hai
Trans: (Why won't we say stupid things like I love you to each other) ... Because then everything becomes emotional, everything becomes sentimental and the fun ends

Title: Befikre
Quote: (Palatne nahi wala hai) ... Palatne ka wait toh 90's mein karte the log ... I was just checking out his a**
Trans: (He's not going to turn around) ... people in the 90's used to wait for someone to turn around ... I was just checking out his a**

Title: Befikre
Quote: Love na ek bungee jump hai ... dum hai toh kood pado ... safe landing ki koi guarantee nahi hai, toh safety ka socho hi mat ... jisne socha woh sochta hi reh gaya ... aur joh kooda woh udta hi raha
Trans: Love is like a bungee jump ... if you have the courage then jump ... there is no guarantee of safe landing, hence don't think about safety ... the one who kept thinking, was left behind thinking ... and the one who jumped, kept on flying

Title: Befikre
Quote: Pyar mein padna is like investing in mutual funds ... hum sabko lagta hai baad mein jab mature hoga na, tab return dega ... joh hum nahi sochte hai woh yeh hai ... ki investing in mutual funds is subject to market risk
Trans: Falling in love is like investing in mutual funds ... we all think that it'll give us returns when it'll mature ... what we don't think is that ... investing in mutual funds is subject to market risk

Title: Dard
Quote: Koi bhi insaan janam se bura nahi hota ... pyar ki kami, galat saathi aur bura mahool insaan ko gumrah kar dete hai
Trans: No human is evil from birth ... lack of love, bad companions and an evil environment misguide a person

Title: Dard
Quote: Rooh ko dard mila, dard ko aankhen na mili ... tujhko mehsoos kiya hai, tujhe dekha toh nahi ... dard ki raah se guzre toh zamana jaane ... aap ka mujhse, mera aap se rishta kya hai
Trans: My soul found pain, the pain didn't find my eyes ... I've felt you, but I haven't see you ... if you pass through the path of pain then the world will know ... what is our relationship

Title: Dard
Quote: Pyar paise se nahi khareeda ja sakta ... usse paane ke liye toh puja karni padti hai
Trans: You can't buy love with money ... you have to pray to attain love

Title: Dard
Quote: Pyar toh bhagwan ka vardaan hai aur paisa insaan ka banaya hua zehar ... zaada ho jaane par usse maar dalta hai
Trans: Love is a blessing of God and money is poison made by humans ... it kills a human when it's in excess

Title: Dangal
Quote: Agar silver jeeti toh aaj nahi toh kal log tanne bhool javenge ... gold jeeti toh misaal ban javegi ... aur misaalein di jaati hai beta, bhooli nahi jaati
Trans: If you win the silver medal then either today or tomorrow people will forget you ... but you'll become an example if you win the gold medal ... and examples are given, you don't forget them

Title: Dangal
Quote: Gold toh gold hota hai ... chhora lave ya chhori
Trans: A gold medal is a gold medal ... whether a boy gets it or a girl

Title: Dangal
Quote: Medalist pedh pe nahi ughte ... unhe banana padta hai ... pyar se, mehnat se, lagan se
Trans: Medalist don't grow on trees ... you have to nurture them ... with love, with hard work, with dedication

Title: Dangal
Quote: Dangal ladne se pehle dar se ladna padta hai
Trans: Before you fight you need to fight with your fear

Title: 31st October
Quote: Naino se naino ke teer chalte hai toh pakad mein nahi aate ... magar jab kisi ke liye honth kuch karate hai toh phool jadte hai
Trans: When the eyes of two people connect then you can't catch them ... but when your lips make you do something for someone, then it's like flowers are falling

Title: 31st October
Quote: Kisi ke liye acha karna kabhi bekaar nahi jaata
Trans: Doing a good thing for someone never goes to waste

Title: 31st October
Quote: Meri Sikhi sirf mere kesuyon mein nahi hai
Trans: The qualities of me being a Sikh are not just in my hair

Title: Kaabil
Quote: Aadmi ka khud pe bharosa, uski taqat hoti hai
Trans: A person's strength is the confidence he has on himself

Title: Kaabil
Quote: Andhere mein agar kisi ka saath ho na ... toh andhera kam lagta hai
Trans: In darkness, if you have the company of someone  ... then the darkness feels less dark

Title: Kaabil
Quote: Yeh khel unhone shuru kiya tha ... tamasha aap logon ne dekha ... khatam main karoonga
Trans: They had started this game ... you guys saw the entertainment ... but I'll finish it

Title: Kaabil
Quote: Aapki aankhen toh khuli rahengi, par aap kuch dekh nahi payenge ... aapke kaan khule rahenge, par aap kuch sun nahi payenge ... aur sabse badi baat ... aap sab kuch samajh jaaoge, par aage kisi ko samjha nahi payenge
Trans: Your eyes will be open, but you won't be able to see anything ... your ears will be open, but you won't be able to listen anything ... and the main thing will be that ... you'll understand everything, but you won't be able to explain to others

Title: Akashdeep
Quote: Jab tak mehnat karne waale haath aur sapna dekhne waala dimaag ek nahi ho jaate ... ek hi manzil par pahunchne ke liye hum sab mein se koi aage nahi badh sakta
Trans: Until the hands that work hard and the mind that sees the dream come together ... none of us can move forward towards our destination

Title: Akashdeep
Quote: Ek din sabko marna hai ... nahi marta toh do cheez ... life aur death
Trans: One day everyone has to die ... only two things never die ... life and death

Title: Saat Uchakkey
Quote: Achievementon ka na koi shortcut nahi hota ... bas naik iraade aur mazboot hausle hone chahiye ... bas phir cycle gol gol hi sahi, manzil pe pahunch hi jayegi ek din
Trans: Achievements don't have a shortcut ... you just need honest intentions and a strong morale ... then no matter what, the cycle will one day reach its destination

Title: Saat Uchakkey
Quote: Kitna mushkil hai mohabbat ki kahani likhna ... jaise pani se, pani pe, pani likhna
Trans: It's very hard to write a story of love ... it's like writing water, on water, with water

Title: Saat Uchakkey
Quote: Aaye hai toh jayenge ... raja, runk, fakeer ... ek sinhasan chhad chale ... duja bandhe zanjeer
Trans: Everyone has come ... king, pauper, beggar ... one sat on the throne ... and the other was in shackles

Title: Saat Uchakkey
Quote: Do not let his wonder steal your thunder
Trans: Do not let his wonder steal your thunder

Title: Mere Jeevan Saathi (1972)
Quote: Aaj kal sirf do kisam ki painting ki demand hai ... ek woh joh raeeson ke bedroom ki shobha bada sake ... aur doosri woh joh kisi ki samajh mein na aa sake
Trans: These days only two types of painting are in demand ... first those which look good in the bedroom of rich people ... and second those which no one can understand

Title: Mere Jeevan Saathi (1972)
Quote: Dil hi toh ek aisi cheez hai insaan ke paas jiska sauda nahi kiya ja sakta
Trans: The heart is the only one thing that a human has, which can't be traded

Title: Mere Jeevan Saathi (1972)
Quote: Aag, pani, thandi sadak, taad ka pedh ... thandi ka mausam, oon wali bedh
Trans: Fire, water, cold road, palm tree ... the winter season, a woolen blanket

Title: Dharti Kahe Pukar Ke
Quote: Jis tarah jhoot jhoot chilakar sach ko jhoot nahi banaya ja sakta ... us hi tarah sach sach chilakar jhoot ko sach nahi banaya ja sakta
Trans: Like you can't shout lie lie and prove the truth to be a lie ... just like that you can't shout truth truth and prove a lie to be the truth

Title: Dharti Kahe Pukar Ke
Quote: Taleem aur libaas se aadmi ki appearance badli ja sakti hai ... uska character nahi badla ja sakta
Trans: With education and clothing you can change the appearance of a person ... but not his character

Title: Parichay
Quote: Yeh raajneeti ke chakkar toh bas do kisam ke logon ko raas aate hai ... ek toh woh jinke ghar khane peene ki fikar na ho ... aur doosre woh jinke ghar khane peene ko kuch na ho
Trans: Politics only works for two kinds of people ... first those who don't have to worry about food in their house ... and second those who have nothing to eat in their house

Title: Hindustan Ki Kasam (1973)
Quote: Hai tere saath meri wafa, main nahi toh kya ... zinda rahega pyar mera, main nahi toh kya
Trans: My loyalty will be with you, even if I'm not there ... my love will be alive, even if I'm not there

Title: Hindustan Ki Kasam (1973)
Quote: Is jawaan ki kasam ... jawab dene aaunga, Hindustan ki kasam
Trans: I swear on this soldier ... I'll come to give a reply, I swear on India

Title: Hindustan Ki Kasam (1973)
Quote: Hindustan ke bahar bhi zameen ke jis tukde par meri raakh bhikregi ... woh zameen hamesha ke liye Hindustan ho jayegi
Trans: Even outside of India, the piece of land on which my ashes will scatter ... that piece of land will turn into India forever

Title: Hindustan Ki Kasam (1973)
Quote: Himmat haarke behte rahe, apna yeh dastoor nahi ... hum manzil se door sahi, manzil humse door nahi
Trans: It's not in my habit to sit around losing my courage ... I may be far from the destination, but the destination is not far from me

Title: Dongri Ka Raja
Quote: Hamara dhande ka usool hai ... daudte hue ghode par baazi lagao ... agar ghoda langda ho jaaye toh usse goli maar do
Trans: It's the policy of our business ... bet on a horse who is already running ... if the horse becomes lame, then shoot him

Title: Dongri Ka Raja
Quote: Joh haan bole usse chhod deta hoon ... joh na bole usse todh deta hoon
Trans: Those who say yes, I leave them alone ... and those who say no, I break them apart

Title: Dongri Ka Raja
Quote: Aankhen band karoon toh us hi ka chehra ... aankhen kholon toh us hi ka khayal ... raat raat bhar karvatein badalkar jaagta raha ... tabhi toh bana gaya hai tera yeh haal
Trans: When I close my eyes, I only see her face ... when I open my eyes, I'm only thinking about her ... all night long I was awake twisting and turning ... that's why your condition is like this

Title: Dongri Ka Raja
Quote: Jabse tune yeh haath thaama hai, sambhal gaya hoon ... bas ab yeh haath mat chhodna, kisak jaaonga
Trans: Since you've held this hand, I've stabilized ... now just don't leave this hand, or else I'll go rogue

Title: Dear Zindagi
Quote: Don't let the past blackmail your present ... to ruin a beautiful future
Trans: Don't let the past blackmail your present ... to ruin a beautiful future

Title: Dear Zindagi
Quote: Genius woh nahi hota jiske paas har sawaal ka jawab ho ... genius woh hota hai jiske paas har jawaab tak pahunchne ka patience ho
Trans: A person who has the answer to every question is not a genius ... a genius is a person who has the patience to get to every answer

Title: Dear Zindagi
Quote: Kabhi kabhi hum mushkil rasta sirf is liye chunte hai ... kyun ki humein lagta hai, important cheezein paane ke liye humein mushkil rasta apnana chahiye ... apne aap ko punish karna bahut zaroori samajhte hai ... but why, aasaan rasta kyun nahi chun sakte ... kya burai hai us mein ... khaas karke jab us mushkil ka saamna karne ke liye hum taiyaar hi nahi hai
Trans: Sometimes we choose a difficult path only because ... we feel that to attain important things we need to choose a difficult path ... we think that it's important to punish ourselves ... but why can't we choose a simple path ... what's wrong with that ... especically when we are not ready to face that difficult path

Title: Dear Zindagi
Quote: Jab hum apne aap ko achchi tarah samajh lete hai ... toh doosre kya samajhte hai, it doesn't matter ... not at all
Trans: When we understand ourselves well enough ... then it doesn't matter what others think about us ... not at all

Title: Ishq Junoon
Quote: Galat tareekon se haasil karne wali mahatvakanksha ek aag ki tarah hoti hai ... joh jalakar sone jaisi chamak toh de sakti hai ... par jalakar raakh bhi kar sakti hai
Trans: The ambitions that you attain in the wrong way are like fire ... they can burn you and give you the shine of gold ... but they can also burn you into ashes

Title: Ishq Junoon
Quote: It's good to be hated for what you are ... rather than loved for what you are not
Trans: It's good to be hated for what you are ... rather than loved for what you are not

Title: Zamaana Deewana
Quote: Tumhare pyar mein dil bekarar kab se hai ... ab aa bhi jaao, mujhe intezar kab se hai
Trans: My heart is restless in your love since a long time ... please come, I've been waiting for you since a long time

Title: Zamaana Deewana
Quote: Aap kamai mein joh maza hai na ... woh maza na baap kamai mein hai, na paap kamai mein hai
Trans: The enjoyment that you get from earning money by yourself ... you don't get that enjoyment from the money received from your father or the money earned from evil things

Title: Zamaana Deewana
Quote: Har mumkin pehle namumkin hi hota hai ... aur har haqeeqat pehle khwaab hi hoti hai
Trans: Everything possible is initially impossible ... and everything real is initially a dream

Title: Zamaana Deewana
Quote: Main jab naachta hoon na ... toh pair floor par nahi, haseeno ke dil par padte hai
Trans: When I dance ... then my feet don't step on the floor, they step on the hearts of beautiful women

Title: Raees
Quote: Joh dhande ke liye sahi woh sahi ... joh dhande ke liye galat woh galat ... isse zyada kabhi socha nahi
Trans: What is right for the business, is right ... what is wrong for the business, is wrong ... I've never thought anything more than that

Title: Raees
Quote: Koi dhanda chota nahi hota aur dhande se bada koi dharam nahi hota
Trans: No business is small and no religion is bigger than business

Title: Raees
Quote: Baniye ka dimaag ... miya bhai ki daring
Trans: I have a sharp mind like a merchant ... and I'm fearless like a warrior

Title: Raees
Quote: Gujarat ki hawa mein vyapar hai saheb ... meri saans toh rok loge ... lekin is hawa ko kaise rokoge
Trans: There is business in the air of Gujarat ... you can stop my breaths ... but how will you stop this air

Title: Ok Jaanu
Quote: Jab do log ek saath pyar mein rehte hai ... toh aadat pad jaati hai ek doosre ki ... aur waqt aane pad na aadat chhut'ti hai na pyar
Trans: When two people live together being in love ... then you get habituated with each other ... and when the time comes you can't leave the habit nor your love

Title: Ok Jaanu
Quote: (Yeh joh hum kar rahe hai, yeh theek hai) ... Ghor paap hai ... lekin yeh paap na baar baar karne se dhul jaata hai
Trans: (What we are doing, is that alright) ... It's a big sin ... but committing this sin again and again, wipes it

Title: Sanam
Quote: Zindagi imtihan leti hai aur joh aadmi us imtihan mein first aata hai ... woh asli hero kehlata hai
Trans: Life always tests us and the person who comes first in that test ... that person is called as the real hero

Title: Sanam
Quote: Jab tum paas hoti ho toh waqt kitni jaldi guzar jaata hai ... aur jab tum nahi hoti ho toh waqt kaate nahi kat'ta
Trans: When you're with me then time passes by very fast ... and when you're not there with me then it's hard to spend that time

Title: Sanam
Quote: Yeh prem rog bada khatarnak rog hota hai ... iska ilaaj toh sirf ussi ke paas hota hai jis insaan ko prem ho jaata hai ... varna yeh aisi jaan leva bimari hai ... ke iska ilaaj toh kisi vaid ke paas bhi nahi hota
Trans: The disease of love is a very dangerous thing ... only a person in love has the cure to that ... or else it's a killer disease ... and no doctor has the cure to this

Title: Chhoti Si Mulaqat
Quote: Samaaj mein rehke samaaj se bair nahi kiya ja sakta
Trans: You can't live in the society and have animosity with the society

Title: Chhoti Si Mulaqat
Quote: Tujhe dekha, tujhe chaaha, tujhe puja maine ... bas itni khatta hai meri, aur khatta kya
Trans: I saw you, I loved you, I worshipped you ... only that's my mistake, and nothing else

Title: Chhoti Si Mulaqat
Quote: Jeevan bhar sada buddhi ke sahare nahi jeeya jata ... kuch pal aise bhi aate hai jab shraddha ka sahara lena padta hai
Trans: You can't live your entire life with your mind ... a few moments come in which you have to take the support of your faith

Title: Bundal Baaz
Quote: Insaan ka charitra uske safed kapdon se hai ... safed kapda subah pehna, agar shaam tak vaise hi rahe ... toh insaan ka dil sacha hai ... woh aadmi saaf hai ... bolo kya khayal hai
Trans: The character of a person can be known from his white clothes ... if the white clothes that he wears in the morning, stays the same till the evening ... then the heart of that person is pure ... and that person is a honest person ... what do you think

Title: Bundal Baaz
Quote: Agar dukh na ho ... toh aane wale sukh ka aadmi maza bhi nahi le sakta
Trans: If sadness is not there ... then a person won't be able to enjoy the happiness that comes his way

Title: Bundal Baaz
Quote: Kastoori ki mehak aur bhookhe ka chehra ... chupaye nahi chupta
Trans: The aroma of musk and the face of a hungry person ... can't stay hidden

Title: Bundal Baaz
Quote: Banakar faqeeron ka hum bhes ghalib ... tamasha-e-ahl-e-karam dekhte hai
Trans: Hey poet, in the guise of a beggar ... I see the spectacle of generocity

Title: Rangoon
Quote: Tujhe samjhana jaise haathi ko chaddi pehnana hai
Trans: Explaining something to you is as tough as making an elephant wear an underwear

Title: Rangoon
Quote: Mohabbat bahut chota lafz hai ... meri jaan band hai tum mein
Trans: Love is a very small word ... without you, I have no reason to live

Title: Rangoon
Quote: Tumhe pata hai uparwala khoobsurat ladkiyon ko itna bewakoof kyun banata hai ... (kyun?) ... khoobsurat yoon ke tum jaise log usse mohabbat kar sake ... aur bewakoof ke woh tum jaison se mohabbat kar sake
Trans: Do you why God makes beautiful girls so foolish ... (why?) ... he makes them beautiful so that guys like you can fall in love with them ... and foolish so that they can fall in love with guys like you

Title: Rangoon
Quote: (Apni jaan se bhi keemti kuch aur hai kya?) ... Hai, woh ke jiske liye mara jaa sake
Trans: (Is there anything more important than your own life?) ... There is, the one for whom you're willing to die

Title: The Ghazi Attack
Quote: Itihaas mein hum ho na ho ... lekin Hindustan ke bhavishya mein hum zaroor honge
Trans: Whether we become a part of history or not ... but we'll definitely be there in the future of India

Title: The Ghazi Attack
Quote: Jung joh hai na, shaheed hokar nahi ... dushman ko shaheed karke jeeti jaati hai
Trans: You don't win a war by becoming a martyr ... you win it by making your enemy a martyr

Title: The Ghazi Attack
Quote: Jeet ek aisi cheez hai joh khud chalkar tumhare paas nahi aayegi ... usse ladkar haasil karna padta hai
Trans: Victory is something that won't come to you by itself ... you'll have to fight for it to attain it

Title: The Ghazi Attack
Quote: Kya hai sainik hona ... aaj hamare desh ka kisaan kheton mein logon ke liye anaaj ugha raha hai ... bina kisi fikr ke, kyun ... kyun ki usse pata hai ki seema par hum khade hai ... maa har subah khushi khushi apne bachon ko school chhodkar aati hai ... uske mann mein koi dar nahi hota, kyun ... kyun ki usse pata hai ki seema par hum khade hai ... is desh ka har ek insaan, har roz kadi mehnat karta hai ... apne pariwar ke bhavishya ke liye ... apne bachon ki tarakki ke liye ... usse unki suraksha ki koi chinta nahi hoti, kyun ... kyun ki usse pata hai ki seema par hum khade hai aur rahenge ... is bharose ko nibhana, yeh hota hai sainik hona
Trans: What does it mean to be a soldier ... today the farmer of our country is growing food for our people ... without any tensions, why is that ... because he knows that we're protecting the border ... a mother happily drops her children to the school ... she has no fear in her heart, why is that ... because she knows that we're protecting the border ... every citizen of this country works hard everyday ... for the future of his family ... for the well being of his children ... he doesn't worry about their safety, why is that .... because he knows that we're protecting the border and we'll keep protecting it ... fulfilling this confidence is what is called to be a soldier

Title: Irada
Quote: Jalte ghar ko dekhne walon phoos ka chappar aapka hai ... aag ke peeche tezz hawa, aage muqadar aapka hai
Trans: People who look at burning houses, remember that your roof is also made from grass ... there's a gust of wind behind the fire, hence the destiny ahead will be yours

Title: Irada
Quote: Sirf hungama khada karna mera maqsad nahi, mera maqsad nahi meri koshish hai yeh soorat badalni chahiye ... aaj yeh deewaar parde ki tarah hilne lagi, sharat yeh thi lekin ki buniyaad hilni chahiye ... meere seene mein na sahi, tumhare seene mein sahi ... ho kahin bhi aag, lekin aag jalni chahiye
Trans: It's not my intention to just make a blast, it's my attempt that the faces must change ... today this wall is shaking like a curtain, but the bet was to shake the foundation ... if not in my heart, then atleast in your heart ... it doesn't matter where the fire is, but the fire must keep on burning

Title: Irada
Quote: Mutthi mein band hai maut ka khel ... dekh raha hai tujhe aasmaan se sohail
Trans: The game of death is locked in your fist ... the stars are staring at you from the sky

Title: Irada
Quote: Jungle mein sirf ek sher hota hai ... aur shehar mein sirf ek khalifa ... baki joh hote hai woh sirf hote hai
Trans: There can only be one tiger in a jungle ... and there can only be one successor in a city ... everyone else is just useless

Title: Aa Gaya Hero
Quote: Main na idhar dekhta hoon na udhar dekhta hoon ... bahut sochne ke baad kahin dekhta hoon
Trans: I don't look here and neither do I look there ... I look somewhere only after thinking a lot

Title: Aa Gaya Hero
Quote: Na saboot dhoondta hoon, na gawah dhoondta hoon ... mujrim nazar aa jaye toh chane ki tarah bhoonta hoon
Trans: I don't search for evidence, neither do I search for a witness ... if I see a criminal, then I crush him like peanuts

Title: Aa Gaya Hero
Quote: Naam pooche se pehle diaper toh pehan lo ... saaf kya tumhara baap karega
Trans: Wear a diaper before you ask my name ... otherwise who's going to clean, will it be your dad

Title: Aa Gaya Hero
Quote: Yeh teen cheezein kaafi khatarnak hoti hai ... kaala coat, safed coat aur petticoat ... pata nahi kitne ghus gaye
Trans: These three things are very dangerous ... black coat of lawyers, white coat of doctors and petticoat ... who knows how many people have been lost in them

Title: Badrinath Ki Dulhania
Quote: Hum hamesha sochte the ... jis se shaadi karenge na hum, uski zindagi ban jayegi ... par tumko dekhne ke baad humko aisa lagta hai ... ki jis se tumhari shaadi hogi na, uski zindagi ban jayegi
Trans: I always thought that ... the person whom I'll marry, that person's life will be set ... but after seeing you I feel that ... the person that you marry, that person's life will be set

Title: Badrinath Ki Dulhania
Quote: Hamare desh mein bache ke janam se hi uski balance sheet ban'ne lagti hai ... ladka equal to asset ... ladki equal to liability ... asset ke janam ki khushi mein boondi ke laddu bat'te hai aur liability ke janam ke mauke pe saste pedhe ... ladka kitna bhi nalayak ho, uski value badhti hi jaati hai ... aur ladki kitni bhi honhaar ho, uski entry asset column mein nahi hoti
Trans: In our country a child's balance sheet is created right from their birth ... a boy is an asset ... a girl is a liability ... you distribute expensive sweets when an asset is born and you distribute cheap sweets when a liability is born ... no matter how useless the boy is, his value keeps on increasing ... and no matter how intelligent the girl is, she never gets added into the asset column

Title: Badrinath Ki Dulhania
Quote: Poore duniya mein sabse kamzor dil ek Indian baap ka hota hai
Trans: The heart of an Indian father is the weakest in the world

Title: Badrinath Ki Dulhania
Quote: Arre yeh tedha mooh karke kyun smile kar rahe ho ... Shahrukh Khan ho kya?
Trans: Why are smiling with a twisted face ... are you Shahrukh Khan or what?

Title: Wedding Anniversary

Trans: A shroud doesn't have a pocket, a grave doesn't have a safe and the messengers of death don't take bribe

Title: Wedding Anniversary
Quote: Sarphire hi itihaas likhte hai ... samajhdar usse padhte hai
Trans: Crazy people create history ... and the smart people just read it

Title: Wedding Anniversary

Trans: The relationships these days are like this ice cube ... they lose their existence the moment they fall in the water

Title: Wedding Anniversary
Quote: Zindagi ka har pal aakhri samajhkar jeena chahiye ... tab zindagi ka asli maza aata hai
Trans: You should live every moment of life as if it's the last moment ... only then you realize the real fun of life

Title: San 75 (Pachattar)

Trans: By nature we're all animals ... it's just that some people are compelled to hunt ... and some people hunt for hobby

Title: San 75 (Pachattar)
Quote: Aadmi ke vikaas ke charan teen ... bandar, aadmi aur machine
Trans: There are three steps of human development ... monkey, human and machine

Title: Jolly LLB 2

Trans: The day I come to my skin ... by god that day I'll turn your respect into a packet and I'll push it up your a*s ... you won't be able to fart and neither will you be able to shit

Trans: This time in English even Barack Obama's mother won't be able to fail you

Title: Jolly LLB 2
Quote: Bekaar aadmi kuch kiya kar ... kapde udherkar siya kar
Trans: Hey useless person, please do something ... tear the clothes and stitch them again

Title: Jolly LLB 2

Trans: Right when I saw your frog like face, I understood that you'll jump a lot

Title: Jeena Isi Ka Naam Hai
Quote: Main sari duniya se tumhare liye ladh sakta hoon ... lekin main tumse nahi ladh sakta
Trans: I can fight with the entire world for you ... but I can't fight with you

Trans: It doesn't matter what should happen and what shouldn't ... what matters is what happens in reality

Title: Jeena Isi Ka Naam Hai
Quote: Arz-e-niyaz-e-ishq ke kaabil nahi raha ... jis dil pe naaz tha mujhe, woh dil dil nahi raha
Trans: I wasn't worthy for the blessings of love ... the heart that I was proud about, that heart is no more a heart

Title: Jeena Isi Ka Naam Hai
Quote: Kabhi dosti rahi, kabhi dushmani rahi ... apne ishq ki taqdeer thodi kam hi rahi ... har baar koshish ki, har baar manaya khud ko ... shayad in haathon ki kismat kuch kam hi rahi
Trans: Sometimes there was friendship, sometimes there was enmity ... the destiny of my love was not that great ... I tried many times, I cajoled myself many times ... but may be the destiny in my hands was not that great

Title: Coffee With D
Quote: Yeh dekhne mein shareef hai lekin sharafat bhi pani bharti hai inke aage
Trans: He looks innocent from his face, but in reality there's nothing honest about him

Title: Coffee With D
Quote: Mujhse related sari cheezein world mein ban hai ... toh mere glasses bhi Ray-Ban hi honge na
Trans: Everything related to me is banned in the world ... hence my glasses should also be Ray-Ban

Title: Coffee With D
Quote: Hollywood ke alava main porn dekhna pasand karta hoon ... kahani is mein bhi nahi hoti, kahani us mein bhi nahi hoti ... action zaroor hota hai
Trans: Other than Hollywood, I like to watch watch porn ... as there's no story in either of them ... but yes, there's definitely action

Title: Coffee With D
Quote: Desh naam se nahi, logon se banta hai
Trans: A country develops due to its people, and not due to its name

Title: Machine
Quote: Main tumhari honthon ki lipstick zaroor kharab karoonga ... par tumhari aankhon ka kajal kabhi nahi
Trans: I'll definitely spoil the lipstick on your lips ... but I'll never spoil the kohl in your eyes

Title: Machine
Quote: Tera junoon hai sar pe chhada ... mujhe na sukoon hai, karde riha ... haal yeh mera dekh zara ... hosh hai baaki mujh mein kahan
Trans: Your passion is all over me ... I'm not at peace, please release me ... look at my condition ... I've totally lost my senses

Title: Machine
Quote: Main brake par paon nahi rakhta ... kyun ki mujhe maut se dar nahi lagta
Trans: I don't keep my foot on the brake ... because I don't fear death

Title: Machine
Quote: Main tumhare jism se khoon nahi ... tumhari aankhon se aansun dekhna chahti hoon ... main tumhe marte huye nahi ... tadapte huye dekhna chahti hoon
Trans: I don't want to see blood from your body ... I want to see tears from your eyes ... I don't want to see you dying ... I want to see you tormenting

Title: Sarkar 3
Quote: Joh usoolon ke raaste pe chalte hai ... unke dost kam hote hai aur dushman zyada
Trans: Those who walk on the path of principles ... they have less friends and more enemies

Title: Sarkar 3
Quote: Kal main rahun ya na rahun, jiyun ya na jiyun ... toh kya, koi farak nahi padta ... kyun ki meri amanat aap hai, meri vasihat aap hai, meri sarkar aap hai
Trans: Whether tomorrow I'm here or not, whether I'm alive or not ... so what, it doesn't matter ... since you're my deposit, you're my will, you're my ruler

Title: Sarkar 3
Quote: Lalach aur darr kisi ko bhi gaddar bana dete hai
Trans: Greed and fear can turn anyone into a traitor

Title: Sarkar 3
Quote: Har achchai ki koi nirdharit keemat hoti hai ... woh chahe paisa ho, gyan ho, ya phir dard ... aur dard ki keemat chukani padti hai
Trans: Every bit of kindness has some price on it ... be it money, or knowledge, or pain ... and one has to pay the price of pain

Title: Commando 2
Quote: Desh ki seva karne mein joh maze hai na ... woh kisi aur mein nahi hai
Trans: The satisfaction that you get from serving your country ... you don't get that satisfaction from anything else

Title: Commando 2

Trans: It's hard to decide ... whether you start flirting when you see danger ... or the danger increases when you flirt

Title: Commando 2
Quote: Khamoshi khatre ki nishani hoti hai
Trans: Silence is the sign of danger

Title: Commando 2

Trans: If you do something like this one more time ... then I'm saying that I'll be totally in love with you ... and I'll stick a couple of kisses on your lips

Title: Running Shaadi
Quote: Hum kabhi why nahi sochte ... hum why not sochte hai
Trans: We never think why ... we think why not

Title: Running Shaadi
Quote: Yeh bandhi teri life ka virus hai
Trans: This girl is the virus of your life

Title: Anaarkali Of Aarah
Quote: Haathi chale bazaar ... kutta hagge hazaar
Trans: The elephant is going to the market ... and the dog is shitting a thousand times

Title: Anaarkali Of Aarah
Quote: Mooh mein aag hai babu aur choli mein angaare hai ... tere jaise kitne sagar is garmi se haare hai
Trans: There's fire in my mouth and embers in my blouse ... so many oceans like you have lost in front of my warmth

Title: Anaarkali Of Aarah
Quote: Har ek nabz kala ke liye dhadakti hai ... dawa bhi woh joh jale par namak chidhakti hai
Trans: Every pulse of mine beats for talent ... a true medicine is something that applies salt on the wound

Title: Anaarkali Of Aarah
Quote: Tere pyar mein lut gaye hum beech bazar mein ... nakad mohabbat khareed ke, dil rakh diya udhaar pe
Trans: Your love defamed me in front of everyone ... I bought love with cash and kept my heart on a loan

Title: Noor
Quote: Mumbai you're killing me ... tu bhi andar se khokli hai ... main bhi
Trans: Mumbai you're killing me ... you're empty from within ... and so am I

Title: Noor
Quote: Himmat toh josh mein aakar koi bhi dikha sakta hai ... par sabar se kaam lena yeh har kisi ke bas ki baat nahi hai ... aur yahi fark hai ek amateur aur ek professional ke beech
Trans: Anyone can show their courage in the heat of the moment ... but not everyone is capable of handling the situation with patience ... and that shows the difference between an amateur and a professional

Title: Noor
Quote: Asli bahadur woh nahi hote joh camera ke peeche sawaal poochte hai ... asli bahaduri woh dikhate hai joh camera ke samne aakar sach bolne ki himmat rakhte hai
Trans: People who ask questions behind a camera are not brave people ... instead people who have the courage to speak the truth in front of the camera are brave people

Title: Noor
Quote: Kya success ki seedi par upar aur upar chadte jaana hi sab kuch hai ... aisi success ka kya faida joh hamare apno ko humse door karde ... unko apne saath leke chalo toh aur bhi maza aayega
Trans: Is climbing the ladder of success higher and higher everything ... what's the use of that success which takes us farther from our dear ones ... take them with you and you'll enjoy it even more

Title: Naam Shabana
Quote: Kuch toh kaam karlo ... ek dum aadat chhod doge toh kaisa chalega
Trans: Please do some work ... if you'll leave your habit right away then how's it going to work

Title: Naam Shabana
Quote: Itni door se aaya hoon ... kuch toh karne do
Trans: I've come from far ... let me do something

Title: Naam Shabana
Quote: A drunk guy is a liability and a drunk girlfriend is an asset
Trans: A drunk guy is a liability and a drunk girlfriend is an asset

Title: Begum Jaan
Quote: (Ek mahine ka waqt hai, sirf ek mahina) ... Mahina humein gin'na aata hai sahab ... har baar saala laal karke jaata hai
Trans: (You have a months time, just one month) ... Sir, I know how to count a month ... every time it comes, it leaves making me red

Title: Begum Jaan
Quote: Aap jise zubaan se kotha aur dimag mein randikhana soch rahe hai na ... yeh mera ghar hai, mera watan ... aur isse pehle ke koi humein yahan se hataye ... hum uske haath, pair aur jism ka woh kya kehte hai, partition kar denge
Trans: What you're calling as a brothel and thinking as a whorehouse ... that's my house, my country ... and before anyone can remove me from here ... I'll partition their hands, legs and their entire body

Title: Begum Jaan
Quote: Baap, bhai, beta, shohar ... Begum Jaan ki chaukhat ke us paar hard mard murgha hota hai ... teen taangon wala murgha
Trans: Father, brother, son, husband ... even man outside Begum Jaan's house is a chicken ... a three legged chicken

Title: Begum Jaan
Quote: Chalti chakki dekh kar, diya kabira roye ... do paatan ke beech mein, sabit bacha na koye
Trans: Looking at the grinding stones, the poet laments ... in the middle of two wheels, nothing stays intact

Title: Phillauri
Quote: Mohabbat kis chiddiya ka naam hai, humein bhi batana ... bhor saver woh kabhi gungunaye, toh humein bhi sunana ... dikh jaye toh dikhana ... kisi roz kabhi aangan aaye, behla phuslake rok toh lenge ... mishri ki daaliyan apne haathon se uski chonch mein denge ... sikha denge usse hamara naam daurana ... seekh lenge bina parwah kiye udh jaana ... suna hai kaante pe dil khop gulaabon mein rakht bhar deta hai ... jaan dekar dil mein ghar kar leta hai ... neend chura churake, chain jodh jodhke, ek gharaunda banata hai, aahon ke jhule jhulata hai ... phir jab do din sau saal se guzarte hai hum patjhad se bhikarte hai ... woh pinjre mein band chhod, rooh ko todh marodh kisi aur chajje pe ek naya geet gaata hai ... dana tum daalo woh kisi aur ko phasata hai
Trans: Which bird is like love, tell me that ... early morning when he sings, then let me know ... if you see him, then let me know ... someday when he comes to my courtyard, I'll coax and stop him ... I'll put the sugar cubes in his mouth using my own hands ... I'll teach him how to repeat my name ... and I'll learn from him how to fly away being carefree ... I've heard that he pricks his heart with thorns and fills the flowers with his blood ... he sacrifices his life to make some room in our heart ... he steals our sleep, he builds peace and makes a house where he swings with sighs ... later when a couple days pass like a hundred years, then we disperse like the autumn season ... he breaks the cage, he twists and turns his soul, and then sings some new song on a new terrace ... you give him the food and he falls for someone else

Title: Phillauri
Quote: Ab tak sab khayali tha, abhi abhi toh jaage re ... tu hi sach, jhuk gaya tere aage re ... ab tu na chhod mirza ko, tujh bin jholi khaali re ... O sahiban ejire ki chhot hai laagi re
Trans: Until now everything was just an imagination, I've just now woken up ... you're the truth and I've bowed down in front of you ... now you don't let go your lover as I'm empty without you ... hey beloved, I'm injured from the wound of my heart

Title: Phillauri
Quote: Rab ne awaaz bhakshi hai ... awaaz nahi, mehar hai ... soch badalne ki taqat hai tum mein
Trans: God has given you this voice ... it's not a voice, it's a blessing ... you have the power to change how people think

Title: Meri Pyaari Bindu
Quote: Pyar karna bahut log sikhate hai ... par afsoos us pyar ko bhulate kaise hai ... yeh saala koi nahi sikhata
Trans: So many people teach you how to fall in love ... but how do you forget about that love ... unfortunately, no one teaches you that

Title: Meri Pyaari Bindu
Quote: Zindagi side 'A' se side 'B' ki tarah ghoomti gaano ki reel ki tarah hi toh hai ... kabhi koi gaana itna pasand hai ki khatam hone se dar lagta hai ... kabhi koi gaana poore din honthon se jaane ka naam nahi leta ... aur kabhi koi gaane ke sirf dhun yaad reh jaati hai
Trans: Life is just like a reel of tape that spins from side 'A' to side 'B' ... sometimes you love a song so much that you're worried that it'll end ... sometimes a song is there on your lips all day long ... and sometimes you can only remember the tune of a song

Title: Meri Pyaari Bindu
Quote: Kuch gaane aapki zindagi se yoon hi judh jaate hai ... unki dhun mein lipte hote hai chote badhe kisse ...  kayi saari yaadein
Trans: Some songs just connect well with your life ... wrapped around their tunes are big and small stories ... and many many memories

Title: Meri Pyaari Bindu
Quote: Zindagi ek pighalti hui ice cream ki tartah hai ... taste nahi kiya toh waste ho jayegi
Trans: Life is like a melting ice cream ... if you don't taste it, then it'll go to waste

Title: Half Girlfriend
Quote: Main tumhari girlfriend nahi hoon ... par I can be your half girlfriend
Trans: I'm not your girlfriend ... but I can be your half girlfriend

Title: Half Girlfriend
Quote: Kuch cheezein aisi toot'ti hai ki unka doobara judna possible nahi hota ... sirf daraarein reh jaati hai
Trans: Some things break in such a way that, you can't reconnect them ... only rifts are left behind

Title: Half Girlfriend
Quote: Hamari amma bachpan se sikhayi ... haaro mat ... haar ko harao
Trans: My mother has taught me this since childhood ... don't lose ... instead defeat the loss

Title: Half Girlfriend
Quote: When the heart breaks, awaaz toh nahi hoti ... but ek broken heart ko doosre broken heart ka awaaz always sunai deta hai
Trans: When the heart breaks, then there's no sound ... but a broken heart can always hear the sound of a broken heart

Title: Hindi Medium
Quote: Yeh headmaster, headmaster nahi hai ji, yeh businessman hai ... aur aaj kal padhai, padhai nahi hai ji, yeh dhanda hai dhanda
Trans: This headmaster is a businessman ... and these days education has turned into a business

Title: Hindi Medium
Quote: Gareebi mein jeena ek kala hai
Trans: Living in poverty is an art

Title: Hindi Medium
Quote: Ek France banda, German banda speak wrong English ... we no problem ... ek Indian banda say wrong English ... banda hi bekaar ho jaata hai ji
Trans: If a French person or a German person speaks bad English ... then we have no problem with that ... but if an Indian person speaks bad English ... then that person seems bad to us

Title: Hindi Medium
Quote: Customer toh God hi hota hai ... lekin biwi na Mata Rani hoti hai
Trans: Customer is God ... but a wife is Goddess

Title: Sachin: A Billion Dreams
Quote: Mere baba hamesha mujhse kehte the ... ke tumne zindagi mein cricket ko chuna hai, yeh ek baat hai ... lekin aakhir tak joh baat tumhare saath rahegi ... woh yeh hogi ki tum insaan kaise ho
Trans: My father always used told me ... it's one thing that you've chosen to play cricket in life ... but the thing that will remain with you for life ... will be the fact that, what kind of a person you are

Title: Sachin: A Billion Dreams
Quote: Cricket khelna mere liye mandir jaane ki tarah tha
Trans: For me playing cricket was the equivalent of going to the temple

Title: Sachin: A Billion Dreams
Quote: Har khiladi ko nirasha ke baad apne pairon pe khade hokar ladna zaroori hota hai
Trans: After any disappointment, it's important for every player to stand up on their feet and fight

Title: Sachin: A Billion Dreams
Quote: Bharat koi ek desh nahi hai ... ek Bharat mein hazar Bharat base huye hai
Trans: India is not a single country ... in one India there are thousands of India settled

Title: C.I.D. (1956)
Quote: Phansi aur tum mein ab utna hi faasla hai jitni ki yahan se kacheri door
Trans: The distance between you being hanged is the same as the distance between here and the court

Title: C.I.D. (1956)
Quote: Aap goli chalwa sakti hai ... chala nahi sakti ... jaan khareed sakti hai ... le nahi sakti
Trans: You can hire someone to fire the bullet ... but you yourself can't fire it ... you can buy someone's life ... but you yourself can't take it

Title: C.I.D. (1956)
Quote: Adalat sachai ki jaanch partaal karti hai ... wahan dilon ki gawaiyan pesh nahi hoti
Trans: The court investigates the truth ... good hearted people don't testify over there

Title: Raabta
Quote: Agar roze nahi rakhe ... toh phir Eid ka kya maza
Trans: If you don't fast ... then there's no fun in celebrating Eid

Title: Raabta
Quote: Main na ek bahut achhe ghar ka shareef launda hoon ... lekin mujhe tujhe aise dekh ke na woh dirty wale ashleel khayal aate hai
Trans: I'm a nice guy from a very good family ... but I get naughty and dirty thoughts when I see you in this way

Title: Raabta
Quote: Ladkiyan na hero se nahi ... heere se pyar karti hai
Trans: Girls don't love a hero ... they love a diamond like person

Title: Raabta
Quote: Ek tha raja ek thi rani ... dono mar gaye khatam kahani ... main drink la raha hoon ... tu la thanda pani
Trans: There was a king and a queen ... both of them died and hence the story ended ... I'm getting the drink ... you get cold water

Title: Bahubali 2: The Conclusion
Quote: Joh pran deta hai woh bhagwan hai ... pran bachane wala vaidya ... aur pran ki raksha karne wala kshatriya
Trans: The one who gives life is god ... the one who saves life is a doctor ... and the one who protects life is a warrior

Title: Bahubali 2: The Conclusion
Quote: Diye huye vachan ke liye ... satya aur nyay ke liye ... dharam stapana ke liye ... kisi ke bhi virudh jaana pade, woh chahe parmatma hi kyun na ho ... toh bhaybheet na ho ... yahi dharam hai, yahi kshatriya dharam hai
Trans: For the promises that have been made ... for truth and justice ... for the establishment of righteousness ... if you have to go against anyone, even if that's god ... then don't fear that ... since that's faith, the faith of a warrior

Title: Bahubali 2: The Conclusion
Quote: Apne haathon ko hathyar bana lo ... apni saanson ko aandhiyon mein badal do ... hamara rakht hi mahaan sena hai
Trans: Turn your hands into a weapon ... turn your breaths into storms ... our blood is our great army

Title: Bahubali 2: The Conclusion
Quote: Soch agar pakki ho toh ek tinka bhi talwaar mein badal sakta hai
Trans: If your thoughts are strong then even a particle can turn into a sword

Title: Bank Chor
Quote: Lips hai tere laal, kaale hai tere baal ... pehla aaya Anna, baad mein Kejriwal
Trans: Your lips are red and your hair is black ... first came Anna Hazare and then came Arvind Kejriwal

Title: Bank Chor
Quote: Main ek aam aadmi hoon ... aur aam aadmi ke naam nahi hote ... bas kaam hote hai
Trans: I'm a common man ... and a common man doesn't have a famous name ... he only has famous deeds

Title: Bank Chor
Quote: Criminals ki haddiyan hi nahi ... unki himmat todhta hoon main
Trans: Not only the bones of criminals ... I also break their confidence

Title: Bank Chor
Quote: Pata hai hamare haathon mein lakeerein kyun hoti hai ... kyun ki hum apne haathon se khud apni kismat banate hai ... we shape our own destiny
Trans: Do you know why we have lines in our palms ... since we make our destiny with our own hands ... we shape our own destiny

Title: Tubelight
Quote: Yakeen ek tubelight ki tarah hota hai ... der se jalta hai ... lekin jab jalta hai, toh full light kar deta hai
Trans: Faith is like a tubelight ... it takes time to light up ... but once it lights up, then it illuminates everything around us

Title: Tubelight
Quote: Agar insaan ke dil mein yakeen ho ... toh woh chataan bhi hila sakta hai
Trans: If a person has confidence in his heart ... then he can even move a mountain

Title: Tubelight
Quote: Kisi bhi insaan ke prati dushmani, khud ke prati dushmani hoti hai ... is liye dushman ko bhi apna dost maan lo
Trans: Enmity against any person is like enmity against yourself ... that's why you should make your enemy as your friend

Title: Tubelight
Quote: Maa kehti thi ... English tubelight jaisi English khopdi hai meri ... joh aayega, dhere dhere aayega ... magar aayega pakka, bharpoor
Trans: My mother used to say that ... my brain is like a English tubelight ... whatever you'll learn, you'll learn slowly only ... but you'll learn it perfectly and completely

Title: Dobaara: See Your Evil
Quote: Hum zindagi ko taken for granted lete hai ... humein lagta hai ki zindagi jaisi hai, vaisi hi rahegi ... aur kuch bhi nahi badlega ... par cheezein badalti hai
Trans: We take life for granted ... we think that life will be the same forever ... and nothing will ever change ... but things do change

Title: Dobaara: See Your Evil
Quote: Joh bhi ab ho raha hai woh pehle bhi hua tha ... joh bhi ab kiya ja raha hai woh pehle bhi kiya gaya tha ... kuch bhi naya nahi hai is duniya mein
Trans: What is happening now has also happened in the past ... what is being done now has also been done in the past ... nothing is new in this world

Title: Munna Michael
Quote: Munna, Munna Michael naam hai mera ... teen batti mein kisi se bhi poochega na ... toh haath pakadke ghar pe chhodega
Trans: My name is Munna Michael ... if you ask anyone about me in the colony ... then he'll hold your hand and drop you at my place

Title: Munna Michael
Quote: Bachpan se lekar aaj tak chawl ki deewaar par tanga Michael Jackson ka poster mujhse kehta tha ... chal Munna uth ... dance as if there's no tomorrow ... as if no one's watching
Trans: From my childhood till today, the poster of Michael Jackson hanging on the wall of my house has been saying this to me ... get up Munna ... dance as if there's no tomorrow ... as if no one's watching

Title: Munna Michael
Quote: Munna jhagda nahi karta ... Munna sirf peet'ta hai
Trans: Munna doesn't fight ... Munna only beats the hell out of people

Title: Munna Michael
Quote: Dance ke liye aukaat ki zaroorat nahi hoti hai ... chahe woh Bappa ka mandap ho ya tum jaiso ka nightclub
Trans: You don't need to be of a certain status to dance ... be it the canopy of Lord Ganesha or a nightclub of people like you

Title: Mom
Quote: (Bhagwan har jagah nahi hota hai) ... Issi liye toh usne maa banayi hai
Trans: (God is not everywhere) ... That's why he has created a mother

Title: Mom
Quote: Galat aur bahut galat mein se chun'na ho ... toh aap kya chunenge?
Trans: If you have to pick between something wrong and something very wrong ... then what will you select?

Title: Mom
Quote: Insaan ki raakh se uski kundli nikaal leta hoon
Trans: I can define the horoscope of a person even from his ashes

Title: Mom
Quote: Jab bhi koi aur mere liye mera kaam karta hai ... tab bhi mujhe bahut gussa aata hai
Trans: When someone else does my work for me ... then I feel very angry

Title: Toilet: Ek Prem Katha
Quote: Aashiqon ne toh aashiqui ke liye Taj Mahal bana diya ... saala hum ek sandas na bana sake
Trans: Lovers have built the Taj Mahal for their love ... and I can't even build a single toilet

Title: Toilet: Ek Prem Katha
Quote: Gita mein Shri Krishan ne kahi baat gambhir ... auro se duniya lade, lade swayam se veer
Trans: In Bhagavad Gita Lord Krishna has said a very important thing ... anyone in the world can fight with others, but the one who fights with himself is a brave person

Title: Toilet: Ek Prem Katha
Quote: Chashme se leke joote tak saare brand nakli videshi hai ... par saala aadmi desi hoon
Trans: From my sunglasses to my shoes everything is fake international brand ... but I'm a true Indian man

Title: Toilet: Ek Prem Katha
Quote: Yeh joh aap gareebon ka paisa khaate hai ... usse nikaalte kahan hai
Trans: The money that you eat after taking from poor people ... where do you extract that

Title: Babumoshai Bandookbaaz
Quote: Hum toh outsourcing karte hai ... yamraj ke liye
Trans: I do outsourcing work ... for the God of death

Title: Babumoshai Bandookbaaz
Quote: Bakch*di karna ek baat hai ... aur doosre ki aankh mein aankh daalke uske chaati mein goli daagna doosri baat hai ... phatke haath mein aa jaati hai
Trans: It's one thing to just say it ... and it's another thing to look into the eyes of someone and fire a bullet in their chest ... you'll get scared to death when you do that

Title: Babumoshai Bandookbaaz
Quote: Free mein thodi na maarenge ... ek ek ka paisa mila hai
Trans: I won't kill you for free ... I've been paid for each one of you

Title: Babumoshai Bandookbaaz
Quote: Aadmi toh karke bhool jaata hai par uska kiya kahin nahin jaata ... ghoomkar ek din uske samne zaroor aata hai
Trans: A man forgets whatever he does, but his deeds don't go anywhere ... they turn around and come in front of him one day or the other

Title: Behen Hogi Teri
Quote: Aap ek launda bata do hum mein duniya mein, ek launda ... jisne ladki ko dekh ke pehli bari mein bol diya ho ki matlab ... kya ladki hai na ... kaash yeh meri behen hoti
Trans: Show me one guy in this world ... who when sees a girl for the first time and says that ... what a great girl is she ... I wish she was my sister

Title: Behen Hogi Teri
Quote: Dil mein joh aag hai sabko dikha doonga ... joh uthi doli teri duniya mein aag main laga doonga
Trans: I'll show to everyone the fire that's there in my heart ... if you get married then I'll burn the entire world down

Title: Behen Hogi Teri
Quote: Love story mein teri kahani na bani ... toh crime story mein zaroor banegi
Trans: If you don't do well in a love story ... then you'll do well in a crime story

Title: Baadshaho
Quote: Char din ki zindagi hai aur aaj chautha din hai ... yeh sochkar itne saal nikaal diye
Trans: Life is short and today is the last day of life ... I've spent so many years thinking just that

Title: Baadshaho
Quote: Yeh joh samay hai na, yeh sabki leta hai ... samay samay par, sahi samay par ... sahi tarah se leta hai
Trans: Time screws everyone ... all the time and at the right time ... it screws perfectly

Title: Baadshaho
Quote: Sharam aur main toh ek sentence mein nahi aate madam
Trans: Madam, shyness and I don't come in a single sentence

Title: Baadshaho
Quote: Waqt tha emergency ka ... mahol tha dehshat ka ... mauka tha kismat badalne ka ... woh army thi, par hum bhi toh harami the
Trans: It was a time of emergency ... there was fright in the atmosphere ... it was an opportunity to change the destiny ... there was an army, but even I was a evil

Title: Indu Sarkar
Quote: Arjun ke iraade hil sakte hai ... ghayal Draupadi ke nahi
Trans: The intentions of Arjun can shake ... but not those of wounded Draupadi

Title: Indu Sarkar
Quote: Emergency mein emotion nahi ... mere orders chalte hai
Trans: Emotions don't work in an emergency ... only my orders do

Title: Indu Sarkar
Quote: Sachai ki mushkil yeh hai ki ... ek baar pata chal jaaye toh usse mooh nahi moda jaa sakta
Trans: The problem with truth is that ... once you come to know of it then you can't look away from it

Title: Indu Sarkar
Quote: Aashiyana badalne se pata toh badal jaata hai ... lekin taqdeer nahi badalti
Trans: By changing your mansion, your address does change ... but it doesn't change your destiny

Title: A Gentleman
Quote: Jab jab jiske lagne hai ... tab tab uske lagte hai ... ab usse ittefaq kaho ya phir what the f*ck
Trans: When someone is going to get screwed ... then that person will get screwed ... you can call that coincidence or what the f*ck

Title: A Gentleman
Quote: Kayi baar kismat badalne ke liye khudko badalna padta hai
Trans: Many a times one has to change themselves to change their destiny

Title: Bareilly Ki Barfi
Quote: Aasaan nahi hai tumse pyar karna ... magar tumse pyar na karna usse bhi zyada mushkil hai
Trans: It's not easy to love you ... but it's more difficult to not love you

Title: Bareilly Ki Barfi
Quote: Kisi ko tum gusail lagti ho, kisi ko bighdail lagti ho ... tumhari amma mazak mazak mein kehti hai ki raat bhar ghoomti rehti ho toh chudail lagti ho ... kisi ko tumhari baatein atpatti lagti hai, kisi ko behad chatpatti lagti hai ... tumhari kasam humein tumhari har ek baat bahut hi achchi lagti hai
Trans: Someone thinks you're great and someone thinks you're naughty ... your mother jokingly says that you look like a witch when you roam around in the night ... someone thinks your talks are strange and someone thinks they're pretty interesting ... I swear on you, I love every bit that you do

Title: Bareilly Ki Barfi
Quote: Agar shakal dekh ke ladkiyan shaadi karti na ... toh Hindustan mein aadhe ladke kanware hote
Trans: If girls would marry just by looking at the face ... then half the guys in India would be bachelors

Title: Bareilly Ki Barfi
Quote: Aaj ke baad galat time pe phone kiya na ... toh aisi laat maarenge koole pe dimple nikaal denge tumhare
Trans: From today if you call me at the wrong time ... then I'll kick your ass in such a way that, a pimple will pop up there

Title: Jab Harry Met Sejal
Quote: Character ho tum ... A1
Trans: You're a character ... of A1 quality

Title: Jab Harry Met Sejal
Quote: Jitna dhokla, thepla te fafda khana hai khao ... par meri zindagi to jao
Trans: Eat as much snacks and fritters as you want ... but go away from my life

Title: Jagga Jasoos
Quote: Dimaag aur parachute same to same ... khula toh great varna dead
Trans: Mind and parachute are the same ... it's great if they open up or else you're dead

Title: Jagga Jasoos
Quote: Musibat aur googly ... pehle se padh liya toh chakka nahi toh okka
Trans: Problems and googly ... if you read them well before then it's a home run or else you'll get out on them

Title: Guest Iin London
Quote: Saath na rehne ke bahut saare bahane ban jaate hai ... par saath rehne ka bas ek bahana bahut hai ... pata hai kyun ... pyar
Trans: You can find many excuses for not living together ... but you need only one excuse for living together ... and you know why ... because of love

Title: Guest Iin London
Quote: India mein guest aur pest aise hi kabhi bhi kahin pe bhi aa jaate hai
Trans: In India guest and pest can come anytime and anywhere

Title: Guest Iin London
Quote: Pant pe gira pani aur phisli huyi jawani bada badnaam karti hai
Trans: Water on your pants and out of control youth can dishonour you

Title: Guest Iin London
Quote: India Pakistan mein biwi shohar ke bare mein agar itna jaante honge, toh phir woh biwi shohar nahi honge ... Karan aur Johar honge
Trans: In India and Pakistan if a husband and wife know a lot about each other, then they must not be husband and wife ... they must be Karan and Johar

Title: Poster Boys
Quote: Itni zor se patkunga ki tappa khakar chatt se lagega
Trans: I'll throw you so hard that you'll bounce and fall on the terrace

Title: Poster Boys
Quote: Joh lada jung ke maidan par wohi shaheed hua ... lekin joh lada hi nahi woh pehle hi gaya ... samman ki is ladai mein apmaan bhi hoga ... lekin joh apni nazaron se girega woh atmasamman se bhi gaya ... besharamon ki is basti mein ab humne toh thaan li hai ... tann pe rahe na ek bhi kapda lekin izzat humne apni zaroor bachani hai
Trans: The one who fought in the battlefield is the one who became a martyr ... but the one who didn't even fight is dead before that ... in this fight for respect we'll might get disrespected ... but the one who falls in his own eyes has lost even his self-respect ... now in this colony of shameless people we've decided that ... even if we don't have a single piece of clothing on our body but still we have to protect our dignity

Title: Poster Boys
Quote: Sachai ke saath saath agar kuch chahiye toh woh hai sansani ... yehi hai aaj ki sachai
Trans: If you need something along with truth then that's sensation ... this is the truth of today

Title: Poster Boys
Quote: Jwalamukhi vaise toh teen prakar ke hote hai ... shant jwalamukhi, yeh kabhi nahi phat'te ... jagrut jwalamukhi, yeh bewajah hi phat'te hai ... aur prasuk jwalamukhi, yeh upar se toh shant dikhte hai par jab phat'te hai
Trans: There are three types of volcanoes ... a silent volcano, they never erupt ... a lively volcano, they erupt for no reason ... and a pure volcano, they seem to be silent from the top but when they erupt they cause destruction

Title: Shubh Mangal Saavdhan
Quote: Mard woh nahi hota jise dard nahi hota ... mard woh hota hai joh na kisi ko dard deta hai, na dene deta hai
Trans: A man is not someone who doesn't feel pain ... a man is someone who doesn't give pain to anyone, and neither does he allow anyone else to do that

Title: Shubh Mangal Saavdhan
Quote: Delhi ke ladkon ke baare mein na zyada sochna nahi chahiye ... faltu mein expectations badh jaati hai
Trans: One should not think a lot about the guys from Delhi ... or else unnecessarily the expectations become high

Title: Shubh Mangal Saavdhan
Quote: Shaadi ke baad love story shuru nahi hoti ... khatam ho jaati hai
Trans: A love story doesn't start after marriage ... as a matter of fact it ends

Title: Shubh Mangal Saavdhan
Quote: Sab meri shaadi ke peeche aise padhe huye the, jaise India ka GDP meri shaadi pe depend karta hai
Trans: Everyone was behind getting me married, as if India's GDP (Gross Domestic Product) is dependent on my marriage

Title: Bhoomi
Quote: Ek ladki ka maika hota hai, sasural hota hai ... par ghar kahan hota hai?
Trans: A girl has her parents house, her in-laws house ... but where is her home?

Title: Bhoomi
Quote: Apna aakhri shradh mana le ... kyun ki iske baad tere haath aur hathyar bhi kaam nahi aayenge
Trans: Celebrate your last death ceremony ... because after this even your hands and weapons won't be useful for you

Title: Bhoomi
Quote: Ek second lagega tujhe maarne mein ... lekin nahi ... tujhe har din maarunga, har second maarunga
Trans: It'll take me one second to kill you ... but no ... I'll kill you every day, I'll kill you every second

Title: Bhoomi
Quote: Hide and seek toh bache khele hai ... yo hide and cheek hai
Trans: Kids play the game of hide and seek ... but this is hide and scream

Title: Judwaa 2
Quote: Raja ki izzat hai na koi Saundarya sabun ki tikiya nahi hai ... joh tu gis-giske dho-dhoke phek daale
Trans: Raja's dignity is not like a bar of Saundarya soap ... that you can scrub it as needed and then throw it away

Title: Judwaa 2
Quote: Joh main bolta hoon, woh main karta hoon ... aur joh main nahi bolta hoon, woh main WhatsApp karta hoon
Trans: Whatever I say, I do that ... and whatever I don't say, I simply WhatsApp that

Title: Judwaa 2
Quote: Duniya ka sabse amir insaan bhi na maa baap ke bina gareeb hota hai
Trans: Even the richest person of the world is poor without a mother and a father

Title: Judwaa 2
Quote: Life mein main sirf do cheezon ki izzat karta hoon ... ek maa aur doosra khana ... kyun ki ek humein janam deti hai aur doosri humein zinda rakhti hai
Trans: I only respect two things in life ... one is a mother and other is food ... because one gives us birth and the other keep us alive

Title: Aksar 2
Quote: Kabhi kabhi aap game apne talent se nahi ... samne wale ki galati ke wajah se bhi jeet'te hai
Trans: Sometimes you don't win a game due to your talent ... instead you win due to the mistake of your opponent

Title: Aksar 2
Quote: Yeh neend bhi badi ajeeb cheez hai yaar ... maut ki tarah befikar kar deti hai aur saath hi saath zinda bhi rakhti hai
Trans: Sleep is a very strange thing ... it makes you carefree like death and at the same time it keeps you alive as well

Title: Aksar 2
Quote: Zindagi tujhse har ek saans par samjhauta karoon ... shauk jeene ka hai, magar itna bhi nahi
Trans: Hey life, I'll compromise with you at every breath ... I have the desire to live, but not that badly

Title: Aksar 2
Quote: Watch you back ... issi pe shahbaazi milti hai aur khanjar bhi
Trans: Watch you back ... since that's where you get a pat on doing great things and also that's where you get attacked

Title: Chef
Quote: Kisi ko apne haath se khana khilane ka mauka milna ... rab ki badi meher hoti hai
Trans: To feed food to someone made by your own hands ... is a great blessing of God

Title: Chef
Quote: Zindagi mein apna passion ek baar mil jaye wohi badi baat hoti hai ... lekin sirf kuch lucky logon ko usse khokar doobara paane ka chance milta hai
Trans: If you can find your passion in life even once, then that's great ... but only a few lucky ones get a second chance to find it again after losing it

Title: Chef
Quote: Apni zindagi ke bare mein log aksar proudly kehte hai ... ki kuch ishq kiya, kuch kaam kiya ... lekin maine apne kaam se hi ishq kiya
Trans: People often proudly say about their life ... that they loved a little and worked a little ... but I loved my work itself

Title: Chef
Quote: Kaam, kaam se pyar, pyar se kaam mein kahin pyar toh reh hi gaya ... woh bhi karna hai apni zindagi se, apne bete se
Trans: Work, from work to love, from love to work, in the middle of all this love got left behind ... now I have to fall in love with my life, with my son

Title: Patel Ki Punjabi Shaadi
Quote: Aadmi paisa kyun kamata hai ... car ke liye ... pet ke liye ... carpet ke liye ... aur kis liye
Trans: Why does a person earn money ... for a car ... for his stomach ... for carpet ... and for what else

Title: Patel Ki Punjabi Shaadi
Quote: Jab tak rahe saans aur haddi ... chalti rahe gaddi ... Jai Mata Di!
Trans: Until we're breathing and are bones are strong ... may our vehicle keep moving ... hail Goddess Durga!
