Trans: Love is a ground on which if a woman walks ... then she'll definitely fall ... because the man on whose support she starts to walk ... often there's a sad person hidden in him

Title: Daas Dev
Quote: Kabhi kabhi phir se shuru karne ke liye sab kuch khatam karna padta hai
Trans: Sometimes to restart one has to end everything first

Title: Daas Dev
Quote: Power ek aisa nasha hai joh kayarta ki zameen pe panapta hai
Trans: Power is such an intoxication that flourishes on the land of cowardliness

Title: Daas Dev
Quote: Main jaanti hoon aap mujhse pyar nahi karte ... par aapko mera ishq mubarak
Trans: I know that you don't love me ... but you're welcome to keep my love

Title: Baaghi 2
Quote: Joh yeh tera torture hai ... woh mera warm-up hai
Trans: This torture of yours ... is just warm-up for me

Title: Baaghi 2
Quote: Jab jung dil aur dimaag ki ho na ... toh hamesha dil ki sunte hai ... kyun ki dimaag kya hota dahi ... aur dil kya hota sahi
Trans: In the battle of the heart and the mind ... always listen to your heart ... because the mind is like yogurt ... and the heart is always right

Title: Baaghi 2
Quote: Is ladai mein uska kuch nahi bhigdega ... aur tumhara kuch bachega nahi
Trans: He won't lose anything in this fight ... and you will have nothing left

Title: Baaghi 2
Quote: Paisa kam ho toh pet nahi bharta ... aur zyada ho toh saala dil nahi bharta
Trans: Your stomach isn't satisfied when you have less money ... and your heart isn't satisfied when you have a lot of it

Title: Raazi
Quote: Watan ke aage kuch nahi ... khud bhi nahi
Trans: Nothing comes before my country ... not even me myself

Title: Raazi
Quote: Mulk ke samne mujhe apna aap nazar nahi aata ... main hi toh mulk hoon, Hindustan hoon
Trans: I don't see myself in front of my country ... I'm myself my country, my India

Title: Raazi
Quote: Hamare itihaas mein aise kayi log hai jinhe koi inaam, koi medal nahi milta ... hum unka naam tak nahi jaante ... na hi unhe pehchante hai ... sirf watan ke jhande par apni yaad chhod jaate hai
Trans: There are many people in our history who don't get any medal or recognition ... we don't even know their name ... neither can we identify them ... they just leave behind their memories on our country's flag

Title: Raazi
Quote: Jung mein aisa hi hota hai ... kayi bekasoor maare jaate hai ... lekin jung mein sivah jung ke aur kuch mayine nahi rakhta
Trans: These things happen in war ... many innocent people get killed ... but in war nothing else matters other than the war itself

Title: Sanju
Quote: Ghee chhe toh ghapa-ghap chhe
Trans: If you have money in life then you'll have sex

Title: Sanju
Quote: Apna life full saanp seedi ka board hai ... kabhi up toh kabhi down
Trans: My life is like the board of a snakes and ladders game ... sometimes it goes up and sometimes it comes down

Title: Sanju
Quote: Main bewda hoon, tharki hoon, drug addict hoon, sab hoon ... lekin terrorist nahi hoon
Trans: I'm alcoholic, lascivious, drug addict, everything ... but I'm not a terrorist

Title: Sanju
Quote: Haath ki lakeerein bhi kamaal karti hai ... mutthi mein toh rehti hai par kaabu mein nahi
Trans: The palm lines of destiny are very strange ... they remain in your hand but you can't control them

Title: Nanu Ki Jaanu
Quote: Self-respect ke bagair zindagi aur dahi ke bagair parathe ... achhe nahi lagte
Trans: Life without self-respect and flatbread without yogurt ... don't go well

Title: Nanu Ki Jaanu
Quote: Tumse jeete jee pyar kiya aur pyar karte hi mar gayi ... isse kehte hai pyar
Trans: I was in love with you while I was alive and I died when we came together in love ... this is called as great love

Title: Caravan
Quote: Yeh botal hai na botal ... yeh duniya ki har sundar ladki se zyada khoobsurat hai ... poocho kyun ... kyun ki yeh dhoka nahi deti, chaalbaazi nahi karti
Trans: You see this alcohol bottle ... it's even more beautiful than every beautiful girl of this world ... ask me why ... because it doesn't cheat on you, it doesn't do tricks on you

Title: Caravan
Quote: Sabzi tarkari garam garam ... arre malik kare hazam hazam
Trans: There are warm and hot vegetable dishes ... may god help me digest all of these

Title: Caravan
Quote: Yeh jagah bilkul veerana hai ... yahan koi kitna cheekhe chillaye ... uski awaaz ya toh cheel kauve sunenge ya yeh veerana ... aur phir yeh awaaz hamesha ke liye khamosh ho jayegi
Trans: This place is a total ruin ... no matter how much one screams here ... their voice is heard either by vultures or by this ruin itself ... and then that voice goes silent forever

Title: Caravan
Quote: Jab koi kisi ke liye bahut kuch karta hai ... toh ek naa bahut bada ghaav bhi lagati hai
Trans: When a person does a lot for someone ... then even one no creates a very big wound

Title: Phamous
Quote: Jab tak khud ki Sita ka haran nahi hota ... koi aadmi Ram nahi banta
Trans: Until your own wife is kidnapped ... till that time a husband doesn't turn into Lord Rama

Title: Phamous
Quote: Power hi hai bhaiya joh aadmi ko banati hai phamous
Trans: Power is the thing that makes a person famous

Title: Phamous
Quote: Dhakad woh hai jiske haath mein bandook aake bandook phamous ho jaati hai ... jiske seene mein goli ghuske goli phamous ho jaati hai
Trans: A person is called courageous when he takes a gun in his hand, and that gun becomes famous ... and when a bullet enters his body, it makes that bullet famous

Title: Phamous
Quote: Tumhe pyar karenge, tumhari raksha karenge ... joh hummo bhagwan bhi hum dono ke beech mein aayo ... toh maa kasam, hum uski bhakti chhod denge
Trans: I'll love you and I'll protect you ... even if god comes in between the two of us ... then I swear on my mother, I'll end my devotion for him

Title: 102 Not Out
Quote: Bhudha samajhte hai na aap ... woh aadmi joh zindagi se bhi darta hai aur maut se bhi
Trans: You know what an old person is ... a person who's scared of life and death as well

Title: 102 Not Out
Quote: Aulaad nalayak nikle toh usse bhool jaana chahiye ... sirf uska bachpan yaad rakhna chahiye
Trans: If your child happens to be unworthy then you should forget them ... you should only remember their childhood

Title: 102 Not Out
Quote: Thakela, pakela, boring, nirutsahi log ... cigarette se bhi zyada hanikarak hote hai
Trans: People who are boring and lack enthusiasm ... are more injurious than cigarettes

Title: 102 Not Out
Quote: Maut aaye na toh woh pariyon ki tarah aani chahiye ... lekin zindagi mein joh karna chahiye ... woh sab kar liya ho toh hi pari aati hai
Trans: Death should come like the fairies ... but whatever work one has to do in their life ... if you complete all of that, then only fairies will come

Title: Hope Aur Hum
Quote: Agar tumse koi galati ho gayi hai ... toh us galati ko theek bhi tum hi kar sakte ho
Trans: If you've made a mistake ... then you're the one who can fix that mistake as well

Title: Hope Aur Hum
Quote: Logon se pyar karo ... cheezon se nahi
Trans: Love people ... and not things

Title: Veere Di Wedding
Quote: Tu na complete package hai ... bahar se sati, andar se slutty
Trans: You're a complete package ... from outside you're innocent and from inside you're slutty

Title: Veere Di Wedding
Quote: Jitna bhi padh lo graduation, post-graduation ... par jab tak bhen*hod mangalsutra gale mein nahi lagta na ... tab tak life complete nahi hoti
Trans: No matter how much you study, graduation or post-graduation ... but until you don't have a wedding necklace in your neck ... till then your life isn't called complete

Title: Veere Di Wedding
Quote: Zindagi mein khoob galatiyan karni chahiye aur unki saza bhi paani chahiye ... magar apni, kisi aur ki nahi ... jab tak galatiyan nahi karoge toh apni kahani kaise likhoge
Trans: One should make a lot of mistakes in life and one should also get punished for them ... but for your own mistakes, and no one else's ... how will you write your own story if you don't make mistakes

Title: Veere Di Wedding
Quote: Jaa apni mummy ke saath ... actually mummy se hi shaadi karle ... bloody mother lover
Trans: Go to your mother ... actually get married to your mother itself ... bloody mother lover

Title: Race 3
Quote: Jis race se mujhe nikaalne ki baat kar rahe hai yeh bewakoof ... woh nahi jaante hai ... us race ka sikandar main hoon
Trans: The race from which these fools are talking about eliminating me ... they don't know that ... I'm the king of that race

Title: Race 3
Quote: Hamare business pe koi nazar daale woh hum mein bardaash nahi ... our business is our business ... none of your business
Trans: We don't tolerate if anyone sets their eyes on our business ... our business is our business ... none of your business

Title: Race 3
Quote: Pariwar ke liye agar kisi ki jaan bhi leni pade ... tab bhi hum peeche nahi hatenge
Trans: Even if we have to take someone's life for our family ... then to we won't step back

Title: Race 3
Quote: Yeh race zindagi ki race hai ... kisi ki zindagi leke hi khatam hogi
Trans: This race is the race of life ... it'll end only after taking someone's life

Title: Bhavesh Joshi Superhero
Quote: Reality hit karti hai ... toh bande ko badal deti hai
Trans: When reality strikes ... then it changes a person

Title: Bhavesh Joshi Superhero
Quote: Heroes andhere mein ghabrate nahi hai ... deewaron par aakar rukte nahi hai ... woh darke kinare par khade nahi rehte hai ... dar ko maarkar sabko raasta dikhate hai ... unko hosh mein laate hai ... jhoothi duniya mein sach bolne ki kranti karte hai
Trans: Heroes don't fear the darkness ... they don't stop when they reach the walls ... they don't stand on the shore being scared ... they kill the fear and show the path to everyone ... they bring them to life ... they bring the revolution to say the truth in this fake world

Title: Bhavesh Joshi Superhero
Quote: Apunka kaam, apunka naam ... dono-ich insaaf
Trans: My work and my name ... both are justice

Title: Bhavesh Joshi Superhero
Quote: Jahan bhi corruption aur crime ho na ... aisi kaali duniya ko light-up karne ke liye joh 10,000 watt ka LED bulb pehda hota hai na ... usse kehte hai hum hero ... insaaf-man
Trans: Wherever there is corruption and crime ... in that dark world the 10,000 watt LED bulb like person that brings light there ... we call him a hero ... a man of justice

Title: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
Quote: Hum duniya ki nazaron mein girenge ya khare utrenge ... yeh pata nahi ... lekin itna yakeen hai ... ki hum khud apne aap se nazarein milake yeh keh payenge ... ki humne joh socha woh desh ke liye tha ... humne joh kiya woh desh ke liye hai ... aur humne joh paaya woh desh ka hoga
Trans: Whether the world will judge us good or bad ... I don't know that ... but I'm confident that ... we will be able to look at ourselves and say that ... whatever we thought was for the country ... whatever we did was for the country ... and whatever we've achieved will be for the country

Title: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
Quote: Kabhi kabhi ek shaq dil mein aise ghar kar leta hai ... ke uske aage sachai naak ke neeche hote huye bhi nahi dikhti hai
Trans: Sometimes a suspicion settles in our heart in such a way that ... even if the truth sits right underneath our nose, but we still can't see it

Title: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
Quote: Ab hum darke shaant nahi baithenge ... karke shaant baithenge
Trans: Now we won't stay quiet doing nothing in fear ... we'll do something and stay quiet

Title: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
Quote: Hero vardi se nahi ... iraade se bante hai
Trans: Uniform doesn't make you a hero ... your intentions do

Title: Gold
Quote: Hamare ghar mein inquilab zindabad pehle hota hai ... phir nashta hota hai
Trans: In our house first we chant long live the revolution ... and then we have breakfast

Title: Gold
Quote: Unka desh mein, unhi ka public ke samne, unka king ka aage, unko harayega
Trans: We'll defeat in them in their own country, in front of their own people and in front of their own king

Title: Gold
Quote: Desh keval zameen se aur border se nahi banta hai ... desh banta hai jab sab deshvasiyon ki aankhon mein ek hi sapna hota hai
Trans: A country is not formed just by land and borders ... a country is formed when all the citizens of that country have one common dream in their eyes

Title: Gold
Quote: Koi bhi sapna impossible nahi hai ... agar hum milke yeh vishvas rakhe ki yeh sapna poora hoga
Trans: No dream is impossible ... if we come together and believe that this dream will come true

Title: Satyameva Jayate
Quote: Do takke ki jaan lene nau millimeter ki goli nahi ... chappan inch ka jigra chahiye
Trans: You don't need a 9 mm bullet to take a life that's worth only 2 pennies ... you need a 56 inch wide chest

Title: Satyameva Jayate
Quote: Jako rakhe saiyan maar sake na koi ... par joh maare satya vaste uske sang saiyan hoye
Trans: No one can kill the one who has God on his side ... but the one who kills for truth, God is on his side

Title: Satyameva Jayate
Quote: Ab tujhe aisi maut maroonga ... ki tu is janam mein jalega ... lekin dard agle janam tak chalega
Trans: Now I'll give you such a death that ... you'll burn in this life ... but the pain will go on till your next life

Title: Satyameva Jayate
Quote: Ghunghat mein ho ya burkhe mein ... is desh mein aurat ko devi maante hai ... aur joh devi ki izzat utaare ... usse hum sare aam maarte hai
Trans: Be it in a veil or a burka ... in this country we consider a woman as a goddess ... and those who don't respect a goddess ... we kill them openly

Title: Mulk
Quote: Ek mulk kagaz pe naksho ki lakeeron se nahi badhta ... mulk badhta hai rang se, bhasha se, dharam se, zaat se
Trans: A country doesn't grow by the boundaries it defines on a map ... a country grows with different colours, languages, religions and caste

Title: Mulk
Quote: Hum aur woh milke is mulk ko thodi na banate hai ... hum is mulk ko banate hai
Trans: We and them collectively don't form this country ... it's just we together that forms this country

Title: Mulk
Quote: Gale lagake sawal poochega, kaleja nikalke haath mein rakh doonga ... ungli uthega poochega na, toh yaad rakhiyega meri jawabdari aap se nahi hai ... apni imaan se hai, apne mulk se hai
Trans: If you embrace me and ask a question, then I'll place my heart in your hand ... but if you raise your finger and ask me a question, then remember that ... I owe the answer only to my faith and my country

Title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster 3
Quote: Mere baare mein joh bhi suna hoga bura hi suna hoga ... lekin main itna bura nahi hoon ki mere bagal mein khade hone se koi badnaam ho jaaye
Trans: Whatever you must have heard about me, must be evil ... but I'm not that evil, that if someone stands next to me then they'll get defamed

Title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster 3
Quote: I believe only three things can change our lives ... dreams, suffering and love ... pareshaniyon se main nikalke aaya hoon ... sapna main dekh raha hoon ... aur pyar mujhe aksar ho jaata hai
Trans: I believe only three things can change our lives ... dreams, suffering and love ... I've come out of my sufferings ... I'm dreaming at this very moment ... and I often fall in love

Title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster 3
Quote: Jab naam ke alava kuch bacha na ho ... toh naam ko bacha bachake chalna chahiye
Trans: When you have nothing left other than your name ... then you should protect your name as you move forward

Title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster 3
Quote: Hum bheed ke samne nahi khade hote hai ... bheed hamare samne khadi hoti hai
Trans: I don't stand in front of crowds ... crowds stand in front of me

Title: Fanney Khan
Quote: Sapno ke saath do hi baatein hoti hai ... ya toh poore hote hai, ya toot jaate hai
Trans: Only two things can happen with dreams ... either they get fulfilled, or they break

Title: Fanney Khan
Quote: Main Mohammed Rafi toh nahi ban saka ... lekin tereko Lata Mangeshkar zaroor banaunga
Trans: I wasn't able to become like Mohammed Rafi ... but I'll make you just like Lata Mangeshkar

Title: Soorma
Quote: Yeh tamancha kacha mein rakho babua ... Bihari hai hum ... thook ke maatham mein chhed kar denge
Trans: Keep this gun in your underwear ... I'm from Bihar ... I'll spit on it and make a hole in your head

Title: Soorma
Quote: Saale itna todhunga na tujhe ... koi budget jodh nahi payega
Trans: I'll break you in such a way that ... no budget will be able to set you back

Title: Soorma
Quote: Switzerland jaane wala tujhe Shahabad mein hi hazaron mil jayenge aur desh mein karodon ... lekin sirf gyarah pagal honge jinka kisi ladki ko dekhke goal se dhayan nahi bhatkega ... kyun ki woh kisi pool ya gaadi ke liye goal nahi maar rahe hai ... India ke liye goal maar rahe hai
Trans: In Shahabad itself you'll find thousands of guys who want to go to Switzerland, and millions in this country ... but there'll only be eleven mad guys who don't get distracted from their goal when they see a girl ... because they aren't shooting a goal for a pool or a car ... they're shooting a goal for India

Title: Soorma
Quote: Ab India khelna hai ... India ke liye
Trans: Now I want to play for India ... for the pride of India

Title: Angrezi Mein Kehte Hain
Quote: Har kahani ka hero Shahrukh Khan nahi hota hai ... kabhi kabhi aapki tarah, meri tarah, ek aam insaan bhi hota hai ... apni kahani ka hero
Trans: Shahrukh Khan isn't the hero of every story ... sometimes a common man like you and me ... is the hero of their own story

Title: Angrezi Mein Kehte Hain
Quote: Pyar jise love kehte hai, aise kahan hota hai ... woh toh Ganga mein pehli dubki ki tarah hai ... shareer pe padte hi atma tarr ho jaati hai
Trans: Love ain't anything just like that ... love is like the first dip in the holy Ganga river ... it cleanses your soul the moment it touches your body

Title: Angrezi Mein Kehte Hain
Quote: Pyar bolne ka bhi naam hai aur chup rehne ka bhi ... par sunai sirf tabhi deta hai jab kaha jaata hai
Trans: Love is the name of saying it and staying quiet as well ... but you can only hear it when you say it

Title: Angrezi Mein Kehte Hain
Quote: Aaj kal kehte hai ki bhagwan ke baad agar kisi ko sab kuch pata hai ... sab kuch ... toh woh hai Google
Trans: Nowadays it is said that if there's someone who knows everything after god ... literally everything ... then that's Google

Title: Genius
Quote: Genius toh woh hota hai jiske paas character ho ... genius toh woh hota hai joh har paristithi mein zindagi ki ladai ladta hai aur jeet'ta hai ... woh genius hai
Trans: A genius is someone who has character ... a genius is someone who fights with life under any circumstances and wins ... such a person is called a genius

Title: Genius
Quote: Dil se main khelta nahi ... aur dimaag se khelne deta nahi
Trans: I don't play with my heart ... and I don't allow others to play with my mind

Title: Genius
Quote: Jaan dene ki cheez nahi hai ... lene ki hoti hai
Trans: Life is not something that one should give ... it's something that one should take

Title: Genius
Quote: Dil ko rashtriya khel ghoshit kar dena chahiye ... sab khelte hai iske saath
Trans: We should name the heart as our national sport ... since everyone plays with it

Title: Teri Bhabhi Hai Pagle
Quote: Akeli ladki na doodh ke patele ki tarah hoti hai ... mauka dekhkar koi na koi billa mooh maarne ki koshish zaroor karega
Trans: A single woman is like a bowl of milk ... some cat or the other will seize the opportunity and try to drink her

Title: Teri Bhabhi Hai Pagle
Quote: Mat samajhna ki haath dikhage rok lega BST hoon ... main tera khoon choos loonga EST hoon
Trans: Don't think that I'm a commuter bus that you'll wave your hand and stop ... I'm a disease and I'll suck your blood

Title: Teri Bhabhi Hai Pagle
Quote: Zindagi ek jung agar patni sang hai ... Sita se pyar kiya toh Ram ban gaye ... Radha se pyar kiya toh Shyam ban gaye ... aur joh kataiy zabardasti ka pyar kiya toh bhootni ke Asaram ban gaye
Trans: Life is like a war if your wife is there with you ... you'll become Ram if you love Sita ... you'll become Shyam if you love Radha ... and if you love someone with force then you'll become Asaram Bapu

Title: Teri Bhabhi Hai Pagle
Quote: Mat samajhna ki main chai nahi pani kam hoon ... main phataka nahi bomb hoon
Trans: Don't think that I'm worthless ... I'm a bomb and not just a firecracker

Title: Paltan
Quote: No guts, no glory ... no legends, no story
Trans: No guts, no glory ... no legends, no story

Title: Paltan
Quote: Ek fauji is liye jung nahi karta hai kyun ki woh samne wale se nafrat karta hai ... woh jung is liye karta hai kyun ki jinko woh peeche chhod aaya hai na ... unse woh pyar bahut karta hai
Trans: A soldier doesn't fight in a war because he hates the enemy ... he fights because the people that he has left behind ... he loves them a lot

Title: Paltan
Quote: Faujiyon ko do hi cheezon ka toh intezar rehta hai ... dushman ki goli aur ghar se aayi chitthi
Trans: Soldiers are always waiting for two things ... the enemy's bullet and a letter from their house

Title: Paltan
Quote: Brother to my left, brother to my right ... together we stand, together we fight
Trans: Brother to my left, brother to my right ... together we stand, together we fight

Title: Batti Gul Meter Chalu
Quote: Jeetne se zyada ladna zaroori thehra
Trans: It's more important to fight rather than winning

Title: Batti Gul Meter Chalu
Quote: Agar aapka bhi meter chalu aur batti gul ... toh aao milkar bajaye bigul
Trans: If even your meter is on and your electricity is out ... then come let's create a commotion together

Title: Batti Gul Meter Chalu
Quote: Main doosron ki tarah safed kapde pehenke haath jodkar tamasha dekhne wala na hoon ab ... kaale kapde pehenke SPTL ki naak mein dum karne wala thehra
Trans: I'm not going to wear white clothes and watch the entertainment like others ... now I'm going to wear black clothes and ruin the activities of the SPTL electric company

Title: Manmarziyaan
Quote: Main tenu phir milangi ... shayad ek khayal banke tere mann mein jotrangi ... ya tere mathe di lakeer banke khamosh tenu takhti rawangi ... main tenu phir milangi ... kithe, kis tarah, pata nahi ... main tenu phir milangi
Trans: I'll meet with you again ... may be I'll live in your heart like a thought ... or may be I'll secretly stare at you becoming a destiny line of your forehead ... I'll meet with you again ... where and how, I don't know that ... I'll meet with you again

Title: Manmarziyaan
Quote: (Mujhe nahi samajh mein aata yeh kaisa pyar hai aapka) ... Yeh woh wala hai jis mein jitna karo na kam padta hai
Trans: (I don't understand your type of love) ... It's that type in which you always feel that it's less, no matter how much you love

Title: Manmarziyaan
Quote: Tu banda na bada sahi hai ... lekin zimmedari ke naam pe na hug deta hai
Trans: You're an awesome guy ... but you always screw up when it comes to responsibilities

Title: Love Yatri
Quote: My expectations are not your ambition ... your expectation is my ambition
Trans: My expectations are not your ambition ... your expectation is my ambition

Title: Love Yatri
Quote: Pyar oonch neech kahan dekhta hai ... pyar SIM card ki tarah hota hai ... aur SIM card mehenge mobile mein, saste mobile mein, har mobile mein barabar fit hota hai
Trans: Love doesn't see big and small ... love is like a SIM card ... and a SIM card fits perfectly in an expensive mobile phone, in a cheap mobile phone, in every mobile phone

Title: Love Yatri
Quote: Is Navratri mein aisa jaadu hai ... kisiko jaadu jaisa feel nahi hota
Trans: There's such a magic in the festival of Navratri that ... no one feels like it's even magic

Title: Love Yatri
Quote: Jab pehli baar usse mulaqat hogi ... saari duniya reh jayegi sookhi lekin tere sar par halki halki barsaat hogi
Trans: When you'll meet her for the first time ... then the entire world will be dry but there'll be light rain falling on your head

Title: Sui Dhaaga: Made in India
Quote: Sab badiya hai
Trans: Everything is great

Title: Sui Dhaaga: Made in India
Quote: Ab zindagi ki cycle pe toh maarna padega pedal ... chahe mile ya na mile medal
Trans: Now we'll have to push the pedal on the cycle of life ... whether we get a medal or not

Title: Sui Dhaaga: Made in India
Quote: Apni banayi cheezon pe apni hi mohar lagake bechenge
Trans: We'll stamp our own name on the products that we make and sell

Title: Ishqeria
Quote: Definitely party hard but work harder ... kyun ki aapka aaj hi aapka kal banata hai
Trans: Definitely party hard but work harder ... because your today is what defines your tomorrow

Title: Ishqeria
Quote: Rishtey darwazo ki tarah hote hai ... koi naya rishta judhta hai toh darwaze khulte hai ... koi rishta tootta hai toh darwaza bandh ho jaata hai ... par kuch darwaze hum itni zor se bandh karte hai ki woh darasal bandh hi nahi hote ... bas jhoolte reh jaate hai ... aur humein pata bhi nahi chalta par halke se khule reh jaate hai
Trans: Relationships are like doors ... doors open up when a new relationship is formed ... a door closes when a relationship ends ... but we try to close some doors so hard that they end up not being closed ... they just keep swinging around ... and we don't even come to know that they remain slightly open

Title: Ishqeria
Quote: Bhagwan ne do hi toh achi cheezein banayi hai ... filmein aur main
Trans: God has created only two good things ... movies and me

Title: Ishqeria
Quote: Pal hasake jaye ya pal rulake jaye ... hamesha yaad rehne chahiye ... kyun ki joh yaad nahi woh pal nahi
Trans: Whether moments of time make you smile or make you cry ... you should always remember them ... because what you don't remember aren't moments of time

Title: Yamla Pagla Deewana Phir Se
Quote: Jitna dimaag tere paas hai na ... utna mera kharab rehta hai
Trans: The total quantity of brain that you have ... I usually lose that much quantity of my brain

Title: Yamla Pagla Deewana Phir Se
Quote: Yeh dhai kilo ka nahi, poore panch kilo ka haath hai ... pad gaya na toh mooh chibda ho jayega ... haddiyan kirtan karengi
Trans: My hand weighs 5 kg and not just 2.5 kg ... your face will get messed up if it falls on you ... and your bones will pray to god

Title: Yamla Pagla Deewana Phir Se
Quote: Oye yeh Punjab hai ... yahan raat ko fight karte hai aur din mein invite karte hai
Trans: This is Punjab ... here we fight in the night and then we invite in the morning

Trans: When it's time to say something important ... when it's time to fulfill a promise ... when it's time to call a name ... when it's time to call someone back ... I always end up being late ... when it's time to protect someone from sadness before death ... when it's time to tell someone what the truth is ... I always end up being late

Quote: Hindi filmon ka paikhana kuch is tarah hota hai ... ki koi bhi, kuch bhi, kabhi bhi kar sakta hai

Trans: A person should always hope for deceit ... since only two things are for real ... deceit and death ... everyone attains these two things at least once in their life

Quote: Maut se zinda lautne ka alag hi maza hai

Trans: The people of this country will decide if I'm right or wrong and not you ... because I only believe in one court ... and that's the court of the people

Trans: The colour of the bullet that will leave touching me ... that colour will be erased from this country forever

Trans: Come and wash my car as you can't rap ... here take some money and have fun you beggar

Trans: Power has only one center ... and that center is the president of a political party

Title: Cabaret

Trans: Why does a heart trust someone ... only the heart knows that

Title: Cabaret

Trans: Why does a heart do whatever it does ... only the heart knows that

Trans: When it comes to a brave lion ... he either himself dies or he kills someone ... but he doesn't give up his territory

Title: S.P. Chauhan

Trans: To become a hero we don't have to be on the border or in a game stadium ... wherever we are, whatever condition we're in, we're different ... and we can do something different

Title: S.P. Chauhan

Title: S.P. Chauhan

Title: Total Dhamaal
Quote: Yeh roz subah jaldi uthte hai murge ki tarah ... phir aada adhoora khate hai kauve ki tarah ... phir breakfast karte hai bandar ki tarah ... phir office ko daudte hai ghode ki tarah ... phir kaam karte hai gadhe ki tarah ... phir ghar aakar daru peete hai machli ki tarah ... phir mujhpe bhaunkte hai kutte ki tarah ... phir khana khate hai magarmach ki tarah ... aur uske baad taange phaila ke soo jaate hai bhainso ki tarah ... dekho kaise ghoor rahe hai ulle ki tarah
Trans: He wakes up early everyday like a cock ... then he eats little bit here and there like a crow ... then he eats breakfast like a monkey ... then he runs to the office like a horse ... then he works like a donkey ... then he comes homes and drinks alcohol like a fish ... then he barks on me like a dog ... then he eats dinner like a crocodile ... then after that he spreads his legs and sleeps like a buffalo ... and now look, he's staring at me like an owl

Title: Total Dhamaal
Quote: Udta teer backside ghuste bahut baar dekha be ... pehli baar udta backside teer mein ghusega
Trans: I've seen a flying arrow enter into one's backside many times ... but for the first time a flying backside will enter into an arrow

Title: Total Dhamaal
Quote: Aaj ke zamane mein mard hona hi ek tragedy hai, tragedy ... apne mummy ke saamne wife se pyar se baat karo toh joru ka ghulam ... wife ke saamne mummy se pyar se baat karo toh maa ke pallu se banda hua ... apne bachon ko maaro toh nirdayi ... aur kuch na kaho toh laparwah ... poore din ghar ke bahar raho toh aawara .. ghar ke andar behto toh naakara ... apni Mrs. se job na karao toh shakki ... aur karvao toh biwi ki kamai khane wala ... yehi ladies ko by mistake haath bhi lag jaye toh hum zalim ... aur yehi ladies apunko peete toh hum nalle
Trans: It's a tragedy to be a man in today's world ... if you talk with your wife with love in front of your mother, then you're called a wife's slave ... if you talk with your mother with love in front of your wife, then you're called a mama's boy ... if you beat your kids, then you're called a cruel person ... and if you don't say anything to them, then you're called a careless person ... if you stay all day out of the house, then you're called a vagrant person ... and if you sit in the house all day, then you're called a useless person ... if you don't allow your wife to work, then you're called a suspicious person ... and if you allow your wife to work, then you're called a person who lives on his wife's money ... if you happen to even touch a woman by mistake, then you're called an evil person ... and if a woman beats us, then we're called a weak man

Title: Total Dhamaal
Quote: Bhuji ko raakh kehte hai, jali ko aag kehte hai ... jisne tumhe bachaya usse Lallan ka dimaag kehte hai
Trans: Burning flames is called as fire and after burning what's left is called as ash ... the thing that has saved you is called as the brain of Lallan

Title: Fraud Saiyaan

Trans: If she'll leave then someone else will come ... if that one will leave then someone else will come ... there's no shortage of women with soft wrists in our country

Title: Fraud Saiyaan
Quote: Berozgar pati ko kaam ke liye utsana chahiye ... kamasutra ke liye nahi
Trans: You should encourage your jobless husband for work ... and not for sex

Title: Bharat
Quote: Aksar log mujhse poochte hai ki mera surname kya hai, jaati kya hai, dharam kya hai ... aur main unse muskurake kehta hoon ... ki is desh ke naam pe mere bauji ne mera naam Bharat rakha ... ab itne badhe naam ke aage jaati, dharam, surname lagake na toh apna aur na hi is desh ka maan kam kar sakta hoon
Trans: Often people ask me what's my surname, caste, religion ... and I smile and tell them that ... my father named me Bharat which is the name of our country ... now by adding my surname, caste, religion to my name, I can't reduce my pride nor that of my country

Title: Bharat
Quote: Jitne safed baal mere sar aur daari mein hai ... usse kahin zyada rangeen meri zindagi rahi hai
Trans: The number of white hair that I have on my head and in my beard ... my life has been much more colourful than that count

Title: Bharat
Quote: Yeh sher boodha zaroor ho gaya hai ... lekin shikaar karna nahi bhoola
Trans: This lion may have become old ... but he hasn't forgotten how to hunt

Title: Bharat
Quote: Har muskurate huye chehre ke peeche ek dard chupa hota hai ... aur shayad wohi dard aapko zinda rakhta hai
Trans: There's some sort of pain hidden behind every smiling face ... and may be that pain keeps us alive

Title: Rangeela Raja
Quote: Pyar mein dara nahi jaata ... pyar mein toh kuch kara jaata hai
Trans: One should not feel scared when in love ... one should actually do something when in love

Title: Rangeela Raja
Quote: Jab jab is dharti pe Sita haran karne ke liye koi Ravan aayega ... tab tab Ram ka saath dene ke liye yeh Hanuman aayega
Trans: Whenever someone like Ravana will come to kidnap Goddess Sita ... then this helper of Lord Rama will come in the form of Hanuman

Title: Rangeela Raja
Quote: Umar toh kasrat karne ki hoti hai ... hasrat karne ki nahi hoti hai ... aazmana hai toh ab bhi aazma sakti hai ... aur shamma jab tak bhujti nahi aag laga sakti hai
Trans: Age has limitations on exercise ... it doesn't have limitations on desires ... if you want, you can even test me out now ... and until a flame extinguishes, it can start a fire

Title: Rangeela Raja
Quote: Rajasthan mein oonth chalta hai par kisi ka jhoot nahi chalta
Trans: A camel can survive in Rajasthan, but not a lie

Title: Mohalla Assi
Quote: Charitra aadmi ko banata hai ... kapde nahi
Trans: A person is known by his character ... and not by the clothes that he wears

Title: Mohalla Assi
Quote: Roti ka chakka jab kuchalta hai na ... toh sabse pehle moolya, siddhant, kuchle jaate hai
Trans: When the flour mill of bread crushes you ... then it crushes your values and principles first

Title: Mohalla Assi
Quote: Four things are very famous in Banaras ... Banaras ka Ganga, Banaras ka panda, Banaras ka paan aur Banaras ka zabaan
Trans: Four things are very famous in Varanasi ... the river Ganges of Varanasi, the saints of Varanasi, the betel leaf with nut of Varanasi and the language of Varanasi

Title: Mohalla Assi
Quote: Joh maza Banaras mein ... woh Paris mein na Far East mein
Trans: The enjoyment that you can get in Varanasi ... you won't get that in Paris and neither in the Far East

Title: Bombairiya
Quote: Hum jitna bhi logon se bhaage ya soche ki woh hi hamari problem hai ... par hum ek doosre ke solution bhi hai
Trans: No matter how much we run away from people or whether we think that they're our problem ... but we're also the solution for each other

Title: Bombairiya
Quote: Do niyam yaad rakhna is shehar ke baare mein ... property ki kimat per square foot duniya mein sabse zyada hai ... aur number of idiots per square foot woh bhi duniya mein sabse zyada hai
Trans: Just remember two rules of this city ... over here the price of property per square foot is the highest compared to anywhere in the world ... and the number of idiots per square foot are also the highest in the world

Title: Badla
Quote: Badla lena har baar sahi nahi hota ... lekin maaf kar dena bhi har baar sahi nahi hota
Trans: It's not always right to take revenge ... but to always forgive isn't right either

Title: Badla
Quote: Taqat ka nasha sabse bura nasha hota hai ... kyun ki jisse taqat ka nasha hota hai ... woh aankhen khuli hokar bhi dekh nahi paata ki woh kab girne wala hai
Trans: The intoxication of power is the worst form of intoxication ... because the one who's intoxicated by power ... he's unable to see when he's going to fall even with his eyes wide open

Title: Badla
Quote: Woh moorkh hota hai joh sirf sach ko hi jaanta hai ... aur sach aur jhooth ke fark ko nahi jaanta hai
Trans: A person is a fool if he knows just the truth ... and not the difference between the truth and the lie

Title: Badla
Quote: Sabka sach alag alag hota hai
Trans: Everyone has their own version of truth

Title: Kesari
Quote: Aaj meri paghdi bhi kesari ... joh bahega mera lahu bhi kesari ... aur mera jawab bhi kesari
Trans: Today my turban is saffron in colour ... my blood that will shed will also be saffron in colour ... and my response will also be saffron in colour

Title: Kesari
Quote: Ladne se sirf dushman khatam hota hai ... aur pani pilane se dushmani
Trans: Fighting will only kill the enemy ... but by offering them water, it'll kill the enmity

Title: Kesari
Quote: (Tum yeh jung jeet nahi sakte) - Jeet toh hum tab hi gaye the jab humne ladne ka faisla kiya tha ... baaki toh marna maarna hai ... chalta rahega
Trans: (You won't win this war) - We won this war the moment when we decided that we're going to fight ... what's remaining is killing and dying ... that will keep on going

Title: Notebook
Quote: Woh bahut khoobsurat hai lekin maine usse kabhi dekha hi nahi ... woh bahut bolti hai par maine usse kabhi suna hi nahi ... pyar ho gaya hai mujhe usse, jisse main kabhi mila hi nahi
Trans: She's very beautiful but I've never seen her ... she talks a lot but I've never heard her ... I'm in love with her and I've never met her

Title: Notebook
Quote: Main jaanta hoon tumhari zindagi mein mere liye koi jagah nahi hai ... lekin tumse pyar karne ke liye mujhe koi wajah ki zaroorat bhi nahi hai
Trans: I know that there's no space for me in your life ... but I don't need a reason to be in love with you

Title: Romeo Akbar Walter
Quote: Jung jeeti ya haari jaati hai sirf ek cheez ke basis par ... information
Trans: A war is won or lost on the basis of only one thing ... information

Title: Romeo Akbar Walter
Quote: Apni position se retire hona bahut aasaan hai ... magar apni soch se bahut mushkil
Trans: It's very easy to retire from your position ... but it's very hard to do that from your thoughts

Title: Luka Chuppi
Quote: Tumhara pariwar hai ya mobile network ... jahan jaate hai wahan pahunch jaata hai
Trans: Your family is like the mobile network ... wherever we go, it's always there

Title: Luka Chuppi
Quote: Jaati na poocho saadu ki, pooch lijiye gyaan ... mol karo talwar ka, pada rehan do myaan
Trans: Don't ask a pious man about his caste, ask him about his knowledge ... value the sword high, and let it remain in the scabbard

Title: Luka Chuppi
Quote: Je mard joh hote hai na, je money plant ke paudhe ki tarah hote hai ... har waqt pani ke sang sang inko disha bhi dikhani padti hai ... varna bhatak jaate hai
Trans: Men are like a money plant ... all the time along with water you have to show them the direction as well ... or else they get lost

Title: Kalank
Quote: Jab kisi aur ki barbaadi apni jeet jaisi lage ... toh humse zyada barbaad aur koi nahi hai is duniya mein
Trans: When someone else's destruction seems like our victory ... then there's no one in the world who's as devastated as us

Title: Kalank
Quote: Mohabbat aur nafrat dono ke rang laal hai ... lekin fark yeh hai ki nafrat se duniya barbaad ho jaati hai ... aur mohabbat mein khud barbaad hona padta hai ... phir bhi kalank aksar mohabbat pe lagta hai
Trans: The colour of love and hatred both are red ... but the difference is that in hatred the world gets destroyed ... and in love you have to destroy yourself ... but still love is the one that gets defamed

Title: Kalank
Quote: Kuch rishtey karzon ki tarah hote hai ... unhe nibhana nahi, chukana padta hai
Trans: Some relationships are like debts ... you don't have to fulfill them, instead you have to repay them

Title: Kalank
Quote: Pyar na karne ki hazar wajah mil sakti hai darr ke bazar mein ... lekin pyar karne ki sirf ek dhoondni hoti hai apne dil mein
Trans: You'll find thousands of reasons in the market of fear for not falling in love ... but you have to search for only one reason in your own heart to fall in love

Title: PM Narendra Modi
Quote: Joh decision ek minute mein nahi hota ... woh decision hi nahi hota
Trans: A decision that is not taken in a minute ... that decision is not even a decision to begin with

Title: PM Narendra Modi
Quote: Hindustan aatank se nahi ... aatank Hindustan se darega
Trans: India won't fear terrorism ... terrorism will fear India

Title: PM Narendra Modi
Quote: Jeetne ka maza tab aata hai jab sab aapke haarne ki umeed karte hai
Trans: The real joy of winning comes only when everyone is expecting you to lose

Title: PM Narendra Modi
Quote: Tumne hamara balidaan dekha hai ... ab badla bhi dekhoge
Trans: You've seen our sacrifice ... now you'll also see our revenge

Title: Mard Ko Dard Nahi Hota
Quote: Har mind blowing kahani ke peeche na ... kuch bahut hi bure decisions hote hai
Trans: Behind every mind blowing story ... there are some very bad decisions

Title: Mard Ko Dard Nahi Hota
Quote: Nazar gul toh goti gul
Trans: If you look away then you'll lose your b*lls

Title: Mard Ko Dard Nahi Hota
Quote: Bruce Lee se zyada zaroori ab life mein saheli hai
Trans: A girlfriend is more important in your life than Bruce Lee

Title: Student Of The Year 2
Quote: Din tera tha ... saal mera hoga
Trans: The day belongs to you ... but the year will be mine

Title: Student Of The Year 2
Quote: Jinke apne khud ke sapne nahi hote ... unki poori life auron ke sapne poore karne mein lag jaati hai ... issi liye life mein apna sapna khud chhuno ... aur usse khuli aankhon se dekho ... taaki jab woh sach ho toh sabse pehle woh tumhe dikhe
Trans: Those who don't have their own dreams ... they spend their entire life trying to fulfill dreams of others ... that's why in life you should select your own dreams ... and you should see them with open eyes ... so that when they become a reality, you should be the first one to see them

Title: Student Of The Year 2
Quote: Life agar maidan hai toh usse do hisso mein divide karo ... ek mein sapne, doosre mein asliyat ... jisse paar wohi karta hai joh bharosa kismat se zyada apni mehnat par kare
Trans: If life's a playground, then divide it in two parts ... put dreams in one part and reality in other ... now the one who has more faith in his hard work than in his luck, he's the one who crosses life successfully

Title: Student Of The Year 2
Quote: Jis din kabaddi kabaddi khelte huye tere paale mein ghusunga ... teri izzat ke saath saath teri pehchaan ko bhi hawa mein uchaal dunga
Trans: The day I enter your side while playing kabaddi against you ... that day I'll toss your respect and your identity up in the air

Title: The Tashkent Files
Quote: Rajneeti mein kuch sach nahi hota ... yehi iska sach hai
Trans: Nothing is the truth when it comes to politics ... and that's the only truth about it

Title: The Tashkent Files
Quote: Kings sabko yaad rehte hai ... kingmakers yaad nahi rehte
Trans: Everyone remembers the kings ... but no one remembers the kingmakers

Title: The Tashkent Files
Quote: Raajneeti mein jeetna bahut zaroori hai ... kyun ki haare huye log desh ki taqdeer nahi badal sakte
Trans: It's very important to win in politics ... because losers aren't capable of changing the destiny of a country

Title: The Tashkent Files
Quote: Idiots hai woh jinko sach se darr lagta hai ... darna rumours se chahiye ... kyun ki rumour ko agar roka na gaya toh woh aisa sach ban jaata hai ... jiske saamne sach bhi jhooth lagne lagta hai
Trans: People who fear the truth are idiots ... instead you should fear rumours ... because if you don't stop a rumour then it becomes a type of truth ... in front of which even the real truth seems like a lie

Title: Milan Talkies
Quote: Sasti sharaab aur sasta sex nuksaan hi karta hai guru
Trans: Cheap alcohol and cheap sex always causes harm

Title: Milan Talkies
Quote: Film hit ho ya flop ho, zindagi super-hit honi chahiye boss ... aur zindagi tab super-hit hoti hai jab aapko woh hasil ho jaye joh aapne apne dil se chaha ho
Trans: It doesn't matter if a film is a hit or a flop, but life must be super-hit ... and life only becomes super-hit when you attain something that you've desired from your heart

Title: India's Most Wanted
Quote: Aatma kabhi nahi marti, shareer marta hai ... main logon ko maar nahi raha hoon ... bas unki aatma ko doosre shareer mein bhej raha hoon
Trans: Only the body dies and not a soul ... I'm not killing people ... I'm just sending their souls into another body

Title: India's Most Wanted
Quote: Yeh jung hai ... is jung mein kuch bhi ho ... chahe marenge ya maarenge ... milegi toh jannat hi
Trans: This is war ... and no matter what happens in this war ... we'll die or we'll kill ... in either case we'll attain heaven

Title: India's Most Wanted
Quote: Joh koi bhi kisi bekasoor ka qatal karta hai ... woh poori insaaniyat ka qatil hai ... joh koi bhi ek zindagi bachata hai ... woh poori insaaniyat ko bachata hai
Trans: The one who kills an innocent person ... that person is the killer of the entire humanity ... the one who saves even one life ... that person is the saviour of the entire humanity

Title: De De Pyaar De
Quote: Main har cheez dobara kar lunga ... har jagah dobara chal lunga ... har galati dobara kar lunga ... har ladai dobara ladh lunga ... dobara mana lunga ... dobara our song chhun lunga ... dobara pet name bhi soch lunga ... har jhooth dobara bol lunga ... har taana dobara sun lunga ... har hasi dobara has lunga ... har aansun dobara roh lunga ... tere bina life badi jee huyi baasi si lagti hai ... mujhe ek baar phir apne saath dobara jeene de na
Trans: I'll do everything again ... I'll go to every place again ... I'll make every mistake again ... I'll fight every battle again ... I'll cajole you once again ... I'll select our song again ... I'll select my pet name again ... I'll say every lie again ... I'll listen to every taunt again ... I'll smile again ... I'll cry again ... the life that I've lived without you seems stale to me ... please let me live my life again along with you

Title: De De Pyaar De
Quote: Milke tujhe ban gaya hoon ... na milta toh adhoora reh jaata ... sang chalta zamane ki bheed mein ... na jaane kis raah pe jaata ... main adhoora reh jaata
Trans: I'm complete only after meeting you ... I would've remained incomplete had I not met you ... had I walked with the crowd of the world ... then who knows what path would've I chosen ... I would've remained incomplete without you

Title: De De Pyaar De
Quote: Shakal se shaadi-shuda aur harkaton se divorcee lagte ho
Trans: You look married from your face but your actions are that of a divorcee

Title: Super 30
Quote: Aaj raja ka beta raja nahi banega ... raja wohi banega joh haqdaar hoga
Trans: In today's age a king's son isn't going to become the king ... instead the one who deserves will become the king

Title: Super 30
Quote: Yeh ameer log apne liye khud chikna sadak banaye ... hamari raah mein aisa bada bada ghadda khod diye ... lekin yehi woh sabse badi galati kar diye ... humko saala chalang lagana sikha diye ... jab samay aayega toh sabse bada aur sabse lamba chalang hum hi maarenge
Trans: These rich people have built great roads for themselves ... and they dug big potholes in our path ... but their biggest mistake is that ... they taught us how to jump ... now when the time will come, then our jump will be the biggest and the longest

Title: Super 30
Quote: Aapatti se hi aavishkar ka janam hota hai
Trans: Invention is born from objection

Title: Super 30
Quote: Prayaas aur safalta ke beech mein ek hi number ka farak hota hai
Trans: There's only a one mark difference between an attempt and success

Title: Amavas
Quote: Sach hamesha woh nahi hota joh sirf dikhai de
Trans: Truth is not always what you see

Title: Amavas
Quote: Har sikke ke do pehlu hote hai ... if there is god, there is evil ... agar achai hai, toh burai bhi hai ... agar roshni hai, toh andhera bhi
Trans: Every coin has two sides ... if there is god, there is evil ... if there is good, then there is bad as well ... if there is light, then there is darkness as well

Title: Amavas
Quote: Joh aatma badla chahti ho ya phir koi adhoori khwaish poori karne aayi ho ... woh bahut dangerous hoti hai
Trans: A soul that returns to take revenge or perhaps to fulfill a desire ... that soul is very dangerous

Title: Kabir Singh
Quote: Life mein pehda hona, pyar karna aur mar jaana ... yeh 10% moments sabse important hote hai ... baaki 90% are just reactions to them
Trans: In life birth, falling in love and death ... these 10% moments are the most important ... and the rest 90% are just reactions to them

Title: Kabir Singh
Quote: I'm not a rebel without a cause
Trans: I'm not a rebel without a cause

Title: Kabir Singh
Quote: Jaante bhoojhte crime karna is a bigger crime
Trans: Committing a crime on purpose is a bigger crime

Title: Jabariya Jodi
Quote: Bihar mein teen tarah se jodiyan banti hai babu ... himmat walo ki arranged jodi ... kismat walo ki love jodi ... aur dahej ke lalchiyon ki jabariya jodi
Trans: In Bihar you'll find three types of couples ... an arranged marriage couple who have the courage ... a love marriage couple who are lucky ... and a forced marriage couple who are greedy for dowry

Title: Jabariya Jodi
Quote: Rukavat ke liye khed hai ... tumhara kidnap prepaid hai
Trans: I'm sorry for the interruption ... but your kidnap has been prepaid

Title: Jabariya Jodi
Quote: Mohabbat ki bebasi ko kah kahe mere dost ... ki baanh mein koi aur hai aur chah mein koi aur
Trans: My friend, how should I describe the helplessness that comes with love ... someone is there in my arms and I love someone else

Title: Jabariya Jodi
Quote: Woh jaa rahi thi humse door kuch is qadar ... jaise saansein chhodkar zindagi jaa rahi ho
Trans: She was going far from me in such a manner ... as if my breaths were leaving my life

Title: Jhootha Kahin Ka
Quote: Subah ka bhoola agar shaam ko laute toh usse bhoola nahi kehte ... par shaam ka bhoola agar subah laute toh usse doodh ka dhoola bhi toh nahi kehte
Trans: If one realizes his mistake and mends it later, then he's no longer wrong ... but if someone leaves in the evening and returns in the morning then he's not called a good person

Title: Jhootha Kahin Ka
Quote: Saala jitna tumhara shakal badsoorat hai utna tumhara aatma kaala hai ... itna kaala ki jab tumhara shareer se tumhara aatma niklega toh surya grahan padh jayega
Trans: Your soul is black just like your ugly face ... it's so black that when your soul will leave your body then there'll be a solar eclipse

Title: Jhootha Kahin Ka
Quote: Aaj kal doston ke beech mein jhappiyan gayi ... pappiyan chal rahi hai
Trans: Nowadays friends don't give hugs to each other ... they give kisses to each other

Title: Jhootha Kahin Ka
Quote: Mann mein jab jhol ho aur chaddi mein hole ho ... toh aap jitna bhi beparwah ghoomo ... duniya ko sab dikh hi raha hota hai
Trans: When you have something evil in your heart and when you have a hole in your underwear ... then no matter how carefree you roam around ... the world can see everything

Title: Judgementall Hai Kya
Quote: Aaj kal normal logon se darro
Trans: Nowadays one should fear normal people

Title: Judgementall Hai Kya
Quote: Jis daali pe maine nazar daali, woh daali kisi ne kaat daali
Trans: The branch that I had set my eyes on, someone happened to cut that branch

Title: Judgementall Hai Kya
Quote: Jab ek samajhdaar aadmi ki satakti hai na ... toh bade se bade pagal ko bhi na seedha kar deta hai
Trans: When an intelligent person goes crazy ... then he can even fix the maddest person

Title: Article 15
Quote: Life mein haan ya na ki probability 50-50 ki hoti hai ... aur mujhe lagta hai ki haan wala 50 bahut hota hai
Trans: The probability of yes or no in life is 50%-50% ... and I feel that the 50% of yes is more than enough

Title: Article 15
Quote: Chaand nikla hai zamane ke baad ... maza aa gaya hai aapke aane ke baad
Trans: The moon has come out after so many days ... there's enjoyment in the air after you've arrived

Title: Family of Thakurganj
Quote: Jung ladne se pehle jung ladne ke darr se bahar nikalna padta hai ... tab jaake fateh hoti hai
Trans: Before fighting a war one must eradicate the fear of fighting a war ... only then you can be victorious

Title: Family of Thakurganj
Quote: Bola kam hai ... yaad zyada rakhna
Trans: I've spoken very few words ... but you need to remember well whatever I've said

Title: Family of Thakurganj
Quote: Jin logon ke hausle kuchle jaate hai na ... manzil bhi wohi paate hai
Trans: The people whose hopes have been crushed ... they're the ones who attain their destination

Title: Family of Thakurganj
Quote: Dhanda koi bhi ho ... chalta zabaan pe hai
Trans: No matter what business it is ... it runs on promises

Title: Khamoshi
Quote: Aane wale kal ki umeed mein joh rehte hai ... unhe beeta hua kal hara nahi sakta
Trans: Those who have hopes for their future ... their past can't defeat them

Title: Khamoshi
Quote: Raat kitni bhi kaali kyun na ho ... subah ko nahi rok sakti
Trans: No matter how dark the night is ... it can't stop the morning from coming

Title: Khamoshi
Quote: Jab koi baat dil ko sahi lage ... tab woh baat sahi hoti hai ... phir duniya chahe kuch bhi kahe ... tum bas apne dil ki sun'na
Trans: When your heart thinks that something is right ... then that thing is actually right ... after that it doesn't matter what the world says ... you just listen to your heart

Title: Arjun Patiala
Quote: Jaise maa apne bachon mein farak nahi karti ... aise police wala bhi apne badmasho mein farak nahi karte ... hum sabko ek hi aankh se dekhenge ... maa ki aankh se
Trans: Like a mother doesn't differentiate between her children ... just like that even the police doesn't differentiate between their criminals ... we'll look at all of them with one eye ... with the evil eye

Title: Arjun Patiala
Quote: Jab chote the toh sochte the ki duniya badal denge ... vade huye toh samajh mein aaya ki duniya ko samajh le, yehi kaafi hai
Trans: When I was small I used to think that I'll change the world ... but when I grew up then I understood that, it's more than enough to even understand this world

Title: Arjun Patiala
Quote: Meri zindagi mein ladki ka aana utna hi mushkil hai jitna purani filmon mein court mein sahi salamat gawah ka pahunchna
Trans: A girl entering my life is as difficult as a witness reaching safely to the court, just like it happened in the old films

Title: Arjun Patiala
Quote: Padai likhai mann se karo ... lekin khel kood jamke karo
Trans: Study from your heart ... but play a lot as well

Title: Mission Mangal
Quote: A dream is not what you see in sleep ... a dream is something which does not let you sleep
Trans: A dream is not what you see in sleep ... a dream is something which does not let you sleep

Title: Mission Mangal
Quote: Pray to whatever god you want ... just pray to the power, not the picture
Trans: Pray to whatever god you want ... just pray to the power, not the picture

Title: Mission Mangal
Quote: Poori duniya se kaho copy that
Trans: Ask the entire world to copy us now

Title: Mission Mangal
Quote: There's no science without experiments
Trans: There's no science without experiments

Title: Khandaani Shafakhana
Quote: HIV positive, TB positive, Malaria positive ... yeh medical line na eklauti line hai jismein positive ka matlab bad news hota hai
Trans: HIV positive, TB positive, Malaria positive ... the medical field is the only field in which positive means bad news

Title: Khandaani Shafakhana
Quote: Har ek friend zaroori hota hai ... par sirf apni zaroorat dekhne wala friend na ... friend nahi hota
Trans: Every friend is important ... but a friend who looks only for his own interest ... isn't a friend

Title: Chhichhore
Quote: Tumhara result decide nahi karta hai ki tum loser ho ki nahi ... tumhari koshish decide karti hai
Trans: Your result doesn't decide if you're a loser or not ... your attempt decides that

Title: Chhichhore
Quote: Success ke baad ka plan sabke paas hai ... lekin agar galti se fail ho gaye ... toh failure se kaise deal karna hai ... koi baat hi nahi karna chahta
Trans: Everyone has a plan after achieving success ... but if you fail by mistake ... then how you need to deal with failure ... no one talks about that

Title: Chhichhore
Quote: Sache dost wohi hote hai ... joh achhe waqt mein aapki bajate hai ... aur jab mushkil waqt aata hai toh wohi chhichhore aapke darwaze par khade nazar aate hai
Trans: True friends are those ... who tease you a lot when your time is great ... and when the tough time comes, then the same vagrant friends are standing at your door

Title: Chhichhore
Quote: Doosron se haarke loser kehlane se kahin zyada bura hai ... khud se haarke loser kehlana
Trans: Being called a loser after losing to others is better than ... being called a loser after losing to yourself

Title: Prasthanam
Quote: Rajneeti bolo toh ek second ... socho toh ek minute ... seekh lo toh kuch din ... lekin rajneeti samajhne ke liye poori zindagi nikal jaati hai
Trans: You can talk about politics in one second ... you can think about it in one minute ... you can learn about it in a few days ... but it'll take you your entire life to understand politics

Title: Prasthanam
Quote: Politicians aur diapers ko badalna chahiye ... nahi toh gandagi phail jayegi
Trans: Politicians and diapers should always be changed ... or else it'll spread filthiness

Title: Prasthanam
Quote: Politics mein ek cheez yaad rakhna ... sikka uchle ya na uchle ... keechad zaroor uchalta hai
Trans: Always remember one thing in politics ... whether your plan works for you or not ... you'll always get defamed

Title: Prasthanam
Quote: Haq doge toh Ramayan shuru hogi ... cheenoge toh Mahabharat ... faisla tumhe karna hai Ramayan ke Mahabharat
Trans: If you give me my right then there'll be peace ... if you snatch it then there'll be a war ... now you have to decide between peace and war

Title: Saaho
Quote: Hamara rishta din aur raat jaisa hai ... dono ek doosre ke mohtaj hai ... aur ek saath reh bhi nahi sakte
Trans: Our relationship is like day and night ... we both are dependent on each other ... and we can't live together as well

Title: Saaho
Quote: Gully cricket mein toh sab Tendulkar hai ... asli talent woh hota hai joh bhare maidan ke bahar sixer maar sake
Trans: Everyone is Sachin Tendulkar in gully cricket ... but true talent is when someone hits a six out of the ground filled with spectators

Title: Saaho
Quote: Jab bache baat nahi maante toh unhe kahani sunai jaati hai ... jab badhe baat nahi maante toh unhe raaz bataye jaate hai
Trans: When kids don't listen then you tell them stories ... and when elders don't listen then you tell them secrets

Title: Saaho
Quote: Main tujhe itni jagah se khol doonga ... ke poore shehar ke mochi milke tujhe phir se sil nahi payenge
Trans: I'll tear you apart from so many places that ... all the cobblers of the city won't be able to stitch you back

Title: Pranaam
Quote: Hum zindagi ko nahi ... zindagi humko plan karti hai
Trans: We don't plan our life ... our life plans us

Title: Pranaam
Quote: Police aur neta is system ka woh hissa hai jinhe chheda nahi jaata ... lekin agar baat hadh se aage badh jaaye toh chhoda bhi nahi jaata
Trans: The police and politicians are that part of our system which one should not touch ... but if they cross the limits then you don't leave them as well

Title: Pranaam
Quote: Mauke aate nahi ... banaye jaate hai
Trans: Opportunities don't come ... they're created

Title: Pranaam
Quote: Sau sukh paaye maat pita jinke hoth sapoot ... narak bhog jeeye jaat hai jinke hoth kapoot
Trans: Parents who have a good child attain loads of happiness ... and parents who have an evil child attain the life of hell

Title: War
Quote: Hum bhi chal rahe the ... saaye bhi wahan the ... ishaare the kitne ... samajhdaar kahan the
Trans: I was walking ... even my shadows were there ... there were so many signals ... but where were the smart people

Title: War
Quote: Mauka mile toh goli chala dena, sochna mat ... main nahi sochunga
Trans: If you get a chance then fire the bullet, don't think ... because I won't think

Title: War
Quote: Sabse pehle watan ... uske baad watan ... aur aakhir mein watan
Trans: My country comes first ... after that comes my country again ... and in the end also comes my country

Title: War
Quote: Match khatam hone se pehle jeetni ki poori koshish karo ... bhaago, daudo, khelo, ladho, sab kuch ... par ek baar match khatam ho jaaye toh yeh mat socho ki tum haare ya jeete ... balki apne aap se yeh poocho, ki did I give it my very best or not ... aur agar tumhara jawaab haan hai ... then you're a winner
Trans: Try your best to win before the match ends ... run, sprint, play, fight, do everything ... but once the match is over, then don't think whether you won or lost ... instead ask yourself a question, that did I give it my very best or not ... and if your answer is yes ... then you're a winner

Title: Saand Ki Aankh
Quote: (Aurat chahe kisi bhi mukaam par pahunch jaye, par apni sahi umar batane se katrati hai) - Sahi umar batane mein ke hai ... par asal mein aurat us umar ka sahi hisaab na lage sake hai joh usne apne liye jee ho
Trans: (No matter how successful a woman becomes, she's always uncomfortable to disclose her real age) - There's no shyness in disclosing your real age ... but the reality is that a woman is unable to accurately calculate the age that she's lived for herself

Title: Saand Ki Aankh
Quote: Mardangi dhoti aur moochon mein na hove hai ... mardangi jigar mein hove hai
Trans: Manliness isn't in wearing a loincloth and growing a moustache ... manliness is in being courageous

Title: Saand Ki Aankh
Quote: Tann buddha hove hai ... mann buddha nahi hota
Trans: A body becomes old ... but a heart never becomes old

Title: Marjaavaan
Quote: Jaan toh woh bhi leta hai, joh tadpata hai aur phir khud hi marham ban jaata hai ... ishq
Trans: Even that thing takes your life, which torments you first and then itself becomes the medicine ... which we call as love

Title: Marjaavaan
Quote: Main maut se darta nahi hoon ... maut se woh log darte hai jinhe jeene ka lalach ho ... aur jab se tum mili ho main lalchi ho gaya hoon
Trans: I don't fear death ... only people who're greedy to live fear death ... but I've become greedy since I've met you

Title: Marjaavaan
Quote: Salaam-e-ishq meri jaan nahi qubool tujhko ... par tujhse pyar karne ki qubool hai bhool mujhko
Trans: My beloved, you won't accept my greetings of love ... but I accept the mistake of falling in love with you

Title: Marjaavaan
Quote: Zara gaur se sunoge toh ehsaas hoga ki har ek cheez mein music hai ... baarish ki girti boondon mein ... aankhon se girte aansun mein ... kisi ke shor mein ... kisi ki khamoshi mein ... har ek dhadkan ... har ek saans mein
Trans: If you listen carefully then you'll realize that there's music in everything ... in the falling drops of rain ... in the tears that fall from the eyes ... in the loud voice of someone ... in the silence of someone ... in every heartbeat ... in every breath

Title: Housefull 4
Quote: Tu mera pati ... main teri patni ... bhar de meri maang ... nahi toh cheer doongi teri taang
Trans: You're my husband ... I'm your wife ... fill my hair parting with vermilion ... or else I'll tear apart your legs

Title: Housefull 4
Quote: Kismat ki bhi ek khasiyat hoti hai ... kismat ka paiya ghoomta hai na ... toh saare paase apne aap hi palat jaate hai
Trans: Destiny has a speciality ... whenever the wheel of destiny spins ... then all the plans change automatically

Title: Housefull 4
Quote: Jiska zor kam hota hai wohi kamzor hota hai
Trans: The one who has a lose grip on things, is a weak person

Title: Housefull 4
Quote: Itihaas ki ek khasiyat hoti hai ... jab bhi woh khudko dohrata hai ... toh saare pyaade wahin khade milte hai
Trans: History has a speciality ... whenever it repeats itself ... then you find all the pawns standing in the same place

Title: The Zoya Factor
Quote: Dengue, malaria, polio ... inse bhi zyada khatarnak bimaari hai cricket
Trans: Dengue, malaria, polio ... even these diseases are nothing in front of cricket

Title: The Zoya Factor
Quote: Success mein na luck ka koi importance nahi hota hai ... woh sirf failure ke liye ek bahana hai
Trans: Luck has no importance when it comes to success ... that's just a reason used for failure

Title: The Zoya Factor
Quote: Players ka skill yeh tay karta hai ki ball ki speed kya hogi ... bat ka angle kya hoga ... aur fielder kis second pe upar koodhega ... par catch hoga ya sixer ... yeh toh sirf luck factor pe depend karta hai
Trans: The skill of players determines what will be the speed of the ball ... what will be the angle of the bat ... and at what second should the fielder jump up ... but will it be a catch or a six ... that only depends on the luck factor

Title: Bypass Road
Quote: Jinke dushman nahi hote ... unke apne hi dushman hote hai
Trans: Those who don't have enemies ... their dear ones become their enemies

Title: Bypass Road
Quote: Zindagi aur raste ek jaise hote hai ... kis modh pe badal jaaye, pata nahi chalta
Trans: Life and roads are similar ... you never know when they'll take a turn

Title: Bypass Road
Quote: Tum bas woh dekh rahe ho joh tumhe dekhna hai ... zindagi tumhe kya dikhana chahti hai woh dekho
Trans: You're just seeing what you want to see ... instead try to see what life is trying to show you

Title: Bypass Road
Quote: Mujhe hurt karoge, chalega ... lekin mere ego ko hurt karoge, woh nahi chalega
Trans: It's alright if you hurt me ... but it's not alright if you hurt my ego

Title: Laal Kaptaan
Quote: Zyada bhala na bolna ... zyada bhali na choop ... zyada bhala na barasna ... zyada bhali na dhoop
Trans: One should neither speak too much ... nor stay quiet all the time ... just like it's not good to have too much rain ... nor too much sunshine

Title: Laal Kaptaan
Quote: Aadmi ke paida hote hi kaal apne bhaise pe baithke chal padta hai usse vapis lewane ... aadmi ki zindagi utni jitna samay us bhaise ko laga us tak pahunchne mein
Trans: When a person is born then time sits on his buffalo and leaves to get him back ... hence the life of that person is equal to the time that it takes for that buffalo to reach him

Title: Laal Kaptaan
Quote: Joh aankhon se dikh jaaye ... woh zakhm hi kya
Trans: What can be seem from the eyes ... that wound is nothing

Title: Laal Kaptaan
Quote: Maut ki taiyaari pehda hote hi shuru ho jaati hai
Trans: The preparation for death starts right when that person is born

Title: Dabangg 3
Quote: Maarenge bhi hum aur bachayenge bhi hum ... yeh tumhari aatma dekhegi aur ghanta kuch nahi kar payegi
Trans: I'll hit you and I'll save you as well ... your soul will watch all this and hell it won't be able to do anything

Title: Dabangg 3
Quote: Narazgi is baat ki nahi hai humein ke tum hamare ghar mein gusse ... narazgi toh is baat ki hai ke tum hamare ghar mein gusse jab hum nahi the
Trans: I'm not upset from the fact that you entered my house ... I'm upset from the fact that you entered my house while I wasn't there

Title: Dabangg 3
Quote: Ek hota hai policewala aur ek hota hai gunda ... hum kehlate hai policewala gunda
Trans: Someone is a cop and someone is rowdy ... but I'm called a rowdy cop

Title: Dabangg 3
Quote: Jiske aage ho Ali aur peeche Bajrangbali ... uska kya ukhaadega Bali ya Baahubali
Trans: The one who has prophet Muhammad in front of him and Lord Hanuman behind him ... he can't be destroyed even by the great ones

Title: Made In China
Quote: Business start karne ke liye sabse zaroori cheez kya hoti hai pata hai ... ispaat ke andhkosh
Trans: Do you know what's the most important thing needed to start a business ... it's balls of steel

Title: Made In China
Quote: Sahi business wohi hai jahan aap problem ko nahi ... solution ko bechte hai
Trans: A real business is not the one in which you sell the problem ... it's the one in which you sell the solution

Title: Made In China
Quote: Aam aadmi sirf do tareeke se famous hota hai ... sahi jagah pe galat cheez bolke ... ya galat jagah pe sahi cheez bolke
Trans: A common man can become famous only in two ways ... either by saying the wrong thing in the right place ... or by saying the right thing in the wrong place

Title: Made In China
Quote: Sangharsh ko chunauti mat samjho ... sangharsh toh ek mauka hai ... sangharsh se aap bahut door tak ja sakte hai ... aur bina sangharsh ke aap kamyaabi ke nazdeek bhi nahi ja sakte
Trans: Don't think that struggling is a challenge ... struggling is an opportunity ... struggling can take you very far ... and without struggling you can't even get close to success

Title: Commando 3
Quote: Hindustani Hindu ho ya Musalman ... ab kisine ungli ki ... toh haath judega nahi, todega
Trans: Whether an Indian is Hindu or Muslim ... now if someone messes with us ... then our hands won't plead them, instead they'll break them apart

Title: Commando 3
Quote: Nasal ya fasal barbaad hoti hai toh desh barbaad hota hai
Trans: If the young generation or the crops go bad, then even the country goes bad with it

Title: Commando 3
Quote: Pehle pardon mein chupa karta tha ... ab mardon mein ... bahut jald kabr mein chupega tu ... bacha sakta hai tu khudko toh bachale
Trans: First you used to hide behind the curtain ... and now behind men ... very soon you'll hide in a grave ... try to save yourself if you can

Title: Commando 3
Quote: (Kafi jazbaati ho) - Na, sirf Bharatwadi
Trans: (You're very emotional) - No, I'm just a patriot of my country India

Title: Pati Patni Aur Woh
Quote: Biwi se sex maang le toh hum bikhari ... biwi ko sex na de toh hum atyachari ... aur kisi tarah jugaad lagake usse sex hasil karle na toh balatkari bhi hum hai
Trans: If we ask for sex from our wife then we're beggars ... if we don't give her sex then we're cruel ... and if we somehow hack our way into attaining sex from her then we're rapist as well

Title: Pati Patni Aur Woh
Quote: Phir kabhi kisi ne aapke hasi ki tareef ki ... toh sochiyega yeh hasi aapke chehre pe hai kis wajah se
Trans: If someone praises your smile ... then think who's the person behind that smile on your face

Title: Pati Patni Aur Woh
Quote: Tum joh karte ho uspe pyar aata hai ... aur joh nahi karte uspe zyada pyar aata hai
Trans: What you do, I love that ... and what you don't do, I love that more

Title: Pati Patni Aur Woh
Quote: Pati patni aur woh ke khele mein ... woh toh saala us gap ka naam hai ... joh pati aur patni apne beech mein aa jaane dete hai, khud hi
Trans: In the game of husband, wife, and the other woman ... the other woman is the name of that gap ... which the husband and the wife create between them, by themselves

Title: Panipat
Quote: Main bhi tumhare saath chalungi ... sukh mein peeche rahungi aur dukh mein aage aa jaungi
Trans: Even I'll come with you ... I'll stay behind you in your moments of happiness and I'll come in front of you in your moments of sadness

Title: Panipat
Quote: Main is dharti ke mitti ke ek kann ke liye bhi marne ko taiyaar hoon
Trans: I'm ready to die even for one small particle of this land's soil

Title: Panipat
Quote: Soorma wohi hai bade joh har haal mein lade ... sar hatheli par lekar chale ... dharam unka hai veerta, karam unka hai veerta ... jeet ya haar hogi yeh sochte nahi
Trans: A brave person is someone who fights under any condition ... he's someone who walks with his death in his hand ... bravery is his faith and duty ... and they don't think whether they'll win or lose

Title: Bala
Quote: Aap mote, kaale, naate, ganje, chahe jaise bhi dikhte ho ... agar aap apne aapse pyar karenge toh duniya bhi aapse pyar karegi
Trans: Fat, dark skinned, short, bald, no matter how you look ... if you'll love yourself then even the world will love you

Title: Bala
Quote: Roothi huyi girlfriend lautke aa sakti hai ... gayi huyi sarkar vapas aa sakti hai ... lekin gaye huye baal vapas nahi aate guru
Trans: An upset girlfriend can return ... a lost government can return ... but the hair once lost can never return

Title: Bala
Quote: Hum baal hai ... sabse bada bawaal hai ... khopdi ki khaal hai ... bheje ki dhaal hai ... agar mil gaye toh kamaal hai ... aur nahi mile toh zindagi bhar ka malaal hai
Trans: I'm hair ... I'm the biggest thing ... I'm the skin for the skull ... I'm the cover for the brain ... if you have me then it's great ... and if you don't have me then you'll cry for your entire life

Title: Bala
Quote: Kutta agar kaat le toh 14 sui lagta hai ... lekin agar khudhai ka kutta kaat le toh 28
Trans: If a dog bites you then you have to get 14 injections ... but if your own dog bites you then you have to get 28 injections

Title: Pagalpanti
Quote: Yeh sach hai ki calendar har tareek ko badalta hai ... lekin ek tareek aisi bhi aati hai joh calendar ko hi badal deti hai
Trans: It's true that the calendar changes the date every day ... but there comes one date which changes the calendar itself

Title: Pagalpanti
Quote: Agar niyat saaf ho aur aadmi imaandari se kaam kare ... toh sade-saati bhi uska kuch nahi bighad sakti
Trans: If a person works with honesty and with good intentions ... then even bad luck can't ruin anything for him

Title: Pagalpanti
Quote: Yeh six-pack, eight-pack, yeh body, kisi bhi gym mein ban sakti hai ... par aisa koi gym nahi bana jahan himmat banti ho
Trans: This six-pack, this eight-pack, this body, can be developed in any gym ... but there's no gym where courage can be developed

Title: Pagalpanti
Quote: Is matlabi duniya mein agar koi bematlab ki baat bol jaaye ... toh us betmatlabi baat ka bhi bahut bada matlab hota hai ... aur tum jaise matlabi insaan ke saath rehne ka yeh matlab hai ki ... saari duniya ka matlab samajh mein aa jaata hai
Trans: If someone says something useless in this selfish world ... then even those useless words have a very useful meaning ... and the meaning of living with selfish people like you is that ... it teaches you the meaning of the entire world

Title: Dream Girl (2019)
Quote: Duniya mein har koi galat hai ... aur sahi woh hai joh kam galat hai
Trans: Everyone in this world is wrong ... but the one who's the least wrong, is the right one

Title: Dream Girl (2019)
Quote: Duniya mein jitni bheed badhti jaa rahi hai ... log utne hi akele hote jaa rahe hai
Trans: The more the population of the world grows ... that much more the people are feeling lonely

Title: Dream Girl (2019)
Quote: Dil kehta hai unse mil ... dimag kehta hai duty ke baad mil
Trans: My heart tells me to go and meet her ... but my mind tells me to meet her after work

Title: Dream Girl (2019)
Quote: Mard ke sar ke baal white ho sakte hai, lekin dil ke nahi
Trans: A man's hair on his head can turn white, but not the hair on his heart

Title: Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior
Quote: Har Maratha pagal hai ... swaraj ka, Shivaji raje ka, bagwe ka
Trans: Every Maratha is crazy ... for independence, for Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, for the saffron flag

Title: Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior
Quote: Yudh mein shastra nahi, saahas chahiye ... sena nahi, himmat chahiye
Trans: In a war you don't need weapons, you need valour ... you don't need an army, you need courage

Title: Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior
Quote: Jab Shivaji raje ki talwar chalti hai ... toh auraton ka ghunghat aur brahmanon ka janeyu salamat rehta hai
Trans: When the sword of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj moves ... then the veil of women and the faith of religious people is well protected

Title: Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior
Quote: Joh yodha apni talwar khud banata hai ... us par uska vishwas dugna ho jaata hai
Trans: A warrior who builds his own sword ... doubles his faith on it

Title: Street Dancer 3D
Quote: Chahe tere lab pe Waheguru da naam aave ya na aave ... lekin woh pal bhi ibadat da haunda hai jab tu kisi aur ke kaam aave
Trans: It doesn't matter if the name of God is on your lips or not ... because even that moment is a moment of worship, when you help others

Title: Street Dancer 3D
Quote: Champion bhi ikka tab nikalta hai jab saamne badshah hota hai
Trans: Even a champion shows his ace only when there's a king in the game

Title: Street Dancer 3D
Quote: Meri life ka rule number 1 hai ... never be number 2
Trans: The number 1 rule of my life is ... never be number 2

Title: Street Dancer 3D
Quote: Tu jaanta hai tumhare aur hamare dance mein kya farak hai ... tu khud ke liye dance karta hai ... hum doosron ke liye
Trans: Do you know what's the difference between your dance and ours ... you dance for yourself ... and we dance for others

Title: Panga
Quote: Jab insaan ka waqt badalta hai na ... toh aas paas ke logon ka ravaiya bhi badal jaata hai
Trans: When a person's time changes ... then even the behaviour of the people around him changes

Title: Panga
Quote: Koi bhi khiladi us din ke liye khelta hai, jis din woh desh ke liye khelta hai
Trans: Every player plays for that special day, the day when he gets a chance to play for his country

Title: Panga
Quote: Har ek khiladi apne liye ya apne team ke liye khelta hai ... sirf kuch ek khushnaseeb khiladi aise hote hai, jinko desh ke liye khelne ka mauka milta hai
Trans: Every player plays for himself or his team ... but only a few lucky ones get the opportunity to play for their country

Title: Shimla Mirchi
Quote: Deewane ka dimaag hai khali ... bina hope ke hi duniya basa li
Trans: This lover's brain is empty ... but still you've settled in your world without any hope

Title: Shimla Mirchi
Quote: Kuch log joh sochte hai usse paate hai ... aur kuch aise loser hote hai joh sirf apna waqt ganwate hai
Trans: Some people attain what they aim for ... and some people are losers who just waste their time

Title: Shimla Mirchi
Quote: Pyar us hi se karna joh tumse pyar kare ... khud se zyada tumpar aitbaar kare
Trans: Fall in love with the one who loves you ... the one who trusts you more than themselves

Title: Shimla Mirchi
Quote: Tareef kya karoon main aapki, words nahi milte ... itne kam budget mein aise honhar balak nahi milte
Trans: How should I praise you, as I can't seem to find the words ... and you can't find such great guys in such a low budget

Title: Jai Mummy Di
Quote: Kehte hai bhagwan ka sakshat roop hoti hai maa ... joh kaam bhagwan bhi nahi kar sakte, woh maa karti hai ... lekin jab ek maa doosri maa se takrati hai ... toh yehi maa sabki maa ki
Trans: It's said that a mother is a guise of god ... what even god can't do, a mother can do that ... but when a mother fights with another mother ... then the same mother destroys everything

Title: Jai Mummy Di
Quote: Himmat tabhi aati hai jab poori tarike se phatti pe hoti hai
Trans: You only find the courage in you when you're totally scared to death

Title: Marne Bhi Do Yaaron
Quote: Main samay hoon ... main dard nahi, dawa bhi nahi ... main khuda nahi, duaa bhi nahi ... yaaron mujhse darna nahi ... aur waqt se pehle kabhi marna nahi
Trans: I'm time ... I'm not pain and neither a medicine ... I'm not god and neither a prayer ... friends don't be scared of me ... and never die before the time of your death

Title: Marne Bhi Do Yaaron
Quote: Waqt ek parinda hai ... aur woh us hi ke saath hai joh zinda hai
Trans: Time is a bird ... and it's only on the side of someone who is alive

Title: Marne Bhi Do Yaaron
Quote: Apne desh ki chitti ho ya mitti ho ... dono ko hi dekhkar bada sukoon milta hai
Trans: Be it a letter or the soil from your country ... you find peace when you see any of them

Title: Marne Bhi Do Yaaron
Quote: Aadmi chahe kitni bhi oonchaiyon par pahunch jaaye na ... lekin raaste pairon ke neeche hote hai
Trans: No matter what heights a person reaches ... but his paths are always under his footsteps

Title: Malang
Quote: Ek darr do baar nahi lagta
Trans: A fear of something can't last twice

Title: Malang
Quote: Badle mein hamesha do kabarein khodni padti hai ... jis mein ek apni khudki hoti hai
Trans: When taking revenge you have to always dig two graves ... in which one of them belongs to you

Title: Malang
