Quote: Darr ki pahunch na bahut solid hoti hai ... kisi ko dil pe effect karti hai ... kisi ko dimaag pe ... aur kisi ko seedha taango ke beech
Trans: Fear has very solid impact ... it effects someone on their heart ... it effects someone on their mind ... and it effects someone directly with their confidence

Title: Malang
Quote: Aaj ka andhera bahut gehra aane wala hai ... aur khamoshi kaan phaad
Trans: Tonight's darkness will be pitch dark ... and the silence will tear your ears

Title: Love Aaj Kal (2020)
Quote: Joh kehne ko aaya tha ... ankahi hi reh gayi woh baat ... sab baaton ke baat
Trans: What I'd come to say ... I wasn't able to say that ... even after all the conversations

Title: Love Aaj Kal (2020)
Quote: Aana toh poori tarah aana ... ya toh aana hi mat
Trans: If you come then come wholeheartedly ... or else don't even come

Title: Jawaani Jaaneman
Quote: Sher hoon main sher ... aur sher tab tak raja hota hai jab tak akela rehta hai
Trans: I'm a lion ... and a lion is a king until he's single

Title: Jawaani Jaaneman
Quote: Mard apni poori zindagi mardangi ki baatein karte hai ... par pregnancy sunte hi jaise namard ho jaate hai
Trans: Men keep talking about their manhood for their entire life ... but when they hear about pregnancy then they become a coward

Title: Jawaani Jaaneman
Quote: Family na aadmi ko chomu bana deti hai
Trans: A family turns a brave person into a timid one

Title: Thappad
Quote: Rishtey banane mein utni effort nahi lagti jitna nibhane mein lagti hai
Trans: It takes more effort to fulfill on a relationship than what it takes to create it

Title: Thappad
Quote: Hum toh hamesha sahi sochke karte hai ... aur kayi baar sahi karne ka result happy nahi hota
Trans: We always do things thinking they're right ... but many a times the result of doing the right thing ain't happy

Title: Thappad
Quote: Har rishta flawed hota hai ... usse jodke rakhna padta hai
Trans: Every relationship is flawed ... we have to keep it well bonded

Title: Baaghi 3
Quote: Mujhpe aati toh main chhod deta ... mere bhai pe aati toh main phod deta
Trans: If I'm hurt then I can leave you alone ... but if my brother is hurt then I'll break you apart

Title: Baaghi 3
Quote: Agar mere bhai ko kuch hua na ... toh kasam hamare baap ki ... tumhare desh ko is duniya ke nakshe se mitta dunga
Trans: If something happens to my brother ... then I swear on our father ... I'll erase your country from the map of this world

Title: Baaghi 3
Quote: Log rishton mein hadein paar karte hai ... mera ek aisa rishta tha jiske liye maine sarhadein paar kardi
Trans: People cross limits for their relationships ... I had one such relationship for which I crossed borders

Title: Baaghi 3
Quote: Aisi kya cheez hai joh insaan khareedta toh hai, pehenta nahi hai ... aur joh penhenta hai woh khareedta nahi hai ... kafan
Trans: What's that one thing which a person buys but he doesn't wear it ... and the person who wears it doesn't buy it ... a shroud

Title: Happy Hardy And Heer
Quote: Dil mera pehli baar zor se dhadka hai ... unki ek jhalak milte hi life mein chha gaya filmy romance ka tadka hai
Trans: My heart is beating fast for the first time ... just one glimpse of her has brought the spice of romantic movies in my life

Title: Happy Hardy And Heer
Quote: Insaan jab bachpan mein hota hai na, toh usse koi farak nahi padta hai ki log uske baare mein kya sochte hai ... aur jawani mein woh parwah nahi karta hai ki log uske baare mein kya sochte hai ... lekin budhape mein aate aate pata chalta hai ki log toh tumhare baare mein sochte hi nahi hai
Trans: In childhood we don't care what people think about us ... and in youth we tend to ignore what people think about us ... but in old age we come to know that, people were never even thinking about us

Title: Happy Hardy And Heer
Quote: Hum life ko theek se samajhte nahi hai ... joh hamare paas nahi hai uski talash rehti hai ... aur joh paas hai woh hamare liye khaas nahi hota ... aur jab tak paas wale ki value samajh mein aati hai na ... tab tak woh past ban jaati hai
Trans: We don't understand life very well ... we always keep searching for things that we don't have ... and the things that we have with us aren't important to us ... and by the time we understand the value of things that we have ... those things become a thing of the past

Title: Happy Hardy And Heer
Quote: Dil chhune wali kahaniyan kabhi dil cheer bhi deti hai
Trans: Sometimes the stories that touch your heart, break them as well

Title: Motichoor Chaknachoor
Quote: Kabab mein haddi aur jawani mein buddhi ... sahi na hoye
Trans: Meat with bones and an old woman in your prime youth ... isn't good for you

Title: Motichoor Chaknachoor
Quote: (Kaa kare feelings hi nahi aa rahe?) - Tum aankh band karo aur Burj Khalifa ke bare mein socho ... feelings apne aap aa jayegi
Trans: (What should I do as I'm not feeling it?) - Just close your eyes and think about the Burj Khalifa ... the feelings will automatically come to you

Title: Motichoor Chaknachoor
Quote: Hamao byah hoke rahega ... London, America, Dubai nahi mila toh ... Nepal, Sri Lanka, Bhutan toh milega
Trans: I'll get married no matter what ... so what if I'm unable to get married in London, America, Dubai ... I still have a chance in Nepal, Sri Lanka, Bhutan

Title: Motichoor Chaknachoor
Quote: Aadmi aur bandar, kitne bhi budha jaaye ... gulati maarna nahi bhoolte
Trans: Be it a man or a monkey, no matter how old they get ... they'll never forget how to do a somersault

Title: Shubh Mangal Zyada Saavdhan
Quote: Shaadiyan mahurat se hoti hai ... par pyar ka koi mahurat nahi hota hai ... na rang hota hai ... aur na koi ling hota hai
Trans: Marriages happen on auspicious dates ... but there are no auspicious dates when it comes to love ... neither does it have a particular colour ... and nor does it have a particular gender

Title: Shubh Mangal Zyada Saavdhan
Quote: Jack and Johnny went up the hill to live in love and laughter ... Jack ki leli papa ne aur Johnny chup gaya bhaagkar
Trans: Jack and Johnny went up the hill to live in love and laughter ... Jack was scolded by his father and Johnny just ran away and was hiding

Title: Shubh Mangal Zyada Saavdhan
Quote: Roz humein ladai ladni padti hai zindagi mein ... par joh ladai pariwar ke saath hoti hai woh saari ladaiyon mein sabse badi aur khatarnak hoti hai
Trans: We face battles everyday in life ... but the battle that we have with our family is the most dangerous one

Title: Sooryavanshi
Quote: Jis goli se tu marega uske upar aisa bade mein likha hoinga ... Made in India
Trans: The bullet that will kill you will be stamped in bold reading ... Made in India

Title: Sooryavanshi
Quote: Mumbai police passport pe religion dekhkar goli nahi chalati ... criminal record dekhkar thokti hai
Trans: Mumbai police doesn't fire a bullet based on the religion mentioned on the passport ... it fires based on the criminal record

Title: Sooryavanshi
Quote: Pariwar hi jeevan ki sabse khaas dein hai
Trans: Family is the most important gift of life

Title: Sooryavanshi
Quote: Is desh mein jitni nafrat Kasab ke liye hai ... utni hi izzat Kalam ke liye hai
Trans: The amount of hatred this country has for Kasab ... we have the same amount of respect for Abdul Kalam

Title: Angrezi Medium
Quote: Zindagi mein kuch bhi hone se pehle, imaandar hona bahut zaroori hai
Trans: In life before you become anything, it's important to be honest

Title: Angrezi Medium
Quote: Aadmi ka sapna toot jaata hai na, toh aadmi khatam ho jaata hai
Trans: When a person's dream breaks, then the person breaks down as well

Title: Angrezi Medium
Quote: Bharat ko angrezon se azaadi lene mein 200 saal lage the ... tu 18 tak toh ruk hi sakti hai
Trans: It took India 200 years to get freedom from the British ... you can wait at least until you turn 18

Title: Angrezi Medium
Quote: Shauk do tarah ke hove hai ... ek toh woh joh samay ke saath khatam ho jave hai ... aur duja woh joh samay ke saath maqsad ban jave hai
Trans: There are two types of hobbies ... one which ends over a period of time ... and second that turns into your mission over a period of time

Title: Dil Bechara
Quote: Janam kab lena hai aur marna kab hai ... hum decide nahi kar sakte ... par kaise jeena hai ... woh hum decide kar sakte hai
Trans: Our birth and our death ... we don't decide that ... but how to live life ... we can decide that

Title: Dil Bechara
Quote: Main serial killer, tum serial kisser ... kya jodi hai
Trans: I'm a serial killer and you're a serial kisser ... we make a great pair

Title: Dil Bechara
Quote: Tum mere heart ke liye zaroori ho ... it beats faster every time you come closer
Trans: You're important for my heart ... it beats faster every time you come closer

Title: Dil Bechara
Quote: Hollywood kare toh wow ... Tollywood kare toh how
Trans: If Hollywood does it, then people say wow ... but if Telugu cinema does it, then people say how

Title: Shakuntala Devi
Quote: (Kya hai aapki age?) - Main beete huye kal se ek din badi hoon ... aur aane wale kal se ek din choti hoon ... now you do the math
Trans: (What's your age?) - I'm one day elder than yesterday ... and one day younger than tomorrow ... now you do the math

Title: Shakuntala Devi
Quote: Maa zyada pyar karle toh bache bighad jaate hai ... bachon ko thoda kam pyar karde toh bhi bache bighad jaate hai ... koi maa perfect maa hoti hi nahi hai
Trans: If a mother loves her child a lot then the child becomes naughty ... and if she loves a little less then too the child becomes naughty ... that's why no mother is perfect

Title: Shakuntala Devi
Quote: Maa ko bhagwan ka nahi ... bhagwan ko maa ka darja diya jaata hai
Trans: A mother isn't given the status of god ... in fact god is given the status of a mother

Title: Shakuntala Devi
Quote: Doosre kya sochte hai sochne lagenge, toh saari zindagi bhar sochte hi reh jayenge
Trans: If we start thinking about what others think about us, then we'll just keep thinking for our entire life

Title: Class Of 83
Quote: Police system ek aisa sikka hai jiske do side hote hai ... ek side law aur doosra order
Trans: The police system is a coin that has two sides ... on one side there's law and on the other side there's order

Title: Class Of 83
Quote: Kabhi kabhi order banaye rakhne ke liye ... law ko bali chadana padta hai
Trans: Sometimes to maintain order ... you have to sacrifice the law

Title: Class Of 83
Quote: Har body ka immune system hota hai ... government bodies, educational bodies, judicial bodies, yeh sab mazboot qilay hai ... inka immune system itna sakht hota hai ke inhe bahar ki maar se hilaya nahi ja sakta ... inhe andar se bimaari ki tarah sadana padta hai
Trans: Every body has an immune system ... government bodies, educational bodies, judicial bodies, these are all strong like forts ... their immune system is so strong that you can't even shake them from the outside ... you have to destroy them like a disease from inside

Title: Class Of 83
Quote: You have the will to kill ... lekin field mein kaam aata hai skill to survive
Trans: You have the will to kill ... but in the field you need the skill to survive

Title: Sadak 2
Quote: Humko duniya vaisi hi nazar aati hai jaise hum khud hote hai
Trans: We see the world in the same way as we ourselves are

Title: Sadak 2
Quote: Desh ke kone kone mein bijli laane se andhera nahi mitega ... hum sabko ek hokar andhvishwas ke andheron se ladna hoga
Trans: You won't eliminate darkness by bringing light to every corner of the country ... for that we'll have to unite and fight against the darkness of superstition

Title: Sadak 2
Quote: Asli himmat woh hoti hai joh darr ke bawajood jutani padti hai
Trans: True courage is that when we can gather it in spite of fear

Title: Sadak 2
Quote: Aadmi karz lauta sakta hai ... ehsaan nahi
Trans: A man can pay back a loan ... but not a favour

Title: Gunjan Saxena: The Kargil Girl
Quote: Har baar main tujhe bachane nahi aa paaunga ... lekin itna jaanta hoon ki kal agar mujhe zaroorat padi ... toh tu mujhe har baar bachane aayegi
Trans: I won't be able to come every time to save you ... but I know that if I ever need you ... then you'll come each and every time to save me

Title: Gunjan Saxena: The Kargil Girl
Quote: Yeh duniya kitni mushkil hai auraton ke liye ... par uska hal pinjre mein qaid ho jaana nahi hai ... pinjra todke udh jaana hai
Trans: This world is very difficult for women ... but locking yourself in a cage isn't the solution for that ... the solution is to break the cage and fly away

Title: Gunjan Saxena: The Kargil Girl
Quote: Agar tum apne kaam mein imaandaar ho ... toh desh ke saath gadaari kar hi nahi sakti
Trans: If you're honest in doing your job ... then you'll never be unfaithful to your country

Title: Gunjan Saxena: The Kargil Girl
Quote: Joh log mehnat ka saath nahi chhodte ... kismat kabhi unka haath nahi chhodti
Trans: Those who don't give up on hard work ... destiny never leaves their hand

Title: Khaali Peeli
Quote: Apan bole toh full dhamaal ... aur yeh heroine full jhol, full bawaal ... ab aise combo mein lafda toh hoiga hi na
Trans: I'm full on entertainment ... and this heroine is full on crazy ... now this combination is definitely going to bring some disruption

Title: Khaali Peeli
Quote: Hamare dhande mein zubaan ki keemat jaan se bhi zyada hoti hai
Trans: In our business a promise has more value than a life

Title: Khaali Peeli
Quote: Apne life ke do sabse important strong point ... pehla tashan ... aur doosra emotion
Trans: The two most important strong points of my life are ... first attitude ... and second emotion

Title: Khaali Peeli
Quote: Insaan ki kismat badalti hai ... fitrat nahi
Trans: A person's destiny can change ... but not his habits

Title: Ginny Weds Sunny
Quote: Har rishtey ki destiny alag hoti hai ... aur woh toh chance deke hi pata chalti hai
Trans: Every relationship has a different destiny ... and we only come to know about it after we give it a chance

Title: Ginny Weds Sunny
Quote: Dil ke matter mein dimaag ko laaoge na ... toh forever lonely reh jaaoge
Trans: If you use your brain in the matter of your heart ... then you'll be lonely forever

Title: Ginny Weds Sunny
Quote: Badhon ka kaha aur amla ka khaya ... baad mein hi raas aata hai
Trans: Suggestion from elders and food made from gooseberry ... their benefits come to life later on only

Title: Ginny Weds Sunny
Quote: Hum Punjabiyon ke paas aur hai hi kya ... ek emotions, ek paneer
Trans: We Punjabi's have nothing but ... emotions and cottage cheese

Title: Chhalaang
Quote: Jeet aksar unki ho jaaya karti hai ... joh haar man'na taalte chale jaate hai
Trans: Often those people end up winning ... who keep delaying the belief that they're losing

Title: Chhalaang
Quote: (Apni gali mein toh kutta bhi sher hota hai) - Hamari gali mein na master, bahar se aaya hua sher bhi kutta hota hai
Trans: (Even a dog is like a tiger in his own street) - Master, in our street even a tiger from outside is like a dog

Title: Chhalaang
Quote: Teacher ka kaam hai sikhana ... 90 laane wale ko 100 tak toh koi bhi le jaa sakta hai ... 10 waale ko 40 tak le jaao toh baat hai
Trans: A teacher's job is to teach ... anyone can take a student who gets 90% to 100% ... but if you can take a student who gets 10% to 40%, then that's some achievement

Title: Chhalaang
Quote: Choti umar ke dost rakhne se koi jawan nahi ho jaata ... aur badi umar ke dost rakhne se koi samajhdar nahi ho jaata
Trans: Making younger friends doesn't make anyone younger ... and making elder friends doesn't make anyone wiser

Title: Ludo
Quote: Ludo is life ... life is Ludo
Trans: The game of Ludo is life ... and life is a game of Ludo

Title: Ludo
Quote: Ab life ki fitrat hai lena, toh legi ... ab yeh tumpe hai ki munh phulake doge ya daant dikhake
Trans: It's the habit of life to screw you, so it'll screw you ... now it's up to you whether you'll accept that with a sad face or with a smile showing your teeth

Title: Ludo
Quote: Kuch rishton mein logic nahi hota hai ... sirf magic hota hai
Trans: Some relationships don't have any logic ... they only have magic

Title: Ludo
Quote: Purana paap aur purana pyar aksar lautke aate hai ... aur jab aate hai toh lagake jaate hai
Trans: Often old sins and old love return back ... and when they return, they end up being bad for you

Title: Laxmii
Quote: Zindagi mein kisi bhi mukaam par pahunchkar sabse zaroori hai kuch pal wahan rukna ... peeche dekhna ... aur un logon ko thanks bolna jinki wajah se aaj aap us mukaam par ho
Trans: In life whenever you reach great heights, then the most important thing is to pause there ... look behind ... and say thanks to those people because of whom you were able to attain those great heights today

Title: Laxmii
Quote: Tera pati hai na harami, tedha hai par tera hai
Trans: Your husband is very naughty, but still he's yours

Title: Laxmii
Quote: Problem aur solution ka faasla sirf ghutne aur zameen tak ka hota hai ... aur ek baar sajda kiya toh problems khatam
Trans: The distance between a problem and it's solution is only that of the distance between the knees and the ground ... and all the problems end when you bow down to pray

Title: Laxmii
Quote: Ek bache ko aasmaan mein udne ke liye par aur oonchai se girne ka dar ... dono maa baap se hi milte hai
Trans: For a kid, the wings to fly in the sky and the fear of falling from height ... both qualities are given by the parents

Title: Suraj Pe Mangal Bhari
Quote: Har taale ki ek chaabi hoti hai ... aur jiski chaabi nahi na hoti, uski hathodi hoti hai
Trans: Every lock comes with a key ... and the one that doesn't come with a key, there's a hammer for that

Title: Suraj Pe Mangal Bhari
Quote: Mujhe talash hai ek aisi pativrata ladki ki ... joh mummy ko kitchen mein ghusne na de aur pati ko bedroom mein se nikalne na de
Trans: I'm in search of such a virtuous girl ... who won't let her mother-in-law enter in the kitchen and who won't let her husband leave the bedroom

Title: Suraj Pe Mangal Bhari
Quote: Aapki toh twacha itni gori hai ke aapki mail se cream ban jayegi
Trans: Your skin is so fair that even the dirt on your body can easily be turned into a cream

Title: Suraj Pe Mangal Bhari
Quote: Aap jaisi ladki ka haath lagna matlab ... ek kilo doodh mein se dus kilo paneer ka nikalna
Trans: When a girl like you touches with her hand ... then it's like, one kilo of milk turning into ten kilos of cottage cheese

Title: Durgamati: The Myth
Quote: Bana diya bhooton ka baboot ... lekin tumhari aankhen aur pasina toh de rahi hai kisi aur hi baat ka saboot
Trans: Did you crush the ghost ... but your eyes and sweat are giving proof of something else

Title: Durgamati: The Myth
Quote: Pyar mein hai na jhagde joh hote hai woh nasdeekiyon ki nishani hote hai
Trans: Fights in between people who love each other are a sign of closeness between them

Title: Durgamati: The Myth
Quote: Imaandari se medal milta hai ... insaaf nahi milta
Trans: With honesty you get a medal ... not justice

Title: Durgamati: The Myth
Quote: The power of people is always stronger than the people in power
Trans: The power of people is always stronger than the people in power

Title: Shakeela
Quote: Acting kya hai, oxygen hai ... uske bagaira mar jayenge
Trans: Acting is nothing but oxygen ... we'll die without it

Title: Shakeela
Quote: Main fan ke dil mein aata hoon aur dushman ke dimaag mein
Trans: I come in the heart of my fan and in the mind of my enemy

Title: Shakeela
Quote: Kauva ho ya hans ... har panchi ki fitrat rehti hai udaan barne ki
Trans: Be it a crow or a swan ... it's in the nature of every bird to fly

Title: Shakeela
Quote: Kuch logon ko pata hota hai ki kya karna hai, kahan jaana hai ... aur woh apne taqdeer se lad-jagadkar apna maqam bana hi lete hai ... aur kuch logon ko kainaat chunti hai ... unhe bas us chunne huye raste pe chalna hota hai
Trans: Some people know what they have to do, where they have to go ... and they fight with their destiny and attain their goals ... while some people get selected by the universe ... and they just have to walk on that selected path

Title: Coolie No. 1 (2020)
Quote: Jiske saath hai upar wala ... uske saath kabhi kuch wrong nahi hone wala
Trans: The one who has god on his side ... nothing wrong can happen with him

Title: Coolie No. 1 (2020)
Quote: Main aapko aap kehke bula raha hoon aur aap hai ki seedha tu pe aa gaye ... agar main tu pe aa gaya na toh aapki thu-thu ho jayegi
Trans: I'm addressing you with respect and you're directly disrespecting me ... if I start to disrespect you then you'll get defamed

Title: Coolie No. 1 (2020)
Quote: Aaj ki zindagi mein coolie kaun nahi hai ... har koi toh bhoj uthata hai ... koi ghamon ka, koi karzon ka, toh koi zindagi ka
Trans: In today's life who's not a porter ... everyone is carrying some form of weight on them ... either the weight of sorrows, or the weight of debts, or the weight of life

Title: Coolie No. 1 (2020)
Quote: Kidhar aap up in the sky so high ... kidhar woh zameen pe pada jinga fry
Trans: You're up in the sky so high ... and he's like a fried prawn laying on the ground

Title: Madam Chief Minister
Quote: Yeh woh pradesh hai jahan joh metro banata hai woh chunaav haarta hai ... aur joh mandir banwata hai wohi jeet'ta hai
Trans: This is a state where the one who builds the metro train loses the election ... and the one who builds a temple wins

Title: Madam Chief Minister
Quote: Main shaadi shuda hoon ... par kismat ki maari hoon ... magar apne baap ki janni nahi joh jhooth bolun ... main aaj bhi tumhari hoon
Trans: I'm married ... but my destiny has been hard on me ... if I'm lying then I'm not a daughter of my father ... and even today I belong to you all

Title: Madam Chief Minister
Quote: Joh na karta tumse pyar ... usko maaro jootey char
Trans: The one who doesn't love you ... hit that person with shoes

Title: Madam Chief Minister
Quote: Rajneeti mein jab apno ka samarthan khone lago ... toh padh tyaag dene mein hi bhalai hai
Trans: In politics once you start losing your supporters ... then it's better to simply resign from the position

Title: The Power
Quote: Aaj sabse badi power, muscle power nahi hai ... political power hai
Trans: The biggest power today isn't muscle power ... it's political power

Title: The Power
Quote: Agar lamba jeena chahte ho toh dushman ki izzat karna seekho ... chahe woh kitna bhi kamzor kyun na ho
Trans: If you want to live long then learn to respect your enemy ... no matter how weak he is

Title: The Power
Quote: Apne gusse ko aansuon mein mat behne de ... uska istemaal kar aur unse chun chun ke badla le
Trans: Don't let your anger flow with the tears ... use it and take revenge against each one of them

Title: The Power
Quote: Aadmi uske kaam se nahi ... uski soch se bada hota hai
Trans: A person doesn't become big from his work ... he becomes big from his thinking

Title: Kaagaz
Quote: Kisaan beejh issi liye boohta hai taaki ek din fasal kaat sake ... aur rajneeti mein bhi bakra issi liye paala jaata hai taaki samay aane par uski qurbaani di jaa sake
Trans: A farmer sows seeds so that one day he can reap the crop ... and in politics you nurture a person so that when the time comes then you can sacrifice him

Title: Kaagaz
Quote: Ramji ke liye aasaan tha Ravan ko maarna ... uska dus maatha tha par dikhta tha ... yahan system ke Ravan ka naa jaane kitna maatha hai, kitna munh hai, kitna aankh hai ... aur jab bhi koi munh kholta hai toh gareeb ki bali maangta hai ... uska adhikaar cheenta hai ... kaise lade is system se
Trans: It was easy for Lord Rama to kill Ravana ... even though he had ten heads but yet they were all visible ... here's the Ravana of the system has so many heads, so many mouths, so many eyes ... and whenever a mouth opens then it asks for the sacrifice of a poor person ... it steals his right ... so how should we fight against this system

Title: Kaagaz
Quote: Kabhi akhbaar, kabhi khat kaagaz ... rozmarra ki zaroorat kaagaz ... aane jaane ki sahulat kaagaz ... jeene marne ki izazat kaagaz ... pyar ki chittiyan bhi kaagaz ki ... kaam ki arziyan bhi kaagaz ki ... jashan mein jhandiyan bhi kaagaz ki ... jism ki mandiyan bhi kaagaz ki ... bane naaton ka bhi gawah kaagaz ... kahin shaadi, kahin nikah kaagaz ... kahin talaak ka gunah kaagaz ... banaye aur kare tabah kaagaz ... cheen le khet, ghar, zameen, kaagaz ... poche aankhon ki bhi nammi kaagaz ... har jagah yoon hai laazmi kaagaz ... jaise ghar ka hai aadmi kaagaz ... kuch nahi hai, magar hai sab kuch bhi ... kya ajab cheez hai yeh kaagaz bhi
Trans: At times paper is used for news, at times for letters ... paper is an everyday necessity ... paper makes it easy to come and go ... paper is the permission to live or die ... love letters are written on paper ... work requests are written on paper ... banners in a party are made from paper ... bodies are sold on paper ... paper is a witness of relationships ... somewhere marriages are on paper ... somewhere divorces are on paper ... paper makes you and destroys you as well ... paper steals your farm, your house, your land ... paper also wipes your tears ... paper is compulsory everywhere ... it's like paper is a member of the house ... it's nothing but yet it's everything ... paper is such an unique thing

Title: Kaagaz
Quote: Jiske haath mein nyay dene ka aadhikar ho aur nyay na de ... woh hoth hai asal mritak
Trans: The one who has the power to do justice and doesn't do justice ... that person is a real dead person

Title: The White Tiger
Quote: Ek Indian businessman wohi hai joh seedha bhi ho aur tedha bhi ... joh aastik bhi ho aur nastik bhi ... joh kapti bhi ho aur sacha bhi ... sab kuch ek saath
Trans: An Indian businessman is someone who is straightforward and a crook as well ... who is a theist and an atheist as well ... who is a cheat and a honest person as well ... everything together

Title: The White Tiger
Quote: Purane dino mein jab Hindustan sone ki chidiya hua karta tha ... tab yahan hazaron jaatiyan thi ... par aaj kal sirf do tarah ki jaat hai ... pehli jinka pet bada hai aur doosri jinki bhookh ... jinki kismat mein do cheezein hai ... ya toh nighalo ya niwala bano
Trans: In the good old days when India was a golden bird ... then there were thousands of different castes ... but nowadays there are only two types of caste ... first those who have a big belly and second who are hungry for food ... and they have only two options in their destiny ... either eat someone or become their bite

Title: The White Tiger
Quote: Gareeb ke liye upar aane ke sirf do hi raaste hai ... jurm ya politics
Trans: A poor person has only two ways to come up ... crime or politics

Title: The White Tiger
Quote: Ghulami na karne ki azaadi, ek din, ek ghante, ek minute, ek pal ke liye bhi bahut hi keemti hai
Trans: The freedom from slavery has a lot of value even for one day, for one hour, for one minute, for one moment

Title: Tuesdays & Fridays
Quote: Pyar kahi khushiyon ki guarantee ke saath nahi aata ... lekin hota aise hi hai ... dil khol kar
Trans: Love never comes with a guarantee of happiness ... but this is how it happens ... with an open heart

Title: Tuesdays & Fridays
Quote: Jab dil toot'ta hai na ... toh life ke sabse khoobsurat rishtey hum pehchaan nahi paate
Trans: When our heart is broken ... then we're unable to recognize the most beautiful relationships of life

Title: Mumbai Saga
Quote: Jab iraada marne maarne ka ho ... toh fikar nahi, taiyaari karte hai
Trans: When the intention is to kill or die ... then one should work on preparations, rather than worrying about it

Title: Mumbai Saga
Quote: Dhokhe ki khaasiyat hai ... ki dene wala aksar koi khaas hi hota hai
Trans: Deception has a specialty ... the one who deceives is often someone special to you

Title: Mumbai Saga
Quote: Bandook toh sirf shaunk ke liye rakhta hoon ... darane ke liye naam hi kaafi hai
Trans: I keep a gun only as a hobby ... just my name is enough to create fear

Title: Mumbai Saga
Quote: Meri goli se bachne ke liye tujhe baar-baar khushkismat hona padega ... aur mujhe sirf ek baar
Trans: To escape from my bullet you'll have to be lucky again and again ... and I just have to be lucky once

Title: Gangubai Kathiawadi
Quote: Zameen pe baithi bahut achi lag rahi hai tu ... aadat daal le ... kyun ki teri kursi toh gayi
Trans: You're looking very good sitting on the ground ... get habituated to this ... because you've lost the chair of your position

Title: Gangubai Kathiawadi
Quote: Arre jab shakti, sampatti, sadbuddhi, yeh teeno hi auratein hai ... toh in mardon ko kis baat ka guroor
Trans: When women are the embodiment of all three, power, wealth and intelligence ... then what makes these men feel so superior

Title: Gangubai Kathiawadi
Quote: Hum dil mein aag aur chehre par gulaab rakhte hai ... mitakar aapke mardon ki bhookh hum un auraton ka rubaab rakhte hai
Trans: We keep fire in our heart and a rose on our face ... we extinguish the lust of your men and we're proud to be women

Title: Gangubai Kathiawadi
Quote: Izzat se jeene ka, kisi se darne ka nahi ... na police se, na MLA se, na mantri se, na bhadwon se, kisi ke baap se nahi darne ka
Trans: Live with respect and don't fear anyone ... not the police, not the Member of the Legislative Assembly (MLA), not the minister, not the pimps, absolutely don't fear anyone

Title: Roohi
Quote: Phool hai gobi ka, sabzi mat samajhna ... pyar hai bhanware ka, humdardi mat samajhna
Trans: This is a cauliflower, don't consider it as a vegetable ... this is bumblebee's love, don't consider it as sympathy

Title: Roohi
Quote: Mohabbat mein aashiq raat ki neend, din ka chain, bank balance, mobile ka top-up, sab kho dete hai ... maine toh phir bhi dimaag ka ek pench hi khoya hai
Trans: Lovers in love lose their sleep at night, their peace during the day, their bank balance, their mobile recharge, everything ... I've only lost one screw of my brain

Title: Roohi
Quote: Dost harami ho toh aata hai maza ... aur premi harami ho toh jeevan ban jaye saza
Trans: If your friend is an idiot then it's great fun ... and if your lover is an idiot then life becomes a punishment

Title: Roohi
Quote: Bhindi sa shareer lekar Undertaker ki diet follow kar rahi hai yeh toh
Trans: She has a body like okra but she follows the diet of Undertaker

Title: Saina
Quote: Saamne koi bhi ho ... main toh bas maar doongi
Trans: It doesn't matter who's in front of me ... I'm just going to kill them

Title: Saina
Quote: Darr asal mein is baat ka nahi hai ke hum bade sapne dekhte hai joh poore nahi hote ... asal mein darr toh is baat ka hai ke hum chote sapne dekhte hai joh poore ho jaate hai
Trans: The fear is not from the fact that we see big dreams that don't get fulfilled ... the fear is from the fact that we see small dreams that do get fulfilled

Title: Saina
Quote: Woh joh matki phodne ka khel hota hai na ... matki phodta toh ek hi hai ... lekin usse us oonchai tak pahunchane wale bahut kandhe hote hai ... mukaam saamne dikhta hai ... aise mein bedhadak chalaang lagani chahiye ... phisalkar gir padhe toh wohi kandhe sambhal lenge ... lekin agar matki tak pahunche aur phod dali ... toh itihaas rach doge
Trans: The game in which you break a pot ... there's only one person who breaks the pot ... but there are many shoulders that take that one person to that height ... now when you see your goal in front of you ... then in that situation you should jump without any fear ... because even if you slide and fall then those shoulders will save you ... but if you get to the pot and break it ... then you'll create history

Title: Saina
Quote: Number one ke sapne paalna khatre se khali nahi hota
Trans: Dreaming about being number one is full of danger

Title: Toofaan
Quote: Apna toh kaam hi khauff ka hai ... aankh mein dekho toh saamne wala moot dena chahiye
Trans: Fear is our business ... when we look into someone's eyes, then that person should accidentally pee

Title: Toofaan
Quote: Mohabbat ka chewing gum mat phulao ... phatenga toh apne munh pe hi laafa aayenga
Trans: Don't blow-up the chewing gum of love ... if it pops then it'll be a slap on your face itself

Title: Chehre
Quote: Hamari adalaton mein justice nahi, judgement hota hai ... insaaf nahi, faisla hota hai
Trans: In our court there's no justice, just direct judgement ... there's no fairness, just direct decision

Title: Chehre
Quote: Aaj imaandaar woh hai jiski baimaani pakdi nahi gayi ... aur begunah woh hai jiska jurm pakda na gaya ho
Trans: Today a honest person is someone whose cheating hasn't been caught ... and an innocent person is someone whose crime hasn't been caught

Title: Chehre
Quote: Har ghadi chashm-e-kharidaar mein rehne ke liye ... kuch hunar chahiye bazaar mein rehne ke liye ... badnaami se shohrat ka woh rishta hai ke log ... nange ho jaate hai akhbaar mein rehne ke liye
Trans: To always be in the eye of the buyer ... you need some talent to stay in the market ... wealth and defamation have such a relationship that ... people are willing to get naked to be in the news

Title: Chehre
Quote: Hamara kanoon andha hai ... issi liye hamara insaaf bhi andha hai ... hum sochte kuch aur hai aur hum karte kuch aur hai ... kanoon sunta kuch aur hai aur insaaf karta kuch aur hai
Trans: Our law is blind ... that's why our justice is also blind ... we think one thing and we do something else ... our law listens to one thing and our justice does something else

Title: Koi Jaane Na
Quote: Hum sab ke andar do shaksh hote hai ... ek shareef, jisse hum duniya se milate hai ... aur doosra badmash, jisse chupate hai
Trans: We all have two characters within us ... first the honest one, whom we show to the world ... and second the naughty one, whom we hide

Title: Koi Jaane Na
Quote: Joh khoya hai woh ek khwaab hai ... aur joh paaya hai woh lajawab hai
Trans: What I've lost is a dream ... and what I've gained is amazing

Title: Koi Jaane Na
Quote: Musafira sa dil mera ... tu mili tham gaya ... meharbaan joh tu hua ... khushi mili, gham gaya ... pehle sa kuch bhi hai nahi ... lagun main khud ko ajnabi ... tere kareeb hoon ... naseeb yoon dhadke hai abhi
Trans: My heart is a traveller ... but it stopped when I met you ... when you showered your love on me ... then I attained happiness and all the sorrow went away ... nothing is like what it was before ... I feel like a stranger to myself ... I'm close to you ... and now my destiny is changing fast

Title: Koi Jaane Na
Quote: Insaan ki sabse badi taqat apni kalpana hoti hai
Trans: A human's biggest strength is his own imagination

Title: The Big Bull
Quote: Is desh mein hum kuch bhi kar sakte hai ... nakli promoters use kar sakte hai ... police ko rishwat de sakte hai ... media ko dhamka sakte hai, logon ko khareed sakte hai, kuch bhi kar sakte hai ... bas ek rule hai ... pakde nahi ja sakte
Trans: We can do anything in this country ... we can use fake promoters ... we can give bribe to the police ... we can threaten the media, we can buy people, we can do anything ... but there's only one rule ... we cannot get caught

Title: The Big Bull
Quote: Is duniya mein na zyada tar log apni kismat likhwa kar laate hai ... lekin kuch log kismat khud likhte hai
Trans: Most people in this world are born with their destiny already written for them ... but some people write their destiny themselves

Title: The Big Bull
Quote: Kahani kirdaar se nahi ... halaat se pehda hoti hai
Trans: A story isn't born from a character ... it's born from a situation

Title: The Big Bull
Quote: Zindagi mein do cheez zaroori maani jaati hai ... pani aur sona ... pani ke bagair aadmi jee nahi sakta ... sona na khane ka kaam aata hai, na peene ka, na nahane ka, na dhone ka ... lekin phir bhi bhaav sone ka hai, pani ka nahi
Trans: In life two things are considered to be important ... water and gold ... a person can't live without water ... whereas gold isn't used for eating, drinking, washing, cleaning ... but still the price of gold is more than the price of water

Title: Thalaivi
Quote: Yeh ladai logon ke liye hai ... apne swabhimaan ke liye hai ... is ladai mein hum gir sakte hai, zakhmi ho sakte hai, magar hum peeche nahi hat sakte
Trans: This battle is for the people ... for our own self respect ... in this battle we can fall, we can get wounded, but we can't back out

Title: Thalaivi
Quote: Aaj tune jis tarah bhari sabah mein mera apmaan kiya hai ... waisa hi cheer haran Kauravon ne Draupadi ka kiya tha ... woh satta ki ladai bhi woh jeeti thi ... aur yeh satta ki ladai bhi main jeetungi ... kyun ki Mahabharat ka doosra naam hai Jaya
Trans: Today the manner in which you've defamed me in front of everyone ... the Kauravas had stripped Draupadi in the same manner ... she had won that battle for power ... and I'll also win this battle for power ... because Jaya is the second name for Mahabharata

Title: Thalaivi
Quote: Baat aise karo joh dil ko lage ... dil par nahi
Trans: Say something that touches the heart ... and not hurts the heart

Title: Thalaivi
Quote: Jeet agar sar pe chhad jaye toh haar se bhi buri ban sakti hai
Trans: If victory gets on your head then it can become worse than the defeat

Title: Radhe
Quote: Radhe jaane ke liye nahi, bhejne ke liye aaya hai ... aur tere hisse ki biryani hum sab mil-baant kar khayenge ... aur bolenge Eid Mubarak
Trans: Radhe hasn't come to leave, he's come to send people ... and we all will eat the biryani of your share ... and we'll say have a blessed Eid

Title: Radhe
Quote: Tumhare dusvi pass hone se pehle ... ya toh woh jail ke andar honge ... ya zameen ke andar
Trans: Before you pass your 10th grade exam ... they'll either be inside the jail ... or else inside the ground

Title: Radhe
Quote: Tumhe pata hai darr ke aage aur peeche kya hai ... darr ke peeche hai maut ... darr ke aage hai zindagi
Trans: Do you know what's in front and behind fear ... there's death behind fear ... and there's life in front of fear

Title: Radhe
Quote: Tum darr se bhaagogi, darr tumhare peeche bhaagega ... aur tumhe daboch lega ... usse behtar yeh hai ke tum darr ke peeche lapko aur darr ko bhagao
Trans: If you run away from fear, then fear will run behind you ... and it'll snatch you ... better than that is to run behind your fear and make fear run away from you

Title: Bewafa Sanam
Quote: Ishq karna toh lagta hai jaise maut se bhi badi ek saza hai ... kya kisi se shikayat kare hum, jab apni taqdeer hi bewafa hai
Trans: Being in love feels like a punishment bigger than death ... how should I complain to anyone, when my own destiny is unfaithful

Title: Bewafa Sanam
Quote: Jis tarah saanp se zehar alag nahi kar sakte ... ussi tarah jurm se mujrim ko aap alag nahi kar sakte
Trans: Like you can't separate poison from a snake ... just like that you can't separate a criminal from crime

Title: Bewafa Sanam
Quote: Har insaan mujrim nahi hota ... lekin har mujrim insaan zaroor hota hai
Trans: Every human isn't a criminal ... but every criminal is definitely a human

Title: Bewafa Sanam
Quote: Jailon ko jail ki tarah nahi, balki aspatal ki tarah treat karna chahiye ... aur mujrimon ko mujrimon ki tarah nahi, bimaaron ki tarah treat karna chahiye
Trans: We should treat a jail like a hospital and not like a jail ... and we should treat criminals like sick people and not like criminals

Title: Haseen Dillruba
Quote: Pagalpan ki hadh se na guzre, woh pyar hi kaisa
Trans: Love that doesn't cross the limits of craziness, ain't love

Title: Haseen Dillruba
Quote: Amar prem wohi hai jispe khoon ke halke halke se cheente ho ... taaki usse buri nazar na lage
Trans: Eternal love is something that has light marks of blood on it ... so that no one can cast an evil eye on it

Title: Haseen Dillruba
Quote: Har kahani ke na bahut pehlu hote hai ... farak bas yeh hota hai ke kahani suna kaun raha hai
Trans: Every story has many facets ... the difference just lies between who's reciting the story

Title: Haseen Dillruba
Quote: Yehi toh problem hai arranged marriage ki ... love marriage mein mehnat karni padti hai na ... arranged marriage mein pakki-pakai parosi huyi ladki samne mil jaati hai na
Trans: This is the problem in arranged marriage ... to be in a love marriage you have to work hard ... but in an arranged marriage you get a girl ready to go in front of you

Title: Anamika (1973)
Quote: Haan karta hoon toh aate hai paseene unko ... na na karta hoon toh raaton ko woh dar jaate hai
Trans: When I say yes then she starts to sweat ... and when I say no then she feels scared in the night

Title: Anamika (1973)
Quote: Hum apne dard ki tauheen kar gaye hote ... agar sharaab na hoti toh mar gaye hote
Trans: I would've have insulted my pain ... and I would've died had there not been alcohol

Title: Bhuj: The Pride Of India
Quote: Mere marne ka maatam mat karna ... maine khud yeh shahadat chunni hai ... main jeeta hoon marne ke liye ... mera naam hai sipahi
Trans: Don't cry for me when I die ... as I've myself selected this martyrdom ... I live only to die ... my name is soldier

Title: Bhuj: The Pride Of India
Quote: Bahe khoon mera toh Hindustan ke liye ... agar jaaye meri jaan toh Hindustan ke liye ... ya Allah yehi toh aarzu hai meri ... aur ab main chahti hoon Allah tera karam aur tirange ka kafan
Trans: If I shed my blood then be it for my country India ... if I lose my life then be it for my country India ... this is my only desire god ... and now god I only want your blessings and a shroud made from the tricoloured flag of India

Title: Bhuj: The Pride Of India
Quote: Hai liye hathyar dushman taak mein baitha udhar ... aur hum taiyaar hai seena liye apna idhar ... khoon se khelenge Holi, ghar watan mushkil mein hai ... sarfaroshi ki tamanna ab hamare dil mein hai
Trans: The enemy is alert with a weapon on the other side ... and here I'm ready with my chest ... we'll play Holi with blood as our country in facing tough times ... and the desire for revolution is in our hearts

Title: Bhuj: The Pride Of India
Quote: Ya khuda teri adalat mein meri ek zamanat rakhna ... main rahoon ya na rahoon, mere Hindustan ko salamat rakhna
Trans: O God, please keep my surety in your court ... whether I live or die, but keep my India safe

Title: Shershaah
Quote: Jab koi doosra banda aake sapna todta hai na ... toh banda sambhal jaata hai, koi problem nahi hoti ... par jab tu khud saare sapne todega na apne ... aadmi mar jaata hai andar se
Trans: When someone else breaks your dream ... then you can bear it without any problem ... but if you yourself will break all your dreams ... then you'll die from inside

Title: Shershaah
Quote: Main tiranga lehrakar aaunga ... nahin toh us mein lipatke aaunga ... lekin aaunga zaroor
Trans: I'll come making sure that the Indian flag is flying high ... or else I'll come wrapped in it ... but I'll come for sure

Title: Shershaah
Quote: If questioned, be ready with your answers ... and if you counter question, be ready for the answers
Trans: If questioned, be ready with your answers ... and if you counter question, be ready for the answers

Title: Shershaah
Quote: Ek fauji ke rutbe se bada koi aur rutba nahi hota ... vardi ki shaan se badi koi aur shaan nahi hoti ... aur apne desh se bada koi dharam nahi hota
Trans: There's no status higher than the status of a soldier ... there's no pride bigger than the pride of a uniform ... and there's no religion bigger than your country

Title: Mimi
Quote: Hum joh sochte hai woh zindagi nahi hoti hai ... hamare saath joh hota hai woh zindagi hoti hai
Trans: Life isn't what we think ... life is what happens with us

Title: Mimi
Quote: Parents banne ke liye baccha pehda karna zaroori nahi hai ... aur parents banne ke liye baccha tumhara hona bhi zaroori nahi hai
Trans: You don't need to have children to become a parent ... and neither does the child have to be yours to become a parent

Title: Kya Meri Sonam Gupta Bewafa Hai
Quote: Kisi ko bewafa kehna bahut aasaan hota hai ... par usse samajhna utna hi mushkil hota hai
Trans: It's very easy to call someone unfaithful ... but it's very hard to understand them

Title: Kya Meri Sonam Gupta Bewafa Hai
Quote: Bada makaan, badi dukaan, aur badi car se zyada zaroori hota hai ... badi soch ka hona
Trans: Rather than having a big house, a big shop, a big car ... it's important to have big thinking

Title: Kya Meri Sonam Gupta Bewafa Hai
Quote: Dimaag ka khula rakhna utna hi zaroori hai jitna ki tijori ka band rehna
Trans: It is important to keep the mind open as much as it is to keep the safe locked

Title: Kya Meri Sonam Gupta Bewafa Hai
Quote: Pyar khwaabon tak pahunchne ka sahara ho sakta hai ... magar iraada nahi
Trans: Love can be a support to reach for your dreams ... but it can't be the intention

Title: Bell Bottom
Quote: Itihaas badalne ke liye ek kissa hi kaafi hota hai
Trans: To change history all you need is one incident

Title: Bell Bottom
Quote: Life mein na backup ka bhi backup hona chahiye
Trans: In life you should have a backup for a backup

Title: Bell Bottom
Quote: Galat ko uske anjaam tak le jana dhokha nahi hai ... galat ka saath dena dhokha hai
Trans: To take wrong to its end result isn't cheating ... being on the side of wrong is cheating

Title: Chalte Chalte (1976)
Quote: Khoon teen kisam ke hote hai ... ek jis mein khoon behta hai ... doosra jis mein aansun behte hai ... aur teesra jis mein jazbaat beh jaate hai
Trans: There are three types of murder ... one in which blood flows ... second in which tears flow ... and third in which emotions flow

Title: Chalte Chalte (1976)
Quote: Yakeen ek dhaage ki tarah hota hai ... joh toot jaaye toh jud nahi sakta ... aur agar joda jaaye toh gaant padh jaati hai
Trans: Trust is like a thread ... which can't be connected once it breaks ... and if you try to connect it then a knot forms in it

Title: Chalte Chalte (1976)
Quote: Doctor dawaon se jism ka ilaaj karta hai aur physiatrist dimaag se dimaag ka ... dil ke paas pahunch kar, usse samajh kar, samjha kar
Trans: A doctor treats the body with medicines and a physiatrist treats the mind using his mind ... by going close to the heart, by understanding it, by making it understand

Title: Chalte Chalte (1976)
Quote: Patte theek pad gaye toh jeet nahi toh haar ... jaise dil mil gaye toh pyar nahi toh takraar
Trans: If you get good cards then you'll win or else you'll lose ... just like if the hearts unite then there's love or else there's quarrel

Title: Saath Saath
Quote: Sach ki awaaz sabse oonchi hoti hai
Trans: Truth has the loudest voice

Title: Saath Saath
Quote: Maana ke pareshan hoon, lachaar nahi hoon ... insaan hoon, bikne ko main taiyaar nahi hoon
Trans: I agree that I'm troubled, but I'm not helpless ... I'm a human, but I'm not ready to be sold

Title: Saath Saath
Quote: Humne paisa banaya tha apni zaroorat ke liye ... aur hum khud ban baithe hai zaroorat paise ki
Trans: We created money for our own needs ... and we ourselves have become the need for money

Title: Saath Saath
Quote: Insaan ki zaroorat kitni hai ... ghar ki, roti ki, kapde ki ... aur isse zyada jama karne ki koshish jurm hai, gunah hai sarasar
Trans: What are the needs of a human ... house, food, clothes ... and trying to collect more than this is a total crime

Title: Arth
Quote: Koi rishta kitna hi bada, kitna hi gehra kyun na ho ... zindagi ka hissa hota hai ... zindagi kisi rishtey ka hissa nahi, ki ek rishta khatam ho jaye toh zindagi khatam ho jaati hai
Trans: It doesn't matter how important or deep a relationship is ... it's just a part of life ... life isn't a part of a relationship, where life comes to an end when one relationship ends

Title: Arth
Quote: Is duniya mein kuch muft nahi milta ... chahat ho ya zaroorat, paane ke liye kuch na kuch dena hi padta hai
Trans: In this world you don't get anything for free ... be it love or necessities, you have to give something or the other to get something

Title: Arth
Quote: Pyar ko janne ya samajhne ki zaroorat nahi hoti hai ... sirf mehsoos karna hi kaafi hota hai
Trans: There's no need to know or understand love ... it's more than enough to just feel it

Title: Shiddat
Quote: Jis koshish mein shiddat na ho woh koshish kis kaam ki
Trans: An attempt that's done without passion is of no use

Title: Shiddat
Quote: Kya hota hai yeh pyar ... kaise nibhate hai isse ... kuch log apne pyar ko paane ke liye duniya ke sabse lambe raste par nikal padte hai ... kuch log pyar mein poori duniya se ladh padte hai ... har kisi ka apna apna tareeka hai, apni apni kahani hai ... sirf ek common factor hai ... shiddat
Trans: What's love ... how do you fulfill it ... some people go on the longest journey in the world to attain their love ... some people fight against the entire world for their love ... everyone has their own method, their own story ... but there's one common factor ... passion

Title: Shiddat
Quote: Pyar kisi ke liye gehra bhanwar hai, le doobta hai ... aandhi hai, toofan hai, shola hai ... aur kisi ke liye pyar naav jaisa, paar laga deta hai ... khamoshi hai, nazm hai, thandi hawa ka jhaunka hai
Trans: For someone love is like a deep vortex, it'll drown them ... it's like high winds, it's like a storm, it's like an ember ... and for someone love is like a boat, it can get them across ... it's like silence, it's like a poem, it's like a gust of cool breeze

Title: Antim: The Final Truth
Quote: Jis din ae sardar di hategi ... sab di phategi
Trans: The day this Sikh man goes crazy ... everyone will fear me

Title: Antim: The Final Truth
Quote: Is anpad ka angootha chapwa do ... agar meri satak gayi toh iska bheja chaap doonga register pe
Trans: Take the fingerprint of this uneducated person ... because if I lose my temper then I'll print his brain on the register

Title: Antim: The Final Truth
Quote: Jahan jahan sardar, wahan wahan gurudwara aur langar ... koi bhooka nahi marta
Trans: Where there's a Sikh man, there's gurudwara and free meal over there ... no one dies with hunger

Title: Bunty Aur Babli 2
Quote: Baimaan ko agar baimaani se kaato ... toh saali wohi hai sabse badi imaandari
Trans: If you cheat a cheater ... then bloody hell that becomes the greatest honesty

Title: Bunty Aur Babli 2
Quote: Behtar yehi hoga ki khud hi surrender kar do ... nahi toh humne pakda na ... toh itne lambe ke liye andar dalenge ki khandan tumhi pe khatam ho jayega
Trans: It's better if you surrender yourself ... or else if I catch you ... then I'll put you in jail for such a long time that your family will end with you

Title: Bunty Aur Babli 2
Quote: Yeh world hai na world, is mein do tarah ke log hote hai ... pehle woh joh darshak banke khel ka lutf lete hai ... aur doosre woh joh maidaan mein utarke khelte hai, aur khel ka rukh badalte hai
Trans: There are two kinds of people in this world ... first who become spectators and enjoy the game ... and second who step in the field to play the game, and change the direction of the game

Title: Bunty Aur Babli 2
Quote: Yeh world hai na world, is mein do tarah ke log hote hai ... pehle woh joh rasta seedha pakadte hai aur har raat chain ki neend sote hai ... aur duje woh joh rasta tedha pakadte hai aur har raat aise jeete hai jaise ki woh unki aakhri raat ho
Trans: There are two kinds of people in this world ... first who take the right path and sleep in peace every night ... and second who take the wrong path and live every night as if it's their last night

Title: Satyameva Jayate 2
Quote: Signal pe khada hawaldar sau rupaye mein meherban hai ... naam tumhara Khan toh aatankvadi poora khandan hai ... wahan apne hi ghar mein pankhe pe latak raha kisaan hai ... lekin mera desh mahaan hai
Trans: The traffic cop standing on the signal will let you go for 100 bucks ... if your name is Khan then it means that your entire family is a terrorist ... over there a farmer is hanging himself from a fan in his own house ... but still you're saying that our country is great

Title: Satyameva Jayate 2
Quote: Meri hathkadi aur mere bandook ki goli ... dono pe uska naam likha hai
Trans: My shackles and the bullet in my gun ... both have his name written on it

Title: Satyameva Jayate 2
Quote: Tann, mann, dhan se badkar jan gan man
Trans: The Jana Gana Mana national anthem is bigger than body, heart, and wealth

Title: Satyameva Jayate 2
Quote: Har gunehgar ko aisi maut maroonga ... ki agle janam mein maa ki kok se kya ... baap ki top se bhi nikalne se darega
Trans: I'll kill every criminal in such a way that ... in next life they'll not only fear coming out from their mother's womb ... but they'll also fear coming out from their father's sperm

Title: Hum Do Hamare Do
Quote: Har ek vyakti ko apna jeevan saathi, apna khana aur apni sharaab chun'ne ka poora adhikaar hona chahiye
Trans: Every person should have the full right to select their life partner, their food, and their alcohol

Title: Hum Do Hamare Do
Quote: Yeh zindagi ke highway pe bahut sari gaadiyan daudti rehti hai ... tu kisi ko rokega toh ruk jayegi ... lift maangega toh mil jayegi ... aur jagah nahi hogi na toh bhi adjust karke bhita denge ... lekin yeh joh family wali gaadiyan hoti hai na ... woh saale rokte nahi hai ... lift bhi nahi milti hai ... jagah hogi toh bhi andar behetne nahi denge
Trans: Many cars run on the highway of life ... if you try to stop them then they'll stop ... if you ask for a lift then you'll get it ... and even if they don't have space then to they'll adjust and accommodate you ... but when it comes to family cars ... they won't stop for you ... they won't give you a lift ... and even if they have space then to they won't accommodate you

Title: Hum Do Hamare Do
Quote: Ghar khareedne se pehle na do baar dekh lena chahiye ... ek baar din mein, ek baar raat mein ... din mein joh hai na woh ghar samajh aata hai ... aur raat mein mohalla samajh aata hai
Trans: Before buying a house you should look at it twice ... once during the day, once during the night ... during the day you'll get an idea about the house ... and during the night you'll get an idea about the neighbourhood

Title: Hum Do Hamare Do
Quote: Yeh rishtey bahut nazuk hote hai ... unhe jhooth ki buniyaad pe nahi banana chahiye ... ek baar toot jaye toh phir jodna bahut mushkil hota hai
Trans: Relationships are very delicate ... you should not establish them on the foundation of lies ... because if they break then it's very hard to bond them again

Title: Meenakshi Sundareshwar
Quote: I want to work at a small firm, where I can make a big difference ... rather than working at a big firm, where I make no difference
Trans: I want to work at a small firm, where I can make a big difference ... rather than working at a big firm, where I make no difference

Title: Meenakshi Sundareshwar
Quote: Engineering aapko kisi job ke liye train kare ya na kare ... lekin life ki tangi mein aiyaashi karna zaroor sikha deti hai
Trans: Whether engineering trains you for a certain job or not ... but it definitely teaches you how to enjoy even when you don't have much in life

Title: Meenakshi Sundareshwar
Quote: Ladne ke reasons bahut hote hai ... toh manane ke options bhi dher sare hote hai
Trans: If there are many reasons to fight ... then there are several options to pacify as well

Title: Meenakshi Sundareshwar
Quote: Engineers make the best husbands ... how ... we don't give up that easily ... engineering ho ya relationships, ek baar decide kar liye toh poora karte hai ... we're great problem solvers ... engineer ko ek baar answer bata do ... wahan tak pahunchna kaise hai, woh figure out kar lega ... we're experts in time management ... ek raat mein exam ke liye prepare karna ho ya ek date mein girlfriend ko impress karna ho ... no one can do that better than an engineer
Trans: Engineers make the best husbands ... how ... we don't give up that easily ... be it engineering or relationships, once we decide on it then we do complete it ... we're great problem solvers ... if you tell the answer once to an engineer ... then he'll figure out the path to get to it ... we're experts in time management ... whether you need to prepare for the exam in one night or you need to impress your girlfriend in one date ... no one can do that better than an engineer

Title: Tadap
Quote: Agar main sharaab hota, gale se utarta, sir pe chadta ... har dil par mera raj hota ... har pyaas ka taj hota
Trans: If I were alcohol, then I would flow through the throat and intoxicate the mind ... I would rule over every heart ... I would wear the crown of every thirst

Title: Tadap
Quote: Sabse khoobsurat jhooth wohi log bolte hai joh hamesha sach bolte hai
Trans: The most beautiful lie is told by someone who always says the truth

Title: Tadap
Quote: Mere paas khone ke liye kuch nahi bacha ... tere paas bachane ke liye kuch nahi chhodunga
Trans: I don't have anything left to lose ... and I won't leave anything for you to save

Title: Tadap
Quote: Saanp ko doodh sirf Nag Panchami ke din hi pilaya jaata hai ... kisi aur din ghar mein gusse toh usse kuchla hi jaata hai
Trans: You feed milk to a snake only on the day of Naga Panchami ... if it enters the house on any other day, then you try kill it

Quote: Ground ke bahar hamari life mein kuch bhi ho raha ho ... jab hum yeh uniform pehenkar ground mein utarte hai ... toh hamara ek hi maqsad hota hai ... jaan lagake desh ke liye khelna
Trans: It doesn't matter what's happening in our life outside the ground ... because when we enter the ground wearing this uniform ... then we have just one intention ... and that is to put our life on the line and play for our country

Quote: Taste the success once ... tongue want more
Trans: Once you taste success ... then it becomes a habit and the tongue wants more

Title: Hum Kisise Kum Naheen
Quote: Kutta bhi jahan tukda khata hai wahan wafadari dikhata hai ... tujhe toh kutta kehna bhi kutte ki beizzati karna hai
Trans: Even a dog shows loyalty towards the place where he eats food ... calling you a dog is a disgrace to the dogs

Title: Hum Kisise Kum Naheen
Quote: Buzdilon ke haath se goli nahi chala karti ... jaan wohi le sakte hai joh jaan dena jaante hai
Trans: The hands of a coward can't fire a bullet ... only those people can take a life who themselves can give their life

Title: Pushpa: The Rise
Quote: Brand ka thappa aadmi ke kapdon mein nahi hota hai ... character mein hota hai
Trans: The stamp of a brand isn't found on the clothes that one wears ... it's found in their character

Title: Pushpa: The Rise
Quote: Pushpa naam sunke flower samjhe kya ... fire hai main
Trans: You thought that I'm a flower hearing my name Pushpa ... but I'm fire

Title: Pushpa: The Rise
Quote: Main idhar kisi ke phatte mein taang adane ko nahi aaya ... raj karne ke liye aaya main
Trans: I didn't come here to stick my foot into someone else's matter ... I've come here to rule

Title: Pushpa: The Rise
Quote: Samne koi bhi ho ... main jhukega nahi
Trans: It doesn't matter who's in front of me ... I simply won't bow down

Title: Bachchhan Paandey
Quote: Jab koi rasta nazar na aaye hum umeed ki taraf mudhte hai ... ek suraj doobta hai toh lakhon chirag bhi toh jal uthte hai
Trans: When can't see any path forward then we turn towards hope ... when a single sun sets then millions of lamps light up

Title: Bachchhan Paandey
Quote: Tumko toh saala hum pakdenge ... aur phir pakad ke chhod denge ... hum goli chhodenge aur lala tum zindagi chhod dena
Trans: I'll definitely catch you ... and I'll leave you after catching you ... I'll leave a bullet from my side and you my friend leave your life

Title: Bachchhan Paandey
Quote: Joh chand ko chhune ki chah rakhta hai ... wohi sitaron tak pahunchta hai
Trans: Those who desire to touch the moon ... they're the ones who reach the stars

Title: Bachchhan Paandey
Quote: Bhaukaal banaye rakhe ke liye bhay banaye ke rakhna bahut zaroori hai
Trans: To maintain the swag it's very important to maintain the fear

Title: Prithviraj
Quote: Dharam ke liye jeeya hoon ... dharam ke liye maroonga
Trans: I've lived for duty ... I'll die for duty

Title: Prithviraj
Quote: Sabhi salaami ke liye taiyar ho ... Hindustan ka sher aa raha hai
Trans: Everyone get ready for the welcome ... as the lion of India is coming

Title: Prithviraj
Quote: Jiske peeche sau sar, sau samanth, watan aur vachan ke liye sar katane ko taiyar ho ... woh samrat Prithviraj Chauhan hota hai
Trans: The one who is followed by 100 warriors, by 100 courtiers, who are ready to sacrifice their life for their country and promise ... that mighty king is Prithviraj Chauhan

Title: The Kashmir Files
Quote: Jab tak sach joote pehenta hai ... jhooth poore duniya ka chakkar lagake aa jaata hai
Trans: By the time truth puts the shoes on ... lies goes around the entire world and comes back

Title: The Kashmir Files
Quote: Tootte huye log batate nahi ... unhe suna jaata hai
Trans: People who are broken don't say anything ... you have to listen to them

Title: The Kashmir Files
Quote: Politics ka bas ek hi anth hai ... vinaash ... maut
Trans: Politics has just one ending ... destruction ... death

Title: The Kashmir Files
Quote: Log akhbaar sirf dekhte hai, padhte nahi ... aur TV news sirf sunte hai, samajhte nahi
Trans: People only look at the newspaper, they don't read it ... and they only hear the news on the TV, they don't understand it

Title: Heropanti 2
Quote: Phatne se phele agar phatne wale ki na phatte ... toh phir kya fateh
Trans: If someone doesn't feel scared before they're going to be scared ... then you haven't conquered over them

Title: Runway 34
Quote: Kabhi us jagah mat jaana jahan tumhari soch tumse pehle pahunch jaye
Trans: Never go to a place where your thoughts reach before you

Title: Runway 34
Quote: Galati karne ke baad aap sirf teen cheezein kar sakte hai ... galati ko maanna, galati se seekhna, aur doobara us galati ko na karna
Trans: After making a mistake you can only do three things ... accept the mistake, learn from the mistake, and don't repeat that mistake

Title: Runway 34
Quote: Main cheezein kabhi bhoolta nahi ... I have a photographic memory
Trans: I never forget things ... I have a photographic memory

Title: Runway 34
Quote: Har hadse ke do pehlu hote hai ... kya hua aur kaise hua ... is kya aur kaise ke beech mein joh daira hai ... sach wahin chupa hota hai
Trans: Every incident has two sides ... what happened and how did it happen ... in the gap that exists between the what and the how ... the truth is hidden over there

Title: Dhaakad
Quote: Jism se rooh alag karna business hai mera
Trans: It's my business to separate the soul from the body

Title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
Quote: Violence, violence, violence ... I don't like it ... I avoid ... but violence likes me ... I can't avoid
Trans: Violence, violence, violence ... I don't like it ... I avoid it ... but violence likes me ... and I can't avoid it

Title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
Quote: Meri dosti layak koi yaar nahi ... meri dushmani jhel sake aisi talwar nahi
Trans: There's no friend who's worth my friendship ... and there's no sword that can bear my enmity

Title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
Quote: Talwar chalakar, khoon bahakar jung ladna ... tabahi nahi ... tarakki hoti hai
Trans: Fighting a war with swords and shedding blood ... isn't destruction ... it's advancement

Title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
Quote: Khoon se likhi huyi kahani hai yeh, siyahi se nahi badegi ... agar aage badana hai toh phir se khoon hi maangegi
Trans: This story has been written with blood, and it won't move forward with ink ... if we have to take it further then it'll ask for blood again

Title: Jersey
Quote: Team ka best player captain nahi hota ... captain woh hota hai joh team ke har player se best nikal ke unko lead kare
Trans: The best player of a team isn't the captain ... the captain is someone who extracts the best from every team player and leads them

Title: Jersey
Quote: Jeb se kangley hai aur khareedne bungaley hai
Trans: He doesn't have money in his pocket and he wants to buy a bungalow
